40001001	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oosoo ka David-maꞌyoona suaketu, tamme Jew numu oꞌnosoo ekow pooha natuukwepu menoꞌo oo-toogoo manekena. Soo Jesus togesapa Jew numu, oosoo tuwazoo Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu, noꞌoko tamme Jew numu-waꞌne.
40001002	Soo Abraham tooa Isaac mee naneꞌa. Soo Isaac tooa Jacob mee naneꞌa. Soo Jacob tooa Judah mee naneꞌa. Soo Judah ewow wangaꞌamu gaꞌyoo.
40001003	Judah waahoo nanaꞌatse doodooamu-gaꞌyoo Perez-no Zerah mee nananeadu. Mu pea uga Judah kunoopea Tamar mee naneadu. Soo Perez tooa Ram mee naneꞌa.
40001004	Soo Ram tooa Amminadab mee naneꞌa. Soo Amminadab tooa Nahshon mee naneꞌa. Soo Nahshon tooa Salmon mee naneꞌa.
40001005	Mu Salmon noko Rahab tooa Boaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Boaz yise wawaꞌa nodukwadoo, Ruth mee naneadu, mu tooa Obed mee naneꞌa. Soo Obed tooa Jesse mee naneꞌa.
40001006	Soo Jesse tooa David mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu. Soo David kummaꞌakoosoo nana Uriah mee naneadu nodukwa makoo Solomon mee naneadu tooa-gaꞌyoo.
40001007	Soo Solomon tooa Rehoboam mee naneꞌa. Soo Rehoboam tooa Abijah mee naneꞌa. Soo Abijah tooa Asa mee naneꞌa.
40001008	Soo Asa tooa Jehoshaphat mee naneꞌa. Soo Jehoshaphat tooa Joram mee naneꞌa. Soo Joram tooa Uzziah mee naneꞌa.
40001009	Soo Uzziah tooa Jotham mee naneꞌa. Soo Jotham tooa Ahaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Ahaz tooa Hezekiah mee naneꞌa.
40001010	Soo Hezekiah tooa Manasseh mee naneꞌa. Soo Manasseh tooa Amon mee naneꞌa. Soo Amon tooa Josiah mee naneꞌa.
40001011	Soo Josiah tooa Jechoniah mee naneꞌa. Oꞌno mu Jew numu wohomu Babylon numu mee nananeadu, ka mu Jew numu pummesoo tubewa-witoo mahuka, mu nedyaawekwuse.
40001012	Soo Jechoniah tooa Shealtiel mee naneꞌa. Soo Shealtiel tooa Zerubbabel mee naneꞌa.
40001013	Soo Zerubbabel tooa Abiud mee naneꞌa. Soo Abiud tooa Eliakim mee naneꞌa. Soo Eliakim tooa Azor mee naneꞌa.
40001014	Soo Azor tooa Zadok mee naneꞌa. Soo Zadok tooa Achim mee naneꞌa. Soo Achim tooa Eliud mee naneꞌa.
40001015	Soo Eliud tooa Eleazar mee naneꞌa. Soo Eleazar tooa Matthan mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthan tooa Jacob mee naneꞌa.
40001016	Soo Jacob tooa Joseph mee naneꞌa, oo nodukwa Mary. Soo Mary yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus dooaꞌadoo.
40001017	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus, Te Pabeꞌe David-maꞌyoo suaketu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.
40001018	Ka Te Pabeꞌe yaaꞌa teepu-koobatoo oo nadooaꞌadoopu-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Mary ka Joseph koomadookwuse yise Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi koheahoo. Pana soo Joseph gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Mary Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi oo kooheana gi oo nodukwadookwu mee soonamme. Soo Joseph besa sootumatuguna gi numu tuukweꞌe ka Mary kohea-kwitu, gi oo soomanasookwikuna.
40001020	Oetu ewa soohanena, soo Joseph yise mee nose. Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kasa-gaꞌyoo meeoo oo tuukwe,
40001021	Ka Mary saaꞌa tooa-doose, u sakwa yise Jesus mee oo nea, Numu Magwetzoidu, mee naꞌunnedu. Oosoo Jesus pumme nanumu, pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoikwudu, ka suda mu tumatuguna mu nemawunikukwu.”
40001022	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha. Menoꞌo yise toge oo-toogoosoo manepetu. Soo Te Naa yadooawabe mee unnepu,
40001023	“Soo tsuadumu gisoo nana-no suda manedu saaꞌa kohease, naatse dooaꞌadoodooa. Oosoo naatse Emmanuel mee naneadooa, Soo Te Naa tamme-no,ꞌ mee naꞌunnedu.”
40001024	Soo Joseph yise saaꞌa ka Mary nodukwadoo, ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo pumme netamma-kwaꞌne.
40001025	Pana soo Joseph gi ka Mary matzama, saaꞌa oo tooaꞌadoose ka oongaꞌa Jesus mee oo nea.
40002001	Ka Jesus ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwi nadooaꞌadoose, saaꞌa susumudu numu taba tsebooena-kwana kemmadu, ka mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu, Herod mee naneadu-baa petuse oo tubenga,
40002002	“Hano soo tuhaꞌyoo nadooaꞌadoopu ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu? Numme ka paatusooba poonne paba patakwetseapunne ka tsebooegese, ka oo nawuena ne tuukwedu. Yow numme petuhoo oo-matoo nanesootuhigena.”
40002003	Soo Herod oo nakasutakuoo.
40002004	Soo Herod yise ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhidu moohedu nanano sumu tuungu, yise mu tubengu, “Hanotoo yise soo Mu Pabeꞌe nawuekwu?”
40002005	Umu yise meeoo, “Oona ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwitoo ka yaa teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatoo nawue, mu nanatugwengapu-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna Te Naa tunemamakwupu,
40002006	‘Soo Bethlehem mee naneadu ka teepu Judah-koobatu unu nanenagapunnedu. Soo numu ka nuga Jew nanumu moohekwudu oonona saaꞌa kemmadooa,’ mee soo Te Naa mooasoo unnepu-gaꞌyoo.”
40002007	Soo Herod yise ka pumme tummatzidu meeoo watze netamma, “Ka mu numu mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu numu nu-matusoo taya.” Soo Herod yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo soo paatoozooba mu poonnepu tsebooege?” Umu ka ooka tu pudu poonne-kwitu oo tuukweꞌe.
40002008	Soo Herod yise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo tuhaꞌyoo Bethlehem-wi mee nu oo naka. Mu sakwa mease, ka oo mayudooase, e tuukwe, oꞌno nu punnoꞌo oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu,” meeꞌe soo Herod mu esayikute.
40002009	Umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise Bethlehem-witoo mease ka paatoozooba poonnesoo.
40002010	Umu tubetse besa sokwama ka paatoozooba poonnesesoo oo nageka, umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise ka nobe ka tuhaꞌyoo pukwiꞌyoona-wi petuga.
40002011	Umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu yise ka nobe-kwi tzoonooakase, ka tuhaꞌakoo poonne, ka oo pea Mary mee naneadu noko, umu oo-matoo nanesootuhi ooka tu hee-matu oo heme: unu nanenagadu oa tupe, ka besa kookwanadu, ka unu nanenakudu sanape numu yaꞌena punoko natuguyina tuwazoo.
40002012	Ka mu nose-kwi umu paatoozooba sopedakwadoodu mee natuuya tuukwe, “Gi ka Herod-matoosoo kodyukapana. Atatamesoo nobe-kwitoo kodyuka.”
40002013	Ka mu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwatoodu numu kodyukase, soo Joseph mee nose. Ka oo nose-kwi, soo Te Naa tummatzidu, toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa petuse mee yise ka Joseph netamma, “Yotsese, namamea ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwitoo, ka Jesus noko Mary hanega. Osoo tutooepunne, nu saaꞌa mu tuukwedooa, oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu kodyudooa. Soo Herod ka Jesus watekwu ka Jesus batsakwuse.”
40002014	Soo Joseph yise ka tuponnese ka tu nosepu mayoho ka Egypt-witoo togaba-ma namamea, tu nodukwa noko tu tooaꞌa nobeahooka.
40002015	Umu ooosapa Egypt-wi ka Herod numu-kooba oo katu. Esoo namanedu Te Naa oꞌnosoo tunemamakwupu oo yadooawabe tubona meeoo, “Nu ka e dooa Egypt-wikoo bihookwu.”
40002016	Soo Herod unutse sutaꞌa ka mu numu ka paatoozooba-witu sopedakwatoodu gi pu-baa kodyu petugasoo, “Umuga sumuna e nemooaga,” mee soonamme. “Oosoo mu Pabeꞌe sumuna saaꞌa e kapikoo e tatsatsebooadooa,” mee soonammena. Oꞌno yise ka mu tu tutukwutumawabe noꞌoko nanaꞌatse, waha tomodu-toohatu dooake, mu oongaꞌa nokosoo ka Bethlehem-witu goe tuungu umu oo-tzageꞌe-kwitu tuwow. Menoꞌo ka soo tuhaꞌyoo oonanoꞌo tomopu mee oo sooyugwena ka umu paatoozooba-witu sopedakwadoodu pumme tuukwe-makoo.
40002017	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Jeremiah mee naneadu ekow botugu menoꞌo yise oo-toogoo manepetu.
40002018	“Ka mu Jew numu Ramah mee naneadu tubewa-gapunnedu-kwitu ewaꞌyoo numu tubetse unu sakwaꞌe. Umu tu doodooamu-kooba sakwina gi pumme netusoonaku-waꞌne ka tu doodooamu tuipu.”
40002019	Ka saaꞌa soo Herod yise yaꞌe. Ka oo yaꞌese, soo Joseph nosesoo tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa tummatzidu, toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo tuukweꞌe ka oo nose-kwikoo punowsoo noꞌyoona kodyuka ka mu Jew nanumu tubewa-witoosoo, ka mu Jesus-noko Mary-nosoo.
40002021	Umu oo tooꞌe nebatsayagadu mooasoo tuipu. Ka kodyukamena,
40002022	soo Joseph meeoo tunaka soo Herod tooa Archelaeus mee naneadu ka tu naa kapi manese ka mu Jew numu-kooba menoꞌo katudu, ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-kooba. Ka meeow tunakase oto tu meakwu-ma suaꞌe. Soo oo nosepu punnoꞌo gi oonow mu mea tuungu. Ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Nazareth mee naneadu ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
40002023	Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekena soo Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Meeꞌe soo Te Naa yadooawabe unnepu, “Oosoo ka Nazareth mee naneadu-wiꞌyoo kemmakwu.”
40003001	Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana John mee naneadu mu numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe oona gi hemma nadukadu pukwi naa-wiꞌyoona. Soo John mu numu pu-baa petudu mee netammayakwe.
40003002	“E nakapunne, mu sakwa ka suda mu tumatuguna maꞌwu, pudusoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu nemadabuekwu.”
40003003	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah ka John gisoo nadooaꞌadoo oo manekwuna, mee botugupu “Mana ka hemma nadukadu gi naa-kwiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi numu tunesootabuekwu, ‘E nananumu mu sakwa muusoo nuummabetseapunne ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwunoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwe, oꞌno mu besa oo nakabetseanokwu.’ “
40003004	Soo John puhu nagwese-kwi namasooana mokobu nateꞌa. Kua noko nota peha tukana oo-ma naakugwetzoinumme.
40003005	Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanotu tooe
40003006	Umu ka suda tu tumatugupu wahana yise mu nemawunidyakwe ka kaaheno meadabekwu mee tusooyugwese. Soo John yise ka Jordan mee naneadu hoo-kwi mu matzakadyakwe.
40003007	Mu Sadducee-no Pharisee mee nananeadu numu nanesootuhi moohedu tooe gi tunakaꞌoedyukupana ka John-baa petugase, umu punnoꞌo baa-wi oo namatzaka tuungu, soo John yise mee mu netamma, “Mu unu etzaꞌa. Saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu baa-wi mumme e matzaka tuungu pana mu gi ka mu tumaꞌemukwapu nematzagakwunaꞌe.
40003008	Mu mooeꞌugasoo sakwa ka suta mu manena tubetse maꞌwukase ka besa tamme manese, oꞌno sakwa yise nu baa-wi mu matzaka.
40003009	Gi besa nasooyugwena mee unnegonnopana, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Naa doodooamu numme ka Jew numuna.’ Mu tookwa gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe tu doodooamu mu mesoo mayugwe.
40003010	Mu sakwa besa tumatugu. Mu ka ooosapa gi besa tumatuguna, mu kadoo namayugwekwusoo tooe haga tooe gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo natunikwu.
40003011	Nu ka baa-wi mu matzakase, mu ka sutakoo podo mu meana maꞌwukase, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabekwu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu nuga oooonakwatusoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, nuga oooonakwa besaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhikwu, oosoo besa, gi totsabu mu mayugwekwu.
40003012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe petuse ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu nemadabuedooa ka mu bebesow ka mu suta-nagakoo tzobadooa. Ka pepesahoo numu yise tu nobe-kwi nabaaꞌyookukwu. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka tubetse gi tokedu goso-witoo namaꞌanakwunikwu.”
40003013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona Galilee mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmase oona ka Jordan hooda-kwi ka John-baa petuga.
40003014	Yise ka John baa-wi namatzaka tuungu. Soo John yise meeoo oo netamma, “How yise u nuga oooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo pana nuka baa-wi namatzaka tuungu?”
40003015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa nuka baa-wi matzaka, noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu mayohona.”
40003016	Soo John yise ka Te Pabeꞌe baa-wi matzaka. Ka Te Pabeꞌe batzebuegena soo Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo yotse punoonooeke-kwaꞌne manegese oonaga mani petu.
40003017	Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana yadooase mee unne, “Esoo Nuga Besa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu a soopedyana besa ma-matoo soonamme.”
40004001	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe oona numu-wanatoo taya oo nanesootuhi tuunguna.
40004002	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise suda oo tooꞌe nemadunagaꞌa. Watsu mano (40) tooi petuga nanesootuhina gi hemma tukana.
40004003	Ka saaꞌa yise soo Sutaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tooꞌe netamma, “U sakwa nasootzaꞌme ka Numu Manumudoopu Tooaꞌana. U sakwa ka eka tupe tukaba mayugwese ka tsuayina a tuka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo soonakabetseana, meeoo oo sukwe netamma,
40004004	“Soo E Naa meeoo unnepu, ‘Soo tukapu suuꞌmu nadukana gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu nakabetseana mu numu namagwetzoikwu.’ “
40004005	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oona Jerusalem-witoo pabow nobe, pukwi mu numu nanesootuhi-kwitoo bikea. Paꞌatseꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kooba oo bi petugase
40004006	yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa nanasookwugi manena ma-koobaꞌyoona nadawunihoo u ka Numu Manumudoopu Naa Dooa mee unnena. U gi namaniyaha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka u Naa u-kooba tueyaꞌe. ‘Soo U Naa ume pumme tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo u-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungukwu, umu paꞌakoosoo u-gwuuhookwu.’ “
40004007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi ume unnena nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo unnepu, ‘Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe mapoonnepana, haꞌoo sakwa oosoo mani mee sokwamadu-kwaꞌne.’ “
40004008	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise tuwazoo oo bi ka oona paꞌa kiba-matoo petugase, mu noꞌobatusoo nanaꞌatakoosoo numu ka teepu-koobatu oo tzapoonnekute. Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise meeoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo nuka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu moohe tuungu, umu yise noꞌyoona e nakabetseakwu. U ka nu-matoo nanesootuhina, nu ume mu nakabetsea tuungukwu.”
40004010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo meeoo netamma, “Nu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mee mooasoo tubotugupu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi. Tamme sakwa ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.’ “
40004011	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nepetukuse oo soomabanase, oo-baaꞌyoo meahoo. Yise Te Naa tutummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa wupetuhoose, ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi.
40004012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John nakwutamase oo nakase, ka teepu Galilee-witoo kodyuka. Ka Nazareth-wi nobe-ga pana ka Capernaum mee naneadu-witoo nowuꞌa. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna mee botugupu. “Mu numu ka Capernaum-wi
40004017	Yaa manakwana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu ka Te Naa-witu nanesootuhi tunedyooekooha, mee yise mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sutakoo gi nakabetseapana, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabe, oꞌno soo Te Naa noꞌoko pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu.”
40004018	Wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa pakwegana, mu Andrew-no Simon Peter mee nananeadu. Umu ka puma tu tuukwina ka banunadu-witoo wukwazuyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pakumi meana mu poonnese meeoo mu netamma,
40004019	“Mu sakwa nu-no memease e tummatzimo. Nu mu tunedyooena mu e nakatzimokwu, oꞌno mu numu nu-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
40004020	Umu nawangaꞌa yise ka puma tu tuukwina maꞌwuoogase yaa manakwana ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu manegakwu.
40004021	Umu-tzageꞌe wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa James-no John ka tu naa Zebedee mee naneadu-no punnoꞌo oona sake-wiꞌyoona ka puma tu tuukwina mabetsabedyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu kumi meadabena mu poonnegase mu nawangaꞌa bi.
40004022	Umu yise ka tu sake noko tu naa maꞌwukase ka Te Pabeꞌe-no memeahoo.
40004023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona noꞌoko mu tuoegoedu mabesakumena, yise mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona tuwow mu numu tunedyooemena mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku, pudusoo soo Te Naa puusoo besa mu sootuhikwu.”
40004024	Mana tooe hano tooe numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu naka, ka teepu Syria mee naneadu-witoo tooe. Mu numu tuoegoedu hane petudyakwe, tsoapayidu, yaꞌehookayidu, gi yuyutsunga manepu numu tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu mabesakuyakwe.
40004025	Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo nakatzipetu. Mana ka teepu Galilee-witu yise tuwazoo mana teepu Sumu Mano Nogadu-witu, Judea mee naneadu, yise ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitu, ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu ooenapatu numu tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe.
40005001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewahoo numu pu-baa petudyidu poonne ka nanaewasoo mu manemena. Ka oonahoo poꞌwoa-matoo mease, o katuse numme pumme nakatzimodu
40005002	putzageꞌe petuse ewow numu pumme nakapunne soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu nanesootuhi tunedyooena mee unakwe,
40005003	“Tamme ka Te Naa sookwina oo sopedakwadoona tamme besakoo nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa puusoo te nemadunagakwu.
40005004	Tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda te tumatuguna nemowunise, oꞌno suuꞌmu besa nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa besa te masokwamakukwu.
40005005	Tamme besaꞌyoona ka gi nidyupuna, tamme nasootuhikwu. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka teepu besasoo matabuese, tamme gi moobegwaga oo-koobakwi gwetzoimokwu.
40005006	Tamme nasootuhikwu ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa oe te tummatzikwu, ka besa pumme te nakabetseꞌa.
40005007	Tamme ka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu tutuha sooyugwena besa nasootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo tamme tutuha sooyugwekwu.
40005008	Ka Te Naa-tamme besa tusooyugwena tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa sopedakwadookwu.
40005009	Ka nanakukummaꞌakoosoo numu nanapuaꞌa neyugwena, tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno tamme Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
40005010	Ka Te Naa te nakabetseꞌa mu numu ka suda te matuguna, tamme nasootuhikwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa noꞌoko nasootuhipu tamme tu tuukwegapu ma te sootuhikwu.
40005011	Mu ka mu numu mumme gi petzabena gi too mu-no mu napuaꞌa, nanasuda nu-koobatoo esayina, mumme suda mu netamma sapa, gi suda sokwamapana, mu besa nasootuhikwu.
40005012	Mu sakwa besa sokwama soo Te Naa saaꞌa ka tu yadooawabe-kwaꞌne mu sootuhidooa, ka pu-baa mu petugase. Mu numu oꞌnosoo manakwana ooosapa ka Te Naa yadooawabe suda matugu.
40005013	Soo ongabe puu ka tukapu besa makamakute, tamme tutunakaꞌoedyukudu mu numu besa-tamme moohekwu. Soo ongabe ka tu kamana kadooꞌookoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, oosoo yise nahanekwunikwu. Ooosoo tamme punnoꞌo ka gi mu numu tummatzina ka gi kamadu ongabe-kwaꞌne tamme gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
40005014	Tamme sakwa numu kootabuakudu-kwaꞌne manepunne. Soo kootabuadu ka giba-maꞌyoona puu kwingaꞌyoopana mesoo napoonne.
40005015	Soo tukootabuakunoo ka paaꞌaꞌyoona kwingaꞌa-kwitoo mesoo kootabuakute. Soo numu nobe-kwitu puu ka kootabuapunnena numu noꞌoko hemma mesoo poonne. Gi soo numu ka tukootabuakunoo-kooba hemma hane.
40005016	Yooonnekoo ewaꞌyoo numu ka besa manena, ka tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌnesoo, oꞌno yise mu numu ka Te Naa netubetseꞌyikwu.
40005017	‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te mooa tumayohope gi he-toogoo mayugwe,’ mee sumuna naꞌunnekwu. Pana soo Te Naa noꞌoko eka nabodu togesapa e mayugwe tuungu, gi kadooꞌoo mu nemayugwe.
40005018	Nu mu tuukwekwu, soo Moses ka oꞌnosoo umu te nanamooatupu oo tuukwepu noꞌyoona kaaheno manekekwu. Oosoo gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40005019	Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka a nabotuguna nakabetseadu, tamme tu netammana, yise ka mu numu gi ooka nakabetsea tuunguna oosoo gi hee manekwu, ka Te Naa tamme oo nemadabue-wi oo manepetuse.
40005020	Tamme sakwa unu tunakabetsea, ka umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mu nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu oooonakwasoo. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.
40005021	Umu te nanamooatupu mee te tuukwedu, ‘Tamme ka numu batsase, soo numu nehanedu sakwa punnoꞌo te mesoo batsa.’
40005022	Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme ka te puaꞌa sutakuna tooetoo oo nesootzemana, te tumaꞌemukwana saaꞌa tamme matusoo kodyukwu.
40005023	Tamme mooasoo yaa ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petugonnose, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Tamme yise ka suda te puaꞌa te matuguna soomayuhoose
40005024	besasoo ka te puaꞌa-no hemma nemadabuese, yise o-no ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Oꞌno yise tamme besa nasootuhikwu.
40005025	Tamme ka numu sudu matuguna soo numu ka numu nehanedu-kobenatoo te bikwuse tamme sakwa oo puaꞌadoo togesoo meadabena. ‘Ta sakwa oo soomuꞌwa,’ mee oo netamma. Tamme ka gi oo puaꞌagana, ka tunehanepe-wi petugase oosoo tamme-witu suda ka numu nehanedu-kobenaꞌyoona te nemadabuekwu. Soo numu nehanedu yise ka mu tukwutumadu tamme wutuma tuungukwu.
40005026	Tamme yise nakwutumatugukwu, ka tamme tu tunekwina te mamakwu-kwitootooe, meeꞌe nu mu tuukwe.
40005027	Umu te nanamooatupu putoogoo tumayoho meana oꞌnosoo mee te tunetammakupu, ‘ Tamme sakwa gi nanakukummaꞌa-nosoo nanapotammapana.’
40005028	Nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa gi te pupuaꞌa nodukwa-no tooe how tooe manepana, tamme tookwa mooasoo te soonamme-kwi suda tusooyugwe ka oo manena.
40005029	Nu sakwa puu ka tumadinakwatu e pooe tzatsebooase oo takwasukwuni ka ookahoo suda nuka mayugwe. Tooe nu sumusoo pooe-gana natukuse sapa gi haꞌoo, oꞌno gi noꞌyoona e tookoo ka nidu-kwitoo natzakwunikwu,” meeꞌe soo Jesus e-makoo te tunenagakute.
40005030	“Nu sakwa ka tumadinakwatu e mi tsekaꞌase oo wuni ka suda oo-ma tumatuguna. Tooe nu ka sumusoo mi-gapana gi haꞌoo ka sutakoo e mi kadooꞌoo mayugwese gi noꞌyoona e tookoo natunikwu.
40005031	Soo te tumayohope meeoo, ‘Tamme sakwa ka nupoonnekwunikwuse oo botuguna oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka te nodukwa-no napoonnekwunikwuse.’
40005032	Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa ka nodukwadoose gi te nodukwa poonnekwunipana, tamme tumaꞌemukwa ka oo poonnekwunise. Soo te nodukwa ka kummaꞌakoosoo pootammana, tamme oo mesoo poonnekwuni. Tamme sakwa gi a napoonnekwunina mogoꞌne nodukwadoopana.
40005033	Umu te nanamooatupu mee tuwazoo te tunedyooꞌe, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-makoo meesoo tunedyahana, ka namano hayu te unnese, tamme oo-toogoo manekwu.’
40005034	Ka oo wahana, kaaheno oo waha, meeꞌe nu mu netamma, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwe. Yaatusoo hemma mamanepunne-makoo gi tunedyahapana. Yise gi too Te Naa manepunne-makoo tunedyahapana. Gi too tamme tammesoo nanedyahapana. Noꞌokoo hemma, soo Te Naa matabuepu, noꞌyoona hee oo-tooha manepunne.
40005038	Umu te nanamooatupu ooosapa mee te tunedyooedu, ‘Soo tooe haga tooe ka tu puaꞌa pooe tsetzatseboogese, oogow pooe sakwa punnoꞌo natsetzatsebooge. Ka e tamma nadosawekuse, oogow tamma sakwa punnoꞌo nadosaweku.’
40005039	Nu mu tuukwekwu tooe suda tamme tu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa gi umu-no nagoepana. Ka sumunakwatu te soba namatakeꞌehoose tamme sakwa oo sukwe tutzomunaku. Oꞌno oosoo ka sumunakwatu matakeꞌehookwu tuwazoo.
40005040	Tamme sakwa ka gi hownnekoo mu numu tumanagakuna, oosoo ka te kwasu gwuuse sapa, gi hownneꞌyoo.
40005041	Ka tooe haga tooe hemma tamme mu tzagwuhu tuungu-tzageꞌetoo sapa, tamme sakwa kwingaꞌatoosoo ooka oo tzagwuhukuka.
40005042	Ka mu numu hemma tamme mu natuungu, tamme sakwa mu gea.
40005043	Mu ka sumuna o nakadu ka oꞌnosoo mu numu meeoo unegayakwe, ‘Tamme sakwa te pupuaꞌamu soobedyana ka tamme wohonedu gi petzape.’
40005044	Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa ka tamme wohonedu soobedya, tooꞌe gi tamme mu soobedya sapa. Ka tamme mu nekusedya, tamme sakwa nanesootuhi besow umutoo nekwina.
40005045	Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo ka noꞌoko numu, tooe mu sutakoo sapa nanakwaꞌnesoo mu matugu. Soo Te Naa ka taba umu-koobatoo tsebooedu madaꞌe, ka powmabu tuwazoo.
40005046	Soo Te Naa gi besa te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu tamme-too besaꞌhoo suuꞌmu besa nanamatukuna nanasoobedya. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo ka besa tu namatuguna soobedya.
40005047	Tamme gi besa manakwe ka tamme pupuaꞌamu suuꞌmu besa yadooena. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu besa mesoo nanapuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.
40005048	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa, te paꞌanakwatu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, noꞌobatusoo numu besa soobedya.
40006001	Tamme sakwa gi naanamanepana, gi ooosapa numu poonnena suuꞌmu besa numu matugupana. Soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu, besa te sootuhikwu ka gi nasootzaꞌmena ooosapa besa te manakwe.
40006002	Ka mu tutuha manedu te maka-kwaꞌne, tamme sakwa gi numu tuukwepana ka tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe oo manekwuse. Umu nanetzamedu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee naneꞌyugwedu suuꞌmu, oo manakwe. Umu ka mu tutuha manedu numu maka nobe-kobenaꞌyoona, tooetoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona mu numu maka, oꞌno mu numu mu poonnekwu. Mu numu mooasoo meeoo mu tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Naa mu sootubetseaꞌyi,’ pana ka numu koobenaꞌyoona oo mu manakwe yise, ‘Umu besa manakwe,’ mee soo Te Naa gi mu netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40006003	Tamme sakwa mu tutuha manedu watzemaka. Gi sakwa haga oo sopedakwatoopana ka oo te manakwe, tooe te besa pupuaꞌamu pana.
40006004	Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu, ka mu tutuha manedu te watze tummatzaꞌe, ka te sopedakwadoona.
40006005	Tamme sakwa manaꞌyoona gi numu tamme poonne-kwiꞌyoona watze nanesootuhi gi namanasootzaꞌme numu poonnenaꞌyoona. Oꞌno soo Te Naa toge manakwe mee te netammana, te sootuhikwu. Susumudu mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneꞌyugwedu nasootzaꞌme, ka Te Naa-matoo papabatse nanesootuhina ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona yise ona mu numu nonobe-kobenaꞌyoona, tuwazoo. Mooasoo mu numu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu kaaheno manakwe,’ pana soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40006007	Tamme sakwa gi sumu-kwaꞌnesoo uꞌnaꞌwepana ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona. Mu numu gi Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo manakwe. Umu meeoo sokwama numme ka ewa unnena numme nanakabetseakwu mee.
40006008	Tamme sakwa gi ooosapa Te Naa ewasoo sumu-kwaꞌnesoo tuukwedyipana mooasoo soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo tooe gisoo pumme te tuukweꞌe sapa.
40006009	Mee sakwa noꞌyoona numu nanesootuhi. ‘U, Ne Naa ne paꞌanikwatu u tubetse besaꞌyoo.
40006010	U noꞌoko numme-kooba poohakatudu. Numme noꞌoko numu yaa teepu-koobatu ume mu nakabetseana soogwaꞌe, ka u-baatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
40006011	Nonotsa tu tabemea-kwi besa ne sootuhi.
40006012	Ka ne tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana, ka mu numu suda numme matugu numme puu oo soomuꞌwa.
40006013	Ne matzino, kaaheno ne mayugwe. Oꞌno numme besa-kwitoo tsebooe petugakwu.’
40006014	Ka mu numu suda tamme matuguduna oo soomuꞌwase, oꞌno Te Naa, te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwakwu ka suda te manakwe.
40006015	Pana tamme ka gi oo soomuꞌwuna ka numu suda tamme matugu, Te Naa, Te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo gi oo soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda te tumatugu.
40006016	Tamme ka te nanesootuhina manekuna gi nasootzaꞌmepana ka gi tukapu tukapana nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa besa sokwamana besa namabetsea. Mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu puu nasootzamena gi namabetseana suda sokwamadu-kwaꞌne tabuamoꞌo. Mu numu mooasoo, ‘Umu toge manakwe,’ mee mu netamma, pana soo Te Naa yise gi oo manedu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40006018	Tamme ka watze tukana nanesootuhina, soo Te Naa mooasoo gi te watzekute, ka mooasoo te sopedakwatoona besa te sootuhikwu.
40006019	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna ooosapa soogwipunne. Tamme ka oo-matu mease saaꞌa oo-baaꞌyoona soo Te Naa ooosapa besa te sootubetseaꞌyina ewa te nenagakwu. Tamme sakwa gi yaa teepu-koobatoosoo hemma te heegana mu numu unu nenagana soogwipana, gi ka teepu-koobatoo hemma ka Te Naa oooonakwa nenagapana. Umuoo ooonneꞌyoo kadooꞌoo sukwe manepetugadyidu: susumudu natzasooꞌadu, susumudu yungusanadooadu, susumudu natuduhatsasooadu.
40006021	Soo unu te nenagapunnena ka Te Naa-baa gi kadoo namayugwedu, gi tuwazoo natutuhatzasooadu. Soo te pewu yise ooosapa ka unu te nenagapunne-kwi manepunnekwu.
40006022	Soo te pooe tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka besa yaatu poonnena suuꞌmu tamme besaꞌyookwu, pana tamme ka sutakoo poonnena suta tusooyugwekwu. Tamme ka unu tammesoo besa tusooyugwena nasootuhikwu.
40006023	Ka tooe hemma tooe sutakoo soohanena ooosapa togano-kwi manepunne. Tamme ka waha-tamme tusooyugwena ooosapa ka togaba-witu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
40006024	Gi tamme waha-tamme tusooyugwena tamme gi waahoo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo sumu-noꞌokwisoo, tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nakabetsea, gi sakwa tamme ewahoo hemma nananenagadu suuꞌmu te heegakwuna soogwipunne. Tamme puu gi nanokwisoo waahoo numu moohedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sumuna sumuhoo besa soobedyana ka sumuoo gi petzabekwu.
40006025	Nu mu tuukwekwu mu sakwa gi nasootookepana gi suda nasooyugwewunupana ka tukapu mu kutuugekwuna, ka baa mu heebena mu tuugekwuna, ka wunapu pukwi mu namasooakwuna mu tuugekwuna. Soo Te Naa ka gwetzoibu te sootuhikwu.
40006026	Tamme sakwa ka mu hootsebaꞌa soohanena umu puu gi hemma haꞌoo yugwepana tu tukana maꞌyu ka Te Naa pumme mabetseꞌa. Tamme puu mu hootsebaꞌa oooonakwasoo nadatsungadu. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu puu noꞌoko te mabetsea tuwazoo ka kwingaꞌatoo te gwetzoimokwuna.
40006027	Tamme gi hownnekoosoo tammesoo kwingaꞌatoo te gwetzoimokwuna madaꞌe tamme sakwa yise gi ka tukapu te tuuge-kwitoo suda soonammekupana.
40006028	Tooe ka wunapu pukwi mu namasooakwuna tuugepana gi oowetoo suda nasooyugwepana. Mu tonegeaꞌa puu tubewabe-kwi naadu. Tooe umu puu gi hemma nakoobatoo matabuepana besa tatabuꞌa.
40006029	Umu tonegaꞌa ka Jew numu-kooba katudu Solomon mee naneadu kwasu oooonakwa besa tatabuꞌa.
40006030	Soo Te Naa umuoo tonegea besa tatabua matabue, tooe yabesoo mu takwasuhookwuse sapa. Tamme sakwa ka ooka Te Naa tamme mabetseadu nakabetsea.
40006031	Tamme sakwa yise gi suda sokwamapana ka haꞌoo tukapu natoogoo tuugena tuwazoo baa natoogoo te tuugekwuna tooꞌetoo ka wunapu pukwi te namasooana te tuugena tamme sakwa gi suda sokwamapana
40006032	ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne umu puu gi hekwitoo sapa suda nasooyugwe. Mooasoo soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu tamme-koobatoo te sopedakwadoo, puma te gwetzoina te sootuhi.
40006033	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa te nakabetseakwuna unu soogwi. Oosoo yise noꞌoko hemma puma te gwetzoina te sootuhikwu.
40006034	Tamme sakwa yise gi suda oo sokwamakupana, ka saaꞌa hemma manekwuna. Tamme mooasoo togekoo suda namanatsaꞌyana oosoo puusoo oo-toogoo manemeana nasoomuꞌwadu.
40007001	Tamme sakwa gi tunesootzimapana, gi tuwazoo suda numu netammapana, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sooyugwe.
40007002	Tamme ka mu tummatzina, soo Te Naa oogow punowsoo te makodyukukwu.
40007003	Tamme sakwa gi te puaꞌa nesagwikupana, ka sagwane oo tumaꞌemukwase. Tamme sumuna ookowsoo tumaꞌemukwa. Hownnekoo yise mu ka mu puaꞌa pooe-wikoo tuutsekoo hemma mesoo poonne ka mummesoo pooe-wikoo hemma pabatsekoo katu sapa?
40007005	Mooeꞌugasoo mu sakwa mummesoo pooe-witu tzatsebooase, oꞌno mu yaatu poonnena, ka mu puaꞌa mesoo tummatzaꞌe. Ooosoo sakwa mu ka suda mu tumatuguna yugwese, oꞌno mu ka mu pupuaꞌamu mesoo tummatzi.
40007006	Tamme sakwa ka mu numu gi tamme nakabetseadu, gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwepana. Umuoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu gi heesoobedyana, gi hemma sootubetseyi. ‘Oosoo gi hee,’ mee umuoo numu sokwamana te nekusegeakwu.
40007007	Tamme ka oo soogwina, nanetsagwayina, oꞌno tamme ookow nasootuhikwu.
40007009	Ka mu tooaꞌa tukaba nekwaꞌe, mu puu gi tupe oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40007010	Ka pakwe oo nekwaꞌe, mu puu gi togogwa oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40007011	Tooe tamme gi totogeꞌyoopana puu te dooamu besa matugu, soo Te Naa yise tamme besa matuguna te sootuhikwu.
40007012	Tammesoo besa namatugu-kwaꞌne sakwa tamme besa numu matugu. Oꞌno yise tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna mayohokwu.
40007013	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe, oosoo unu nameana tuutze hanoꞌyoo, pana soo sutaꞌyoo po paba hanoꞌyoona suta-kwitoo nameꞌa. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka sutakoo po nake.
40007014	Pana soo Te Naa besa po tubetse nagwetzoidu-kwitoo nameꞌa, gi moobegwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo tuutze hanoꞌyoona huutseꞌyoo numu ekow nage.
40007015	Tamme sakwa mu esagoedu numu, mu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneꞌyugwedu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Umuoo nunuꞌu-waꞌneꞌyoo numu kadooꞌoo mayugwedu, tooꞌe besaꞌyoo mee naneꞌyugwepana.
40007016	Mu ka mu ooonnekoo numu sopedakwadookwu ka suda mumme mu matugu-makoo. Tamme puu wuyupooe gi tsaꞌabu-makoo wutaꞌne-waꞌneꞌyoo, wuyupe-makoo suuꞌmu.
40007018	Noꞌyoona soo hee namasuadu tu pooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo suakute, susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo.
40007019	Soo tsaꞌabu sutakoo pooe-gaꞌyoo gi pumme tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo nuubetakwunina natunaꞌe.
40007020	Susumudu numu eka sutakoo pooe-gakoo tsaꞌabu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo mu tumatugu-makoo umu nasopedakwatoo ka gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoona.
40007021	Umu Te Naa nakabetseana oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu oo-baa petugakwu, gi umu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu, mee naneyugwedu.
40007022	Ka e kodyu petuse ewaꞌyoo numu mee e netammakwu, ‘U yow E Pabeꞌe. Nu ooosapa u unnepu mu numu tuukwedu. Nu mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, ka mu tsoapagoedu-makoo. Nu ewa nanabesa tumadabuegena, u pooha-toohakwi.’
40007023	Pana nu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Mu gi nu-notu, gi nu-tsageꞌyoopana mu ewa numu nemooaga. Ooonneꞌyoo nu mu taꞌya.’
40007024	Ka besa e naka tumayohokudu puu nu tuukwekwu. Tupe besa nobetoodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu ohobudu gi namanubue oo matabue.
40007025	Tooe ka baa unu hooꞌoo ka teepu putoohakwitu patokwenawunu sapa gi anoꞌa, oosoo ka besa namadabuepuna.
40007026	Mu numu ka e unnena gi oo nakatumayohodu, ka nana tu nobe teepu-kooba oo sukwe matabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo oo nobe-toona ka baa unu hoo petuse patadyoomowkwu.
40007027	Ka tu powma petuse ka baa unu hooꞌoo, unu tu hukwa petuse soo nobe gi besa namadabuena wunapowkwu tubetse paba suda unni petuse, gi hee nabenaꞌe.”
40007028	Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooamakwuse mu numu mee nananetamma, “Numme gi meeoo naꞌunnedu nakadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahadyakwe, gi ka umu te nedyooedu-kwaꞌne.”
40008001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-maꞌyoona wuegena, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-ma tzabehooke.
40008002	Sumuꞌyoo nana tookoo uayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwese nama oo pooha-matugu tuungu.
40008003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise oo-ma pooha matuguse mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu.
40008004	U sakwa ka mu numu nanesootuhikudu petuse, ka menoꞌo besa u manepu o tzapoonneku yise ka Moses tamme tunetamma-waꞌnesoo Te Naa pooha tuwunikuse. Mu tzapoonneku ka u tookoo uayina namabesakuna. Pana gi ka mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuse.”
40008005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petugase sumuꞌyoo mu tukwutumadu moohedu-matu, tubetse wawaꞌa, oo-baa petuse, meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e tummatzi.
40008006	Soo tooebetse nuka tummatzidu gi yutsunga manepu oona e nobe-wi, unu nuummaba wumana. Nu ookahoo u mabesakukwuna sookwaꞌe.”
40008007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa tooꞌe oo mabesakuhoodooa.”
40008008	Soo tukwutumadu moohedu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi mu-matu numu, mu Jew numme wakwawaꞌa nuutumooedu, tooe u gi nuga nobe-kwitoo kemmapana gi hownneꞌyoo. Nu oo sopedakwadoo u sakwa oo sukwe yadooese, soo e tummatzidu besa mane.
40008009	Nu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka numu nu-toohatu puu nuka nakabetseꞌa, nu ka meeoo mu netammaꞌyina, ‘U sakwa mea,’ oosoo yise meahooyakwe. Nu ka mu bihooyina, mu yise numatoo kemmayakwe. Nu ka nuka tummatzidu mee netammana, ‘U sakwa yoo mane,’ oosoo yise e nakabetseayakwe.”
40008010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka oo unnena nakase, ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Yow yise soo tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Noꞌoko ka mu Jew numu oooonakwasoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
40008011	Noꞌobatusoo numu tooe hanotutooe ka Te Naa-baa petuga ka oo ewa tukanoꞌo, oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe: Abraham, Isaac, tuwazoo Jacob meeꞌe nananeadu ono onokwu.
40008012	Tooe mu Jew numu yisetu, mee nanasoobedyadu gi oeꞌyookwu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu togabu-witoo nakwumaꞌanakwunina, yise ooosapa sakwikwu, soo suda mu tumuduguna yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
40008013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “U nobe-witoosoo mea. Nu mooasoo ka u tummatzidu mabesakupu, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
40008014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse oeꞌyoona mease, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga. Soo Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena oo tookoo udutuna onahoo hape. Umu o nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka peawabe-matoo mease,
40008015	oo mi-kooba matuguse oosoo besa mani. Oosoo peawabe yise yotseoose, mu tugoomahanekuhoose, mu tuka tuunguhoo.
40008016	Oogowsoo yongona ewaꞌyoo tuoegoedu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa nabi petudyakwe, tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Oosoo umu-ma pooha matugumese noꞌoko mu tuoegoedu numu mabesaku. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagukwuniyakwe.
40008017	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tuukwe yoo namanekwu mee tubotugu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe te mabesakukwu ka te tuoegoꞌe.”
40008018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tu naꞌoonnakwi ewa manemena mu poonnena, yise ka numme nakatzimodu ka banunadu oowenapatoo sake-wi mu natsemange tuungu.
40008019	Ka ooonnapa petugase, sumuꞌyoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa u-no mea tooe hano tooe u meꞌa sapa u-no manenumme.”
40008020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U deaꞌa gi nobe-gakwu. Mu etzaꞌa puu ka teepu-naga to-gaꞌyoo, mu hootsebaꞌa mu sunngabe-ma nobe-doo pana nu gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.”
40008021	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-no manennummedu meeoo oo netamma, “Nu sakwa e nobe-wi mooe nummedooa. E naa yaꞌe, nu oo mooe nomatugudooase, oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu u-no manennummedooa.”
40008022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa menoꞌosoo nu-no maneka. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu gi nuuno manedu saaꞌa puusoo tu nanumu tutuꞌina nanomatugudooa.”
40008023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka sake-wi tsebooeka ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no.
40008024	Ka banunadu panowmookwi ne manekase unu hukwa petuhoo. Soo baa pabatseꞌe pakwutiwununa ne sake bakaanogaꞌa. Te Pabeꞌe mesoo uwedape.
40008025	Umu oo nakatzimodu oo netupoonne mee unnese, “Uda! U sakwa tuponnese ne magwetzoi. Tamme sumuna badatuꞌihookwu.”
40008026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suipana, mu gi e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute pana nu mu magwetzoihookwu.” Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yotsehoose, ka baa noko hukwapa yooi tuunguhoo. Soo pakwutiwununa ka tu hukwamakwuse, punnoꞌo yooꞌihoo.
40008027	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee nananetammamoꞌo, “Uune! Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetseꞌa.”
40008028	Wahaꞌyoo tsoapagoedu naana ka teepu Gadara mee naneadu-kwi, oonow ka tupe tawaga-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo, ka mu tuipu nakoonaga. Gi haga oo-toogoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu naana ka unu susutaꞌyoona, numu tumaheyakwe noꞌoko numu kusegeayina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu natsemangegase oonow umu-tzageꞌe petuhoogase, ka sake-wiꞌyoona wuegase,
40008029	tsoapagoedu naana oo-baa pepetuhooga, papabatse apegeakoohase mee oo netamma, “Gi ne matzamapana. U ka noꞌokosoo hemma Manumudoopu Dooa. Gi suda ne yugwepana. Saaꞌa u kadoo ne mayugwekwu, gi menoꞌo.”
40008030	Gi haaꞌno umu kwingaꞌa ewaꞌyoo hogu toꞌo.
40008031	Mu tsoapa ka mu nanana-nagaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U ka mu naana-nagakoo ne nemakuase numme sakwa mu hogu-naga mani petuga.”
40008032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tsoapa mee netamma, “Unudooe meaꞌa,” mu tsoapa yise ka mu nanana-nagaꞌyoona kuowkase ka mu hogu-naga mani petuga. Noꞌyoona mu hogu namatatanomanese ka bakumanaꞌyoona ka baa-witoo sawehoose noꞌyoona padatuihoo.
40008033	Mu hogu takonemodu yise ka Gadarea-witoo tatanomanegase, ka mu numu tuukwe petuga, ka mu hogu badatuihoona, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapagoedu nanana oo mabesakuna tuwazoo.
40008034	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Gadarea-wiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tayakwunaꞌe, “Ne tsasoopedya sakwa u,” mee oo netammana.
40009001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wi tsebooesesoo, ka banunadu paꞌoenapatoo punowsoo kodyuka.
40009002	Soo tuoeyaꞌedu gi yutsungu manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa natzakwu petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sopedakwatoo ka mu naana pu-ma mu nasoonatzaꞌe. Te Pabeꞌe yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, u sakwa besa soonamme. Nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”
40009003	Susumudu mu Jew nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu meeoo sokwama, “Esoo hayoo suda unakwe. Masoogina ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo nasooyugwena meeoo unnewunu.”
40009004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suda tusooyugwepana.
40009005	Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwa-kwitu, pana mu oo poonnekwu ka eka nana e mabesakuse.
40009006	Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwakwuna.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yutsungadu meeoo netamma, “Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoosoo tzagwuuka.”
40009008	Noꞌyoona mu numu oo poonnese, oo sooꞌoedyukuse meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesa namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gana tamme-baa petu.”
40009009	Nu Matthew, oonow ka putoogoo numu tzoonooadyikwi katuna numu tunekwidyakwe. Te Pabeꞌe o meana e poonnese ka o e katu, yise meeoo e netamma, “U sakwa e tummatzi, nu-nosoo manenumme.” Nu yotseoose oo-no meahoo.
40009010	Ka saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe e nobe-witoo nu-no mease numme tuka. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tunekwidu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu Pharisee ne neꞌa, numme ka ewaꞌyoona onona ewatuka.
40009011	Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese numme-no tuka, meeoo yise ka pumme nakatzimodu netamma, “Oosoo Mu Pabeꞌe sakwa gi mu suda tutumatugudu-no tukapana, mu numu tunekwidu ooonneꞌyoo.”
40009012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakase, mee unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba petuse, ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu gi sopedakwadoodu tuukwekwu. Gi nu mu numu mooasoo kaaheno meadu mee nasooyugwedu Te Naa-witu sopedakwadoodu tunedyooekwu. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa unnena natunedyooe ka mee oo unakwe, ‘Nu mu numu besa nanamatuguna umu-makoo sookwaꞌe, gi tuwazoo nu hemma umu-nakwana sookwaꞌe.’ Soo pooha-gaꞌyoo puu tuoegoedu numu-doo suuꞌmu nabaꞌe, gi ka gi tuooegoedu numu-doo. Nu puu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu suuꞌmu tummatzikwu, gi ka mu besa nasooyugwedu numu.”
40009014	Umu John pupuaꞌamu-matu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee unakwe, “Numme ka mu Pharisee-no gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”
40009015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo yaahoo umu-no, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne, umu puu ka nanoꞌyoona besa sokwama. Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhidyikwu.
40009016	Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu wanapu nadotsana-kwaꞌne. U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu.
40009017	Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mu mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40009018	Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu, soo mu nanesootuhidu nemadanagadu oo-baa petugase oo-kobena meatzedose oo nanetzakwiyaꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “E padu yaꞌegaꞌa, u sakwa kemmase oo-kooba pooha matuguse, oosoo sakwa besa mane.”
40009019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-no mea mu tunakatzimodu-no.
40009020	Oꞌno yise togesoo mu meaꞌa soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌedu, sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petugapu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonnakwana oo kwasu tzamow,
40009021	mee tusooyugwena, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe kwasu sukwe tzamowse besa manekwu.”
40009022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yabesoo oo pooha wumowse oo sopedakwatoo meeoo yise oo netamma, “U mooasoo besa mani, e nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa soonamme.” Soo mogoꞌne yise yabesoo puuhamakwu.
40009023	Ka oona Jairus nobe-wi petugase ewaꞌyoo numu sakwaꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Puuwunaꞌyoopunne, esoo tsuaꞌa gi yaꞌe, esoo sukwe uꞌwe.” Umu numu oo-maꞌyoona sukwe nanekoꞌe.
40009025	Ka mu numu puuwanakoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsuaꞌa mi-ma tzakaduse oo tzadyota.
40009026	Esoo Te Pabeꞌe manena yise tooe hano tooe nawaha.
40009027	Ka Te Pabeꞌe oeꞌyoona pudu meahoose, wahaꞌyoo gi tutubootabuedu nanana umu-no tzabegease mu-nakwi memeꞌana papaba meeoo oo netammamena, “Ne Pabeꞌe u sakwa ne sootuhi.”
40009028	Ka nobe-kwi ka Te Pabeꞌe egease, mu gi tutubootabuedu oo-matoo memea; soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubengu, “Mu haaꞌa oo sooꞌoedyukute ka nuka mumme mabesakukwuna?” Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, Ne Pabeꞌe.”
40009029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pooe-ma matuguse meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuse namabesakukwu.”
40009030	Mu nanana yise besa tubootabue mamani. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi haka saaꞌa tuukwepana.”
40009031	Ooonneꞌyoopana umu yise mana teepu kaaꞌno oo waha kodyu.
40009032	Ka togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mea, soo tsoapayidu gi yadooa manepu oo-baa nabi petu.
40009033	Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapayidu nana mabesakuse, soo tsoapayidu nana yise yadooa mani. Mu numu yise noꞌyoona oo poonnedu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow besaꞌyoo gi hee hannanoꞌo yooonneꞌyoo ka te nanumu-nagatu napoonnedu.”
40009034	Pana mu nananesootuhidu-matu meeoo, “Oosoo ka tsoapa moohedu sutakoo poohabe pooha-gana, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo yise ka sutakoo tu pooha-gana-ma mu tsoapa nematzagakwuniyakwe.”
40009035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mana tooe ka Te Naa unnepu wahanumme, mu numu tunedyooena, mu nanesootuhi-kwiꞌyoona tooe. Tooe hownnekoo tooe tuoeba mabesakute tuwazoo.
40009036	Nanaꞌewow numu poonne mukwadu-kwaꞌne mu manemoꞌo, tutuha mu soobedya, ka oo mu manemoꞌo gi too howsoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo ka pumme tummatzikwudu kadooꞌookoo. Te Pabeꞌe yise tutuha mu soobedya.
40009037	“Gi haga ka Te Naa besa podosoo mu moohe-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee soonammena. Te Pabeꞌe yise pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu tu nakakwuna soogwidu. Pana gi ewaꞌyoo numu mu tuukwedu.
40009038	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, ‘Ne Naa, U, ewowsoo numu sootuhi ka besa u unnepu wahakwudu. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu u-witu nakana, u nakasopedakwadookwu.’ “
40010001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme sumumano wahamatsebooeku (12) naana pumme nakatzimodu nabaatoo bise meeoo ne netamma, “Nu manatooe mu tayakwu mu nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooekwu. Nu mu pooha-makase mu tsoapa nematzagakwunikwu, noꞌobatusoo tuoebu-ma tuꞌoegoedu namabesakumokwuna tuwazoo.”
40010002	Umu sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) nanana Te Pabeꞌe nayadooawabe mee nananeꞌa, Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter mee oo neꞌa, Andrew, Peter pabeꞌe, James tu wanngaꞌa John-no, mu naa Zebedee mee naneadu.
40010003	Philip, Bartholomew, Thomas, nu Matthew uga numu tunekwidu, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Thaddeus,
40010004	Simon, ka Cana mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmapu, soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo pabenapu.
40010005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka gisoo numme pumme nakatzimodu mana tooe hano tooe ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe tayana, mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa mu Jew numu-matoo suuꞌmu mea umuoo gi ka Te Naa besa podu meꞌa, gi ka mu susumudu tooe hownnekoo tooe numu-matoo meapana.
40010007	Mu sakwa meadabena mu numu tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Naa petukwuna tzakeꞌe manekena.’
40010008	Mu sakwa mu tuꞌoegoedu mabesaku, mu uagoedu, mu tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Mu sakwa ka mu numu yaꞌedu mayodayisoo. Mu sakwa gi numu tunekwi, mu sukwe tummatziyi, soo Te Naa puu gi mu tunekwaꞌe mu sakwe sootuhiyakwe.
40010009	Gi hemma puma mu tumu-waꞌnekoo hanegapana.
40010010	Gi hemma hanepana pukwi mu namasooa-waꞌnekoo gi tuwazoo tunekwipana, umu mu nakapunnedusoo sakwa ka hemma mu soogwina mu tummatzi.
40010011	Ka tooe hano tooe petugase mu sakwa besow numu mayuse oo nobe-kwi yise umu-baaꞌyoopunne.
40010012	Mu ka kummaꞌakoosoo nobe-kwi egease besow mu numu oe nobe-gakoo nekwiku.
40010013	Umu ka besaꞌyoo numuna nasootuhikwu. Umu ka sutaꞌyoona soo besow mu nekwipu mu-matoosoo namakodyukakwu.
40010014	Ka mu numu besa mu unnepu gi nakaꞌoedyukute, ka numu nonobe-too meana, ka koosebu mu moko-makoo tataꞌne mea. Ka oo mu manese umu oo sopedakwadookwu ka gi besa tu manena gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
40010015	Saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu numu nemadabuekwu, soo suda mu tumatugupu yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka oꞌnosoo namane-kwaꞌnesoo soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka mu numu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-matoo kodyu, umu yise nakootzasooa.
40010016	Mu numu pumatoo mumme e tayakwuna sutaꞌyoo numu etzaꞌa-waꞌne. Ka umu-baaꞌyoona mu sakwa unu besa sapa manena, besa mu matuguna, kaaheno Te Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, umu sumuna mu tooꞌe nemooagakwu.
40010017	Mu sakwa besa mu eyaꞌena. Umu sumuna mu-toogoo pabenase, mu nagusedyakwu,
40010018	umu ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu moohedu-koobenatoo saaꞌa mu hanese, mu nanehanedooa. Mu saaꞌa nuupagetadooa. Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi mu petzabedooa. Mu yise nuga besa unnepu mu tuukwekwu.
40010019	Mu ka nakwutumase gi suda oo soonammekupana ka haꞌyoo mu unnekwuna. Mu ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi yadooakwu. Soo Te Naa mu unnekwuna mu tuukwekwu.
40010021	Mu numu nu-koobatoo gi mu petzabekwu. Mu nananumusoo sumuna mu nekwohonekwu. Mu sumuna nabatsakwu ka mu pabeꞌe tooetoo mu tooaꞌasoo mumme wahase. Pana mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukumona, nu mu magwetzoikwu.
40010023	Ka mu numu mumme suda matugu, kummaꞌa-witoosoo mease umuoo tunedyooe. Mu sakwa tooe hanotoo tooe mea. Nu sumuna petukwu gisoo ka nakwitu Jew numu-baa mu petugaꞌa.
40010024	Mu ka numu tunedyooena mu nu-waꞌnesoo namatugukwu. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puusoo Sutaꞌyoo mee e neꞌa. Umu mumme tuwazoo suda netammakwu. Pana oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, oꞌno mu nu-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
40010026	Mu sakwa gi suipana ka besa e unnepu mu numu tuukwena. Tooe ka mumme e watze tuukwe sapa, saaꞌa mu sakwa numu nakana oo mesoo waha.
40010028	Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tamme nekwohoꞌne sapa, gi umu-ma suipana. Umu tooe te batsase sapa, gi hownnekoo te moogooa how yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana, ka Te Naa unnena suuꞌmu togeꞌyooku. Te Naa suuꞌmu o te soonammena, te tookoo noko madipunnedu, Te Naa suuꞌmu sakwa tamme besa sooyugwena.
40010029	Pana soo Te Naa unu te nenaka. Mu hootsebaꞌa puu gi haaꞌno nanenaka pana soo Te Naa mu soopedyana mu mabetseꞌa. Soo Te Naa puu gi e watzekute, noꞌoko tamme-witu sopedakwadoopunne.
40010032	Mu ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu tuukwena, ‘Soo Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ nu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ka E Naa-kobenaꞌyoona. ‘Mu nugatu,’ mee tuukwedooa.
40010033	Mu ka ‘Jesus e Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu unne-ma nasookwina, nu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ka E Naa-kobenaꞌyoona, ‘Mu gi nugatu,’ mee ka Te Naa tuukwedooa.
40010034	Mu sumuna mee sokwamakwu, ‘Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe petuku manese yaa manakwana, hee-noꞌyoona besaꞌyookwu.’ Pana gi! Mu numu mu nekwohonekwu ka nuka mu nanesootuhaꞌe.
40010035	Mu nanumupana mu wohonekwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu pummesoo naanapuaꞌamu, tu yahe nokosoo mu wohonekwu, ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukumanese.
40010036	Mu numu tamme-baasoo nobe-gaꞌyoo sumuna punnoꞌo te wohonekwu.
40010037	Mu nuka noꞌokosoo hemma oooonakwa unu soobedyakwu. Mu sakwa ka mu naa, mu pea, noko mu doodoomu, oooonakwasoo unu e soobedya, oꞌno mu ka E Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
40010038	Mu ka mee unnena, ‘Tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, oosoo besaꞌyoo,’ oꞌno yise mu ka mumme e sooyugwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoona, mu e nanumu manepunnekwu.
40010039	Mu ka nu-koobatoo nasoomawunise nabatsase, nu ka tubetse gwetzoibu gi moobegwagakoo mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka mummesoo tookoo unu soobedyana, gi gwetzoibu-ma nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40010040	Tooe haga tooe ka mu nuka nakatzimodu tummatzidu nuka tummatzaꞌedu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Soo tooe haga tooe nuka tummatzidu ka Te Naa tummatzidu-kwaꞌne tuwazoo manepunne.
40010041	Tamme ka Te Naa yadooawabe tummatzina, oosoo ka Te Naa yadooawabena, saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka ooka tu yadooawabe tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo. Tamme ka kaaheno meadabedu numu tummatzina, oosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meana, saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu, ooka tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo.
40010042	Ka tooe hownnekoo tooe besa sumuoo Te Naa doodooamu-matu te matugu, oosoo ka Te Naa dooaꞌana, ka oo puudyaꞌe, baꞌutzutzudu oo sukwe bamagase sapa, soo Te Naa ka besow tamme-matusoo makodyukukwu,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.
40011001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu waha matsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu tunedyooemakwuse, ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo mease mu numu nonokadu-kwi nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooemena.
40011002	Soo John nakwutumana ka Te Pabeꞌe manepu-kwitu naka, yise ka mu tu pupuaꞌamu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taꞌya mee mu tutubengatuunguna,
40011003	“U haaꞌa yow Te Pabeꞌe, pute soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu?”
40011004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka John tuukwe ka mu poonnena, mu nakana tuwazoo.
40011005	Ka umu gi tutubootabuedu numu tubootabue manese, mu toyomodu numu besa numme manese, mu gi nakatakedu numu nakadake manese, mu numu uagoedu besa maneyakwe, mu tuipu numu namayodasesoo, yise ka mu tutuha manedu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu natuukwese.
40011006	Mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna gi nu-ma nasookwina, besa nasootuhikwu.”
40011007	Ka mu John pupuaꞌamu kodyukase, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John-witu mu numu tuukwe, “Ka oꞌnosoo nuga-kobenasoo mu numu oona giba-ma ka John-baa petugayakwe, soo John yise gi waha-tamme tusooyugwedu nana.
40011008	Hemma mu poonnekwu mee mu sokwamana oo-matoo mea? Mu besa namasooadu, besa namadabuedu nana poonnekwu mee haaꞌa mu sokwama? Mu numu besa nanamadabuedu ka numu-kooba katudu nobe-witu.
40011009	Soo John o Te Naa nayadooawabe, ookow Te Naa nayadooawabe mu nakakwuse oo-baa petugaꞌa. Soo John ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe oooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
40011010	Soo John ka Te Naa besaa nayadooawabe. Oꞌnosoo ka John-witu nabotugupu-gaꞌyoo soo Te Naa meeoo e netammapu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Ume-kobenasoo ka teepu-koobatoo nu e nayadooawabe tayakwu ka mu numu ume petukwu-kwitu tunesootabue tuunguna.’
40011011	Nu mu tuukwe soo John noꞌoko numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Pana saaꞌa soo gi maawaneꞌyoo numu Te Naa-tooha manedu ka John oooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu.
40011012	Soo John baa-wi numu matzakadu ewow numu baa-witoo ka suda mu tutumatuguna patamatzakakwunaꞌe. Umu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyuku manekeyakwe.
40011013	Noꞌyoona oꞌnosoo mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe ka Elijah nuga-kobenasoo wahagena. Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo John ka Elijah-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo nu-kobenasoo petukwu.
40011015	Mu sakwa besa oetu nakapunne.
40011016	Nu mu-witu natugwengakwu. Mu doodooake-waꞌneꞌyoo gi besa mu pupuaꞌamu-no tuꞌateꞌa. Mu puapuaꞌamu sumuna mee mu netamma,
40011017	‘Numme mu tunekwukukwu. Numme saaꞌa nugagonnodooa, mee mu unnese, pana mu gi oo-toogoo manakwe. Mu ka suda ne sokwama, gi numme-no sakwaꞌe. Mu e unnepu gi heesoobedya.’
40011018	Soo John puu ka petuse, gi unu tuka, gi tuwazoo atsa baa hepe, umu yise meeoo ka John-witu netamma, ‘Soo John sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo numu poohadu.’
40011019	Ka nuka mu-baa petugase mee tuwazoo mu e nesootzeꞌma, ‘Oosoo nana ewa tukana, umu suda tutumatugudu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.’ Umu besaꞌyoo numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoona, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee unnekwu.”
40011020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu tooe tuukwe ka mooeꞌugasoo pukwiꞌyoona nanabesa tu pooha manepu, umu ka tooe nanabesa oo pooha manepu poonnese sapa, gi oo sooꞌoedyukuna gi ka suta tu tumatuguna nematzagakwunaꞌe.
40011021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu numu ka mu Chorazin noko Bethsaida mee nananeadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Nu mu tooꞌe tuukwepana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute, ka suda mu tumatuguna gi mu nanekwahakwunaꞌe.
40011022	Mu ka oꞌnosoo umu sutakoo numu ka mu Tyre noko Sidon mee nananeadu-witu oooonakwasoo suta-kwi manekwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa numu nemadabue-wi oo manepetuse. Umuoo otuoo numu sakwa uga ka besa e pooha manepu poonnese, umu sakwa sumuna ka suda tu tumatuguna nanekwahakwunise, tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
40011023	Mu numu yaaꞌa ka Capernaum-witu unu besaꞌyoo mee naneyugwe. Pana mu maꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
40011024	Ka oꞌnosoo tu namane-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka Sodom mee naneadu-matoo kodyuse, umu nakootzasooa. Mu sumuna umuoo oooonakwa suda namatugukwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa numu nemadabuekwuse soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
40011025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo tubetse besa soonammena meeoo nanesootuhaꞌe, “Ne Naa u noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu yise ne paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo nemadabue. U tubetse besaꞌyoo u ka umu u dooamu ka besa etzaga u unnepu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhipuna tooe gi unu mu natunedyooe sapa. Umu unu natunedyooepu gi gea u unnepu nakasopedakwatoo.
40011026	Yooonnekoo u tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne.”
40011027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma tuwow, “Soo E Naa noꞌokosoo hemma e sopedakwatoona e sootuhipu. Oosoo suuꞌmu e sopedakwatoo. Nu punnoꞌo ka E Naa sopedakwatoona nu ka numu oetu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu mesoo tuukwe.”
40011028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Mu numu ka gi manese, suda sokwamana sakwa nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌe, oꞌno nu mu pewu-witu sootuhikwu.
40011029	Mu sakwa ka e unnepu oo nakana, oo nakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka besaꞌyoona, gi paba nasooyugwe.
40011030	Mu ka e unnepu etzaga mesoo nakabetseanona, oꞌno saaꞌa mu besa sokwamakwu.”
40012001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme pumme nakatzimodu-no oona tubewabe-too meꞌa. Numme tseagoena ka tumasuape-matu mabokana oo mahangemeana oo tuka.
40012002	Mu nanesootuhidu Jew numu moohedu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonne, umu yise Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Tamme Jew numu mooa tumayohona, oꞌno nanesootuhi tabeno gi hee how nuugwe. Umu u nakatzimodu ka te Jew numu tumayohope gi heesoobedya. Umu ka tumasuape mahangena oo tukamena ka nanesootuhi tabeba gi numu hemma how yugwenoꞌo.”
40012003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka sumuna uga oo naka ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka te Jew tumayohope takopapu ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no tseagoena.
40012004	Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka pooha tukaba tuka umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi hownneꞌyoo.
40012005	Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo nea ka te tumayoho-wi soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu puu, oꞌno tabeno hemma how mesoo yukwe ka pabow tu nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona.’
40012006	Nu yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe oooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
40012007	Mu sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa unnena, ‘Mu ka nanatoo besaꞌyoona nuka mu sukwe hee-makapana oooonakwaꞌyoo nadatsuungu.’ Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu numme tookwa gi tumaꞌemukwa.
40012008	Nu yow mu Pabeꞌe. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka mu nanesootuhi-kwi mu nemadabuekwudu.”
40012009	Onona mease soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petuga.
40012010	Soo nana sumu-nakwatu mi pasadu ka nanesootuhipe-wi. Mu Te Pabeꞌe manena nesootuꞌadyidu soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo haaꞌa nu ka nana mi mabesakuna ka nanesootuhi tabeba numme puu, oꞌno tabeba gi hemma how yugwe?” Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe numu mabesakute oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe.
40012011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Aha, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka besa tumatuguna ka oꞌno tabeba-wi. Mu muusoo punnoꞌo oo manekwu. Soo mu kootsoo sumuna ka teepu tawaga-witoo wuese ka mu nanesootuhi tabeno mu yise puu oo tzatsebooakwu. Soo numu ka kootsoo oooonnakwasoo nadatsunga.”
40012013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana meeoo netamma, “Matuhee.” Oosoo yise matuhese soo Te Pabeꞌe oo mi mabesakuhoo ka sumunakwatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
40012014	Pana mu Jew numu Pharisee
40012015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme mu batsakwuna sopedakwadoose umu-baaꞌyoona meahoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-no manekase oosoo yise mu tuoegoedu mabesaku yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu saaꞌa gi tuukwepana.”
40012017	Ka oꞌnosoo Isaiah mee naneadu Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu-waꞌnesoo manepetu. Isaiah meeoo tubotugupu.
40012018	“Soo Te Naa tummatzidu menoꞌo yow tamme-baa. Soo Te Naa oo-matoo besa soonammena ka oo netutzease o esoo Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-ma oo sootuhise oosoo ka mu gi Jew numu tuukwekwu ka Te Naa umu magwetzoikwuna.
40012019	Oosoo gi numu-no nahadu, gi paba yadooadu tuwazoo.
40012020	Tooe ka mu gi nanatzooedu noko tutuha mamanedu suda namanatzaya sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu pumme wohonedu tooe matzooekukwu.
40012021	Noꞌobatusoo numu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, Te Pabeꞌe yise mu magwetzoikwu.”
40012022	Mu numu yise ka tsoapayidu nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petu. Soo nana gi tubootabue, gi besa yadooa soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo mabesaku. Soo nana yise besa tubootabue manese, besa yadooa tuwazoo.
40012023	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka nana namabesakuse oo poonnena, mee yise nananetamma, “Yow tookwa esoo nawahapunnedu Te Pabeꞌe, mooasoo tamme-baa petu.”
40012024	Mu Pharisee numu yise ka mu numu unnegonnona nakase, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe sooꞌoedyukuna mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana numu nemooaga mu numu yise nakaꞌemukwa, sutakoo poohagana ooonneꞌyoona esoo tsoapa nematzagakwunidyakwe.”
40012025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo pumme mu sooyugwena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma, “Mu numu ka pumme moohedu gi nakabetseana nanano nananepetukuna, soo mu moohedu gi mu numu moohe-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu numu yise kadooꞌoo sukwe namayugwekwu.
40012026	Mu gi toge unakwe mu ka ‘Numu poohadu,’ mee e netammana. Soo numu poohadu gi hownnekoo nanesootuhina ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo gi ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanematzagakwunina petzape, umu tsoapa ka oo tutummatzina.
40012027	Mu Jew numu moohedu puu ka mu tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanesootuhina mu nematzagakunaꞌe. Mu puu gi numu poohadu mee mu neꞌa. Mu sakwa gi nuka meeoo soobedyapana.
40012028	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu nanesootuhina mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, mu sakwa menoꞌo oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu sootuhaꞌe.
40012029	Nu ka mu susutakoo moohedu oooonakwasoo unu pooha-gana nuga pooha ooosapa oo matzooekute. Soo natzooedu nana puu ka tu hemma besa takonena gi hee oo matzooekute, pana ka numu tzakunase, oꞌno yise oo hemma hanekwu. Yooosoo nu ka sutakoo yugwese, oꞌno nu mu numu magwetzoikwu ka suta-makoo.
40012030	Soo numu gi e nakabetseadu tookwa e wohonekwu. Tooe haga tooe nu-witu mu numu gi tunesootabuedu, oosoo punnoꞌo e tumooꞌoodu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne.
40012031	Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌekwu tooe haga tooe numu yise ka Te Naa suda netammana nuka tuwazoo, oosoo nasoomuꞌwakwu. Pana soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda netammana gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40012033	Tumasuape-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo tumasuape puu susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo. Tamme puu oo sopedakwatoo ka tumasuape hownnekoo soo besaꞌyoo tumasuape pooedooꞌa, besa mesoo naduka. Mu tsaꞌabu pooe puu gi naduka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Susumudu numu eka sutakoo pooe-gakoo tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo mu tumatugu-makoo umu nasopedakwatoo ka gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoona.
40012034	Mu togogwa-waꞌne nanasoobedya, mu suda apegea ka sutaꞌyoona. Tamme ka te unne-makoo nasopedakwadoo ka hownneꞌyoona.
40012035	Mu ka besaꞌyoona besa manena besa apegea, pana ka sutaꞌyoona suda manena, suda apegea.
40012036	Pana nu mu tubetse tuukwekwu, mu saaꞌa oo nanekwahakwu how manena mu meeoo tooe unakwe, oo-makoo saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu nemadabuedooa.
40012037	Mu kaaheno apegeana, soo Te Naa saaꞌa mu tookwa kaahenoꞌyoo mee mu netammadooa. Mu ka suda apegeana saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
40012038	Yise mu susumudu nanesootuhidu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Nanasookwugi u tutumadabuena ne tzaponneku, oꞌno yise numme u sooꞌoedyukute.”
40012039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sutaꞌyoo numu, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka nanasookwugi e manakwe e poonnese suuꞌmu. Nu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Jonah mee naneadu manepu-waꞌnesoo manekwu.
40012040	Soo Jonah puu ka pabatsekoo pakwe numua-wi pahe tabeno yise pahe togano tooiyakwe pana soo pabaꞌyoo baa-kummanatoo oo mootzakwate soo Jonah yise ka yaa teepu-koobasoo petu. Nu punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo pahe tabeno yise pahe togano nu natukuse, oꞌno yowsoo ka teepu-koobasoo petukwu.
40012041	Ka Te Naa mumme nemadabuekwuse, mu numu
40012042	Soo mogoꞌne mana taba meanakwatu numu-kooba katudu punnoꞌo suta mu nemadabuekwu. Oosoo mogoꞌne tubetse kwingaꞌa manakwana kemmadu Jew numu-kooba katudu, Solomon mee naneadu yadooana nakagese, ‘Unu soonamme,’ mee oo nakana. Tooe nu ka Solomon oooonakwa unu soonammepana mu gi e heesoobedya.
40012043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa-witu numu natugweꞌngakwu. Soo tsoapa ka numu-nagakoo namatsatsebooese, kummaꞌakoosoo punaga tu ekeahookwuna wate, pana ka gi tumayuna
40012044	oꞌno yise mee unakwe, ‘Nu punowsoo kodyukakwu.’ Ka numu punagaꞌyoo tumeahoopu mayuse oosoo numu sumuna gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasoonatzaꞌena.
40012045	Oꞌno yise soo tsoapa natakwatsukwuhoo (7) kukummaꞌakoosoo tsoapa pumme oooonakwasoo unu susutakoosoo bise, ka punagaꞌyoona tu meapu-nagatoosoo kodyukakwu. Soo numu yise unusoo suda namanatzayakwe. Ooosoo tooe nu ka e sutaꞌyoona tooꞌe nematzagakwunise sapa umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo mu-tamme kemmakwu.”
40012046	Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu yadooedyakwe oo pea oo wangaꞌamu-no petugonno. Puuwuna konnopunnenasoo ka mu numu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witoo taya.
40012047	Sumuꞌyoo meahoose ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe petuga, “U pea u wangaꞌamu-no u baꞌe u-no apeageakwuse.”
40012048	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu umu-matoo tayase mee yise oo netamma, “Umuoo suuꞌmu nu yaatoo nanumu-gaꞌyoo. Umuoo ka E Naa-matoo nanesootuhina. Noꞌoko tooe haga tooe ka E Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu oo unnetusoo manedu umuoo nu tubetse nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
40013001	Oꞌno tabenasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nobe-wiꞌyoona mease, ka banunadu-kumaba petuoogase oona katu.
40013002	Mu numu tubetse ewaꞌyoo ka oo naꞌoonnakwi manepunnena oo taakooꞌnapunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wi tsebooese oe katu, mu numu ewaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka baa-kumana konnopunne.
40013003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunedyooena mu natugwenga katu, mee mu netamma, “Soo nana tumasuaꞌa.
40013004	Susumudu soo oo pooe matu ka a nadapoohabe-witoo sawehoose mu hootsebaꞌa mu sooa.
40013005	Susumudu oo pooe tubebuꞌa-matu punnoꞌo oona tupe-nagatoo gi tookapu teepu-ga-witoo sawehoose yabesoo naahoose sapa,
40013006	soo taba mu kootuikuhoo, umu ka gi tookaputoo tunahabena.
40013007	Susumudu mu a pooe punnoꞌo tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawehoose, naase sapa, soo tsaꞌabu ka ewa naana mu tatsatsebooge.
40013008	Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawese besa naakese ewa pooetooa.
40013009	Mu sakwa ka mumme e tunedyooe-makoo a nakasopedakwadoose mamakoo natunedyooe.”
40013010	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase meeꞌe oo tubenga, “How manena u ka mu numu natugwenga?”
40013011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ne nanekwegease mee unakwe, “Mu e nakatzimodu mooasoo nasootuhipu. Mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa unnepu. Mu nasootuhipu pana mu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natugwenga katu Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.
40013012	Soo tooe haga tooe numu ka sagwane tunakaꞌoedyukuse, saaꞌa oo-no meadabena unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu. Tooe haga tooe numu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna hanobasoo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu.
40013013	Ooonneꞌyoona nu mu numu natuukweꞌnga. ‘Tooe mu numu oo poonnepana, umu gi ooka tu nakasopedakwatoona petzape. Tooe mu numu oo nakapana, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.’
40013014	Oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mu numu manekwu-kwitu botugupu, mee naꞌunakwe, ‘Mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakamo, pana gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute. Mu tuwazoo tooe oo poonne pana gi oo soo nakasoopedakwadoo.
40013015	Mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu tu nakasopedakwadookwuna gi petzape, tooꞌe mumme tu tuukwe sapa. Mu sakwa ka mumme oo tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu poonnena nakasopedakwadoona, oꞌno sakwa mu nu-matoo kemmase, nu yise mu sootuhikwu.’
40013016	Nu mu sootuhikwu mu ka oo nakana, oo oedyukuna ka mumme e tuukwena, oo poonnena, oo nakasopedakwadoona ka e manena.
40013017	Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, oꞌnosoo mu nanamooatupu ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa yadooawabe, mu kukummaꞌyooosoo bebesaꞌyoo numu e tooe soopoonne pana e tooe soonaka pana gi hownnekoo oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌnosoo nu gi mu nanamooatupu-baa pana menoꞌo mu nasootuhipu nu ka mu-baa petuse.
40013018	E nakapunne nu ka e natugwenga-kwitu mu tunedyooekwu. Esoo natugwengapu-kwitu, tamme ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu.
40013019	Susumudu ka Te Naa unnepu naka pana gi oo oedyukuna ooonneꞌyoona ka a pooe a natapohabeku-kwitoo a sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo a pooe ka Te Naa unnepu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo gi togeꞌyoo ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu numu nemooagatu, oosoo yise ka hootsebaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo ka a ewana ka a pooe kwakwape oo totsopetahookwu. Yoo mu numu hanobasoo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu. Oosoo ka a pooe a nadapodo-wi namasuadu-kwaꞌnesoo.
40013020	Susumudu numu-matoo sumuna ka tupe-nagatoo a pooe nabebuꞌa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakana, besa Te Naa unnepu-matoo nakasokwama.
40013021	Mu nanewohonena mu numu yabesoo tunakaꞌoedyukumakwukwu.
40013022	Susumudu numu sumuna ka a pooe mu tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana ka ewa tu heetooana sumu petukute, yise ka teepu-kooba tooe hownnekoo tooe suda oo soonammekute. Esoo ka besa te tooꞌe tunakapu tamatzooekukwu.
40013023	Pana mu numu-matu ka a pooe besow teepuna namasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka besa naꞌunnedu nakase oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Umu ka besa-kwi natumasuakudu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu ka ewow besow pooe saawe-waꞌne ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tuukwena, oꞌno ewaꞌyoo umu numu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
40013024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kummaꞌakoosoo mu numu natugwenga tunedyooe tuwow. “Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyudu-no namayuꞌa yaa teepu-koobatu. Ka nana tubewabe-gaꞌyoo-kwaꞌne, soo numu tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo puu ka besow tu pooe suuꞌmu masuakute.
40013025	Mu numu yise tumasuamakwuse ka tu yongose utuika ka tu woho togabama tu tubewabe-wi petuse ka tsaꞌabu pooe ka besow tumasuape-nagatoo pebuꞌase meaꞌa.
40013026	Ka tumasuape besa naahookese, soo tsaꞌabu punnoꞌo oo-nagakwi namayuadu naahooke.
40013027	Soo tumasuadu tummatzidu mee oo netamma, ‘Numme oo sopedakwadoo ka besow a pooe mawe tubewabe-wi u masuase. How yise manena mu tsaꞌabue punnoꞌo umu-nagakwi naꞌa?’
40013028	Soo tumasuadu meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, ‘Oosoo nuka wohoꞌnedu ka sumuna mow manakwe.’ Umu oo tummatzidu mee oo netamma, ‘Numme sakwa mu tsaꞌabu tzanooedapebuꞌa.’
40013029	Soo tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, ‘Gi menoꞌosoo. Mu sumuna ka besow tumasuape nokosoo ka tsaꞌabu tzanooeꞌdakwunidooa ka menoꞌosoo oo manena.
40013030	Ka tumasuape nayasakwuse, nu saaꞌa mu yasadu mee netammadooa, Ka tsaꞌabu mooe hanese, nana-ma mu wutamase mu tuni. Oꞌno saaꞌa yise ka besow tu pooe e tubane nobe-kwi tubane.’ “
40013031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo natugwenga ka mu numu nanesootuhidu mane-kwitu. Sumuꞌyoo natugwengape meeoo yise oo soo puu ka tuutsekoo a pooe manakwana suakese ka saaꞌa naakese pabatse suakese paba manepetugase nanaꞌemota maꞌnatooakwu. Mu hootsebaꞌa yise oo maꞌna-ma mesoo aata yoohoo soo nanesootuhibu manepunne. Menoꞌo numme tutunakaꞌoedyukute huutseꞌyoosoo ka saaꞌa ewow numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manese ka tutsekoo a pooe paba naa petuga-kwaꞌne manekwu nanaꞌemota maꞌnaga-kwaꞌne manepetugakwu.
40013033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa mu numu tuwazoo natugwengayakwe ka umu-matu tunakaꞌoedyukute ewaꞌyoosoo numu saaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu. Meeꞌe yise unakwe, “Ka mogoꞌne tukaba tohanedyidu-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu ka tumayuaꞌa hongobe noko mooe mayuꞌase, ka saaꞌa soo oo tukabadoona besa koposekwu.”
40013034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu nanatuukweꞌe hemma mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo yise mu ewow numu manaꞌyoona saaꞌa ka nanatugwengapu tu nakatzimodu tunesootabuedooa.
40013035	Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe natugwengakwu-kwitu wahana, meeꞌe tubotugupu, “Nu mu Pabeꞌe mu natugwengakwu ka gi hannanoꞌo mu nakapugana.”
40013036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu baaꞌyoona meꞌase ka nobe-kwi ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no tzoonooahooka. Numme yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Numme gi ka natugwenga-kwitu nakasopedakwadoo, hayoo u unnena?”
40013037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe ne nanekwegea, “Nu ka tumasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
40013038	Noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobatu yaatuoo ka tubewabe-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Mu numu nuka nanesootuhidu bebesow a pooe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Mu numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu punnoꞌo ka sutakoo tsaꞌabu sua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
40013039	Soo Gi Togeꞌyoo e wohonedu ka tsaꞌabu masuapu. Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa eka teepu-koobatu mu numu nemadabuekwu. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa tummatzikwu.
40013040	Nu ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, nuka tummatzidu yaa teepu-koobatoo tayakwu, oꞌno umu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu numu kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu. Ka mu tsaꞌabu natunikwu-kwaꞌne, umu ka sutakoo numu goso gi tookedu-witoo maꞌanakwu. Umu suda sokwamana sakwikwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa ka teepu atasoo mayugwekwu.
40013043	Umu numu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu ooosapa padakwetseaakwu ka taba-kwaꞌne, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Mu sakwa e nakapunnena a nakasopedakwadoo.
40013044	Soo Te Naa God tubetse besa te sootuhaꞌe tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakabetseana, ka yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu hemma te heegana oooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwena, ka hemma puma tu tumuna tubewabe-wi watze nagoodu-kwaꞌne. Soo numu ka oo mayuse oo watze tugukwusoo yise noꞌoko tu hemmama tumuse ka tabewabe tumukwusesoo, oosoo besa soonammena ka hemma puma tu tumukwuna nawatzetugu-matoo.
40013045	Tamme sakwa oo tubetse soogwi ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna.
40013046	Soo numu puu unu nanenagadu tsomebe mayuhoose, ka unu oo sookwina noꞌoko tu hemma-ma tumuse yise ka umu tu soogwina tsomebe tumukwu.
40013047	Ekow teepu-koobatu, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no namayuꞌa, umu ka pakwe nuukwi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu puu ka puma tu tukwina ka paa-witoo tzakwekuse noꞌobatusoo pakwe hanehookwu susumudu besaꞌhoo, susumudu gi besaꞌhoo.
40013048	Ka tu tukwinoo kaanohoose bakumanatoo oo tzapewoyaga. Oosoo ka besow pakwe tu kawona-wi hanemena ka sutakoo yise tapebuamena.
40013049	Ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo yugwese mu toha kakasagakoo Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu numu nanasukwesoo yugwe, mu bebesahoo sugwesoo, mu sutakoo too sugwebasoo, ka mu pakwe nuukwi-kwaꞌne.
40013050	Mu sutaꞌyoo ka goso gi tokedu-witoo nahanekwunikwu umu suda sokwamana sakwikwu.
40013051	Mu haaꞌa ka mumme e tuukwena nakasopedakwatoo?” meeꞌesoo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tubenga. Umu oo nanekwegea, “Aha numme tooe besa oo nakasopedakwatoo.”
40013052	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo mooa tumayohope sopedakwadoodu ka menoꞌo mumme e tunedyooepu nakasopedakwadoose, oꞌno oosoo besakoosoo mu numu tunedyooekwu. Howꞌoo puu soo numu pudutupu nokosoo mooatupu hee-gaꞌyoo tu nobe-kwikoo yise mu wutzadyupa, ꞌyoo manepunnedu unu besaꞌyoo.”
40013053	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu natugwengamakwuse,
40013054	tu nanumu-baasoo kodyu petuga. Ka mu numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukwena. Mu numu oe oo nakapunnedu meeoo netamma, “Haꞌoo yise soo Jesus besa yadooa, pana oosoo sukwe tamme-matusoo?
40013055	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo oosoo Mary sukwe tooa. Mu James, Joseph, Judas, Simon yise a wangaꞌamu.
40013056	Yise a punneꞌemu yow tamme-naga. Haꞌoo yise soo Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo?”
40013057	Ooonneꞌyoona yise umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe mu netamma, “Ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu ka Te Naa yadooawabe nakaꞌoedyukukwu, oogowsoo nanumu, oo nonopuaꞌamu-no suuꞌmu gi.”
40013058	Huutsekoosoo numu tuoegoedu-matu oetu soo Te Pabeꞌe mabesaku, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
40014001	Ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa tumatugu-kwitu pudu nakase oosoo mu pumme tummatzidu meeoo netamma.
40014002	“How haaꞌa soo John numu baa-wi matzakadu pumme te batsasesapa tuusootabuese, unu poohadooapu? Esoo Jesus John haaꞌa?”
40014003	Ka oꞌnosoo soo Herod tu pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoose, soo mogoꞌne Herodias mee naneadu.
40014004	Oꞌno soo John yise ka Herod ooosapa mee netammanoꞌo, “Gi toge u manakwe. Gi ka Herodias nabaaꞌyookupana,” mee.
40014005	Oosoo yise ka John unnena gi petzabena oo soobatsapana gi oo manakwe ka mu numu-ma suina. Mu numu ka John Te Naa yadooawabe oedyukute.
40014006	Ka Herod nawuena soomaꞌyuna tabenoꞌo soo Herodias padu mu numu ewana-kobenaꞌyoona oo nugakute. Soo Herod yise tubetse besa soonamme.
40014007	Soo Herod yise ka pumme nugakudu meeoo oo netamma, “Tooe hemmadooe u soogwina nu u geakwu.”
40014008	Soo tsuadumu yise ka tu pea tubengase soo pea yise meeoo, “Ka John koota tsekeaꞌase, yise ka oo wo hanese, yise tseda-wi oo wuna,”
40014009	Soo Herod yise oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe ka John tu batsa tuungukwuna, pana ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo naka ka Herod unnena.
40014010	Soo Herod yise mu tukwutumadu ka John koota tsekaꞌa tuungu.
40014011	Umu ka oo wo tsekaꞌase oo wo tseda-wi oo wunase, yise ka Herodias padu yongageaꞌa. Soo tsuadumu yise ka Herodias gea.
40014012	Mu John pupuaꞌamu ka oo nakase yise mease oo tugudooase ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukweꞌe.
40014013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka John nabatsana nakase Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nakatzimodu-no ka sake-wi kuase ka banunadu ninapatoo natzemangeka numu-wanatoo. Pana ewaꞌyoo numu ka mu meana nakase ka banunadu-kumi sogo mease oo takwi petuga.
40014014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona ka baa-kumabatoo ewow mu numu-baa petuga, oosoo oeꞌyoona tsebooeke. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tutuha mu soobedyana mu tuoegoedu mabesakute.
40014015	Ka tu yongokese, numme oo nakatzimodu oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mu taꞌya ka kwayaꞌyoona mu kemmase. Umu sakwa puusoo tu tukakwuna hownnekoo mayu.”
40014016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee ne netamma, “Gi umu numu tayapana, mu sakwa muusoo yaanoko mu maka.”
40014017	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Manegeoo numme tutukutsekoo patzebonomadu tukaba-gaꞌyoo. Yise waahoo numme too pakwe-gaꞌyoo.”
40014018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Yaa nu-matoo oo hanehooke.”
40014019	Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu ka pooena mu neꞌaataꞌakuse ka manegeoo tutukutsekoo patzebonomadu tukaba, noko waahoo pakwe hemehoose toogoopatu poonnese nanesootuhi. Oꞌno yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase umu pumme nakatzimodu mu ewow numu maka tuungu.
40014020	Mu numu yise noꞌyoona togekoo tukase wutzuꞌme. Ka tu naduka makwuse numme ka mu tugupenina ka tukaba noko pakwe matsobase oosoo tukapu nagupenina sumu-manoꞌyoona waha-ma tsebooekudu (12) kawona-wi umu kaanokuhoo.
40014021	Mu numu tubetse ewaꞌyoo namaka (5000 nanana).
40014022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka numme pumme nakatzimodu suuꞌmu ka sake-wi taya. Umu ka banunadu ninapatoo natzemangekakwu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu ewow numu tuwazoo mu nobe-kwitoosoo taꞌya.
40014023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-matoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe, ka tu yongokese oosoo puu suuꞌmu o.
40014024	Ka sake mooasoo banamookwi manikease, unu hukwabetu soo paa unu bayutsungakooha.
40014025	Awamooasoo gisoo tu tabuagena soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-witoo meahoo baa-koobakwi kemmakaꞌe.
40014026	Numme tunakatzimodu sake-wi meana ka Te Pabeꞌe numme-tamme kemmakaꞌe oo poonne oo-ma unu sui. “Uda! Tsoapa tamme-tamme,” mee numme unnemoꞌo.
40014027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee sookweta unne, “Gi suipana. Nu yow kemma.”
40014028	Soo Peter yise mee oo netamma, “U ka togesapa Ne Pabeꞌena ka paa-koobakwi namatoo e bikwu. Oꞌno yise nu u oedyukukwu.”
40014029	“Yaatoo kemmow,” meeoo soo Te Pabeꞌe oo netamma. Soo Peter yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona wuese ka Te Pabeꞌe-tamme ka baa-koobakwi meahoo.
40014030	Ka hukwapa-ma suise tooꞌe padadyaꞌe. Pabatse waꞌagenumme, “E Pabeꞌe e magwetzoi.”
40014031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka paa-wikoo yabesoo oo tzatseboogese oo magwetzoihoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mow u ka gi e sooꞌoedyukuna. U sakwa yaa manakwana gi waha-tamme tusooyugwepana.”
40014032	Ka sake-wisoo mu kuase, soo hukwapa wuyooihoo.
40014033	Mu naana ka sake-wi manepunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha, “U tookwa togesapa Te Naa Besaa Tooa.” mee yise oo netamma.
40014034	Umu yise ka mangekase ka Gennesaret mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
40014035	Mu nanana yise onoko ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo sopedakwadoona oetu mana tooe nanatuukwe. Mu numu yise mu tuꞌoegoedu mu nuummadu oo-baa tsato petugonno.
40014036	Mu tuoegoedu ka oo-baa petugadyina ka pukwi oo namasooana sukwe tzamayina, besa maniyakwe.
40015001	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipe papabeꞌe numu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petu.
40015002	Mu Pharisee yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “How manena mu u nakatzimodu ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope-too gi meꞌa? Oosoo te tumayohope puu mee te tunedyooe, tamme mooe mabatzagase yise tuka. Pana umu ume nakatzimodu gisoo namabatzagapana tuka.”
40015003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu Pharisee nanekwegea, “Mu muusoo ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakupu tagotekena ka mu nanamooatupu tumahohona nagena.”
40015004	Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, ‘Mu sakwa mu naanapuaꞌamu besa matugu yise mu ka mu naanapuaꞌamu suda netammadu sakwa nabatsa.’
40015005	Mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohona pana mu meeoo, ‘Tamme sumuna ka mu naanapuaꞌamu mee netammakwu. “Nu ka Te Naa God tummatzaꞌe, gi umu e naanapuaꞌamu.” ’
40015006	Mu gi besa ka mu naanapuaꞌamu matugu ka oo tumatuguna. Mu ka Te Naa tunetammana takopa ka mu mooa tumayohope ooosapa nagena.
40015007	Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee mu naneyukwe. Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah togesapa mu netamma ka mee tubotuguna.
40015008	‘Umu numu meeoo unnepana mu tupa sukwe apeakana gi mu tubetse sokwamana. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetsea.
40015009	Umu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwepana ka mu numu aata-tammesoo neꞌemukwa ka pummesoo tusooyugwena ka mu numu ewana mee netamma. “E nakapunne mummesoo tumayohope tumayoho, oꞌno Te Naa nakabetsea.” ’ “
40015010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu ewana mee netamma, “E nakapunne e nakasopedakwatoo.
40015011	Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo soo hemma mu tukana gi hownneꞌyoo Te Naa-nakwana. Soo suda te tumatuguna, yise gi besa soonammena, umuoo soo Te Naa gi petzape.”
40015012	Umu oo nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tzageꞌetoo mease meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U haaꞌa oo sopedakwatoo mu nanesootuhidu papabeꞌemu Pharisee mee nananeadu unu sutagonno ka ookow nakase?”
40015013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu Pharisee nakatsasoopedya. Soo E Naa puusoo saaꞌa kadooꞌoo mu mayugwedooa, umu Pharisee ka gi ooka nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umuoo ka tsaꞌabu namasua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo sukwe natuoona pepuꞌakwu tsaꞌabu-waꞌne. Umuoo gi tubootabuedu numu kummaꞌakoosoo gi tubootabuedu numu tzakadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umu Pharisee gi kaaheno numu neyugwemodu. Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu ka teepu tawaga-kwitoo sawehookwu ka gi ka besa podo meana.”
40015015	Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U ka natugwengapu naꞌunnena ne tuukwe.”
40015016	Mee yise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Umu ume nakatzimodu gisoo besa e nakasopedakwatoona meeoo unakwe.
40015017	Soo hemma te tukana puu te sapu-kwitoo meana yise kaaheno tsebooegea.
40015018	Pana soo suda mu unnena ka meeoo tuwazoo mu suda tusooyugwe, oosoo suda mu mayugwe.
40015019	Tamme ka suda tusooyugwena sumuna saaꞌa numu batsadooa, kumanosoo napootamana ka nanodukwana, tuduhana, esayina, suda numu-witu nemadabuena.
40015020	Ka suda tumatuguna soo numu gi besaꞌyoo; tooe mu ka mu mooe tumayohope nagepana, oosoo gi besa mu mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40015021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka numme tu nakatzimodu-no yise oona wawaꞌa tubewabe-witoo Tyre noko Sidon-witoo mease o petuga.
