40015022	Oꞌnona yise sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “E Pabeꞌe u sakwa e tummatzi, e padu unu tsoapayaꞌe ooka oo nematzagakwuniku.”
40015023	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne nanekwegeꞌa. Numme oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Ka mogoꞌne taya, oosoo te nakwi nanetzakwiyaꞌe kemmanoꞌo.”
40015024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu Jew numu suuꞌmu magwetzoigena.”
40015025	Soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne yise oo-kobena meatzedo petusoo meeꞌesoo tuwazoo unne, “E Pabeꞌe, e tummatzi.”
40015026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sukwe nemapoonnena meeoo oo netamma, “Gi nu wawaꞌa sootummatzi. Numme Jew mu wakwawaꞌa saduꞌu mee neꞌa. Mu numu puu tu dooamu tukakwuna tu saduꞌu gi maka.”
40015027	Yise soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne mee punnoꞌo nanekwegea, “Tooe saduꞌu pana puu ka hemma nagupenina namaka. U sakwa nuga padu mabesaku u nanumu noko,” mee.
40015028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo u e nakaꞌoedyukudu u ka meeoo unnena nu u tummatzikwu. U nobe-kwitoo yise kodyuka nu ka tsoapa mooasoo nematzagakwunihoo,” meeꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne padu yise besa mani.
40015029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka numme tu nakatzimodu-no oona mease, ka banunadu Galilee mee naneadu kumi meꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka gibana manepetugase oonahoo katu.
40015030	Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyipunne, nanakummaꞌakoosoo tuoe-gaꞌyoo susumudu toyodu, susumudu gi tubootabuedu, susumudu gi nummedu, susumudu gi apegeadu. Mu tuoegoedu numu noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba natzapookwakute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu mabesaku.
40015031	Mu numu yise mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Mu gi apeageadu apegea mani, umu gi yuyutsungamodu nummenumme mani, mu totoyodu kaaheno mo mani, mu gi tutubooetubooedu punnoꞌo yaatu poonne mani. Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoona tooe gi te Jew numu sapa te sootuhaꞌe.”
40015032	Saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu mu numu sootuhaꞌe. Umu pahe tabeno ooosapa nu-noꞌyoona, gi hemma tuka. Nu gi mu tayakwuni-waꞌne nuumma ka mu tzuagoꞌe. Umu-matu sumuna mana po-witoo tseaꞌanooakwu, tamme sakwa mu maka.”
40015033	Numme oo tunakatzimodu yise mee Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tamme gi mu maka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme gi hownnekoo yaatuoo tukapu mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40015034	“Haaꞌnoko tamme tukaba-gaꞌyoo?” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe. “Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tamme tukaba-gana yise tamme huuhoosoo dudutsekoo pakwe,” mee numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea.
40015035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numu ewana ka teepu-kooba aata tuungu
40015036	yise ka natakwatsukwuꞌyoo tututsekoo tukaba tu mi-wi hemmase, ka pakwe nokosoo, Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise ka tukaba tzabokase, ka pumme nakatzimodu mu ewow numu maka tuungu.
40015037	Noꞌyoona numu yise wutzuꞌmehoo. Numme oo nakatzimodu ka mu tugupenina natakwatsukwuoo kawona kaanokuhoo.
40015038	Umu tubetse ewatseꞌyoo numu yise oe (4000 naana).
40015039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noko yise mu numu nobe-kwitoo tayahoose ka sake-wi tsebooese, ka baa natzemangeka ka Magadan mee naneadu teepu-witoo mea numme pumme nakatzimodu-no.
40016001	Mu nanesootuhidu moohedu ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducees mee nananeadu-nagutu kemmana ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemanasoo oo-baa petuhoose mee oo netamma, “Ka paꞌanakwanasoo nanasookwugidu tumadipu ne tzapoonneku, oꞌno yise numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
40016002	Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo mooa tabeno besa nuummapunnekwu ka yaa yongona gi tu koomeapunne.
40016003	Ka yaa togano ka muha nakagoapunne, mu oo sopedakwatoo mooa tomoapunnekwu. Mu mooasoo ka koomeba-witu sopedakwatoo pana mu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka teepu manekwuna ka nuka, mu Pabeꞌe petuse.
40016004	Mu numu menoꞌo mommodu sutaꞌyoo mu ka nanabesa e tumadina mumme e tzapoonneku tuunguna, oꞌno mu e sooꞌoedyukukwu mee nu unnena. Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo nuga hownneꞌyoona, nu ka Jonah-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Jonah puu pahe tabeno ka pakwe numua-wiꞌyoose sapa gwetzoise ka teepu-koobasoo tuwazoo nummenumme. Nu Jonah-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka yaꞌese pahe tabeno manepunnese namayodakwu. Oꞌno yise mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
40016005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-baaꞌyoona mea numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka banunadu natzemangeka. Numme oo nakatzimodu ka tukaba ne tunokwuna soomuꞌwake. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma,
40016006	“Mu sakwa ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducee tukaba namayana nuutumooe.”
40016007	Numme yise mee nananetamma, “Oosoo meeoo unakwe ka gi tukaba te hanekese.”
40016008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka ne unnena, yise mee ne netamma, “Mu tookwa gisoo e nakaꞌoedyukute.
40016009	Mu sakwa tooe gi tukaba-gapana gi suda oo sooyugwepana. Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo, nu mu mabetseakwu. Mu sakwa oo soomayu sumu, nu ewow numu maka manegehoosoo (5) tukaba-gana. Mu oo soomaꞌyu ka ewow nagupenina muusoo tzoba.
40016010	Nu mooasoo yise tuwow ewowsoo numu maka, natakwatseꞌyoo (7) tukaba-gana, mu yise ewowsoo tuwazoo hane ka a nagupenina.
40016011	Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo nu gi tukaba-witu netamma. Mu sakwa ka mu Pharisee noko Sadducee tukaba namayuna nuutumooe.”
40016012	Numme oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakasopedakwatoo, oosoo gi ka tukaba-witu netammana pana ne tuukwena gi ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu nakabetseapana, umu ka besow ka sutakoo noko mayuꞌa.
40016013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Philippi mee naneadu teepu-wi petuga soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo mu nu-kwitu naka?”
40016014	Numme tunakakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Susumudu umu-matu mee u netamma, ‘U ka sumuna John, numu baa-wi matzakadu.’ Susumudu yise punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘U, Ne Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu, pute Jeremiah mee naneadu, tooe haga tooe sumuna ka umu Te Naa yadooawabe-matu.’ “
40016015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma. “Mu puu haꞌyoo e sooyugwe?”
40016016	Soo Simon Peter oo nekwegea, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe. U ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa.”
40016017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Simon Peter netamma, “U Simon, Jonah tooa, soo Te Naa tookwa u sootuhipuna u tunedyooepu. Ooonneꞌyoona u e nakasopedakwadoo. Sukwe numu gi nu-kwitu meeoo u tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40016018	Yaa manakwana nu Peter mee u neakwu, Tupe mee naꞌunnedu. U tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo u e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute, nu yow U Pabeꞌe. U ka yaa teepu-koobatu nanesootuhikuna, soo te paꞌanakwatu u nakasootuhikwu. Oꞌno numme nanesootuhidu ka Etzaꞌa suda unnepu matzooekukwu.
40016019	Nu E Besa Pooha-matu-ma u sootuhikwu, u saaꞌa ewow numu ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedooa. Soo E Besa Pooha nayadooana mooasoo Te Naa tunemamakwupu, ookow u punnoꞌo mayohonokwu.”
40016020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Gi menoꞌo e wahapana nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
40016021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oowe manakwana ooosapa ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee tuukwegena, “Nu Jerusalem-wi petugase mu Jew numu moohedu e kusedyana e batsakwu. Pana waha tabe mease nu tuusootabuekwusoo.”
40016022	Soo Peter yise seagabatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bise oo nesagwikuna meeꞌe oo netamma, “Nu ka Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikukwu. Soo Te Naa u sootuhise u gi nabatsakwu, gi yise meeoo tusooyugwepana.”
40016023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo nakasopedakwadoose ka Peter-tamme nakwumanase mee oo netamma, “Gi ookow e tuukwepana. U sukwe numu-waꞌne tusooyukwe ka sutaꞌyoona, u gi ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzaꞌe.”
40016024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, nu oo nagenokwu.’
40016025	Tooe haga tooe ka nu-koobatoo nasoomawunina oosoo namagwetzoikwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka puusoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina puusoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
40016026	Soo tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gana yaꞌese soo ewow oo hee-gana gi oo magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40016027	Nu, Mu Pabeꞌe, ka E Naa pooha tooha-kwi ka umu Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-ga-no petuse saaꞌa ka mu numu nemadabuekwu.
40016028	Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu susumudu menoꞌo yow mu konnodu-matu gisoo tuidu, mu ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e gwetzoina poonnekwu.”
40017001	Naapahe tabe mease soo Te Pabeꞌe pihoo tu pupuamu oona kiba-matoo bika, mu oo pupuaꞌamu mee nananeadu Peter-no, James, yise oo wanngaꞌa John.
40017002	Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhaꞌe oo koba atasoo tubuagaꞌa, yise pukwi oo namasooana tohawiyanegaꞌa, yise patakwetseapunne.
40017003	Wahaꞌyoo nanana Moses-no Elijah mee nananeadu yise oo-baa petuse oo-no yadooꞌa.
40017004	Soo Peter yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Besa numme ka yaanona, ka oo u soomanakwe numme sakwa pahe tutukutsekoo tatza nobe mu matabuekukwu umme Elijah yise Moses.”
40017005	Togesoo oo yadooawunu oosoo koomeba umu-kooba habagahoo petu. Oonagaꞌyoona yise soo Te Naa mu yadooe, “E Besaa Tooa unu e soobedyana, besa e masoonammedu, mu sakwa besa a nakabetsea.”
40017006	Umu oo pupuaꞌamu unu nakasui meatzedose oo-matoo nanesootuhigonno.
40017007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-matoo mease yise mu tzamase meeoo mu netamma, “Yosuhoo gi suipana.”
40017008	Umu yise yaatu poonnese, soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise o.
40017009	Umu ka giba-maꞌyoona sawekese soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi haga tuukwepana ka yaanoko mu poonnepu ka e namayodase saaꞌa mu numu tuukwe.”
40017010	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo unnena mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu meeoo numu tunedyooe, ‘Soo Elijah mooe petugakwu’?”
40017011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo yoo kaaheno manepunne. Elijah mooe petuse hemma e mooe nemabetseabekupu.
40017012	Mooasoo soo Elijah mu-baa petupu pana mu numu gi oo posopedakwadoo meeꞌe nu. Umu tooe how tooe Elijah sootunagapu oo batsapu. Umu nuka tuwazoo kusegeana e batsakwu.”
40017013	Oꞌno numme oo nakatzimodu yise oo nakasopedakwadoo soo John Baa-wi Numu Matzakadu tookwa Elijah. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe-kobenasoo nanekemmadu.
40017014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe bihoo numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka numu ewa-kwi petugonno sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa meatzedohoose mee oo netamma,
40017015	“U sakwa ka e tooa nanesootuhiku masoo yaꞌehookayina sumutooe ka numu peta-kwitoo anoakayakwe yise ka baa-witoo wuehooyakwe tuwazoo. Oo manena masoo unu nuummaba wuma.
40017016	Nu ka umu ume nakatzimodu-baa a bi petuse sapa umu gi a mabesakute.”
40017017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu gi e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-baaꞌyoose sapa. Mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku. Ka naatse yaa nu-baa bi petu.”
40017018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tsoapa ka naatse-nagakoo nematzagakwunihoose, soo naatse yise besa mani.
40017019	Numme tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no oetu watze nehanena mee unakwe, “How yise manena numme gi ka tsoapa nematzagakwunaꞌe?”
40017020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu gi oo nematzagakwunaꞌe mu ka gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu sakwa uga ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka tuutsetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna sapa mu ka giba nooyooa tuunguna oosoo oo manikwu. Mu ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe hemma tooe oo natuunguna o nageakwu.”
40017022	Ka saaꞌa Galilee-wi ne petugase soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma,
40017023	“Umu e wohomu nu-ma tzakaduse, e batsakwu yise waha tabe mease nu saaꞌa e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu.” Numme oo tunakatzimodu suda nakasokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe.
40017024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga, soo pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-witu tumasumudoodu ka Peter-baa petuoose mee oo tubenga, “Soo Jesus haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka nanesootuhi nobe-witu tumanagayakwe?”
40017025	“Aha soo Te Pabeꞌe oo manekwu,” mee soo Peter oo nanekwegea. Ka nobe Te Pabeꞌe pukweꞌyoo-kwi soo Peter egeagase soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo mooe netamma, “Haꞌyoo u oetu sooyugwe, Peter? Soo numu-kooba katudu puu gi pummesoo dooamu tunekwaꞌe, ka tu tumasumudookwi oosoo mu wakwawaꞌa suuꞌmu tunekwikwu haaꞌa?” “Mu wakwawaꞌa-makoo suuꞌmu,” meeꞌe soo Peter oo nekwegea.
40017026	“Nu tookwa ka Te Naa tooana gi tumanaga-waꞌneꞌyoo,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.
40017027	“Pana ta ka tumanagase umu gi taka sutakute.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter pakwega tayase, mee oo netamma, “Ka banunadu-kwi petugase saaꞌa ka u mooe pakwe tutzatsebooana tupa-witu poonne ka u tumayu-ma saaꞌa ta-kooba tumanagahoo.”
40018001	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe tubenga, “Haga saaꞌa ka numme-matu numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo ka numme Te Naa-baa ne petugase?”
40018002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo tzakwuhoose umu-naga oo tzakwunukuhoo.
40018003	Yise mee unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, mooeꞌugasoo mu nanekwahakwu oo nematzagakwunikwu, mu yise tutugusekoo dooake-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa-baa petugadooa.
40018004	Mu ka tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne manekoo petuse, mu gi numu oooonakwa besaꞌyoo mee nasooyugwena. Soo tuhaꞌyoo yise e tubetse nakatzimodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise mu numu-oooonakwa besaꞌyookwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona.
40018005	Mu ka nuga dooamu puaꞌa-gana, oꞌno mu nuga puaꞌa tuwazoo.
40018006	Soo tooe haga tooe ka umu nuga dooamu suta-kwitoo kwasenona ka mu tumaꞌemukwase, oosoo oo tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.
40018007	Mu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu numu ewaꞌyoo gi toge-tamme nakwasenodu, saaꞌa mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
40018008	Nu sakwa e-mi sukwe tsekaꞌa yise gi ka suda namanedu mahane. Besaꞌyoo ka sumuoosoo mi-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo mi-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa e kuku sukwe tsekaꞌa ka gi togekoo podo meana. Besaꞌyoo ka sumuoosoo kuku-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo kuku-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue.
40018009	Nu sakwa tuwow e pooe sukwe tsepata ka gi togekoo soopoonnena. Besaꞌyoosoo ka sumuoosoo pooe-gana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo pooe-gana ka ooosapa nikatu-kwitoo wue.
40018010	Mu sakwa gi e dooamu matu suda matugupana mu toha kakasa-gakoo, Te Naa tummatzidu, ooosapa Te Naa-baatu, e dooamu mabetseana mu nanesootuhiku.
40018012	Mu sakwa ekow nakasopedakwatoo, soo nana puu ka ewow tu seepu hee-gana, sumuoo watzekuse, oosoo ka mu ewow tu seepu maꞌwukase ka sumuoo watekakwu.
40018013	Yise ka oo mayuse ka mu ewow gi nawatzekudu oooonakwasoo besa oo-matoo soonammekwu.
40018014	Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ooosoo tamme-koobatoo ka umu pumme dooamu nawatsekukwuna gi petzape.
40018015	Ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu suda pumme matuguse, u sakwa oo tuukwe gi numu nakana. Oosoo ka u nakabetseana, oꞌno u oo magwetzoikwu.
40018016	Pana ka gi ume oo nakabetsea, u sakwa sumuoo tooetoo waahoo u pupuaꞌamu-matu bikase onosoo apegea. Oꞌno mu numu u-notu u nakase oo wahakwu.
40018017	Oosoo ka gi mu nakabetseana, mu sakwa ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petugase oo waha. Ka gi mumme oo nakabetsea, mu sakwa oo tsasoopedya.
40018018	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, mu ka sumuoo numu meeoo neyugwese, soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
40018019	Nu tuwazoo sumubatu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, ka waahoo mu nagatu ka Te Naa-matoo nanetsagwayina, soo Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu.
40018020	Ka waahoo tooetoo pihoo nanano sumuse ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukuna nu-matoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe nu umu-noꞌyookwu.”
40018021	Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Ne Pabeꞌe, huu sakwa nu ka e puaꞌa suda nuka matugu oo soomuꞌwaꞌyi? Natakwatsukwu (7) haaꞌa?”
40018022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Tooe hano sapa oo matuadyigena yise ka ooka oo nemakodyukuyakwe tamme sakwa ooosapa punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwano.
40018023	Soo numu-kooba katudu puu ka mu pumme tummatzidu kutzina oo soogwaꞌe.
40018024	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka numu-kooba katudu-baa nabi petu, tubetse ewow oo nakutzikudu gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakute.
40018025	Soo numu-kooba katudu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U nodukwa, u doodooamu, noꞌoko hemma u hee-ga-ma u tumukwu, u ka gi hownnekoo punowsoo e tumanagaku-waꞌne manepunnena.’
40018026	Soo nana ka numu-kooba katudu meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa e sootuhina, gi nuga hemma-ma tumupana. Nu sakwa tooe hownnekoo dooe noꞌoko punowsoo u tumanagaku.’
40018027	Soo numu-kooba katudu oo nakasootuhise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe u ka gi punowsoo e tumakodyukupana. U sakwa menoꞌo nobe-witoosoo kodyuka.’
40018028	Soo nana ka numu-kooba katudu tutuha soobedya yise mease sumuoo numu tapoegea huutsekoo pumme nakutzikudu. Oo-ma tzakaduse oo tooe matsongakwadyabe. ‘U sakwa ka nuka u nakutzikuna e tumanagaku,’ mee oo netamma.
40018029	‘Nu gi hownnekoo menoꞌo u tumanagaku-waꞌneꞌyoo pana nu saaꞌa noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe ooka u makodyukudooa. U sakwa tutuha e soobedya.’
40018030	Pana oosoo gi tutuha oo soobedyana ka nana wutuma tu nakutzina oo tumanaga-witoo tooe.
40018031	Mu numu-kooba katudu tummatzidu ka nana manena poonnena suda oo soobedya. Umu ka numu-kooba katudu-baa petugase ka nana manena oo tuukweꞌe.
40018032	Soo numu-kooba katudu ka nana nabatoo bise, meeoo oo netamma, ‘U suda manakwe. Nu mooasoo meeoo u netammapu, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe u gi ka u nakutzina tumanagapana.”
40018033	U puu ka u puaꞌa gi tutuha soobedya ka ume oo nakutzikute. U sakwa tutuha mu numu u soobedyana sootuhi, nu puu tutuha u soobedyana u sootuhipu.’
40018034	Soo numu-kooba katudu ka sutakoo nana besa tu matugukwuna gi petzabepana oo wutuma tuungu, noꞌoko tu nakutzina oo tumanaga-witoo tooe.
40018035	Tamme ka te pupuaꞌamu suda tamme matugupu gi soomuꞌwana soo te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
40019001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka mu numu tunedyooemakwuse Galilee-wiꞌyoona mea, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatoo. Te Pabeꞌe ka meana ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu mangeka.
40019002	Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo nagekase soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mu mabesakute.
40019003	Mu Pharisee Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse oo tooꞌe nekwesekuna, ka numu nanodukwa napoonnekwuni-kwitu.
40019004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka tuneana oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa numu pudu manumudoose meeoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Nu ka nana noko mogoꞌne manumu-doopu.
40019005	Soo nana-no mogone ka nanodukwadoose tu naanapuꞌamu-koobaꞌyoona mease umu yise sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
40019006	Soo Te Naa meeꞌe soo numu ka nanodukwadoose sakwa gi napoonnekwunipana.”
40019007	Umu Pharisee yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “How yise soo Moses mooasoo ka meeoo tunetammana, ‘Soo numu ka napoonnekwunikwuse tubope-makoo napoonnekwunaꞌe?’ “
40019008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana ooonneꞌyoona soo Moses meeoo mu tunetammakute mu ka napoonnekwunikwuse tubope-makoo napoonnekwunaꞌe. Pana ka Te Naa numu pudu manumudoo-kwi manakwana meeoo nayadooa ka nanodukwadoose gi napoonnekwunipana.”
40019009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Soo numu ka tu nodukwa poonnekwunise tooe gi kummaꞌakoosoo nana-no oo tumaꞌemukwa sapa ka kummaꞌakusoo nodukwadoose maꞌemukwa. Oosoo suda tumatugudu.”
40019010	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme sakwa gi uga nodukwadoopana sumuna puu numme saaꞌa napoonnekwunikwu.”
40019011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Susumudu numu gi hownnekoo nanodukwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka tooe hownnekoo tooe namaniyahapugana, susumudu punnoꞌo numu gi nanodukwadoo umu ka Te Naa suuꞌmu sooabegana. Gi noꞌyoona numu ka eka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40019013	Mu numu tu dooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petudyakwe ka umu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna mu sootuhi mee oo netammana. Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu numu nesagwikute ka oo mu manakwe.
40019014	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Gi mu numu ka mu tu dooamu bi petudu nesagwikupana. Nu mu tutugutsekoo dooake nanesootuhikukwu umu-waꞌnekoo sokwama-gakoo soo Te Naa besa dooamu-gaꞌyoo.”
40019015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu dooake nanesootuhikuse umu-ma pooha matugumena mu sootuhina yise umu-baaꞌyoona mea.
40019016	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga mee tutubenguna, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?”
40019017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa gi nuka ka besa-witu tutubengapana, soo Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo. U ka soonamagwetzoina u sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu nakabetsea.”
40019018	“Noꞌoko haaꞌa?” mee soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe tutubenga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha. U sakwa gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu-witu
40019019	besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena. U sakwa unu mu numu-no nanasoobedya, mummesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.”
40019020	“Mooasoo nu ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌne tumaduku,” mee soo nana, “Nu haaꞌa namagwetzoikwu?”
40019021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise e nakatzinummekwu.”
40019022	Soo nana ka ewow hee-gana suda oo nakasoonammekuna mea.
40019023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu unusoo manena namagwetzoikwu.
40019024	Gi hownnekoo soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40019025	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe oo nakase meeꞌe punnoꞌo unakwe, “Hownnekoo soo numu tutuha manedu namagwetzoikwu?” Numme meeoo sokwama soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu besa nasootuhipuna namagwetzoaꞌe.
40019026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ne pooꞌnekwunihoose mee ne netamma, “Gisoo mu e nakasopedakwadoo, mu gi muusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
40019027	Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “Numme noꞌoko hemma ne hee-gana maꞌwugese ume nageke. Hemma yise numme hee-gakwu?”
40019028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeꞌe ne nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Ka teepu atasoo manekese, nu ebe te paꞌanakwaꞌyoona numu nemadabuekwu, mu yise e nakatzimodu punnoꞌo noꞌoko mu (12) Jew numu nemadabuekwu.
40019029	Noꞌyoona numu tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu, tu hemma, noꞌoko tu hee-gana, tu doodooamu, tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena, ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu ka gi moobegwaga ka gwetzoibu-ma besaꞌhoo nasootuhikwu.
40019030	Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”
40020001	Te Pabeꞌe togesoo te tunedyooemena. Esoo tamme oo tunedyooena ka Te Naa umu pumme tummatzidu besa sootuhi-witu mee yise oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa ka nana-waꞌnesoo puu ka awamooasoo mu numu tu tubewabe-witu a pooe tzaboka tuungu.
40020002	Esoo nana puu ka pumme tutzabokakudu tunemanagakute umu yise oo neꞌoedyukute.
40020003	Saaꞌa oogowsoo awamooa soo nana tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo ka mu numu-nagatu gi hemma how yugwedu natummatzibu wategase mu
40020004	mayuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu sakwa e tutzabokaku. Nu saaꞌa mu tumanagakudooa.’
40020005	Ka tabeno tu manekese tu yongokese tuwazoo ooosoo tuwazoo manakwe.
40020006	Gisoo tu taba egeagaꞌa soo nana tuwazoo measesoo ewasoo numu gi hemma howyugwedu too mayuse mee mu netamma, ‘Mu haaꞌa tabewano yow?’
40020007	Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, ‘Aha, gi deaꞌa haga ne natummatzi tuungu.’ ‘Mu sakwa nuka tummatzi,’ mee yise soo nana mu netamma.
40020008	Ka tu nayakwengase soo nana tubewabe-gaꞌyoo ka umu pumme tummatzidu moohedu mee netamma, ‘Noꞌoko umu nuka tummatzigonnodu mu bise mu tumanagakuhoo. U sakwa ka umu nakwi petudu mooe tumanagakuhoo, oꞌno yise mu susumudu ooosoo ka umu mooeꞌugasoo petudu tumanagaku tuwazoo.’
40020009	Umu numu nakwi petudu ka umu mooeꞌugasoo petupu noꞌokosoo saaꞌa tumunagaku.
40020010	Umu mooe tutummatzi petudu numu oooonakwakoosoo natumanakakukwu mee sokwamapunnepana, umu noꞌyoona nananoꞌokosoo natumanakakuhoo.
40020011	Mu mooe tutummatzi petupu ka nana tubewabe-gakoo nesootzema mee unnena.
40020012	‘Haꞌoo manena mu ne-nakwi petupunnedu numme noꞌokosoo natumanakakute? Numme yise tabewano yow tooe kootuise sapa umu nokosoo natumanakakute.’
40020013	Soo tubewabe hee-gaꞌyoo yise mu naka ka mu nenisagoꞌe ka sumuoo umu-matu mee netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, nu kaaheno u tumatugukute. Nu ooka u gea ka ume e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
40020014	Mu sakwa mumme e gea-matoo besa sokwama. Nu meeoo mesoo tusoohanena sumu noꞌokosoo mu mesoo tumanagakute.
40020015	Esoo u natumanakakuna nugatu. U sakwa gi moogoo tusooyugwepana, nu ka noꞌoko numu sootuhina tooe gi haaꞌno mu tutzabokase sapa numu noꞌoko tumanagakute.’
40020016	Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”
40020017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jerusalem-witoo meana, numme tunakatzimodu bikase meeoo ne tuukwe,
40020018	“Jerusalem-wi te petugase mu numu-kobenatu yadooadu nu-ma tzakadukwu, oꞌno yise umu wakwawaꞌa-matoo e tzakakase yise umuoo nuka batsa tuungukwu.
40020019	Umu wakwawaꞌa yise e nasootzamekukwu e wupagetana yise e batsakwu. Nu yise saaꞌa waha tabemease tuusootabuese namayodakwu.”
40020020	Mu nawangaꞌa James-no John pea o ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga.
40020021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pea meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u unnena yow?” Soo mu pea yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Haꞌoo sakwa umu e doodooamu saaꞌa ka u-baa manepunnena ka numu u nemadunaga meakwuse?”
40020022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu waahoo oo doodooamu netamma, “Mu gi a nakasopedakwatoo ka putoogoo e meakwuna. Nu nabatsakwu. Mu haaꞌa tooe punnoꞌo oo-toogoosoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo?” mee. Mu wahaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme sakwa punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo mane.”
40020023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Aha, mu nu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, mooasoo soo Te Naa oo nemamakwupu. Pana nu gi ka mu numu-kobena mu neyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40020024	Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu unnena nakana ka mu James noko John unu nakasagwikute.
40020025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ne netamma, “Mu sakwa gi ooosapa numu-kooba nasooyugwepana ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona.
40020026	Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu tummatzino, nu-kwaꞌne. Nu puu ka yaaꞌa mu-baa petuse noꞌoko numu tummatzaꞌe. Pudusoo nu mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa yise nu mu numu gwetzoibu-ma gi moobegwagakoo sootuhidooa.”
40020029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jericho-wiꞌyoona mease ewaꞌyoo numu ne nakwisoo meadape.
40020030	Oonow yise ka po-kumaba wahaꞌyoo gi tutubootabuedu nanana yugwe. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe pukumi mea oo nakana oo nanetsagwayaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “Ne Pabeꞌe ne nanesootuhiku.”
40020031	Mu numu mu nakadu mu nesagwikute meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi unnepana.” Pana umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe pabasoo yadooeyakwe, “Ne Pabeꞌe ne nanesootuhiku.”
40020032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yooꞌi petugase namatoo mu baꞌe ka puba mu pepetuhoose mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo natummatzibu mu sookwaꞌe?”
40020033	Umu gi tutubootabuedu nanana yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi tutubootabuena yaatu ne poonnena soogwaꞌe.”
40020034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tutuha mu nakasoobedyana mu pooe-kooba matuguse. Umu yise tubootabue mamanikwate ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu naana yise ka podo Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi memea.
40021001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Soo giba Olive mee naneadu oo-tzageꞌe. Ka Bethpage mee naneadu-tzageꞌe numme petuga.
40021002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waahoo numme pumme nakatzimodu-matu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa yaatoo ne maꞌwukase ka Bethpage-witoo manekakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze tooaꞌa-gakoo oo natzakunadu mayukwu. Oo tzadopase, nu-matoo oo wetzakake.
40021003	‘How mu mu yugwekwu?’ mee ka mu numu mumme tubenga, mu saaꞌa mee mu netammadooa, ‘Te Pabeꞌe mu soogwina, oosoo saaꞌa mu makodyukudooa.’ “
40021004	Oꞌno soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu mee naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna.
40021005	“Mu sakwa mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakoo tuukwe soo mu-kooba katukwudu mu-baa petukwu tzagaze tooaꞌa-gakoo-kooba katuna. Esoo mu tumayohope ka numu nanapupuaꞌamu-gakwuna wahadu.”
40021006	Umu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohoku.
40021007	Umu ka tzagaze nadooaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa wetzaka petuse oo nasonatugukuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-kooba tsebooese, oo-kooba katunoꞌo.
40021008	Ewaꞌyoo numu tu wunagapu ka po-kooba wupatzetagonno susumudu numu punnoꞌo sunngabe maꞌna ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena tuoonana oo-ma oo podokute. Umu ka umu-kooba katudu ooosapa yoo tumatuguna besa oo sooyugwena yoo oo tumayohoku tabuꞌa.
40021009	Ewaꞌyoo numu yise Te Pabeꞌe naꞌooonakwatu oo netubetseyaꞌena ewa unnegonno, “U yow Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe, ne magwetzoidu. U menoꞌo numme-kooba katudu ka te namooatupu David-waꞌneꞌyoo, numme besa sokwama ka Te Naa-matoo, ka numme-matoo ume oo tayase. Soo Te Naa u tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa puusoo ne magwetzoidooa.”
40021010	Numme ewaꞌyoo ka Jerusalem-wi petugase ka Te Pabeꞌe-no, mu numu otuoo yise ne poonnese mee ne tubenga, “Haga masoohoo?”
40021011	Numme ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-notu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitu ka Galilee mee naneadu teepu-koobatu kemmana.”
40021012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo mea, yise ka pabow nananesootuhi nobe-tzageꞌe kodyu petuga. Mu weehoo-ma tumudu poonne. Tu hemma tsanabedona, tu weeho-ma tumugonno tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma pukooba mu tuoona-na manapow, ka mu kadunoo tuwazoo, yise oekoo mu numu matzayubow. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka nobeana gi-matoogoo meapana. Esoo pukwiꞌyoona tu nananesootuhina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ekow botugupu, ‘E nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhina.’ Menoꞌo mu yise miꞌyoona nanatuduha.”
40021014	Umu gi tutubootabuedu, mu toyomodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhi-kwiꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu mabesakumena.
40021015	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo poonne ka nanabesa Te Pabeꞌe pooha manakwe yise tuwow ka mu doodooake naka ka papaba ooka mu nesookwugaꞌe, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoidu. U tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Mu tutunehanedu yise mu nakasagwaꞌekute. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ohobu netamma, “U sakwa ka mu doodooake uꞌnewununa nedyooihoo.”
40021016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu ka sumuna oo sopedakwatoo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugupu, ‘U, Ne Naa mu tutugutsekoo doodooake besa ume nemadabue tuungu.’ “
40021017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise Bethany-witoo mease oonow tooi.
40021018	Ka oo mooꞌa awamooa, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem-tamme mea.
40021019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meana, ka sunngabe Fig mee naneadu poonnese, oo-tamme mea ka tzuayaena. Unu sunngabe naka-gaꞌyoo gi pooe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe meeoo netamma, “Gi gea hannanoꞌo u pooedooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.” mee. Soo sunngabe yise pasahoodooe.
40021020	Oꞌno numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka sunngabe pasahoose oo poonnepunne, numme ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Uune! How manena soo sunngabe yabesoo pasa?” meeꞌe.
40021021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ne netamma, “Mu sakwa a nakasopedakwadoo mu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukwu, gi waha-tamme tusooyugwepana soo Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu ka mu nanesootuhaꞌe. Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo manakwe. Ka ooka mu natuungu, oosoo yise oo-toogoo manekwu. Mu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi hee unu manepunnekwu.
40021022	Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌena, Te Naa mu nakasootuhikwu.”
40021023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhi-wi petugase mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo tubenga, “Haga pooha tunetamma-toohakwi u yoo manakwe?”
40021024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Nu ka John-witu mu mooe tuukwekwu. Mu ka kaaheno e nanekwegease, oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu punnoꞌo haga pooha-toohakwi ꞌyoo nu e manena mu tuukwekwu.
40021025	Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka, soo Te Naa God, pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?” Mu tutunehanedu yise puusoo nanano apegeagonnose, mee unakwe, “Tamme ka meeꞌe unnese, ‘Soo Te Naa God ka John meeoo netamma.’ Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netammakwu, ‘How yise manena mu ka John gi nakabetsea?’
40021026	‘Pana soo John puusoo oo manakwe,’ mee te unnese, mu numu punnoꞌo te kusekeakwu, soo John Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo netammana oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
40021027	Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka haga pooha-toohakwi, e pooha maꞌnawena.
40021028	Nu mu natugwengakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu e tuukwe hanotu umu-matu kaaheno manepunne. Wahaꞌyoo tootooebetse tu naa-no nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo mu naa sumuoo tu tooa mee netamma, ‘U sakwa yaa tabeno ka te tubewabe-witu hemma how yugwega.’
40021029	‘Gi nu,’ mee oosoo ka tu naa nemaꞌese sapa saaꞌa mease ka tubewabe-witu hemma mahane.
40021030	Soo mu naa yise ka sumuoo tuwazoo tu tooa meeoosoo netamma, ‘U sakwa ka te tubewabe-witu hemma oo tummatzi.’ ‘Unudooe e naa,’ mee unnese sapa gi oo-toogoo manakwe.
40021031	Hanotu umu-matu ka tu naa nakabetseꞌa?” “Soo mooeꞌugasootu,” meeꞌe mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, umu numu tumaꞌemukwadu ka nuka oedyukuna, mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu, mu nananesootuhidu mee naneyugwedu punnoꞌo sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku manese mu punnoꞌo Te Naa-baa petugakwu.
40021032	Ka John mu-baa petugase ka Te Naa besa po-witu mumme oo tuukweꞌe, mu gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu netammana suuꞌmu ka suda tu mamanenona nemawunina oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu yise mu poonne pana gi umu-waꞌnesoo manakwe.
40021033	Nu yaa menoꞌo mu tuukwekwu ka nana tubewabe hee-ga-kwitu. Oosoo nana mooe tumasuꞌakese yise oo naꞌooonnakwitoo kooduadoose yise oo-toogoo tubane nobe-too. Ka tu tumasua-matu mu numu tunemanagakuse ka ooka mu mabetseakwu-kwitoo, yise oona kwingaꞌa mea.
40021034	Ka tu tumasuana kwasuse, soo tumasuadu ka sumuoo tu tummatziwabe umu-matoo taya. Oo naamookwitu a tupooe oo hane tuunguna.
40021035	Mu numu yise ka pumatoo natayadu petugase oo wupagetahoose gi a tupooe-matu oo hanekupana oo tayakwunihoo.
40021036	Soo tumasuadu ewowsoo umu pumme tummatzidu oetoosoo taya pana umu tumasuape mabetseadu mu goehoo tuwazoo.
40021037	Nakwitoo yise ka tu besa dooa umu-matoo taya mee tusooyugwena, ‘Umu sumuna besa e besaa tooa matugukwu.’
40021038	Pana umu tumasuape mabetseadu oo tooa pu-baa petuse meeꞌe nananetamma, ‘Esoo numu ka tubewabe hee-gea manekwu tamme sakwa a batsase, oꞌno tamme ka tubewabe hee-gakwu.’
40021039	Umu yise ka tabewabe-wikoo oo matzatseboogese oo batsahoo.
40021040	Haꞌoo soo tabewabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka umu ookow mabetseadu yugwekwu ka umu-baa petugase?” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe tutubenga.
40021041	“Oosoo ka mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matusoo makodyukukwuse kadoo mu mayugwekwu ka mu sutakoo. Ka penakwa tumasuase yise kukummaꞌakoosoo ka tu tumasuape mabetsea tuungukwu, kummaꞌaꞌyoosoo oo tubewa-kooba tumasuase oo naamookwitu oo hanekukwu,” meeꞌe umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea.
40021042	Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu mu tuukwekwu mu gi ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu mu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu numu nuka tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohekwu. Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe meeꞌe nu-kwitu botugupu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Mu tupe nobe-toodu puu ka sumuhoo tupe moodyise, soo mu tumoodyina tookwa gi pumme wuni-waꞌneꞌyoo o ka nobe madipunnedu.’ Nu yow oosoo nanetammadu tupe Te Naa nobe madipunnedu.
40021044	Nu yow ookow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namayugwekoo. Ka numu nanemadabuekwu-kwi oo manepetuse umu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.”
40021045	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo pumme natukwenga nakase umu oo nakasopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tookwa umu-witu netamma.
40021046	“Hownnekoo sakwa tamme oo wutumahoo?” meeꞌe mu tutunehanedu sokwamapana mu tutunehanedu ka mu numu-ma suipunnena ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe oo oedyukuna.
40022001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu natugwengasoo tuwazoo meeoo noꞌobatusoo numu nasootuhikwu gi Jew suuꞌmu mee yise tuukweꞌe.
40022002	“Nu mu natugwengakwu ka numu-kooba katudu-kwitu. Soo numu-kooba katudu numu ewa tukakukwu ka tu tooa nodukwadookwuse.
40022003	Ka tu nanumusoo numu-kooba katudu ewa tukakwu-kwitoo bina, umu pumme tummatzidu umu tayase meeꞌe mu tuukweꞌe saaꞌa, mee mu netammana, ‘Nu mooasoo tubatsase ka e tooa naꞌewa tukakukwuna mamakwupunne. Mu sakwa yabesoo nu-matoo kemma.’
40022005	Pana umu oetoo oo nanumu oo tubina gi oo nakaheesoobedya. Sumuꞌyoo tu tubewabe-witoo meahoo, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo hemma how yugwega.
40022006	Mu susumudu yise ka mu numu-kooba katudu tummatzidu wohonena, mu goehoo.
40022007	Soo numu-kooba katudu gi ka mu numu pumme tummatzidu oo pumme mu yugwena petzabena, tu tukwutumadu taꞌya, umu yise mu nobe tuni tuungu.
40022008	Ka umu pumme tummatzidu yise meeꞌe netamma, ‘Soo e tooa nodukwadookwunoꞌo naꞌewa tukakwudu mooasoo namamakwupunne. Umu yise e nanumu oetoo e tubina nagutza besa nanasooyugwe, gi kemma.
40022009	Mana po-witoo mease tooe haga tooe nu-baa tuka tuungu, oo soomanedutooe.’
40022010	Umu oo tummatzidu yise mease noꞌoko numu tu poonnena tooe ka numu-kooba katudu nobe-kwi bi petu. Saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu oe manepetu. Umu yise namebatu susumudu bebesaꞌyoo susumudu too sutaꞌyoo. Umu yise pukwi tu namasooakwuna nahemese yise naꞌewa tuka.
40022011	Soo numu-kooba katudu oe petuoose sumuoo nana mayuhoo gi namabetzapedu.
40022012	Mee oo netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, haꞌoo u gisoo namabetzapepana yow numu-baa?’ Soo nana gi hownnekoo oo nanekwegea.
40022013	Soo numu-kooba katudu yise umu pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘A tzakunase mabe ooosapa unu togano-kwitoo a tzakwuni, umu mabetuoo ooosapa suda sokwamana sagwipunnedu.’ “
40022014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu ewow numu bipana huuꞌyoosoo oo-toogoo namabetzapedu suuꞌmu ka Te Naa ewa tukakwu-kwiꞌyookwu.”
40022015	Mu Pharisee yise tunehanese ka Te Pabeꞌe unne-makoosoo oo nemadihookwu, mee oo-toogoo tunehane.
40022016	Ka tunehanese mu punotusoo mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu-notu nanana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tayase umu yise meeꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe netammana, “U tubetse besaꞌyoona mu numu Te Naa-witu besa tunedyooꞌe. U gi numu tutzeadu yise gi tuwazoo u numu nesootzemadu oo namanedu u gi heesoobedyadu.
40022017	Numu pabeꞌe natumasumudookuyi-kwitu hayoo u sooyukwe mee numme u tubengagese?”
40022018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoopunne ka pumme mu nemadikwuse yise meeoo mu netamma, “How yise mu manena e tooꞌe nemooaga? Mooasoo mumme gi e watzekupunne sapa mu e tooꞌe nemadaꞌe.
40022019	Ka namasumudoona a haneku.” Umu tu tumasumudoona-matu oo gea.
40022020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tumasumudoope pumme mu gease meeoo mu tubenga, “Haga ma-ma namanaka yise haga naneana tuwow ma-ma naboꞌo?” mee.
40022021	Umu yise meeoo, “Mu wawaꞌa pabeꞌe namanagana ma-ma, oo neneana tuwow ma-ma naboꞌo,” mee. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe geasoo, umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme puu Te Naa tumadabuena Te Naa yise te hee-gaꞌyoo.”
40022022	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakase besa sokwamana umu yise nasoomenakwase meaꞌa.
40022023	Mu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu mee oo natunedyooꞌe soo numu ka yaꞌese otosoo soo moogooa mobegwa-gaꞌyoo. Oogowsoo tabeno
40022024	“Oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu ka menoꞌo te tumahohope te mayoho tuungu soo nana ka yaꞌese, oo wanngaꞌa sakwa ka oo nodukwa nodukwadoose oosoo yise ka tu pabeꞌe dooamudookukwu.
40022025	Umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwangaꞌamu tamme numu-naga. Mu Pabeꞌe nodukwadoose, gisoo dooamudoona yaꞌe.
40022026	Umu oo wangaꞌamu nanapenakwa oo tooꞌe nodukwadooke pana gisoo oo-makoo dooamu-gana tuꞌi tzasooahooke.
40022027	Soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo saaꞌa yaꞌe.
40022028	Soo numu ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase ka ume unne-kwaꞌne mane haga yise umu-matu ka mogoꞌne nodukwa-gakwu, umu ka noꞌyoona oo nodukwa-gapana?”
40022029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu tookwa gi ka Te Naa tubetse unnena ka oo pooha noko nakasopedakwatoo, ka mu numu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwuna.
40022030	Soo numu ka tuise namayodase gi nananodukwamu-gakwu, umu ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
40022031	Mu ka sumuna Te Naa unnepu nabotuguna neꞌa, ‘Umu mu nanamooatupu Abraham, Isaac, yise Jacob nu-matoo togesoo nanesootuhidu.’ “
40022032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Tooe Mu Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob oꞌnosoo kadoo manepupana, umu togesoo gwetzoaꞌe umu ka Te Naa-matoo togesoo nanesootuhina.”
40022033	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakadu mee nananetamma, “Tamme gi hannanoꞌo yooonnekoo nakadu, Te Pabeꞌe besa numu tunedyooedu.”
40022034	Pana ka mu nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu soo Sadducee gi hownnekoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwegea. Mu Pharisee mee tunakase umu pudu tunemadabue ka Te Pabeꞌe nemapoonnehookwu mee sokwamana. Umu Pharisee sumuoo punagatusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga tuungu,
40022036	“Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses ewow tumayohope te mayoho tuungu. Hanotu umu te tumayohope-nagatu unu besaꞌyoo pumme mooe datsunga-waꞌneꞌyoo?”
40022037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa soobedyana ooosapa meeoo sokwamamo.
40022038	O a besana.
40022039	Soo penakwatu besaꞌyoo tumayohope te nakabetseakwuna punnoꞌo meeꞌe, ‘Tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.’
40022040	Tamme ka Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu besa soobedyana, tamme tookwa noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna nakabetseꞌa.”
40022041	Mu Pharisee numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sumu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu Pharisee tubenga,
40022042	“Haꞌyoo mu puu oo soobedya? Haga nakwana oosoo Te Pabeꞌe suaketu?” Umu Pharisee meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Ka numu-kooba katudu David mee naneadu-nakwana suakekwutu.”
40022043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo David ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga. Ka David tubotugu-kwi meeoo,
40022044	‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwu katu ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo.” ’
40022045	How yise soo David Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga ka punakwana oo nanekemma sapa?” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu Pharisee tubenga.
40022046	Gi haga hownnekoo oo nanekwegea-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu yise gi hemmasoo oo tubengasoo mani.
40023001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka mu numu ewana ka mu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee netamma,
40023002	“Mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe ka Moses kapi naneyugwena ka oo unnena numu tunedyooe.
40023003	Mumme mu tunedyooena kaahenoꞌyoo pana umu puu gi oo-toogoo tumayohopana mu tunedyooꞌe. Mu sakwa gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40023004	Umu unu namanedu te mayoho tuungupana, gi te tummatzi sokwama.
40023005	Umu sukwe nasootzamena ka tumayohope mayoho mee naneꞌyugwe.
40023006	Umu puu besa-kwi tu namasooa-ma nasootzaꞌme numu pumme besa neyugwena pedukudu tuwazoo. Umuoo ka tu naꞌewa tuka numu-kooba tunaneyugwena besa soobedya punnoꞌo, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwekwu mee nasooyugwedu.
40023008	Pana mu sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mee mumme netammadu sookwipana. Nu suuꞌmu yow kaahenotu ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mu noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
40023009	Mu sakwa gi tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobatu Te Naa mee neapana, mu sumuoosoo Tubetse Naa-gaꞌyoo, oosoo yise ebe te paꞌanakwa manepunne.
40023010	Mu sakwa tuwazoo gi kummaꞌakoosoo ka yaa teepu-koobatu, Te Pabeꞌe, mee neapana. Nu suuꞌmu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.
40023011	Soo unu nadatsungadu mu nagatusoo sakwa mu tummatzi.
40023012	Ka te nasootzaꞌme soo Te Naa gi besa te sooyugwe. Pana ka gi te nasootzaꞌme soo Te Naa besa te soomadabuꞌe.”
40023013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo mu yadooedyakwe, “Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu yise ka mu numu ka mu nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu-kwitu nu mu tuukwekwu. Mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu mu ka nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwena. Mu ka mu numu Te Naa nakabetseakwuna takohoꞌne ka mu gi oo nakabetseana. Ka Te Naa tamme a nameana ka natzakwonaꞌa mu tzatuma-kwaꞌne manepunne.
40023015	Mu tubetse unu sutaꞌyoona soo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu mana tooe momona sumuoo numu mu-ma nakatzabese mu mumme tumayohope oo tunedyooe gi ka Te Naa unnena, mu waha oo-koobakwisoo ka goso gi tokedu-tamme oo taya mummesoo mane-kwaꞌne.
40023016	Mu Pharisee tooe ka Te Naa-witu gi nakasopedakwadoopana ka mu numu tooꞌe tunedyooꞌe. Mu yise ka mu numu neꞌemukwa. ‘Mu hee ka te nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu oa tupe namadabuedu ka Te Naa nahemagana tamme sakwa yise mu sootubetseyaꞌe. Pana ka nanesootuhi nobe sakwa tamme gi sootubetseyaꞌepana,’ mee mu.
40023017	Soo nanesootuhi nobe Te Naa-tu ka oa tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
40023018	Mu oo netubetseyaꞌe ka Te Naa nahemagana pana mu ka pukooba oo natuguna gi heesoobedya.
40023019	Pana nanosoo umu Te Naa nahemagana.
40023020	Tamme sakwa yise namekoosoo mu sootubetseyaꞌe
40023021	ka oa tupe ka nanesootuhi nobe noꞌoko, umu noꞌyoona Te Naa tumadabuena.
40023022	Tamme ka tamme-koobatu-kobenaꞌyoona namayodase, tamme ka Te Naa ooka nemadabuedu nokosoo-kobenaꞌyoona namayota.
40023023	Mu nanesootuhidu numu tunedyooedu ka Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnepu tzamunetana numu tunedyooena mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea mee sukwe naneꞌyugwena. Mu ka gi haaꞌnoko mu hee-gana-matu ka Te Naa geapana ka kaaheno Te Naa besa unnepu gi nakabetseana. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa mumme sooyugwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu sakwa tuwazoo sakwane sapa ka Te Naa totsaꞌmaka. Mu sakwa besa numu matuguna, besaꞌyoona, kaaheno tusooyugwena ka Te Naa-wi tubetse besa tunakabetsea.
40023024	Mu ka gi kaaheno numu tunedyooena gi toge-tamme numu moohe.
40023025	Mu Pharisee gi kaaheno numu tunedyooena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu ka numu poonnenaꞌyoona besa nasooyugwena pana mu tusoohane gi togeꞌyoo. Mu suda totsa tusooyugwe, tuduhana, unu moogoobuna. Mu unu totsadu tseda-waꞌneꞌyoo numu puu ka oo naꞌoonnakwitu suuꞌmu gi madotzakuna oetu tooesoo totsaꞌa.
40023026	Mu Pharisee tumamooagadu. Mu sakwa gi toge mu manena nematzaga, oꞌno mu besaꞌyookwu.
40023027	Mu ka mu numu nakoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu besa namabetzape puuwanatu a napoonne-kwitu, soo tsoapa suuꞌmu oe.
40023028	Mu besa tatabuꞌa ka numu mumme poonnekwi ooonneꞌyoo pana mu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana unu eꞌesapu.
40023029	Mu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe nakoona mabetsabena,
40023030	mee nanaꞌunakwe, ‘Tamme sakwa uga ka oꞌno mona Te Naa nanayadooawabe gi goe ka umu te nanamooatupu-waꞌne.’
40023031	Tooe mu meeoo sukwe unnepana mu nanamooatupu manena mu nakwisoo meꞌa.
40023032	Mu punnoꞌo umu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooosapa ka umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe goetabekwu.
40023033	Mu togogwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo saaꞌa nanemadabuese ka goso gi tookedu-kwitoo natzakwunikwu.
40023034	Ka yoo a manepunne nu ooosapa ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepu tunedyooekukwudu mu-matoo tayatabekwu, pana mu umu-matu goena, mu kusedyana, suda mu matuguna, mu tayapebuakwu, umu-matu tzakwenetakwu.
40023035	Mu oe naneyugwekwu ka noꞌoko Te Naa nanayadooawabe goena. Mu numu menoꞌo modu togesoo ooosapa manedape soo sutaꞌyoo mu manetabena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
40023037	Nu ewasoo mumme Jerusalem-witu numu tutuha soobedyayakwe, nu sakwa tooe ka hootze-waꞌne tu dooamu ka tu kasa-tooha hane mee nu tusooyugwe. Pana mu gi mumme oo e matuguna petzape. Mu nonoꞌotsa umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe mu-matoo e tayayakwe oo batsayakwe.
40023038	Ka saaꞌa mu-matu kadooꞌoo namayugwese mu nogadu-kwitu numu kadooꞌyookwu.
40023039	Saaꞌa ka mu-baasoo e kodyu petuse mu mee unnedooa, ‘Yow soo Te Pabeꞌe wunaꞌme te wutooena.’ “
40024001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌa, numme yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu apegeamoꞌo.
40024002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Besa oo poonne ka nanesootuhi nobe maasoo puu tupe namadabuena ka saaꞌa mu tupe noꞌyoona abedikwu gi sumuꞌyoo sapa wunukwu.”
40024003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tutsekoo giba Olive mee naneadu-ma poyase onow katu. Numme yise numu-wanaꞌyoona mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo saaꞌa numme oo sopedakwadoo tabuadooa hannanoꞌo yoo namanese u kodyu petukwu ka yaatu teepu atasoo u mayugwekwu?”
40024004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne nanekwegea, “Besa sapa gi kummaꞌakusoo numu mumme nemooagadu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
40024005	Ewaꞌyoo soo numu mee sumuna mu netammakwu, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe,’ yise ewow numu nemooꞌaga.
40024006	Mu ka tu nanaꞌakwe-kwitu nakakwu, tooetoo nanaꞌakwekwu pana gi suipana. Tooe tu nanaꞌakwedyakwe sapa gisoo atasoo ka yaatu teepu e yugwekwi manakwe.
40024007	Yoo namanekwu ka hemma suda manekwuse. Ewa-baatu numu kukummaꞌyoosoo nanagoena, tukapu natugena natseagoena, soo teepu yise yutsungayikwu.
40024009	Saaꞌa numu mu wohonena ka mu numu moohedu mumme goe tuungukwu. Noꞌobatusoo mu numu gi mu petzabekwu nu-koobatoo.
40024010	Ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu gi nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese gi nanapetzabena nanakwohonekwu.
40024011	Ewaꞌyoo numu nu yow Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwedu mu-baa petuse ewow numu nemooagakwu.
40024012	Yise ewaꞌyoosoo soo numu suda tumatuguna tooe noꞌyoona mu numu gi nanapetzape manekwu.
40024013	Pana mu sakwa ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku tooe mu numu mumme tumooꞌoo, oꞌno mu namagwetzoikwu.
40024014	Mooeꞌugasoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Naa besa naꞌunnedu natuukwekwu. Umu punnoꞌo oo naka ka Te Naa numu magwetzoikwuna. Oꞌno yise nu ka yaatu teepu atasoo yugwekwu.
40024015	Tooe hemma tooe sutaꞌyoo ka nananesootuhi nobe-kobena natzekwunukukwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Daniel mee naneadu yoo eka sutakoo
40024016	Oꞌno sakwa mu ka oo poonnese, Judea-wiꞌyoona yabesoo meaꞌa.
40024017	Mu ka ona puuwanaꞌyoona mu sakwa gi hemma hanepana meaꞌahootooe.
40024018	Ka oona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona mu sakwa gi mu wegea-kwitoo kodyupana.
40024019	Mu momokoꞌne kokoheadu yise mu nunuupetzekudu tutuha namanatzayakwe ka numu tuyamanese.
40024020	Umu sakwa nanesootuhi, gi sakwa tommo tooetoo te nanesootuhi tabeno hee oo suda manepana.
40024021	Oꞌno numu nanasuda manekwu. Gi hannanoꞌo oo suda namatugupu-gaꞌyoo.
40024022	Soo Te Naa umu tu nanumu tutuha soobedyana mu sootuhina ka suda mu nuugwena tzadyooikuse, oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu namagwetzoikwu.
40024023	Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo mu tuukwekwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo kodyu petu,’ mee, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukupana.
40024024	Ewa tuwazoo naꞌesagoekwu, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe mee naꞌunnekwu.’ Ewasoo mu numu moohedu numu nemooagayakwe. Ewa nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekukwu tooe hemma tooe mahanekwu ka umu e dooamu tooꞌe nemooagana.
40024025	Nu yaa menoꞌo ekow mu tuukweꞌe.
40024026	Ka tooe haga tooe mumme mee tuukwe, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa, tooetoo mana numu-wanakoo oo nanepoonne, tooetoo ebe nobe-kwi,’ mee mu unakwe sapa gi oo poonne-gapana, gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
40024027	Nu ka numu poowutzaba-kwaꞌne oo yabe manikwu ka tukwukwetseba tabatsebue-nakwana ka koomeba pedakwana ka taba egea-tamme mani-kwaꞌnekoosoo, nu mu-baa kodyu petuhookwu soo numu noꞌyoona e poonnekwu.
40024028	O mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu nu-baa sumuhookwu.
40024029	Oꞌno ka gi hemma besa manekwuse, soo taba toganohookwu, soo muha punnoꞌo. Mu paatoosooba punnoꞌo sawedyikwu.
40024030	Noꞌyoona mu numu punnoꞌo ka koomeba-nagakoo e pooha kodyu petukwuna poonnekwu. Noꞌobatusoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu suda sokwamakwu.
40024031	Soo tumooyagakunoo paba namooyagakuhookwu, ka e kemmana mu tuukwena. Nu ka mu nuka tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo, mooe tayakwu umuoo saaꞌa umu nuga tutzeana nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatutooe tsobakwu.
40024032	Ka sunngabe pooedooakese, mu meeoo sokwamadooa, tamme tookwa tamatsebooe.
40024033	Ka gi besa hemma manekese, mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa pudusoo kodyu petukwu.
40024034	Susumudu mu numu-matu ka hemma oo manedu poonnekwu gisoo yaꞌena.
40024035	Nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu, gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40024036	Ka hannanoꞌo oe e petuookwuna manepetuse gi haga ka teepu-koobatu oo sopedakwatoo. Mu toogoopatu Te Naa tutummatzidu puu gi, nu punnoꞌo gi. Te Naa suuꞌmu oo sopedakwatoopunne ka hannanoꞌo e petuookwuna.
40024037	Nu sumuna yabesoo umu-baa kodyu petukwu gi mu numu meeoo sokwamanoꞌo. Ka gisoo e petu mu numu tooe how tooe maꞌnaꞌwekwu. Ka oꞌnosoo tu mane-kwaꞌnesoo ka nana Noah mee naneadu togesoo ka yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoinumme. Umu puu tukana, hebena, nananodukwadooyakwe ka oꞌno tabeno ka Noah ka sake-wi natzatumase. Mu numu puu ka gi ka Noah nakaheesoobedyana. Oꞌno umu puu ka teepu patatzopahoose, batatuihoo ka gi oo nakaheesoobedyana. Ooosoo tuwazoo manekwu ka e kodyu petuse.
40024040	Sumuna wahaꞌyoo nanana ka tubewabe-wiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo nakwuhoogase, sumuꞌyoo nabenihookwu.
40024041	Sumuna wahaꞌyoo momokoꞌne toosoona, sumuꞌyoo nakwuhoogase, sumuꞌyoo nabenihookwu.
40024042	Mu sakwa nonotsu tabeno nuummabetsabena. Tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nu kemmowgena, yongona, togano, awamooasoo. Nu sumuna gi mu nuummabetsabe mu mayu petukwu.
40024043	Mu sakwa namabetzapepunne ka e kodyu petukwuna wutooena, soo numu puu namabetzapepunne ka tu nobe-kwitu natuduhakwuna sopedakwatoona, oꞌno soo hemma tuduhakwudu gi mu hemma tuduha-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40024044	Mu sakwa yise ooosapa namabetzapepunne nu mu-baa petuhookwu gi meeoo mu sokwamanoꞌo.”
40024045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Umu nuga besa yadooawabe mu e dooamu nehane aatakwu, unu sokwamana sakwa ooosapa besa e dooamu tummatzi. Umu yise ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu nemabetseana ka e besa unnepu mu tunedyooena.
40024046	Nu ka kodyu petuse umu e netutzeana ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa mu nemabetsea mu mayu petuse, nu besa mu sootuhikwu.
40024047	Oꞌno umu e hemma noꞌoko nemadunagakwu.
40024048	Pana soo e yadooawabe ka suda tusooyugwena, gi yabesoo e petukwuna sookana.
40024049	Oosoo yise umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu nemabetseana, tukana, ewa hebena mesoo baayaꞌena tooe how tooe manekwu.
40024050	Nu yise gi oo soonamme-kwaꞌne yabesoo kodyu petukwu. Nu yise ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-noko oo tatsungukwu. Oꞌno oosoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no suda sokwamanoꞌo.”
40025001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Nu ka nuga kodyu petukwu-kwitu mu natugwengakwu. Mu sumumanoꞌyoo (10) sususuꞌa ka nana wutooedu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka naꞌewa tukakwu-kwitoo pumme oo bikakwuse.
40025002	Manegeꞌyoo umu-matu ka mooasoo oo nakana ka tu tukootabuakunoo besa mabetsapunnena oo wutooepunne ewow yoohoo oo-kumabasoo hanepunne. Umu manegeꞌyoo punnoꞌo oo nakapunnedu gi tu tugootabuagunoo mabetseꞌa, oo sukwe wutooepunne.
40025005	Soo nana gidyaꞌe manegena umu oo wutooedu utuigana yise noꞌyoona utuihooga.
40025006	Togabeno umu nanetupoonne mee natuukwehoo, ‘Pudusoo soo nana petuookwu,-tzageꞌe manegena yosuhoose oo-no meaꞌa mu ka tooe mooasoo namamakwupunne.’ Noꞌyoona mu sususuꞌa yosuhoose tu tukootabugunoo mabetsabekooha.
40025008	Mu gi oo-toogoo namabetzapepunnedu sukwe kemmadu ka tu tukootabuakunoo togegaꞌa mu tu pupuaꞌamu punotu tooꞌe yoohoo natuungu.
40025009	Umu pupuaꞌamu yise mee mu nanekwegea, ‘Gi! Esoo yoohoo sumuna gi toge tamme-too togeꞌyoo. Mu sakwa muusoo yoohoo tumuhoo.’
40025010	Ka mu sususuꞌa yoohoo tumugase, soo mu wutooena nana petuhoo. Mu sususuꞌa mooasoo nuummabetsabepunnedu ka nana-no meaꞌa ka tu naꞌewa tukakwu-kwitoo. Ka oe mu petugonnogase soo natzakwonaꞌa natzadumahoose natseponoehoo.
40025011	Saaꞌa umu yoohoo tumumodu yise saaꞌasoo ka natzakwonaꞌa-wi tooꞌe petugonno. Meeꞌe tooꞌe unakwe, ‘Ne tutzakwonaku.’
40025012	Oosoo nana yise mee mu nanekwegea, ‘Mu mooasoo saaꞌasoo manasoo manemo. Manakwingaꞌa-witoosoo meaꞌa.’
40025013	Nu Mu Pabeꞌe ookow nana-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa namabetzapepunnena nu-no mea ka tooe hannano tooe mumme e bi petugase.”
40025014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe tuwazoo mu natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo numu puu ka meakwuse, ka hemma how pumme yugwekudu hemma nemanekuka. Ka tuꞌeyaedu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi uꞌwepana.’
40025015	Ka sumuoo pumme tummatzidu manegeoo oa tupe oo heme, ka sumuoo pumme tummatzidu waahoo oa tupe oo heme, sumuoo tummatzidu sumuoo oa tupe oo gea. Oꞌno soo nana mea.
40025016	Soo oo tummatzidu ka manegeoo nahemedu hee-ma tumuna oo-masoo too tumuwununa sumumano (10) oe mamaꞌe petuga.
40025017	Soo tummatzidu ka waahoo nahemedu punnoꞌo manegeoo nahemedu-kwaꞌnesoo manese watsu oo mamaꞌe petuga.
40025018	Soo oo tummatzidu ka sumuoo nageadu yise ka teepu-tooha oo sukwe kooohoo.
40025019	Ka saaꞌa soo nana kodyu petuse mu pumme tummatzidu namatoo bi.
40025020	Ka umu tu hemepu-witu soosopedakwatoona soo oo tummatzidu manegeoo nahemekadu oo makodyuse yise manegeoo too oo-koobakwisoo oo heme.
40025021	Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, ‘U punnoꞌo besa manepu-gaꞌyoo u manegeoo nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nemadabuekwu. Nu ewahoosoo u hanekukwu. U besa soonammekwu, yaa manakwana u nu-baaꞌyoona.’
40025022	Soo sumuꞌyoo oo tummatzidu punnoꞌo ka waahoo oa tupe nahemedu meeoo ka nana netamma, ‘U waahoosoo oa tupe e hemese, nu onoko tzanabedose menoꞌo watsukwuoo oa tupe u makodyukukwu.’
40025023	Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, ‘U tookwa punnoꞌo tubetse besa manepu-gaꞌyoo. U besa e nakabetsea tooe ka huutsekoo ume e hanekuse sapa. Nu ewahoosoo u hanekukwu. U punnoꞌo besa soonammekwu, yaa manakwana u nu-baaꞌyookwu.’
40025024	Soo tummatzidu punnoꞌo ka sumuoo oa tupe nageadu meeoo ka nana netamma, ‘U nenaduꞌyana. U ooosapa tooe hema soogwidu tooe gi numu tummatzipana.
40025025	Nu ka u-ma suina gi oo sookwatzekuna teepu-tooha ka oa tupe kooohoo. Yaaꞌa yise soo u oa tupe.’
40025026	Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U unu sutaꞌyoo, unu toetzebu. U mooasoo e sopedakwadoo ka e u manekwuna ka e tusoogwipunne.
40025027	U sakwa ka e oa tupe uga wutumase, oꞌno oosoo ewasoo manekwu.’
40025028	Ka oa tupe oo-makoo gwuuse ka nana sumumano (10) oa tupe makodyupu nagea.
40025029	Soo tooe haga tooe ka pumme tu geana besakoo mabetseana ewowsoo nageakwu. Soo tooe haga tooe yise ka gi besa oo mabetseana oosoo umu-makoo nahanekwu.
40025030	Soo gi besa tummatzidu ka unu togano-kwitoo natayakwu ka gi besa nanasoonamme-kwitoo.
40025031	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tooha-kwi e petuse ka mu nuka tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo-no, nu saaꞌa ka mu numu nemadabuedooa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
40025032	Noꞌobatusoo numu saaꞌa nu-baa e koobena manepetuse, nu yise mu tapokase mu nuga dooamu sukwesoo hanekwu.
40025033	Nu ka mu nuga dooamu e tumadinakwa hanekwu ka mu susutakoo numu e oenakwa hanekwu.
40025034	Ka umu e tumadinakwatu nu mee netammakwu, soo Te Naa namatoo mu bise Te Naa mu doodooamu-gakwu mu sootuhise, mu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu. Te Naa oꞌnosoo oo nemamakwupu gisoo ka teepu matabuena.
40025035	Mu nasootuhikwu ka e tzuayaꞌe e makase, e bamaka ka e puudyi, e nabaaꞌyookute tooe e wawaꞌa sapa.
40025036	Mu pukwi e namasooana e heemaka ka ooka e soogwaꞌe. Mu e tuoeyaꞌe e mabetsea. Mu nu-baa nobeꞌne ka e nakwutuma.
40025037	Mu bebesaꞌyoo numu mee unnekwu, ‘Hannanoꞌo numme u poonnena, u maka ka u tzuayaꞌe, yise ka u puudyaꞌe u bamaka?
40025038	Hannanoꞌo numme u nabaaꞌyookute tooe u wawaꞌa sapa? Hannanoꞌo pukwi u namasooana numme u heemaka ka ooka u soogwaꞌe?
40025039	Ka u tuoeyaꞌe haaꞌa u mabetseꞌa? Hannanoꞌo u nakwutuma u nobeꞌne?’
40025040	Nu mu tuukwekwu, ‘Mu ka umu e doodooamu-nagatu besa matuguna mu nuka besa matugudu-kwaꞌne manepunne.’
40025041	Nu ka umu e oenakwatu yise mee netammakwu, ‘Mu sakwa nu-baaꞌyoona meaꞌa. Mu ka gi tookedu goso-witoo meakwu, ka sutakoo yise too ooka tummatzidu-no ka suta-too namadabuedu-kwitoo mu meaꞌakwu, ka gi e tummatzina ka mumme e soogwaꞌe.
40025042	Mu gi e maka ka e tzuayaꞌe. Mu gi e bamaka ka e puudyaꞌe.
40025043	Mu gi e nabaaꞌyookute ka wawaꞌana mu-baa e petugase. Mu pukwi e namasooana gi e heemaka, ka ooka e soogwaꞌe. Mu gi e mabetsea ka e tuoeyaꞌe, ka e nakwutuma gi e nobeꞌne.’
40025044	Nu oo sopedakwadoo umu punnoꞌo mee e nanekwegeakwu, ‘Numme gi u nabaaꞌyookudu ka gi hannanoꞌo u poonnena. Gi too u hee-makadu ka gi u poonnena, tooe u tuoeyaꞌe sapa, tooe u nakwutuma sapa, gi hownnekoo u tummatzi ka gi u poonnena.’
40025045	Nu mee mu nanekwegeakwu, ‘Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Mu gi nuka tummatzaꞌe-kwaꞌne manepunne ka umu e doodooamu gi tummatzina.
40025046	Mu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo mee mu soobedyana. O mu sutaꞌyoo numuna soo suda mu tumatuguna mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Umu bebesaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa nasootuhikwu.’ “
40026001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu natukwengamakwuse ka numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma.
40026002	“Mooa yongona tamme ka gi namayuadu tukaba ewa tukakwu. Ka tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo nu sutakoo nana-waꞌne nakwuse natzakwenekwu. Oo nu nabatsa tabuakwu.”
40026003	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka pumme tubetse moohedu Caiaphas mee naneadu nobe-wi sumuhoo.
40026004	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu watze tunehanese yise oo batsakwu mee tunehanena.
40026005	Pana mu tutunehanedu ka mu numu-ma suaꞌe. “Tamme gi hownnekoo ka tu naꞌewa nadukanoꞌo ka Jesus wutama-waꞌneꞌyoo mu numu sumuna te goehookwu,” meeꞌe umu nananetamma.
40026006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona Bethany-wi ka Simon
40026007	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oo-matoo kemma tupe osa-kwikoo besa kwanadu namakwanakuna unu nanenagadu gwuuna. Ookow ka Te Pabeꞌe kwo-kooba tokwuukwateoo ka oo tuka katu.
40026008	Numme oo nakatzimodu ka mogoꞌne manena poonnese oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe, meeoo yise, “How manena oo nahadyakwe ka besa kwanadu unu naneagadu namakwanakuna?
40026009	Oosoo sakwa uga oo-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu namadea.”
40026010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “A tsasoopedya. Gi a nesootuꞌadyaꞌepana. Esoo mogoꞌne besa manakwe.
40026011	Mu tutuha manedu tooe hannanoꞌo pana ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana nu yise gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
40026012	Oosoo ka namakwakuna nu-kooba tokwuukwateoo ka e nakoookwuna-kobena e natugukwuna tumayohokuna.
40026013	Tooe hano tooe ka teepu-koobakwi soo besa nayadooadu numu natunedyooe-kwi ekow mogoꞌne besa tumatugu-kwitu nawahakwu.”
40026014	Sumuꞌyoo ka numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot mee naneadu ka mu Jew tutunehanedu-baa petuse
40026015	mee mu netamma, “Mu ka Ne Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona mumme e tuukwese, haaꞌnoko sakwa mu e tumanagaku?” Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu yise pahe mano-ma tsebooekudu (30) oo tumanagakuhoo.
40026016	Soo Judas yise mee soonamme, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu ka Jesus bika?”
40026017	Ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba naꞌewa tukana oe manepetuse, numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Hanoꞌyoona sakwa numme ka te nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mahanega?”
40026018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu ka Jerusalem-wi petugase sumuoo nana tapoegakwu mee saaꞌa oo netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Soo e nabatsakwuna mooasoo tuganaꞌa manegena. Nu ka umu nuka nakatzimodu-no ume nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukadooa.” ’ “
40026019	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna, ka ne nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mabetsabe.
40026020	Ka tu yongose, soo Te Pabeꞌe Gi Namayuadu Tukaba numme-no tuka.
40026021	Ka togesoo ne tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa oo tubetse nakasopedakwadoo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu ka umu nuka wohonedu-matoo e bihookakwu.”
40026022	Numme suda sokwamana nanasusumuꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubengadyipunne, “Nu haaꞌa?” meeꞌe.
40026023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne nanekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo yaa nu-no tukadu.
40026024	Pana saaꞌa oosoo umu e wohonedu nu-matoo bikekwu soo oo manedu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
40026025	Soo Judas Iscariot ka Te Pabeꞌe ka ooka wohonedu-matoo bikakwu. Oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubenga, “Nu haaꞌa?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Judas netamma, “O u mooasoo oo yadooahoo.”
40026026	Ka togesoo ne tuka aata soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuhoose oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzabokahoo. Ookahoo numme pumme nakatzimodu hemehoose mee unakwe, “Mu sakwa eka tukaba tuka esoo nuga tookoo-matu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.”
40026027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseda gwuuhoose ka atsa baa oe tuoonahoose oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise mee ne netamma, “Mu sakwa noꞌyoona mamatu hebe.
40026028	Esoo nuga puupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwupu nu mu-koobatoo nabatsa. Ooonneꞌyoona yise soo Te Naa mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.
40026029	Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose, oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo mu-no hebekwu.”
40026030	Numme yise nanesootuhi hoobea negwuuna ka Olive mee naneadu poꞌwoadu-matoo mea.
40026031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka yaa togano suda tu namanekwuse mu e maꞌwuookakwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe tubotugupu, meeꞌe naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo e manekwuna. ‘Soo seepu takonedu nabatsahookwu, mu seepu yise nanaꞌemota petugwahookwu.’
40026032	Pana saaꞌa nu ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase mu-kobenasoo Galilee-wi mani petuhoogakwu.”
40026033	Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Umu sumuna u-koobaꞌyoona meaꞌakwu, nu gi umu-no meakwu,” meeꞌe.
40026034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Togesoo tu toganopunne, gisoo ka tsekana kwuꞌa waha-dooe oo yaka, pahe-dooe ona u numu tuukwekwu u gi e sopedakwatoo.”
40026035	Soo Peter yise meeoo Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tooe umu e batsakwu mee unnepana gi nu meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌyoona oo-waꞌnesoo unakwe.
40026036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme-no Gethsemane-wi petugase onona yise mee ne netamma, “Yowsoo aatapunne nu nanesootuhigakwu.”
40026037	Mu Peter, James, John, oꞌno meaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe
40026038	mee mu netamma, “E pewu-kwitu tubetse suda nuumma. Mu sakwa yaahoosoo aatapunne.
40026039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sagwane umu kwingaꞌatoosoo meahoose, o teepu-kooba meatzedose, yise nanesootuhikooha. “E Naa Toogoopatu. Nuga Naa Toogoopatu. Nuka u tunetammakuse nu oo-toogoo meakwu. Ekow e pewu-kwitu suda nuummana, kadooꞌoo mayugwe.”
40026040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pahe-matoo kodyukase, utuaꞌe mu mayuhoo petugase mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhipunne, oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu matzama.
40026041	Mu gi oo mapuꞌa ka gi manese meeꞌe nu.”
40026042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise penakwa nanesootuhigase, oꞌno yise tuwow mee unakwe, “E Naa nu tooe a nuukatupana oo-toogoo meakwu ka nuka u tunemayohokupu.”
40026043	Yise tu pupuaꞌamu-baa kodyu petuse, mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petusoo.
40026044	Ka mu poonnese kodyukase meeoosoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
40026045	Ka nanesootuhimakwuse ka umu tu pupuaꞌamu-baasoo petugase meeoo mu netamma, “Yow, haaꞌa mu togesoo utuaꞌe? Yosuhoo! Tamme meaꞌakwu, nu natzakwenekwu. Yaa soo sutaꞌyoo nana kemma.”
40026047	Togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe soo Judas uga numme-notu, mu ewaꞌyoo tukwutumadu o-no numme-baa petugonno, tsegesa noko papabatsekoo hooope hehemana. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu numme-matoo tutayana.
40026048	Mooasoo soo Judas meeoo mu tunetammakupu, “Nu saaꞌa oo mitzadyamehoodooa, oꞌno u oo sopedakwadoodooa o soo Jesus.”
40026049	Soo Judas ka Te Pabeꞌe yise mee netamma, “How u E Pabeꞌe?” yise oo mitzadyaꞌmehoo.
40026050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “E puaꞌa. Yabesoo sakwa u oo manikwuna mayohohoo.” Mu naana ka Judas-notu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tsakatuhoo.
40026051	Sumuꞌyoo numme-matu yise tsegesa-ma ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe tummatzidu naka wugaꞌakwunihoo.
40026052	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U tsegesa mabesootugu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka tsegesa-ma mooemanedu nanagoedu, oosoo oo-masoo nabatsakwudu.
40026053	Mu sakwa e unnena nakasopedakwatoo, nu ka E Naa ewow oo tutummatziwabe toha kakasa-gakoo sakwa mesoo natummatzi tuunguse uga.
40026054	Pana nu ka gi umuoo natummatzi tuunguse, ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooapu nabotugu-waꞌnesoo manepunne.”
40026055	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme gwuuhoodu mee netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi nu naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu e tumahepana wobe-ma, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo. Tooe ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe.
40026056	Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotugu oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.” Noꞌyoona numme nakatzimodu yise suise oo-baaꞌyoona namapetukwahoo.
40026057	Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe Caiaphus mee naneadu-baatoo bihooka. Mu Jew numu tutuhanedu ka Caiaphus-no watze tunehane ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
40026058	Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu-nakwi meadabena ka pukwi mu tutunehane-kwi petuhooga obe puuwanasoo. Soo Peter mu otuoo tutukwutumadu-baa katu, mee soonammena, “Howga umu ka Te Pabeꞌe yugwekwu?”
40026059	Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe mu tutunehanedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nebatsa, gi toge oo manena tooꞌe nekwatepana, gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
40026060	Tooe ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu esayipana gi nanakwaꞌnesoo nanano tuukweꞌe. Wahaꞌyoo numu yise saaꞌa mee unnekwate “Esoo nana meeoo,
40026061	‘Nu ka nobe ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhina kadooꞌoo mesoo mayukwe yise pahe tabeba-wi oo mesoo mayota.’ “
40026062	Soo Caiaphas yise wunuoose ka Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa ne tuukwe ka mu numu ume netamma-kwitu.”
40026063	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi. Soo Caiaphas yise tuwow mee oo netamma, “U sakwa togekoo tuukwe u haaꞌa tooꞌe Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa toogoopadu Te Naa Besaa Tooa?”
40026064	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, u besa unakwe. Nu togesapa mu tuukwe saaꞌa mu e poonnekwu Te Naa-baaꞌyoona e tunemadabue ka koomeba-kooba e kodyu petuse.”
40026065	Soo Caiaphas tu kwasu makebuekooha. Yooonnekoo mu numu oo sopedakwatoo ka suda Te Pabeꞌe unnena oo nakasagwaꞌekuhoose. Soo Caiaphas yise mee mu tutuhanedu netamma, “Oosoo suda unakwe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo mee naneyugwena. Gi tamme manatusoo oetusoo wahakwutu sookwaꞌe. Mu muusoo oo naka ka suda oo unakwe mu sakwa haꞌyoo oetu netamma.
40026066	Hayoo mu sokwama?” Umu yise ka Caiaphas nanekwegease meeoo unne, “Soo Jesus sakwa nabatsa.”
40026067	Umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe kobi-too toohegonno yise madopotona oo topagetagonno. Oo matatsena oo nematzama,
40026068	mee unnena, “U sakwa ne mesoo tuukwe ka ume topagetadu ka u pooha ume tuukwe u ka Te Pabeꞌe mee unnena.”
40026069	Soo Peter tooesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nehane puuwana tu nobe-kobena katu. Sumuꞌyoo tutummatzidu tsuadumu mee oo netamma, “U haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka Jesus-notu
40026070	Soo Peter yise noꞌoko mu numu tu naꞌoonnakwi manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu gi oo-notu. Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
40026071	Ka koodua nanatzakwonaꞌa-witoo soo Peter meahoo. Oꞌno yise kummaꞌyoosoo tsuadumu tutummatzidu punnoꞌo oo poonnese mee ka mu numu o konnodu netamma, “Esoo nana uga ka Jesus-notu
40026072	Soo Peter yise meesoo, “Nu gi ka nana sopedakwatoo, mee uga nu.”
40026073	Saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo umu o konnodu-matu mee ka Peter netamma, “U tookwa umu-notu, u umu-matoo-waꞌnesoo yadooakanga.”
40026074	Soo Peter yise mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa unakwe soo Te Naa sakwa gi e sootuhipana ka mumme e esayaꞌekute. Nu gi ookow nana sopedakwatoo.” Toge, oꞌno soo tsekana kwuꞌa yagayakwe.
40026075	Soo Peter yise oo soomayuhoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammapu, “Pahe u gi e nesopedakwadoopunnekwu gisoo ka tsekana kwuꞌa yaka.” Soo Peter puunuwatoo mease yaka ka tooe Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoopana gi oo nesopedakwadoose.
40027001	Awamooasoo noꞌyoona mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee tunehane.
40027002	Ka Te Pabeꞌe mi tzagunetowse ka mu otuoo numu-kooba katudu Pilate mee naneadu-matoo oo bika. Mu Jew tutunehanedu gi mu numu batsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
40027003	Soo Judas
40027004	“Nu suda manakwe nu ka mu tummatzina ka besow nana mu batsakwuse,” mee soo Judas unakwe. “U suda soonamme gi numme,” mee umu tutunehanedu oo netamma.
40027005	Soo Judas yise ka mu tumakodyukuna ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona sutahoose oo tabebuowse meahoo. Yise puusoo natzakwenehoose yaꞌehoo.
40027006	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka oo tutabebuahoona tzobahoose mee unakwe, “Esoo numu nabatsa-kwi a natumanakana. Esoo sutaꞌyoo gi ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi natumasumudoodu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
40027007	Umu yise tubewa oo-ma tumuhookwu mee tunehane wakwawaꞌa numu pukwi nakooꞌyikwuna
40027008	Menoꞌo yise esoo tubewabe, Numu Pu-koobatoo Nabatsapu, mee naneꞌa.
40027009	Oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe, Jeremiah mee naneadu, ka yoo tu namanekwuna oꞌnosoo wahapu.
40027011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Pilate-baa nabi petugase soo Pilate yise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa ka Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Aha, nu yow oosoo.”
40027012	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu nanasuda oo netamma, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi haꞌyoo unakwe.
40027013	Soo Pilate yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu tutunehanedu tubetse suda u netamma. U sakwa ka mu tutunehanedu kaaheno nanekwegea.”
40027014	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo tuwazoo haꞌyoo sukwe unakwe. Soo Pilate meeoo soonamme, “Nu gi o nakasopedakwatoo haꞌoo manenaga masoo gi mu nanekwegea.”
40027015	Nonotsa sumu tomoyina tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo soo numu-kooba katudu sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzamaꞌwuyakwe ka mu numu unnemakoosoo.
40027016	Mu ewaꞌyoo numu sumuoo nakwutumadu unu sopedakwatoo Barabbas mee naneadu ewow numu goedu.
40027017	Ka mu numu sumuse soo Pilate mee mu tubenga, “Hanotu umu-matu mu natzamaꞌwukwuna soogwaꞌe Barabbas pute Jesus?”
40027018	Soo Pilate oo sopedakwatoo ka mu numu Jew tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe gi mu petzape oo nuusoogwedu ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumase.
40027019	Tooesoo ka Pilate oetu soohane oo nodukwa kummaꞌakoosoo oo-matoo taya mee oo tuukwe tuunguna, “Gi ka besaꞌhoo nana how yugwepana soo e nosena suda e masoonamme u ka oo batsa tuungukwuse.”
40027020	Mu numu tutunehanedu meeꞌe ka ewow numu tunetammakute, “Ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwuse ka Jesus batsa,” meeꞌe.
40027021	“Hanotu umu-matu nu tzamaꞌwukwu?” meeꞌe soo Pilate tutubenga. “Barabbas,” mee mu numu noꞌyoona oo nanekwegea.
40027022	“Haꞌoo yise nu oo yugwekwu ka Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe?” meeꞌe soo Pilate mu tubenga. Umu noꞌyoona oo nanekwegease mee unne, “Oo batsa.”
40027023	Soo Pilate yise mee mu tubenga, “Haꞌoo suda mu oo tumatuguse, oo batsa tuungu?” Pana umu tunenoyukwesoo, “Oo batsa.”
40027024	Soo Pilate ka mu numu-ma suina meeoo mu netamma, “Nu tooe mu tooꞌe tumayohokukwu mu Jesus batsa mee tunetamma gi yise nu hownnekoo oe naneyugwekwu.” Soo Pilate yise mu-kobenaꞌyoona mabatzaka, ka umu-tammesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsana tzamunase, puu gi oe soonaneyugwena mee unnena.
40027025	Noꞌyoona mu numu yise oo nanekwegea, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo. Mooasoo numme noꞌyoona oo patza tuunguse. Gi too hownneꞌyoo tooe soo oo numme manena numme-matoosoo kodyuse.”
40027026	Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwuse ka umu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wupagetu tuunguse ooka mu batsa tuungu, oo taposa paaꞌa yise oo batsakwu.
40027027	Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-witoo tzakakase noꞌyoona mu susumudu tutukwutumadu oo naꞌoonnakwi mani.
40027028	Umu yise ka pukwi oo namadabuena tsakwumetahoose ka numu-kooba katudu-kwaꞌnesoo oo wunagayaku.
40027029	Unutse monoga-kwi tuwow oo tzowupagaku tonobe-makoo a namadabue-kwi. Natzetono oo mi-wi tuguse oo-kobena meatzedona oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U tookwa yow mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
40027030	Umu oo kobitu toohena ka pumma oo natzetomasoo oo kwo-makoo oo wupageta.
40027031	Ka oo-maꞌyoona nanekoemakwuse umu oo kwasu-kwisoo oo kwaseakuse oo tzakahooka oo batsakwuse.
40027032	Umu tutukwutumadu ka meadabena, Simon mee naneadu wegeahoo. Mu tutukwutumadu ka Simon nenoyukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe puma nataposakwuna oo hane tuunguna.
40027033	Umu yise ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-wi oo bi petuhooga.
40027034	Yise umu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa noko natusooabe mayuana oo tooꞌe hebe tuungu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi oo hepe.
40027035	Yise awamooa umu oo mi-makoo paaꞌa oo taposa. Mu tutukwutumadu yise oo kwasu natotsakwate.
40027037	Ka Te Pabeꞌe nataposana tzopanakwa wobe-matoo mee nabotugu, “Yaa esoo Jesus, ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
40027038	Mu wahaꞌyoo unu tutuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwa nataposa.
40027039	Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe moopa meana oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.
40027040	Mu numu oo-moopa meadu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U meeoo unnepu u Te Naa nobe wudyoomase, pahe tabeba-wi besa oo matabuekwu. U sakwa ka unu tumadina mamaꞌyoo wuekese, namagwetzoi.”
40027041	Umu numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena,
40027042	“U mu numu magwetzoise, pana yise gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi. Ne hee Pabeꞌe u? Gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi ka naduyana mee unnepana. Uusoo yaa teepu-matoo wuese numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
40027043	Masoo Te Naa Besaa Tooa mee naneyakwe Te Naa God sakwa oo magwetzoi ka Te Naa-wi oo tunakaꞌoedyukute mee oo unakwe.”
40027044	Umu tutuduhadu oo naꞌenakwa natzakwenedu punnoꞌo oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.
40027045	Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwikoo tooe, ka teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
40027046	Ka pahe-kwikoo tooesoo toganopunne soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌagedyadooa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani,” mee naꞌunnedu, “E Naa, E Naa, how manena u e matusookwunaꞌe?”
40027047	Umu susumudu konnopunnedu-nagatu mee unne, “Masoo tookwa ka Elijah oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneadu bidyakwe.”
40027048	Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu yabesoo tanomanegase yise suda kammadu baa yotsogadu-kooba hanese oodutsekoo hooope-ma oo tzetzabekuse ka Te Pabeꞌe baa tumakute.
40027049	Pana mu susumudu meeoo, “Oo tsasoopedya. Sumuna soo Elijah tamme-baa tabua petuse oo magwetzoikwu.”
40027050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise paba yadooase soo oo moogooa oo-nagaꞌyoona tsebooegea.
40027051	Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona numu nanesootuhidu-makoo nowmootoo natzakwenedu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose soo wunapu paꞌanakwana tubongo nowmootoo natzagebuꞌehoo. Soo teepu yutsungakoohase mu tupe payooagonnona tsawekooha.
40027052	Mu numu pukwi natuoonana-kwitu soo teepu paꞌyooawununa mu numu pukwi natuoonana wonedihoo. Mu numu tuꞌina Te Naa dooamu suuꞌmu tu natuoona-kwiꞌyoona tuusootabue.
40027053	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tuusootabuese, oꞌno mu numu mooasoo tu nakoo-kwiꞌyoona tuusootabuepuna yosupu, umu ewow numu poonne ka Jerusalem-witu.
40027054	Mu tukwutumadu pabeꞌe ka mu tukwutumaku ka Te Pabeꞌe eyaꞌepunnedu umu noꞌoko hemma manewununa poonne ka teepu yutsungakoohase ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose umu yise unu suigonnona meeꞌe nanaꞌunakwe, “Masoo tookwa tooꞌe togesapa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
40027055	Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne punnoꞌo onow kwingaꞌa konnopunnena oo poonnepunne umuoo ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oo tummatzina.
40027056	Umuoo momokoꞌne-nagatu paheꞌyoo Mary Magdalene, yise Mary mu James noko Joseph pea, yise tuwazoo Zebedee nodukwa.
40027057	Ka tu pudu yongose soo nana Joseph
40027059	Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo tzakwekuse pudutupu toha wanapu hane petuse oe oo mabutooe.
40027060	Mooasoo soo Joseph ka tupe-wi tutotawagase, ka sumu tabeno puusoo oe natugukwu mee soonammena. Ooweoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo nanomatugu. Ka pabatsekoo tupe yise oo-kobenatoo tonanooehoose yise oeꞌyoona mea.
40027061	Mu Mary Magdalene-no Mary punnoꞌo ka pukwi oo nanomatuguna oowenapa oo poonnedyugwe.
40027062	Ookow mooꞌa mu Jew numu tutunehanedu noꞌyoona ka Pilate-baa petuga.
40027063	Umu mee oo netamma, “Numme oo soomayu soo Jesus uga meeoo ka mu numu esayaꞌekuyakwe ka saaꞌa yaꞌese waha tabeno manese namayodakwu.
40027064	U sakwa watsukuoo umu u tutukwutumadu-matu pukwi oo natuguna waha tabeno mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu, oꞌno umu oo nakatzimodu sumuna gi oo tookoo tuduhadooa, oosoo tu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda mee gi mu numu tuukwedooa. Ekow naꞌesayaꞌedu ka mooasoo Jesus unnena oooonakwa sutaꞌyookwu,” mee mu tutunehanedu unakwe.
40027065	“Unu ooka mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu,” mee soo Pilate.
40027066	Umu yise ka pukwi oo natugu-kwitoo mease unutse oo madumahoo, oꞌno gi haga oe egea-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu yise mu tutukwutumatu ooka eyaꞌe tuungu.
40028001	Yise ka nanesootuhi tabeba waha tabeno oo tabemease ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌese oogow awamooasoo, mu Mary Magdalene-no Mary ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitu poonne memeahoo.
40028002	Gisoo ka oe mu pepetugaꞌa soo teepu unu yutsungakooha yise soo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka tupe oo koobenatu tonanooekwunihoose oo-kooba katuoo.
40028003	Soo Te Naa tummatzidu besa kootabedooana tukwukwetseba-waꞌne yise besa toha namasoꞌa.
40028004	Umu tutukwutumadu kwepekeagonnona, ka oo poonnese abedihooga ka sui nunugwehoose.
40028005	Ka mu momokoꞌne pepetuhoogase soo Te Naa tummatzidu mee mu netamma, “Gi suipana, nu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo wate.
40028006	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi yow, mooasoo yotsepu ka tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo. Kekemowse ka pukwi oo natzatugupu poonne.
40028007	Yabe memeahoose ka umu oo nakatzimodu tuukwe petuga Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona mooasoo yotsepuna mu-kobenasoo Galilee-wisoo petuoogakwu. Ka o petuoogase, mu saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe poonnedooa. O soomayuna ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme tuukwepu,” meeꞌe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo.
40028008	Umu momokoꞌne yise yabesoo ka pukwiꞌyoo oo natugupu-wiꞌyoona memeahoose, besa sokwama gisoo besa oo nakasopedakwadoopana, mu nakatzimodu tuukwega.
40028009	Mu momokoꞌne memeana ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus wegease Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Haꞌoo mu?” Umu yise oo-tamme kekemmase oo-kobena meatzedokwatese oo kuku-kooba matuoonase oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
40028010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mee mu netamma, “Gi suipana. Mu sakwa umu nuka nakatzimodu ka teepu Galilee-witoo taya, nu saaꞌa onoko mu tapoegeadooa.”
40028011	Ka mu momokoꞌne ka Jerusalem-witoo kokodyuse mu tutukwutumadu yise ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu papabeꞌe-baa petugonno ka tu poonnena mu tuukwe.
40028012	Mu tutunehanedu papabeꞌe ka mu tutukwutumadu ewatseꞌe tumanagakukwu.
40028013	Mu tutunehanedu mee mu netamma. “Mu sakwa mu numu tuukwe ka umu Jesus nakatzimodu tookwa ka oo tookoo hanedooapu ka togano ne utuihoogase.
40028014	Ka Pilate ooka nakase numme saaꞌa ookow tuwazoo tumanagakudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Pilate gi haꞌoo mu yugwedooa.”
40028015	Mu tutukwutumadu ka pumme tu tumanagakuna hemmase mu numu nemooaka. Yaa manakwana mu Jew numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo natuduhapu meeꞌe pumme tu nemooagapu oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
40028016	Mu sumumanoꞌyoona sumu-ma tsebooekudu (11) Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwi petu ka giba-kumaba ka Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo pumme tunetammakupu-wi.
40028017	Umu-matoo ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Pana umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese punnoꞌo gi oo posopedakwadoo.
