40028018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu besa pooha-ma e pooha sootuhi, ka ebe tamme-kooba Te Naa-baa noko yise ka yaa teepu-koobatu tuwazoo.
40028019	Menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌe mu sakwa ka tooe hano tooe manemona noꞌobatusoo numu nu-kwitu tunedyooe. Ka mumme nakaꞌoedyukudu baa-wi matzaka Te Naa-koobatoo, nu-koobatoo, yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-koobatoo tuwazoo.
40028020	Mu sakwa mu tunedyooena, oꞌno umu noꞌoko mumme e tuukwena mayohokwu. Nu ooosapa mu noꞌyookwu ka teepu mobegwanatoo tooe.”
41001001	Nu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa Tooa-witu, mu tuukwe. Oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-witu, mu Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna yise meeoo, “Mana ka hemma nadukadu gi naa-wiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi yadooakwu, ‘Mu sakwa muusoo namabetseapunne, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwunoꞌoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwepunne, oꞌno mu oo nakabetseanokwu.’ “
41001004	Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana John mee naneadu ka numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe, oona ka hemma nadukadu pukwi gi naa-wiꞌyoona. Soo John ka mu numu maꞌemukwapu, mu nanekwaha tuungu. “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu,” mee mu netamma. Ka mu nanekwahakese, soo John yise baa-wi mu matzakakwu.
41001005	Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanotoo tooe oo-baa petudyakwe.
41001006	Soo John a puhu nagwesena namadabue-wi kwaseana, yise mokobu-ma nateꞌa. Kua noko nota peha natumatzuꞌatoona tukana.
41001007	Soo John yise mee mu numu netammayakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu, nuga ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, yise nuga ooonakwa tuwazoo besaꞌyoo.
41001008	Nu baa-wi mu matzaka, mu ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabekwu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu.”
41001009	Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nazareth, ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona kemmana ka John-baa petuhooga. Soo John yise ka Te Pabeꞌe baa-wi matzaka, ka hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-wi.
41001010	Ka Te Pabeꞌe batsebooegena, o poonne ka Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo punoonooekwuekedu-kwaꞌne manegese oo-naga mani petu.
41001011	Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana meeoo oo netamma, “U yow Nuga Besaa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu u soopedyana besa u-koobatu soonamme.”
41001012	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oona numu-wanatoo taya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nunuꞌu-baa watsumano (40) tooꞌi. Soo Sutaꞌyoo oo-baa petugase oo tooꞌe maꞌemukwa pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo-ma nakaꞌemukwa. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe sootummatzise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-toogoo tsebooe.
41001014	Ka John nawutumase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooemeꞌa.
41001015	Ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Pudusoo Te Naa noko mu numu nemadabuekwu. Mu sakwa ka sutakoo gi nakabetseapana, yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
41001016	Wahaꞌyoo pakwe-gadu naana, nawangaꞌa Andrew-no Simon mee nananeadu, ka pumma tu tuukwina ka banunadu-witoo wukwazuyakwe, oonow soo Te Pabeꞌe ka bakumana meꞌa.
41001017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nu-no mease e nakatzimodu mane. Nu oo mu mayugwese, mu saaꞌa ka mu numu nuka nakatzimodu mayugwedooa.”
41001018	Umu nawangaꞌa yise ka pumma tu tuukwina maꞌwuhookase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nagegakwate.
41001019	Umu tzageꞌe soo wahaꞌyoo nawangaꞌa, James-no John, ka tu naa Zebedee mee naneadu-no ka tu naa sake-wi. Umu ka pumma tu tuukwina mabetsabedyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu-kumana meadabena mu poonne,
41001020	yise umu nawangaꞌa tuwazoo bihooka. Umu yise ka tu sake noko tu naa maꞌwuhookase, Te Pabeꞌe nakwisoo puno memeahoo.
41001021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga. Nanesootuhi tabeno ka mu nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukweꞌe.
41001022	Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mee netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow, oosoo tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahadyakwe, gi ka te tunedyooedu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
41001023	Sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oe.
41001024	Soo nana tsoapa-toohakwi waꞌagese, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Uda! U haaꞌa kadooꞌoo ne mayugwekwu? U sakwa ne tsasopedya. Numme u sopedakwatoo, u Jesus, noko Hemma Manumudoopu Besaa Tooa.”
41001025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo meeoo oo netamma, “Gi unnepana, mana-gaꞌyoona tsebooegea.”
41001026	Soo tsoapa kwebebewununa yise paba waꞌakese tsebooega.
41001027	Mu numu yise mee nananetammakooha, “Uuneꞌyoo! Numme gi hannanoꞌo mownnekoo poohabe poonnedu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu sukwe yadooase ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo.”
41001028	Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanatuukwe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwitu.
41001029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise watsukweoo tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona meaꞌase, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga.
41001030	Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena, tu tookoo unu udutu hape. Umu oo nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukweꞌe.
41001031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-baa petugase, oo mi-makoo oo tzadyoda. Oosoo yise yotseoose, saahoose, mu tukatuungu.
41001032	Oogowsoo yongona tu taba egease, mu numu tuoegoedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petudyakwe.
41001033	Tubetse ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka nobe-kobena sumupunne.
41001034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu numu-ma matuoonase, mu noꞌobatusoo tuoegoedu numu mabesaku, mu tsoapagoedu tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi mu unne tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tsoapagoedu gi ooka mu wahakwuna petzape, umu ka oo sopedakwadoona.
41001035	Oogow mooꞌa awamooa tooesoo tu toganopunne soo Te Pabeꞌe yotsese, oona numu-wanatoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe.
41001036	Saaꞌa soo Simon tu pupuaꞌamu-no oo wateka.
41001037	Ka oo mayuse, meeoo oo netamma, “Mu numu u kwate, u sakwa kodyugasoo,” mee.
41001038	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu numu mana tooe nonobe-gakoo sakwa nu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwe. Soo e pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu ekow nanesootuhibu tunedyooe.’ “
41001039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witu ka mu numu tuukweꞌe, ka mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona.
41001040	Sumuꞌyoo nana unu tookoo uayidu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, nanesootuhina meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e mabesaku ka meeoo soonammena.”
41001041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nakasootuhise, yise oo mi-makoo oo tzamahoose, mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu. U besa manekwu.
41001043	Yabesoo u sakwa ka te nanesootuhiwabe petuoose oo tzapoonneku ka besa manese, yise ka Te Naa ka Moses tamme netamma-waꞌnesoo, oo tzapoonneku ka u tookoo uayina namabesakuse. Pana tubetse gi ka mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuna.”
41001045	Pana soo nana ewow mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, yise tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kwingaꞌa numu-wanatoo mea, gi yise punowsoo kodyukaꞌa.
41002001	Huu tabe mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Capernaum-wi kodyu petuga. Ewaꞌyoo numu yise oo petugana nakow,
41002002	yise oo-baa petudyakwe. Ka nobe kaaꞌno, ka natzakwuna-kobenakwi tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooꞌe ka Te Naa-witu.
41002003	Watsukweꞌyoo nanana kapa-wikoo ka gi yutsungadu nana tzakwuhuna ka nobe-wi petuga.
41002004	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo oo tzakwuhookase sapa, ewaꞌyoo numu ka nobe-wi, umu gi hownnekoo oe tzoonooꞌa. Umu yise ka nobe-koobatu tzatawagase, ka kapa-nokosoo tobongo oo tzakweku ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenatoo.
41002005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu naana pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute, yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”
41002006	Umu Jew numu tunedyooedu o aatadu mee sokwama,
41002007	“Esoo hayoo suda naꞌunnedu unni. Masoogina ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwe, mee soonamme. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
41002008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu tusooyugwena yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute nu ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, pana mu oo poonnekwu ka nana e mabesakuse.
41002010	Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwakwuna.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yutsungadu meeoo netamma,
41002011	“Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoo tzakwuka.”
41002012	Soo nana yise ka tu kapa tzakwuhuna mea. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sooꞌoedyukuna meeoo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesow namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Numme gi haananoꞌo yooonnekoo poohabe poonnedu.”
41002013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka banunadu-kumabasoo petugase, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe.
41002014	Sumuꞌyoo nana Levi
41002015	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Levi nobe-witoo oo-no mea, umu tukaga. Ewaꞌyoo numu tumasumudoodu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee mu Pharisee mu neꞌa, umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nagedu yise umu-no tuka.
41002016	Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe umu-no mu tuka mu poonnese, meeoo ka umu oo nakatzimodu netamma, “Umu mumme tunedyooedu sakwa gi suda tumatugudu numu-no tukapana, umuoo tumasumudoodu ooonneꞌyoo.”
41002017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakase, mee unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba petu, ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu tuukwekwuse. Ka mu numu mooasoo kaaheno meadu mooasoo Te Naa-witu sopedakwatoo. Soo pooha-gaꞌyoo puu tuoegoedu numudoo suuꞌmu nabaꞌe, gi ka besow numudoo, nu puu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu suuꞌmu tummatzaꞌe, gi ka besow numu.”
41002018	Susumudu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “Umu John pupuaꞌamu yise ka mu Pharisee-no mee tunetamma, ‘Numme puu gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe.’ How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”
41002019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo yaahoo umu-no, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne, umu puu ka nananoꞌyoona besa sokwama.
41002020	Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhikwu.
41002021	Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noꞌoko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu wanapu nadotsana-kwaꞌne. U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu. Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mu mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
41002023	Sumu nanesootuhi tabeno, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ona tubewabe-too meꞌa. Umu tseagoena ka wada-matu mabokana, oo mahangeana oo tuka.
41002024	Mu nanesootuhidu Jew numu moohedu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonne, umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu u nakatzimodu gi ka te Jew tumayohope mayoho. Umu ka wada mahangeana oo tukadyakwe, esoo nanesootuhi tabeba, gi numu hemma howyugwenoꞌo.”
41002025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa oogow nea ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka ne Jew tumayohope takopa, ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no tseagoena.
41002026	Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-witoo mease ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no, soo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu Abiatha mee naneadu, ka pooha tukaba mu maka, umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Soo Te Naa yise gi hayoo mu netamma.
41002027	Soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhi tabeba nemadabue ka mu numu nasootuhi-kwi, gi sakwa mu numu oꞌno hemma how yugwe tuungu.
41002028	Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu mu manekwuna nemadabue ka nanesootuhi tabeno.”
41003001	Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petuga. Soo nana mi pasatopoꞌnepu gi miyutsengudu ka nanesootuhipe-wi.
41003002	Mu tunesootzemadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnepunne how saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana mi mabesaku. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe how u nanesootuhi tabeno numu sootuhaꞌe? Mee oo tooꞌe netammakwuse. Oo wohonedu oo hoawipunne, ka gi hemma haꞌoo nuugwenoꞌo oo oo manakwe.
41003003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Yaatoo kemma.” Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo meꞌahoo.
41003004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme poonnepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Ka pabow tabeba-wi gi hemma how nuugwenoꞌo, oꞌno haaꞌa sutaꞌyoo? Yise oꞌno tabeba haaꞌa mu gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwe? Oꞌno haaꞌa mu gi namabesakukwu? Oꞌno haaꞌa ka pabow mu tabebanoꞌo, yaꞌepana gi howꞌneyoo?” Umu yise gi tunemaꞌyuhoo.
41003005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi besa mu sooyukwe mu soosawikuna, gi mu numu nakasootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma ka gi mayutsungadu, “Matuhe.” Oosoo yise matuhe, oo mi namabesakuhoopu.
41003006	Mu Pharisee oeꞌyoona meaꞌase, mu wakwawaꞌamu numu pabeꞌe pupuaꞌamu-no oetu nehanegonno, noꞌyoona mee tusooꞌyukwe umu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe batsa mee.
41003007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no yise ka banunadu-kumaba petuga. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzaꞌe, mu tuoegoedu besa oo mayugwepu-witu nakadu tooe hano manakwanatu tooeSoo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sake mabegapunne, nu oe meahookwu.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tsamowkwunu petzabena, umu nanamatsagawunu.
41003013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka giba-matoo meahoose, ka umu pumme nakatzimodu bi, ka mu netutzease.
41003014	Sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) umu-nagatu netutzease yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu e yadooawabe manekwudu. Nu yise nanesootuhibu mu numu mu tunedyooe tayakwu.
41003015	Mu pooha-gana tsoapa nematzakwunikwu.”
41003016	Umu oo yadooawabe mee nananeꞌa Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter meeoo oo neahoo,
41003017	James tu wanngaꞌa John-no, mu naa Zebedee mee naneadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka James noko John Nunuadu-kwaꞌne mee mu neꞌa.
41003018	Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Thaddeus, Simon, ka Cana mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu,
41003019	soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa oobenakwa tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo bika.
41003020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-wi kodyu petuga. Mu numu yise ka nobe-wi ewa mani petuga, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu-no mu mabetseana, gi ooosapa tuka.
41003021	Mu nanumu gi oo manena nakana, umu yise meeoo sokwama, “Esoo emukwa. Numme sakwa nobe-witoo oo tzakaka,” mee.
41003022	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona kemmaꞌase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemana meeoo, “Oosoo numu poohadu. Oosoo sutakoo pooha-gana ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidyakwe.”
41003023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Sutakoo u pooha-gana gi hownnekoo tsoapa nematzagakwuni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
41003024	Ka yooonnekoo, mu numu sukwe nanayadooena, gi hownnekoo hemma nemamakwu ewa nanatumooꞌoo.
41003025	Mu naanapuaꞌamu sukwe nanahase gi hemma nemamakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41003026	Mu numu poohadu naduyadu sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo, gi hownnekoosoo sutakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo gi puusoo tu nanagoena petzape.
41003027	Nu ka sutakoo ooonnakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, yise nu tuwazoo unu nazooꞌe. Nu mu mesoo matzooekute.
41003028	Ka noꞌoko suda te tumatugupu soo Te Naa kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu, ka ooka te nekwaꞌe. Ka Te Naa-witu gi suda netammapana tuwazoo.
41003029	Pana ka ooka Te Naa Besa Pooha sutaꞌyoo mee netammadu, soo Te Naa gi oo soomuꞌwakwu.”
41003030	Mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma, ka tu Besa Pooha mu nesootzeꞌma.
41003031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea-no oo wanngaꞌamu yise petugonno, obe puuwana konno ka oo yadooadyakwe.
41003032	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo nanaꞌoonnakwi aatadu meeoo oo netamma, “U pea-no u wanngaꞌamu obe puuwanaꞌyoona u-no neyadooꞌa.”
41003033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Haga e pea-no e kwangamu?”
41003034	Ka umu tu naꞌoonnakwi aatadu poonnese meeoo mu netamma, “Mu suuꞌmu yaatu e nanumu.
41003035	Mu ka E Naa te paꞌanakwatu nakabetseana, noꞌyoona mu ka E Naa nakabetseana, e tubetse nanumu.”
41004001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu-kumabaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo naꞌena-kwi manepunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wi tsebooese oe katu; mu numu yise ka banunadu-kumaba konno.
41004002	Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa mu numu tunedyooena, meeoo mu tuukweꞌe,
41004003	“E nakapunne, sumuꞌyoo nana ka tubewabe-wi tumasuꞌa.
41004004	Susumudu soo oo pooe tumasua-matu ka a nadapodo-witoo sawemena, mu hootsebaꞌa yise mu sooꞌa.
41004005	Susumudu soo oo pooe punnoꞌo unu tupe-ga-nagatoo saꞌwe, gi tookapu teepu-ga-witoo. Umu yabesoo naahoose sapa,
41004006	soo taba mu koopasakuhoo, umu ka gi tookapatoo tuna-gana.
41004007	Susumudu tsaꞌabu-nagatoo sawe meana, naa pana mu tsaꞌabu ewa naana mu tatsatsebooa.
41004008	Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawehoose besa naꞌa. Umu tumasape ewa pooedooꞌa.”
41004009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa e nakapunne, mu ka besow naka-gana.”
41004010	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mu numu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, meeꞌe oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo manena u mu numu natugweꞌnga?”
41004011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nekwegease mee unakwe, “Mu e nakatzimodu mooasoo nasootuhipu. Mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo, ka Te Naa unnepu. Mu nasootuhipu, pana mu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natugwengakatu Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.
41004012	‘Mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakamo, pana gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute. Mu tuwazoo tooe oo poonne pana gi oo soonakasopedakwadoo. Mu sakwa ka mumme oo tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu poonnena nakasopedakwadoona, oꞌno sakwa mu nu-matoo kemmase, nu yise mu sootuhikwu.’
41004013	Mu haaꞌa ka nuga natuukwepu sopedakwadoodu? Haꞌoo yise mu ka ekow naꞌunnepu mumme e tuukweꞌe gi oo nakasopedakwatoo?
41004014	Soo Te Naa yadooana ka numu tumasuꞌa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu yise ka teepu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41004015	Soo numu ka teepuna tumasuꞌana, susumu-kwi gi besa naꞌa. Soo numu ka Te Naa yadooana gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo gi togeꞌyoo yise mu numu tzaꞌemukwa. Mu natzaꞌemukwadu yise ka po-koobatoo sawetu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41004016	Susumudu numu ooonneꞌyoo gi tunagadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mooeꞌugasoo susumudu besa sokwamana pumme tu nesootzeꞌma
41004017	yabesoo ka Te Naa yadooana soomuꞌwa.
41004018	Susumudu numu ka teepuna naadu, tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo ooonneꞌyoo numu ewa tu hee-gana petukute. Ka tsaꞌabu-waꞌneꞌyoo yabesoo ewaꞌa, yise ka Te Naa yadooana gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
41004020	Susumudu soo numu besa tumasuꞌa, ka besow teepu-wi. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manekwu, tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwena.”
41004021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tugootabuagunoo gi he-tooha sukwe nuunadu. Paꞌaꞌyoona mu gootabuakupunnena, yise noꞌoko hemma gootabuakute. Soo e natugwengapu tugootabuagunoo-kwaꞌnesoo.
41004022	Umu-waꞌnekoosoo nu ka Te Naa-witu mu tunesootabuedooa.
41004023	Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu tubetse unu sokwamakwu, mumme e tuukwe-kwaꞌne, mu yise unusoo besa tusopedakwadookwu. Mu gi e nakabetseadu noꞌoko oo soomuꞌwakwu.”
41004026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu-witu nakase e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Ooosapa mu manemokwu tumasuꞌape-kwaꞌne. Sumuꞌyoo nana puu ka tubewabe-wi wahabu masuꞌase,
41004027	oosoo puu gi nasootabue yabesoo naꞌa. Tooe togano, tooe tabeno tooe, yabesoo naꞌa. Oo naa tabuꞌana, tamme gi sopedakwatoo.
41004029	Naakese, paꞌa wunukese, yise ka naa makwuse, nakutadu.”
41004030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna ewa manese nu mu tuukwekwu. Menoꞌo huutseꞌyoosoo numu E Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyute,
41004031	atsapooe-kwaꞌne. Atsapooe tuutseꞌyoo ka namasuana,
41004032	oosoo puu paꞌa naakese kwasu, mu hootsebaꞌa yise oo-naga nobe-too.”
41004033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu nanatuukweꞌe, hemma mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo, yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanatugwengapu tu nakatzimodu watse tunesootabuedooa.
41004035	Ka tu yongokese, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Tamme ka banunadu ooenapatoo meakwu.”
41004036	Mu oo nakatzimodu mu numu ewatoo mease, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sake-wi tzoonooase ka baa natzemangega. Susumudu ka sake-wi umu-no.
41004037	Unu hukwa petuse, baa ka sake-wi bakaanoho.
41004038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake ooonnakwa habenoꞌo tu mi tzopedanena, atasoo uꞌwedape. Mu oo nakatzimodu suina, yise oo netupoonnese, mee oo netamma, “Haꞌyoo u ne soobedya? How sakwa u ka ne badatuꞌihoose?”
41004039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka hukwapa noko baa yadooese, “Obeda sapa,” mee unne. Gi hukwa manise, gi hee yutsungapunne.
41004040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa gi unu suꞌipana, gisoo mu nuka togesoobedya.”
41004041	Umu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Haga esoo nana? Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetsea.”
41005001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no ka Gerase mee naneadu-kwitoo natzemange petuga.
41005002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooekase, sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oo tapoegea. Esoo nana ka tupe tawaga-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo mu tuꞌipu nakoo-kwi. Ewasoo oo mi-no oo kowpa natzakunediꞌyakwe. Nonotsa yise soo nana oo mesoo tzahanekwunihooyakwe. Gadooꞌoo haga natzooedu oo wutama-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41005005	Soo nana nonotsa tabeno, tooetoo togano, tooe hano tooe oona manennumme mu tuꞌipu natuoona-kwi, tooetoo giba-nagakwi waꞌagenumme, puusoo ka tupe-ma natzebokana.
41005006	Oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-baa tanomanepetuoo.
41005007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U tsoapa mana-gaꞌyoo tsebooegea.” Soo tsoapa yise meeoo oo netamma, “How yise u nukadooe? Numme u sopedakwatoo. U Jesus, Numu Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa. Gi numme makadooꞌookupana.”
41005009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u naneꞌa?” Soo tsoapa oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Ka ewaꞌyoona numme, numme ewa nananeꞌa.”
41005010	Umu tsoapa ewana meeoo oo netamma, “Gi ne tayapana ekow teepu-koobakoo.”
41005011	Ewaꞌyoo mu hogu ka giba-kumaba tuka konnomoꞌo.
41005012	Umu tsoapa yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa mu hogu-nagatoo ne taya.”
41005013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Muusoo tooꞌe.” Mu tsoapa yise ka mu hogu-naga mani. Mu hogu ka banunadu-kwi badatuꞌihoo.
41005014	Mu naana yaatu, mu hogu mabetseadu ka mu hogu badatuꞌihoose, mu naana nanaꞌemota tatanomane, ka mu numu yise tuukweꞌe. Umu noꞌyoona kemmase oo poonne. Pudusoo yise ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa mani petu. Soo nana soonamme-kwitu besa manese, oosoo yise onow katu, tu hekwi namasooana.
41005017	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoosuina yise oo tayakwunaꞌe.
41005018	Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka sake-wi tsebooedyakwe, soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu u-no meakwu.”
41005019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka nana netamma, “U sakwa gi nu-no meapana, u sakwa u nanumu-witoo kodyu. Te Naa besa ume tumadukugana mu tuukwe.”
41005020	Soo nana yise kodyuka, ka teepu Sumumano (10) mee naneadu-kwitoo. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo nakadu besa nakasokwama.
41005021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunadu mana-kwi nummese, ewaꞌyoo numu oo-baa manegaꞌa.
41005022	Oosoo nana mu nanesootuhidu nematugudu, Jairus mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petuse
41005023	mee oo netamma, “E padu unu tuoeyaꞌe. U sakwa yabe kemmase, oo-kooba pooha matuguse, oosoo sakwa besa manese, besa nuumma.”
41005024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-no mea. Ewaꞌyoo numu umu-no oo takooꞌnegeaꞌa.
41005025	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌedu sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petuga.
41005026	Mu poopooha-gaꞌyoo gi besa oo mayugwe. Oosoo yise noꞌoko tu hemma tzasooꞌa petuga. Nahanobasoo manemena, yise hanobasoo manepetuga.
41005027	Oosoo yise ooka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase, oo ooonakwana oo kwasu tzamow, mee toosoohanena,
41005028	“Nu sakwa oo kwasu sukwe tzamase, besa mane.”
41005029	Ka oo tzamase, soo oo puuhana yise pasahoo. Oo tookoo yise noꞌyoona besa nuumma, ka besa manese.
41005030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yabesoo tu pooha-matu yaahoose, oo sopedakwatoose umu-tamme nakwumunase, yise meeoo unne, “Haga e tzamow?”
41005031	Umu oo nakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Ewaꞌyoo numu u takooꞌnapunne. U yise meeoo, ‘Haga e tzamow?’ “ mee.
41005032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yaatu poohnamooꞌase, oo poonne ka oo manedu.
41005033	Oosoo mogoꞌne yise suꞌise kwebebewunu. Ka tu manena sopedakwatoose, oꞌno yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmase oo nanekwahakute.
41005034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna besa manese, saaꞌa mea.”
41005035	Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu, oona ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona kemmadu meeoo tuukweꞌe, “U padu yaꞌeoo, gi ka Jesus u nobe-witoo bipana. Nagutza saaꞌasoo.”
41005036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakase ka Jairus mee netamma, “Gi suꞌipana. E nakabetsea.”
41005037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jairus-no oo nobe-witoo memeakwate. Peter, James, John suuꞌmu umu-no ka Jairus nobe-witoo meaꞌa, meeoo susumudu nakatzimodu mu netamma, “Gi kemmapana numme-no.”
41005038	Ka oonow mu petugase mu numu ewaꞌyoona sakwaꞌe.
41005039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nobe-wi egease, meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwipana. Esoo tseaꞌa gi yaꞌe, sukwe uꞌwe.”
41005040	Umu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise puuwanatoo mu taya. Ka tseaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu-no ka umu punotu bina ka tseaꞌa habe-kwitoo meaꞌa.
41005041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseaꞌa-matoo takwuese, oo mi-ma tzakaduse, meeoo oo netamma, “Yotseoo.”
41005042	Soo tseaꞌa wahamatsebooekute (12) tomopu, yise tuponnese, yabesoo yotseoose, wununnumme. Mu numu otu oo poonnedu hayoo sapa sokwamahoo.
41005043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tseaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu meeoo netamma, “Hemma manatu a maka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunetammakute, “Gi haka tuukwepana kayoo e tumadukuse.”
41006001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tu nakatzimodu-nosoo ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona tu nanumu-witoosoo kodyu petuga.
41006002	Ka nanesootuhi tabeba oo manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga, ka mu numu besasoo Te Naa-witu tuukweꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo numu oe oo nakapunne, meeoo nananetamma, “Soo Jesus besa yadooa, pana oosoo tamme-nagatusoo. Haꞌoo yise esoo Jesus ka ekow yooonnekoo nageapu, Te Naa-witu tu sopedakwadoona?
41006003	Esoo nana uga nobe-doodu yise yaa menoꞌo unu tu pooha-gana te tzapoonnekute. Tamme oo sopedakwadoo, oosoo Mary tooa. Mu James, Joseph, Judas, Simon yise oo wangaꞌamu. Yise oo punneꞌemu yow tamme-naga.” Yise umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.
41006004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu ka Te Naa yadooawabe nakaꞌoedyukudu, yise umu oogowsoo nanumu, oo nonopuaꞌamu-no gi.”
41006005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu susumudu numu tuoegoedu-ma matuoona yise mu mabesaku. Huutseꞌyoo numu namabesaku, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
41006006	Te Pabeꞌe tutuha tu nanumu soobedya ka mu tooꞌe tuukwese sapa, gi pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona tzatzageꞌe-kwisoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooennumme.
41006007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu wahamatsebooekudu (12) tu nakatzimodu bise, meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu pooha-makakwu, puma tsoapa mu nematzagakwunikwuna. Wakwahaꞌyoona saaꞌa gi hemma hemapana memea.
41006008	Gi nadukadu tunopana, gi magoꞌo, gi puma hemma mu tumukwuna tuwazoo hemapana.
41006009	Gi waahoo kwasu hemapana. Sumu-kwisoo tanegeana tuwow.
41006010	Ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobe-wi egease, ooweoo umu-baa tooi, gi oonatooe tooinnummepana.
41006011	Yise ka mu numu gi mumme nakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu nobe-wi egeapana. Ka kooseba mu moko-matu tataꞌnese, oeꞌyoona saaꞌa memea. Mu numu tzapoonneku how sutaꞌyoo tookwa umuoo numu.”
41006012	Mu tunakatzimodu yise meaꞌase, meeoo mu numu tuukwe meꞌa, “Gi suda manepana.”
41006013	Yise ewow tsoapa nematzagakwunimena. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu tuoegoedu yoohoo, namagunana besa manakwe.
41006014	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nesoobedya. Susumudu numu meeoo, “Masoo sumuna soo John numu baa-wi matzakadu, tuusootabuese, unu poohadooa.” Susumudu numu meeoo oosoo ka sumuna Elijah. Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Oosoo Jesus ka sumuna Te Naa-witu wahadu.” Mu numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase, yise meeoo, “Nu tukwutumadu ka John batsa tuungu. Oosoo yise sumuna tuusootabuepu?”
41006017	Ka oꞌnosoo, soo Herod tu pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoo, soo mogoꞌne Herodias mee naneꞌa.
41006018	Soo John ka Herod meeoo netammanoꞌo, “Gi toge u manakwe, gi ka Herodias nodukwadoopana.”
41006019	Soo Herodias unu sutana ka Herod ka John tooꞌe batsa tuungu.
41006020	Soo Herod yise ka John tu batsakwu-ma unu suaꞌe, ka John nanesootuhidu nana. Mu tukwutumadu ka John wutumow. Soo Herod besa ka John nakasoobedya pana oo yadooa-ma nakasuaꞌe.
41006021	Yise geaꞌa soo Herod tu nadooaꞌadoonoꞌo tabeno mu numu papabeꞌemu-no ewa tuka.
41006022	Herodias padu tukawunuse yise mu numu nugakute. Noꞌyoona yise oo nugana besa soobedya. Soo Herod mee oo netamma, “Hemma u? Tooe hemmadooe u soogwina nu u geaꞌakwu.”
41006024	Soo tsuadumu tu pea tubenga,
41006025	“Hemma sakwa yise nu natuungu?” Yise soo oo pea meeoo oo netamma, “Ka John koota tsekowse, ka oo wo hanese, yise tseda-wi oo wuuna.”
41006026	Soo Herod oo nesootuꞌadyaꞌe ka oo batsa tuunguse, ewa mu numu oo unnena naka.
41006027	Herod yise ka mu tukwutumadu ka John koota tsekeaꞌa tuungu,
41006028	ka oo wo tseda-wi oo wuunase, ka Herodias yise yongagea.
41006029	Mu John nakatzimodu oo nakase yise oo tookoo tugudooa.
41006030	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-baatoosoo kodyuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka tu manemopu-witu oo tuukwe.
41006031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa gi haaꞌno songapangapunne.” Ewaꞌyoo numu pooha namagunana meagonno, gi tu tuka-ma sokwamana manegonno.
41006032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tu nakatzimodu-no ka sake-wi, gi numu pumme poonne-kwitoo meaꞌa.
41006033	Mu numu mu meaꞌase, mu poonne. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu mu posoopedakwadoona oo nanatuukwe ka baa-kumi mu mea tu noꞌata-kwiꞌyoona umu yise oo-baa sogo tatanomanepetuga.
41006034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sake-wiꞌyoona wue petuga ka baa-kumabatoo, ewaꞌyoo mu numu o, pukwi oo petuga-kwi. Mu numu sukwe mukwadu-kwaꞌne mu posoobedyana, mu sootuhina yise mu tunedyooꞌe.
41006035	Yabesoo yise taba egagaꞌa,
41006036	mu tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa mu taꞌya ka kwayaꞌyoona mu kemmaꞌase. Umu sakwa puusoo tu tukakwuna hownnekoo mayu.”
41006037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Hemma sakwa tamme mu maka?” Mu tunakatzimodu yise meeoo, “Numme haaꞌa ka tukapu tumukwu? Ewaꞌyoo numu yaatu. Hanoko sakwa yise numme ka tukapu mu mayuku?”
41006038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Huuhoo mu tukaba-gaꞌyoo? Mu sakwa oo poonnetooa.” Ka saaꞌa umu tunakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Manegeoo numme tukaba-gaꞌyoo. Yise waahoo tuwazoo numme pakwe-gaꞌyoo.”
41006039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka mu tunakatzimodu, “Maa poohega-kooba sapa mu numu aata tuungu. Yoodeꞌa, mu sakwa mu toonooba-wisoo aata.”
41006041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu aatahoose, ka tukaba, noko pakwe hemahoose, toogoopadu poonnese, nanesootuhikooha. Yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase, umu pumme nakatzimodu, mu ewow numu maka tuungu.
41006042	Yise ewow numu maka (5000 nanana). Ka nanesootuhina ka tukaba noko pakwe togeꞌyookwunu ka mu numudoo negwaꞌe, umu yise ewa tukase, noꞌyoona wutzuꞌme. Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise ooka pakwe, noko tukaba nagupenina ka wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawono, oo-ma kaanoku.
41006045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa ka sake-wi kodyu, ka banunadu natzemangegase, yise ooka Bethsaida mee naneadu-kwitoo kodyuka. Mu numu ewana yise nu tayakwu.”
41006046	Yise ka mu meaꞌase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka giba-matoo mea, ka nanesootuhikwuse.
41006047	Ka yongona, ka sake-wi ka banunadu banaamoo-kwitoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko mu poonne. How gi besa natzemange, ka kwenahadu unu hukwawunu. Oꞌno awamooasoo tu tabuꞌagena, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka banunudu-koobakwi kemmakaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu moopa tooꞌe meahoo.
41006049	Mu tunakatzimodu oo poonnese unu suise, yise waꞌagemoꞌo, “Uda tsoapa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu yadooe, “Gi suipana. Nu yaahoo.”
41006051	Ka sake-wi umu-baa tsebooese, yise soo hukwapa kadoo manigeaꞌa. Umu oo nakatzimodu gi geaꞌa oo pooha manena nakasopedakwadoona ka manegeoo tukaba nagoohanena, waahoo pakwe tuwow. Ka ewow numu oo makana poonne pana gi oo sooꞌoedyukute.
41006053	Ka Gennesaret mee naneadu-kwi umu natzemange petuse, tu sake o tzakuna,
41006054	oeꞌyoona yise sawe. Mu numu ewana nosumuna ka oo nesopedakwatoona
41006055	oo nanatuukwe. Umu nanatuukwewunudu, mu tuoegoedu, mu nuummadu oo-baa bi petudyakwe. Susumudu oo-baa natzahedape petu.
41006056	Umu yise Te Pabeꞌe kwasu-matu tzamase, noꞌyoona besa mane.
41007001	Mu Jew numu nananesootuhipe papabeꞌe numu tunedyooedu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu kemmana, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa.
41007002	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu poonne, umu gisoo mabatzagapana tukagonno.
41007003	Umu Jew-no Pharisee tumayohope-wi umu gi tuka ka gisoo mabatzagana ka tu nanamooatupu tumayohope.
41007004	Umu ka hano mose tu tootsa mabatzakwunaꞌe. Tu tseda, pukwikoo tu saakwuna, batzakase oekoo saakwu. Ne nanamooatupu mee ne tunetammakuna, numme yise oo mayoho.
41007005	Umu Jew tuukwewabe, mu Pharisee-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Mu u nakatzimodu sagwane maꞌemukwapu-gaꞌyoo, gi tu mi mabatzakapana tuka. Umu te nanamooatupu ka tu nanumu meeoo netamma namabatzakase yise tuka.”
41007006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “How yise mu ka te nanamooatu besa nakana, gi Te Naa tuukwewabe naka? Soo Isaiah, ka mumme nemooagadu-witu meeoo unnepu. ‘Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa mee mu naneyakwe.’ Soo oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe togesapa mu netamma ka mee tubotuguna. ‘Umu numu meeoo unnepana mu tupa apeakana, gi mu tubetse sokwamana. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseꞌa.
41007007	Umu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe mee sukwe naneyugwepana, ka mu numu aata-tammesoo neꞌemukwakute, ka pummesoo tusooyugwena mu numu ewana mee netamma, “E nakapunne pummesoo tumayohope tumayoho oꞌno mu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa.” ’
41007008	Umu meeꞌe mu nanamooatu mu Te Naa unnepu-waꞌnesoo.”
41007009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi umu te nanamooatupu tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukupana. Mu sakwa Te Naa suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.
41007010	Ka mooasoo soo Moses meeoo unnepu, ‘Te Naa noko ka numu tu naanapuaꞌamu mabetsea tuungu. Soo tu naanapuaꞌamu suda netammadu sakwa nabatsa.’
41007011	Mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohona pana mu meeoo, tamme sumuna ka mu naanapuaꞌamu mee netammakwu, ‘Nu ka Te Naa God tummatzi, gi umu e naanapuaꞌamu tummatzaꞌe.’ Mu gi besa ka mu naanapuaꞌamu matugu, ka oo tumatuguna. Mu ka Te Naa tunetammana takopa, ka mu te nanamooatupu tumayohope ooosapa nagena.
41007013	Ewaꞌyoosoo te nanamooatupu unnepu mu numu ka gi besow tunedyooe, tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tuukwena suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
41007014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu ewa-kwikoo mu numu netamma.
41007015	“Mu sakwa e nakasopedakwatoo, soo hemma mu tukana gi hownneꞌyoo, Te Naa-nakwana. Soo suda te tumatuguna yise gi besa te soonammena yugwe, umuoo soo Te Naa gi petzape,” mee.
41007017	Ka nobe-wiꞌyoona mu tunakatzimodu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka mu numu tuukwepu?” mee.
41007018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Mu sakwa oꞌnosoo e nakasopedakwatoo. Soo tooe hemma tooe te tukana gi hownneꞌyoo Te Naa-nakwana. Soo tukapu gi atasoo numu yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tukapu numu-nagakwi sukwe meadu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te tzapoonnekute tooe hownneꞌyoo numu tukapu besaꞌyoo.
41007020	“Ka suda te tumatuguna soo Te Naa gi petzape.
41007021	Noꞌobatusoo suda te tusooyugwena, tuduhana, tubatsana,
41007022	moogoobuna, numu mooagana, numu nowuakuna. Kummaꞌakusoo nasoodyagena, numu nesootzemana, besa nasooyugwena,
41007023	ooonnekoo soo Te Naa gi petzape.”
41007024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona tubewa-wi, Tyre mee naneadu-kumaba, ka nobe-wi watze petuga, gi haga oo sopedakwatoo. Mu numu puusoo yise oo mayuoo.
41007025	Yise sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne oo-baa petu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakase ka tu padu tsoapayaꞌe ooka oo nematzagakwuni tuunguna.
41007027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo nemapoonnena mee oo netamma, “Gi nu wawaꞌa sootummatzaꞌe. Nuga nanumu suuꞌmu sakwa nu tummatzi. Numme Jew mu wakwawaꞌa saduꞌu mee neꞌa. ꞌYoo manepunne mu numu puu gi tu dooamu tukakwuna tu saduꞌu maka.”
41007028	Soo wawaꞌa mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “Mu te dooamu puu tu tugupenina saduꞌu maka. U sakwa nuga padu mabesaku u nanumu too,” mee.
41007029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Aha, besaꞌyoo u ka meeoo unnena, nu u tummatzikwu. U nobe-witoo kodyuka ka tsoapa nu mooasoo nematzagakwunipu.”
41007030	Soo mogoꞌne ka kodyu petugase, ka tu padu besa manepu, ka tu kapa-kooba oo habennumme oo mayuoo petuga.
41007031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Tyre mee naneadu-nakwana kodyuna ka Galilee banunadu-witoo mea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Sidon mee naneadu-toogoo meꞌa. Ka teepu Sumumanoꞌo Nogatudu mee naneadu.
41007032	Onona mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa sumuoo nana bi petu. Oosoo nana gi nakatawagadu, gi besa yadooadu tuwazoo. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa namekoosoo u mi-makooba matuoonase, eka nana mabesaku.”
41007033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana bihooka mu numu ewanagakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu makoogoo ka nana naka-wi tsetuoonahoo. Ka tu makoogoo tu huutse-ma mobanase, ka nana ego-kooba tsetugu.
41007034	Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopadu poonne. Nasongapose ka nana gi nakatawagadu meeoo netamma, “Yise nakatawaga.”
41007035	Soo nana nakatawaga manese, besa yadooa mani.
41007036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “Gi sakwa mu haka tuukwepana,” pana mu numu gi oo nakabetseana oo nanatuukweꞌe.
41007037	Umu meeoo, “Uune! Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu tumadaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu gi nakatawagadu nakadage maꞌeyakwe, mu gi apegeadu besa apegea maneyakwe.”
41008001	Mu numu ewana sumuna tusooase, gi hemma tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tu nakatzimodu netamma,
41008002	“Nu suda umu numu nuummakute, ka pahe tabeno gi hemma mu tuka, umu tseagoꞌe.
41008003	Nu ka nobe-witoo mu tayase, umu sumuna tsuawumehoekwu, umu-matu ka kwingaꞌa kemmase.”
41008004	Umu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka tubetse numu-wanaꞌyoona hownnekoo tamme ka nadukatu umutoo mayukwu?”
41008005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Haaꞌnoko mu tukaba-gaꞌyoo?” Mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo, “Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tukaba.”
41008006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ma teepuna sapa aatapunne.” Oꞌno yise ka tukaba hanese, oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzabokase, mu tu nakatzimodu mu numu ooka haneku tuungu, umu yise ka tukaba mu numu ewana haneku.
41008007	Umu yise tuwazoo huutsekoo tutugutzekoo pakwe-gaꞌyoo; ka pakwe tuwazoo nanesootuhikuse mu tu nakatzimodu mu numu haneku tuungu.
41008008	Mu numu yise ka tukase wutzumeoose, ka tunakatzimodu natakwatsukwuoo (7) kawona-witoo ooka a nagupenina tzoba.
41008009	Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (4000) numu o.
41008010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu nobe-witoo taya. Yabesoo yise ka tu sake-wi mu tu nakatzimodu-no kuowse onona ka teepu Delmanutha mee naneadu-kwitoo meaꞌa.
41008011	Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo nesootzemana mee oo netamma, “U sakwa mee tzapoonneku ka Te Naa Pooha-matu u hee-gana.”
41008012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nasoomenakwana, mee ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu netamma, “Mooasoo nu mu tzapoonnekuse sapa, mu gi oo sooꞌoedyukute. Nu gi mu tzapoonnekukwu, ka e pooha-gana.”
41008013	Oosoo yise ka mu tunakatzimodu-no, ka mu Pharisee-baaꞌyoona meaꞌase ka sake-wi tzoonooase ka baa natzemangeka.
41008014	Umu oo nakatzimodu ka baa natsemanegase ka tu tukuba soomuꞌwaka. Sumuoosoo tukaba yise tunoꞌo ka sake-wi.
41008015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma “Ka mu numu yadooedu namayuadu tukaba gi soogwipana.”
41008016	Umu oo nakatzimodu yise gi oo nakasopedakwadoona yise meeoo nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe te nesootzeꞌma ka tukaba te soomuꞌwakuse.”
41008017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakasopedakwadoose meeoo mu netamma, “Gi suipana ka gi tukuba-gana. Mu gisoo e pooha nakasopedakwatoo.
41008019	Mu ka sumuna oo soomaꞌyu nu manegeoo tukaba-koobatoo nanesootuhi, oo ewakwuna soogwina. Nu yise ewow numu (5000) maka. Huoo kawona-witu ooka a nagupenina umu numu tzobahoo?” mee. Sumuꞌyoo mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona-witu,” mee.
41008020	“Nu yise tuwow ewowsoo (4000) numu maka, natakwatsukwuoo (7) tukaba-gana, mu yise ewowsoo tuwazoo hane, ka a nagupenina. Huoo kawona-witu ooka a nagupenina umu numu (5000) tzobahoo?” Sumuꞌyoo mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, natakwatsukwuoo (7) kawona-witoo mee.
41008021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Mu gi e nakasopedakwatoo, mu tuwazoo gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.”
41008022	Umu yise ka Bethsaida-wisoo kodyu petu. Susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo gi tubootabuedu tsaka petu. Umu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa eka nana, gi tubootabuedu-ma matuguse a mabesaku.”
41008023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo tsakakase oo pooe-witoo tooheoo. Yise o-kooba matuoonase, meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa tooe besa tuboohaꞌe menoꞌo?”
41008024	Soo gi tubootabuedu mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu menoꞌo yaatu poonnepana, ka mu numu-ma sogomeadu, sunngabe-kwaꞌne posoobedya.”
41008025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo pooe-kooba matuoonasoo, soo gi tubootabuedu besa manise besa tuboohwaꞌe.
41008026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa kaaheno nobe-witoo mea, gi numu tuukwepana.”
41008027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tunakatzimodu-no ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona meaꞌa, ka Caesarea Philippi mee naneadu-kwitoo. Onow po-kumi sogo meana meeoo mu tubenga, “Hayoo mu nu-witu naka?”
41008028	Umu oo nekwegea, “Susumudu numu meeoo u ka sumuna John baa-wi numu matzakudu. Susumudu numu meeoo u ka sumuna Elijah. Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo u ka sumuna Te Naa-witu wahadu.”
41008029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga, “Hayoo mu nu-witu sooyugwe?” Soo Peter oo nekwegea, “U Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe,” mee.
41008030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi e wahapana, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe.”
41008031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tunakatzimodu tuukwe, “Mu numu yadooakudu gi e petzape, unu nananuumadu e wumakuse, e batsase, oꞌno yise pahe tooise saaꞌa nu tuusootabooedooa.”
41008032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe toge kaaheno meeoo unakwe. Umu oo nakase soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu meeoo watze tunesoobedyakute, “Gi soo hee oo manepunne. Gi umu u batsa.”
41008033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tunakatzimodu-matoo kodyuse meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Gi meeoo unnepana. Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo u neꞌemukwawunu. U sukwe numu soonamme-kwaꞌne tusooyugwe, gi ka Te Naa soonamme-kwaꞌne.”
41008034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu numu, ka umu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu ka nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu e nagenokwu.
41008035	Tamme ka tammesoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu, mu ka nu-koobatoo kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwena mu namagwetzoikwu.
41008036	Tamme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo pana ka te yaꞌese oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41008037	Gi oosoo te gwetzoina tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41008038	Tooe haga tooe nu-ma nasookwina, noko e unnepu tuwazoo, nu yise punnoꞌo, saaꞌa mu-ma nasookwikwu, ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e petuse, ka toogoopadu e tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo-no.”
41009001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwepu susumudu mu yaa konnodu gisoo tuina, e pooha-gana poonnekwu.”
41009002	Oona ka sumuna sumu natakwatsu (7) tooise oosoo Te Pabeꞌe tu pupuaꞌamu bikase, oona ka paꞌa giba-maꞌyoona nanesootuhi-ga.
41009003	Ka togesoo oo nanesootuhiwunu soo pukwi oo namasooana atasoo tapuꞌa, besa toha patakwetseaawunu.
41009004	Oꞌno yise wahaꞌyoo nanana oo-baa petuoo, Elijah-no Moses meeꞌe nananeadu umu nanano yise yadooꞌa.
41009005	Soo Peter yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Besa numme ka kemmaꞌase. Numme sakwa piho mu tatza nobe-tooku. Oꞌno mu ka Elijah noko Moses-no susuꞌmuoo,”
41009006	mee unne, ka gi tu unnena sopedakwadoona ka unu suise.
41009007	Togesoo oo yadooawunu soo koomeba umu-kooba habaga petuoo. Te Naa yise ka koomeba-nagaꞌyoona yadooakooha. “Yow esoo nuga Besaa Tooa, mu sakwa besa a nakabetsea.”
41009008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise umu-baasoo. Mu Elijah-no Moses kadooꞌoo.
41009009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nakatzimodu-no ka giba-maꞌyoona sawekese meeoo mu netamma, “Gisoo haka tuukwepana, ka mu poonnena. Ka kadoo e manese yise e yotsese, oꞌno suuꞌmu saaꞌa mu numu tuukwe.”
41009010	Mu oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase gi oo waha, pana yise meeoo nanatuubenga, “Haꞌoo manena meeoo unakwe? Te Pabeꞌe haaꞌa yaꞌese yise pudu yotsekwu?”
41009011	Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo unakwe, Elijah mooe petukoo, o haaꞌa togesapa numme natuukweꞌe? Oꞌno yise haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu nakwi saaꞌa petudooa?”
41009012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Aha, meeoo tubetse nabotugu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Elijah ka mu numu mooe tunesootabue petukwu. Nu yise oo-penakwa petuhoose suda punnoꞌo namatugukoo.
41009013	Mooasoo soo Elijah mooe kemmapu. Umu numu yise tooe how tooe ka Elijah yugwe, ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo.”
41009014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka mu tunakatzimodu-baasoo kodyu petu. Mu numu ewana ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese besa sokwamase oo-tamme tatanomanega. Mu nananesootuhidu tuukwewabe, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no mooasoo mu nanepetukute oe petuoo.
41009016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “How manena umu nananepetukute?”
41009017	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu e tooaꞌa u-baa tooꞌe hane petu u kadooꞌookoosoo. Oosoo tsoapayaena gi besa yadooꞌa.
41009018	Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe, soo tsoapa oo-ma tabuꞌana soo e tooa yaꞌeookayakwe. Nu umu ume nakatzimodu, ooka tooꞌe nematzagakwuni tuungu. Umu gi oo mabuꞌa.”
41009019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakabetseꞌa, tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-paꞌyoopana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka naatse tzakowke.”
41009020	Soo naatse ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese yaꞌehooka.
41009021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Haaꞌno wunaꞌme soo naatse ꞌyoo manenumme?” Mee soo oo naa, “Tuhaꞌa manakwanasoo.
41009022	Susumudu soo tsoapa ka naatse tooꞌe soobatsana goso-witoo oo wunapuyakwe, baa-witoo tuwazoo. U pooha haaꞌa ne sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo? Ne mesoo tummatzaꞌe haaꞌa?”
41009023	Soo Jesus yise oo nanekwegea, “U deaꞌa mooasoo e pooha-gana sopedakwatoo. Nuka u toge soobedyase, oꞌno nu u tummatzikwu.”
41009024	Soo nana meeoo, “Sagwane nu u nakaꞌoedyukute, pana unusoo ume e nakaꞌoedyukuna nu sookwaꞌe.”
41009025	Gisoo mu numu ewana petu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa kwingaꞌatoo nematzagakwunise mee oo netamma, “Yaanona mea. Gi kodyupana ka naatse-matoo.”
41009026	Soo naatse paba yadooase, yaꞌeooka. Mu numu yise meꞌe, “Yaꞌehoo haaꞌa?”
41009027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe o mi-makoo oo tzadyota. Soo naatse besa manise yotseoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tu nakatzimodu-no, ka mu numu-baaꞌyoona meaꞌa.
41009028	Ka nobe-kwi mu tzoonooase, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo tubenga, “How manena numme gi oo nemabuꞌa?”
41009029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Oosoo yooonneꞌyoo tsoapayaedu nanesootuhibu-ma nataꞌyadu.”
41009030	Galilee-too umu watze mease
41009031	soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu tunakatzimodu tuukwegaꞌase meeoo mu netamma, “Mu nuka wohonedu nu-ma tzakaduse, e batsase, saaꞌa nu pahe tabemease tuusootabuedooa.”
41009032	Umu oo unnepu gi nakasopedakwatoo, pana umu ooka tu tubengakwuna-ma suaꞌe.
41009033	Ka mu tunakatzimodu ka Capernaum-wi petugase, ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu tubenga, “Hekwitu mu nehane mu ka kemmana?”
41009034	Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, ka numu ooonakwa besa-kwitu nehanena, “Soo tooe haga umu-nagatu ka mu ooonakwa besaꞌyoona oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoo mooe meakoo.”
41009035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu tunakatzimodu nabatoo bise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe numu-kobena soo nadatsungadu, sakwa noꞌoko numu sumu-nakwiꞌyoona numu tummatzino.”
41009036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo umu-baatoo bise, meeoo mu netamma,
41009037	“Mu ka tuutsekoo tuhaꞌakoo nu-koobatoo besa soobedyana, mu tookwa nuka besa sobedya tuwazoo.”
41009038	Soo John ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Ka nana ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidu, numme poonne. Tooe oosoo nana gi numme ume nakatzimodu-matu pana u nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwuni. Numme yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunipana,’ “ mee.
41009039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa uga gi meeoo oo netammapana. Oosoo ka e nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunikwuse oosoo tookwa gi e nekwohonekwu.
41009040	Oosoo besa e tummatzaꞌe.
41009041	Tooe haga tooe ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe umu nuka tummatzidu bamagase sapa nu mu sukwe sootuhi meakwu.”
41009042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Gi besa soo tooe haga tooe ka nuga dooamu ka gi togekoo podo mu tunedyooena. Nu sakwa puu sukwe badyaꞌe, gi yise ka gi togekoo mu Te Naa dooamu tunedyooe.
41009043	Nu sakwa e mi sukwe tsekaꞌa, gi ka suda namanedu mahane. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo mi-geana Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo mi-geana, ka niwunu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa e kuku sukwe tsekaꞌagwuuni, gi ka gi togekoo podo mea. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo kuku-gana ka Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo kuku-gana ka niwunu-kwitoo wue. Nu sakwa tuwow e pooe sukwe tsepata, gi ka gi togekoo poonnena. Besaꞌyoo tooe ka sumuoosoo pooegeana ka Te Naa-baa petugase, gi waahoo pooegeana niwunu-kwitoo wue, owetuoo ooosapa nidabedu gi nimakwudu. Mu woꞌabe yise ooosapa mu tookoo sooꞌadape.
41009049	Noꞌyoona oowetuoo numu oo wumadooa.
41009050	Ongabe puu ka tukapu besa makamakute, ka gi onga-gana gi hee besa kamma. Mu sakwa ongabe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa besa nanapuaꞌana, besa sokwamamo.”
41010001	Oꞌno yise ka tubewa, Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona, soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu tunedyooeꞌe. Ka hooodu, Jordan mee naneadu baa mangega.
41010002	Ewaꞌyoo tunesootzemadu numu, Pharisee mee nananeadu oo-baa petuse, meeoo oo tubenga, “Besaꞌyoo haaꞌa soo numu ka nanodukwadoose, yise napoonnekwunina?”
41010003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Haꞌyoo soo Moses ka moooꞌasoo te tuukwe?”
41010004	Umu mee oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Ka moooꞌasoo soo Moses mee tuboꞌo, tamme ka napoonnekwunina sakwa tubope-ma napoonnekwuni.”
41010005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Te Naa gi meeoo te netamma. Pana mu gi Te Naa nakabetseana soo Moses yise ekow mu tuukwe.
41010006	Oꞌnosoo, soo Te Naa ka numu pudu manumudoose meeoo, ‘Nu ka nana noko mogoꞌne manumudoopu.
41010007	Umu yise nanodukwadoose, soo nana tu naanapuaꞌa-baaꞌyoona nomea. Tu nodukwa-no yise nobe-gaꞌyoo.
41010008	Umu yise sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi waahoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
41010009	Soo Te Naa meeꞌe te netamma, ‘Ka nodukwadoose gi napoonnekwunipana.’ “
41010010	Ka nobe-kwi petugase, mu oo nakatzimodu ka a napoonnekwunipu-witu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga.
41010011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu nanodukwa sakwa mesoo napoonnekwunipana, ka kummaꞌakoosoo nodukwadoose maꞌemukwa.”
41010013	Mu numu yise tu doodooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa hane petudyakwe, umu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna. Mu tunakatzimodu ka mu numu poonnena mu nesagwikute ka oo mu manakwe.
41010014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu poonnena meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu numu tu dooamu hane petudu tayapana, gi mu nesagwikupana. Nu mu dooake sootuhise, umu yise ka Te Naa-baatoo meakwu.”
41010015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, mu mooeꞌugasoo, nanekwahakwu, tutugutsekoo dooake-waꞌneꞌyookwu gi maꞌemukwadu. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.”
41010016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu doodooake tzahedana, mu nanesootuhikuna, mu sootuhise umu-baaꞌyoona mea.
41010017	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa tanomane petugase oo-kobena meatzedose ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana, haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?” mee.
41010018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U haaꞌa mee e netamma, u besaꞌyoo? Gi haga besaꞌyoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.
41010019	U oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu; gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu mane-witu, besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena.”
41010020	Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu tuhaꞌyoona meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetseakena.”
41010021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, ka ooka besa soobedyana mee oo netamma, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse, ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise nuka nakatzinnummekwu.”
41010022	Soo nana ka oo nakase suda soonamme ka ewow hee-gana.
41010023	Ka nana mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu meeoo tuukwe, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu unusoo manena namagwetzoikwu.”
41010024	Mu tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase punnoꞌo meeoo tutubenga, “Hownnekoo soo numu yise mesoo namagwetzoaꞌe?” Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Soo numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
41010026	Mu tunakatzimodu mee oo netamma, “Kadooꞌoo haga numu magwetzoi-waꞌne tabuꞌa.”
41010027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Aha. Te Naa suuꞌmu numu magwetzoidu.”
41010028	Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mooasoo numme noꞌoko ne hemma matusookwunikese, nanesootuhi mane.”
41010029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu, noꞌoko hemma tu hee-gana, tu dooamu, tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu, menoꞌo manekwana. Mu nasootuhikwuna gi moobegwagakwu.
41010031	Umu yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo numu moohedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi hee manepunnekwu. Umu menoꞌo gi mamaawaꞌneꞌyoo, yaaꞌa teepu-kooba manepunnedu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona numu moohedooa.”
41010032	Soo Jesus yise ka Jerusalem-witoo mea. Mu oo nakatzimodu mu numu-no nakasuipana oo nageka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tunakatzimodu suuꞌmu watze tuukwe.
41010033	“Jerusalem-wi te petugase, mu numu-kobenatu yadooadu nu-ma tzakadukwu, yise umu wawaꞌa tibo-matoo e tzakakakwu, yise umu nuka batsa tuungukwu.
41010034	Umu tiboꞌo yise e kobitoo toohena, e wupagetana, yise e batsakwu. Pahe tabe mease nu yise saaꞌa tuusootabuedooa.”
41010035	Mu nawangaꞌa James-no John ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petu, yise meeoo oo netamma, “U haaꞌa sakwa ne tummatzi?”
41010036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu mu tummatzi? Hemma mu soogwina?”
41010037	Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U ka pudusoo numu-kobena katukwuse, how sakwa numme ka u-baa sapa aatana?”
41010038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Nu nabatsase, namayodase yise saaꞌa ka numu-kobena katudooa. Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo ooosoo?”
41010039	Mu wahaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo mesoo mane.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea mee, “Aha. Mu punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnekoosoo wumakwu nu-koobatoo nabatsase, saaꞌa namayodakwu.
41010040	Gi nu ka mu numu-kobena mu aata tuungu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mooasoo soo Te Naa oo nemamakwupuna mu oo sopedakwatoo.”
41010041	Noꞌyoona mu oo nakatzimodu mu nakase, ka James noko John unu sutakute.
41010042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi umu wakwawaꞌamu-kobena katudu-kwaꞌne paba nasooyugwepana. Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu tummatzimo. Nu ooonneꞌyoo, ka yaa petuse, nu noꞌoko ka mu numu tummatzaꞌe. Nu mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numu gwetzoidooa.”
41010046	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jericho mee naneadu-too meakwu. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu umu-no oo-toogoo meꞌa. Ooosapa po kumabu katudu, soo nana gi tubootabuedu, Bartimaeus mee naneadu, nonotsu mu numu pu-moopaa meadu meeoo netammakayakwe, “E tummatzi.”
41010047	Yise oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe kemmana nakase, meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa e sootuhi,” mee.
41010048	Umu numu ewana oo nesagwikute, “Gi unnepana,” mee oo netamma. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pabasoo yadooe, “U sakwa e sootuhi.”
41010049	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ka gi tubootabuedu, nu-baatoo bike.” Umu tunakatzimodu ka gi tubootabuedu nana mee netamma, “Besa nasooyugwese, yotse, soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa menoꞌo, u baꞌe, mee.”
41010050	Soo gi tubootabuedu nana yise tu nagaꞌapu mawunise yotsehoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo takwue.
41010051	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu u tummatzi?” Soo gi tubootabuedu meeoo, “Nu gi tubootabuena, enatu e poonnekwuna sookwaꞌe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma,
41010052	“Unudea, u ka e togesobedyase suuꞌmu, besa manekwu.” Oosoo gi tubootabuedu nana yise yaatu besa poonne manese, ka podo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuyohoka.
41011001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo meana, ka Bethphage, noko Bethany mee nananeadu naamootoo mease, ka giba Olive mee naneadu tzageꞌe petuga. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe waahoo umu pumme nakatzimodu-matu
41011002	meeoo netamma, “Ka Bethpage-witoo memeakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze natzakunadu mayukwu, gisoo pukooba nakatudu. Oo tzadopase punowsoo saaꞌa oo wetzakake.”
41011003	Ka mu numu mumme tubenga, “How mu manakwe?” mee saaꞌa mu nekwegea, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe yabesoo a soogwina saaꞌa yise punowsoo a makodyukudooa.”
41011004	Umu ka memease, ka tzagaze, ka nobe-kobena oo natzaku oo mayu petugase, oo tzadoopahoo.
41011005	Mu numu o konnodu mee mu tubenga, “How yise manena mu a tzadoopa?”
41011006	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena mu tuukwese, umu yise, “Muusoo tooꞌe,” mee mu netamma.
41011007	Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka tzagaze ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo tzakakase, wega oo-kooba hanese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wega-kooba katunoꞌo.
41011008	Ewaꞌyoo numu tu wega ka po-kooba wupatzeta, susumudu numu punnoꞌo sunngabe maꞌna hanese, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ooka podokute.
41011009	Ewaꞌyoo numu oo kumi meana ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhinoꞌo, besa sokwamana, papaba apegeana, “U yow, U Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe, noꞌoko numu magwetzoidu.
41011010	U numme-kooba katudu ka ne namooatupu David-waꞌneꞌyoo, numme besa sokwama soo Te Naa ka numme-matoo u tayase, soo Te Naa u tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa puusoo te magwetzoikwu.”
41011011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jerusalem-wi petugase, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meahoo, noꞌoko hemma oetu besa sootseꞌma, pana ka mooasoo unu yongona oo mane-gapu umu tunakatzimodu-no Bethany-witoo meaꞌa.
41011012	Ka ookow moooꞌa awamooa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu-no Bethany-wiꞌyoona meaꞌa. Oosoo ka meana, ka sunngabe Fig mee naneadu poonnese, oo-matoo mea, ka tzuayaꞌena. Ka tamano, ka sunngabe pooe naa-kwi oo manepetuse, gisoo oo pooetooꞌa oo mayu petu. Unu sunngabe naka-gaꞌyoo suuꞌmu.
41011014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe meeoo netamma, “Gi gea hannanoꞌo u pooetooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu oo nakatzimodu oo naka.
41011015	Umu Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme nakatzimodu-no ka Jerusalem-witoo meaꞌa, yise ka pabow nananesootuhi nobe tzageꞌe kodyu petuga. Mu weehoo-ma tumudu poonne. Tu hemma tsanabedona, tu seepu-ma tumugonno tuwazoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma pukooba mu tuoonana manapow, oo kadunoo tuwazoo, yise oekoo mu numu matzayubow.
41011016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka nobeꞌana gi ma-toogoo meapana. Esoo pukwiꞌyoona tu nananesootuhina.”
41011017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, ‘E nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhina.’ Menoꞌo mu yise nanatuduha miꞌyoona.”
41011018	Soo numu pabeꞌe, ka mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe manena sopedakwatoose, oo-ma nakasuaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, yise oo nebatsa, ka ewow numu ooka nakatogeꞌyookute.
41011019	Ka yongo-nakwa, soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no punowsoo kodyuka, ka Bethany-wi tooibodona.
41011020	Tu pudu taba tsebooegena, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no Jerusalem-witoo meaꞌa. Ka sunngabe mooasoo pasapu oo poonne.
41011021	Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena soomayuna mee oo netamma, “U ka etzeꞌe ka sunngabe pasa tuungu, oosoo yise menoꞌo pasapu,” meeꞌe.
41011022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Aha. Mu ekow soomaꞌyu. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuse nanesootuhi. U ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, u ka giba ka banunadu-naamookwitoo nooyooa tuunguse, oosoo oo-toogoo manikwu.
41011025	Ka nanesootuhi manese, mu sakwa ka mumme suda tumatugukudu soomuꞌwase. Oꞌno Te Naa yise punnoꞌo ka suda mu tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu.”
41011027	Ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyuse soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobenakwi soo Te Pabeꞌe nanapedo meowbodote. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse
41011028	mee oo tubenga, “Haga pooha tunetamma-toohakwi u yoo manakwe?”
41011029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka John-witu mu mooe tuukwekwu. Mu ka kaaheno e nanekwegease oꞌno yise saaꞌa nu punnoꞌo haga pooha-toohakwi ꞌyoo nu e manena mu tuukwekwu.
41011030	Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka, soo Te Naa God, pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?”
41011031	Mu tutunehanedu yise puusoo nanano apegeagonnose, mee unakwe, “Tamme ka meeꞌe unnese soo Te Naa God ka John meeoo netamma, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te tubengakwu, ‘How yise manena mu ka John gi nakabetsea?’
41011032	Pana, ‘Soo John puusoo oo manakwe,’ mee te unnese mu numu punnoꞌo te kusekakwu, soo John Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo netammana, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
41011033	Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka haga pooha-toohakwi, e pooha maꞌnaꞌwena.”
41012001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu mee natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana puu tumasuꞌa. Soo nana tumasuase, oo naꞌoonnakwi koodua-doose, ka tu tumasuana toogoo tuubane nobe-too. Ekow nobe-kwikoo hoobadookwuse. Oosoo tuwazoo tueyaꞌe nobe-toose, ka tumasuape-matu mu numu tuukwena ka tubewabe mu mabetseakwu-kwitoo, yise kwingaꞌa mea.
41012002	Ka tu nayasa-wi oo manepetuse, oosoo sumuoo numu ka tabewabe-witoo taya, pumme naamookwitoo oo tupooegea tuunguna.
41012003	Umu ka nana-ma tzakaduse oo mooedyakwehoo, yise oo taya, gi oo pooe makana.
41012004	Soo tumasuadu yise punowsoo kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzidu taya, umu numu yise suda manakwe, oo kwo-makoo oo wupageta gi hemma oo hanekute.
41012005	Oꞌno yise soo tumasuadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzidu taya tuwazoo. Umu yise oo patsow. Soo tumasuadu yise ewowsoo pumme tutummatzidu oetoo tayayakwe. Susumudu mu tutummatzidu oetoo natayadu nuupagetayakwe yise umu-matu punnoꞌo nagoꞌe.
41012006	Nakwitoo ka tu besaa tooa tu nabenina umu-matoo taya mee tusooyugwena, ‘Umu ka e besaa tooa nakaꞌoedyukuna gi how a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
41012007	Pana mu numu meeoo nananetamma, ‘Esoo ka tumasuadu besaa tooa. Tamme ka a batsowse, ka oo teepu manikwu.’
41012008	Umu yise oo-ma tzakaduse oo batsase ka tumasuape-kwitoo oo wuwazuhoo.”
41012009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo, soo tumasuadu sutakwu ka kodyu petuse, ka umu pumme tutummatzidu nagoese. Oꞌno yise oosoo ka tabewabe kummaꞌakoosoo numu hane tuungukwu.”
41012010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee nu-witu botugu, ‘Mu tupe nobe-tootu tumoodyipu tupe tookwa besaꞌyoo tupe, ka penakwa mu nobe namadabue-kwi oosoo tupe unu nadatzenga petu. Soo Te Naa yoo tumadabue, tamme yise tubetse besa sokwama ma-koobatoo.’ “
41012012	Mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekwutuma, ka pukwitu oo sopedakwatoose, umu ka mu numu-ma suꞌina, sukwe meꞌa.
41012013	Mu numu-koobatoo yadooadu-matu Pharisee, mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe pupuaꞌamu-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nataya. Yow umuoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe unu nesoonahadyakwedu.
41012014	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U tubetse besaꞌyoona, ka umu numu Te Naa-witu besa tunedyooꞌe. U gi numu tutzeadu; yise gi tuwazoo u numu nesootzemadu. How haaꞌa sakwa tamme, ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe tumanagaku?”
41012015	Soo Jesus mu sopedakwatoo ka pumme mu nesoonahadyakwe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwa mu e nesoonahadyakwepana, ka mu tumanagapu-matu e tzapoonneku.”
41012016	Umu yise oo tzapoonnese soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Haga mama namanaka, yise haga naneana mama naboꞌo?” mee. Umu mee oo netamma, “Soo mu wakwawaꞌa pabeꞌe mama.”
41012017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa numu pabeꞌe gea, esoo umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa tumadabuena, ka Te Naasoo gea.” Mu numu besa o sukwe pooꞌnepebuꞌahoo.
41012018	Mu sumubaatu nanesootuhidu numu, Sadducee mee nananeadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuga. Umu Sadducee meeoo nananesootuhidu, soo numu ka yaꞌese sumu tammesoo meꞌadu.
41012019	Umu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe, “Oꞌnosoo ka Moses tunetammapu umu mayohodu, ka tu pabeꞌe gi dooamu-gakoo kadooꞌoo oo manese, soo penakwatu oo wanngaꞌa sakwa oo nodukwadoose, tu pabeꞌe dooamu-dooku.
41012020	Natakwatsukweꞌyoo (7) mu nanakwangaꞌamu. Oosoo mu tubetse pabeꞌe ka ekow mogoꞌne mooe nodukwa-gaꞌyoo. Ka tu mooe kooma kadoo manese, gi oo-makoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
41012021	Ka oo pabeꞌe yaꞌese, oo wanngaꞌa koomadoo. Ooka tuwazoo yaꞌese, gisoo tuwow oo-makoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
41012022	Umuoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) naana esoo mogoꞌne nanasusuꞌmu mu koomadookese, gisoo umu-makoo dooamu-gana yise punnoꞌo kadoo ꞌmane.
41012023	Esoo mogoꞌne yise ka saaꞌa namayodase haga kooma-gakwu? Mu noꞌyoona natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu oo nodukwa-gakena,” meeꞌe umu oo nesootzemana unakwe.
41012024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu Sadducee netamma, “Mu gi o nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tubetse tunetammapu, tamme oo pooha netammapu.
41012025	Mu sakwa yise ka saaꞌa namayodase mu toha kakasa-gakoo Te Naa tummatzidu-kwaꞌne, mu gi mu nodukwa-gana soohanekwu.
41012026	Mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe mu tuise sapa. Mu saaꞌa gi moobegwaga gwetzoimokwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase. Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna. Moses ka pooewunudu niwunu oo-kobena wunu, soo Te Naa yise ka Moses meeoo netamma, ‘Mu Abraham, mu Isaac, mu Jacob puu tooesoo nu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Nu yise mu Nanesootuhi Naa.’ “
41012027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Te Naa gi mu tuipu Naa, mu togesoo modu suuꞌmu. Mu ka Te Naa nanetsagwayipana, mu tubetse gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.”
41012028	Oosoo sumuꞌyoo nana mu tunedyooedu-matu, oona oo nakakwunu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌosoo pumme mu numu tubenga, besa mu nanekwegeꞌa mee oo nakasoobedya, soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanotu umu-matu ka Te Naa unnepu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo umu te tumayohope-matu?”
41012029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Waha-baatu esoo naꞌunnepu Te Naa tamme tuukwepu besaꞌyoo. Mooeꞌugasoo, ‘Soo Te Naa Te Manumudoopu.
41012030	Tamme sakwa tubetse besa oo soobedya.’
41012031	Soo penakwatu yise meeoo. ‘Tamme sakwa mu numu besa soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.’ “
41012032	Soo nana meeoo oo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo soo nayadooape. Oosoo sumuꞌyoosoo, Te Naa Te Manumudoopu. O oosoo Te Naa.
41012033	Tamme punnoꞌo sakwa ka Te Naa besa soobedya. Soo penakwatu yise, tamme sakwa tammesoo besa nanasoobedya, tuwazoo. Umu wahaꞌyoo noꞌokosoo nanesootuhipu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo.”
41012034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “U unu soonammedu. U tookwa unu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Umu numu yise naka nasookwise gi hemma ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga mani.
41012035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kobena petu, umu ewaꞌyoo numu o manepunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe David-matu mee oo netamma.
41012036	Pana soo David ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga. Ka David tubotugu-kwi meeoo, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwu katu ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo.” ’
41012037	How yise soo David Te Pabeꞌe mee oo natubaꞌnga ka punakwana oo nanekemma sapa?” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubenga.
41012038	“Ka mu meeoo tuukwedu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana, umu tu nanesookwugina sukwe soogwidu. Umu numu tunedyooedu unu besow namasooꞌa.
41012039	Ka paba tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo, umu besa-kwi tu katuna soogwaꞌe. Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, tuwazoo unu besa-kwi tu katuna soogwaꞌe.
41012040	Umu yise ka mu pepeawabe hemma tuduhana mu nanesootuhikute. Umu sugweꞌapa wunaꞌme mu nanesootuhikute. Umu gi besa numu tunedyooedu. Umu unu suda manedu tumatuguna, umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
41012041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu owenapa mu poonne katu, ka mu numu ewana ka tumasumudoope-kwi tutuoonadyakwe. Susumudu mu naana ewow hee-gaꞌyoo ewa oe tutuooꞌna.
41012042	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne tu kooma kadooꞌoo manekupu umu-tamme kemma. Gi hemma mapuꞌa, oosoo yise huutse oe tutuuooꞌna.
41012043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tunakatzimodu netamma, “Yaa esoo mogoꞌne. Esoo tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo.
41012044	Yise mu naana gi ewa oe tutuooꞌna ka a namasumutoo-kwi, tooe ewa oo hee-gapana. Esoo mogoꞌne tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo. Gi haaꞌnokoo oe tuoona, pana a besana puma mu gwetzoina mee nu.”
41013001	Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Esoo nanesootuhi nobe tupe noko namadabuepu-gaꞌyoo. Mu yaatu tupe papabaꞌyoo. Esoo nanesootuhi nobe besa tabuꞌa.”
41013002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Esoo nobe besaꞌyoo pana te wokwohomu noꞌoko a wuyoomedakwunikwu.”
41013003	Umu yise ka tuutsekoo giba-ma, Olive mee naneadu-kwitoo mease o aataꞌa, ka nanesootuhi nobe poonne. Peter, James, John, Andrew yise mee oo watse tubenga.
41013004	“How sakwa tamme oo sopedakwatoo tabua, ka nobe nuudyoomedakwuna? Hee te tzapoonnekukwu hannanoꞌo oo manikwuna?”
41013005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Ewaꞌyoo numu meeoo naneyugwedu, yow numme Te Pabeꞌe. Nu gi mu esayaedu-matu, meeoo soo esayaedu mu tuukwekwu. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu nanemooagakwu. Gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.
41013007	Tooe hanotu tooe mu numu mesoo nanagoꞌe. Gi saaꞌa suꞌipana. Gi soo te teepu suda mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi meeoo hemma sooyugwepana.
41013008	Mu numu yise nanano ewa nanagoekwu. Tooe hanotu tooe saaꞌa, soo te teepu yutsungadooa. Mu numu saaꞌa tseagoedooa. Gi besow saaꞌa hemma mu poonnedooa.”
41013009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa namasootzema. Mu sumuna nahemase, mu nanehanedooa. Mu saaꞌa nuupagetadooa. Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi mu petzabedooa. Mu yise nuga besa unnepu mu tuukwedooa.
41013010	Noꞌobatusoo mu numu saaꞌa e unnepu nakadooa.
41013011	Mu ka nakwutumase, gi suda oo soonamekupana ka hayoo mu unnekwuna. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ooka madaꞌe.
41013012	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu gi e petzabedooa, mu nananumudooe suda mu matugudooa, yise mu goedooa saaꞌa. Ka umu gi e sooꞌoedyukudu, gi mumme numu petzabedu, gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu, gi e maꞌwukadu, nu magwetzoikwu.
41013014	Tooe hemma tooe sutaꞌyoo
41013015	Oosoo tu nobe-kobena wununnummedu sakwa gi tu nobe-kwitu hemma gwuupana, yabesoo meeow.
41013016	Soo tubewabe-kwitu hemma how yugwewunudu sakwa punnoꞌo gi hemma gwuupana, gi tu nobe-kwitoo kodyupana, yabesoo meeow.
41013017	Ka yabesoo meaꞌakwuse, mu koheadu-kwi gi besa, ka mu sutuba meaꞌakwuse mu oongaꞌa petzekudu punnoꞌo.
41013018	Umu sakwa nanesootuhi gi sakwa tommo hee oo suda manepana.
41013019	Esoo gi besa a namanekwuna tubetse unu suda, gi hannanoꞌo namanedu ka teepu namadabuese.
41013020	Te Naa yise ka umu tu tutzeanana sootuhikwu, ka gi oo tzadyooꞌikuna gi haga namagwetzoꞌi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41013021	Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo mu tuukwekwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo kodyu petu.’ Gi oo naka oedyukupana.
41013022	Ewa tuwazoo naꞌesagoekwu, ‘Nu Yow Mu Pabeꞌe mee naꞌunnekwu.’ Ewasoo mu numu moohedu numu nemooagayakwe. Nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekukwu, tooe hemma tooe pooha mahanekwu, ka umu e dooamu tooꞌe nemooagana.
41013023	Mooasoo nu mu tuukwepu. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa mu namasootzemapunne.
41013024	Oꞌno ka gi hemma besa manekwuse, soo taba toganohookwu, soo muha punnoꞌo.
41013025	Mu paatoozooba punnoꞌo sawedyikwu.
41013026	Noꞌyoona mu numu punnoꞌo ka koomeba-nagakoo e pooha kodyu petukwuna poonnekwu.
41013027	Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo e tutummatzikwutu, tooe hanotu tooe ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona, mu e nanumu nu-baa hanepetukwu.
41013028	Ka sunngabe pooedooase, mu meeoo sokwamadooa, tamme tookwa tamatsebooe.
41013029	Ka gi besa hemma manekese, mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa pudusoo kodyu petukwu.
41013030	Susumudu mu numu-matu ka hemma oo manedu poonnekwu gisoo yaꞌena.
41013031	Nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu, gi atasoo naneyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41013032	Ka hannanoꞌo oe e petuookwuna manepetuse, gi haga ka teepu-koobatu oo sopedakwatoo. Mu toogoopatu Te Naa tutummatzidu puu gi, nu punnoꞌo gi. Te Naa suuꞌmu oo sopedakwadoopunne ka hannanoꞌo e petuookwuna.
41013033	Mu sakwa ooosapa namasootzemapunne.
41013034	Nu-kwaꞌnesoo, sumuꞌyoo numu puu ka meakwuse, ka hemma how pumme yugwekudu hemma nemanekuga. Ka tuꞌeyaedu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi uꞌwepana.’
41013035	Mu sakwa nonotsu tabeno nuummabetsabena. Tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nu kemmowgena, yongona, togano, awamooasoo. Nu sumuna gi mu nuummabetsape mu mayu petukwu.”
41014001	Mooa yongona oetu, oꞌnosoo te manena te natzamaꞌwukwuna soomayuna, yise ewa tukakwu, ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba tukakwu. Soo Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe watze nesootzeꞌma mee yise, “How sakwa tamme ka Jesus watze tzakadu tabuase, oo batsa?
41014002	Tamme sakwa gi numu poonnena oo batsapana, mu numu tamme-no nagoedooa.”
41014003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Bethany-wi ka Simon Tookoo Pehe mee naneadu nobe-kwi. Mu tukawunu, sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oe petuoo. Ka tupe osa-witu ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa gwuuna. Ka osa tsabadowse, ka Te Pabeꞌe kwo-kooba oo tuoonahoo.
41014004	Susumudu mu Te Pabeꞌe-batu ka mogoꞌne manena nesootuꞌadyaꞌe, “Oosoo sakwa gi oo nahadyagwepana ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa oosoo ewa nanenagadu. Oosoo sakwa oo-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu namadea.”
41014006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “A tsasoopedya. Gi a nesootuꞌadyaꞌepana. Esoo mogoꞌne besa manakwe.
41014007	Mu tutuha manedu tooe hannanoꞌo pana ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana nu gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
41014008	Soo mogoꞌne manena deaꞌa, e natugukwu-kwitoo a natumayohona.
41014009	Tooe hano tooe ka teepu kaaꞌno, ka besa nayadooadu-kwi esoo mogoꞌne manepu saaꞌa nanatugwengadooa. Oo-makoo tamme nanasoomayudooa.”
41014010	Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot mee naneadu ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu-baa petuse mee mu netamma, “Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka Ne Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona nu sumuna mu tuukwekwu.”
41014011	Mu tutunehanedu besa sokwama ka oo nakase umu yise ka Judas tumasumudooku. Soo Judas yise meeoo soonamme, “Hownnekoo sakwa nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu bika?”
41014012	Yaa tabeno numme ka seepu tooaꞌa batsakwu, ka gi namayuadu tukaba noko oo ewa tukakwuse mu oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoona sakwa tamme ewa tuka?”
41014013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waahoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu tayase. Mee mu netamma, “Ka nana baa tzanodu mu saaꞌa wegeadooa.
41014014	Mu saaꞌa ookow nageakadooa. Ka nobe-kwi oo egeakase oo-nosoo saaꞌa tzoonooahookwatese ka nana nobe-gakoo mee netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no yaa u-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukakwu.’
41014015	Esoo nana nobe-gaꞌyoo yise mu tzapoonnekukwu, ka paꞌatu nobe-kwiꞌyoona ka tukapu mu yonga tukakwuna mu saadooa.”
41014016	Mu wahaꞌyoo yise memea, ka Te Pabeꞌe unne-toosoo manekwuse.
41014017	Ka tu yongose Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no ka nobe-kwi petuga.
41014018	Umu-no tukanasoo, Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-matu nu-no tukadu ka mu tukwutumadu nu-matoo bikekwu, umu yise e batsakwu.”
41014019	Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo nakase, suda nuummana, umu nanasusuꞌmuꞌyoona mee unakwe, “Nu haaꞌa?”
41014020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu nu-no tukadu.
41014021	Tooꞌe soo Te Naa mooasoo, ‘U nabatsakwu,’ mee tunetammapana, saaꞌa oosoo umu e wohomu nu-matoo bikepu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
41014022	Mu tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe tukaba gwuuhoose, oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise oo tzaboka. Yise umu tunakatzimodu hemese ooka mu tuka tuungu, mee unnena, “Esoo puu nuga tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.”
41014023	Yise ka besow atsa baa yoongase oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise, ooka mu hebe tuungu.
41014024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe unnena, “Esoo puu nuga puupe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Te Naa Toogoopatu besa unnena tunetammana, suda mu manepu-koobatoo e nabatsakwuse.
41014025	Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, saaꞌa ka Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose, oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo hebekwu.”
41014026	Umu yise nanesootuhi hoobea nekwuna ka Olive mee naneadu tuutsekoo giba-matoo meaꞌa.
41014027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka yaa togano suda tu namanikwuse mu e maꞌwuookakwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe tubotugupu, meeꞌe naꞌunakwe ka menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe manekwuna. ‘Soo seepu takonedu nabatsahookwu, mu seepu yise nanaꞌemota petugwahookwu.’
41014028	Nu saaꞌa e yaꞌekwukoo namayodase, Galilee-witoo mu-kobenasoo meadooa. Mu saaꞌa, o nu-baa petugadooa.”
41014029	Soo Peter meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu u nakatzimodu sumuna u-koobaꞌyoona meaꞌakwu, nu gi umu-no meakwu.”
41014030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Togesoo tu toganopunne, ka tsekana kwuꞌa gisoo wahadooe oo yaka, u pahedooe oona numu tuukwekwu u gi e sopedakwatoo mee.”
41014031	Soo Peter yise meeoo Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tooe umu e batsakwu mee unnepana nu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi u-ma nasookwina.” Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌyoona oo-waꞌnesoo unakwe.
41014032	Ka Olive namasuꞌa-wi petuse, Gethsemane mee naneadu, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Yowsoo aatapunne. Nu nanesootuhigakwu.”
41014033	Mu Peter, James, John oo-no meaꞌa.
41014034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “E pewu-kwitu tubetse suda nuumma. Mu sakwa yaahoosoo aatapunne.”
41014035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sagwane umu kwingaꞌatoosoo meahoose, o ka teepu-kooba meatzedose, yise nanesootuhikooha.
41014036	“E Naa Toogoopatu. Nuga Naa Toogoopatu. Nuka u tunetammakuse nu oo-toogoo meakwu. Ekow e pewu-kwitu suda nuummana, kadooꞌoo mayugwe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhimakwuse
41014037	tu pupuaꞌamu utuaꞌe mu mayu petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “How mu tubetse unu utuigapu-gaꞌyoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U sakwa gi uwepana.”
41014038	Noꞌoko yise meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhi aata oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu matzama. Mu gi oo mapuꞌa ka gi manese meeꞌe nu.”
41014039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise penakwa nanesootuhigase ka mooeꞌugasoo tu nanesootuhi-kwaꞌnekoosoo nanesootuhi.
41014040	Yise tu pupuaꞌamu-baa kodyu petuse, mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petusoo.
41014041	Yise nanesootuhigasoo tuwazoo saaꞌa umu-baasoo kodyu petu, tooesoo mu utuaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yow haaꞌa mu togesoo utuaꞌe? Yosuhoo, tamme meaꞌakwu, menoꞌo oe mani petu, nu natzakwenekwu. Yaa soo sutaꞌyoo nana kemma.”
41014043	Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooꞌa, Judas petuoo, mu Jew numu tutunehanedu mu tukwutumadu taya ka Judas noko. Pabatzeꞌekoo koodooꞌoo noko tsegesa hemana. Soo Judas, ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tooe. Soo Judas yise oo-no namitzadyaꞌme oꞌno umu oo sopedakwatoo.
41014046	Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tsakatu.
41014047	Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu yise tsegesa-ma ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu pabeꞌe tummatzidu naka wugaꞌakwunihoo.
41014048	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi nu naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu koodooꞌoo-ma e tumahepana, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo.
41014049	Tooe ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa, mu gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe. Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotuku, oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.”
41014050	Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-ma suꞌise, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baaꞌyoona namabetugwahoo.
41014051	Nu ka tooebetsena, ka Te Pabeꞌe nagwuuhoose, nagaꞌapu-wi wunagaꞌa yaahoose ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meanoꞌo.
41014052	Umu tukwutumadu e nagaꞌapu-ma tsakatu, nu yise e nagaꞌapu makwumahoose namameow.
41014053	Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwakoo oo puta-ma tzakaduse, ka Jew numu pabeꞌe-matu oo tsakaka. Umu tutunehanedu oo nehanekwu.
41014054	Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu nakwi meꞌa, ka Jew numu pabeꞌe nobe-kobena petugase, o yooekatu.
41014055	Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe ka mu tutunehanedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe batsakwuse, gi toge oo manena tooꞌe nemayupana gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
41014056	Susumudu nanana oo manena tooꞌe wahana sukwe esagoꞌe. Umu tooꞌe tuukwepana kadooꞌoo hee, tubetse gi hemma nemamaꞌyu.
41014058	“Numme meeoo oo unakwe oo naka, ‘Nu ka nobe, ka Te Naa-matoo pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhina kadooꞌoo mesoo mayugwe, yise pahe tabeba-wi oo mesoo mayota.’ “
41014059	Mu naana gi nanakwaꞌnesoo unakwe.
41014060	Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe umu-kobenaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Togesapa haaꞌa umu nanana meeoo u netamma?”
41014061	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse gi hiyoo unakwe. Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe yise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa toogoopatu Te Naa Tooa?”
41014062	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha, mu oeꞌyoopana e poonnekwu, nu Te Naa Toogoopatu-kumaba katukwu. Saaꞌa nu koomeba-naga petuookwu, oꞌno yise mu e pooha poonnekwu.”
41014063	Soo Jew numu pabeꞌe yise tubetse unu sutahoose tu kwasu tsakebuꞌehoo, mee mu netamma, “Oosoo suda unakwe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo mee naneyugwena. Gi tamme manatusoo oetusoo wahakwutu sookwaꞌe.
41014064	Mu oo naka ka suda oo unakwe mu sakwa hayoo oetu netamma. Haꞌyoo mu sokwama?” Mu numu tutunehanedu mee oo netamma, “Tamme sakwa oo batsa.”
41014065	Yise o kobitoo toohegonno, o pooe kwudumowse, oo wupageta, mee yise oo netamma, “Ne tuukwe ka pooha-gana, haga u wupageta?” Mu tutukwutumadu oo-ma tzakaduse, yise oo koba mabatseoo.
41014066	Soo Peter yise ka Jew numu tunehanedu naa nobe-kobena pedana oe yooekatu. Sumuꞌyoo tsuadumu ka Jew numu tunehanedu naa hemma how yugwegudu, ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U haaꞌa yise ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” mee.
41014068	Soo Peter mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.” Soo Peter meeowse ka natzakwonaꞌa kumabu wunu.
41014069	Soo tsuadumu ka mu numu o konnodu meeoo netamma, “Esoo nana ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu.”
41014070	Soo Peter ka mu numu-ma unu suꞌina punnoꞌo mee oo netamma, “Gi nu.” Pudusoo mu numu o toonoobatu meeoo oo netamma, “U tookwa togesapa yow ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu. U ka Galilee-witu.”
41014071	Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Gi nu mu numu nemooagadu, nu gi umu-matu.”
41014072	Yise tsekana kwuꞌa waha yaga. Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammana soomayuse, suda soonammena, yagakooha.
41015001	Awamooasoo soo mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee tunehane. Yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mi tzakunase, ka teepu-kooba katudu naa, Pilate mee naneadu-kobena oo tzaka petuga.
41015002	Soo Pilate mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nekwegeꞌa, “Aha, nu yow oosoo.”
41015003	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Ewa u suda manakwe.”
41015004	Soo Pilate yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Umu tooe hayoo tooe u netamma. U haaꞌa gi oo naka, oꞌno u gi hayoo unakwe?”
41015005	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo tuwazoo hayoo sukwe unakwe. Soo Pilate meeoo soonamme, “Nu gi o nakasopedakwatoo haꞌoo mane-naga masoo gi mu nanekwegeꞌa.”
