41015006	Nonotsa sumu tomoyina tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo soo numu-kooba katudu sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzamaꞌwuyakwe, ka mu numu unne-makoosoo.
41015007	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Pilate-baa petuse, yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa sumuoo mu nakwutumadu-matu tzatsebooe.” Soo Pilate oo nesopedakwatoo ka Jew tutunehanedu gi Te Pabeꞌe soobetzabena, ooonneꞌyoona yise mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutuma. Soo Pilate meeoo mu tubenga, “Mu haaꞌa ka Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus tzamaꞌwukwu?” Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu meeoo mu numu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Pilate ka Barabbas tzatsebooe tuungu.” Oosoo nana, Barabbas mee naneadu, tu pupuamu-no nakwutumadu. Umu ka mu Roman numu-no nanagoena, susumudu mu numu-matu nagoehoo.
41015012	Soo Pilate mu numu mee netamma, “Esoo nana nu-baa petu, mu Jew Numu-kooba Katudu mee naneadu. How yise nu oo yugwekwu?”
41015013	Mu numu waꞌagemoꞌo, “Oo tzakwenne. Oo batsa.”
41015014	Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “How tubetse suda oosoo manakwe?” Mu numu pabasoo waꞌagemoꞌo, “Oo batsa.”
41015015	Soo Pilate gi oo nebatsapana, yise mu numu puusoo oo nebatsana. Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas, ka mu tukwutumadu tzamaꞌwu tuunguse, ka Te Pabeꞌe wupagetase oo batsa, paꞌa oo taposa mee tunetamma.
41015016	Mu tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka Pilate nobe-kwitoo tzakaka. Noꞌyoona mu tukwutumadu oe sumuhoobetu.
41015017	Umu numu-kobenaꞌyoona o wunagaꞌayaakuhoo, mono-ga-kwi oo tzowupagaku.
41015018	Umu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌena, oo nematzamana, mee oo netamma, “U tookwa yow Jew Numu-kooba Katudu.”
41015019	Umu hooope-ma oo kwo-makoo oo wupagetana, oo kobitoo toohena, o-kobena meatzedona oo nasootzamekuna, oo-maꞌyoona nanekoena.
41015020	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nanetzaꞌmekumakwuse, oo namasooapu-wisoo oo matabue. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tsakakase, oo batsakwu.
41015021	Umu tukwutumadu ka meadabena, Simon
41015022	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-kwi o bi petuga.
41015023	Yise umu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa, noko natusooabe mayuana oo tooe hebe tuungu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi oo hepe.
41015024	Yise awamooa umu oo mi-makoo paꞌa oo taposa. Mu tukwutumadu yise oo kwasu nanatotsakwate.
41015026	Ka sunngabe namadabue-ma puma oo nataposana meeoo natuboꞌo, “Yow esoo Jew Numu-kooba Katudu.”
41015027	Wahaꞌyoo tutuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwana nataposa.
41015029	Mu numu oo-moopa meagonnona, oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U meeoo unnepu, u Te Naa nobe wudyoomase, pahe tabewa-wi besa oo matabuekwusoo.
41015030	U sakwa ka unu tumadina mamaꞌyoo wuekese, uusoo namagwetzoi.”
41015031	Umu numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe mee unnena, “U mu numu magwetzoise, pana yise gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
41015032	Hownneꞌyoo Ne Pabeꞌe U? Gi hownnekoo uusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka naduyana mee unnepana. Uusoo yaa teepu-matoo wuese, numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Umu punnoꞌo oo naꞌenakwa nataposadu oo-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe.
41015033	Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwikoo tooe, ka teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
41015034	Pahe-kwikoo tapuakese soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌage yadooa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani,” mee naꞌunnedu, “Nuga Naa, Nuga Naa, How manena u e matusookwunaꞌe?”
41015035	Umu susumudu o konnopunnedu-nagatu mee unne, “Masoo tookwa ka Elijah, oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneadu bidyakwe.”
41015036	Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu yabesoo tanomanegase, yise yotsogadu wanapu, suda kammadu baa oodutsekoo hooope-ma oo tzetzabekuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe tzatumakute. Pana mu susumudu meeoo, “Oo tsasoopedya. Sumuna soo Elijah tamme-baa tabua petuse oo magwetzoikwu.”
41015037	Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe paba waꞌagese, yaꞌeoo.
41015038	Soo tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka oo yaꞌehoose, mee yise unne, “Masoo tookwa tooꞌe togesapa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa.” Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona numu nanesootuhidu-makoo naamootoo natzakwenedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose, soo wunapu paꞌanakwana tubongo oo naamootoo natzagebuꞌehoo. Soo teepu yutsungakoohase, mu tupe payooagonnona sawekooha.
41015040	Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne punnoꞌo onow kwinaꞌa konnopunnena oo poonnepunne, umuoo ka Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oo tummatzina. Umuoo momokoꞌne-nagatu paheꞌyoo, Mary Magdalene, yise Mary mu James noko Joseph pea, yise tuwazoo Zebedee nodukwa.
41015042	Soo nana, Joseph mee naneadu, Arimathea-wikoo nobe-gaꞌyoo, ka numu tutunehanedu-matu, unu napetzabedu. Toogoopatu Te Naa ka teepu besa oo yugwekwunu wutooedu. Ka tu pudu yongogaꞌa soo Joseph ka Pilate nobe-kwi petuga yise oo tubenga, “How sakwa u ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo e tzagea?”
41015044	Soo Pilate mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus haaꞌa tubetse yaꞌepu?” Soo tukwutumadu nabise, yise natubenga, “Soo Jesus tubetse yaꞌepu haaꞌa?” Soo tukwutumadu, “Aha,” mee unakwe.
41015045	Yise ka tukwutumadu nakase, soo Pilate ka Joseph mee oo netamma, “Yise a haneka.”
41015046	Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo tzakwekuse toha wunapu hane petuse, oe oo manobea. Tupe tuwaga-kwi oo tugu. Pabow tupe o-kobenatoo tonanooehoo.
41015047	Umu Mary Magdalene-no, Joseph pea Mary mee naneadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitu poonnepunne.
41016001	Sumu tabe mease, oogow mooa awamooasoo taba pudu tsebooegena, paheꞌyoo momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe natugu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Mary Magdalene, James pea, yise Salome-no.
41016003	Yise ka o meadabena meeoo unnemena, “Haga yise ka pabow tupe o-kobenatu tonanooekwunikwu?”
41016004	Yise toogooonakwatu poohwise, soo pabaꞌyoo tupe mooasoo natonanooekwunipu.
41016005	Oe mu tzoonooase sumuꞌyoo tooebetse toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzi-matu, toha namasooana o katu. Mu momokoꞌne oo-ma suihoo.
41016006	Soo tooebetse mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe Nazareth-witu wate; oosoo nabatsapu, oosoo kadooꞌoo yaatu; mooasoo namayodapu. Poonne yaa oo habepu-witu kadooꞌoo.
41016007	Mu sakwa mease, Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tuukwe, Peter tuwazoo. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe mu mooenakwasoo Galilee-witoo meapu. Onoko yise mu oo poonnekwu, mooasoo mu natuukwepu.”
41016008	Umu momokoꞌne yise oꞌno tatanomanega. Gi haga umu-matu sukwe yadooꞌa, umu ka suihoose.
41016009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodase, unu awamooasoo ka Mary Magdalene natzapoonneku petu, ka Mary Magdalene-nagakoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) tsoapa taꞌyakwunipu-gaꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo.
41016010	Mary saaꞌa ka umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matoo meahoose yise mu tuukwe petuga, umu yise oeꞌyoopana sagwaꞌe.
41016011	“Te Pabeꞌe pudu namayoda. Nu o poonne,” mee mu netamma. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
41016012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe atasoo tabuana, waahoo nanana nobe-kwitoo meaꞌa. Yise umu-no manega.
41016013	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoohoose punowsoo memeahoo mu tunakatzimodu tuukwe petuga. Pana umu tunakatzimodu gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
41016014	Penakwa mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe mu natzapoonneku, mee yise mu netamma, “How manena mu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe ka umu numu mumme tuukweꞌe sapa?
41016015	Ka tooe hano tooe yaa teepu-kooba momona, mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa yadooapu wahamo, noꞌobatusoo numu tuukwe.
41016016	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka gi tookedu goso-witoo meakwu. Umu oe tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise baa-wi namatzakana namagwetzoikwu.
41016017	Umu oe unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu toogoopatu yadooa-masoo yadooakoohakwu.
41016018	Tooe togogwa tuwazoo mu tokuese, tooetoo mu sutakoo hebehoose sapa, mu gi nuummaba wuma-waꞌneꞌyoo. Yise mu umu-kooba matuguna, mu nanesootuhikuna, mu tuoegoedu besa manekwu.”
41016019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-no yadooamakwuse, yise toogoopatoo tsebooegase, ka Te Naa tumadinakwa katu petuga.
41016020	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu tooe hano tooe numu besa o unnena tuukwemoꞌo, nanabesa tu tumadina pumme tu sootuhipu mu tzapoonekute. Esoo toge sapa. Maaꞌno sapa.
42001001	Ka Te Pabeꞌe ka yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baaꞌyoona oo manepu-witu. Oꞌno Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka oo poonnese ne tuukweꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo numu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu botugu.
42001003	Nu ka noꞌoko umu ooka poonnedu unnepu nenayodase besa oetu nakasopedakwadoose, menoꞌo e puaꞌa Theophilos nu u-matoo tuboꞌo,
42001004	oꞌno saaꞌa u punnoꞌo oo nakasopedakwadookwu mee nu tusooyugwe.
42001005	Oosoo sumuꞌyoo waꞌetse, Zachariah mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu Abijah mee naneadu nananesootuhidu-matu
42001006	Umuoo uga besaꞌyoo numu, noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno nakabetseꞌa.
42001007	Umuoo ooosapa gi dooamu-gaꞌyoo soo Elizabeth ka gi dooamudoo-waꞌneꞌyoona.
42001008	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe nanahoesoo ka tu tumayohoyina, ka pabatsekoo Jew nanesootuhipe nobe-kwiꞌyoona mayohoyakwe. Umu ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meakwudu, ka besa kookwanadu kootugukwudu. Sumu tabenoosoo Zachariah nanetutzeꞌa
42001010	Ka besa kookwanadu nakootugukwunoꞌo oe manepetuse, soo Zachariah ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egeaka. Umu numu puuwanasoo konnopunnena nanesootuhigonno.
42001011	Zachariah yise meeoo pooha tuusoobedyakooha. Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-matu petuhoose, ka besa kookwanadu pukwikoo nakootuguna-kumaba wunupunne.
42001012	Soo Zachariah yise ka Te Naa tummatziwabe poonnese suihoo.
42001013	Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe ka Zachariah mee netamma, “U sakwa gi suipana. Soo Te Naa tookwa u nanetsukwiyaꞌena naka. U nodukwa Elizabeth mee naneadu saaꞌa naatse tooaꞌagakwu. U yise John mee oo neakwu.
42001014	Ka oo nadooaꞌadoose, mu saaꞌa besa sokwamadooa, ewaꞌyoo numu saaꞌa punnoꞌo ooosoo.
42001015	Soo John besaꞌyoo numukwu, ka gisoo oo nadooaꞌadoo soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma oo sootuhikwu. Soo John sakwa ooosapa gi atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebepana, gi tooe hownnekoo puma tu nabaayina hebepana tuwazoo.
42001016	Saaꞌa ka nana manese, soo John unusoo pooha-gakwu ka Te Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo petu, saaꞌa u tooa, John, mu numu oo-toogoo mooe nemamakwupunnedooa. Soo John ka mu numu Te Naa oemota manepu, ka oo besa podo mu makodyukwu. Soo John ka mu naanapuaꞌamu tu doodooamu besa soobedya mayugwedooa. Soo John saaꞌa ewow Jew numu ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyuku-matusoo makodyudooa.”
42001018	Soo Zachariah ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo mee netamma, “Mooasoo nu unu waꞌetsena, e nodukwa punnoꞌo unu peawabe. Hownnekoo yise nu oo sopedakwadoodooa u sumuna e nemooaka?”
42001019	Soo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee oo nanekwegea, “Gabriel mee nu naneꞌa. Nu Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu. Soo Te Naa-soo meeoo e netamma, nu u tuukwedooa ka besa naꞌunnedu.
42001020	Menoꞌo manakwana, u gi yadooa manekwu, u ka ume e tuukwena gi nakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana saaꞌa ka u tooa nawuese, u yadooasoo manedooa.”
42001021	Noꞌyoona mu numu puuwanasoo konnodape ka Zachariah wutooena. “Haꞌooga manena oosoo gi yabe tsebooegena?” mee umu sokwama.
42001022	Ka saaꞌa umu-matoo tsebooekese, yise sukwe miyutsuꞌnge, gi yadooꞌa. “Soo waꞌetse tuusoobedyadu-kwaꞌne nuumma,” mee mu numu sokwama.
42001023	Saaꞌa ka tu nananesootuhi pupuaꞌamu tutumatzimakwuse, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, Zachariah nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka.
42001024	Ka saaꞌa soo oo nodukwa, Elizabeth mee naneadu, kohea. Manege muha manepetuga, Elizabeth ooosapa nobe-kwisoo.
42001025	Soo Elizabeth yise mee unakwe, “Soo Te Naa e tubetse sootuhipu. Menoꞌo manakwana numu gi e nesootzemakwu, gi dooamu-gaꞌyoo mee e netammana.”
42001026	Soo tsuadumu Mary mee naneadu, Nazareth mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo
42001028	Soo Gabriel ka Mary-baa petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhikwu.”
42001029	Soo Mary oo-ma nakasuaꞌe, “Hemmagina netamma?” mee soonammena.
42001030	Soo Gabriel yise mee ka Mary netamma, “Gi suipana. Soo Te Naa besa u-matoo soonammena, u sootuhikwu. Pudusoo u kohease saaꞌa u naatse oongaꞌa dooadookwu. U yise Jesus mee oo neakwu Numu Magwetzoidu mee naꞌunnedu. Oosoo unu pooha-gakwu, oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmakwuse. Soo Te Naa saaꞌa ooosapa tu doodooamu-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungudooa ka mu namooatupu David-waꞌnesoo soo David puu tu nanumu nehanegatudu. Gadoo hee oo ooonakwatu.”
42001034	Soo Mary yise mee ka Gabriel tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise nu tooaꞌadookwu, nu ka gi hannanoꞌo nanano habepuna?”
42001035	Soo Gabriel yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma oo u sootunagakwu. Ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi u koheakwu, oosoo tuhaꞌyoo ka Te Naa Tooaꞌakwu.
42001036	Soo u hamaꞌa Elizabeth punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo besa nasootuhipu. ‘Oosoo gi dooamu-doodu mogoꞌne,’ mee mu numu ka oꞌnosoo oo nea pana oosoo yise mooasoo naapahe muha kohea.
42001037	Noꞌyoona soo Te Naa unnepu togesapa manekena.”
42001038	Soo Mary meeoo, “Nu Te Naa tummatziwabe. Tooe how tooe nuka Te Naa mayugwena besaꞌyoo.” Soo Gabriel yise meahoo.
42001039	Gi haaꞌno obenakwatoo, soo Mary namahanese, mea oona giba-matoo ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo, ka tu hamaꞌa Elizabeth nobenega.
42001040	Ka Zechariah nobe-kwi yise petugase, ka Elizabeth-no yadooꞌa.
42001041	Soo Elizabeth ka Mary-no yadooadyakwe, oo wuma ka tu oongaꞌa yutsungahoose. Soo Elizabeth yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pumme oo wupetuhoose yadooakooha. Mee yise unnewunu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhipu, u oongaꞌa nokosoo.
42001043	Nu besa soonamme ka yaa nu-baa u petuse, ka tamme magwetzoikwudu u koheꞌa, ka Te Naa ume besa sootuhaꞌe.
42001044	Ka u petuhoose nuka u yadooese, e oongaꞌa nu-nagaꞌyoona yutsungahoo, ka besa soonammese.
42001045	Soo Te Naa tubetse besa u sootuhi u ka tubetse besa noꞌoko oo unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
42001046	Soo Mary tubetse besa soonammena nanesootuhikooha meeoo yise, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo, numu magwetzoidu. Nu tubetse besa oo-matoo soonamme.
42001048	Tooe gi e maawaꞌnekoo sapa soo Te Naa e soobedyana tubetse besa e sootuhi. Yaa manakwana mu numu ooosapa meeoo nu-kwitu wahakwu, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Mary tubetse sootuhipu.’
42001049	Soo Te Naa tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
42001050	Soo Te Naa oe manakwana te soobedyana tamme punnoꞌo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna besa nasootuhi.
42001051	Soo Te Naa unu naduya hemma yugwedu, oosoo umu besa nasooyugwedu numu matzooekute,
42001052	mu numu-kooba aatadu nokosoo. Pana ka mu gi maawaꞌnekoo numu besa sootuhaꞌe.
42001053	Soo Te Naa ka mu tutuha manedu sootuhaꞌe, pana mooasoo besa manepunne mee nasooyugwedu numu soo Te Naa tsasoopedya.
42001054	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka te namooatupu Abraham mee netammapu, ‘Mu yow e nanumu besa sootuhikwu.’ Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka mooasoo meeoo unnepuna yise ooosapa besa te sootuhaꞌe.”
42001056	Pahe muha soo Mary ka Elizabeth-baaꞌyoose tu nobe-kwitoosoo kodyukasoo.
42001057	Ka saaꞌa yise soo Elizabeth naatse tooaꞌadoo.
42001058	Oo nananumu-no oo nonopuaꞌa besa sokwama ka oo nakase, soo Te Naa ka oongaꞌa-ma besa ooka sootuhise.
42001059	Sumu nasatese, umu nanesootuhaꞌe ka Jew numu tumayohokuna soo oongaꞌa Jew mane, oo nakakwuse tuwazoo. Umu oo nonopuaꞌa ka oongaꞌa Zachariah mee tooe neahookwu, ka oo naa-waꞌnesoo,
42001060	pana soo Elizabeth meeoo mu netamma, “Masoo John mee naneakwu.”
42001061	Umu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “How yise John? Gi too haka u nananumu-matu John mee naneꞌa.”
42001062	Umu ka Zachariah mayutzengese, oo mi yadooꞌena, oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka u tooaꞌa naneamakakwu?”
42001063	Soo Zachariah yise punnoꞌo mu tumawahakuse pumma tu tubokwuna nekwaꞌe.
42001064	Ka pumme ooka tu gease, Zechariah yise meeoo oo-ma tubohoo, “Mooasoo masoo John mee naneꞌa.” Oꞌno yise soo Zachariah tuapa nanakahoopetuhoosoo yadooase nanesootuhikoohase mee unnewunu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
42001065	“Esoo ka Te Naa umu sootuhipu. Hownneꞌyookwu gina esoo tuhaꞌyoo?” mee umu oo nonopuaꞌamu sokwama. Gi haaꞌno oobenakwatoo mu numu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-koobatu ka oona giba-na nonobe-gaꞌyoo, ka Zachariah Elizabeth-no unu moomooatupu dooaꞌadoose oo nanatukwena, punnoꞌo meeoosoo, “Hownneꞌyookwugina oosoo tuhaꞌyoo?” Umu ka Te Naa saaꞌa ooka sootuhikwuna sopedakwadoo, soo tuhaꞌyoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma tu hee-gakwu.
42001067	Soo Zachariah ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi nanesootuhina mee unakwe,
42001068	“U, Ne Naa numme Jew numu ooosapa pumatoo nanesootuhidyina. U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ka ne namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu meeoo netammapu u ka numme wohonedu-makoo ne magwetzoikwu mee. Menoꞌo yise u ka u unnepu oo-toogoo mayohogena. U mooasoo meeoo unnepu ka Ne Pabeꞌe numme-baa petuse, oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu David mee naneadu-nagatu tsuagetu. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe unu poohagakwu
42001074	umu numme wohonedu tu pooha-ma matzooekukwu. Gi numme hemma-ma nasoosuꞌa.
42001075	U nakabetseana kaaheno ka u besa podo meadabekwu.
42001076	Yise u e tooa John, ka Te Naa yadooawabe manekwu. U ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenasoo meadabenokwu ka mu numu nemabetsea meakwu.
42001077	U meeoo ka mu numu tuukwekwu soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoina, te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tutuha te soobedyana. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baatoo taꞌya ka tabatsebooege-kwaꞌnekoo yaa teepu-koobatoo petuookwu.
42001079	Mu numu, ka togaba-witu tuigadu oosoo mu tzapoonnekukwu ka besow po, oꞌno yise soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
42001080	Soo John ka saaꞌa, ka nana manekese, ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Mana giba-ma nobe-gaꞌyoo numu-wana, ka namamakwuse mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooekwuse.
42002001	Oꞌno
42002004	Soo Joseph ka David-maꞌyoona tsuaketu tu nanamooatupu, yise ka Bethlehem numu nokatu-kwiꞌyoona kemmapu ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-koobatu. Soo Joseph ka Mary-no yise ka Nazareth
42002006	Umu yise Bethlehem-wi pepetugase, soo Mary yise naatse tooaꞌadoo. Oosoo mu oongaꞌa mu mooe tooaꞌa. Soo Mary yise wunapu-wi oo wutootase, ka pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo tzahabeku, umu ka gi hanosoo toikwuse. Mooasoo kakaaꞌnoꞌyoo soo numu pukwi tooina.
42002008	Mu seepu takonedu-matu tu seepu takoꞌne, ona sukwe puuwana.
42002009	Te Naa-baaꞌyoona mu tutakonedu-koobatoo paꞌanakwana gootabua petuse mu gootabuakupunne, yise sumuꞌyoo Te Naa tummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-gakoo-matu paꞌanakwana umu-tamme wuegena. Mu tutakonedu tubetse unu suaꞌe.
42002010	Soo Te Naa tummatzidu yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Nu besa mu tuukwegena, noꞌobatusoo numu besa masokwamakwudu.
42002011	Yaa tabeno mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nadooaꞌadoo, oona Bethlehem-witoo ka David pukwiꞌyoo kemmapu-wiꞌyoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwutu.
42002012	Mu oo sopedakwadookwu nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe, mu oo mayukwu ka oongaꞌa wunapu-wi namabutooena, pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo natzahabekute.”
42002013	Toge oꞌno, ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa tutummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo paꞌanakwana umu-baa petugonnose nanesootuhina mee unnegonno,
42002014	“U paꞌanakwatu Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa ka mu numu-matoo besa soonammena yaa teepu-koobatoo mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.”
42002015	Umu Te Naa tutummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo yise punowsoo toogoopatoosoo kodyuhoo. Mu tutakonedu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Tamme sakwa oona Bethlehem-witoo mease, oo poonne ka Te Naa tamme tuukwena.”
42002016	Mu tutakonedu yise yabesoo meaꞌase, Mary-no Joseph mayu petuga, yise ka oongaꞌa ka pookoo tukanoo-kwi oo natzahabekute.
42002017	Mu tutakonedu yise punnowsoo kodyuna, nanesootuhina mee unnemena, “Ne Naa, u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa numme sootuhipu. Numme nanasookwugi pooha namanipu poonnena ka pooha naꞌunnewunudu naka. Noꞌyoona tookwa soo ume unnepu togesapa.” Umu yise punowsoo meana mu numu tuukwemena, ka oongaꞌa tu poonnepu-witu. “Hownneꞌyookwugina soo oongaꞌa?” mee mu numu ka mu tutakonedu unnena nakadu sokwama. Soo Mary mu unnena soomayuna, yise ewa oetu soohaneyakwe.
42002021	Namewatsu tabe mease ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakapu mayohoyakwe umu ka oongaꞌa Jew numu manena tumayohokukwu. Jesus mee oo nea, ka Te Naa tummatziwabe ka toha kasa-gakoo pumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, gisoo ka Mary koheꞌa.
42002022	Soo Mary ka tu hoone manena tatukwase, yise ka Joseph-no ka tu oongaꞌa Jesus tzahedana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo memea. Ka o pepetugase, ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo memea, soo Mary waahoo weeho ka Te Naa tzademe, ka Te Naa tunetammana mayohona. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo numu mooe tooa tooe hannano pana nugatu.”
42002025	Sumuꞌyoo besaꞌyoo waꞌetse, Simeon mee naneadu, Jerusalem-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, ka tu Nanumu Magwetzoidu Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna wutooedu.
42002026	Soo Te Naa ka Simeon ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma meeoo, tuusoobedyapu-gaꞌyoo, “Gisoo u yaꞌena, u Nanumu Magwetzoikwudu poonnekwu.”
42002027	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo ka Simeon taꞌya. Oꞌno yise mu Mary-no Joseph ka Jesus tzahedana pepetuoo, ka tumayohope mayohokwuse.
42002028	Soo Simeon ka Jesus tzahedase, tu puta-wi oo hedapunnena, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiwunu mee unnewunu,
42002029	“U, Ne Naa, tubetse besaꞌyoo. Nu menoꞌo oo poonne numme-matoo u tutayana numu magwetzoikwudu. Oosoo saaꞌa mu gi Jew numu togesapa u unnepu tunedyooena yise mu Jew numu sootuhidooa. Wunaꞌme nu oo wutooꞌe, ume nakabetseana. Nu gisoo yaꞌena oo poonnekwu mee u e tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise nu besa soomanena mesoo yaꞌe, nu ka mooasoo oo poonnese.”
42002033	“Soo Simeon sumuna besa ka ne tooa-witu netamma,” mee mu Jesus naanapuaꞌamu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoopana besa oo nakasokwamakute.
42002034	Soo Simeon yise mu nanesootuhikuse, ka Mary meeoo netamma, “U tooaꞌa saaꞌa ka mu Jew numu suda tumatuguna tzapoonnekudooa, yise ka hayoo mu tusooyugwena. Umu-matu namagwetzoikwudu. Umu-matu punnoꞌo kadoo namayugwekwu umu ka oo nekwohonena. U punnoꞌo unu tutuha soonammekwu ka mu numu u tooa tumooꞌookese.”
42002036	Toge oꞌno, tubetse unu peawabe, Anna mee naneadu, umu-baa petuhoo. Soo Anna tubetse besaꞌyoo numu. Besaꞌyoo uga kooma-gana
42002037	ka tu kooma yaꞌese, unusoo besaꞌyoo ka wunaꞌme nonotsa awamooa nanesootuhiyakwe ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhidyina, nonotsa yongona tuwazoo. Ewasoo gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. Soo Anna Te Naa yadooawabe.
42002038	Ka Mary noko Joseph pu-baa pepetugase, Anna ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, “U, Ne Naa, tubetse besaꞌyoo. Yowsoo oongaꞌa te wutooena. Esoo tamme Jew numu magwetzoikwudu.”
42002039	Joseph-no Mary ka tumayohope mayohose, ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌne ka tu teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo punowsoo kodyuka, ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo.
42002040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneadu naatse manekese, unu natzooena, unu soonamme, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhaꞌe.
42002041	Nonotsa sumu tomoyina soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus naanapuaꞌamu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo memeayakwe, nananesootuhina naꞌewa tukayakwe, ka oo soomayuna, oꞌno mu Jew numu natzamaꞌwu.
42002042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tooebetse manese, sumumano waha matsebuekudu (12) tomose, umu-no mea.
42002043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus naanapuaꞌamu yise ka hemma namamakwuse, ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona memea. “Soo Jesus ka sumuna ta nananumu noko tu pupuaꞌamu-no kemma,” mee umu sokwama. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-wisoo mani. Oꞌno yongona umu oo tooꞌe kwate tu nananumu-baatu.
42002045	Pana umu-baatu kadooꞌoo. Umu yise ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kokodyuka oo watena.
42002046	Pahe tabe mease, umu oo mayu, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu naka katuna ka nanesootuhibu-witu besasoo mu tutubengayakwe.
42002047	“Esoo besa oo nakasopedakwadoona mu mesoo nanekwegeayakwe, tooe togesoo naatsepana,” mee mu nanesootuhibu numu oo soobedya.
42002048	“How manena soo Jesus mow mu numu tunedyooedu yadooe katu?” mee oo naanapuaꞌamu sokwama. Soo oo pea yise meeoo oo netamma, “Manatu tooe numme u tooꞌe wate. U sakwa uga gi ꞌyoo suda ne matugupana.”
42002049	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegease meeoo, “How yise manena mu e tooꞌe wate? Mu mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo nu yaa E Naa-baa oo nakabetseana.”
42002050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe naanapuaꞌamu oo unnena gi nakasopedakwatoo.
42002051	Umu yise ka Nazareth mee naneadu-kwitoo punowsoo kodyuka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu naanapuaꞌamu besa nakabetsea.
42002052	Nanakese unu soonamme manepetu soo Te Naa besa oo soobedya, mu numu punnoꞌo.
42003001	Ka saaꞌa soo John
42003003	Soo John yise ka giba-maꞌyoo wuekese, ka baa hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-kumi meadabena, mu numu maꞌemukwapu mu nanekwaha tuungu. “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu,” mee mu netamma. Ka mu nanekwahakese, soo John yise baa-wi mu matzakakwu.
42003004	Soo John ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu pumme waha-kwaꞌne manakwe. Isaiah meeoo tubotugu. “Mana ka gi hemma nadukadu naa-wiꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi mu numu tunesootabuekwu, ‘Mu sakwa muusoo namabetseapunne ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwunoꞌoto. Mu sakwa kaaheno tuusooyugwepunne, oꞌno mu besa oo nakabetseanokwu.’
42003005	Menoꞌo mu numu ka unu nanakwohonedu sutakoo podo meꞌa. Nanekwahase, ka po kaaheno mayugwe. Soo Te Naa ka numu besa mayugwekese, mu oo nagenokwu. Soo Te Naa ka giba wuwutaꞌnena kaaheno mayugwese, mu tutuaga kwakwabedu kaanokukese, mu numu yise kaaheno oo podokoo besa meadabekwu.
42003006	Noꞌobatusoo numu yise oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoaꞌe.”
42003007	Soo John ka mu numu pu-baa petudu mee netamma yakwe, “Mu unu etzaꞌa. Saaꞌa soo mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu baa-wi mumme e matzaka tuungu, pana mu gi ka mu tumaꞌemukwapu nematzagakwunaꞌe.
42003008	Mu mooeꞌugasoo sakwa ka suta mu manena tubetse maꞌwukase, ka besa-tamme manese, oꞌno sakwa yise nu baa-wi mu matzakakwu. Gi besa nasooyugwena mee unnegonnopana, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Naa doodooamu, numme ka Jew numuna.’ Mu tookwa gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa tooe hownnekoo tooe tu doodooamu mu mesoo mayugwe.
42003009	Mu sakwa besa tumatugu. Mu ka ooosapa gi besa tumatuguna mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Tooe haga tooe gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo natunikwu.”
42003010	Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakana oo tubengu, “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa tumatugumo?”
42003011	Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka tutuha manedu tummatzi. Tamme ka waha-batu hemma hee-gana sakwa sumuoo ka numu gi hee-gakoo gea. Ka tukapu-gana tamme sakwa mu tseagoedu maka.”
42003012	Mu tumasumudoodu ka John-baa petuse baa-wi oo namatzaga tuunguna. “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa tumatuguyi?” mu numu mee oo tutubengu.
42003013	Soo John mu nanekwegea, “Mu ka mu tumasumutoona suuꞌmu haneyi.”
42003014	Mu tukwutumadu punnoꞌo oo tutubengu, “Hownnekoo sakwa numme besa natumunagakuna suuꞌmu oo natubesatuka?” Soo John mee mu nanekwegeana, “Mu sakwa gi mu numu nesuana hemma puma mu tumuna hanepana. Mu sakwa gi mu numu nemooagana mu esayikupana.”
42003015	Mooasoo mu Jew numu oo sopedakwatoo ka tooe hannano tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nanepetuna umu yise ka John Te Pabeꞌe mee sooyugwe.
42003016	Soo John ka mu sokwamapunnena sopedakwadoona mee mu netamma, “Nu gi Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu gi oo-waꞌne unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Nu baa-wi numu sukwe matzakayakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nuga ooonakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo nuga ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu oosoo suda mu manena mu nematzagakuse mu gi tunakabetseadu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
42003017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe petuse ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu nemadabuedooa ka mu bebesow ka suta-nagakoo tzobadooa. Ka bebesow numu yise Te Naa nobe-kwi mu nabaaꞌyookukwu. Ka sutakoo numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tubetse gi tokedu goso-witoo maꞌanakwunikwu.”
42003018	Meeoonekoo soo John ka oꞌnosoo ooosapa numu tunedyooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu.
42003019	Soo John ka mu numu baa-wi matzadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo oo-baa petugase yise baa-wi namatzaka. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhiwunu, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha paꞌanakwana kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo punoonooe yotsekwuge-kwaꞌne yise oonaga manipetu. Soo Te Naa paꞌanakwana yadooase, mee unne, “U yow E Besaa Tooa, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu unu u soopedyana besa u-matoo soonamme.” Ka saaꞌa soo mu Jew numu-kooba numu nehane katudu Herod mee naneadu gi togeꞌyoo nana. Tu pabeꞌe nodukwa, Herodias mee naneadu, oo-makoo tsakahoose oo nodukwadoo. Soo John ka Herod manena nesootuꞌadyaꞌena mee oo netamma, “U sakwa gi ewa suda tumatugupana. U sakwa gi uga ka u pabeꞌe nodukwa nodukwadoopana.” Soo Herod gi oo nakabetsebena nanahanoꞌobasoo ka John wutuma tuunguna.
42003023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pahemano (30) tommo manepetuse numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe maneka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Joseph tooa mee mu numu-matu unakwe. Soo Joseph naa Heli mee naneꞌa.
42003024	Soo Heli naa Matthat mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthat naa Levi mee naneꞌa. Soo Levi naa Melchi mee naneꞌa. Soo Melchi naa Jannai mee naneꞌa. Soo Jannai naa Joseph mee naneꞌa.
42003025	Soo Joseph naa Mattathias mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattathias naa Amos mee naneꞌa. Soo Amos naa Nahum mee naneꞌa. Soo Nahum naa Esli mee naneꞌa. Soo Esli naa Naggai mee naneꞌa.
42003026	Soo Naggai naa Maath mee naneꞌa. Soo Maath naa Mattathias mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattathias naa Semein mee naneꞌa. Soo Semein naa Josech mee naneꞌa. Soo Josech naa Joda mee naneꞌa.
42003027	Soo Joda naa Joanan mee naneꞌa. Soo Joanan naa Rhesa mee naneꞌa. Soo Rhesa naa Zerubbabel mee naneꞌa. Soo Zerubbabel naa Shealtiel mee naneꞌa. Soo Shealtiel naa Neri mee naneꞌa.
42003028	Soo Neri naa Melchi mee naneꞌa. Soo Melchi naa Addi mee naneꞌa. Soo Addi naa Cosam mee naneꞌa. Soo Cosam naa Elmadam mee naneꞌa. Soo Elmadam naa Er mee naneꞌa.
42003029	Soo Er naa Joshua mee naneꞌa. Soo Joshua naa Eliezer mee naneꞌa. Soo Eliezer naa Jorim mee naneꞌa. Soo Jorim naa Matthat mee naneꞌa. Soo Matthat naa Levi mee naneꞌa.
42003030	Soo Levi naa Simeon mee naneꞌa. Soo Simeon naa Judah mee naneꞌa. Soo Judah naa Joseph mee naneꞌa. Soo Joseph naa Jonam mee naneꞌa. Soo Jonam naa Eliakim mee naneꞌa.
42003031	Soo Eliakim naa Melea mee naneꞌa. Soo Melea naa Menna mee naneꞌa. Soo Menna naa Mattatha mee naneꞌa. Soo Mattatha naa Nathan mee naneꞌa. Soo Nathan naa David mee naneꞌa.
42003032	Soo David naa Jesse mee naneꞌa. Soo Jesse naa Obed mee naneꞌa. Soo Obed naa Boaz mee naneꞌa. Soo Boaz naa Salmon mee naneꞌa Soo Salmon naa Nahshon mee naneꞌa.
42003033	Soo Nahshon naa Amminadab mee naneꞌa. Soo Amminadab naa Ram mee naneꞌa. Soo Ram naa Hezron mee naneꞌa. Soo Hezron naa Perez mee naneꞌa. Soo Perez naa Judah mee naneꞌa.
42003034	Soo Judah naa Jacob mee naneꞌa. Soo Jacob naa Isaac mee naneꞌa. Soo Isaac naa Abraham mee naneꞌa. Soo Abraham naa Terah mee naneꞌa. Soo Terah naa Nahor mee naneꞌa.
42003035	Soo Nahor naa Serug mee naneꞌa. Soo Serug naa Reu mee naneꞌa. Soo Reu naa Peleg mee naneꞌa. Soo Peleg naa Eber mee naneꞌa. Soo Eber naa Shelah mee naneꞌa.
42003036	Soo Shelah naa Cainan mee naneꞌa. Soo Cainan naa Arphaxad mee naneꞌa. Soo Arphaxad naa Shem mee naneꞌa. Soo Shem naa Noah mee naneꞌa. Soo Noah naa Lamech mee naneꞌa.
42003037	Soo Lamech naa Methuselah mee naneꞌa. Soo Methuselah naa Enoch mee naneꞌa. Soo Enoch naa Jared mee naneꞌa. Soo Jared naa Mahalaleel mee naneꞌa. Soo Mahalaleel naa Cainan mee naneꞌa.
42003038	Soo Cainan naa Enos mee naneꞌa. Soo Enos naa Seth mee naneꞌa. Soo Seth naa Adam mee naneadu. Ka Adam yise soo Te Naa manumudoopu.
42004001	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe ka Jordan hooodu-kumabaꞌyoona mea. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha numu-wanatoo oo tayana oo nanesootuhi tuunguna.
42004002	Saaꞌa yise soo sutaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa nanamanena nasootzaꞌme ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana. U sakwa eka tupe tukaba mayugwe, oꞌno u oo mesoo tuka.”
42004004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nakabetseana, mee unakwe, “Soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Tukapu nadukana suuꞌmu gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ Soo Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu numu magwetzoi.”
42004005	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise paꞌatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bikase, oo tzapoonnekute noꞌyoona nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo numu ka teepu-koobatu.
42004006	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise meeoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo nuka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu e moohe tuungu, umu yise noꞌyoona e nakabetseakwu.
42004007	U ka nu-matoo nanesootuhina, nu ume mu nakabetsea tuungukwu.”
42004008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Sutakoo netamma, “Nu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnepu mee mooasoo nabotugu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi, ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.’ “
42004009	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo bika. Paꞌatseꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kooba oo wunu tuunguse, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U sakwa nanamanena u ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana. U sakwa ma-koobaꞌyoona nadawunihoo.
42004010	Oꞌno soo Te Naa u magwetzoikwu oosoo ka meeoo nabotuguna, ‘Soo Te Naa umu pumme tummatzidu u mabetsea tuungu.
42004011	U gi tupe-ma tukwutzaꞌnge-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka u tsipunnena.’ “
42004012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Sutakoo meeoo netamma, “Nu gi umu unnena nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo ka meeoo nabotuguna. ‘Tamme gi ka Te Naa mapoonne, haꞌoo sakwa oosoo mani mee sokwamana.’ “
42004013	Soo Sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baaꞌyoona meahoo. “Sumuna penakwasoo nu ka Mu Pabeꞌe makwuhookwu,” mee soonammena.
42004014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punowsoo kodyuka ka pummesoo teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka meadabena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe mea ka Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona tuwow. Noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu mu numu oo nanatuukweꞌe yise mee nanaꞌunakweꞌe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse unu besow pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
42004016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nazareth pukwi tu namananana-wisoo petuga. Ka nanesootuhi tabeba oe manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-baa nanesootuhi petuga ka ooosapa maneyina.
42004017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise natunea tuungu. Oosoo yise wunuoohoo. Umu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu tubona nakea. Oo tsakwunowse oo-toogoo tu poonnemese ka oo mayuse ooka mu neakutu mee naꞌunnedu.
42004018	“Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma e sootuhipu ka umu tutuha manedu gi how mane-waꞌne manepunnedu numu tu unnepu e tuukwe tuunguna. Ka Te Naa Pesa Pooha-ma ka mu nanasuda tu tumatugumasoo tzangedu umuoo suda tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu. Mu gi tutubootabuedu-kwaꞌne manepunnedu nu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu. Yise mu numu mukwapunnedu numu nanasuda namatugudu,
42004019	nu besa tuukwekwu. ‘Menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.’ “
42004020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo neamakwuse o ka pumatoo a natubona mabutooese punowsoo ka tu tummatzidu geasoo yise ka numu tunedyooedu katunoo-wi katuhoo. Noꞌyoona numu yise oo nakapunne.
42004021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yow menoꞌo soo oꞌnosoo a unnepu oo-toogoo manekena. Mu muusoo namakoo a poonne.”
42004022	“Soo Jesus nanabesa yadooapana masoo tamme-matusoo, masoo Joseph tooa. Haꞌoo yise masoo besa yadooꞌa?” Meeꞌe noꞌyoona mu tunakapunnedu nananetamma.
42004023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu sumuna meeoo e netammakwu, ‘Mooasoo numme oo naka u ewow numu magwetzoikena ka Capernaum mee naneadu wiꞌyoona. U sakwa yaanona ka umesoo numu mabetsea,’ mee sumuna mu e netammakwu.
42004024	Nu mu tuukwekwu mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa yadooawabe etzaga nakaꞌoedyuku pana mu oogowsoo nanumu oo nopuaꞌamu-no gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42004025	Ka tubetse oꞌnosoo oo namanepu-waꞌne, wunaꞌme (3 ½) tomopu gi tu powꞌma, ewaꞌyoo Jew numu natseagoe. Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew pepeawabe tu koomamu tuipu punnoꞌo tseagoe
42004026	pana soo Te Naa gi mu maka. Soo Te Naa ka wawaꞌa peawabe
42004027	Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu unu tookoo peheꞌuagoedu pana soo Te Naa gi ka Elisha umuoo mabesaku tuungu. Soo Te Naa ka Elisha ka wawaꞌa tookoo pehe uayidu Naaman mee naneadu mabesaku tuungu. Soo Te Naa ka umu wakwawaꞌa etzaga tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu, gi mumme gi tutunakaꞌoedyukudu.”
42004028	Mu numu ka meeoo oo unakwe oo sutakuse yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo oo tayahoo. Yise oona wutaꞌne-matoo oo tzakakase ka oo batsowkwuse.
42004030	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tasegeyidoo meahoose mu namatsatsepooge, yise kokodyuka.
42004031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wi petuga. Toge, oꞌno mu nanesootuhigonno tabeno umu-baa petuga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe petugase, ka besowsoo ka Te Naa-witu mu numu tunedyooewunu.
42004032	Mu numu yise oo nesookwugaꞌe oosoo tubetse besa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu wahamena, “Yow tookwa esoo Te Pabeꞌe,” meeꞌe mu numu.
42004033	Sumuꞌyoo nana tsoapayidu oe. Soo tsoapa waꞌagena ewa unnewunu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netammabodote.
42004034	“Uda! U haaꞌa kadoo e mayugwekwu? U sakwa ne tsasoopedya. Nu u sopedakwatoo, u Jesus, ka Noꞌoko Hemma Manumudoopu Besaa Tooaꞌa.”
42004035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo meeoo oo netamma, “Gi unnepana, managaꞌyoona tzebooegea.” Soo tsoapa ka oo-nagaꞌyoona tsebooegease, ka nana wunapowkase sapa oosoo gi namanayaha.
42004036	Mu numu yise mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Uuneꞌyoo! Tamme haꞌyoo gi hannanoꞌo besa mownnekoo poohabe poonnedu. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo, sukwe yadooase sapa.”
42004037	Mu numu otuoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe manipu poonnedu nanatuukwekooha ka saaꞌa yise ewaꞌyoo numu otuoo nanakwingadu oo nanatuukwegonno.
42004038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse oeꞌyoona mease, ka Simon Peter-baa petuga. Soo Simon Peter yahe peawabe unu tuoeyaꞌena oo tookoo unu udutuna onahoo hape. Umu o nobe-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe oetu tuukweꞌe.
42004039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo-baa wunu petugase meeoo oo netamma, “U mooasoo besa mani.” Oosoo peawabe yise yotseoose, mu tugoomahanekuhoose, mu tuka tuunguhoo.
42004040	Oogowsoo yongona tu taba egowse, mu numu nanaꞌatakoosoo tutuꞌoe-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa natzato petudyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-ma pooha matugumena mu mabesakumena
42004041	mu tsoapagoedu nokosoo. Mu tsoapa yise mee unnegayakwe, “U yaahoo ka Noꞌokosoo Hemma Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tsoapa tayayakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi ooka mu wahakwuna petzape, ka pumme mu sopedakwatoona. Ka mu tsoapa tsebooegeayakwe, mu tsoapagoedu numu yise besa maniyakwe.
42004042	Oogow mooꞌa awamooa soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona numu-wanatoo mea. Saaꞌa mu numu yise oo watena, oo mayuse, oo tooꞌe nabaaꞌyoo tuungu.
42004043	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu sukwe netamma, “Mu numu manatooe nonobe-gakoo, nu ka Te Naa tamme mabetseakwuna-witu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu ekow nanesootuhibu tunedyooe.’ “
42004044	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona ka mu numu tuukweꞌemena, yise mu nanesootuhi-wiꞌyoona tuwazoo.
42005001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka banunadu Gennesaret mee naneadu-kumaba wununa, ewow numu Te Naa unnepu tunedyooedyakwe. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo naꞌoonnakwi manepunne ka Te Naa unnepu soonakana.
42005002	Wahaꞌyoo sake o. Mooasoo soo mu tuukwidu Simon mee naneadu-no ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooese, ka puma tu tuukwina tzabazagadyakwe.
42005003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon sake-wi tsebooese, oo natzemange tuungu sagwane ka bakumanatoo. Oꞌno oweoo ka sake-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe katuna ka Te Naa unnepu numu tunedyooe.
42005004	Ka mu numu yadooemakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon mee netamma, “U sakwa ma tookapu baa-ga-witoo natsenooyooe ka puma mu tuukwina ka baa-witoo tzasawekuse, mama tuukwina tutzakadukooha.”
42005005	Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu u nakabetseakwu tooe mooasoo numme togawano tooꞌe tuukwise sapa gi hemma tzakuꞌa.” Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma-kwitu wukwihoo.
42005006	Tubetse ewaꞌyoo pakwe yise natzakadu, soo puma mu tuukwina yise natakebuꞌe.
42005007	Umu ka mu tu pupuaꞌamu James noko John
42005008	Soo Simon Peter ka tu pupuaꞌamu James, John-no yise, oꞌno oo pudu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gana, umu ka ewow pakwe mu tuukwina poonnese, soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha mee unnewunu, “Uda! Nu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwanummedu. U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U sakwa gi nu tzageꞌe manepana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Peter netamma, “Gi nu-ma suipana. Wunaꞌme u pakwe-ganummedu. U sakwa nu-ma tsabegase ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tunedyooemea e tummatzina.”
42005011	Umu yise noꞌyoona ka bakumana petuse, Simon, James yise John noꞌoko ka tu hemma matusookwunise ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu mane.
42005012	Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meana ka numu nogadu-kwi petuga. Sumuꞌyoo nana unu tookoo uayidu onona, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo nanetsagwayina meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa e mabesaku ka meeoo soonammena.”
42005013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise oo-ma pooha matuguse mee oo netamma, “Nu u mabesakukwu, u besa manekwu.
42005014	Ka besa manese. U sakwa ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe natzapoonnekuse ka Moses tamme tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa tuwuniku ka te tookoo uayina namabesaku-kwitoo. Gi saaꞌa mu numu tuukwepana ka ume e mabesakuna.”
42005015	Ooonneꞌyoopana soo nana ka besa manise ka mu numu tuukwekooha ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, yise ewaꞌyoo numu tuoegoedu oo takoona petu ka besa tu manekwuna sookwina.
42005016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise kwingaꞌa numu-wanatoo mease nanesootuhaꞌe.
42005017	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu tunedyooedyina ka Te Naa-witu. Susumudu naana ka mu numu Jew tumayohona numu tunedyooedu, susumudu yise mu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu mana kwingaꞌakwitu
42005018	Huuꞌyoo nanana kapa-wikoo ka gi yutsungadu numu tzakwuhuna petuga. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo napoohameapana,
42005019	ewow numu ka nobe-wikoo umu gi hownnekoo oe tzoonooꞌa. Umu yise ka nobe-kooba tupoyase oo-koobatu tzatawagase ka kapa-nokosoo tobongo ka tuoeyaedu tzakweku ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobenatoo.
42005020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu nanana puu-ma unu nasoonatzaꞌe yise ka gi yutsungadu nana meeoo netamma, “E puaꞌa, nu ka u tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.”
42005021	Umu Jew numu tunedyooedu mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-no o aatadu mee tusooyugwe manepunne, “Esoo hayoo suda naꞌunnedu unni. Masoogina Te Naa mee nasooyugwe. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
42005022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwa pana mu oo poonnekwu ka eka nana e mabesakuse.
42005024	Mu yise oo sopedakwadookwu nu eka teepu-kooba ookow poohabe hee-gaꞌyoo ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana e soomuꞌwana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana gi yotsungadu meeoo netamma, “Wunuoose ka u kapa nobe-witoo tzakwuka.”
42005025	Soo nana ka tu kapa tzakwuhuna nobe-kwitoosoo meana, ooosapa meeoo unnenoꞌo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
42005026	Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sooꞌoedyukuna meeoo punnoꞌo, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme nanabesa namanedu yaa tabeno poonne. Numme gi hannanoꞌo yooonnekoo poohabe poonnedu.”
42005027	Sumuꞌyoo nana Levi mee naneadu ka oonow putoogoo numu tzoonooadyakwe mu numu tunekwina tumasumudoodyakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oetoo meana ka o oo katu oo poonnese yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa umu-no nu-no manenumme.”
42005028	Soo Levi yotseoose, oo-no tzabeka.
42005029	Ka Levi nobe-wiꞌyoona paba natabetuka yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Levi nobe-witoo oo-no mea mu Pharisee mee nananeadu tuka. Ewaꞌyoo numu tumasumudoodu o, tumaꞌemukwadu mee nananeadu umu-no tuka.
42005030	Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe umu-no tuka oo poonnese, ka umu oo nakatzimodu nesootzemana meeoo mu netamma, “Umu gi toge manakwe umu-no tuka, umu tumasumudoodu mu nanumu suda dyugwedu.”
42005031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo unnena nakase, meeoo yise unakwe, “Nu yaa ka teepu-kooba namanumudoopu ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu Te Naa-witu tuukwekwuse. Ka mumme mooasoo besa nasooyugwedu numu nu gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42005033	Umu Pharisee nanesootuhidu naana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu John nakatzimodu ka numme Pharisee-no gi tukapana nanesootuhiyakwe. How yise umu ume nakatzimodu gi punnoꞌo ooosoo tumatugu?”
42005034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu togesoo umu-noꞌyoona, pudu nodukwadoodu-kwaꞌne umu puu ka nananoꞌyoona besa sokwama.
42005035	Pana pudusoo nu gi umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa umu e nakatzimodu gi tukapana nanesootuhikwu.”
42005036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunedyooena mee tuwazoo mu tuukwe, “Ka oohoo a manepunne mu gi hownnekoo ka mu numu pudu tumayohope noꞌoko ka mumme putoogoo mooa tumayohope-noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo. U pudu wanapu ka mooa wanapu-ma dotsanase, oosoo gi toge tubuakwu.
42005037	Mu gi hownnekoo eka mumme pudu natunetammakuna ka mooa tumayohope noko mayua-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42005039	Pana mu numu ka mumme e pudu tumayoho tuunguna gi nakabetzape. Mu ka mummesoo mooa tumayohona soonoyugwena. Mu ka mooatupu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebedu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu gi pudu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa petzape oosoo meeoo, ‘Soo mooatupu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa besa kamma.’ “
42006001	Ka tu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu-no oona tubewabe-too meana unu tseagoena ka tumasuape-matu mabokamena oo mahangena o tukamena esoo mooasoo natumayohodu.
42006002	Mu Jew numu nananesootuhidu, Pharisee mee nananeadu, mu poonnena, ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Umu u nakatzimodu ka te Jew tumayohona gi heesoobedya. Umu ka tumasuape mahanegena oo tukana esoo nanesootuhi tabeba gi numu hemma how yukwenoꞌo. Esoo tamme Jew numu mooa tumayohona, oꞌno nanesootuhi tabeno gi numu hemma how yukwenoꞌo ꞌyoo manakwe.”
42006003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa uga oo nea ka oꞌnosoo soo besa tamme-kooba katukwudu, David mee naneadu, punnoꞌo ka te Jew tumayohona takopapu tu pupauꞌamu-no ka tseagoena.
42006004	Soo David ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka pooha tukaba tuka, umu nanesootuibu numu tunedyooedu suuꞌmu tukana. Oosoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi hownneꞌyoo.”
42006005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka mu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu nemadabuekwu.”
42006006	Ka tu nanesootuhi tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nanesootuhidu-baa petugase Te Naa-witu mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Sumuꞌyoo nana tumadinakwatu tu mi pasatopoꞌnepu gi mayutsungadu oe numu-no.
42006007	Umu Pharisee nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, mu Jew nanana Pharisee mee naneadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe besa eyaꞌepunne oo sookwahaꞌyoo howga saaꞌa ekow nana oo mabesakudooa. Oꞌno tabeno gi hemma how nuugwenoꞌo, ooka saaꞌa how kadooꞌoo oo mayugwekudooa.
42006008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo tusooyugwena sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Yaatoo kemma.” Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo meahoo.
42006009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme poonnepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Ka pabow tabeba-wi gi hemma how nuugweno, oꞌno haaꞌa sutaꞌyoo? Yise oꞌno tabeba haaꞌa mu gi haꞌyoo oo sooyukwe oꞌno haaꞌa mu gi namabesakupana gi hownneꞌyoo? Oꞌno haaꞌa ka pabow mu tabebanoꞌo, yaꞌepana gi hownneꞌyoo?”
42006010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu poohwise yise ka gi mayutsungadu meeoo netamma, “Matuhe.” Oosoo yise matuhe oo mi namabesakuhoopu.
42006011	Umu tunesootzemadu sutaꞌa yise nanano mee tunehane, “Tamme sakwa ka Jesus batsa.” meeꞌe.
42006012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oona giba-matoo mease togawano nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo.
42006013	Ookow mooa awamooa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu namatoo baꞌe. Sumu manoꞌyoona wahamatsebooekudu (12) umu-nagatu netutzea tu yadooawabe manekwudu. Umu mee nananeꞌa:
42006014	Simon, soo Te Pabeꞌe Peter mee ookow neaꞌa; Andrew, Peter pabeꞌe, James, John, Philip, Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthew, James, oo naa Alphaeus mee naneadu, Simon, numu-no watze nagoedu mee tuwazoo naneadu, Judas ookow naa James mee naneꞌa,
42006016	Soo Judas punnoꞌo saaꞌa ka tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nemanekukwudu.
42006017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka giba-maꞌyoona wuekese, oo tookanakwa yamoso-wi petugonnohoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe petudyipunne ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa
42006018	Susumudu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakahooyapunnedu, susumudu tuoegoedu natzatogedu, mu tsoapagoedu punnoꞌo oo-baa natzatodu.
42006019	Noꞌyoona mu tuoegoedu natzatodu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzamadyakwe ka oo pooha noꞌoko numu mabesakute.
42006020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Tooe tamme ka menoꞌo tutuha manepana nasootuhaꞌe, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa yise unusoo te mabetseakwu.
42006021	Tooe tamme ka menoꞌo tseagoepana nasootuhaꞌe, saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona gi tutuugekwu. Tooe tamme yaano ka suda sokwamapana nasootuhikwu, saaꞌa tamme Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa sokwamakwu.
42006022	Mu ka mu numu mumme gi petzabena gi too mu-no mu napuaꞌana, nanasuda nu-koobatoo mumme tu netamma sapa gi suda sokwamapana mu besa nasootuhikwu.
42006023	Mu sakwa gi oo nasoomenakwapana tooe how mumme tu yugwe, mumme suda tu netamma sapa. Mu ka saaꞌa Te Naa-baa petugase unusoo besa nasootuhikwu. Mu nanamooatupu puu mu Te Naa yadooawabe nanasuda matugu pana, menoꞌo yise umu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona besa sokwama, ka besa pumme tu sootuhise.
42006024	Pana soo tooe haga tooe ka menoꞌo besa manepunne ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ookowsoo nasootamana, gi haꞌyoo sokwamana, gi hemma toge soobedyana, umuoo gi nasootuhikwu, ka mooasoo umu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa sokwamana.
42006025	Mu ka menoꞌo mu hee-gana paba sooyugwena oosoosoo mu takonepunnena mu gi hownnekoo nasootuhaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42006026	Mu ka mu numu besa mu nemadabuena petukuna, ka saaꞌa mu gi nasootuhikwu. Mu numu puu ooosapa ka mu yaahoo Te Naa yadooawabe meeꞌe mumme tu nemooaka mu besa mu sooyugwe.
42006027	Pana nu mu tuukwekwu tamme sakwa te wohomu besa soobedya yise besa mu matugu tooe umu gi te soobedya sapa.
42006028	Ka tamme mu nekusegea, tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi besow umutoo nekwina.
42006029	Nu mu tuukwekwu tooe suda tamme tu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa gi umu-no nagoepana. Ka sumunakwatu te soba namatakeꞌehoose, tamme sakwa oo sukwe tutzomunaku. Oꞌno oosoo ka sumunakwatu matakeꞌyookwu tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa ka numu nakutzikuna gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakuna, oosoo ka te kwasu kwuse sapa, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme te wunagapu oo gease tuwazoo. Ka mu numu hemma tamme mu natuungu, tamme sakwa mu gea.
42006032	Soo Te Naa gi besaꞌyoo numu mee te neakwu tamme ka sukwe numu tamme besa soobedyadu besa soobedyana. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu puu besa nanasoobedya.
42006033	Tamme gi besa manakwe ka besa te matugudu suuꞌmu besa matuguna. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pana besa mesoo nanamatugu. Tamme sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu unu soobedya ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoona.
42006034	Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tamme nagutzikudu suuꞌmu tummatzina, tamme tookwa gi besa manakwe. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu puu nanatummatzaꞌe ka punowsoo oo namakodyukwuna sopedakwatoona.
42006035	Tamme sakwa te wohomu besa soobedya, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu. Tamme ka Te Naa tamme-koobatu-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa numu sootuhi tooe gi besa mu tumatugu sapa.
42006036	Soo Te Naa puu tutuha numu soobedya, tamme sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo.
42006037	Gi tunesootzemapana, gi tuwazoo suda numu netammapana, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te sooyugwekwu. Tamme ka mu numu suda tamme matukupu soomuꞌwase, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.
42006038	Tamme ka mu numu tummatzina, soo Te Naa ookow punowsoo te makodyukukwu.
42006039	Tamme sakwa unu besa a nakaduguse, oꞌno tamme kukummaꞌakoosoo mesoo tunedyooꞌe. Tamme ka gi hemma nakasopedakwadoopana numu tooꞌe tunedyooena, soo numu puu gi tubootabuena kummaꞌakoosoo gi tubootabuedu numu tzakadu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Umu nanosoo a tawaga-kwitoo sawehookwu.
42006040	Soo numu tunedyooedu ka natunedyooedu ooonakwasoo tusopedakwatoo. Pana tamme ka noꞌokosoo hemma natunedyooese, tamme ka numu tunedyooedu-kwaꞌnesoo tusopedakwadookwu.
42006041	Tamme sakwa gi te puaꞌa nesagwikupana, ka sagwane oo tumaꞌemukwase. Tamme sumuna ookow ooonakwasoo tumaꞌemukwa. Hownnekoo yise mu ka mu puaꞌa pooe-wikoo tuutsekoo hemma mesoo poonne ka mummesoo pooe-wi hemma egease sapa. Mooeꞌugasoo mu sakwa mummesoo pooe-witu tzatsebooase, oꞌno mu yaatu poonnena, ka mu puaꞌa mesoo tummatzaꞌe. Ooosoo sakwa mu ka suda mu tumatuguna yugwese, oꞌno mu ka mu pupuaꞌamu mesoo tummatzaꞌe.
42006043	Noꞌobatusoo tumasuape tu tupooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo suakute. Mu tumasuape ka besaꞌhoo a pooe-nakwana suaketu besaꞌyoo. Mu sutakoo tsaꞌabu pooe-nakwana suaketu-kwaꞌne, mu punnoꞌo gi besaꞌyoo.
42006044	Noꞌobatusoo tumasuape ka pummesoo pooe-kwaꞌnesoo suaketu.
42006045	Soo numu ka tumasuape-kwaꞌnesoo tu mane-makoo nasopedakwadookwu, tooe haꞌoo soo numu ka besaꞌyoona tooetoo sutaꞌyoona.
42006046	Mu ka ‘Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ meeꞌe natubangana mu sakwa e nakabetseayi.
42006047	Ka besa e nakatumayohokudu nu tuukwekwu.
42006048	Tupe-kooba besa nobe-toodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu ohobu gi namanabue oo matabue. Tooe baa unu hooꞌoo ka teepu putoohakwitu patokwanawunu sapa gi anoꞌa, oosoo ka besa namadabuepuna.
42006049	Mu numu ka e unnena nakapana gi oo nakatumayohodu, ka nana tu nobe teepu-kooba oo sagwa matabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo oo nobe-toona ka baa unu hoo petuse kadooꞌoo o patadyoomedikuoo.
42007001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu ewow numu tunedyooemakwuse, oeꞌyoona mease, ka Capernaum mee naneadu-wisoo kodyu petuga.
42007002	Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu wawaꞌa gi Jew numu, sumuoo ka pumme tummatzidu-matu unu soobedya. Oosoo oo tummatzidu unu tuoeyina, yaꞌegaꞌa.
42007003	Soo wawaꞌa gi Jew nana ka Te Pabeꞌe onow pupaa petugana nakase, mu Jew numu moohedu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taya, oo bina ka pumme tummatzidu oo mabesaku tuunguna.
42007004	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase, mee oo netamma, “U sakwa eka wawaꞌa nana tummatzi.
42007005	Soo wawaꞌa nana tamme Jew numu unu soobedyana, ka te nanesootuhi nobe te matabuekupu.”
42007006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-no mease ka wawaꞌa nana nobe tzageꞌe mu manigase, soo tukwutumadu moohedu tu pupuaꞌamu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo taya mee oo netammana, “Nu sukwe wawaꞌa. Mu Jew numu numme wakwawaꞌa nuutumooedu. U sakwa gi ne nobe-kwi egeapana, gi hownneꞌyoo.
42007007	Nu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoona, gi u-matoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu u sooꞌoedyukute u sukwe yadooahoose, oosoo e tummatzidu besa manekwu.
42007008	Nu punnoꞌo ka numu nanemadunagadyina sopedakwadoo. Nu puu ka nu-koobatusoo unnetoosoo manakwe.”
42007009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakase, mee ka ewow numu netamma, “Yow yise soo nana tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Tooe gi tamme Jew numu-matu pana unu tunakaꞌoedyukute.”
42007010	Ka tukwutumadu moohedu pupuaꞌamu ka oo nobe-witoo kodyukase, soo oo tummatzidu mooasoo besa manepu.
42007011	Oogow moooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu-no yise ewaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo umu-no ka Nain mee naneadu-kwitoo kemmana.
42007012	Sumuꞌyoo tooebetse ka mogoꞌne penebe dooa yaꞌe. Soo oo pea oꞌnosoo tu kooma yaꞌekupu. Ewaꞌyoo umu oo pea nonopuaꞌamu oo-no mea ka tu tooa oo nomatugugakwuse.
42007013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wegease
42007014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka yaꞌedu tzamahoose, mu oo tzagwuudu yise konno pebuꞌahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌepu tooebetseꞌe mee netamma, “Yotsehoo.”
42007015	Soo tooebetse katuhoose yadooakooha. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punowsoo nobe-kwitoo mu taya.
42007016	Mu numu o konnopunnedu meeoo nanaꞌunnekooha, “Uune! Esoo togesapa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina, eka unu pooha-gakoo tu yadooawabe, tamme-matoo tayapu.”
42007017	Mu numu yise oo nanatuukwekooha ka Te Pabeꞌe manipu, oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobakwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu naka, mu numu mana tzatzageꞌe-witu teepu-gaꞌyoo tooe.
42007018	Mu John pupuaꞌamu ka John tuukweꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitu.
42007019	Waahoo pumme pupuaꞌamu-matu soo John taya ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo. Soo John mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka Jesus tutubenga, ‘U haaꞌa yow Te Pabeꞌe, pute soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu?’ “
42007021	Ka oo-baa pepetugase, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo tuoegoedu numu mabesakute: tsoapagoedu, gi tubootabuedu, tooe hownnekoo tooe tuoebu.
42007022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Mu sakwa ka John tuukwe ka mu poonnena, mu nakana tuwazoo: ka umu gi tubootabuedu numu tubootabue manese, mu toyomodu numu besa momona, mu gi nakatawagadu numu nakatage mu manese, mu numu uagoedu besa manese, mu tuipu numu namayodase, yise ka mu tutuha manedu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwe.
42007023	Pana mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi nu-ma nasookwina, mu nasootuhikwu.”
42007024	Ka mu John pupuaꞌamu kokodyukase, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka John-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe, “Ka oꞌnosoo nuga-kobenasoo, ka oona giba-ma umu uga ka John-baa petugayakwe. Soo John gi waha-tamme tusooyugwedu nana.
42007025	Soo John gi nanenagadu namasooꞌa. Pana umu gi oo-makoo oo-matoo meꞌa. Mu ka John nakapunnekwuse oo-baa petuga, soo John ka Te Naa yadooawabena. Soo John ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
42007027	Soo John ka Te Naa poenaꞌewabe. Oꞌnosoo ka John-witu nabotugu soo Te Naa mee e netamma, ‘U-kobenasoo ka teepu-koobatoo nu e poenaꞌewabe tayakwu, ka mu numu ume petukwu-kwitu oo tunesootabue tuunguna.’
42007028	Soo John noꞌoko numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Pana saaꞌa noꞌyoona numu nu-toohatu, ka John ooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu.”
42007029	Ka mu numu mu tumaꞌemukwadu mee nananeadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe John besa oo nemadabuꞌe, umu besa sokwama ka baa-wi pumme oo matzakadyakwe. Umu meeoo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
42007030	Pana umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu gi nanekwahana, ka John baa-wi namatzaka tuunguna, ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌne.
42007031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwitu mu tuukwekwu.
42007032	Mu mu doodooake-waꞌne gi besa mu pupuaꞌamu-no tuateꞌa. Mu pupuaꞌamu sumuna mee unakwe, ‘Numme mu tunekwukukwu, mu saaꞌa nugagonno. Pana mu gi nuka.’ Mu pupuaꞌamu yise mee tuwazoo mu netammakwu, ‘Numme ka suda mu sokwama, mu-no sagwikwu, pana mu gi sagwaꞌe.’
42007033	Soo John ka petuse, gi tuka, gi tuwazoo atsa baa hepe. ‘Soo John numu sukwe poohadu,’ mee mu.
42007034	Ka nuka mu-baa petugase, nu tukana, hepe, mu yise e nesootzema mee unnena, ‘Oosoo nana ewa tukana, sukwe baayina, umu tumaꞌemukwadu pupuaꞌamu-gana.’
42007035	Umu sokwamadu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoona, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee unnekwu.”
42007036	Soo nana Simon mee naneadu ka umu Pharisee mee nananeadu nanesootuhidu-nagatu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-nabatoo baꞌe, oo tuka tuunguna. Sumuꞌyoo otuoosoo mogoꞌne gi toge tumatugudu sapa tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon nobe-wiꞌyoona ka mu ewa tukana naka. Soo mogoꞌne yise besa kwanadu nakwanana tupe-ma namadabuepu osa-wi nakedadu hanena, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuhooga. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o sekedabena tukadape, soo mogoꞌne oo pepa wunuhoo petu.
42007038	Soo mogoꞌne yise yagana, ka oo kuku-koobatoo yaga pasawehoo. Yise meatzedose tu tzopuhu-ma oo mabasakuse, oo kuku mootuhikwunaꞌe, yise ka besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa oo kuku-koobatoo totsakwatese oo mawoꞌnge.
42007039	Soo Simon ka mogoꞌne yoo ka Te Pabeꞌe sootuꞌnagana poonnena oo sootuꞌadyina meeoo oo soobedya, “Esoo Jesus tookwa gi ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Masoo sakwa ka Te Naa pooha uga hee-gana soo oo pooha oo sopedakwadookwu, ka mogoꞌne sutaꞌyoona, oꞌno masoo sakwa uga gi ka mogoꞌne natzamakupana.”
42007040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Simon soonammena pooha sopedakwadoo, meeoo yise oo netamma, “Nu besasoo u tuukwekwu.” Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Haꞌyoo u e tuukwekwu?”
42007041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegease meeoo, “Wahaꞌyoo numu puu ka sumuoo numu nakutzikute. Sumuꞌyoo ewatseꞌe oo nakutzikute, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo huutseꞌe oo nakutzikute.
42007042	Umu wahaꞌyoo yise gi hownnekoo oo tumanagakute. Soo mu kutzidu yise mee mu netamma, ‘Nu ka nuka mu nakutzikuna soomuꞌwakwu.’ Hanotu umu-matu yise unu oo soobedyakwu ka besa pumme oo sootunagase?”
42007043	Soo Simon yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nanekwegeaꞌa, “Soo ewa oo nakutzikudu, mee tuwa nu.”
42007044	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne-tamme nakwumunase, ka Simon meeoo netamma, “Nu ka u-baa petuse, u puu gi ka pukwi e tabatsagakwuna e bawununakute. Esoo mogoꞌne puu ka e kuku tu yagapu-ma pakedyase yise ka tu tzopuhu-ma a mabasakute.
42007045	Esoo mogoꞌne puu ka besa nu-matoo soonammese e kuku mootuhikwunaꞌe, u puu gi e mootuhi ka haꞌoo besa nu-matoo soonammena ka e petuse.
42007046	Ka besa kwanadu nakwanana e kuku-koobatoo totsakwate e kuku onokoo mawonge u puu yoohoo-ma sapa gi e tzopuhu mahane.
42007047	Tooe masoo mogoꞌne ewa tumaꞌemukwakepana, nu yise ka oo tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwakwu, masoo ka unu e soobedyana. Nu ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwadu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa. Susumudu numu ka sagwane tumaꞌemukwana mee nasooyugwena gi unu e heesoobedya.”
42007048	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “Nu noꞌoko ume tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.”
42007049	“Haga esoo numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadu mee naneyugwedu?” mee mu numu tuka aatadu nanatubengu.
42007050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mogoꞌne meeoo netamma, “U ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukuse u namagwetzoikwu. Besa sapa manena mea.”
42008001	Ka saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mana tooe hanotoo tooe ka teepu tanamooanumme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tunedyooena, mu oo nakatzimodu ooosapa oo-nosoo;
42008002	mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo umu-no. Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne Mary Magdalene mee naneadu oo-nagakoo soo Te Pabeꞌe uga natakwatsukwuhoo (7) tsoapa tayakwunipu
42008003	yise ewaꞌyoosoo momokoꞌne
42008004	Ewaꞌyoo numu manaꞌyoona tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petudyakwe yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu yadooena, mu natugwengayakwe mee unnena,
42008005	“Soo nana tumasua-ga. Yise susumudu soo oo pooe tumasua-matu ka a nadapodo-witoo sawe mea, yise ka puuwana mu kwakwape mu numu umu-koobakwi mona mu tatuikuna umu gi naꞌa. Mu hootsebaꞌa yise punnoꞌo mu sukwe sooꞌa.
42008006	Susumudu soo oo pooe punnoꞌo unu tupe-gakwitoo sawena, yabe naahookese, yise yabe tagwazuoo ka gi baa-gana.
42008007	Susumudu a pooe punnoꞌo tsaabu-nagatoo sawehoose, soo tsaꞌabu yise umu-no naana mu tatzatsebooahoo.
42008008	Susumudu besow teepu-koobatoo sawehoose, yise besa naꞌa, nanaꞌewa pooedooꞌa. Mu sakwa besa e nakapunne.”
42008009	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise oo tubenga, “Haꞌyoo oosoo unakwe?”
42008010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa tuwatzetuguna mu tuukwekwu, mu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoona nasootuhipu; pana susumudu numu gisoo ookow nasootuhaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona nu meeoo mu natuugwengakute. Tooe mu numu e poonnepana, umu gi e posopedakwadoo. Tooe umu e nakapana, gi e nakasopedakwatoo.
42008011	Soo mu nanatugwengana meeoo, soo a pooe ka Te Naa yadooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
42008012	Susumudu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakapana gi oo ꞌoedyukuna, soo gi togeꞌyoo yise mu tzaꞌemukwana, mu natzaꞌemukwadu yise ka po-koobatoo saweoopu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, yise gi namagwetzoi.
42008013	Susumudu ka tupe-nagatoo sawehoopu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. A pooe besa oo-matoo soonamme, tamme yise tuwazoo gi tunaga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka nanewohonena, tamme yabesoo tunakaꞌoedyukumakwu.
42008014	Tamme ka a pooe mu tsaꞌabu-naga naadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, susumudu ka Te Naa unnepu nakase, ewa tu hee toowana petukute, yise gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
42008015	Pana tamme ka a pooe besow teepuna namasuadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme yise ka besow naꞌunnedu nakatuguna oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
42008016	Tamme ka tugootabuagunoo kootabuakuse hekooba oo wunakwu numu ooka poonne-kwi. Gi puu tamme hee-tooha oo watzetugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42008017	Tugootabuagunoo-waꞌnesoo sakwa tamme mu numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwe. Tamme sakwa ka ooka mu nakaꞌoedyukukwuna petsabena gi mu numu-makoo oo nekwatzetugu.
42008018	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unnena besakoo nakowꞌya. Tamme ka sagwane oo nakasopedakwadoona saaꞌa unusoo oo nakasopedakwadoo manepetugakwu. Tamme yise ka gi oo nakatuguna noꞌoko te natuukwepu soomuꞌwakwu.”
42008019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea oo wangaꞌamu-no petugonnose yise gi hownnekoo oo tzageꞌe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu tubetse ewow.
42008020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo natuukweꞌe, “U pea-no u wangaꞌamu-no mabe puuwana konnopunne, u baꞌe.”
42008021	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu meeoo netamma, “Umu sakwa tooe tuutooepunne, soo Te Naa tunetamma noko hemma ooonakwatu. Nu saaꞌa ka tunemamakwuoose, oꞌno saaꞌa nu mu tuukwedooa. Ka mu Te Naa unnepu nakabetseadu nu tubetse nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
42008022	Sumu tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no sake-wi kuaka. “Tamme sakwa ooonakwatoo ka banunadu natsemangega,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma.
42008023	Ka togesoo mu meꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe uwehooka. Unu hukwabetu. Soo sake bakaanogaꞌa umu sumuna patatsopedihookwu.
42008024	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu unu suihoose, oo netupoonne, mee oo netammana, “Tamme batatuihookwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tupoonnese, ka hukwapa meeoo netamma, “Gi hukwapana,” ka baa tuwazoo meeoo, “Gi yutsungapana.” Umu yise gi yutsungahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu nesagwikute,
42008025	“Mu sakwa uga e nakaꞌoedyuku.” Umu yise meeoo, “Uune! Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa ka baa-no a nakabetseꞌa.”
42008026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tu nakatzimodu-no yise natsemangega, ka Galilee paꞌooenapa petuga, ka teepu Gerasenes mee naneadu-wi petu.
42008027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oho bakumana petugase ka sake-wiꞌyoona tsebooese ka sumuoo nana tsoapayidu oo tapoegea. Wunaꞌme manekapu soo nana gi kwaseana nummenumme. Ka poꞌwoa-ma taage-wi mu numu nakoo-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo.
42008028	Mu tsoapa unu natzooe oo mayugwe. Mu numu wehepu namadabue-ma oo tooꞌe tzakunayipana oosoo oo mesoo wukaꞌakayina natzepooekuyakwe. Soo tsoapayidu nana Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo-baa petuse, oo-kobena meatzedopetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa oo-nagakoo tayakwunikwuse soo tsoapa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U sakwa e tsasoopedya. U Jesus, Noꞌoko Hemma Manumudoopu Tooaꞌa. U sakwa gi e wohonepana.”
42008030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tsoapa tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u naneꞌa?” Oosoo yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Ewaꞌyoo mee numme nananeꞌa, numme ka tubetse ewaꞌyoona.”
42008031	Umu tsotsoapa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Gi ka goso ooosapa nidabedu-witoo ne tayapana.”
42008032	Ewaꞌyoo hogu oona wutaꞌnedu pedakwana toꞌo. “U sakwa umuoo hogu-matoo ne tayase numme umu-naga manikwu,” mee mu tsotsoapa ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma.
42008033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Muusoo tooꞌe.” Mu tsotsoapa yise ka mu hogu-naga mani. Mu hogu yise tatanomanegase ka pagadudu-wi padatuihoo.
42008034	Mu hogu tatogudu tatanomanegase ka oo hemma manina poonnese noꞌoko mu numu tuukweyimoꞌo. Mu numu ka ooka nakowse ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugonno, soo nana ugasoo tsoapayidu besa manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena katu besa namasooapu-gana. Mu numu yise oo tu namanena nadugwengagonno.
42008037	Mu numu otuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoosuise oo taꞌya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mease yise ka sake-wisoo tsebooe.
42008038	Soo nana ugasoo tsoapayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no tooꞌe nemeꞌa, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma,
42008039	“U sakwa u nobe-kwitoo mease u nanumu tuukwe ka Te Naa ume mabesakuse.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punowsoo natsemangega. Soo nana ka pumme tu mabesakuse ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu noꞌoko numu tuukweꞌe.
42008040	Ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuse mu numu ewaꞌyoo besa sokwama.
42008041	Oona yise nana kemma, Jairus mee naneadu, mu nananesootuhidu nematugudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petugase oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha yise tu nobe-witoo oo paꞌe.
42008042	Soo Jairus oo penebe padu pudu tsuadumu yaꞌegana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise Jairus-no mea, mu numu mu takooꞌnamena.
42008043	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne hoone tuoeyaꞌena sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tommo petuga tooꞌe natzatona mu poopooha-gaꞌyoo mee naneyugwedu, gi besa oo mayugwe.
42008044	Oosoo mogoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonakwi kemmahoose, ka oo kwasu pekwitu tzammahoo yise oosoo oo puuhana yooihoo.
42008045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Haga oosoo e tzamahoo?” Ka noꞌoko umu numu ooka gi nesopedakwatoo, Peter yise meeoo, “Ne Pabeꞌe, ewaꞌyoo numu u naꞌoonakwi u takooꞌnagena!”
42008046	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoosoo tuwow, “Haga e tzamahoo? Nu oo wuma ka e pooha tumabesakuhoose.”
42008047	Soo mogoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme sopedakwatoose suꞌise, kwebebewunu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedose oo nanekwahakute noꞌoko mu numu nakana, ka yabesoo besa tu manina.
42008048	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U besa mani, ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mow yise ka besa manese nummenumme.”
42008049	Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo ka mogoꞌne yadooꞌadyakwe, soo nana ka Jairus nobe-wiꞌyoona kemmadu ka Jairus meeoo tuukwe petu, “U padu mooasoo yaꞌeoo. Gi ka Jesus u nobe-witoo bipana, nagutza saaꞌasoo.”
42008050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakatzamaꞌyu ka Jairus meeoo oo tuukwewunu yise ka Jairus meeoo netamma, “Gi suda oo soonammekupana, e nakaꞌoedyuku, u padu besasoo manekwu.”
42008051	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jairus-no nobe-witoo mea ka pepetugase gi haga tuwazoo oetoo nemeakute, mu Peter, James yise John suuꞌmu yise ka tsuatuma naanapuaꞌamu-no oe tzoonooahoo.
42008052	Umu numu oo naꞌoona-kwi manepunnena sakwigonno, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwipana; esoo tsuaꞌa gi yaꞌe, esoo tuusootabooekwu.”
42008053	Umu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe, ka oo sopedakwatoona ka tsuaꞌa yaꞌepu.
42008054	Pana Te Pabeꞌe oo mi-ma tzakaduse, yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yotseoo.”
42008055	Soo tsuaꞌa yise tuponnese, yotseoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo naanapuaꞌamu meeoo netamma, “Hemma ka tsuaꞌa manatu maka, esooga tzeayaꞌe.”
42008056	Soo tsuaꞌa naanapuaꞌamu oo pooꞌne pebuꞌahoo ka tu padu yotseoose. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Gi haka tuukwepana ka e manena.”
42009001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu sumumanoꞌyoona wahamatsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu nesumuse, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu yise nanesootuhibu mu numu mu tunedyooe tayakwu. Mu pooha-gana tsoapa nematzakwunikwu, noko tuoegoedu mabesakukwu tuwazoo,
42009002	yise meadabena mu numu tuukwe, ‘Pudusoo soo Te Naa besa te nemadabuekwu.’ “
42009003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu hemma hanegapana, mu kwasu, gi hemma puma mu tumukwuna tuwazoo, yise gi nadukadu.
42009004	Ka sumuoo nobe-kwi petugase gi meapana mu sakwa ononasoo kummaꞌa-kwitoosoo meadooa.
42009005	Ka mu numu besa naꞌunnepu gi mu nakaꞌoedyukute, ka umu-baaꞌyoona meana, ka koosebu mu moko-makoo tataꞌneka. Ka ꞌyoo mu manena oo sopedakwadookwu umu suda manakwe ka gi mu nakapunnena.
42009006	Mu yise meana nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooena yise ka tuoegoedu mabesaku meaꞌa tuwazoo.”
42009007	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesoobedyana, yise umu-matu meeoo, “Haꞌoogina masoo Elijah?” umu-matu meeoo. “Oosoo Jesus ka umu Te Naa oꞌnosoo tuukwewabe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.” Mu Jew numu pabeꞌe Herod mee naneadu ka Jesus-witu nakase, yise meeoo, “Nu ka mu tukwutumadu ka John batsa tuungu. Oosoo John yise sumuna tuusootabuepu.” Soo Herod yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nepoonne.
42009010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu tunakatzimodu-no numu-wanatoo mea ka Bethsaida mee naneadu-tamme.
42009011	Mu numu ka mu meana nakase mu nageka. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise besa soonammese ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tunedyooꞌe ka mu tuoegoedu mabesakuna.
42009012	Ka tu taba ekowgase, mu wahamatsebooekudu (12) tunakatzimodu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Soo yaatu numu kwingaꞌyoona, kadooꞌoo hee. U sakwa mu numu taya umu mana mease tu tukakwuna hanedooakwu.”
42009013	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo mu netamma, “Hemma sakwa tamme mu maka?” Mu oo nakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme manegeoo tukaba-gaꞌyoo yise waahoo pakwe-gaꞌyoo. Pute sakwa numme mease mu ewow numu tukapu tumukudooa?”
42009014	Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (5000) nanana o. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mu numu sakwa ka poohegea-kooba sapa aataꞌapunne.”
42009015	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise pumme oo netamma-kwaꞌne manese yise noꞌyoona aatahoo.
42009016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu aatahoose ka tukaba noko pakwe hemahoose toogoopatu poonnese, nanesootuhikooha. Oꞌno yise ka tukaba noko pakwe tzabokase, mu ewow numu ka umu pumme nakatzimodu maka tuungu.
42009017	Mu numu noꞌyoona yise ewa tukase, wutzuꞌme. Ka mu numu wutzuꞌmese mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka a nagupenina tunoka wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona kaanoku.
42009018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mu nakatzimodu oo-no. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tunakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Hownneꞌyoo oosoo nana mee mu numu nu-kwitu netamma?”
42009019	Umu tunakatzimodu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Susumudu numu, ‘Ume ka numu baa-wi matzakadu John’ mee netamma. Susumudu numu yise meeoo, ‘Soo Jesus Te Naa yadooawabe Elijah mee naneadu.’ Susumudu numu punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Ka mu Te Naa yadooawabe-matu.’ mee u-kwitu netamma.”
42009020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Haꞌyoo mu puu e soobedya?” Soo Peter oo nekwegea, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa numme-matoo tutayana.”
42009021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu netamma, “Gi menoꞌo numu tuukwepana, nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu Jew numu yadooakudu gi e petzape, unu e kusekase, e batsase yise waha tooise saaꞌa nu tusootabooekwu.”
42009023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko mu numu, ka umu tunakatzimodu-nokosoo mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa mee unne oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu ka nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu e nagenokwu.
42009024	Tamme ka tammesoo tooꞌe namagwetzoina tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu, mu ka nu-koobatoo kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwena mu namagwetzoikwu.
42009025	Tamme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo pana ka te yaꞌese oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42009026	Gi oosoo te gwetzoina tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe haga tooe nu-ma nasookwina, noꞌoko e unnepu tuwazoo, nu yise punnoꞌo, saaꞌa mu-ma nasookwikwu ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi e petuse, ka toogoopatu e tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-ga-no.
42009027	Nu togesapa mu tuukwepu susumudu mu yaa konnodu gisoo tuina e pooha-gana poonnekwu.”
42009028	Sumu nasatese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu tu pupuaꞌamu tuukwe, mu Peter yise James noko John nano mu mea tuunguna, oona giba-matoo nanesootuhigakwuse.
42009029	Togesoo oo nanesootuhaꞌe oo koba atasoo tabuagaꞌa, yise pukwi oo namasooana tohawiyaꞌnegase patakwetseapunne.
42009030	Yise wahaꞌyoo nanana oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses-no Elijah mee nananeadu oo-baa tabua petu. Umu punnoꞌo patakwetseapunne.
42009031	Nanano apegeadyakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe besa manekwuna ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsakwuna. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoikwu.
42009032	Soo Peter tu pupuaꞌamu-no usumeadyakwe umu ka tupoonnese umu ka mu pihoo o konnodu patagwetseapunne mu poonne.
42009033	Mu Moses-no Elijah memeahookwuse, soo Peter gi haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Besa numme ka kemmase. Numme pihoo mu tatza nobe-dookukwu, u sumuoo mu Moses-no Elijah punnoꞌo namesusuꞌmu.”
42009034	Togesoo oo yadooadyakwe, soo koomeba mu haba-gakuhoo petu, umu-koobakwi manikese, mu tunakatzimodu suaꞌe.
42009035	Soo Te Naa yise koomeba nagaꞌyoona mu yadooe mee mu netamma, “Esoo yow E Besaa Tooa, nu a netutzea. Mu sakwa a nakabetsea.”
42009036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise umu-baa mani. Ka oꞌno umu gi haga tuukweꞌe ka a namanina.
42009037	Ka giba-maꞌyoona mu sawekese ewaꞌyoo mu numu yise mu takwi.
42009038	Umu nagaꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo nana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “E tooa sakwa u mabesaku, oosoo tsoapayina gi besa manakwe. Oosoo e besaa tooa.
42009039	Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe soo tsoapa oo-ma tabuaꞌana soo e tooa yaꞌeookayakwe, oobenakwatoo unu nuummaba wumayakwe.
42009040	Nu umu ume nakatzimodu tooꞌe nematzagakwuni tuungu umu yise gi oo mabuꞌa.”
42009041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu gi e nakabetseꞌa tooe nu wunaꞌme yaa mu-baaꞌyoona mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka naatse yaatoo tzakowke.”
42009042	Soo naatse ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese yaꞌeooka. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapa nematzagakwunise ka naatse magwetzoi ka tsoapa-makoo. Soo naꞌatse ka besa manise soo Te Pabeꞌe oo naa-matoo oo nemawunihoo.
42009043	Mu numu yise ka Te Naa nesookwugi. Mu numu yise mee nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka unu pooha-gana nanasookwugi tumadabue.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma,
42009044	“Mu sakwa a tubetse soomayu ekow naꞌunnepu nu saaꞌa nakwutumakwu.”
42009045	Umu oo nakatzimodu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka meeoo oo unakwe. A nawatzetugu-kwaꞌne umu oo nakasoobedyana ooka tu tubengukwuna nasoogwaꞌe ka meeoo oo unakwe.
42009046	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu puusoo gi nanatogeꞌyookute ka nooꞌyoo meeoo tusooyugwena, “Nu yow oo ooonakwatusoo.”
42009047	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tusooyugwena, oosoo yise sumuoo ka tuhaꞌakoo nabaa tzakwunukuna
42009048	umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Sumuna mu noꞌyoona mee soonamme nu sakwa mu moohe. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-matu gi maawaꞌne nanasoobedyadu gi yoo tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne saaꞌa mu moohedooa. Ka tuhaꞌakoo tummatzina nu-koobatoo, ka nugatuna nuka tummatzidu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne ka E Naa tuwow tummatzipunnesoo.”
42009049	Yise soo John ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Numme sumuoo nana poonne, ume pooha tooha-kwi tsoapa tayakwunidu. Numme yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa gi mu tsoapa tayakwunipana ka Ne Pabeꞌe pooha-ma, ka gi numme tunakatzimodu-matuna.’ “
42009050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mu sakwa uga gi meeoo ka nana netammapana. Tooe haga tooe e nanea-ma ka tsoapa nematzagakwunidu tookwa te tummatzidu, oosoo ka gi te wohonena.”
42009051	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa pudusoo namatasoo oo bikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu sakwa ka Jerusalem-witoo mease mu numu-no nanesootuhi.”
42009052	Susumudu tu pupuaꞌamu-matu mooe taya ka mu wakwawaꞌa Samaritan mee nananeadu numu-matoo mu tutubenga tuunguna umu-baa tooikwu mee tusooyugwena.
42009053	Mu Samaritan numu gi Jew numu togeꞌyookute ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona mu paba nananesootuhaꞌyoo. Mu oo tutayana oo wegeatooase yise meeoo oo tuukwe, “Umu wakwawaꞌa gi u nenabaaꞌyookute.”
42009054	Wahaꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu James-no John mee nananeadu mu nakase mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi umu wakwawaꞌa numu sakwa natuni.”
42009055	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-tamme nakwumunase mee mu netamma, “Gi suda unnepana.”
42009056	Umu yise kummaꞌabasoo numu-baa tooikwu.
42009057	Ka podo-toogoo mu meadape soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Nu tooe hano tooe u mea nu u nagenummekwu.”
42009058	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U ka nu-noꞌyoona gi nobe-gakwu. Mu etzaꞌa puu ka teepu-naga to-gaꞌyoo, mu hootsebaaꞌa punnoꞌo sunngabe-ma nonobe-gaꞌyoo, pana nu yise gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.”
42009059	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sumuoo nana meeoo netamma, “U sakwa nu-no maneka.” Soo nana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nanekwegea, “Nu sakwa e naa-no nummenummese, ka oo yaꞌese oo tuguse, saaꞌa u-no tzabekadooa.”
42009060	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Menoꞌosoo nu-no maneka. Mu-matusoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa ka mu naa mabetseadooa.”
42009061	Kummaꞌyoosoo nana punnoꞌo meeoo, “E Pabeꞌe, nu sakwa punnoꞌo u-no manenumme; pana mooeꞌugasoo nu mu e nobe-kwitusoo mu mooe tuukwekase nu u-no tzabekadooa.”
42009062	Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa gi punowsoo kodyupana.”
42010001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ewahoo (70) numu tutunedyooemodu meeoo netamma, “Nu mu numu-matoo wakwaha-kwikoo mu tayamena ka pukwi e petugakwuna, ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwena.
42010002	Gi haga ka Te Naa besa po-witu mu tuukwe. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakasoogwidu. Pana huꞌyoosoo ka Te Naa unnepu mu numu tunedyooedu. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, ‘U sakwa ewowsoo numu netutzea ka besa u unnepu wahakwudu. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu u-kwitu nakana, u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.’
42010003	Mana mea, nu mu tayakwu mu sutahoo numu-nagatoo.
42010004	Gi hemma hanegapana, gi nobenepana, gi magoꞌo, gi mu moko, yise gi numu yadooepana ka meana.
42010005	Ka tooe hanotu nobe-kwi pudu egea-kakwuse besow mu numu oe nobe-gakoo mooe nekwiku.
42010006	Ka nanesootuhidu oo nobe-gakoo oo nanesootuhiku, oosoo besaꞌyookwu. Umu ka sutaꞌyoona soo besow umu mu nekwipu mu-matooso namakodyukukwu.
42010007	Tooe hano tooe mu-baaꞌyoona osoo saaꞌa tukana, hebena tuwazoo. Gi oo nasookwipana o mu natummatzina gi nanaꞌatakoosoo nobe-toogoo meꞌa.
42010008	Ka mana tooe hano tooe petugase, ka u namakana tuka, gi oo nabeatsegapana.
42010009	Mu tuoegoedu nanesootuhikuna mu mabesakuna ka noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Pudusoo soo Te Naa te nemadunagakwu.’
42010010	Ka tooe hano tooe petugase ka mu numu gi mumme togeꞌyookute, gi umu-baaꞌyoopana.
42010011	Mu tsasoopedya, oeꞌyoona mea mu tunesootabue ka gi toge mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka gi te oedyukuna.
42010012	Nu yise mu tuukwe saaꞌa ka Te Naa mu numu nemadabuekwu, soo suda mu tumatugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka oꞌnosoo tu namane-kwaꞌnesoo, soo sutaꞌyoo puu ka Sodom mee naneadu-matoo namakodyukuse, umu nakootzasooa.”
42010013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwow mee, “Mu numu ka mu Chorazin noko Bethsaida mee nananeadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo tooe umu nanaꞌewasoo e besa pooha manekena poonnepana umu gi e oedyukute. Sumuna soo mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, nu ka oo tooꞌe wahana, umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu numu ka Tyre noko Sidon-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo sakwa ka mumme poonnena e oedyukuna gi uga nagoekwu. Ka Te Naa numu nemadabuekwuse mumme manena umu manepu ooonakwa sutaꞌyoo.
42010015	Mu numu ka Capernaum-witu nonobe-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo gisoo besaꞌyoo. Mumme maꞌemukwana sumuna punnoꞌo mu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka gi e oedyukuna punnoꞌo.
42010016	Soo tooe haga tooe unu e nakaꞌoedyukute Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu tuwazoo. Soo tooe haga tooe punnoꞌo nuka gi togeꞌyookudu, Te Naa tuwazoo gi togeꞌyookute. Soo Te Naa yaatoo mu-matoo e taya.”
42010017	Saaꞌa mu ewaꞌyoo nanana Te Pabeꞌe tutuyana oo-baasoo petugase mee oo netamma, “Numme u pooha-ma ka mu tsotsoapa nematzagakwunina, umu meaꞌayakwe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma,
42010018	“Menoꞌo yise soo e wohonedu soo sutaꞌyoo namatzooekuhoo.
42010019	Nu mu besa pooha-makapu oꞌno soo sutaꞌyoo gi hownnekoo mu matzooekute. Gi hee mu matzama-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe mu togogwa-kooba tatukuse sapa oosoo gi how mu yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42010020	Ka mumme e pooha-maka gi ookow madumotseagapunne, pana soo gwetzoibu yise Te Naa mumme sootuhipu, o yisetu.”
42010021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo tubetse besa soonammena meeoo nanesootuhi, “Ne Naa u noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu yise ne paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo nemadabue. U tubetse besaꞌyoo u ka umu u dooamu ka besa etzaga u unnepu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhipuna, tooe gi unu mu natunedyooepu sapa. Umu unu natunedyooepu, gi gea u unnepu nakasopedakwadoo. Yooonnekoo u tusooyugwepu-kwaꞌne.”
42010022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma tuwow, “Soo E Naa noꞌokosoo hemma e sopedakwatoona e sootuhipu. Oosoo suuꞌmu e sopedakwatoo. Nu punnoꞌo ka E Naa sopedakwatoona nu ka numu oetu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu mesoo tuukwe.”
