42010023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa ka besa e unnepu nakasookwina. Pana umu te nanamooatupu gi ooka nasootuhi. Menoꞌo yise mu e poonnena ka besa e unnepu nakasopedakwatoo.”
42010025	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe naka aataꞌa. Sumuꞌyoo nana ka mu Jew tumayohope numu tunedyooedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekwesekuna wunuoose mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo besa sakwa saaꞌa nu manese ka yaꞌese, ka Te Naa-baatoo mea?”
42010026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U ka te tumayohope nea, hayoo puu oosoo oetu naꞌunakwe?”
42010027	Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea punnoꞌo meeoo yise, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unu soobedya, noꞌoko te sokwama-ma ka hemma how te yugwena tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa te pupuaꞌamu tuwow besa soobedya, tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne.”
42010028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U togekoo e nanekwegea. U ka ekow unnepu nakabetseana, saaꞌa u ooosapa ka Te Naa-baa nobe-gakwu, ka yaꞌese.”
42010029	Soo nana yise tu tumatuꞌadyina sopedakwatoona ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Haga yise nuga puaꞌa?”
42010030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow mu natugwengakooha, “Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona tubongo meana ka Jericho mee naneadu-kwitoo. Umu tuduhadu oo mooedyugwese noꞌoko hemma oo-makoo hanehoo oo tooꞌe batsahoo ka po-kumaba oo maꞌwuhooka.
42010031	Ka saaꞌa oosoo Jew nanesootuhidu o kemmana, oosoo ka unu namooedyugwepu nana onoko poonnese ka po oo tookana-kwi oo-moopa meahoo.
42010032	Saaꞌa yise punnoꞌo oosoo Jew nanesootuhidu tummatzidu o kemmana ka nana poonne oosoo yise punnoꞌo oo-moopa meahoo.
42010033	Sumuꞌyoo numu mu Jew gi petzabedu saaꞌa punnoꞌo o kemma. Oosoo ka unu namooedyugwepu nana poonne, tutuha oo soobedyana tooe ka nana Jew sapa.
42010034	Oosoo yise oo-matu meahoose natusooa-ma oo mahanese, ooka oo wupagakute. Ka tu pookoo-kooba o tzatsebooase ka numu tooi nobe-witu oo hanehoogase onanoko oo mabetsea.
42010035	Awamooa yise ka tooi nobe hee-gakoo nana tumanagakuse mee oo netamma, ‘Ka namooedyugwepu e mabetseaku. U ka ewowsoo tzasooase, nu saaꞌa ooka u tumanagakudooasoo, nu ka kodyupetuse.’
42010036	Haꞌoo yise, hanotu umu-matu ka nana unu namooedyugwepu puaꞌa?”
42010037	Soo nana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Esoo nana oo tummatzise oo puaꞌa mane.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana mee netamma, “U sakwa punnoꞌo noꞌobatusoo numu soobedya, noꞌobatusoo pupuaꞌamu-ga.”
42010038	Mu Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pumme nakatzimodu-no ooosapa meadabena ka numu nokadu-kwi petugonno. Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne Martha mee naneadu yise nabaa mu tuka tuungu.
42010039	Soo Martha punneꞌe Mary mee naneadu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba katuna, oo nakakatu oo yadooadyakwe.
42010040	Soo Martha gi namadamawunu, ka tukapu mu mahanekuwununa. Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammadooa, “Nu ka tukapu gi namadamawunu, u sakwa ka Mary nuka tummatzi tuungu.”
42010041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Martha meeoo netamma, “Gi ka tukapu-witu suda nasooyugwewunupana.
42010042	Soo e unnekatuna ka te tukakwuna ooonakwaꞌyoopunne. Soo Mary soo besa e nakasoobedyana. Ooonneꞌyoona gi nu a tayahoo.”
42011001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mana tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe nanesootuhidyina tunemamakwuse soo sumuꞌyoo oo nakatzimodu meeoo oo netamma, “Ne Pabeꞌe, ne nanesootuhi tunedyooe, ka John umu tu nakatzimodu tunedyooe-kwaꞌnesoo.”
42011002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Ka nanesootuhina mee unneyi, Ne Naa ne paꞌanakwatu, u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U noꞌoko numme-kooba pooha katudu. Numme noꞌoko numu yaa teepu-koobatu ume mu nakabetseana soogwaꞌe, ka u-baatu-kwaꞌnesoo.
42011003	Nonotsa tu tabe mea-kwi tukapu gi ne namatuugekwuna.
42011004	Ka ne tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana numme puu oo soomuꞌwa ka mu numu suda numme matugu. Ne matzino kaaheno ne mayugwe. Oꞌno numme besa-kwitoo tsebooe petugakwu.”
42011005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanetsagwayidyi. Mu numu nanetsagwayina ꞌyoo manepunne. How sakwa puu tamme ka togabeno ka tu puaꞌa nobe-witoo mease ka oo yadooe petugase mee unnena,
42011006	‘E puaꞌa mana kwingaꞌatu pudu petuhoose, nu gi hemma oo maka-waꞌne manepunne. U sakwa pihoo tukaba nanoꞌhona e hemepunne?’
42011007	Sumuna soo u puaꞌa gi u tutzakwonakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mooasoo habena, umu oo doodooamu tuwa mooasoo bokwa, oosoo yise gi yotsese u maka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42011008	Pana saaꞌa pumme u nenoyukwe oosoo yotsese ka natzakwona tzakwuna, yise u makakwu. Tamme nanesootuhidyina oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa te sootuhise ka natzakwona tzakwonase, te makakwu.
42011009	Nu yise meeoo mu netammakwu, tutubenguse u nageakwu, oo watena u oo mayukwu, tutokangese u natutzakwonakukwu. Soo tooe haga tooe tutubengadu oo nageakwu, soo tuwatedu oo mayukwu, soo tutokangedu oo natsakwonakukwu.
42011011	U puu ka u tooaꞌa ka pakwe nekwaꞌe gi togogwa oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42011013	Tooe tamme gi totogeꞌyoopana puu te dooamu besa matugu, soo Te Naa yise tamme besa matugukwu Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhikwu.”
42011014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tsoapayidu nana gi besa yadooadu nanesootuhikuse, yise ka oo namabesakuhoose soo tsoapayidu nana besa manese, yadooawunu. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka nana namabesakuse oo poonnena oo nesookwugaꞌe.
42011015	Susumudu mu numu ka oo nakana yise meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana Jesus ka tsoapa nematzagakwunihoo. Oosoo ka umuoosoo pooha-ma oo mu yugwewunu.”
42011016	Susumudu yise ka oo manena poonnena gi oo sooꞌoedyukuna unusoo oo pooha manikwuna nepoonne.
42011017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo pumme mu sooyugwena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma, “Mu numu ka pumme moohedu gi nakabetseana nanano nananepetukana, soo mu moohedu gi mu numu moohe-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu numu yise kadooꞌoo sukwe namayugwekwu.
42011018	Mu gi toge unakwe mu ka, ‘Numu poohadu,’ mee e netammana. Soo numu poohadu gi hownnekoo nanesootuhina ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi ka tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanematzagakwunina petzape, umu tsoapa ka oo tutummatzina.
42011019	Mu Jew numu moohedu puu ka mu tsoapa numu-nagakoo nanesootuhikuna mu nematzagakwunaꞌe. Mu puu gi numu poohadu mee mu neꞌa. Mu sakwa gi nuka meeoo soobedyapana.
42011020	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu nanesootuhina mu tsoapa nematzagakwuni, mu sakwa menoꞌo oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu sootuhaꞌe.
42011021	Nu ka mu susutakoo moohedu ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gana nuga pooha ooosapa oo matzoekute. Soo natzooedu nana puu ka tu hemma besa takonena gi hee oo matzooekute,
42011022	pana ka numu tzakunase oꞌno yise oo hemma hanekwu.
42011023	Yooosoo nu ka sutakoo yugwese oꞌno nu mu numu magwetzoikwu ka suta-makoo.
42011024	Soo tsoapa ka numu-nagakoo natayase, kummaꞌakoosoo puma tu kaduookwunu wate, pana gi tumaꞌyu, yise ka gi tumaꞌyuna meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu punowsoo kodyukakwu.’
42011025	Ka numu punagaꞌyoo tumeahoopu mayuse, oosoo numuna sumuna gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasoonatzaꞌena.
42011026	Oꞌno yise soo tsoapa natakwatsukwu (7) kukummaꞌakoosoo tsotsoapa pumme ooonakwa unu susutakoosoo bise ka punagaꞌyoona tumeapu-nagatoosoo kodyukakwu. Soo nana yise unusoo suda namanatzayakwu.”
42011027	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne oonow numu-naga wunudu ka oo nakase meeoo oo netamma, “U pea sakwa nasootuhi ka u dooaꞌadoose yise ka u petzekuse tuwazoo.”
42011028	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Oo mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakana, ka oo oedyukuna umu unu nasootuhikwu,” mee.
42011029	Ka mu numu ewasoo manemena soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu ka nanasookwugi besa e manena poonnese e nakaꞌoedyukukwu suuꞌmu, mee mu tusooyugwe. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe, Jonah mee naneadu
42011030	ka mu wakwawaꞌa numu Te Naa unnepu tuukwena mu oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu yise yow Mu Pabeꞌe mu-baa petuse pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.
42011031	Oꞌnosoo soo mogoꞌne mana mu taba mea-nakwatu numu nehane katudu, puu kwingaꞌa kemma ka mu Jew numu-kooba katudu Solomon mee naneadu oo tunetammana nakakwuse, ‘Ka unu oo sopedakwadoo,’ mee neyugwena. Tooe nu ka Solomon ooonakwa unu tusopedakwadoopana mu gi e nakabetseꞌa.
42011032	Ka numu paba nanehanenoꞌo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Jonah nakaꞌoedyukupu sakwa mu nemadabue ka mu menoꞌo gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, tooe nu ka Jonah ooonnakwa pooha-gakooapa.
42011033	Soo besa e unnepu tukootabuakunoo kootabua-kwaꞌne. Tamme puu ka oo kootabuakuse paaꞌa hee-kooba oo wuna. Oꞌno soo tooe haga tooe petudu noꞌoko hemma mesoo poonne. Gi tamme puu kawona-tooha oo watzetugu.
42011034	Soo te pooe puu tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka besow poonnena suuꞌmu tamme besaꞌyookwu, pana tamme ka sutakoo poonnena suta tusooyugwekwu.
42011035	Tamme ka besow nakasopedakwatoo,
42011036	tamme besaꞌyookwu.”
42011037	Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawunu, sumuꞌyoo nana nasootuhidu Pharisee mee nananedu-nagatu punnoꞌo oo tuka tuungu. Oosoo yise oo-no tuka kaduhoo.
42011038	Mu Jew numu tu mi mooe bakomase tuka, ka oo tumatuguna. Soo Jew nana yise meeoo soonamme, “How manena soo Jesus tuka gisoo tu mi bakomana?”
42011039	Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ka nana netamma, “Mu Jew numu tumatuguna, puu besa ka mu tookoomatsuꞌa, pana soo mu soonammena togesoo totsaꞌa, ka numu mooa-gana mu sutaꞌyoo. Ka tseda-kumitu suuꞌmu matsuana soo oetu togesoo totsaꞌa.
42011040	Te Naa namekoo mu mi noko mu soonammena matabuepu. Te Naa yise namekoo gi mu totsana sookwaꞌe.
42011041	U ka mu tutuha manedu numu makana u besaꞌyoo.
42011042	Mu Pharisee nananesootuhidu tooe gi haanoko hemma hanepana mu ka Te Naa tosamakayakwe. Mu besa manakwe ka oo tosamakana. Mu gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetsea ka Te Naa unu soobedyanaka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu besa matuguna, mee naꞌunnena.
42011043	Mu Pharisee nananesootuhidu mu ka tu naꞌewa tuka besa-kwi mooe aatahooyakwe, ka tu nananesootuhaꞌe mu tuwazoo ooosoo. Mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu, ‘Oosoo besa nanesootuhidu,’ mee mumme mu netammana soobedya. Mu tumaꞌemukwana saaꞌa mu-maatoosoo kodyukwu.
42011044	Mu suda manakwe ka kukummaꞌakoosoo numu neꞌemukwana ka Te Naa besa po oemota mu moohena.”
42011045	Sumuꞌyoo ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U suda numme-witu waha tuwazoo.”
42011046	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu punnoꞌo mu tumaꞌemukwadu mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mu ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu unu namanedu tumayohope nage tuungu pana mu gi hownnekoo ooka mu mayoho tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42011047	Mu puu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe besa nanomatuooꞌna, ka umu mu nanamooatupu tugoena besa matabuena.
42011048	Mu tookwa ka mu nanamooatupu tugoena togeꞌyookute, oꞌno mu ka mu nanomatuoonana besa matabuꞌe.
42011049	Soo Te Naa gi hemma watzekudu mee unakwe, ‘Tooe nu ka umu e yadooawabe umu-matoo tayase sapa umu mu kusegana mu koꞌehookwu.’
42011050	Mu oe naneyukwe ka noꞌoko Te Naa yadooawabe goese.
42011052	Mu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu ka puusoo gi ka Te Naa nakabetseana gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa nakabetsea-kwitu mu numu tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42011053	Ka Te Pabeꞌe meahookwuse mu Pharisee unu oo sutakuna oo tooe nemasutana,
42011054	oꞌno oosoo suda unnise umu ookow oe neyugwekwu mee tooꞌe sokwamana.
42012001	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo kemmana, ka tubetse ewaꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe takooꞌna, nanakwukutzuꞌnena ka wogo manepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu nakatzimodu tu tunedyooehookwuna pedukwunu meeoo yise,
42012002	“Mu sakwa gi suipana ka besa e unnepu mu numu tuukwe.
42012003	Ka mu nawatze natuukwena sapa waha, haꞌoo puu soo togano-kwitu puu ka tu tabua-kwitu waha.
42012004	E pupuaꞌamu, nu mu tuukwe gi ka te tookoo batsakwudu-ma suipana, umu ka te tookoo suuꞌmu batsakwu gi ka te moogooa. Soo te moogooa gi hownnekoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42012005	Pana nu mu tuukwe ka yise pumma mu sui-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo Te Naa. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ka te tookoo noko te moogooa kadoo mesoo maꞌyugwe.
42012006	Mu hootsebaꞌa puu gi haaꞌno nanenaka pana soo Te Naa mu soopedyana mu mabetseꞌa.
42012007	Soo Te Naa puu gi te watzekute, ka te tzopuhutooe tatzengana ka te wo-matu. Gi suipana, tamme mu hootsebaꞌa ooonakwasoo nadatzeꞌnga.
42012008	Mu ka mu numu tuukwena, ‘Soo Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ nu saaꞌa ka E Naa tamme-koobatu, ‘Mu nugatu,’ mee tuukwedooa.
42012009	Mu ka ‘Jesus E Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu unne-ma nasookwina, nu saaꞌa ka E Naa tamme-koobatu, ‘Mu gi nugatu,’ mee oo tuukwedooꞌa.
42012010	Noꞌyoona numu yise ka Te Naa suda netammana oosoo nasoomuꞌwakwu, pana mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda netammana oosoo gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42012011	Ka nakwutumuna ka nanehanena mu nanesootuhidu noko numu moohedu-kobenaꞌyoona, gi ka mu unnekwuna suda soonammekupana.
42012012	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu unnekwuna mu tuukwekwu.”
42012013	Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakapunnedu-matu mee oo netammadooa, “U sakwa ka e pabeꞌe mee netammana oosoo ka ne naa hemma nu-no nowmoo.”
42012014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana mee netamma, “Mu gi nuga nehanena.”
42012015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu tuwow meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa gi moomoogoobupana. Tooe tamme how ewow hee-gapana oosoo gi numu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42012016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu numu mee natugwengakooha, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana tubewabe-gana ewow besa hemma suaku.
42012017	Oosoo mee soonamme, ‘Haꞌoo sakwa nu mane? Nagutza ewaꞌyoo soo e tumasuana, gi toge e tubane nobe-kwi noꞌyoona nahane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42012018	Nu sakwa umu e tubane nobe tzadyoometase papabowsoo matabue.
42012019	Oꞌno nu saaꞌa besa soonammekwu ka noꞌoko tumasuana oe hanese. Meeoo nu soonamme, nu ewa tubanese wunaꞌmetoo mesoo meawunukwu. Nu gi hemma how yugwena sukwe tukana, hebena, besa soonammekwu.’
42012020	Soo nana tu yaꞌeookwuna gi sopedakwadoo. Oꞌno togano soo nana yaꞌehoo. Noꞌyoona oo tumasuape kummaꞌyoosoo nahaneku.
42012021	Tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ewow hee-gaꞌyoo ka oo-mahoo nasoonatzina ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana tamme matuꞌadyipunne.”
42012022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tunakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Gi suda oo sokwamakupana ka tukapu sumudooe tuugena, yise too ka pukwi mu namasooana.
42012023	Soo numu gwetzooina ka tukapu ooonakwatu, ka pukwi numu namasooana ooonakwatu tuwow.
42012024	Mu ka mu hootsebaꞌa poonne, umu puu tooe gi tumasua pana mesoo tuka, soo Te Naa mu mabetsea. Soo Te Naa puu mu hootsebaꞌa ooonakwasoo te soobedya.
42012025	Tamme gi hownnekoo tammesoo kwingaꞌatoo te momokwuna madaꞌe, tamme sakwa yise gi ka te tuka-witu suda soonammekupana.
42012026	Mu yise ka yooonnekoo tututsekoo gi soomadi how yise ka a pabana suda soonammekute.
42012027	Ka mu tonegeadu puu soo Te Naa mabetseꞌa ka umu puu gi tuusoogwi tatabuꞌa. Umu ka Jew numu-kooba katudu, Solomon mee naneadu unu nananenagadu oo nemasooaꞌapu oo ooonakwa besa tatabuꞌa.
42012028	Soo Te Naa umuoo tonegeaꞌadu puu besa matabue. Tooe umuoo yabesoo takwasugwuuse sapa, oosoo Te Naa yise ooosoo ka pukwi te namasooana gi te namatuugekwuna ka oo nakabetseana.
42012029	Tamme sakwa yise gi suda sokwamapana ka te tukakwuna, ka te hebekwuna kadooꞌookoo.
42012030	Mooasoo soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu oo sopedakwadoo, gi nawatzekudu. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooonnekoo yaaꞌa teepu-koobatu ka tukapu, ka pukwi tu namasooana ooosapa ookow ooonakwa sooyugwe.
42012031	Tamme sakwa yise ka Te Naa nakabetseanona oosoo gi hemma te namatuugekukwu.
42012032	Gi suda oo sokwamakapana, oosoo Te Naa besa te sootunagaꞌa.
42012033	Noꞌoko mu hemma-ma tumuse mu tutuha manedu haneku, soo Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu yise besakoo mu sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa besasoo mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno ookow sakwa mu gi soomuꞌwapana.
42012034	Tooe hee tooe mu tusoodyahana o mu manepunnekwu.
42012035	Mu sakwa ooosapa namamakwupunne ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petukwuse.
42012036	Mu sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo ka mu tuutooedu nehanedu petukwuse besa sokwama.
42012037	Ka togesoo mu tubonne oosoo kodyu petuse umu nasootuhikwu. Oosoo puusoo tukapu mu makakwu.
42012038	Ka tooesoo mu tubonne petuse tooe togabeno tooetoo tabua-tamme tunehanedu ka utuina besa sokwama.
42012039	Nu gi nuka meeoo mu soobedyanoꞌo mu-kooba o petukwu. Ooonneꞌyoo mu sakwa yise namabetzapepunne.”
42012041	Soo Peter yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa noꞌoko numu netammana, pute numme tunakatzimodu suuꞌmu?”
42012042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Peter nekwegea, “Soo nuga poenaꞌewabe netutzeana sakwa unu soonammena besa numu tummatzi. Umu yise ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu mabetseana mu makakwu ka tukapu mu sookwaꞌe.
42012043	Nu ka kodyu petuse umu e poenaꞌewabe ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa mu mabetseꞌa mu mayu petuse, nu mu sootuhikwu.
42012044	Nu besasoo mu sootuhikwu, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuekwu.
42012045	Sumuna soo numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka meeoo tusooyugwena, ‘Gi soo Te Pabeꞌe yabesoo kodyu petukwu. Nu menoꞌo tooe how ka umu ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu suda matuguna ka ewa puusoo namakoo tusoohanena mesoo baayaꞌe.’
42012046	Nu yise ka kodyu petuse tooe hano tooe petukwu gi nuka meeoo mu soobedyanoꞌo. Oꞌno nu yise ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-noko mu nanesootuhibu moohedu mu meeoo sooyugwe.
42012047	Soo numu gi nuka nakabetseadu tooe oo sopedakwadoopana ka pumme e tuukweꞌe soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
42012048	Soo numu gi oo nakasopedakwatoodu ka sutaꞌyoona sagwane sapa nanekusekakwu.
42012049	Nu menoꞌo gi oo nasoomanekute ka nu-tamme kemmadu, ka nabatsakwuse. Nu sukwa tooe yabe soo oo tatukwahoo meeꞌe nu sooname. Oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka teepu nemadabuekwu. Menoꞌo sakwa mooasoo oe manepetu mee nu soonamme.
42012051	Mu sumuna mee sokwama menoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse noꞌyoona numu nanapuaꞌakwu. Pana gi oo manepunne. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌookwu tooetoo tu nananumu sapa.
42012052	Esoo nana gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumuna pummesoo tooa, tooetoo tu naa tumooꞌookwu. Soo mogoꞌne gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumuna punnoꞌo ka tu padu, tu pea, tooetoo tu yahepeawabe tumooꞌookwu. Sumuna manegeꞌyoo nananosoo nobe-gaꞌyoo nanatumuooꞌookwu, wahaꞌyoo umu-matu pihoo tumooꞌookwu, tooetoo paheꞌyoo ka umu waahoo nu-matoo nananesootuhidu tumooꞌookwu.”
42012054	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu ewow numu mee netamma, “Mu puu oo sopedakwatoo ka tu powmakwuse soo taba egea-tammetu unu koomeapunnekwu.
42012055	Mu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka unu tu naꞌudutukwuse ka taba meanakwana hukwakwu.
42012056	Pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute ka suda tumatuguna.
42012057	Mu gi etzaga muusoo besa nanemadabue-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda mu tumatugu-kwitu. Mu sakwa tuwazoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu sakwa kaaheno tumatugu.
42012058	Mu sakwa yise ka mumme nehanekwudu-kobenatoo nabikwuse, tamme sakwa oo puaꞌadoo togesoo meadabena. Tamme ka gi oo puaꞌagana, ka tunehanepe-wi petugase oosoo tamme-witu suda nemadabuekwu. Soo numu nehanedu yise ka mu tukwutumadu tamme wutuma tuungukwu.
42012059	Tamme yise nakwutumatugukwu, ka tamme tu tunekwina tumanagase suuꞌmu mee nu mu tuukweꞌe.”
42013001	Mu numu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Mu numu-matu Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu umu ka Jerusalem-witoo nanesootuhimidu. Soo mu Roman numu moohedu Pilate mee naneadu mu numu goehoo.”
42013002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Mu ka sumuna mee sokwama umuoo numu Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu tookwa ka mu Galilee numu ooonakwa unu tumaꞌemukwadu ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
42013003	Pana gi, soo sutaꞌyoo mu-matusoo kodyukwu ka gi mu nanekwuha.
42013004	Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama, ‘Umu numu nagoehoodu soo tukwutumadu nobe umu-koobatoo aanooahoo, umuoo tookwa hanobasoo sutaꞌyoo numu ka mu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gadu hanobasoo.’
42013005	Pana gi, mu ka gi mu tumaꞌemukwana wahana mu-tammesoo kodyuse kadoo mu mayugwekwu.”
42013006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tuukwe, “Sumuꞌyoo numu puu pogobesa tu tubewabe-wi masua. Saaꞌa menoꞌo soo pogobesa kwasu mee soonammena oetoo e petugayakwe pana gi pooedooꞌa.
42013007	Ka pumme tummatzidu yise mee netamma, ‘Pahe tomokapu, gisoo pooedooana. Masoo pogobesa gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo numu sukwe kapamooaka. U sakwa a tuhewekwuni.’
42013008	Soo tummatzidu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu a naꞌoonnakwitu hewese pookoo kwedana ma-kooba hanese sumu tomoba-wi a mabetseakwu.
42013009	Yise ka sumu tomoba-wi a pooe-dooase, oosoo besaꞌyookwu. Pana ka sumu tomoba-wi gi a pooe-tooase, oꞌno saaꞌa nu a tuhewekwunikwu.’ Yooonnekoosoo soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu oetu tunenagakute, ka gi mu maꞌemukwana mu waha, mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
42013010	Sumu tu nananesootuhaꞌe nasumuꞌu soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooedyakwe.
42013011	Soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne wunaꞌme (18) tomopu manena tookoo tootzadyamedu.
42013012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne tutuha manedu mee oo netamma, “Yaatoo kemmase nu u mabesakukwu.”
42013013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe naꞌenakwa oo-ma matuoonahoose soo mogoꞌne yise kaaheno nakwumaꞌese mee unnetooe, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
42013014	Soo nanesootuhibu nehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sutakuoo ka nanesootuhi tabebuno ka mogoꞌne oo mabesakuhoose yise ka nehanedu-umu meeoo netamma, “Tamme Jew numu naapahe tabeno natzatoꞌo, mu umuoo tabeba-wi mesoo nemabesakute. Pana ka te nanesootuhi tabeba-wi gi hee how nuukwu. Oꞌno mu gi natzatoꞌo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42013015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U umesoo unnena takopadyakwe. Ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu puu ka mu pookoo tzadopayina oo bamagayakwe.
42013016	Soo mogoꞌne ka u pookoo-waꞌne soo sutaꞌyoo wunaꞌme a tuoe tzatobotoo, nu yise o tzadopase ka gwetzoibu-ma oo sootuhise esoo yise besa mane, u yise e togeꞌyookuhoo, ka maka e mabetsakuoose ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi.”
42013017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemadu gi hownnekoo oo nekwegea pana ewaꞌyoo numu oo besaꞌyookute ka Te Pabeꞌe besa manina.
42013018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu natugwengasoo tuwazoo, “Nu mu tuukwekwu, haꞌoo soo numu manekwu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Menoꞌo mu huutseꞌyoo nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu pudusoo mu ewasoo manekwu.
42013019	Ka wuyupe sua-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu tuutsekoo a pooe-nakwana suake, oo soo tunadooakese, naakese, nanaꞌemota maꞌnadooa petugakwu. Ka suube-kwaꞌneꞌyoo mu hootsebaꞌa puu ka oo maꞌna-ma mesoo aataꞌa. Ooosoo mu manekwu ka e nanesootuhinona.
42013020	Ka mogoꞌne tukabadoo-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu ka tumayuꞌa ka hongobe noko mooe mayuꞌa. Soo tumayuꞌa saaꞌa noko ka oo tugoohanetoo mani, soo tukaba yise paꞌatseꞌe posehoo. Yooosoo yise soo numu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
42013022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Jerusalem-tamme meano noꞌoko mu numu nokadu-too tu meana nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooemena.
42013023	Sumuꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo tubenga, “Hutseꞌyoosoo numu haaꞌa namagwetzoi?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea,
42013024	“Huutseꞌyoo mu tubetse tuꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu namagwetzoikwu ka ꞌyoo a manepunne mu sakwa unu o petukuno ka mu namagwetzoikwuna.
42013025	Ewaꞌyoo numu menoꞌo gi e nakaheesoobedyadu nu yise yotsese ka natzakwunaꞌa mu-nakwi tzatumowkwu mu puuwanaꞌyoona oo tooꞌe waꞌagekwu mee unnena, ‘E Pabeꞌe e tutsakwonaku nu mi egeahookwu.’ Nu yise meeoo unnekwu, nu gi u sopedakwatoo. U tookwa gi besa tumatugupu.
42013026	Mu yise mee e netammakwu, ‘U ne sopedakwadoo. Numme u-no ewa tukayakwe, u yise ne nobe-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooeyakwe.’
42013027	Nu yise mee mu netammakwu, mu gi nu-notu ka suda mu manena manoyugwena, mu sakwa mea. Nu gi mu sopedakwadoo.
42013028	Mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nanatuaganena sakwikwu umu ka te nanamooatupu noꞌoko Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Naa-baakoo.
42013029	Noꞌobatusoo numu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu ka eka teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu yise ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu.
42013030	Susumudu numu menoꞌo gi meeoo nanasoobedyadu mooe nasootuhidu, mu yise meeoo nanasoobedyadu numu-nagwi manekwu.”
42013031	Susumudu numu ka mu nanesootuhi-nagadu ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “U sakwa yaanona mea soo mu numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu u nebatsayagate.”
42013032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ookow etzaꞌa mee tuukwe, ‘Gi haaꞌnotoo nu yaanopunnekwu mu toegadu mabesakuna, mu magwetzoina, mu tsoapa nematzagakwunikwu ka E Naa nuka tunetammakupu nu mamakwuhoogena.
42013033	Pudusoo nu Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyukwu mu numu Jerusalem-witu suuꞌmu nonoꞌotsa ka Te Naa yadooawabe goeyakwe, otoo nu numu-koobatoo nabatsekwu ka E Naa tunetammana nu mamakwuookwu.’
42013034	Nu wunaꞌme mumme Jerusalem-witu tutuha soobedya ka hootze tu dooamu ka tu kasa-tooha tuwatzetugu-kwaꞌne. Pana mu gi oo mu namatuguna petzape. Mu noꞌoko umu Te Naa yadooawabe sukwe tagoehoo, tupe-ma. Pudusoo mu kadoo namayugwese mu nobe-kwitu, hee kadooꞌyookwu. Saaꞌa ka mu-baasoo e petuse mu mee unnekwu, ‘Yow soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa pooha-toohakwi petu.’ “
42014001	Tu nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu Pharisee nanesootuhidu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuka bi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise umu-no tuka, mu Pharisee oo e yaꞌepunne ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemakwuse.
42014002	Sumuꞌyoo nana tookoo pawadu oo numu-no.
42014003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonne ka umu Pharisee yoo Jew tumayohope sopedakwadoodu tubenga, “Haꞌyoo soo mumme tumayohope? Besaꞌyoo, gi hownneꞌyoo haaꞌa ka nanesootuhi tabeno soo numu namabesakuna?”
42014004	Pana umu gi oo nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tookoo pawadu nana tzamahoose oo mabesakuse oo nobe-kwitoo oo taꞌya.
42014005	Ka mu Pharisee yise mee netamma, “Ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu dooa tawaga-kwitoo wuehoose, tooetoo mu kootsoo, ka gi hownnekoo oo tzebooꞌe, mu puu oo tummatzikwu. Mu sakwa yise gi e nesootzemapana ka nana e tummatzaꞌe.”
42014006	Umu Pharisee gi hanotoosoo haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42014007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu poonne ka susumudu mu numu nadukabidu besa nasooyugwena ka besow kadunoo-kwitu mooe ohomanakwe, oosoo yise mee mu netamma,
42014008	“Tamme ka naꞌewa tuka-kwitoo tamme tubise, tamme sakwa gi besa nasooyugwena besa-kwitoo mooe ohomanepana. Tamme ka besow kadunoo-kwi mooe kaduhoose sumuna saaꞌa tamme ooonakwa besaꞌyoo oe petuhookwu.
42014009	Soo numu oetoo te tuka bidu yise mee te netammakwu, ‘Yaa e besa puaꞌa petuhoo. U sakwa ookow kadunoo maka.’ Tamme yise sumuna gi besa oo nakwumakukwu ka oekoo tamme tu tayahoose.
42014010	Ka tamme tubise, tamme sakwa gi ka hemma besa-kwitoo mooe ohomanepana. Soo numu te tuka bidu te manena poonnena sumuna mee te netammakwu, ‘U e besa puaꞌa yaa ka besa kadunoo-kwi katuse ka e pupuaꞌa-baa, umu-no tuka.’ ‘Oosoo besaꞌyoo numu,’ mee umu numu oo manepunnedu, te sootubetseyina.
42014011	Tamme ka tammesoo besa nasooyugwena, saaꞌa namanasookwikudooa. Tamme ka gi besa nasooyugwena saaꞌa, ‘Oosoo besaꞌyoo,’ mee nanetammakwu.”
42014012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nana pumme tuka bidu meeoo netamma, “Tamme ka naꞌewa tukana, tamme sakwa tutuha manedu, mu gi yutsungadu numu oetu bi tuungu. Umuoo gi hownnekoo ooonnekoo soo te tumakodyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Saaꞌa yise ka Te Naa te yaꞌe-wikoo tamme oo mayodase, te tumakodyuku-kwi tamme nasootuhikwu. Pana tamme ka tu pupuaꞌamu te nananumu, yise ka besa manepunnedu te nanumu suuꞌmu tuka bise, umu saaꞌa punnoꞌo te tuka bikwu, umuoo yise mooasoo te tumakodyukukute. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi ooonekwitoo te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42014015	Sumuꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no tukana meeoo, “Mu numu ka Te Naa-noꞌyoona ewa besa nasootuhikwu mu ewa tukadu besa sokwamakwu.”
42014016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa paba ewa tuka-kwitu yise ka nana natukwenguna, “Sumuꞌyoo numu tu pupuaꞌamu makakwuse mee soonammena,
42014017	ewa yongo saa tuungu, ewow tu pupuaꞌamu oetoo bi.
42014018	Pana mu oo pupuaꞌamu mee oo sooyugwena sukwe nanemaweakooha sumuꞌyoo oo puaꞌa mee oo netamma, ‘Nu ka tubewabe heetooꞌase, nu oo tasootzemahookwu.’
42014019	Sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Nu sumumano (10) kootsoo tumuhoose, nu umuoo poopoonnegakwu.’
42014020	Oosoo sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘Nu gi kemma-waꞌne menoꞌo manepunne, nu pudu nodukwadoohoose.’
42014021	Soo oo tayana ka kodyu petuse, ‘Umu gi kemmow-waꞌne menoꞌo manepunne,’ meeoo oo tuukwe. Soo nana suda oo nakwumaku ka ewa tukooma hane tuunguse tu pupuaꞌamu gi kemma. Ka pumme tummatzidu yise mee netamma, ‘Manatutooe mu numu nemasumudoodooa, tooe hownnekoo tooe, mu tutuha manedu, mu gi unu besa mamanemodu nokosoo gi tutubootabuedu, tooe hownnekoo tooe umu ewa tukoohane, umu nu-no tukakwu.’
42014022	Saaꞌa mu numu oo bi petuse mee oo netamma, ‘Nu mooasoo nuka u netamma-kwaꞌne manese sapa, ewowsoo tamme soogwaꞌe. Gisoo u nobe kaaꞌno.’
42014023	Soo nana yise ka pumme tummatzidu tayasoo too meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa manatutooe mu numu masumudoo, yise e nobe kaanohookwu.
42014024	Pana umu numu mooeꞌugasoo e tooꞌe bina umu gi nu-baatu yongo tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “
42014025	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meadape. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yooihoose umu-tamme nakwumunase mee mu netamma,
42014026	“Mu nuka noꞌokosoo hemma-ooonakwa unu soowabega. Mu sakwa ka mu naa, mu pea, mu nodukwa noko mu doodooamu, mu samoomu, muusoo sapa tuwow nuka mu-ooonakwa unu soowabega, oꞌno mu ka E Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
42014027	Mu nu-koobatoo nasoomawunise tooe mu nabatsase sapa, oꞌno mu nu-noꞌyookwu.
42014028	Mooeꞌugasoo gisoo ka Te Naa besa podo meana, tamme sakwa oetu soohane, tamme haaꞌa tooe oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo?
42014029	Soo numu puu ka nobe-tookwuse ka gi oo nanenagakwuna mooe soohanena sukwe nobe-tookoohase, ona manikese, tukwumehoe petugase yise oto oo matusookwuni. Oꞌno yise mu numu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoe.
42014030	‘Ma how manedu masoo? Masoo sakwa uga mitu soohanese, oꞌno yise uga nobe-too.’
42014031	Tamme sakwa nakobenatusoo soohanena ka naꞌakwebu moohedu-waꞌne, oosoo tu manikwuna puu mooe soohanese numu-no nagoekwu.
42014032	Oosoo ka mu tubetse ewow, ka gi mu matzooeku-waꞌne manepunnena, oosoo yise umu-no oetu nehanese mu tu pupuaꞌamu-doose sumusoo nanano besa meadabekwu.
42014033	Mu ka nu-noꞌyookwuse mu noꞌoko mu hee-gana matusookwunikwu, oꞌno gi hee mu tsitugukwu.
42014034	Ongabe puu besaꞌyoo ka ongakamana. Ka gi ongakama manese, tamme gi hownnekoo oo madi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42014035	Oosoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo ka gi kamana, tamme oo totsakwatekwunaꞌe. Ooosoo tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, ka te kammana kadoo manepetugase, Te Naa te totsakwatekwunaꞌe. Mu sakwa e nakapunne, oꞌno mu gi nasootuaganedooa.”
42015001	Ewaꞌyoo umu tumasumudoodu-no kummaꞌakoosoo numu tumaꞌemukwadu ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe oo-baa petuse oo nakapunne.
42015002	Umu Pharisee nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee naneyugwedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemana mee unakwe, “Oosoo Jesus ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo umu-no tukayakwe.”
42015003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu natugwengayakwe.
42015004	“Tamme puu ka ewow seepu-gana sumuoo nawatsekuse ka mu ewow seepu ka giba-masoo maꞌwukese ka sumuoo seepu nawatzekudu watehookakwu.
42015005	Ka nawatzekudu seepu mayuse, tamme ka besa soonammena nobe-kwitoo oo tzanogakwu.
42015006	Mee yise tamme ka te pupuaꞌamu tuukwekwu, ‘Mu sakwa nu-no besa sokwamapunne, nu ka seepu nawatzekuse oo mayusoo.’
42015007	Ka umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo puu besa sokwamayakwe ka sumuoo numu tumaꞌemukwadu nanekwahayakwe, pana mu numu kaaheno meadu mee sukwe naneyugwedu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo suda oo sokwamakute ka gi kaaheno mu nanekwaha.
42015008	Soo mogoꞌne puu sumumano (10) ese tupe-ma namadabuedu hee-gaꞌyoo yise sumuoo watzekuse toogootabuakuse tu nobe-kwitu wutzooꞌnekwu oo watena.
42015009	Ka oo mayuse besa soonammena mee tu pupuaꞌamu-noko tu nopuaꞌamu tuukweꞌe, ‘Nu besa soonamme ka e tuwatzekuna mayuse.’
42015010	Ooosoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamakwu ka sumuoo tumaꞌemukwadu namayuse ka Te Naa besa podo menoꞌo meakwu.”
42015011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo natugweꞌnga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana waahoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo.
42015012	Soo oo penage ka tu naa meeoo netamma, ‘U sakwa ka hemma saaꞌa u yaꞌese nuka u hanekukwuna menoꞌosoo e haneku.’ Soo mu naa yise tu hemmatu oo haneku.
42015013	Saaꞌa yise soo oo tooa ka pumme tu hee-maga-ma tumuse yise kwingaꞌa-too mea. Ewa nanasuda manena yabesoo ka pumme tu hemma-gana pumatu tu tumupu tzasooꞌow.
42015014	Ka saaꞌa ka tukapu unu natugenoꞌo, oosoo tsuayina ka tu hemma tzasooase gi hownnekoosoo ka tukapu tumu-waꞌne manepetu.
42015015	Sumuꞌyoo nana oonow tabewa-gaꞌyoo hogu-gaꞌyoo oo nedyaꞌwe ka tu hogu oo maka tuunguna.
42015016	Oosoo ka unu tsuayina ka ‘Umu hogu namakana sakwa nu tuka,’ mee soonamme ka gi hownnekoo ka nadukadu tamamayuna.
42015017	Oowetu soohanese mee tusooyugwe, ‘Menoꞌo nu tsuayaꞌegaꞌa. Pana umu e naa tummatzidu puu besa namakayakwe ewa natugapeniyakwe.
42015018	Nu sakwa nobe-kwitoo kodyuse ka e naa mee netamma, “Nu tubetse suda u masoonammekute, ka Te Naa tuwazoo.
42015019	U sakwa gi e natubangapana, nu ka sutaꞌyoona, u sakwa e sukwe nedyaꞌwe.” ’
42015020	Oosoo yise nobe-kwitoo kodyuka gisoo pumme oo wupetugaꞌa soo oo naa ona o kemma o posopedakwudoose tutuha oo poosoopedyase oo-matoo tanomanese, oo masootuhi petuga.
42015021	Soo oo tooa yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu tubetse suda mu manuuma ka Te Naa tuwazoo. Mu sakwa gi e natubangapana, nu ka sutaꞌyoona.’
42015022	Pana soo oo naa ka umu pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘Yabesoo ka e dooa besa namasooapu hanekuooke, maꞌnegeaꞌa tuwow, moko pukwi oo namadabuekwuna oo hanekuooke.
42015023	Ka unu yoohoopu te tubatsakwuna kootsoo hanehoodooa oo batsahoose oo koomahanekooha. Tamme ewa tukase besa sokwamakwu.
42015024	Oosoo ka yoo manepunnena nu ka e dooa watzekutu-kwaꞌne mane ka oo petuse tooe nanasuda oo manenumme sapa, nu besa soonamme ka oo petuse. Umu yise ewa tukana too nuka.’
42015025	Saaꞌa soo oo pabeꞌe oona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona kemmana, ka mu tunekwuꞌu mu nakana,
42015026	ka sumuoo umu tu naa tummatzidu-matu meeoo tubenga, ‘How manena umu nugadu-kwaꞌne nanaka?’
42015027	Soo tutummatzidu yise meeoo oo tuukwe, ‘U wanngaꞌa petuoosesoo, u naa ka unu yoohoopu kootsoo oo batsaku. U naa ka oo-matoo besa soonamme ka oo petuhoosesoo.’
42015028	Soo oo pabeꞌe sutahoose gi ka nobe-kwi eka. Soo oo naa oo-matoo tsebooekese oo tooꞌe baꞌe.
42015029	Pana oosoo ka tu naa meeoo netamma, ‘Nu tubetse wunaꞌme ooosapa u nakabetseanumme. Pana u gi hannanoꞌo hemma e geadu. Gi moosooe seepu tooaꞌa sapa, ewa e pupuaꞌamu-no e tukakwuna e batsakute.
42015030	Pana u tooa ka pumme u hemena ka mu sutakoo momokoꞌne-matoo sukwe tzasooꞌa, menoꞌo kodyu petuse u yise ka unu yoohoopu kootsoo oo batsakukwu.’
42015031	Soo oo naa yise mee oo nanekwegeadooa, ‘U e besaa tooa ooosapa nu-baatu. Noꞌyoona soo nuga hee umetu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne.
42015032	Besaꞌyoo te ewa tukana ka besa ta sokwama. Yoo soo manepunne, soo u wanngaꞌa uga nawatsekupu-kwaꞌne manese, menoꞌo yise ka petuse tamme besa sokwama oo-matoo.’ Yooosoo soo Te Naa ka manatooe how tooe te manemose ka te kodyu petuse besa tamme-matoo soonammekwu.”
42016001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana hee-gaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu tu hemma mabetsea tuungu. Saaꞌa yise mee oo naka, gi besa oo hemma meakute.
42016002	Oosoo yise nabaatoo oo bise mee oo netamma, ‘U ka e hemma sukwe tzasooꞌa mee nu u naka. Ka noꞌoko hemma e tumadabue tuunguna nu-matoosoo haneke, u gi hemma e mabetseakukwu yaa manakwana.’
42016003	Soo oo mameakudu mee soonamme, ‘Howga nu manekwu? Nu ka umu hemma how nuugwewununa gi mapuꞌana gi mu numu e nedyaꞌwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu mu numu hemma e natuunguna nasookwikute.
42016004	Nu sakwa ka numu hemma sukwe hanekwu, oꞌno umu saaꞌa ka e nadayahoose e makadooa.’
42016005	Oosoo yise noꞌoko mu numu ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu nagutzikudu nabaatoo bi. Ka mooeꞌugasootu mee tubenga, ‘Haaꞌnoko u ka e nedyaꞌwedu nakutzikute?’
42016006	Oosoo meeoo oo nanekwegeꞌa, ‘Ewatsekoo yoohoo, nu oo nakutzikute.’ Oosoo yise mee oo netamma, ‘Yaasoo u tumadabuepu. U sakwa oo naamookwitusoo ma-ma botugu.’
42016007	Ka sumuoo yise too meeoo tubenga, ‘U punnoꞌo haaꞌnoko oo nakutzikute?’ Oosoo meeoo oo nanekwegea, ‘Ewatsekoo weeda nu oo nakutzikute.’ Mee yise oo netamma, ‘Yaa punnoꞌo ume tumadabuena huutsekoo mi botugu.’
42016008	Saaꞌa soo oo nedyaꞌwedu yise ka tu hemma mameakudu manena naka, mee yise oo netamma, ‘U tubetse unu soonamme. U ka nawitu poohina.’
42016009	Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa nawitu poohi ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soonamme. Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo nawitu soohane. Tamme sakwa ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te hee-matu numu hanekuna, besa mu matuguna ewa pupuaꞌamu-ga. Oꞌno ka saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baa petugase, soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka besa te tumatugu-koobatoo.
42016010	Tamme ka gi unu nanenagadu he-koobatoo esagoena, tamme ka unu nanenagadu he-koobatoo esagoekwu tuwazoo.
42016011	Yoo manepunne tamme ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi te hemma kaaheno mabetseana, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa manepetugase tamme gi ka tubetse nasootuhipe nageakwu, tamme ka gi kaaheno mu tumatuguna mabetseana.
42016012	Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi kaaheno hemma mabetseana saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, tamme gi tammesoo hownnekoo nasootuhipe nageakwu.
42016013	Tamme gi hownnekoo waahoo soowabega-waꞌneꞌyoo. Sumuna tamme sumuoo besa soobedyana besa oo nakabetseakwu. Tamme gi namekoosoo soogwi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa noko ka hemma ewow te hee-gana.”
42016014	Mu Jew nanesootuhidu numu Pharisee mee nananeadu ooosapa tu natumanakakuna soogwipunnedu. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu nakase gi oo nakaheesoobedyana oo-maꞌyoona sukwe nanekoꞌe.
42016015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ka mu numu mee tuukweyakwe, ‘Soo Te Naa besa ne sootuhise ewow ne heemaka numme ka besaꞌyoo numuna.’ Pana soo Te Naa gi mu watzekupunne ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa namanekwuna. Ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona besa mee mu nasooyugwedu, saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ‘Gi hee,’ mee oosoo mu netammadooa.
42016016	Ka John gisoo petu-kwitoo tooe mu ooosapa mu mooa tumayohope nagenoꞌo. Pana menoꞌo numme ka Te Naa besa unnepu numu tunedyooena noꞌobatusoo numu tookwa etzaga eka mee soonamme.
42016017	Pana soo Te Naa unnepu gi yise atasoo nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa manepunne.
42016018	Mu yise meeoo, ‘Oosoo numu ka tu nodukwa poonnekwunise kummaꞌakoosoo mogoꞌne nodukwadoose te tumayoho-kwi oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo,’ pana ka Te Naa tamme poonne-kwi mu maꞌemukwa. Yise ka napoonnekwunina mogoꞌne nodukwadoose, mu too tumaꞌemukwasoo esoo togesoo Te Naa unnepu.”
42016019	Mee yise soo Te Pabeꞌe mu natugwenga tuwazoo, “Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana ooosapa unu nanenagadu namasooadu. Nonotsa tabeno besa tukayakwe.
42016020	Nonotsa tabeno oo nobe-kumaba soo tutuha manedu nana unu uayidu, Lazarus mee naneadu habeyakwe.
42016021	Ka ewow hee-gakoo nana tugutsaꞌabu natuunguyakwe. Mu saduꞌu yise punnoꞌo ooosapa oo ua-witu ekosebayakwe.
42016022	Saaꞌa yise soo Lazarus yaꞌe. Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu ka oo moogooa Te Naa-baatoo bika. Oobeoo petuoogase ka besow te namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu-kumaba katuse oo-no tuka. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana punnoꞌo yaꞌese nakoo.
42016023	Ka goso gi tookedu-wi petuga. Toogoopatu poonnese nakwingaꞌatoo ka Abraham poonne ka Lazarus oo-baa katu.
42016024	Ka Abraham waꞌagese meeoo netamma, ‘E puaꞌa, u sakwa tutuha e soobedyase ka baa-wi Lazarus mamoogoo oo tsetzaka tuungu soo Lazarus sakwa ka e ego-koobatoo ooka oo pasaweku tuungu, esoo goso nuummabu e wumakute.’
42016025	Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Uga tooe oo soomaꞌyu ka togesoo ka teepu-kooba nummenummena, u uga ooosapa ewow hee-gana, oo-ma nasoonatzina, menoꞌo yise oosoo gi u magwetzoꞌi gi hemma nesoobedya tooe ka Lazarus tutuha manenumme sapa u gi oo tummatzaꞌe. Menoꞌo Lazarus yise besa hee-gana u yise nuummaba wuma.
42016026	Numme gi hownnekoo u tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka pabow tukapa ta naamookwi hape.’
42016027	Soo uga ewow hee-gaꞌyoo nana yise ka Abraham mee oo netamma, ‘U sakwa umu manegeoo (5) e wangaꞌamu-matoo ka Lazarus taya, oosoo mu tuukwe ka e namanatzayina. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu gi nu-kwaꞌnesoo manedooa.’
42016029	Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Umu haaꞌa gi mu Te Naa yadooawabe tubona neadu?’
42016030	Oosoo yise ka Abraham meeoo netamma, ‘Umu gi ka Te Naa nayadooawabe nakaheesoobedyadu pana mu ka Lazarus yaꞌepu oo sopedakwadoona ka pu-baasoo oo petugase, oꞌno umu oo oedyukukwu.’
42016031	Soo Abraham yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Umu ka mooasoo gi Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe umu numu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda pu-baa petuga sapa, umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “
42017001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ooosapa ewaꞌyoo numu ooonneꞌyoo, ka suta-kwitoo numu mesoo kwase nokayakwe. Soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
42017002	Umu ka sumuoo Te Naa tooa-matu kwase nokase, soo mu manena hanobaꞌyoonasoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
42017003	Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka te puaꞌa besa matuguna mu tummatzi yise ka te puaꞌa tamme suda matugu tamme sakwa oo tuukwe. Oosoo ka suda tu manena nemakodyuse tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwakwuni.
42017004	Tooe hano sapa oo matuadyigena yise ka ooka oo nemakodyukuyakwe tamme sakwa ooosapa punnoꞌo oo soomuꞌwano.”
42017005	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo-matu kemmase meeoo netamma, “Unusoo besa ne tuꞌoedyukukwuna ne sootuhi.”
42017006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Tooe tamme tuutse te pewu katzookwanatuma tuꞌoedyukuna, ka sunngabe ooweoo baa-witoo anoa tuunguse oosoo yise te tunetammatusoo manekwu.
42017007	Gi sakwa tamme pabow oo neyugwena Te Naa unnepu mayohonona, mooasoo tamme tu tunepohabekuna mayohodyina. Ka tummatzidu-kwaꞌne oosoo puu ka puuwanatu mamakwuse nobe-kwi petu.
42017008	Oosoo puu gi katuhoopetuse tukakoohakwu. Mooeꞌugasoo oosoo ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu tukakwuna mooe haneoose,
42017009	yise saaꞌa ka pumme nedyaꞌwedu tukamakwuse, oꞌno yise punnoꞌo tukakwu. Oosoo gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwe, ‘Nu ka mooasoo oo tu tunepohabekuna mayohodyina.’
42017010	Tamme ka Te Naa tunepohabekuna mayohodyina, gi sakwa tamme papaba oo sooyugwepana o te nagekwuna yaa manakwana.”
42017011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo meana, ka umu Jew numu noko wakwawaꞌa numu tubewabe Samaria mee naneadu-kumi mea.
42017012	Toge ka Samaria-wi oo egeakakwuse sumumanoꞌyoo (10) nanana uagoedu oo wegeahoo. Umu gi oo tzageꞌe nuuyugwena,
42017013	mee oo sukwe netamma, “U Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus, u sakwa ne sootuhi.”
42017014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhiwabe tzapoonneku mu mooasoo namabesakuhoo.” Ka tooesoo mu meagaꞌa mu ua besa manika.
42017015	Sumuꞌyoo wawaꞌa nana suuꞌmu ka tu ua namabesakuse besa soonammese ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo kodyuhoodooa mee unnenoꞌo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
42017016	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena petugase mee oo netamma, “U besa e sootuhi ka e mabesakuse.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu sumumanoko (10) nanana mabesaku pana sumuꞌyoosoo umu-matu kodyutooa ka Te Naa besa pumme tumatugukupu waha. Umu sumu kadoopu (9) Jew nanana gi kodyu petu, umu sumuna ooosapa meagaꞌa.
42017018	Esoo sumuꞌyoosoo wawaꞌa nana yise kodyu petu yise mu uagoedu e nanumu gi e heesoobedya tooe pumme e mabesakuse sapa.”
42017019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka wawaꞌa meeoo netamma, “Tooe u wawaꞌa pana, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna namabesaku, menoꞌo yise u nobe-kwitoo mesoo kodyu.”
42017020	Mu numu ka umu nananesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo soo Te Naa te nemadabuedooakwu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi tamme oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo ka tamme oo nemadabuekoohase.
42017021	Numu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ‘Menoꞌo soo Te Naa te nemadabue,’ soo Te Naa ka mooasoo tamme-nagakwitoo nemadabuena.”
42017022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Mooeꞌugasoo mu Jew numu menoꞌo yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu, gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu e batsakwu. Saaꞌa mu sakwa e poonne mee tooe sokwamapana mu gi e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu susumudu mu nemooagakwu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo watze petuse oonowsoo numme-baa.’ Mu sakwa gi mu nakabetseapana. Nu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe mesoo napoonnekwu ka petuhoose tukwukwutzeba-kwaꞌne.
42017026	Ka gisoo e petu mu numu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu tooe how tooe maꞌnaꞌwekwu. Ka oꞌnosoo tu mane-kwaꞌnesoo ka nana Noah mee naneadu togesoo ka yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoi nummenumme.
42017027	Umu puu gi oo nakaheesoobedyadu tooe pumme oo tooe tuukwe sapa tukana, hebena, tooe how tooe manakwe. Ka oꞌno tabeno ka Noah ka sake-wi tsebooese, powma petuse soo teepu patatsopowse mu numu ka teepu-koobatu noꞌyoona batatuihoo.
42017028	Ka oꞌnosoo ka namanepu tuwow ka Lot togesoo eka teepu-kooba gwetzoinumme
42017029	Pana ka Lot ka Sodom-wiꞌyoona namameꞌa soo goso paꞌanakwana powmadu-kwaꞌne sawewunuse noꞌoko mu kootuikuoo.
42017030	Ooosoo mu menoꞌo numu maꞌnaꞌwekwu, ka saaꞌa e kodyu petuse.
42017031	Mu puu ka nobe-kobenaꞌyoona tooetoo ona tubewabe-kwiꞌyoona, mu sakwa gi mu nobekwitoosoo kodyupana tooe ka mu hemma soomayupana.
42017032	Mu sakwa ka Lot nodukwa manepu soomayu. Oosoo puu ka namameahoose wesabetugase, ongabe mani.
42017033	Tamme ka tammesoo tooe namagwetzoina, tamme kadoo nuugwekwu, pana ‘Ka gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase sapa,’ mee unnena tamme namagwetzoikwu.
42017034	Ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e petuse sumuna wahaꞌyoo numu kapa-wi utuikwabekwu, sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-no manegakwu sumuꞌyoo gi e nakaheesoobedya umu natzapenihookwu.
42017035	Sumuna wahaꞌyoo momokoꞌne oonaꞌyoona toosoona, sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-no manekakwu sumuꞌyoo gi e nakaheesoobedyadu oosoo natzapenihookwu.”
42017036	Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu mee oo tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoona oo namanekwu?”
42017037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Tooe hanoꞌyoo tooe mu kweꞌnaꞌa puu ka hemma nabatsa-kwi sumuhookwu. O oosoo puu oo sopedakwadoo tabuꞌa.”
42018001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu mee tunedyooe, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanetzakwiyino gi oo nasoomukwapana tooe gi yabesoo tamme tu nekwegea sapa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu meeoo natugweꞌnga,
42018002	“Sumuꞌyoo sutaꞌyoo nana gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi numu tutuha soobedyadu, mu numu-nehanedu.
42018003	Nonotsa tabeno sumuꞌyoo peawabe oo-baa petuyina mee oo netammayakwe, ‘Oosoo e wohonedu suda e matugu. U sakwa e tummatzi.’
42018004	Wunaꞌme soo numu-koobatu nehanedu gi oo nakabetsea pana saaꞌa mee soonamme, ‘Tooe nu gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi mu numu tutuha soobedyapana, nu sakwa ka peawabe tumayohoku.
42018005	Ka nonotsa tabeno e tubenguna e nesagwaꞌe.’ “
42018006	Mee tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe unakwe, “Soo sutaꞌyoo nana numu-nehanedu ka peawabe ooosapa pumme nanetsagwayi oo tumayohoku.
42018007	Soo Te Naa ka umu tu doodooamu nakasootuhikwu ka nonotsa tabeno mu nanetzakwiyinoꞌo, ka nonotsa togano tuwazoo.
42018008	Umu nagutza tubetse wunaꞌme tuutooe, soo Te Naa yabesoo mu nanekwegeahookwu. Pana ka yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petuse, sumuna mu numu tuꞌoedyukudu kadooꞌyookwu.”
42018009	Susumudu numu puusoo besa nasooyugwena kukummaꞌakoosoo numu sutaꞌyoo mee sooyugwe ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu natugweꞌngaꞌa.
42018010	“Wahaꞌyoo numu-ga ka mu nanesootuhidu tunehane-kwitoo memeakwate. Sumuꞌyoo ka mu nanesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, sumuꞌyoo yise tumaꞌemukwadu.
42018011	Soo mu Pharisee-matu ka mu numu-wana wununa nanesootuhiwunu, ‘Ne Naa u tubetse besaꞌyoo. U nuka besa matabue gi ka numu-waꞌnesoo. Nu ooosapa nonoꞌotsa awamooa nanesootuhina pooha tuwunikwu punnoꞌo. Mu susumudu numu suda sukwe manena unu moomoogoobana unu nanidyapu. Soo o wunudu tumaꞌemukwadu puu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu gi oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
42018013	Soo tumaꞌemukwadu nasookwina gi oetu poonnena sukwe nanesootuhikooha, ‘Nu tubetse ewa suda manakwe. U sakwa tutuha e soobedyana e tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.’
42018014	Ka mu nanesootuhimakwuse soo Te Naa mee unakwe, ‘Oosoo tumaꞌemukwadu besa manakwe ka tu tumaꞌemukwana nematzakwunina, nu yise oo sootuhikwu suda oo manepu soomuꞌwakwu. Soo Pharisee numu togesoo sutaꞌyoo tu tumaꞌemukwana gi nematzagana, puusoo besa nasooyugwena.’ Tamme ka tammesoo besa nasooyugwena gi hee ka Te Naa-nakwana. Pana tamme ka tammesoo gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo e mee nasooyugwena, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.”
42018015	Mu numu tu doodooamu tooe Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petugonno umu mu nanesootuhiku tuunguna. Mu oo tunakatzimodu ka mu poonnena mu numu nesagwikute ka oo mu manegonno.
42018016	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tu nakatzimodu netamma, “Gi mu numu mu dooamu hane petugonnodu nedagonnopana. Mu tututsekoo dooake nu sootuhikwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tuhaꞌyoo ka haꞌyoo oo tuukwe oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Mu sakwa ka tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.”
42018018	Sumuꞌyoo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubenga, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo nana. Haꞌoo besa sakwa tuwow nu manese namagwetzoi?”
42018019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “U haaꞌa mee e netamma, ‘U besaꞌyoo,’ gi haga besaꞌyoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.
42018020	U oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu: gi numu batsapana, gi numu nowuakupana, gi tuduhapana, gi esayipana numu mane-witu, besa tu naa noko tu pea sooyugwena.”
42018021	Soo nana yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu tuhaꞌyoona meeoo naꞌunnedu nakabetseakena.”
42018022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nana unnena nakase mee oo netamma, “U sakwa noꞌoko u hemma-ma tumuse ka u nahemena ka mu tutuha manedu hanekuse, oꞌno yise u ewow hee-gakwu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona. Oꞌno u yise nuka nakatzinummekwu.”
42018023	Soo nana yise ka oo unnena nakase suda soonamme ka ewow hee-gana, tu hemma unu nenagana.
42018024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonnepunnena ka nana-witu meeoo netamma, “Oosoo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo tuheka-ma nasoonatzina gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42018026	Mu oo tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakase punnoꞌo meeoo tutubenga, “Hownnekoo soo numu yise mesoo namagwetzoi?”
42018027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Soo numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu.”
42018028	Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo numme noꞌoko hemma puu ne heegana maꞌwugese u-no maneke.”
42018029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tooe haga tooe, tu nobe maꞌwukadu, tu nanumu noko hemma tu hee-gana tu doodooamu tu tubewabe, ka nuka nagena ewowsoo besa noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu, menoꞌo manakwana. Mu nasootuhikwuna gi moobegwagakwu.”
42018031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo umu tu nakatzimodu sukwesoo nesumudoose umu-no yadooana meeoo mu netamma, “Tamme ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, soo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo nu-witu tubotugu oto nanemamakwu. Umu numu tutunehanedu nu-ma tzakadukwuse, ka mu tiboꞌo-matoo e tzamunase umu yise e batsakwu.
42018033	Umu tiboꞌo yise e kobitoo toohegonno e wupagetana, yise e batsakwu. Pana nu yise saaꞌa pahe tabe mease tuusootabuedooa,” mee.
42018034	Pana mu oo nakatzimodu yise gi oo nakasopedakwatoo yise meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Haꞌyoo naꞌunnedu tamme gi nakasopedakwatoo?”
42018035	Ka Jericho tzageꞌe ka Jesus manekena sumuꞌyoo gi tubootabuedu nana oonow po-kumaba katuna ka mu numu natummatzi tuunguyakwe.
42018036	Esoo gi tubootabuedu nana ka mu ewow numu pukumi meadu meeoo tubenga, “Haꞌoo haaꞌa namanewunu?” mee.
42018037	Mu numu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Jesus yaa kemma.”
42018038	Soo gi tubootabuedu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “E Pabeꞌe e sootuhi.”
42018039	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo-naꞌoonnakwitu yise oo nedayakwe. “Gi unnepana,” mee oo netammayakwe. Pana soo gi tubootabuedu yise pabasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe, “U E Pabeꞌe, u sakwa e sootuhi.”
42018040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yooꞌipetu ka mu numu ka gi tubootabuedu tsaka tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pu-baa ka gi tubooetabooedu natzaka petuse meeoo oo tubenga,
42018041	“Hownnekoo natummatzi u sookwina?” mee. Soo gi tubootabuedu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nu gi tubootabuena yaatu soopoonne.”
42018042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka gi tubootabuedu netamma, “Mow u ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, menoꞌo yise u yaatu poonnekwu.”
42018043	Yabesoo yise soo gi tubootabuedu besa manise yaatu besa poonnena ka Te Pabeꞌe nakwi ka podo meadabekoo. Mu numu ka gi tubootabuedu nana namabesakuse oo poonnese yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugi.
42019001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jericho mee naneadu-too meana.
42019002	Sumuꞌyoo nana besa manepunnedu Zacchaeus mee naneadu ka tumasumudoope nemadunagadu oonow.
42019003	Ka Te Pabeꞌe soopoonne pana gi oo poonne. Nagutza ewatseoo mu numu ka meetzeꞌe oo wunu.
42019004	Ka sunngabe-ma tuboyahoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tu kumi meakwuse.
42019005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sunngabe-toohakwi meana anguse ka Zacchaeus poonnese mee oo netamma, “Yabeupu wueke nu u-baaꞌyookwu yaa tabeno.”
42019006	Zacchaeus besa soonammese wuekese ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nobe-kwitoo bika.
42019007	Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootzemakooha mee oo netamma, “Soo Jesus ka tumaꞌemukwadu-baaꞌyookwu.”
42019008	Soo Zacchaeus ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Nu naamookwitu ka e hee-ga-matu mu tutuha manedu numu namadeakwu. Nu ka mu numu e tutuhana watsu oo-koobakwi nu oo makodyukudooa.”
42019009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Yaa tabeno-manakwana u ka u dooamu-no namagwetzoikwu. Yaa tabeno u Te Naa tooa manekwu.
42019010	Nu yaa teepu-koobatoo nataya tumaꞌemukwadu magwetzoikwuse.”
42019011	Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunnena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo ka Jerusalem tzageꞌe oosoo ka o petugase soo Te Naa mu numu-kooba katuna mu moohekwudu ka Te Pabeꞌe mayugwekwu,” mee mu numu sokwamapunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sokwamana sopedakwadoo yise mee mu netamma, “Oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadookwu gi menoꞌosoo namanikwudu nu saaꞌa numu moohekwudu.”
42019012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu natugweꞌnga, “Soo sumuꞌyoo nana ka numu-kooba katudu nanumu ka mu numu-kooba pumme tu neyugwese oosoo ka umu sumumano (10) pumme tummatzidu mee netamma, ‘Nu nanasusuꞌmuhoo oa tupe mu hemegakwu. Mu saaꞌa mu maꞌewadooa. Nu kwingaꞌa meakwu ka noꞌoko tamme-kooba katudu-matoo oosoo mu-kooba katudu e nemayugwekwu. Nu yise nanemamakwutooase yise saaꞌa yowsoo kodyu petukwu, mu ka oa tupe maꞌewase saaꞌa nu-matoosoo oo makodyukudooa.’
42019014	Soo numu-kooba katudu yise mea susumudu mu numu otuoo ka nana gi petzabena sumuoo numu taya ka noꞌoko numu-kooba katudu-matoo mee oo tunetammakute, ‘Gi ookow nana ka numme-kooba katukwudu nemayugwepana, numme gi oo petzape.’
42019015	Pana oosoo numu-kooba katudu naneyugwese yise punowsoo kodyukakwu. Ka petugase, ka umu pumme tummatzidu nabatoo bi. ‘Howgena umu e tumaꞌewaku?’ mee soonammena.
42019016	Soo mooeꞌugasoo oa tupe nageadu oo-baa petuse
42019017	mee oo netamma, ‘U sumuoo oa tupe e gea nu oo maꞌewase menoꞌo yise nu sumumano (10) u makodyukukwu.’ Soo numu-kooba katudu yise mee oo netamma, ‘U tubetse besa manepu-gaꞌyoo. U besa e tumatugukupu ka sumuoosoo ume e gease. Menoꞌo yise nu besa u sootunagakwu, nu sumumano (10) nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu-kooba u nemadabuekwu.’
42019018	Soo penakwatu oo-baa petuse, punnoꞌo meeoo, ‘U sumuoosoo oa tupe e gease, nu yise punnoꞌo oo maꞌewase menoꞌo mangeoo oa tupe nu u makodyukudooa.’
42019019	Soo numu-kooba katudu meeoo oo netamma, ‘U punnoꞌo besa manepu-gaꞌyoo u manegeoo nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu-kooba nemadabuekwu.’
42019020	Kummaꞌyoosoo yise oo-baa petuhoose, mee oo netamma, ‘Yaa soo oa tupe nuka u geapu nu a makodyukukwusoo. Nu wanapu-naga a watzetugu.
42019021	Nu oo watzetugu ka u-ma suina, u nenaduꞌya. U ooosapa numu-makoo tusoogwipunnedu.’
42019022	Soo numu-kooba katudu yise meeoo oo netamma, ‘Nu ka nenaduyana ooosapa numu-makoo tusoogwipunnedu, u sakwa uga ka ume e geana tooe how tooe sootunagase uga punnoꞌo oo maꞌewa.’
42019024	Soo numu-kooba katudu yise ka mu numu oo konnodu mee netamma, ‘Ka oa tupe oo-makoo gwuuse ka nana sumumanoko (10) e makodyukudooadu saaꞌa gea.’
42019025	Mu numu yise meeoo netamma, ‘Mooasoo oosoo besa manepunne ewow oa tupe-gaꞌyoo. Haꞌoo yise u oo-koobakwisoo oo tugeakwu?’
42019026	Pana soo numu-kooba katudu mu nanekwegea, ‘Soo numu ka pumme tu tugeana besa matuguna, oosoo ewasoo nageakwu. Soo numu yise ka gi toge tumatuguwunudu gi besa oo tzasooana umu-makoo nahanekwu.
42019027	Menoꞌo yise ka umu nuka wohonedu ka numu-kooba e katukwu-kwi gi e petzabedu yaatoo masumudoose yaa e poonnenaꞌyoo kadoo mu mayugwe.’ “
42019028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo unnemakwuse ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no Jerusalem-kwitoo meaꞌa.
42019029	Bethpage noko Bethany mee nananeadu-kumi meana ka poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu tzageꞌe petuga. Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe waahoo pumme nakatzimodu-matu taya, meeoo mu netammana,
42019030	“Ka Bethpage-witoo memeakwate. Onoko mu sumuoo tzagaze gisoo namadusooꞌyookudu mayukwu, oo tsadopase nu-matoo oo wetzakake.
42019031	Ka numu mumme tubenga, ‘How mannena mu oo tzadoopa?’ mee mu nekwegea, ‘Ne Pabeꞌe oo soogwaꞌe.’ “
42019032	Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise memease pumme tu tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo oo mayu petuga.
42019033	Ka tzagaze mu tzadoopawunu, mu numu mu tubenga, “How manena mu a tzadoopa?”
42019034	Umu yise mu nekwegea, “Soo Ne Pabeꞌe a nekwaꞌe.” Oꞌno mu numu yise gi hayoo mu netamma.
42019035	Mu wahaꞌyoo naana yise ka tzagaze ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo tzakakase, wega oo-kooba hanese, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu wega-kooba katunoꞌo.
42019036	Ewaꞌyoo numu wega ka po-kooba wupatzeta.
42019037	Oosoo yise ka tuupetukana ka poꞌwoadu Olive petakwana mea mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise papaba apegeana oo nesookwugaꞌe ka oo manena poonnena.
42019038	Umu papaba apegeana, “U yow, Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoidu.”
42019039	Ewaꞌyoo mu Pharisee-matu yise meeow ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Mu ume nakatzimodu nesagwiku.”
42019040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu nekwegea, “Ka umuoo gi unakwe, kukummaꞌyoosoo e nesookwugikwu.”
42019041	Ka Jerusalem mee naneadu tzageꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe manegana ka Jerusalem poonnese mu numu tutuha soonammeguna mu yagakute
42019042	mee unakwe, “Tooe menoꞌo pana mu sakwa oo soopedakwadoo, ka mumme e soomagwetzoikwuse pana mu gi e nakaheesoobedya.
42019043	Saaꞌa umu mu wokwohomu mu naꞌoonakwi mani petuse mu takone petukwu, mu gi hownnekoo oo namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu paaꞌa teepu tapoꞌwogese ka mu tupe koodeadoo-koobakwi mu-baa tsonooahookwu.
42019044	Umu mu numu kadooꞌoo maꞌese mu nobe wunabetahookwu ka yow Jerusalem-witu. Gi sumuꞌyoo sapa natapoꞌwogedu tupe namayukwu. Sukwe puuwapudooahookwu. Soo Te Naa menoꞌosoo mu mabetseana mu magwetzoikwu mee tooe soonammepana mu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya.”
42019045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka hemma-ma tumudu-matoo meahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu oeꞌyoona hemma-ma tumudu tayapebuꞌahoo oosoo ka mu manena gi togeꞌyookuna. Ka mu tayana soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Naa ka umu oꞌnosoo tu yadooawabe ekow po tugupu, ‘Soo e nobe pukwiꞌyoona noꞌobatusoo numu nanesootuhikwu.’ Mu ka e nobe-kwiꞌyoo gi besa manakwe ka miꞌyoona nanatuduhana.”
42019047	Nonotsa tabeno soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooe ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona. Mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee unnena oo hoawi pana gi hownnekoo oo batsa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu ewa oo naꞌoonnakwi mamanepunne numu yise mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe tuꞌeapunnena oꞌno umu gi hownnekoo how Te Pabeꞌe yugwe.
42020001	Sumu ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu tunedyooedyakwe ka Pabow Nanesootuhi Nobe-kobenaꞌyoona umu Jew numu tutunehanedu-nagatu oo-baa petuse,
42020002	mee oo tubenga. “Haga meeoo u netammana u ka Pabow Nanesootuhi Nobe-kwi u tooe namabedakwabawunu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu punnoꞌo ka John-witu mu tubengakwu.
42020003	Mu ka e nanekwegease nu punnoꞌo ka nuga pooha-witu mu tuukwekwu.
42020004	Haga ka John meeoo netammana oosoo numu baa-wi matzaka soo Te Naa pute oosoo puusoo oo sukwe manakwe?”
42020005	Umu yise puusoo mee nananetamma, “Tamme ka meeoo oo nanekwegease, ‘Soo Te Naa ka John mu numu baa-wi matzaka tuungu,’ meeoo oo netamma. Esoo meeoo te netammakwu, ‘How yise mu ka John gi nakaꞌoedyukute?’ Tamme meeoo ka Jesus netammase, puusoo oo manakwe, mu ewow numu punnoꞌo te kusedyakwu umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo John Te Naa yadooawabe.”
42020007	Umu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Numme gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
42020008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo gi hemma mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42020009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise mu numu meeoo natugwenga, “Sumuꞌyoo nana tumasuꞌana yise mu numu ooka mabetsea tuunguse, yise mea.
42020010	Ka oo kwasuse, soo tumasuadu ka sumuoo tu tummatziwabe umu-matu taya. Oo naamookwitu a tupooe oo hane tuunguna. Mu numu yise ka pumatoo natayadu petugase oo wupagetahoose gi a tupooe-matu oo hanekupana oo tayakwunihoo.
42020011	Soo tumasuadu yise tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo pumme tummatzi oetusoo taya. Mu numu yise tubetse suda manena oo wupagetana punowsoo oo taꞌya gi hemma oo geapana.
42020012	Oꞌno yise soo tumasuadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo tuwazoo taya, ookow yise manayahoose punowsoo taya.
42020013	Soo tumasuadu yise meeoo tusooyugwe, ‘Howga yise nu manekwu? Nu ka e besaa tooa tayakwu. Umu sakwa sumuna ookow e besaa tooa nakaꞌoedyuku.’
42020014	Pana mu numu ka oo poonnese meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, ‘Yow esoo ka tumasuadu besaa dooa. Tamme a batsowse, ka oo tubewabe manekwu,’ mee unnena.
42020015	Umu yise ka tumasuape-wikoo oo matzatsepoogese oo batsa.
42020016	Soo tumusuadu ka oo nakahoose ka tu tooaꞌa nabatsahoose unu sutaꞌa, oosoo yise mu tumahese mu goe. Oꞌno yise oosoo tumasuape hee-gaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu hane tuungukwu.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunne oo unnena nakasopedakwadoose mee unne, “Suda hayoo.”
42020017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nayadooawabe meeꞌe nu-kwitu botugupu-gaꞌyoo, ‘Mu tupe nobe-toodu puu ka sumuoo tupe moodyise. Soo mu tumoodyina tookwa gi pumme wuni-waꞌneꞌyoo o ka nobe madipunnedu.’ Nu yaahoo oosoo nanetammadu tupe Te Naa nobe madipunnedu.
42020018	Nu yow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namayugwekoo. Ka numu nanemadabuekwu-kwi oo manepetuse umu gi e nakaheesoobedyadu kadoo namayugwekwu.”
42020019	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe umu pukwitu netammana nakasopedakwatoona oo wutumahookwu mee unnegonno pana mu ewahoo Jew numu-ma sui.
42020020	Umu tutunehanedu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe oo-matoo taya mu tutubenga tuunguna ka Te Pabeꞌe nehoawipunnena oo tunedyooepu-kwitu oo hooawipunne yise ka wakwawaꞌa numu moohedu-tamme oo tzamunahookwu.
42020021	Umu oo-matoo natayadu yise mee oo netamma, “Numme kaaheno numu u tunedyooena sopedakwatoo. U ooosapa Te Naa kaaheno unnepu numu tuukwenoꞌo. U gi numu tuutzeadu, mu numu u-nakwana sumuꞌyoosoo.
42020022	U ka mu wakwawaꞌa-tamme mu teepu-kooba natunekwiyi-kwitu haꞌyoo sooyugweꞌe?”
42020023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pumme mu nanekwegeakwu-kwitoo pumme mu hoawipunnena sopedakwadoona, mee mu netamma,
42020024	“Mu tumanagana e tzapoonneku.” Umu yise sumuoo oo tzapoonnekute. “Haga namanagana ma-ma?” meeꞌe mu tubenga. Umu yise meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka mu Tibo-kooba katudu namanagana ma-ma.”
42020025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Tamme sakwa mu Tiboꞌo numu pabeꞌe geasoo umuoo nanumu tumadabuena. Tamme puu Te Naa tumadabuena Te Naa yise te hee-gaꞌyoo.”
42020026	Umu tutunehanedu-matu natayadu gi haꞌyoo unni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka ewow numu ka pumme nakapunne.
42020027	Mu Jew numu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo numu gi hownnekoosoo ka yaꞌeyina soo oo moogooa ka Te Naa-baatoo meꞌa, gi too gwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwedu. Susumudu umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse nanatugweꞌnga.
42020028	Mee yise umu oo netamma, “Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu mee tunetammapu, ‘Soo nana ka yaꞌese soo oo wanngaꞌa sakwa ka oo nodukwa nodukwadoose ka tu Pabeꞌe dooamu-dookukwu.’
42020029	Umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu-witu. Soo mu pabeꞌe nodukwadoose, gisoo dooamu-gana yaꞌe.
42020030	Umu oo wangaꞌamu nanasuꞌmu nanapenakwa ookowsoo nodukwadoose sapa punnoꞌo gisoo oo-makoo dooamu-doona tuipetuga.
42020032	Saaꞌa soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo yaꞌe.
42020033	U meeoo unnena, ‘Soo numu tu yaꞌekwikoo natzadyodase,’ ka ume unne-kwaꞌne mane haga yise umu-matu ka mogoꞌne nodukwa-gakwu, umu ka noꞌyoona oo nodukwa-gapana?”
42020034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu numu menoꞌo ka yaa teepu-kooba mommodu ooosapa nananodukwadooyikwu.
42020035	Soo numu ka tuise namayodase gi nananodukwamu-gakwu, umu ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe, mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
42020036	Umuoo Te Naa besa dooamu ka oo tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhipu.
42020037	Tubetse togesapa soo Te Naa numu tu tui-kwikoo mayodakwu soo Moses pana meeoo te netamma ka numu tu tui-kwikoo namayodase. Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka niwunudu sawabe-kobena wunupunnena soo Te Naa mee oo netamma, ‘Nu yow mu Naa. Umu u nanamooatupu mee nananeadu Abraham, Isaac yise Jacob nu-matoo togesoo nanesootuhi.’ Mu Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob tookwa togesoo gwetzoimoꞌo umu ka Te Naa-matoo togesoo nanesootuhimona tooe oꞌnosoo tuipupana.
42020038	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu moogooa gi watzekute.”
42020039	Susumudu mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu-matu o konnopunnena ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U besakoo mu tuukweꞌe.”
42020040	Umu yise gi hemmasoo oo tubenga-waꞌne mane.
42020041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Umu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu meeoo numu tunedyooe,” soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka David-maꞌyoona suaketu. Hownnekoo yise soo David ka Te Pabeꞌe natubangakwu?
42020042	Tooe soo David puusoo ka tu hoobeadoo-kwi mee tubotugupana, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netammapu, “U sakwa ooosapa e tumadinakwa katu,
42020043	ka umu ume wohonedu e matzooekunoꞌotoo tooe.” ’
42020044	Nu ka David kobenatusoo, soo Te Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya. Nu ka David-maꞌyoona kemmadu, oooneꞌyoona soo David, ‘E Pabeꞌe,’ natubanga,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe.
42020045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu pumme nakatizmodu mee mu netammadyakwe ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo nakapunne,
42020046	“Mu sakwa gi mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu-kwaꞌne manepana. Umu puu besa-kwi tu namasooa-ma nasootzaꞌmepunne numu pumme besa neyugwena petukudu. Umuoo ka tu naꞌewa tuka numu-koobatu naneyugwena soobedyadu punnoꞌo, oꞌno mu numu besa mu sooyugwekwu meeꞌe nasooyugwedu.
42020047	Nanesootuhaꞌe mee naneyugwe pana ka mu pepeawabe nobe umu-makoo tuduha tuwazoo. Umuoo tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi.”
42021001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu ewow unu nanenagadu hee-gakoo numu tubebuamena mu poonnepunne.
42021002	Sumuꞌyoo tutuha manedu peawabe tu penebetu oe tuoonahoo.
42021003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka pumme nakatzimodu meeoo netamma, “Yow esoo besow mogoꞌne. Esoo tu penebetu oe tuooꞌna.
42021004	Yise mu naana gi ewa oe tuoonana, ka a namasumutoo-kwi tooe ewa hee-gapana. Esoo mogoꞌne tu penebetu oe tuooꞌna. Gi haaꞌnokoo oe tuooꞌna,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe.
42021005	Susumudu mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu, ka mu nanenagadu besow tupe namadabuena oo poonnena oo nesookwugaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma,
42021006	“Esoo yow menoꞌo mu poonnena esoo besa tabuadu yaanona nobe te wokwohomu saaꞌa noꞌoko a wudyoomedakwunidooa.”
42021007	Mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Hannano yise oo mani petukwu how saaꞌa numme oo sopedakwadoo tabuakwu?”
42021008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu mumme nemooaga oo nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewaꞌyoosoo numu mee mu netammakwu, ‘Nu yow mu Pabeꞌe,’ mee mu nemooagana gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana.
42021009	Mu tuwazoo ka tu nanaꞌakwe-kwitu nakakwu, tooetoo nanaꞌakwekwu pana gi oo-ma nakasuipana. Tooe yoo sumuna mooe namanekekwu sapa pana gisoo soo yaatu teepu atasoo e yugwekwuna oe manakwe.
42021010	Tooe hanotu tooe saaꞌa soo te teepu suyugadooa. Ewa-baatu numu kukummaꞌyoosoo nanagoena,
42021011	tukapu natugena natseagoena soo teepu yise yutsungayikwu. Tooe hemma tooe mu koomeba-nagakoo poonnekwu.”
42021012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Gisoo hemma ꞌyoo manakwe umu gi nananesootuhidu gi mu petzabena mu-ma tzakaduse mu wupagetana mu wutumetakwu. Oꞌno yise mu numu-kooba katudu-kobenaꞌyoona mu nanehanekwu nu-koobatoo.
42021013	Oꞌno sakwa yise mu nukwitu mu tuukwe.
42021014	Ka pumme mu nehanekwuse nakwutumase saaꞌa mu unnekwu-kwitu gi soohanepana.
42021015	Nu saaꞌa ka mu nanehane nuusoo mu unnekwuna mu nemadabuekudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa soo mumme tumooꞌoodu gi hanotu haꞌyoo unnetooa.
42021016	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu gi e petzabedooa u nananumudooe suda u matugudooa yise mu goedooa saaꞌa. Tooe umu gi e sooꞌoedyukudu gi mumme numu petzabekwuse sapa, mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu gi e maꞌwukadu, nu mu magwetzoikwu.
42021020	Mu ka te wokwohomu ka Jerusalem-naꞌoonnakwi manise mu poonnena mu oo sopedakwadookwu, pudusoo mu wokwohomu ka Jerusalem kadooꞌoo maꞌekwuse.
42021021	Mu numu Jerusalem-witu sakwa ka giba-matoo namameaꞌa umu oo tzage-kwitu sakwa punnoꞌo mu-nosoo, gi sakwa haga Jerusalem-witoo namameapana.
42021022	Soo Te Naa ka oꞌnosoo ka mumme tooꞌe nemananaꞌwipu mu-matu gi oo nakahoyase menoꞌo yise mu-koobadooe.
42021023	Mu momokoꞌne kokoheadu yise mu nunupetzekudu tutuha namanatzayakwe ka numu tuyagoese.
42021024	Susumudu numu nagoehookwu, susumudu punnoꞌo ona tooe hano tooe kwingaꞌatoo nawetzakakwunihookwu. Tubetse wunaꞌmetoo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakwu. Saaꞌa ka Te Naa tunetammana namamakwuse, soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu punowsoo Jerusalem-witoo nemakodyukukwu.
42021025	Togesapa soo Te Naa ka yaatu tamme-koobatu atasoo yugwekwu. Ka tubetse baa unu bayutsungadyakwe mu numu oo-ma nakasui.
42021026	Mu numu tubetse suikwu ka gi oo sopedakwadoona ka hemma yoo manakwe.
42021027	Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa gi nasootookepana ka yoo hemma manekwu, nu mu magwetzoikwu. Ka yaa teepu-koobatoo mu numu e poonnekwu ka e pooha patakwetseana tubongo ka koommeba naga-kwi e wuegena.”
42021029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Ka sunngabe pooedooagese mu puu oo sopedakwadoo ka pudusoo tatza manepetukwu.
42021031	Ooonekoosoo mu ka yoo hemma suda manegena poonnekwu, mu oo sooꞌoedyukukwu pudusoo kodyu petukwuna.
42021032	Mu numu menoꞌo yaa teepu-koobatu gisoo tuina ka Jerusalem kadoo nuugwekwuna poonnekwu.
42021033	Esoo nuga unnepu besa naꞌunnedu gi hee atasoo a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42021034	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu gi ka e kodyu petukwuna soomaꞌyu. Ka tu manegonnona suuꞌmu soomaꞌyuna suda oo sokwamakute ka tooe how tooe manena. Nu gi nuka mu soogwinoꞌo umu-baa petukwu. Mu sakwa nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi hemma tu hee-gakwitu soohanekupana, gi suda oo sokwamakupana. Mu mooasoo namamakwupunne.
42021036	Tamme sakwa yise Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo ka suda ka mu gi nakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme kemmadu-makoo te magwetzoikwu. Oꞌno yise e petuse mu e dooamu nasootuhikwu.”
42021037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tuutsekoo poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu-ma tooaꞌe. Nonotsa tabeno ka nanesootuhi nobe-kumabatoo meayina ka mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tunedyooebodotu.
42021038	Nonotsa awamooa mu numu awamooasoo sumuhooyakwe ka oo nakabodona.
42022001	Mooa dyongona oetu, oꞌnosoo te manena te natzamawukwuna soomayuna, yise ewa tuka, Gi Namayuadu Tukaba tukakwu.
42022002	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe watze batsakwu meeꞌe sokwama pana ka mu numu-ma suipunne.
42022003	Ka sumuoo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu, Judas mee naneadu soo sutaꞌyoo ookow maꞌemukwa.
42022004	Soo sutaꞌyoo ka mu tutunehanedu-matoo ka Judas taya mu tuukwe tuunguna oosoo mu tzapoonnekukwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona, oꞌno mu oo watze tzakadukwu.
42022005	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu besa sokwamana, “Numme u tumanagakukwu,” meeꞌe ka Judas netamma.
42022006	Soo Judas, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu bikakwu, gi numu poonnena,” mee tusooyugwe.
42022007	Yaa tabenoo numme ka seepu tooaꞌa batsakwu, ka gi namayuadu tukaba noko ne ewa tuka-kwi manepetu.
42022008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter noko John meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa mooe memeakwatese ka te nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna mabetsabega.”
42022009	Umu yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanoꞌyoo yise numme tugoomahanegakwu?”
42022010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Ka Jerusalem-wi mu pepetugase mu sumuoo nana banoꞌosa tu tsoabu-kooba tokwuhudu wegeakwu. Mu saaꞌa ookow nagekadooa. Ka nobe-kwi oo egeakase oo-nosoo saaꞌa tzoonooahoo kwatese
42022011	ka nana oo nobe-gakoo mee saaꞌa netamma, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no yaa u-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhi yongo tukakwu.’
42022012	Esoo nana nobe-gaꞌyoo yise mu tzapoonnekukwu ka paꞌatu nobe-kwiꞌyoona ka tukapu mu yongo tukakwuna mu saadooa.”
42022013	Umu yise mooe memeow tu tukakwuna mahaneookwuse.
42022014	Ka tu yongose, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu nakatzimodu-no tukana
42022015	mee mu netamma, “Nu tubetse unu mu-no e nanesootuhi yongo tukakwuna petzape gisoo nabatzana.
42022016	Esoo te nanesootuhi yongo tukana ka numu-koobatu e nabatsakwuna oo wahadu ka seepu dooa nabatsa-kwaꞌne. Yow nakwitu umu nanesootuhi tukakwuna e nabatsana-kobena.”
42022017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tseda gwuuꞌhoose atsa baa oekoo oo-koobatoo nanesootuhihoose umu pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Noꞌyoona sakwa mu ma-matu hebe.
42022018	Nu mu tuukweꞌe nu ekow atsa baa ka yaa teepu-koobatu tubetse gi hebekwusoo, saaꞌa Te Naa ka te teepu mapudutupudoose oꞌno yise nu tubetse pudutupusoo hebekwu.”
42022019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuꞌhoose ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhihoose oo tzabokase yise mee mu netamma, “Yoonnekoo soo e tookoo mu-koobatoo natzabokakwu eka tukaba-waꞌne. E soomayu saaꞌa ka a tukana.”
42022020	Ka mu tukamakwuse ooosoo ka tseda-witu yukwe soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unnena, “Nu sakwa mu-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo atsa baa e puupe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
42022021	Soo sumuꞌyoo numu ka umu nuka batsakwadu-tamme e tzamunahookwudu tamme-baa tuka.
42022022	Mooasoo soo Te Naa meeoo tunetamma, nu ooonnekoo nabatsakwu. Pana saaꞌa oosoo umu wohomu nu-matoo bikepu tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
42022023	Umu oo nakatzimodu yise mee nanatubenga, “Hanotugina tamme-matu yoo manekwu?”
42022024	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu puusoo nanano nananepetukute. “Ka puusoo nana suꞌsumme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakwasoo manepunnekwu,” meeꞌe nanatusooyugwena.
42022025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu nakana yise mee mu netamma, “Gi mu wakwawaꞌa numu-kooba katudu-kwaꞌne, paba nasooyugwepana. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mooe natatsungadu sakwa mu tummatzi. Gi paba nananeyugwepana mu numu tummatzi, tooe nu mu Pabeꞌe pana nu ooosapa mu-kwitu poohigena. Mu sakwa e manena tuusoodyahana nu-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mu mooe tatsungadu sakwa mu tummatzi. Mu ka numu tummatzidu gi heesoobedya. Pana nu mu Pabeꞌe, yise mu tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa nanatummatzi punnoꞌo.
42022028	Mu nu-no tukakwu ka saaꞌa Te Naa-baa mu petukase. Mu yise nu-nosoo ka mu Jew numu nemadabuekwu mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe mu numu nuka wohone sapa.
42022031	E besa puaꞌa Simon Peter, soo sutaꞌyoo mu tapokakwu te manena gi petzabena.
42022032	Pana nu u nanesootuhikute u sakwa gi e nakaꞌoedyukumakwupana. Ka u unnekwuna saaꞌa nemakodyuse u sakwa umu ta pupuaꞌamu besa mu nanesootuhi meakwuna mu nemayugwekwu.”
42022033	Soo Simon Peter yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Nu ooosapa u-noꞌyookwu tooe taka mu wutuma tooetoo taka mu goekwuse sapa.”
42022034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Simon Peter meeoo netamma, “Awamooasoo gisoo ka tsekuna kwuꞌa yaka, u saaꞌa pahe mu numu mee netammapunnedooa, ‘Nu maka Jesus gi sopedakwatoo.’ “
42022035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu meeoo tubenga, “Nu ka oꞌnosoo ka besa e unnepu mu numu mu tuukwe tuunguna ka mu tayase tooe gi mu hee-gakoo sapa, gi tuwow mu magoꞌo-gana, gi tuwazoo kummaꞌakoosoo mu moko-gaꞌyoo sapa. Mu puu uga hemma tuuke haaꞌa?” Umu mee oo nanekwegea, “Numme u unne-kwaꞌnesoo gi hemma tuuke.”
42022036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Ka yaa manakwana ka mease ka mu hemma magoꞌo noko hanega ka ooone-gana. Mu ka gi segesa-gana ka mu wegabedo tutsanabedu.
42022037	Soo nu-kwitu nanemamakwudu nabotugudu oo-toogoo manipetukwu. Mee oosoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Nu ka mu nanasuda tumatugudu-kwaꞌnesoo namatugukwu.’ “
42022038	Umu oo nakatzimodu mee oo netamma, “Mooasoo numme waahoo segesa-gaꞌyoo.” “Gi nu mownnekoo segesa netamma,” meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe mu netamma.
42022039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-no ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌase ka poꞌwoadu Olive mee naneadu-matoo petuga, oosoo ka uga ooosapa maneyina.
42022040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa nanesootuhi. Oꞌno mu ka sutakoo mumme nemooaka mu gi oo-ma nakatzabedooa.”
42022041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise gi haaꞌno umu kwingaꞌatoo mease meatzedose mee nanesootuhaꞌe,
42022042	“E Naa, soo tubetse suda nuka tu yugwekwuna nu-tamme kemmana nu gi oo nasoomanekena. Ka ume nuka tunetammapu nu oo mayohokwu.”
42022043	Oꞌno yise sumuꞌyoo soo Te Naa tummatziwabe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-baa tabua petuse ka Te Pabeꞌe besakoosoo sootuhidooa.
42022044	Togesoo ka pumme tu yugwekwuna oo soonammetugupunne soo oo nanekoonana ka teepu-koobatoo puupe pasawedu-kwaꞌne manewunu.
42022045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhimakwuse yotsese ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-baa petuhooga ka suda sokwamana mu utuaꞌe mu mayu petuse,
42022046	mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi utuꞌipana. Yosuhoose nanesootuhigonno, oꞌno mu ka Sutakoo mumme nemooaga mu gi oo-ma nakatzabe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
42022047	Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo yadooawunu soo nana Judas mee naneadu mu tukwutumadu-no ewow numu oo-baa moohe petu. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse oo mitzadyaꞌme. Oꞌno umu oo sopedakwatoohoo.
42022048	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo o netamma, “Judas how u suda e matugukwuse sapa e mitzadyaꞌme?”
42022049	Mu Te Pabeꞌe-no tunakatzimodu ka tukwutumadu poonnese meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Tamme haaꞌa umu-no nagoekwu?”
42022050	Sumuꞌyoo mu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu yise sumuoo mu Jew pabeꞌe tummatziwabe naka tsekaꞌakwunihoo.
42022051	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mow sapa.” Ka meeoo oo netammase ka nana naka pukwikoo oo nakwugaꞌahoo-kooba matuguse soo oo naka besa mani.
42022052	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu Jew pabeꞌe tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu koodooꞌoo-ma e tumahepana, wobe-ma, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo.
42022053	Tooe mu ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa gi nu-ma tzakadupu-gaꞌyoo. Muusoo tooꞌe. Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotuku oꞌnosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
42022054	Mu tukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma tzakaduse oo bika ka mu Jew-numu tutunehanedu naa-matoo. Soo Peter kwingaꞌa mu-nakwi meadabe.
42022055	Ka mu numu yise ka tunehane nobe-kobenakoo pedahoose soo Peter yise ka mu numu-naga katu.
42022056	Sumuꞌyoo tseadumu yise ka Peter poonnese ka oo tsetsoogase yise meeoo unakwe, “Esoo nana ka Jesus-matu.”
42022057	Pana soo Peter yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu gi ma-notu.”
42022058	Ka mu numu togesoo aataꞌa, kummaꞌyoosoo numu ka Peter poonnese punnoꞌo meeoosoo, “U punnoꞌo umu-notu.” Pana soo Peter yise meeoo ka nana netamma, “Nu gi.”
42022059	Togesoo mu tuutooe kummaꞌyoosoo numu punnoꞌo ka Peter meeoo netamma. “U tubetse yow ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu. U Galilee-witu.”
42022060	Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Nu gi mu numu nemooaga, nu gi umu-notu.” Togesoo ka Peter ookow nemayuyakwe soo tsekana kwuꞌa yagakooha.
42022061	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter poonnegaꞌa. Soo Peter yise oo soomayuhoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme netammapu. “Gisoo ka tsekana yaka pahe tooe u gi e nanenamaꞌyoodooa.”
42022062	Soo Peter pumme unnepu soomayuse yagakooha.
42022063	Mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe nasootzamekuna oo pooe wutumase yise oo wupageta.
42022064	Yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U tooꞌe noꞌokosoo gi hemma watzekudu, haga menoꞌo u wupageta?”
42022065	Mu ewaꞌyoo tutukwutumadu haꞌyoo tooe oo netammana oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe.
42022066	Ka tu tabuakese mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe mu tunehanedu-koobenatoo hane petuga yise mu tutunehanedu meeoo oo tubenga.
42022067	“U haaꞌa yow soo nanetammadu Ne Pabeꞌe?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Tooe mu mumme e tuukwe sapa gi mu e oedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
42022069	Saaꞌa mu e poonnekwu Te Naa toogoopatu-kumaba e katu numme mu tunemadabuekukwu.”
42022070	Mu tutunehanedu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Naa Tooa?” Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Aha, nu yow soo Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
42022071	“Oosoo ka meeoo naneyugwena puusoo gi toge-tamme kemmowgena,” mee mu tutunehanedu nanaꞌunakwe.
42023001	Mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakunana ka tiboꞌo numu nehanedu Pilate mee naneadu-kobena oo bi petuga.
42023002	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nemooyugwena ka Pilate mee netamma, “Numme eka nana mayu esoo ewa ka mu numu suda neyugwe. Gi ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu ka mu tumasumudooyina hemepana, mee mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu,’ mee unakwe.”
42023003	Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “U haaꞌa mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Aha, o umesoo unnena.”
42023004	Soo Pilate yise ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu noꞌoko meeoo netamma, “Nu ka ma-no yadooase, yise esoo ka oo manepunne e tuukwe mu unnena tubetse oo ataꞌyoosoo. Esoo nana gi suda manakwe.”
42023005	Pana mu tutunehanedu ooosapa mee unnegonno, “Esoo ka mu numu suda neyugwewunu, mana ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-toogoo suda tuneyugwedu.”
42023006	Soo Pilate ka meeoo mu unnegonno mu nakase mee mu tubenga, “Oosoo haaꞌa Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmapu?”
42023007	Umu mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha.” Soo Galilee numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu punnoꞌo Jerusalem-wi. Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Herod-matoo nemawuni. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Herod pukwiꞌyoo-kwitoo tzakaka.
42023008	Soo Herod besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe puu-baa natzaka petugase. “Soo Jesus sumuna umu besa tu tumadipu-matu e tzapoonnekukwu. Wunaꞌme nu oetu nakakena besa oo poonne soonamme,” mee soo Herod soonammekatu.
42023009	Ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga pana soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nanekwegea.
42023010	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu osoo konnopunnena noꞌobasoo nanasuda oo netammagonno.
42023011	Soo Herod yise ka umu tutukwutumadu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe suda matuguna oo-maꞌyoona nanekoena oo nasootzamekugonno. Umu unu nanenagadu-kwi oo kwaseakute mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee oo netammana yise ka Pilate-matoosoo oo taya.
42023012	Wunaꞌme mu ka Pilate-no Herod gi natokeꞌyookute pana ka yoo hemma manepetuse umu napuaꞌahoo.
42023013	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa punowse petugase soo Pilate ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu nesumuhoo.
