42023014	Yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ekow nana nu-baa bi petu. Esoo nana ka mu numu suda neyugwe gi ka numme-kooba katudu nakabetsea mu meeꞌe e tuukwena. Nu oetu soohanese masoo gi ka mu unnekwasoo manakwe.
42023015	Nu tuwazoo ka Herod-matoo a tooꞌe taya. Soo Herod punnoꞌo gi how a yugwe ka gi how a manakwe.
42023016	Masoo sakwa sukwe nuupageta yise natzamaꞌwu mee nu mesoo unakwe.”
42023017	Noꞌyoona mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Ka Barabbas ne tzamaꞌwukuse ka Jesus batsa.”
42023019	Soo Barabbas nakwutuma oosoo ka mu wakwawaꞌa tamme-kooba aatadu wohonekese numu goese ooetoo nakwutumadu. Soo mu wakwawaꞌa tumatuguna ka tabeba oe maneyakwe sumuoo nakwutumadu natzamaꞌwuyakwe mu numu oo netutzeayina.
42023020	Soo Pilate ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe netzamaꞌwusoo pana
42023021	mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Oo tzakwenne, oo batsa.”
42023022	Soo Pilate mee mu numu tubenga, “How manena mu ooka e batsa tuungu? Oosoo gi suda tumatugu. Nu oo wupagetase oo tzamaꞌwukwu.”
42023023	Pana mu numu papabatsesoo mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Oo batsa.” Soo Pilate yise mu nakabetsea.
42023024	Soo Pilate yise ka mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa tuungu ka mu numu meeoo unakwe.
42023025	Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwu tooe mu wakwawaꞌa numu-kooba aatadu oo wohonekese numu oo goese sapa.
42023026	Sumuꞌyoo nana Simon mee naneadu ka Cyrene mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu ka Jerusalem-witoo kemmadape. Mu tutukwutumadu Te Pabeꞌe tzemahudu oo wegeagena. Oo-ma tzakaduse ka Te Pabeꞌe puma nataposakwuna oo tokwu tuungu ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwisoo.
42023027	Ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne mu-nakwisoo punnoꞌo meadape sakwina.
42023028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-tamme nakwumunase ka mu momokoꞌne mee netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-koobatoo sagwipana. Mu sakwa muusoo yise ka mu doodooamu-koobatoo sakwi.
42023029	Pudusoo Jerusalem-witu suda namanekwu mu doodooamu-makoo suda namanatzayakwe mu yise mee unakwe, ‘Mu numu gi doodooamu-gaꞌyoo tookwa besa namanatzi.’
42023030	Umu yise ka giba-matoo nanesootuhikoo mee unnena, ‘U sakwa numme-koobatoo aanooakase mee wumabema.’ “ Pana soo giba gi oo manakwe.
42023031	Togesoo e gwetzoi sapa umu suda e yugwe tooe gi suda e manakwe sapa. Umu ka saaꞌa e batsase umu mumme numu Jerusalem-witu unu suda yugwekwu mu ka suda tumatuguse.”
42023032	Mu wahaꞌyoo tuduhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-no natzakase nataposa.
42023033	Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-kwi petugase ka sunngabe nuummadabue-ma oo taposa wahoo tutuduhadu naana naamookwi.
42023034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee nanesootuhikooha, “E Naa u sakwa mu numu yaa manepunnedu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoona yoo e yugwe.” Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka oo kwasu natotsakwate.
42023035	Mu numu oona konnona Te Pabeꞌe tupoonnepunne mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U puu kukummaꞌakoosoo magwetzoi mee unnepana menoꞌo sakwa yise u uusoo namagwetzoi u ka Te Pabeꞌe mee naneꞌyugwena.”
42023036	Mu tutukwutumadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌena. Umu yise ka suda kammadu baa suda manena ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe mapoonneku pana oosoo
42023037	yise gi oo hepe. Umu mee oo netamma, “U sakwa uusoo namagwetzoi, u ka pooha-gana mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee naneyugwena.”
42023038	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tzopa ka sunngabe-ma soo wobe nataposa mee oo-ma natuboꞌo, “Yow soo Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
42023039	Sumuꞌyoo mu tutuduhadu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba nataposadu mee oo netamma, “U ne Pabeꞌe mee naneyugwepana gi hownnekoo te magwetzoaꞌe.”
42023040	Soo sumuꞌyoo tutuhadu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoona sooiwunudu mee netamma, “Gi meeoo unnepana. U sakwa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku ta punnoꞌo nagoekwu.
42023041	Ta ka tumaꞌemukwase sakwa oe tumanaga pana esoo nana puu gi tumaꞌemukwa.”
42023042	Oosoosoo tuduhadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka u pooha-toohakwi kodyu petuse, saaꞌa e sootuhi.”
42023043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa oo nakasopedakwatoo yaa tabeno soo Te Naa ta sootuhikwu ka pu-baa ta pepetugase.”
42023044	Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwitoo oo katu-kwikoo tooe, noꞌoko teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
42023045	Soo taba koomeba-ma natzadoboyahoo. Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwiꞌyoona mu pooha maneyina naamootoo natzakwenedu paꞌanakwana tubongo oo naamootoo natzagebuꞌehoo.
42023046	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa mee nanetzakwiyaꞌe, “E Naa menoꞌo u-matoo e moogooa meahookwu.” Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoo.
42023047	Soo tueyaꞌedu pabeꞌe ka a namanina poonnese mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tookwa togesapa besaꞌyoo.”
42023048	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌehoose oo poonne suda sokwamana ka suda oo matuguse yise nobe-kwitoo kodyu mee nanaꞌunnena, “Tamme suda manakwe, tamme tumaꞌemukwa.”
42023049	Umu Te Pabeꞌe soobedyadu umu momokoꞌne Galilee-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-no kemmapu oona kwingaꞌyoona oo poonne ka suda oo nuugwe.
42023050	Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mee naneꞌa
42023051	Soo Joseph gi ka Jew numu tunehanedu nakabetzape ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nebatsa. Soo Joseph ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana sookwina.
42023052	Soo Joseph ka Pilate-baa petugase ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo oo natuungu.
42023053	Soo Joseph ka oo tookoo hanehoose wunapu-wi oo mabutooe. Gisoo ka taba egea, ka tupe-naga natudotawaga gisoo numu pukwi nanomatuguna, ooweoo soo Joseph ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo nanomatugu.
42023054	Esoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno-kobenasoo namanena.
42023055	Umu momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmaꞌadu ka Joseph nagegase ka Te Pabeꞌe nanomatuguna poonne.
42023056	Umu nobe-kwitoo kodyukase nakwanaꞌa matabue oo tookoo-kooba nahanekwudu. Umu ka Jew tumayohope mayohona gi kodyu ka nanesootuhi tabeno oo manese.
42024001	Ookow moooꞌa awamooasoo tu pudutabuagena mu momokoꞌne Te Pabeꞌe tookoo pukwi nanomatugupu-wi petugonnohoo ka nakwanaꞌa tu tumadabuepu hanena.
42024002	Soo tseketadyadu tupe oo-kobena nahanepu puma oo namatumana namagonnonooekwunipu-gaꞌyoo.
42024003	Umu oe tzoonooahookase sapa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo oekoo maꞌyu.
42024004	“Hano soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo?” mee umu nananetammadyakwe. Wahaꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo umu-baa tapua petu besa patakwetseadu-kwi nanamasooana.
42024005	Mu momokoꞌne umu-ma nasoosuahoo.
42024006	Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo mee mu momokoꞌne netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Gi ka togesoo nummenummedu numu ka numu tuipu-nagatu watepana. Te Pabeꞌe gwetzoi.
42024007	Mu sakwa oo soomayu ka gisoo nabatsana oosoo mu tuukwe, ‘Pudusoo mu sutaꞌyoo numu e batsakwu yise waha tabe mease nu namayodakwusoo.’ “
42024008	Mu momokoꞌne yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu soomaꞌyu,
42024009	ka oo nanomatugupu-wiꞌyoona meaꞌase ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu noꞌoko tuukwe.
42024011	Mu Te Pabeꞌe nanayadooawabe gi ka pumme mu tuukwepu nakaꞌoedyukute sukwe meeoo tooe unakwe mee mu soobedyana.
42024012	Soo Peter yotseoose ka Te Pabeꞌe uga nanomatugu-kwitoo tanomanegea. Ka oe petuoogase, oetu tomooeꞌma pukwi oo namasooapu suuꞌmu oe kwakwape oosoo yise nobe-kwitoosoo mea mee soonamme, “Mu momokoꞌne tookwa togesapa tuukwe haꞌoogena yise mani?”
42024013	Oꞌno tabenosoo wahaꞌyoo nanana Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Emmaus mee naneadu-witoo memea kwinga nasogomea ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
42024014	Umu ka memeadabena ka namani-kwitu nanatugweꞌnga.
42024015	Te Pabeꞌe mu hatsuhookase sapa
42024016	umu gi oo posopedakwadoo.
42024017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tubenga, “Hekwitu mu netammana?” Umu ka suda sokwamana wamepetu.
42024018	Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu Cleopas mee naneadu mee oo netamma, “U suuꞌmu ka sumuna ka umu Jerusalem-witu-matu gi ka a namane-kwitu naka.”
42024019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo tu namanise?” Umu yise meeoo, “Jesus-witu, oosoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Nazareth-witu kemmana. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma soo Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo oosoo ka ewow numu mabesakuse yise Te Naa besa unnepu numu tuukwepu.
42024020	‘Soo Jesus tookwa Te Pabeꞌe. Oosoo ka mu Tiboꞌo tayakwuni,’ mee numme ooosapa sokwamadu. Pana umu tutunehanedu ka mu Tiboꞌo ooka batsa tuunguna. Etzeꞌe tabe mea ka oo tu namanise.
42024022	Yaa awamooa mu momokoꞌne numme-matu besow ne tuukwe gi ne nakasopedakwadoona. Umu meeoo, ‘Awamooasoo numme meaꞌa ka pukwi Te Pabeꞌe nanomatugu-kwitoo,
42024023	pana Te Pabeꞌe kadooꞌyoo. Numme ne tuusoobedya-kwikoo umu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo poonne umu mee ne tuukweꞌe, “Te Pabeꞌe gwetzoi.” ’
42024024	Mu numme-nagatu-matu mu naana ka oo nanomatugu-kwitoo meaꞌa. Umu oo poonne petuga oosoo ka mu momokoꞌne umu tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo. Pana umu gi Te Pabeꞌe poonne.”
42024025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu gisoo e nakasopedakwadoo. Mu gisoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe tamme tuukwena.
42024026	Oꞌnosoo umu meeoo tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooe nabatsase saaꞌa yise noꞌoko mu numu nemadabuekwu.’ “
42024027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise besasoo mu tuukweꞌe ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekepu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Moses unnepu mu tuukweꞌe penakwa yise umu susumudu Te Naa nanayadooawabe unnepu waha.
42024028	Umu yise ka umu waahoo naana pukwitoo mea tzageꞌe manepetu. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-kwingadusoo meadu.
42024029	Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo yongoho pudusoo taba egeahookwu, u sakwa numme-baasoo tooi.”
42024030	Ka mu tukakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba gwuuhoose oetu mu nanesootuhikukooha. Ka tunemamakwuse oo tzabokase umu-matoo oo mameaku.
42024031	Oꞌno umu o posopedakwatoo oosoo yise gi tapuꞌaka.
42024032	Umu yise mee uꞌunekwate, “Ka te sogo kemmadape, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka a nabotuguna besasoo ta tuukwe, ta yise besa oo nakasoobedya.” Umu yise yosuhoose ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kokodyuhooka, okow yongonasoo.
42024033	Ka mu pepetugase noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe nanano o, ewaꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo mu-kumisoo.
42024034	Umu ka mu waahoo mee netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodu, Simon Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.”
42024035	Umu wahaꞌyoo yise mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-no sogomea. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe tubotuguna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu besasoo ne tuukweꞌe. Numme ka mooeꞌugasoo gi oo posopedakwatoo. Saaꞌa ka oo nanesootuhise ka tukaba oo tzabokase, numme oo pudu posopedakwatoo.”
42024036	Togesoo mu apegeagonno soo Te Pabeꞌe umu-baa tapuꞌa petuse mu yadooꞌe.
42024037	Umu nasoosuihoo, “Uda tsoapa,” mee sokwamahoo.
42024038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-ma suipana. Gi nu tsoapa.
42024039	Nu nuusoo yow ka e mi noko e kuku pumakoo e natzepotzetapu poonne. Mu e mesoo tzama. Soo tsoapa gi tookoope-gaꞌyoo.”
42024041	Ka besa sokwamahoose umu gisoo oo sooꞌoedyukupana ka tsoapa mee oo sooyugwepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu tubenga, “Mu haaꞌa hemma nadukadu hane?”
42024042	Umu yise pakwe nanoꞌhona oo magahoo
42024043	oosoo yise mu-kobenaꞌyoosoo tukakooha umu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tookwa togesapa nummenumme.
42024044	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona mu tuukweꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna togesapa oo-toogoo namanekwu.”
42024045	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Te Naa nanayadooawabe tu tubotugupu nanakasoopedekwadoo oo mayugwe.
42024046	Mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo oꞌnosoo e manekwuna nanemamakwu. Nu nabatsase pahe tabe mease nu e yaꞌekwikoo namayoda.
42024047	Soo nu-kwitu besa naꞌunnedu noꞌobatusoo numu oo natuukwekwu, mooeꞌugasoo yaa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona yise mana kwingaꞌa-kwi. Mu numu yise tu tumaꞌemukwana nanekwahase mu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwase mu nasootuhikwu ka nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna.
42024048	Mu ka nu-kwitu mu numu tuukwekwu ka e manena poonnena yise ka e unnepu nakana.
42024049	Pudusoo nu mu poohamakakwu ka Te Naa unne-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa yaa Jerusalem-wisoo ka mumme e pooha-makananoꞌoto.”
42024050	Saaꞌa yise Bethany-tamme meana soo Te Pabeꞌe mayodase mu nanesootuhikute.
42024051	Toesoo mu nanesootuhikuwununa umu-baaꞌyoona toogoopatoo tsebooega.
42024052	Umu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe yise besa sokwamana ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyuka.
42024053	Umu ooosapa ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhiyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” mee unneyakwe.
43001001	Gisoo ka teepu namadabue soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo o. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-baa ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoonasoo.
43001003	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma matabue tuungu.
43001004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka ooosapa nummennummekwuse noꞌoko numu kootabuakute Tu Besa Pooha-ma.
43001005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe kootabuapunnena, togano-wi numu mesoo kootabuakute. Soo sutaꞌyoo togabu-witu gi oo matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petuse gi haaꞌnoto tamme-nagakwi nummennumme. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tubetse kootabuadu ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu haneku petu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu, numu besa matugu tuwazoo ka kaahenotu ooosapa tuwazoo waha. Numme ka Besa Poohabe poonne, soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ooka sootuhi. Soo nana John mee naneadu ka Te Naa tamme-tamme tutayana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu oo tuukwe tuungu. Saaꞌa mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo John yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi paba yadooase mee unne, “Yow esoo nana puwitu mumme e tuukweyina.” Mu yise mee unakwe, “Tooe esoo nuga kwanngaꞌapana esoo ka Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe-notu esoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwuse. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa yise oo nakabetsea.” Soo John gi Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu sukwe tuukwekwu. Ka mu numu meeoo tuukwekwu soo Te Pabeꞌe numu magwetzoikwu. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe oꞌnosoo ka teepu matabuese sapa, ka tu nanumu-baa petuse, susumudu umu-matu gi oo heesoobedya. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu, Te Naa doodooamu manepetugakwu. Gi tamme hownnekoo tammesoo namagwetzoaꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka gwetzoibu te sootuhikwu. Numme ka nanabesa oo pooha manena poonne.
43001016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma hee-gana, yise ewahoo nasootuhipe te sootuikwu.
43001017	Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka te nanamooatupu tuukweꞌe, mee mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-witu nakadooa. Saaꞌa yise soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te tuukwe soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa te tuukwe.
43001018	Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, oo Besaa Tooaꞌa Jesus suuꞌmu ooosapa oo-noꞌyoodu oo sopedakwadoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa witu te tunesootabue.
43001019	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu Jerusalem-witu ka mu naana-matu yise ka mu tutummatzidu-no ka John-matoo nataya mee yise oo tubengu. “Haga u? U haaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe? U haaꞌa yow oosoo nanetammadu?”
43001020	Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi nu.”
43001021	“U haaꞌa Elijah?” mee tuwazoo umu oo tubengu. Soo John yise meeoo, “Nu gi Elijah.” Umu yise tuwazoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa Te Naa yadooawabe numme-matoo oo tutayana oꞌnosoo nanetammadu?” “Gi!” mee soo John.
43001022	Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Haga yise u? Haꞌyoo saaꞌa numme mu numu numme tayadu tuukwedooa? U sakwa uusoo nakwitu ne tuukwe.”
43001023	Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu yow soo nana Te Naaꞌa Pooha-tookwi, numu-wana nobe-gaꞌyoo mu numu nu-baa petudyana nu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Ka suda mu tumaduguna nematzagakwuni, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwuna tuganaꞌa tzageꞌe manekena ne mu numu tunesootabue.’ Ka Te Naa yadooawabe, Isaiah mee naneadu e manena nanemamakwupu-witu oo nabotugupu.”
43001024	Mu Jew nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-nagatu-no ka John-matoo nataya. Ka baa hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-kwi soo John baa-wi numu matzakayakwe, ka Bethany mee naneadu tzageꞌeꞌyoona. Mu Pharisee meeoo ka John netamma, “U gi Elijah, u gi Te Pabeꞌe, u gi tuwazoo Te Naa yadooawabe-matu, how yise manena u numu baa-wi matzakayakwe? Hownnekoo pooha tooha-kwi, yise haga mu numu baa-wi u matzaka tuungu?” Soo John yise mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka mu numu, baa-wi sukwe matzaka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-nooꞌyoopana mu gi oo soopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43001029	Ooga mooa soo John ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe poonne, pudamme oo kemma. Soo John yise Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi meeoo, “Yowsoo Te Pabeꞌe. Yow esoo nana mu numu nanasuda mamanena-koobatoo nabatsakwudu. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu baa-wi e matzaka tuungudu mee tuwazoo e netamma, ‘U ka mu Pabeꞌe posopedakwadookwu, ka E Besa Pooha-ma oo pooha nasootuhise. Soo E Besa Pooha yise ooosapa ka mu Pabeꞌe-nagaꞌyookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise saaꞌa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka E Besa Pooha-ma punnoꞌo sootuhikwu.’ Nu ooosapa meeoo mu netammanoꞌo, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwu.’ Tooe oosoo e wanngaꞌa natubanga pana yow esoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu-koobenatusoo. Gisoo nu Te Pabeꞌe posopedakwadoo, nu mu numu baa-wi matzakakena, ooonneꞌyoona mu Jew numu oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo petukwuna.” Soo John yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha poonne, paꞌanakwana, kweꞌnaꞌa tubongo wueketu-kwaꞌne tabuakese ka Te Pabeꞌe-naga manipetu.
43001034	Nu ka Pooha Nasootuhipe poonne, nu yise mu tuukwe oosoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
43001035	Ookow moooa soo John waahoo umu putoohakwi natunedyooemodu-no oona konnopunne.
43001036	Ka Te Pabeꞌe pumoopa oo sogomeꞌa oo poonnese, John mee mu netamma, “Mow masoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwudu.”
43001037	Wahaꞌyoo umu natunedyooemodu-matu oo nakahoose, ka Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi memeahoo.
43001038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe wesase mu poonne ka tu nakwi mu memeaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu tubengu, “Hemma mu?” Umu yise meehoo, “Hano u tooiyakwe?”
43001039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nu-no kemmase muusoo oo poonnekwu.” Umu yise, oo-no memea, oonaa oo pukwiꞌyoo-witoo. Oꞌno tabeno umu gi haaꞌno oona oo-baaꞌyoopunne.
43001040	Sumuꞌyoo mu waha-matu natunedyooemodu Te Pabeꞌe-nakwi meadu, Andrew mee naneadu, Simon Peter pabeꞌe ka tu wangaꞌa-baa petuoogase oo tuukwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nanatapoegea.”
43001042	Ka Simon yise Te Pabeꞌe-baa bi petuooga. Ka mu pepetuoogase soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon poonnese mee oo netamma, “U yow, Simon
43001043	Oogow moooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo meakwu, mee tusooyugwe. Soo Philip mee naneadu punnoꞌo o. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Philip netamma, “U sakwa nu-no mea.”
43001044	Soo Nathanael mee naneadu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Philip
43001046	Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “Gi besaꞌyoo numu suuꞌmu, ka Nazareth-wiꞌyoona kemma.” Soo Philip yise meehoo, “Kemmase uusoo nama oo tapoegea.”
43001047	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Nathanael poonne, meeoo yise, “Yow esoo Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Esoo gi suda tusooyugwedu.”
43001048	Nathanael yise mee tutubengu, “Hownnekoo u e sopedakwatoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu oona sunnga-toohakoo u pooha poonne gisoo ka Philip ume baꞌe.”
43001049	Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “U yow Ne Pabeꞌe, u ka tamme Jew numu-kooba katukwutu.”
43001050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu u pooha poonnena mee e unakwe u haaꞌa e nakaꞌoedyukute?
43001051	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa nanabesa oo tumadaꞌe oo poonnekwu. Mu nuga mane-too ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo petugakwu, o tutusooyugwena, tuwazoo.”
43002001	Waha tabe mease ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobaꞌyoona, ka Cana mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona numu nanodukwadookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no oetu nabaꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe pea punnoꞌo.
43002003	Togesoo ne tuka aata soo atsa baa nasooꞌahoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pea mee oo netamma, “Soo nahebedu punoko te tukana nasooꞌahoo.”
43002004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Gi hownnekoo nu menoꞌo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo, e pooha manekwuna gisoo oe manepetu.”
43002005	Ooonneꞌyoopana soo oo pea yise ka umu numu tummatzidu mee netamma, “Ka e tooa mumme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo, saaꞌa mane.”
43002006	Naapaheꞌyoo papabatseꞌyoo tupe-ma namadabuedu, pukwi baa mu tubanena umu tzageꞌe nahane. Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipu puma namayohona, pukwi mu mabatzagana.
43002007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Baa-ma ka pukwi mu tubanena kaanoku.” Ka ooka mu kaanokuse,
43002008	soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu netamma, “Ka baa-matu bayoongase, ka mu tuka-kooba poenaꞌewabe mooe bamaga.”
43002009	Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka baa-matu tumahoo, oosoo tookwa atsa baa manipu-gaꞌyoo. Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka Te Pabeꞌe ooka sootunagahoona gi sopedakwatoo, umu numu tummatzidu suuꞌmu oo sopedakwatoo.
43002010	Soo mu poenaꞌewabe ka nodukwadookwudu bihoose mee oo netamma, “Tooe haga tooe ka besow atsa baa numu mooe hebekuyakwe. Yise saaꞌa ka mu numu baagoehookase, umu ka gi tubetse besow mu numu hebekuyakwe. U nakwitoo ka besow nabeni.”
43002011	Yow esoo nagutza mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manikepu, ka Cana-wiꞌyoona. Owe manakwana numme ka Te Pabeꞌe numme pooha tunedyooemona unukoosoo besa oo nakaꞌoedyukute manika.
43002012	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Capernaum mee naneadu-witoo mea, tu pea, tu wangaꞌamu, yise numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no. Numme punnoꞌo huu tabenosoo o.
43002013	Saaꞌa yise numme tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Jerusalem-witoo tuwazoo meaꞌa. Ka mu Jew numu ka oꞌno tu namagwetzoina soomayuna gi namayuadu tukaba nadukanoꞌo tabeba-gaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise paba tukayakwe.
43002014	Numme pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wi petuooga, oo-kobenaꞌyoona ka tu nananesootuhinoꞌo mu nanana kootsoo-ma tumuꞌu, seepu noko weeho tuwazoo, yise susumudu nanana o manepunnena ka mu wakwawaꞌa puma tumukwuna tzanabetokudyakwe numme mu poonne.
43002015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tugapoo nakwebaꞌa-doose, ka puma mu tumuna mu kootsoo noko mu seepu tuwazoo, ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumabakoo wumahukwunihoo. Ka pukooba mu tutzanabetokudyina tonabedahoose, ka oo-kooba natuoona tatapepuꞌa.
43002016	Ka mu nanana weeho-ma tumudu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa mu hootsebaꞌa haneooka, gi ka Te Naa-matoo pukwiꞌyoona te nanesootuhidyina nobe-kobenaꞌyoona hemma-ma tumupana.”
43002017	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tunakatzimodu ka saaꞌa oo soomaꞌyu ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mesoo tubotugupu ka Te Naa unnepu, “E Naa ume ooosapa namatuguna, ka numu u-tamme suda tumaduguna nu gi petzape.”
43002018	Susumudu mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa besa nanasookwugi ne tusootunagaku, oꞌno numme u oedyukukwu yow tookwa ka Te Naa tunetammana mayoho mee numme u sooyugwekwu.”
43002019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu nekwegea, “Mu ka eka nanesootuhi nobe kadoo mayugwese, nu pahe tabeba-wisoo oo mayodakwusoo.”
43002020	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Esoo pabaꞌyoo nanesootuhi nobe wuꞌnaꞌmeꞌyoosesoo namadabuepu. U yise ka sumuꞌyoonasoo hownnekoo u pahe tabeba-wisoo nanakwisoo a matabuehookwu?”
43002021	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe puusoo tu yaꞌe-kwikoo tu namayoda-kwitu netammana meeoo unakwe, umu yise gi oo nakasopedakwadoo.
43002022	Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-wikoo, pihoo tabeba-wisoo namayoduse, oꞌno numme ka oo unnepu pudu nakasopedakwadookooha, ka puusoo oo nanetammana. Numme yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo nanayadooawabe unnepu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu togesapa nayadooadu.
43002023	Ka mu Jew numu ewa tukanoꞌo ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, ewaꞌyoo numu ka nanabesa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manena poonnese oo nakaꞌoedyuku.
43002024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu sopedakwadoo, mooasoo mu manekwuna gi watzekupunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe owetuoo mu numu pumme batsakwuna soopedakwedoo. Ka sukwe numu gi totogekoo mu sopedakwadoona.
43003001	Sumuꞌyoo nana Nicodemus mee naneadu ka umu nananesootuhi papabeꞌe-matu
43003003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. Ka Te Naa nakabetsakwuse, u sakwa pudu nadooaꞌadoosoo.”
43003004	Soo Nicodemus yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Mooasoo nu unu waꞌetsena. Hownnekoo nu pudu nadooaꞌadookwusoo? Gi nu hownnekoo ka e pea nagasoo egease pudu nadooaꞌadookwusoo tuwazoo.”
43003005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. U ka Te Naa-wi mooe tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno yise u ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Numu puusoo oo madaꞌe ka numu pudu nadooaꞌadoona, pana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha suuꞌmu, ka mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwekwu.
43003007	Gi a nasoomenakwupana, gi nagutza unu namanedu nu u netammakute.
43003008	Soo Te Naa ka hukwapa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo hukwapa puu tooe how tooe hukwa-tabuꞌa, gi tamme oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi haga pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana, yise pukwitoo oo meana sopedakwadoo. Gi haga oo sopedakwadoo hownnekoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwekwu.”
43003009	Nicodemus yise mee unakwe, “Togesoo nu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka nuka u tuukwena.”
43003010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “U sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo, u ka mu Jew numu mooasoo tunedyooennummena.
43003011	Nu togesapa u tuukwekwu. Nu ka e sopedakwatoona, ka e poonnena tuwazoo, nu u tooe tuukwe pana u gi e nakaꞌoedyukudu.
43003012	Ka yaa teepu-koobatu ka numu sooabe, Te Naa-no sumusoo manepunnedu u gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute tooꞌe nu u tooe tuukwepana, ka hemma manepunnena ume e tuukwe u gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, u ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
43003013	Gi haga yaa teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu sopedakwadoo nu suuꞌmu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa baꞌyoona kemmapuna oo sopedakwadoo.
43003014	Ka oꞌnosoo mu te nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka togogwa pumme tokuese umu ka Te Naa nanetsagwayaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo mu tunetammakute, ‘Ka weehepu togogwa-waꞌne matabuese, paꞌa oo taposase, umu numu saaꞌa ookow poonnena gwetzoimodooa.’
43003015	Mu ka nuka nanetzakwiyina gwetzoikwu. Oꞌnosoo te nanamoomooatupu-waꞌnesoo ka paꞌa e nataposase mu saaꞌa gwetzoidooa.
43003016	Te Naa noꞌoko numu ka teepu-koobatu besa soobedyana, tu besa dooa tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Tooe haga tooe nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi yaꞌekwu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.
43003017	Soo E Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatu numu e magwetzoi tuunguna yaatoo e taꞌya, gi nagutza ka mu sutakoo numu kadoo e mayugwe tuunguna.
43003018	Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gwetzoikwu. Tooe haga tooe gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumu-tammesoo yaꞌekwu, mooasoo soo Te Naa meeoo tunetammapu.
43003019	Nu yow gwetzoibu manepunnena, ooonneꞌyoona susumudu numu nu-ma soonammetugu, umu gi e heesoobedyadu ka suda tu manena hemma ooonakwa sooyugwena. Soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
43003020	Soo tooe haga tooe suda manedu gi nuka petzape, gi tuwazoo nu-matoo kemma, oosoo ka suda tu manena soogwina ooosapa togano-kwi.
43003021	Mu numu besa tumadugudu ka tu tumaduguna gi nasookwina, nu-matoo kemma, oꞌno noꞌyoona numu mu poonne umuoo tookwa Te Naa nakabetseadu.”
43003022	Ka saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwi petuse mu numu baa-wi matzaka.
43003023	Soo John punnoꞌo baa-wi numu matzakadyakwe
43003024	Oꞌno soo John gisoo nakwutumana.
43003025	Umu John pupuaꞌamu, mu Jew nanesootuhiwabe-matu-no, ka baa-witu numu namatzakadyi-koobatoo nanepetukute.
43003026	Umu John pupuaꞌamu ka John-matoo mease mee oo netamma, “Soo nana Te Pabeꞌe mee u netammana, menoꞌo numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe.
43003027	Soo John yise meeoo, “Numme ka Te Naa numme tunetammekupu mayohodyakwe.”
43003028	Mu mooasoo mee e unnena naka, “Nu gi mu Pabeꞌe, nu oo-kobenasoo yaatoo natayadu. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunesootabuadu.
43003029	Ka numu nanodukwadoose, soo nana ka mogoꞌne nodukwadoose oo kooma manekwu. Soo nana puaꞌa oo-baa sukwe wununa oo nakapunne. Oosoo punnoꞌo besa soonamme ka nana nodukwadoodu besa soonamme. Ooonneꞌyoona nu besa soonamme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu mea, mu poonnena.
43003030	Mu numu sakwa Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimo gi nuka.”
43003031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu-koobatu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmana, ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu noꞌoko sopedakwatoo. Mu numu puu ka yaa teepu-koobatu hemma sopedakwadoona oo waha.
43003032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka Te Naa-witu sopedakwadoona te tooꞌe tuukweꞌe, pana susumudu numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
43003033	Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse soo Te Naa oo tubetse togeꞌyookute.
43003034	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo tayapu, oosoo ka Te Naa kaaheno unnena te tuukwe tuunguna. Soo Te Naa tooꞌe noꞌoko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma Te Pabeꞌe sootuhi.
43003035	Soo Te Naa ka tu Tooa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, unu soobedyana tooꞌe noꞌoko tu pooha oo-tamme nemawuni.
43003036	Mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Mu gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna punnoꞌo gi gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu, yise mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
43004001	Mu Jew nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuusookweta. Umu ka mee tunakana, ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
43004002	Numme Te Pabeꞌe-matoo natunedyooemodu, ka numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe gi baa-wi numu matzakadu.
43004003	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌase, ka Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu Pharisee pumme nuusoogweda oo sopedakwadoona.
43004004	Ka oonow meana, numme ka teepu Samaria mee naneadu-toogoo meꞌa.
43004005	Ka Samaria-wi numme ka Sychar mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
43004006	Oꞌnosoo ka Jacob pahoda-kwi numme petuga, ka kwingaꞌa sogo mease, gi nadamanese. Ka tabeno tu manekese numme ka Te Pabeꞌe oo tamawuse, tukapu tumuga. Soo sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne baa-witoo kemmana oo-baa petuoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma,”Nu unu puudyaꞌe nu baa soogwaꞌe.”
43004009	Soo Samaritan mogoꞌne mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U Jew numu pana u nuka Samaritan numu banekwikute.” (Mu Jew numu ka mu Samaritan, gi petzabedu, gi unu mu yadooꞌedu.)
43004010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Samaritan mogoꞌne netamma, “U ka e pooha-gana gi sopedakwadoona gi ka E Naa ume sootuhikwuna tuwazoo, u sakwa uga ka oo tubengase soo Te Naa sakwa ka baa puu-ma nagwetzoidu u bamaka.”
43004011	Soo mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “U gi tugapu-gana, gi too u wetooa-gaꞌyoo, soo pahodape tuwow tookapuꞌyoo. Hownnekoo yise u eka baa puma nagwetzoidu hanekwu?
43004012	U haaꞌa ka te namooatupu Jacob ooonakwa besowsoo pahodape-gaꞌyoo? Soo Jacob ne pahodakupu puma ookowsoo gwetzoina, umu oo doodooamu yise oo kootsoo punnoꞌo puma gwetzoina.”
43004013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe ka ekow baa hebedu puudyaꞌekwusoo.
43004014	Pana eka nuga pumme bamakana gi puudyaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo eka baa, nuga pumme bamagana nanagatoo hebese, oosoo patzona-waꞌne gi pasa-waꞌneꞌyoo, numu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.”
43004015	Soo mogoꞌne yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa e bamaka, oꞌno nu gi puudyaꞌena gi yaatu bidya petuyaꞌekwu.”
43004016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Ka u kooma bihoodooase yaasoo pepetuhoo.”
43004017	Soo mogoꞌne mee oo netamma, “Nu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “U togesapa tuukweꞌe, ka meeoo unnena, ‘Nu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo,’ mee. U manegeoo koomamu-gapu. Soo nana menoꞌo puno u nobe-gana gi u kooma.”
43004019	Soo mogoꞌne yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo nu u sopedakwatoo u tookwa sumuꞌyoo ka umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe-matu.
43004020	Umu ne nanamooatupu ekow giba-koobaꞌyoona nanesootuhaꞌe, pana mu Jew yise meeoo tunetamma, ‘Tamme sakwa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhi.’ Haga yise toge-koo?”
43004021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Mu Samaritan numu nanesootuhi pana, togesoo gi oo nakasopedakwadoo. Numme ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-no numme Jew-matu magwetzoipu. Mu numu tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe nanesootuhikwu. Pudusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka kaaheno Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu, ka oo besa pooha pumme tummatzaꞌe. ‘Yooonnekoo nu-matoo mu kaaheno nanesootuhiyakwe,’ meeꞌe soo Te Naa te netamma. Soo Te Naa unu pooha-gana ooonneꞌyoona tamme tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe sakwa ka oo pooha-masoo oo-matoo nanesootuhi.”
43004025	Soo mogoꞌne yise mee oo netamma, “Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pudusoo petukwu. Ka saaꞌa petuse oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma kaaheno te tuukwekwu.”
43004026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu mooasoo yow. Nu Mu Pabeꞌe.”
43004027	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe ka mogoꞌne-no yadooꞌadyakwe oo poonnena umu-baa petuoogonno. Haꞌooga manena ka mogoꞌne yadooedyakwe? Mee numme sookama pana gi mu tubenga.
43004028	Soo mogoꞌne ka tu banoꞌosa mawuoogase ka tu nobe-witoo kodyuhooka. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Mooasoo numme tukapu tumuhoodooa, yaatu tuka.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Nu atamasoo gwetzoidu.”
43004033	Numme yise mee nananetamma, “Haga gina tukapu a makahoodooa?”
43004034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka E Naa tunetammana nakabetseana gwetzoaꞌe.
43004035	Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tunedyooe. Ooonneꞌyoona menoꞌo mu numu mumme wutooꞌe, ka Te Naa besa unnepu pumme tunedyooekwudu. Nu yise meeoo mu netammakwu mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwe, oꞌno ewaꞌyoo numu e nakaꞌoedyuku manepetukwu, yise soo Te Naa gi mobegwa-ga mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka ꞌyoo mu manekwi nasootuhikwu. Mu yise ka mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu mooe tunedyooedu-no besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna mu nasootuhaꞌe.”
43004039	Toge, oꞌno soo mogoꞌne ka petuoogase ka tu nanumu mu Samaritan numu, mee netamma petuga, “Kemmase ka nana wegeadooa oosoo noꞌoko e manepu gi nekwatsekute. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute o oosoo Te Pabeꞌe.” Ewaꞌyoo numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane. Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuhooga.
43004040	Mu Samaritan numu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa yaa numme-baasoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise waha tabeno umu-baa.
43004041	Ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu nakase ewaꞌyoosoo numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
43004042	Umu ka mogoꞌne mee netamma, “U ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ne tuukwese numme tunakaꞌoedyuku mane, ka mooeꞌugasoo numme ka nummesoo oo poonnese, oo nakana numme yise tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.”
43004043	Waha tabe mease soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo mea.
43004044	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ne tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa nayadooawabe nananumu gi ooka mu nakaꞌoedyukuna.
43004045	Ewaꞌyoo Galilee numu mooasoo ka tu pooha naꞌewatuka-kwikoo ka Jerusalem-witu nanabesa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tumadugupu poonne. Ooonneꞌyoona ka Galilee-wi ka Te Pabeꞌe petugase mu numu besa oo matuku.
43004046	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Cana-witoosoo
43004047	Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Galilee-wi petuna nakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “E dooa unu tuꞌoedyuina yaꞌegaꞌa ona Capernaum-wi. U sakwa kemmase oo mabesakudooa.”
43004048	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Mu ka nanabesa e pooha manepu poonnese suuꞌmu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
43004049	Soo numu moohedu nana ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U sakwa menoꞌosoo nu-no kemma, gisoo ka e tooa yaꞌe.”
43004050	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “U sakwa kodyuka, u tooa mooasoo gwetzoikwu.”
43004051	Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse meahoo, togesoo ka oona tu nobe-kwitoo oo mea, soo oo tummatzidu nana oo wegeahoodooase mee oo tuukweꞌe, “U tooa mooasoo besa manepu.”
43004052	Soo numu moohedu ka pumme tummatzidu nana mee tubenga, “Hannanoꞌo besa mani?” Oosoo yise oo nanekwegea, “Etzeꞌe toge tabeno kadooꞌe.”
43004053	Soo nana oetu soomayuhoo, ka oona nokwikoo haꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netamma, “U tooa mooasoo besa namagwetzoipu.” Soo numu moohedu nana ka mu tu nobe-kwitu numu-no, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku mane.
43004054	Yow esoo wahasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanabesa pooha tumadugupu, ka teepu Galilee-koobaꞌyoona. Gi haaꞌnoꞌyoose ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona oo kodyu petuse.
43005001	Saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-wi petuga, ka mu Jew numu otuoo ewa pooha tuka-noꞌo.
43005002	Ka Jerusalem-wi oo petugase, tuutseꞌekoo banunadu Bethsaida mee naneadu naꞌoonnakwi manegeoo nahabatoo.
43005003	Ewaꞌyoo tuoegoedu numu oho. Susumudu gi tutubootabuedu, umu-matu gi modu, umu-matu gi yuyutsunga manepu. Umu ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo wutooena, ka pudusoo ka baa oo mayutsunga petukwuse. Soo mooeꞌugasoo numu ka baa bayutsungawunudu-kwi ekadu besa maniyakwe.
43005005	Sumuꞌyoo gi nummedu nana ewa (38) tomogapu oe numu-no.
43005006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo poonne ka oona oo hape, yise soo gi nummedu nana wunaꞌme o hape, mee oetu naka. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo tubengu, “U haaꞌa u namabesakuna soogwaꞌe?”
43005007	Soo nana mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Ka bayutsungatu-kwitoo e tummatzikwudu kadoo haga. Kummaꞌyoosoo nonotsa nuka-kobenasoo ka baa-wi mooe ekeahooyakwe.”
43005008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Yotseoose nummemanese, ka u wegea mahedase nobe-kwitoo kodyuka.”
43005009	Esoo ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeno tooe, a namanena.
43005010	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka nana namabesakupu mee netamma, “Soo tamme putoogoo tumayohona, gi soo numu puusoo tu wegea maheta tamme nanesootuhi tabeno.”
43005011	Oosoo nana besa manipu mee oo nanekwegea, “Soo nana e mabesakudu meeoo e netamma, ‘U besa manese, u wegea mahedase nummennumme,’ “ meeꞌe.
43005012	Umu numu nanesootuhi moohedu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga meeoo u netamma?”
43005013	Soo nana gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka mu numu ewa-naga oo manise.
43005014	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U menoꞌo besa manepu. Ka suda u tumaduguna maꞌwu, u ka gi suda u tumaduguna maꞌwuna, soo suda u tumaduguna u-matoosoo kodyuse u unusoo tuoeyidooa.”
43005015	Soo nana yise mease ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu tuukweꞌe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe e mabesaku.”
43005016	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohone petu, oosoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu numu mabesakuna.
43005017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Soo Nuga Naa, puu nonotsa tabeno numu sootuhidyakwe, gi oo maꞌwudu. Nu punnoꞌo oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43005018	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe unu batsa soogwaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu numu mabesakuna, yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa nuga tubetse Naa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo mee nanetammadu.
43005019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu ka E Naa tunetammana mayoho. Nu gi nugasoo manena suuꞌmu mayoho.
43005020	Soo E Naa ka unu e soobedyana, ka hemma how tu yugwena e tzapoonnekute. Saaꞌa E Naa nanabesowsoo e tzapoonnekukwu. Nu yise punnoꞌo mumme ooka tzapoonekukwu. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, ‘Uune! Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.’
43005021	Soo E Naa puu mu numu mu yaꞌekwikoo mayodakwu, nu punnoꞌo gwetzoibu mu numu meeoo e soobedyana sootuhikwu.
43005022	Soo E Naa gi ka mu numu saaꞌa nemadabuekwu, oosoo nu-tamme oo tzamunapu.
43005023	Soo E Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nu-tooha manekwuna soogwaꞌe. Tooe haga tooe nuka gi heesoobedyadu, ka E Naa tookwa gi heesoobedyadu.
43005024	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu tooe haga tooe e unnena nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka E Naa nakaꞌoedyukudooa tuwazoo, umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu. Umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumaduguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo soomuꞌwa, umuoo gi numu-no paba nanehanekwu, ka mooasoo Te Naa besa podo meana.
43005025	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu-matoo nanesootuhidu, tooe tuipu pana, saaꞌa ka e yadooase tu tutui-kwiꞌyoona yosuse, ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, umuoo ka ooosapa gwetzoibu gi mobegwa-gakoo nasootuhikwu.
43005026	Soo E Naa ka gwetzoibu-ma mu numu sootuhikwudu. Nu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
43005027	Soo E Naa ka mu numu tu nemadabuekwuna nu-matoo nemawuni, ooonneꞌyoona nu ka mu numu nemadabuekwu, nu ka Mu Pabeꞌena.
43005028	Mu sakwa ekow nakaꞌoedyuku. Pudusoo noꞌyoona mu tuipu numu yosukwu, ka e nakase, ka pumme e baꞌe. Soo numu besa tumadugudu, besa nasootuhikwu, ka ooosapa gi moobegwaga nagwetzoidu. Umu suda tumadugudu, punnoꞌo soo nanasuda mu tumaduguna umuoo-matoosoo kodyukwu. Umu suda sokwamana puusoo nasootuaganekwu.
43005030	Oꞌno nu ka E Naa nuka tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo numu paba nehanekwu. Nu besa numu nehanekwu, E Naa pooha-toohakwi nu numu nehanekwu nu gi nuusuꞌmu numu nehanekwu.
43005031	Ka nuusoo nakwitu e nanekwaha mu gi hownnekoo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43005032	Pana soo E Naa yise nu-witu wahana, oꞌno yise mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa nanekwahana oosoo kaaheno tuukwe.
43005033	Mu mooasoo mu numu tayapu ka John nu-witu tubengakwudu. Soo John kaaheno mu tuukwepu.
43005034	Mu numu yise ka John unnena soogwaꞌe. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka mooasoo togesapa tuukwena. Nu mu nemayukute ka John nu-witu wahapu, oꞌno yise mu punnoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyukuse namagwetzoikwu.
43005035	Soo John ka Te Naa Besa Po mu tzaponnekute, mu gi haaꞌnoto besa sokwamapunne.
43005036	Soo John unnepu ka mu numu nu-witu sopedakwatoo tummatzi. Ka nanabesa e tumadipu E Naa nuka tunetammakuna, mumme e tzapoonneku oꞌno mu numu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yaa mu-matoo e taya.
43005037	Mu gi ka Te Naa nakana, gi tuwazoo oo poonne. Soo Te Naa nu-witu wahase, oꞌno yise yaatoo e taya.
43005038	Mu gi ka Te Naa unnena nakaꞌoedyukute mu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mumme oo tunetammakuna.
43005039	Mu ka Te Naa unnepu nease numme namagwetzoikwu mee mu sokwamana. Pana nu-witu mu neꞌa, ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyukuse mu namagwetzoi.
43005040	Pana mu gi nu-matoo kemma, oꞌno nu gi ka gwetzoibu-ma mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43005041	Nu gi ka mu numu besa nu-witu tuukwedu wate pana
43005042	nu ka nuusoo oo sopedakwadoona, mu tookwa gi ka Te Naa besa soobedya.
43005043	Tooe soo Te Naa mu-matoo e taꞌyase sapa, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Ka kummaꞌakoosoo atasoo numu tunedyooe petuse, mu oo nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe Te Naa gi ooka taꞌya sapa.
43005044	Mu ka mu numu mu besaꞌyoo mee mumme mu netammana besa soobedya, pana ka Te Naa meeoo unnena gi nakaheesoobedya. Mu gi hannanoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43005045	Soo Moses mu magwetzoidu tooe mu magwetzoi mee mu tusooyugwe sapa. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Moses te namooatupu ka Te Naa unnepu te tuukweꞌe. Soo Moses ka suda mu tumaduguna ka Te Naa tuukwekwu.
43005046	Tooe haga tooe ka Moses unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu nuka nakaꞌoedyukukwu tuwazoo, soo Moses ka e manekwuna botuguse.
43005047	Mu ka gi Moses tubotuguna nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa nuka gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
43006001	Saaꞌa ka tamano tu manegese soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka banunadu Galilee
43006005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu manekwuna sopedakwatoona, haꞌyoo saaꞌa soo Philip unnedooa mee soonammena, ka Philip mee tubenga, “Hanoko nadukadu tamme tumuse, noko umu numu makakwu?”
43006007	Soo Philip oo nanekwegease meeoo oo netamma, “Soo nana tooe hemma tooe how yugwe, pumme tukapu puma tu tumuna suuꞌmu hee-gaꞌyoo, pana, oosoo gi togeꞌyoo, ka mu ewow numu makakwuse, ka tukapu ewa nanenaga.”
43006008	Sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Andrew
43006009	“Esoo naatse manegeoo tukaba-gaꞌyoo, waahoo tutukutsekoo pakwe noko. Nagutza huutseꞌyoo, gi tamme noꞌoko mu numu maka-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43006010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Ka mu numu ka pooega-kooba aata tuungu
43006011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu manegeoo tutukutsekoo tukaba hemmahoose, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Ka numme pumme nakatzimodu yise hemehoose, noko mu numu aatadu ne maka tuungu, ka tutugutsekoo pakwe ooosoo tuwazoo ooosoo yugwe.
43006012	Numu noꞌyoona togekoo yise tukahoo, ka noko numu wutzuꞌmese, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Noko ka tukapu nagupenidu masumudoo. Gi ka tukapu nahadyugwepana.”
43006013	“Numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona kaanoku, ka tukapu nagupeni-ma, o soo manegeꞌyoo tutukutseꞌyoo tukaba.”
43006014	Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa tumadabuehoose, oo poonnese mee nananetamma, “Yow esoo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa nayadooawabe. Wunaꞌme tamme ka Te Naa nakawutooepunne, ka yaa teepu-koobatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe oo tayakwuse.”
43006015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwadoo, ka mu numu-kooba katudu oo nemayugwekwuse, ooonneꞌyoona mu maꞌwukase puu suuꞌmu oona ka giba-matoo meahoo.
43006016	Ka yongona tu manepetuse numme oo nakatzimodu ka banunadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka.
43006017	Ka tu toganokase sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe gisoo numme-baa kodyu petu. Numme yise ka sake-wi kuase, ka Capernaum-witoo natsemangega.
43006018	Unu hukwa petuse, soo baa unu bayutsungakooha.
43006019	Numme banamoo-kwitoo natsemangega, o ne manikese numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka baa-koobakwi, oo kemmanoꞌo ka sake tzageꞌe oo manikese numme sui.
43006020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Nu yow, gi suipana.”
43006021	Numme yise ka sake-wi oo netzatsebooase yabesoo ka bakumana petuga, Capernaum tzageꞌe.
43006022	Oogow awamooa mu numu ka banunadu oowenapaꞌyoona mee nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no sumuoo sake-gaꞌyoo. Ka togano tamme mu poonne ka mu tunakatzimodu ka sake-wi mu meaꞌase. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-no.”
43006023	Kukummaꞌyoosoo sake punnoꞌo o ka Tiberias mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu, ka oona etzeꞌe Te Pabeꞌe pukwiꞌyoona nanesootuhina, mu numu pukwikoo oo makapu tzageꞌe petugadyakwe.
43006024	Noꞌyoona mu numu oo poonne soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no gi o, ewaꞌyoo numu yise ka sake-wi kuase ka Capernaum-witoo natzemangekase, ka Te Pabeꞌe watega. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe mayuse meeoo oo tubenga, “Hannano u natsemangeke?”
43006026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu numu ewana nanekwegea, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwe. Mu numu ewana ka tseakoꞌena suuꞌmu e wategena, ka tukapu suuꞌmu soogwina. Gi umu ka nanabesa e pooha manena poonnese e wate.
43006027	Gi ka nasooꞌawunudu paba sooyugwepana, mu sakwa ka tukapu pumme numu nakugwetzoinnummena paba sooyugwe. Soo Te Naa nuka pooha-maka. Nu ookow tukapu puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu sootuhikwu.” Umu numu ewana yise oo tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu?”
43006029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Nuka nakaꞌoedyuku meeꞌe soo Te Naa unnena yaatoo e taya, oꞌno mu oo nakabetseakwu.”
43006030	Umu numu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Sumu tuwazoo besa u tumadina ne tzapoonneku, oꞌno numme u nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
43006031	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa puu umu te nanamooatupu tukaba makamena. Soo Te Naa unnepu mee nabotugu, ‘Te Naa paꞌanakwana tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu maka, umu yise oo tuka.’ “
43006032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, soo Moses gi ka mu nanamooatupu ka tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnumme maka. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka tukaba pummetusoo puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena-ma mu sootuhaꞌe.
43006033	Nu yow soo tukaba Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu. Soo Te Naa ekow tukaba-ma mu sootuhikwu, nu ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmapu, puma mu namagwetzoikwuna.”
43006034	Umu numu yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo manakwana u sakwa ooosapa ꞌyoonnekoo tukaba-ma ne sootuhi.”
43006035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu yow soo tukaba mu sootuhikwudu ooosapa puma mu gwetzoimokwuna. Soo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi kummaꞌakoosoo tooe hownnekoo tukapu sookwi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi puudyi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌena.
43006036	Pana mumme e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo, mu ka nanabesa e tuyugwena poonnepana mu gi e nakabetsea.
43006037	Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tutzeana, nuka nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu yise gi mu tsasoopedya-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43006038	Nu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemma, nuka oo tunetammakuna mayohokwuse, gi nuusoo meeoo tusooyugwena.
43006039	Soo Te Naa ka umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tuikwuna gi petzabena. Nu saaꞌa ka yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, noꞌoko umuoo nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, mu tuipu tuwazoo mayosudooa.
43006040	Soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, ooosapa gwetzoimokwuna soogwidu. Nu ka kodyu petuse umuoo tuipu mayosukwu.”
43006041	Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nanetzamekute ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe, “Nu yow ka tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo numu puma nakugwetzoinnummena, Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmadu.” Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “U, Ne Naa-witu esayaꞌe. U sukwe Jesus, ka Joseph tooa. Numme ka u naanapuaꞌamu sopedakwatoo.”
43006043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Gi e nanetzamekupana.
43006044	Gi mu numu puusoo e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu numu sootuhidyina umu nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa doodooamu manekekwu. Nu ka petuse saaꞌa umu nuka nagemodu, mayosukwu, tooe mu tuipu sapa.
43006045	Soo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo mee tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Naa saaꞌa noꞌoko numu tunedyooedooa.’ Tooe haga tooe numu ka Te Naa unnena nakana, yise oo nakaꞌoedyukudu, saaꞌa nu-matoo kemmadooa.
43006046	Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, nu suuꞌmu ka Te Naa poonne ka oo-baaꞌyoona kemmapuna.
43006047	Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
43006048	Nu yow soo tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo puma numu nakugwetzoinnummena, ooosapa numu puma gwetzoimokwuna.
43006049	Umu te nanamooatupu puu, ka sukwe nadukadu-ma namagwetzoimoꞌo, ka Te Naa pumme makana. Soo tukapu sukwe nawutzuꞌme, gi numu tubetse magwetzoaꞌe.
43006050	Nu yise yow soo puma numu tubetse gwetzoina tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Esoo tukapu nugasoo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe haga tooe ka nuka tookoo tukase, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu. Nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsase, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu yaahoo soo tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnumme, nu puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
43006052	Mu Jew numu puusoo nananepetukukooha mee nanaꞌunnena, “Haꞌoo haaꞌa puusoo tu tookoo-matu tzapookana te makakwu, tamme pute yise oo tukakwu?”
43006053	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, nu yow mu Pabeꞌe. Tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu. Nu ka tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnummekwuna. Soo e puupe ka baa mu hebena, puma mu namagwetzoina. Soo tooe haga tooe soogwetzoidu nu-ma suuꞌmu gwetzoikwu. Nu ka kodyu petuse mu tuiputooꞌe saaꞌa namayosudooa.
43006055	Soo e tookoo tubetse tukapu-waꞌneꞌyoo, yise e puupe punnoꞌo tubetse baa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu-mamma ooosapa numu gwetzoimokwu.
43006056	Tooe haga tooe ka e tookoo tukadu, yise ka e puupe hebedu ooosapa nu-noꞌyoopunne.
43006057	Soo Te Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi mu-baa gwetzoinnumme. Tooe haga tooe ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna, nu e pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu.
43006058	Nu yow oo soo tukapu, puma numu nakugwetzoinnummekwuna, ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Tooe haga tooe nu-noꞌyoopunnedu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu. Soo tukapu te nanamooatupu pumatu tukapu, gi haaꞌnoto numu magwetzoidu. Pana nu yow gwetzoibu mu sootuhikwudu.”
43006059	Soo Te Pabeꞌe, meeoo mu numu netammadyakwe tooesoo ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona, ka Capernaum-wiꞌyoona.
43006060	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakapunne pana gi oo nakatugu yise mee nananetamma, “Esoo nana tamme tunedyooena unusoo namanena nanakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
43006061	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo, ka oo unnewununa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana, ka meeoo mumme e netamma.
43006062	Mu sakwa sumuna gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku tooe e poonnepana, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e koyukase.
43006063	Mu numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa-suuꞌmu mu magwetzoikwu. Soo nuga unnepu putoogoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu nakaꞌoedyukuna suuꞌmu mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
43006064	Pana susumudu mu-matu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.”
43006065	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, soo numu gi puusoo nama e nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo E Naa mee e netamma, ‘Mumme nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwe,’ “ mee.
43006066	Ewaꞌyoo numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise tu nonobe-witoo kodyuka.
43006067	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu mee tubengu, “Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo e nasoomenakwu?”
43006068	Soo Simon Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwegea, “Numme ooosapa u-noꞌyookwudu. U ooosapa kaaheno ne tunedyooennumme. Numme ka gwetzoibu besa nakasoobedya.
43006069	Numme u nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo nakasopedakwatoo u yow Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
43006070	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Nu mumme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) netutzea. Pana sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu ooosapa gi nu-noꞌyoopunne.”
43006071	Ka nana Judas Iscariot mee naneadu soo Te Pabeꞌe netammana meeoo. Tooe soo Judas sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tunakatzimodu-nagatu pana soo Judas ka saaꞌa umu Te Pabeꞌe ooowemota mani, ka umu wohonedu-tamme mane, umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe batzakwu mee tunetammana.
43007001	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwi numu tunedyooennumme. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo gi meꞌa, mu Jew moohedu oonatuoo pumme nehooawi, pumme mu nepatza.
43007002	Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi ewa tukakwuna tzageꞌe manegena, oꞌno umu numu sumuyakwe, nanasusuꞌmu tatza nobe-kwi nobegana, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ewaꞌyoo yise nasootuhiyakwe.
43007003	Umu Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌamu gi oo oedyukute ka tu pabeꞌe. Umu oo wohonena mee oo netamma, “U sakwa Judea-witoo mea. U pooha tumadipe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oetuooo tzapoonnekukwu. U ka pooha-gaꞌyoo mee naneyugwena, gi oo nekwatzetugupana. U ka nanabesa tumadi mee unnena u sakwa noꞌoko numu tzapoonneku.”
43007006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu gi o mea-waꞌne manepunne, mu yise tooe hannano tooe mesoo mea.
43007007	Nu ka mu numu suda tumadugu mu tuukweꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona umu yise gi e petzape, pana umu mumme gi nekwohoꞌne.
43007008	Nu gi menoꞌo mu-no mea-waꞌne manepunne.”
43007009	Ka mu tu wangaꞌamu mease, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo huu tabeno ka Galilee-wisoo, saaꞌa puu suuꞌmu watze mea.
43007011	Mu Jew numu moohedu ka mu numu-naga-kwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe wate. Ewow numu tooꞌe tubenga, “Hano soo Jesus?”
43007012	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ewaꞌyoo numu nanatuukwe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo, “Soo Jesus besaꞌyoo nana,” pana susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Soo Jesus numu nemooagadu.”
43007013	Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-noꞌyoopunnedu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu watze nanatuukwe.
43007014	Ka mu Jew numu pahe tabeno nanesootuhi ewa tuka-kwi manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petuse yise nanesootuhibu-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe.
43007015	Mu numu mee nanatubenga, “Hownnekoo esoo nana noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo? Esoo gi hannanoꞌo nanesootuhibu-witu natunedyooepu-gaꞌyoo.”
43007016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu ka Te Naa unnena mu tunedyooe. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mu tunedyooꞌe.
43007017	Tooe haga tooe ka E Naa nakabetseadu oo sopedakwadookwu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, ka E Naa unnepu e waha.
43007018	Soo tooe haga tooe pummesoo tusooyugwena wahakwu, besa pummesoo nanemadabuewununa soogwaꞌepunnedu. Nu ka toge kaahenotu E Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno mu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe, nu gi esayaꞌe.
43007019	Mu puu ka Moses putoogoo tumayohomeana nakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwe, pana mu puu gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu ka Moses nakabetseana, how manena mu e batsa soogwaꞌe?”
43007020	Mu numu mee oo netamma, “Soo tsoapa haaꞌa u maꞌemukwa? Gi haga u batsa-soogwaꞌe.”
43007021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Sutaꞌyoo nana mee mu e netamma, ka nanesootuhi tabeno numu e mabesakukena.
43007022	Oꞌnosoo soo Moses ka mu nanamooatupusoo tumayohope mu tunedyooꞌe, ooonaꞌyoona numu kootze naꞌoonnakwitu natsekea, umu yise Jew numu maneyakwe. Mu nanamooatupu oꞌnosoo ka Moses-kobenasoo gwetzoimodu, oo ka tu doodooamu mooe yugwe.
43007023	Mu puu ka Moses nakabetseana ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno ka nana mabesaku
43007024	mu sakwa gi e sutakupana, gi e nesootzemapana.”
43007025	Susumudu mu numu-matu mee nananetamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Mu Jew moohedu batsayagana.
43007026	Soo Jesus noꞌoko ne-kobenaꞌyoona yadooadyakwe. Hownneꞌyoonagina mu numu moohedu a tsasoopedya? Te moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sumuna nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoona oo tsasoopedya.”
43007027	Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Mana numme pukwiꞌyoona a kemmana sopedakwadoo pana, oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugu. ‘Gi haga pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana soopedakootookwu.’ Numme ka nana pukwiꞌyoona kemmana sopedakwatoo ooonneꞌyoona numme meeoo oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe-matu.”
43007028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kumabaꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee mu netamma, “Mu meeoo sokwama, mu ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoo mee, pana mu ka pukwiꞌyoona oo kemmana, tuwazoo gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi ka E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakasopedakwatoo, oosoo Nuga Naa, nu oo-baaꞌyoona kemmahoo. Pana E Naa unnena nu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe, nu gi nugasoo unnena wahadu.”
43007030	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabeꞌe sookwutuma pana gi oo-toogoo manakwe, ka gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwi oo manakwe.
43007031	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-noyoopunnedu mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Esoo nana noꞌokosoo hemma nanabesa pooha madaꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona esoo nana tookwa Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma nanabesa pooha madikwu.”
43007032	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka mu numu unnena nakana nuusoogweda, ka mu tuukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wutuma tuungu, pana umu gi oo wutuma.
43007033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Nu gi haaꞌnoto mu-baaꞌyoopunnekwu. Pudusoo nu yise saaꞌa ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
43007034	Ooonneꞌyoona mu saaꞌa, unu e tooꞌe soogwi pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu nu-no tooꞌe soogwedapana gi mu hownnekoo nu-noyoopunnekwu.”
43007035	Mu numu yise mee nananetamma, “Hanogina oosoo meakwuse tamme gi oo nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo? Oosooga sumuna ka mu Jew numu tooetoo ka mu gi Jew numu-baa manekwuse.
43007036	Hayoo unnena oosoo ka meeoo, ‘Mu e tooꞌe soogwi pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu too gi e nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka e kodyukase?’ “
43007037	Ka mu Jew numu ewa tuka nanesootuhi tabeno namamakwuhoogaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe wunuse ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-punagakoo mee unakwe, “Tooe haga tooe wunaꞌme tu gwetzoinnummekwuna gi mobegwa-gakoo soogwidu nu-toohatoo nasoomawunise, nasootuhikwu.
43007038	Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe oosoo, ‘Tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu patzona-waꞌne gi pasa-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu.’ “
43007039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa tusootuhi-kwitu te tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa gisoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu numu poohamaka, ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo pubaatoo kodyu petugaꞌa.”
43007040	Susumudu oo unnena nakase, mu numu-matu meeoo, “Oosoo tookwa Te Naa yadooawabe.”
43007041	Mu susumudu punnoꞌo mee, “Yow tookwa Te Pabeꞌe.” Umu-matu yise mee unakwe, “Oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmakwudu.
43007042	Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te namooatupu David maꞌyoona suaketu. Oosoo ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmakwu, oosoo uga David pukwiꞌyoona kemmana.’ “
43007043	Mu numu yise nanapokihoo nanaꞌatasoo tusooyugwegonnona.
43007044	Mu susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuusoogwetakugonno, pana gi haga yise oo wutuma.
43007045	Mu tukwutumadu yise ka mu tutunehanedu-matoo kodyuka. Mu tutunehanedu ka mu tukwutumadu mee tubenga, “How manena mu gi ka Jesus wutuma?”
43007046	Mu tukwutumadu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo nanabesa unakwe, gi haga nana oo-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43007047	Mu tutunehanedu yise mee mu tukwutumadu netamma, “Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo oo nakaꞌoedyukute?
43007048	Numme tutunehanedu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, numme mooasoo noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoo, numu gi numme nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43007049	Mu gi tutusopedakwatoodu gi Te Naa unnena sopedakwadoo, mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-tamme kodyusoo.”
43007050	Sumuꞌyoo umu-notu Nicodemus
43007051	“Oosoo meeoo nayadooa soo Te Naa unnepu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka nana-no mooe yadooase, ka haꞌoo manekwuse oo sopedakwatoose, oꞌno tamme sumuna oo nehanese tamme oetu sopedakwadookwu, oosoo haaꞌa besaꞌyoo pute gi besaꞌyoo?’ “
43007052	Umu yise mee oo nanekwegea, “U punnoꞌo umu Galilee-witu-kwaꞌne yadooa-kaꞌnga. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu nease oo nakasopedakwadoo, soo Te Naa yadooawabe gi Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmakwudu.”
43007053	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tunemamakwuse, mu numu tu nonobe-kwitoosoo kodyudyipunne.
43008001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka giba Olive mee naneadu-matoo kodyuka, oonow tooikwu mee soonammena.
43008002	Oogow mooꞌa awamooasoo tu tabuagena, soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyuka, oona ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kobenatoosoo. Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakadu oo-baa petudyipunne. Oonow katuna nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooꞌe.
43008003	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne mooasoo kooma-gapana kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma. Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, ka mogoꞌne poonnese ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa oo bi petuoo.
43008004	Umu Jew nananesootuhidu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme eka mogoꞌne kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma a mayuhoo.
43008005	Ka te tumayohope-wi soo Moses oꞌnosoo ka te nanamooatupu oo tuukwe-kwi, oosoo mee naꞌunakwe ka ꞌyoo manedu mogoꞌne batsa. How tamme a yugwekwu?”
43008006	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nekusekuna, ka gi pumme oo nanekwagea umu oo nekwohone mee sokwamana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe natsekwuꞌne katuhoose ka tu mamoogoo-ma, ka teepu-ma tubokooha.
43008007	Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa meeoo tubengadyakwe, “Yabe hayoo unne how sakwa tamme a maꞌe?”
43008008	Umu o suuꞌmu tubengadyakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, wunuoose mee mu netamma, “Unu tooe, tupe-ma oo tapagetahoo, oo yaꞌe-kwitoo tooe. Pana soo gi hannanoꞌo tumaꞌemukwadu sakwa oo mooe tabe.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise natsekwuꞌne katusesoo ka teepu-ma tutsebokoohasoo.
43008009	Ka nasookwise mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mogoꞌne meeoo netammadu, mu wakwaꞌetse mooe meaꞌa, yise mu tootooebetse umu benakwatoo punnoꞌo meaꞌa. Ka mu petukwahookase,
43008010	soo Te Pabeꞌe wunuse ka mogoꞌne meeoo tubenga, “Haga menoꞌo meeoo u netamma?” Soo mogoꞌne meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Gi haga.”
43008011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka mogoꞌne netammasoo, “Nu punnoꞌo gi. U nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka. Yaa manakwana gi kummaꞌakoosoo nana pootaꞌma-pana.”
43008012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu ka teepu-koobatu kootabedooakute, oꞌno mu numu ka Te Naa besa po poonnena oo nagenokwu. Mu numu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi togaba-wiꞌyookwu.”
43008013	Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “U ka uusoo nanetammana esayidyakwe, ooonneꞌyoona numme yise gi u nakaꞌoedyukute.”
43008014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Tooe nu nuusoo nanetamma pana, nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Nu ka pukwiꞌyoona e kemmana, yise ka pukwitoo e meakwuna mooasoo sopedakwadoo. Mu yise gi ekow nu-kwitu sopedakwatoo.”
43008015	Mu ka nuka nemadabuena gi togekoo tunemadabue, mu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona. Soo E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu e tummatzikwu, nu yise kaaheno mu nemadabuekwu. Nu gi mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, nu kaaheno mu tunemadabuekukwu.
43008017	Soo te tumayohope meeoo, ‘Ka waahoo numu nawaꞌnesoo nanekwaha oosoo togesapa.’
43008018	Numme yise ka Te Naa-no wahaꞌyoo ooonneꞌyoona nu yise kaaheno mu tuukwe.”
43008019	Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga yise u naa?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu gi nu-kwitu sopedakwadoo, hownnekoosoo yise mu ka E Naa sopedakwadookwu?”
43008020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunedyooꞌe ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona, puu-kwikoo mu numu tumasumudoo tsageꞌyoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nakwutuma, ka gisoo oo nabatsa-kwi oo manakwe.
43008021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu gi hemma heesoobedyadu mee netamma, “Ka pukwiꞌyoona e kemmapu-witoo e kodyuse, mu saaꞌa e tooe soogwikwu, pana mu gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Suda mu tumadugu-kwisoo mu tuikwu. Mu gi nuga pukwitoo mea-kwitoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43008022	Mu Te Pabeꞌe gi heesoobedyadu, gi oo nakasoobedakwadoodu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Haꞌoo manena meeoo unakwe? Puusoo haaꞌa nabatsakwuse?”
43008023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee unakwe, “Mu ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa, noꞌyoona mu numu ka teepu-koobatu moohedu punnoꞌo ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa. Pana nu ka Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu nakabetseꞌa.
43008024	Mu ka gi nuka nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka togesoo sutaꞌyoo numuna, tuikwu.”
43008025	Umu yise oo tubenga, “How yise ꞌyoo u numme ataꞌyoosoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu ooosapa mu tooꞌe tuukwenoꞌo, pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute.
43008026	Nu yise ka ewasoo suda mu tumadugu-kwitu mu mesoo tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, pana nu gi. Soo E Naaꞌyatoo nuka tayadu, kaaheno mu nemadunagakwu. Nu noꞌoko mu tooe tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.”
43008027	Mu Jew numu moohedu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu oo waha tuunguna, yaatoo oo taya.
43008028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Mu saaꞌa e nabatsase, susumudu mu-matu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, nu mu Pabeꞌe. Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mayohokwu, pana nu ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna mu sukwe tuukweꞌe.
43008029	Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, ooosapa nu-no, gi e maꞌwukaꞌa, nu ka ooosapa besa Te Naa nakabetseana.”
43008030	Ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooadyakwe ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
43008031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee netamma, “Mu ka ooosapa o nakaꞌoedyukuna nu mu doodooamu-gakoo.
43008032	Mu yise ka kaahenotu sopedakwadookwu, gi mu numu ka suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.”
43008033	Umu yise meeoo, “Numme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu. Haꞌyoo u unnena meeoo unakwe tamme suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu?”
43008034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nanasuda tu manena mayohodu ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
43008035	Soo numu tummatziwabe, puu gi ka pumme nedyawedu nanumu. Pana soo numu nedyawedu dooaꞌa ooosapa nanumu nadatsungapunne.
43008036	Nu Mu Pabeꞌe, nu ooosapa mu nanumu-gakwu, mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu gi suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.
43008037	Tooe mu Abraham-maꞌyoona suakese sapa mu Te Naa dooamu mee nasokwama mu e batsa soogwaꞌe, mu ka gi e togeꞌyookuna.
43008038	Nu ka Nuga Naa nuka tuukwena mu tooꞌe tuukwe pana, mu ka suta-nakwana suakese, ooonneꞌyoona mu sutakoo nakabetsea.”
43008039	Umu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi suta-nakwana suaketu, Abraham ne namooatupu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Umu Abraham doodooamu ka Te Naa besa nakabetseꞌa Abraham-waꞌnesoo. Mu gi Abraham doodooamu-waꞌneꞌyoona, gi tuwazoo Te Naa dooamu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
43008040	Mu yise e batsa soogwaꞌe tooe nu kaaheno mu tooe tuukwepana mu ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, soo te namooatupu Abraham gi mu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43008041	Mu ka oo manena kummaꞌakoosoo Naa-gaꞌyoo.” Umu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Numme gi kummaꞌakoosoo naa-gaꞌyoo. Numme sumuoosoo Naa-gaꞌyoo soo numu manumudoopu, ne tubetse Naa.”
43008042	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ka Nuga Naa nenagana, mu sakwa unu e soobedya. Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise yow mu-baa petu. Gi nuusoo meeoo nasooyugwena.
43008043	Mu gi e nakabetsea. Gi ka e unaꞌwena nakapunne.
43008044	Soo Sutaꞌyoo, mu Naa, ooonneꞌyoona mu ookow nakabetseꞌa. Soo Sutaꞌyoo ooosapa numu kadoo mayugwekena, ooosapa mu esayaꞌekuna.
43008045	Mu ka gi togekoo nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoo mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute tooe kaaheno mumme e tuukweꞌe sapa.
43008046	Noꞌyoona mu e sopedakwadoo, nu ooosapa besa tumadugudu. Nu kaaheno mu tuukwepana mu gisoo e nakaꞌoedyukute.
43008047	Soo Te Naa doodooamu ooosapa oo nakabetseꞌa. Mu yise meeoo unnepana mu gi oo-noꞌyoopunne.”
43008048	Mu Jew numu mee oo netamma, “U gi kaaheno numme-matu, u ka mu sutakoo numu-matu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. U tumaꞌemukwadu.”
43008049	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu. Nu ka E Naa togeꞌyooku pana mu gi e togeꞌyookute, ooonneꞌyoona mu suda nu-kwitu waha.
43008050	Nu gi nuusoo besa naneyugwena, soo Te Naa saaꞌa besa nu-kwitu waha. Soo Te Naa ka umu nu-kwitu esayidu nemadunagakwu.
43008051	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi yaꞌekwu.”
43008052	Mu Jew numu yise meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Menoꞌo numme u sopedakwatoo u tumaꞌemukwadu. Soo te namooatupu Abraham puu yaꞌe, Te Naa nanayadooawabe punnoꞌo noꞌyoona tuipu. U yise meeoo, tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi yaꞌekwu.
43008053	U haaꞌa ka Te namooatupu Abraham ooonakwa besaꞌyoo? Hownneꞌyoo, mee puu u uusoo nasooyugwe?”
43008054	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka nuusoo nakwitu wahana, mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana soo nuga Naa, besow e poohamaka, ookow nuga netammana, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu nuka nesookwugaꞌe. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu mee nananeyugwedu.
43008055	Pana mu gi ka E Naa sopedakwatoo, nu suuꞌmu ka E Naa sopedakwatoo. Nu gi esaꞌyaꞌe mu-kwaꞌnesoo, ooonneꞌyoona nu sakwa oetu mu tuukwe, ka Te Naa e sopedakwadoo-kwitu.
43008056	Soo te namooatupu Abraham besa soonamme ka oꞌnosoo oo pooha poonnena ka yaa teepu-kooba e petukwuna.”
43008057	Mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Abraham tubetse oꞌnosoo yaꞌepu. U ka Abraham gi poonnedu. Oꞌnosoo ume gisoo nadooaꞌadoo.”
43008058	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee mu netamma, “Nu oo-koobenasoo mooasoo gwetzoi, tubetse oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Abraham nadooaꞌadoo.”
43008059	Umu yise tupe tzobakooha oo tatzagowkwu mee soogwamana. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu manikwuna sopedakwadoo ka umu-baaꞌyoona yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona watse meahoo.
43009001	Soo nana gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoopu, oona po-kumaba katu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu pumme nakatzimodu-no oona meadabena oo poonne.
43009002	Numme oo nakatzimodu ka Te Pabeꞌe mee tubenga, “Haga suda tumadugu-kwi esoo nana gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoopu, masoo nana haaꞌa puusoo suda tumaduguse, pute umu oo naanapuaꞌamu?”
43009003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Esoo nana gi tubootabuedu, suda oo tumaduguna gi oo-matoosoo kodyu, oo naanapuaꞌamu suda tumaduguna gi oo dooaꞌa-matoo kodyu. Oꞌnona eka gi tubootabuedu namabesakuse mu numu oo poonnese ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe.
43009004	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nuka yaatoo tayadu nakabetsea. Pudusoo nu nabatsase gi mu-noꞌyookwu.
43009005	Nu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoopunnena ka mu numu tummatzina, umu ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadookwu.”
43009006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka teepu-koobatoo toohese ka tu huutsenoko ka pasakwabu mayuase, ka gi tubootabuedu nana popoꞌa-kooba oo matzabekuhoo.
43009007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa meahoose ka patzona Siloam mee naneadu-kwi nabakomamitooa.” Soo gi tuboodabudu nana yise ka oonahoo nabakomamitooase, besa tubootabuena kodyu petuuoosoo.
43009008	Mu numu uga, ka gi tubootabue oo poonnedu mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Yow haaꞌa tooꞌe, esoo nana uga oona po-kumaba katuna numu tumasumudoo tuunguyidu?”
43009009	Susumudu numu meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, “Aha mow oosoo nana.” Susumudu yise punnoꞌo mee, “Gi esoo oosoo nana, oo-waꞌnesoo sukwe tabuadu.” Soo nana yise mee unne, “Nu yow soo nana gi uga tubootabuedu.”
43009010	Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mane?”
43009011	Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Sumuꞌyoo nana Jesus mee naneadu, pasagwabu e popoꞌa-kooba matzabekuse, yise ka patzona Siloam-witoo e bakomami tuungu. Nu ka bakomamitooase, besa tubootabue mani.”
43009012	Umu yise meeoo oo tubengasoo, “Hano yise oosoo nana meahoo?” Oosoo uga gi tubootabuedu nana besa manena yise meeoo, “Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
43009013	Umu numu yise ka mu Jew nananesootuhidu numu Pharisee mee nananeadu-matoo ka nana bika.
43009014	Ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi ka nana besa namabesakuse, mu Pharisee mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mani?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo Jesus tu huutsepu ka teepu noko pasagwabudoose e popoꞌa-kooba oo matzabekuhoose oo-koobatoo yise e bakomami tuunguse, nu yise bakomamitooase, yaatu poonne mani.”
43009016	Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus tookwa gi besaꞌhoo pooha-gana ka te nanesootuhi tabeba-wi numu mesoo mabesakute, masoo tookwa gi ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu.” Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu yise meeꞌe punnoꞌo unakwe, “Ekow nana mow besa oo mayugwese oosoo tookwa Te Naa besa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo.” Umu yise oo-koobatoo nananepetukute.
43009017	Umu yise, ka uga gi tubootabuedu nana mee tubenga, “Haꞌyoo u ka nana ume mabesakudu-kwitu soobedya?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo oo kaaheno Te Naa yadooawabe.”
43009018	Mu Pharisee gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute, ka nana uga gi tubootabuena. Umu yise oo naanapuaꞌamu-witoo tutaꞌya.
43009019	Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu nabi petuse, mu Pharisee mee, ka oo naanapuaꞌamu tubenga, “Esoo haaꞌa mumme dooa? Yaa haaꞌa oosoo gi tubootabuena nadooaꞌadoodu? Haꞌoo manese menoꞌo tubootabue mane?”
43009020	Mu Jew numu moohedu mooasoo mee tunetammapu, “Numme tooe haga tooe ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ne Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo tayakwunihookwu.” Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suipunne, ka meeoo mu tunetamma. “Soo Jesus ne dooa mabesaku,” mee tu unnikwu-ma suipunne. Mu oo naanapuaꞌamu mee mu nanengwegea, “Numme oo sopedakwadoo, esoo ne dooa oe manakwanasoo. Pana numme gi oo sopedakwatoo ka hownnekoo oo namabesakuse, ka ooka mabesakudu tuwazoo. Mooasoo masoo ewa tomopu, makowsoo tubenga.”
43009024	Umu numu moohedu yise ka nana uga gi tubootabuedu nabatoosoo bihoo tuwazoo. Umu yise mee oo netamma, “U sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi gi ka Jesus-matoo. Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus suda tumadugu.”
43009025	Pana soo uga gi tubootabuedu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Sumuna oosoo tooꞌe suda tumadugudu, nu gi oo sopedakwadoo, pana nu oo sopedakwatoo, nu uga gi tubootabuedu, pana menoꞌo nu yaatu mesoo poonne.”
43009026	Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haꞌoo soo Jesus u sootunagase u yaatu mesoo poonne?”
43009027	Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe, pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Haꞌoo manena mu ookowsoo e tubengayakwesoo? Mu haaꞌa punnoꞌo ka Jesus nakatzimokwu mee sokwamana, mee sumu tutubengadyakwe?”
43009028	Umu yise ka nana nakasagwaꞌekuhoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “U ka sutakoo nana nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo unakwe. Pana numme puu ka Moses unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute.
43009029	Soo Moses yise uga, oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe. Numme ka Jesus gi Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo unakwe sapa, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute.”
43009030	Soo nana yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi hannanoꞌo hagaa ꞌyoonnekoo nana tunadooaꞌadoo-kwi manakwanasoo gi tubootabuedu mabesakudu. Soo Jesus ka gi tubootabuedu numu mesoo mabesakuna, oosoo kaaheno ka Te Naa maꞌyoona kemmadu. Oosoo gi sutaꞌyoo nana mee pumme netamma-waꞌne. Soo Jesus ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi numu mabesakute. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa mu oo sopedakwadoo, soo Jesus, Te Naa yaatoo tutayana meeꞌe nu.”
43009034	Mu Pharisee ka uga gi tubootabuedu nanekwegea, “U puu ka u nadooaꞌadoo-kwi manakwana tubetse sutaꞌyoo. Gi hownnekoo u ne tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43009035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oekoo ka nana natayakwunihoose oo naka, oo watega, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U haaꞌa ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa nakaꞌoedyukute?”
43009036	Soo nana yise mee ka Te Pabeꞌe nanekwegea, “Aha, nu ookow nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana nu gi oo poonnedu, haga oosoo?”
43009037	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise meeoo, “Nu yow soo U Pabeꞌe Te Naa Tooaꞌa.”
43009038	Soo nana yise mee unakwe, “Nu u nakaꞌoedyukute.” Soo nana yise Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhikooha.
43009039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee unakwe, “Nu yaa teepu-kooba petu, ka umu gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwatoodu ka Te Naa pudu unnepu tunedyooegena, oꞌno saaꞌa umu besa oetu nakasopedakwadookwu. Susumudu mu-matu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoodu besa manepunne mee nasooyugwe pana, mu gi eka mumme e tunedyooena nakasopedakwadoo.”
43009040	Mu Pharisee-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo unakwe oo naka. Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme gi ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo, mee haaꞌa u unnena meeoo?”
43009041	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo numu gi oo nakasopedakwadoodu, gi mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana mu yise ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo mee naneyugwedu soo mumme tumaꞌemukwana yise mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
43010001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka seepu koodua natzakwonaꞌadoo oe egeadu, oosoo kaaheno mu mabetseakwudu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka koodua-koobakwi oe tooe egeadu, tookwa gi toge manedu.
43010003	Soo tueyaꞌedu ka umu mabetseadu sopedakwadoona, oosoo suuꞌmu oe natzaꞌegeakwu. Soo seepu takonedu pummesoo seepu bihookakwu. Umu oo seepu yise, ka seepu koodua-wiꞌyoona kuowkase oo nagekakwu umu pumme takonedu tuapa nakasopedakwadoona.
43010005	Pana umu seepu ka kummaꞌakoosoo tuapa nakahoose umu sukwe namameaꞌakwu.”
43010006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka natugwenga makwuse, umu gi ka oo natugwengapu nakasopedakwadoo.
43010007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tuwow, “Nu yow ka koodua natzakwonaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo, sumuoosoo natzakwonaꞌa-gaꞌyoo. Mu oo-toogoo oe egase nu ooosapa mu-kooba tueyaꞌekwu. Nu mu mabetseana, mu gi hemma namatuugekwu. Umu kukummaꞌaꞌyoosoo sumuna mooasoo nu-kobenasoo petugadu mee unnedu, ‘Nu mu magwetzoikwu.’ Umuoo esagoedu. Umuoo tuduhagetu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, umu nuka nagedu kadoo tooꞌe mayugwedu. Mu e nanumu tooe kadoo mayugwekwudu. Pana umu nu-noyookwudu, gi ka mu numu nemooagadu nakatzabe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu yise yow petu, mu magwetzoikwutu, mu yise ooosapa gwetzoimona besa sokwamamokwu.
43010011	Nu yow ka mu mabetseakwuse, nu gi mu namanayahakwuna sookwaꞌe, nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse, umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu yise nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa besa e sooyugwe, nu ka oo tunetammapu mayohona mu numu magwetzoina, umu-koobatoo tuwazoo nabatsakwuse. Mu numu e batsakwu ka meeoo e soonamme, pana nu gi meeoo tusooyugwe. Nu pooha tumadaꞌe, yise nu mesoo gwetzoaꞌekwusoo, soo E Naa ka ꞌyoo e mane tuunguna. Nanakukummaꞌayoosoo numu saaꞌa e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Nu yise sumusoo mu mayugwe petuse, mu mabetseana, mu-kooba tueyaꞌedooa. Soo seepu takonedu gi mu seepu toge soobedya, ka puu gi mu hee-gana. Oꞌno yise ka etzaꞌa mu seepu-baa petuse, soo mu takonedu sukwe meahoo, oosoo ka gi mu seepu hee-soobedyana. Soo etzaꞌa mu seepu-matu goehookwu, mu susumudu yise nanaꞌemota petukwowkwu.”
43010019	Mu Jew numu ka oo nakase ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu, nanano sukwe nanepetukute.
43010020	Susumudu umu-matu mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tumaꞌemukwadu unu sutaꞌa, gi oo nakabetseapana.”
43010021	Susumudu umu-matu punnoꞌo mee unakwe, “Soo tumaꞌemukwadu, gi mee ooonnekoo yadooa-waꞌneꞌyoo, masoo unu nesoonamme. Esoo nana, Te Pabeꞌe gi tubootabuedu numu mabesakupu.”
43010022	Saaꞌa ka tu tommo petuse, mu Jew numu nanesootuhidu ewa tuka, umu ka oo soomayuna ka oꞌnosoo tu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe mu mabetsabepu.
43010023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oona wunudyinnumme, ka nanesootuhi nobe-matoo nahabadoodu-tooha, ka Solomon haba mee naneadu-toohaꞌyoona mu numu nanesootuhiyakwe, umu-baa.
43010024	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo naꞌoonnakwi manise mee oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa ne nanekwegeakwu? U haaꞌa Ne Pabeꞌe?”
43010025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Nu mooasoo mu tooꞌe tuukwe pana mu gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu ka E Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe, mu sakwa uga e sopedakwatoo, pana mu gi e nakaheesoobedya.
43010026	Mu tookwa gi nu-noꞌyookwudu.
43010027	Umu nu-noꞌyoopunnedu e nakasopedakwadoo, yise e unnetoosoo manaꞌwe. Nu mu sopedakwadoo,
43010028	mu yise ooosapa mu gwetzoimona petukudu. Gi haga nu oemota mu mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43010029	Soo E Naa umu e doodooamu mayugwepu, soo E Naa ka mu numu ooonakwasoo pooha-gana, gi haga ka E Naa oemota mu nemayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43010030	Nu punnoꞌo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka E Naa-waꞌnekoosoo.”
43010031	Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu tupe tzobakooha, ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena gi naka petzabena oo tatzagahookwu mee sokwamana.
43010032	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu mayohona ka mu numu tummatzaꞌe, mu yise oowetoo e batsayagate.”
43010033	Umu mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Pana numme u batsakwu ka Ne Naa-waꞌnesoo u naneyugwe. Gi numme ka besa u tumadugu-kwitu u batsakwu. U sukwe numu, numme-waꞌnesoo pana u mee unakwe, ‘Nu ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.’ “
43010034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Mu tookwa ka Te Naa unnepu neꞌa, ka mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Soo Te Naa meeoo ka sukwe numu netamma, “Mu sakwa nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.” ’
43010035	Soo Te Naa unnepu gi naꞌesayidu. Nu gi sukwe numu nu ka Te Naa tubetse yadooawabe. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa gi e batsapana, tooe nu ka E Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo meeꞌe e unakwe sapa.
43010036	Soo Te Naa yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya. Haꞌoo manena mu, ‘Esayaꞌe,’ mee e netamma, ‘Nu Te Naa Tooaꞌa,’ mee e unakwe?
43010037	Mu sakwa ka Te Naa pooha-ma nanabesa e manekena nakaꞌoedyuku, tooe mu gi e nakaheesoobedya pana. Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, numme ka E Naa-no sumuꞌyoosoo.”
43010039	Umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe wutumahookwu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu namatzatsebooge.
43010040	Numme natunedyooemodu, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meaꞌa, ka Jordan hooodu kwingakwatoo, ka oꞌnosoo John numu baa-wi matzakapu-witoo.
43010041	Onona ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmadyakwe. Umu mee nananetamma, “Soo John puu gi pooha-gapana noꞌyoona ka John Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahapu menoꞌo oo-toogoo manekena.”
43010042	Ooonneꞌyoona ewaꞌyoo numu onona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane.
43011001	Soo nana Lazarus mee naneadu ka oona Bethany mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo unu tuoeyaꞌe. Lazarus ka umu tu susuakwumu Mary
43011007	yise numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Tamme ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoosoo kodyu.”
43011008	Numme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo mee netamma, “Te nanumu papabeꞌe otuoo tupe-ma u tooꞌe tatsagapu. U sakwa gi oetoosoo kodyupana.”
43011009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Nu menoꞌo yaahoo togesoo gwetzoinnumme. Gi hee menoꞌo e patza-waꞌneꞌyoo, gisoo nu E Naa nuka tunetammakupu mamakwu.”
43011011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Te puaꞌa Lazarus sukwe uꞌwe, tamme oo-matoo mease nu saaꞌa oo netupoonnedooa.”
43011012	Numme oo nakatzimodu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Gi tookwa oosoo hownneꞌyoo ka sukwe uwena. Oosoo puusoo pudusoo tupoonnekoo.”
43011013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus yaꞌena sopedakwadoo. Numme meeoo sokwama soo Lazarus tookwa sukwe uꞌwe.
43011014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise besasoo oetu ne tuukweꞌe, “Soo Lazarus yaꞌepu.”
43011015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Nu besa soonamme nu ka gi onona ka Lazarus yaꞌehoose. Oꞌno nu e besa pooha manena mu tzapoonnekukwu, oꞌno yise saaꞌa mu e nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Menoꞌo tamme ka oo natugu-kwitoo meaꞌa.”
43011016	Soo nana Thomas mee naneadu, Namatu mee tuwazoo naneadu, mee ne netamma, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meaꞌase, oꞌno sumuna tamme saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo natagoedooa.”
43011017	Ka oo Te Pabeꞌe-no ne petuhoogase mu numu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe, “Mooasoo watsu tabe meakapu soo Lazarus ka tupe tawaga-kwi natugupuna.”
43011018	Soo Bethany ka Jerusalem tsageꞌyoona, ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu ka Jerusalem nakwanatu kemmana mu Mary noko Martha-baa petugase, ka Bethany-wiꞌyoona mu netusoonakute, ka mu wanngaꞌa yaꞌese.
43011020	Mu numu ka Martha meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Soo Jesus mu puaꞌa mooasoo oo-na kemma.” Soo Martha yise oo wegea meahoo. Soo Mary ka gi oo nakana tu nobe-kwisoo.
