43011021	Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wegeꞌowse mee oo netamma petuga, “U sakwa uga ka ne wanngaꞌa tooesoo gwetzoꞌi petuse, oosoo uga gi yaꞌekwu.
43011022	Soo Te Naa ka pumme u nanetzakwiyaꞌe u nakasootuhidyina mu numu besa mayugweyakwe.”
43011023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo netamma, “Saaꞌa soo u wanngaꞌa gwetzoise tuusootabuekwu.”
43011024	Soo Martha yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Aha, nu oo sopedakwatoo soo teepu saaꞌa atasoo manekwu, noꞌyoona mu tuipu tuusootabuekwu.”
43011025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ka Martha netamma, “Nu ka mu numu mayodakwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, tooꞌe yaꞌese sapa nu mu matuusootabuese umu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. U haaꞌa puu e nakaꞌoedyukute?”
43011027	Martha yise meeoo oo netamma, “Aha, nu u nakaꞌoedyukute, u yow Ne Pabeꞌe, oꞌnosoo nanekemmapu.”
43011028	Soo Martha yise ka Mary-matoo mease meeoo oo watse tuukwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo petuoose u baꞌe.”
43011029	Soo Mary ka oo nakahoose, yotsekase ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo meahoo.
43011030	Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo Jew numu petugonno ka Mary netusoonakuna. Ka Mary gi obeda yotseoose oo meahoose umu numu meeoo sokwama, “Oosoo tookwa ka tu wanngaꞌa natugu-kwitoo meahoo.” Umu yise oo-nakwi meaꞌa.
43011032	Soo Mary ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugase oo-kobena meatzedose, mee ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “U sakwa uga ka oꞌnosoo petuoose, e Pabeꞌe sakwa uga gi yaꞌe.”
43011033	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Mary tu pupuaꞌa-no mu sakwaꞌe mu poonnena, tutuha mu sooyugwe.
43011034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo tutubenga, “Hano natzatugu?” Umu yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Kemmow, numme u tzapoonnekukwu.”
43011035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yaka.
43011036	Mu numu otuoo yise mee nanaꞌunnegonno, “Masoo Jesus tookwa togesapa ka Lazarus unu soobedya.” Mu susumudu punnoꞌo mee unnegonno, “Esoo Jesus puu ka gi tubootabuedu mabesaku, ka Lazarus sakwa uga tuwazoo ooosoo. Soo Lazarus uga gi yaꞌekwu.”
43011038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tutuha soonammena, ka tupe tawaga-kwitoo ka Lazarus pukwi natugu-kwitoo mea. Ka tupe tawagana-kobena papabatseꞌyoo tseketadyadu tupe-ma oo nadatumapunne.
43011039	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Ka tupe sekebatoo magonnonoekwuni.” Soo Lazarus suakwu Martha yise meeoo oo netamma, “Oosoo mooasoo watsu tabeno manekapu ka mi natzatuguna. Menoꞌo ka sumuna oosoo suda kwanakapu.”
43011040	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo nu mee uga u tuukwepu, u ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno u ka Te Naa pooha tuyugwena poonnekwu.”
43011041	Ka tupe mu magonnonoese, soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopatu poonnese meeoo nanesootuhi, “Ne Naa u nanasookwugaꞌe, nu ka nonoꞌotsa u nanetzakwiꞌyina u e nakasootuhiyakwe.
43011042	Nu oo sopedakwadoo u ooosapa e nakasootuhidyidu. Nu menoꞌo yaanona u yadooꞌe, oꞌno mu numu yaatu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu, nu yaahoo U Besaa Tooa.”
43011043	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pabatseꞌe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee unne, “Lazarus, yaatoo kemma.”
43011044	Soo Lazarus yise, yaatoo tsebooeke, oo tookoo noꞌyoona wunapu-ma nakwutoota, oo-koobadooe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ka a nakwutootana tzahanehoo.”
43011045	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona ka Mary-no kemmadu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha manena poonnese oo sooꞌoedyukute.
43011046	Pana susumudu umu-matu gi oo sooꞌoedyukudu, ka mu Pharisee Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoodu-matoo mease ka Te Pabeꞌe besa pooha tuyugwepu mu tuukweꞌe.
43011047	Mu tutunehanedu-no mu Pharisee sumuhoose mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus ewa naduya pooha manekena. Haꞌoo sakwa tamme oo sootunaga?
43011048	Ka menoꞌo gi ooka te tzodyooikute noꞌyoona numu sumuna oo nakaꞌoedyuku mani petugakwu. Oꞌno sumuna mu Roman numu moohedu umu tukwutumadu yaatoo tayase umu ka te nanesootuhi nobe, yise noꞌoko te nanumu manepunnena kadoo mayugwekwu.”
43011049	Sumuꞌyoo mu tutunehanedu pabeꞌe Caiaphas mee naneadu mee mu netamma, “Mu gi hemma sopedakwatoo.
43011050	Tamme sakwa ka Jesus batsa, oosoo puu sukwe sumuꞌyoosoo nana. Tamme puu ewaꞌyoo. Oꞌno tamme noꞌyoona gi tuikwu.” Gi puu pumme tusooyugwena yadooꞌa.
43011051	Oosoo ka mu tunehane pabeꞌena, soo Te Naa pumme soonammetuguna oo yadooa tuunguna, oosoo yise meeoo, “Jesus noꞌoko ka mu tu nanumu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.”
43011052	Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi ka mu tu nanumu-koobatoo suuꞌmu nabatsakwu, noꞌobatusoo numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.
43011053	Mu Jew tutunehanedu yise oo batsakwu mee tunehane.
43011054	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooonneꞌyoona tukena nuuyugwesapa, numme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-no Ephraim mee naneadu-kwitoo meꞌa, onahoo sukwe hee-wanatoo.
43011055	Soo tabeba tzageꞌe manekena ka mu pooha tumayohoyina, oꞌno umu gi namayadu tukaba
43011056	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-kwitoo ewa tuka mi. Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe watena mee nanatubenga, “Haꞌoogena soo Jesus ka ewa tukape-kwitoo kemmakwu?”
43011057	Mu tutunehanedu, mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ne tuukwe saaꞌa ka Jesus poonnese, oꞌno numme oo wutumowkwu.”
43012001	Naapahe tabeno ka Gi Namayuadu Tukaba mu nanesootuhi ewa tukakwuna penipunne, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Bethany-wi petuga Lazarus-baa oo nobe-kwi, ookow soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oꞌnosoo mayodapu oo yaꞌekwikoo.
43012002	Soo Lazarus hamaꞌa Martha ewow numu ka Te Pabeꞌe noko maka, ka Lazarus tuwazoo.
43012003	Togesoo mu tuka aata soo Martha punneꞌe, Mary, unu nanenagadu, besa kwanadu nakwanaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe kuku-koobatu hanehoose, tu tzopuhu-ma oo-maꞌwonge. Soo nakwanaꞌa noꞌoko ka nobe-tootu besa kwanakupunne.
43012004	Sumuꞌyoo umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu Judas Iscariot
43012005	“Masoo sakwa uga eka nakwana-ma tumu, gi a nahadyagwe ka mu tutuha manedu numu oo-ma tummatzi.”
43012006	Soo Judas gi ka mu tutuha manedu numu heesoobedya. Soo Judas ka tumasumudoope mahaneyina oo-matu tuduhayakwe.
43012007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo oo netamma, “Gi ka Mary meeoo netammapana. Esoo ka e nabatsakwuna tzageꞌe manekena, ooonneꞌyoona soo Mary ꞌyoo e sootunagaꞌa.
43012008	Mu tutuha manedu numu ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu, pana yise nu gi ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu yaa teepu-kooba.”
43012009	Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe, ka Mary nobe-kwi oo-baa nobenge oo sopedakwatoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnegetu, ka Lazarus tuwazoo.
43012010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus oo yaꞌekwikoo oo matuusootabuꞌase, ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manegena. Mu yise tutunehanedu ka Lazarus nuusookwetakuna oo batsakwu meeꞌe tunehane. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Lazarus oo mayodase oo poonnedu nanekwahakooha.
43012012	Ookow mooꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Jerusalem-witoo mea.
43012013	Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Jerusalem-wi numu-baa ewa nanesootuhi tukagetu oo naka ka Te Pabeꞌe kemmana. Mu numu ka mu nanekwahana nakadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe wegeaga, ooꞌoodutsekoo poohegakoo sunngabe maꞌna hemmana. Umu papabatse nanakatsebooegonno, besa nesokwamana mee unnena, “Soo Te Naa menoꞌo te tummatzikwu. Soo Te Naa yaatoo Te Pabeꞌe tayapu. Soo Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe sootuhikwu. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe menoꞌo tamme-kooba tunehane katukwudu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuutsekoo tzagaze-kooba katunooꞌoo, ka Te Naa unnepu nabotugu-kwaꞌne, “Mu numu saaꞌa, gi suipana. Soo mu-kooba katukwudu pudusoo petukwu tzagaze-kooba katuna.” Numme ka oꞌno gi oo nakasopedakwadoo. Saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase numme oo ꞌoedyuku manepetu, noꞌoko ka Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo tubo tuguna.
43012019	Mu Pharisee puusoo mee nananetamma, “Mu numu gi te nakabetseꞌa manegena, umu ka Jesus suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukugonnona.”
43012020	Ka mu ewa nanesootuhi tuka, mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew umu-no oe.
43012022	Mu wakwawaꞌa ka Philip-matoo kemmase yise mee oo netamma, “Numme sakwa ka Jesus-no nanatapoegea.” Soo Philip ka Andrew tuukwe, umu yise nanosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwe.
43012023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu netamma, “Pudusoo nu mu numu suda mane-koobatoo nabatsakwu. Oꞌno yise mu oo sopedakwadoodooa, yow nu mu Pabeꞌe, mu magwetzoi meakwudu. Ewaꞌyoo numu e nakaꞌoedyukuna ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu togekoo mu tuukwe. Nu ka hemma pooe-kwaꞌne puu, ka teepu-tooha namasuase tooe suda manese sapa, ka suakese ewa pooedooakekwu, yooosoo nu punnoꞌo manekwu. Ka e yaꞌese e namayodase, ewaꞌyoo numu nunakwana nanesootuhi manekekwu.
43012025	Tooe haga tooe gi nu-notu, ka gi moobekwa-gakoo nagwetzoidu gi nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tooe haga tooe nu-no meadabedu, oosoo ka tubetse gi moobekwu-gakoo nagwetzoidu nasootuhikwu.
43012026	Soo tooe haga tooe nu-matoo nanesootuhidu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu. Soo E Naa yise ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu.
43012027	Menoꞌo nu suda soonamme, nu yaa teepu-koobatoo kemma, mu numu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse. Gi nu ka E Naa mee netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka nuka wohonedu-makoo e magwetzoi.
43012028	U, E Naa, ka mu numu u-matoo nanesootuhi mayugweke, mee nu u nanetzakwiyaꞌe.” Soo Te Naa yise paꞌanakwana mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu mooasoo nu-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe mu mayugwepu, mu yise ooosapa manenokwu.”
43012029	Ka Te Naa tuapa nakase mu susumudu numu oo konnopunnedu-matu mee nananetamma, “Nunuabu-waꞌne meeoo numme oo nakasoobedya.” Mu susumudu yise punnoꞌo mee unne, “Sumuna soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooe.”
43012030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Soo Te Naa pabatseꞌe e yadooe, nunuaꞌadu-kwaꞌne nanakahoo, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwadookwu ka nuka oo yadooꞌe.
43012031	Pudusoo nu mu-koobatoo nabatsakwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo mee unakwe, “Nu noꞌobatusoo numu nuka nanesootuhi mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, soo suda mu tumadugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Nu ka Sutakoo, mu numu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwedu matzooekukwu.”
43012034	Susumudu mu numu otuoo mee unakwe, “Numme mee oo naka, soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo naꞌunakwe, ‘Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.’ U yise ka Ne Pabeꞌena, u gi hownnekoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43012035	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee mu nanekwegea, “Te Naa unnepu nu mumme numu tunesootabuekute, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa yaa teepu-kooba mu-baa e manumudoopu. Ka e yaanoko e nakaꞌoedyuku, nu yise saaꞌa ka tubetse nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka sutakoo matzooekukwu ka nuga dooamuna, pudusoo nu E Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu, mu yise gi hownnekoo e nagega-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mease umu tu wohomu watze.
43012037	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tubotugupu-gaꞌyoo, “Te Naa, gi haga pumme ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukute, tooe umu ka nanabesa u tumaduguna poonnepana.” Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne, ka nanabesa oo tumadugu. Pana ka Isaiah oꞌnosoo unnekwaꞌnesoo gi noꞌyoona umu oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
43012039	Mee tuwazoo soo Isaiah unakwe, “Mu numu tusoomatzooena tooe ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana gi oo soonakabetseꞌa. Umu sakwa sumuna ka oo nakasopedakwadoona, ka suda tu tumaduguna maꞌwuse e nakaꞌoedyuku manese, nu mu mabesakukwu. Oo manena umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.”
43012041	Soo Isaiah meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha, soo Isaiah ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha nakasopedakwatoona.
43012042	Susumudu mu numu Jew numu-matu, yise susumudu mu Jew numu moohedu-matu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute. Pudu mu Pharisee nanesootuhidu mee unakwe, “Numme ka tooe haga tooe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tayakwunikwu.” Ooonneꞌyoona umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nanekwaha.
43012043	Umu gi oo nakaheesoobedya tooe ka Te Naa meeoo pumme netamma sapa. Pana ka mu numu pumme nesookwugina suuꞌmu besa soobedya.
43012044	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu besa pooha-toohakwi mee unakwe, “Numu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyukute, umu ka Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.
43012045	Mu numu nuka sopedakwadoodu, ka Te Naa nuka yaa teepu-koobatoo tayase, ka nu mumme numu Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo mayugwekwuse.
43012046	Mu numu ka nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, gi ka suda tu tumadugu-ma sokwamakwu.
43012047	Nu ka mu numu magwetzoikwuse yaa teepu-kooba petu, gi mu wohonekwuse.
43012048	Tooe haga tooe gi e unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa, soo suda mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
43012049	Nu gi e sukwe tusooyugwena wahana meeoo unakwe, ka Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu meeoo nuka netamma. Mu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu ooosapa gi moobegwaga gwetzoimokwu.”
43013001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa numme pumme nakatzimodu yaa teepu-koobatu unu soobedyadu. Ka gi namayadu tukaba nanesootuhi naꞌewa tukakwuna oe manegena, soo Te Pabeꞌe unu ne soobedyana, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo sopedakwatoona, pudusoo nabatsase ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
43013002	Soo Sutaꞌyoo mooasoo ka Judas Iscariot
43013003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa oo Pooha-makase noꞌyoona hee oo-toohakwi gwetzoimokwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu-no yongo tukana,
43013004	soo Te Pabeꞌe yotseoose, tu nagaꞌapu tzakwumowse, namatzuaꞌa-ma wunateahoo.
43013005	Ka baa pukwi mu tabatzaganoo-wi tuoonahoose, numme pumme nakatzimodu ne tabatzagakute, ne kuku mabasakute.
43013006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter-baa mani petu, soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U Ne Pabeꞌe. U gi nuka tabatzagakupana. Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu moohedu, gi numu tabatzagatudu.”
43013007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter meeoo nanekwegea, “Menoꞌo u ka ꞌyoo e manena gi nakasopedakwadoo, pana saaꞌa u besasoo oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”
43013008	Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Gi nuga kuku tabatzagapana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter nanekwegea, “Nu u tabatzagakuse, u e dooaꞌa manekwu. Nu ka gi u tabatzagakuna u gi e dooaꞌa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43013009	Soo Peter ka Te Pabeꞌe yise mee netamma, “Noꞌoko e tookoo e nabageaku, e kuku, e mi, e wo tuwazoo.”
43013010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter mee netamma, “U mooasoo pudu nabagea u gi tootsaꞌa, u kuku suuꞌmu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka suda mu tumaduguna soomuꞌwapu, pana sumuoo mu-nagatu suda tumaduguna gi soomuꞌwa, oosoo ka tooesoo suda tumaduguyina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Judas Iscariot netammana ka oo sopedakwatoona, saaꞌa soo Judas ka umu Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumakwu.
43013012	Ka noꞌoko ne tabatzagakumakwuse, ka tu nagaꞌapu-wi namadabuese oo katuhoosoo.
43013013	Mee yise ne netamma, “Nu mu tuukwekwu ka how manena nu mu kuku tabatzagakute. Mu yise Ne Pabeꞌe mee e neꞌa. Oosoo togesapa, nu Mu Pabeꞌe.
43013014	Nu Mu Pabeꞌe mu tabatzagaku ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa nanatummatzina, mu sakwa punnoꞌo nanatabatzagaku. Mu sakwa gi paba nasooyugwepana tooe meeoo soonammepana.
43013015	Ooosapa nu besa mu tummatzidu, ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa besa nuga mumme matugu-kwaꞌnesoo besa nanamatugu.
43013016	Nu togesapa mu tuukwe mu sakwa nanatummatzi, mu sakwa gi mee tusooyugwepana, ‘Nu nagutza besaꞌyoo gi ka E Pooha Pabeꞌe numu tummatzi-kwaꞌne mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
43013017	Mu haaꞌa oo nakasopedakwatoo ka how manena nu mu tabatzagaku? Mu ka e unnepu nakabetseana, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.
43013018	Sumuoo mu-nagatu soo Te Naa gi sootuhikwu. Nu mu posopedakwatoonasoo mu netutzea, nuka tummatzikwutu. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubo, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu nu-no tukadu e wohonekwu.”
43013019	Gisoo oo tu namanakwe nu mu tuukweꞌe, saaꞌa yise ka oo tunamanese mu mee unnekwu, ‘Soo Jesus togesapa Te Pabeꞌe.’
43013020	Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Nu ka umu e nanayadooawabe numu-matu mu-matoo tayakwu, mu ka mu nakabetseana e doodooamu manekwu. Umu nuga doodooamu, E Naa doodooamu tuwazoo.”
43013021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise suda soonammena mee tuwazoo ne netamma, “Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu saaꞌa e nemawunidooa, ka umu e wohomu-matoo.”
43013022	Numme tunakatzimodu nanapoonnemoꞌo, numme gi oo sopedakwatoo ka haga oo netammana.
43013023	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kumaba katu, oosoo ka nuka unu soobedyana.
43013024	Soo Peter e tsetzoogase mee unakwe, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga haga oosoo netamma.”
43013025	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzageꞌesoo nuuyugwese, ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Haga numme-matu u wohomu-matoo u nemawunikwu?”
43013026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee e nanekwegea, “Nu ka egea tukaba-matoo a hooba-wi matzakase ka ookow nana geahookwu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tukaba hooba-wi, a namatzakana ka Judas Iscariot geahoo.
43013027	Soo Judas yise ka tukaba-matoo tukowse, soo sutaꞌyoo Judas-ma katuoose oo-naga mani. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo ka Judas netamma, “Yabeapu ka u tusoohane-kwaꞌne mani.” Mooasoo tu toganokase soo Judas meahoo. Numme tuka aatadu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ooka nemaꞌese. Ka Judas ka pumma ne tumukwuna hanedu, numme-matu yise meeoo sokwama, “Sumuna soo Te Pabeꞌe tukapu oo tumu tuungusoo, ka tu ewa tukapu-kwitoo.” Numme-matu punnoꞌo meeoo sokwama, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, ka mu tutuhamanedu-matu haneku.”
43013031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu tzapoonnekukwu, nu Mu Pabeꞌe. Menoꞌo manakwana tamme ka Te Naa nesookwugikwu e mane-koobatoo. Pudusoo ꞌyoo namanekwu.
43013033	Mu e besa doodooamu. Pudusoo nu gi mu-baaꞌyookwu. Mu e wate pana gi e mayu-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu Jew numu moohedu e tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.
43013034	Nu pudu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu, ‘Nuka mumme soobedya-kwaꞌne, mu sakwa menoꞌo manakwana ooonnekoo soo nanasoobedyana.
43013035	Noꞌobatusoo numu mu nakasopedakwadookwu, mu e doodooamu, ka besa mu nanasoobedya mu poonnena.’ “
43013036	Soo Simon Peter mee ka Te Pabeꞌe tubenga, “Howtoo maꞌa u meakwu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu oona kwingaꞌa meakwu, ka Te Naa-matoo, mu gi hownnekoo nu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana nu saaꞌa mu bidooa.”
43013037	Soo Simon Peter yise mee oo netamma, “Haꞌyoo u unnena meeoo, mu gi menoꞌo nu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo? Nu u-noꞌyookwu ka unu u soobedyana tooe mu numu taka goekwuse sapa.”
43013038	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu u sopedakwadoo. U gi nu-no yaꞌekwu, yaa togano u gi e nanenamaꞌyookwu. Gisoo ka kweꞌnaꞌa kwuꞌa yaka u saaꞌa pahe tooe ka mu numu mee netammadooa, ‘Nu gi ka Jesus sopedakwatoo.’ U gi ooosapa nu-noꞌyoopunnekwu.”
43014001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, nuka nakabetsea tuwazoo.
43014002	Soo Te Naa nobe-kwitu ewow kapa-gaꞌyoo. Nu togesapa, nu gi esayaꞌe. Nu mease ka Te Naa-baa mu kapadookukwu. Saaꞌa nu yaasoo kodyu petuse, mu bikakwu Te Naa-matoo. Oꞌno yise mu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu.
43014004	Mu mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo ka a nameatabuana.”
43014005	Soo Thomas yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Numme gi oo sopedakwadoo ka pukwitoo u meakwuna. Numme gi a nameatabuana sopedakwatoo.”
43014006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee oo netamma, “Nu ka besow podo mu moohekwu. Nu togesapa ka Te Naa-witu sopedakwatoo, nu ka mu numu ooosapa gwetzoimo-kwitoo mu moohekwu, gi tooe haga tooe hownnekoo puusoo ka Te Naa-baatoo mea-waꞌne, nu otu mu mesoo bigaꞌa.
43014007	Mu mooasoo e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute. Yaa manakwana mu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo poonnekwu tuwazoo.”
43014008	Soo Philip yise ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka Te Naa ne tzapoonneku. Oꞌno numme besa sokwamakwu.”
43014009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Philip mee netamma, “Wunaꞌme nu mu-baa, pana tooesoo mu gisoo e tubetse sopedakwatoo. Tooe haga tooe nuka poonnedu ka Te Naa tuwazoo poonne.
43014010	Numme ka Te Naa-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena nu mu tuukweꞌe, pana E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu waha.
43014011	Mu sakwa ka mumme e tuukwena nakaꞌoedyuku, numme ka Te Naa-no toge nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka mu tuoegoedu mabesakuyakwe.
43014012	Mu sakwa oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyuku, nu pudusoo ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukakwusoo. Nu yise mumme nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhise, oꞌno mu nu-kwaꞌnesoo punnoꞌo, besa pooha nasootuhikwu. Mu punnoꞌo nanasookwugi, nuga ooonakwasoo besa pooha manekwu.
43014013	Mu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna e nanetzakwiyaꞌena, nu mu nakasootuhikwu. Oꞌno mu numu saaꞌa mee unnedooa, soo Te Naa tookwa besaꞌyoo.
43014015	Tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu unu e soobedyadu, e nakabetseakwu.
43014016	Nu ka Te Naa tuukwekwu, ‘U sakwa u Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise ooosapa mu-noꞌyoona mu tummatzikwu.
43014017	Soo Te Naa Besa Poohasoo ka kaahenotu mu tunedyooekwu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mumme tummatzi, oosoo ooosapa mu-noꞌyoona, mu ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha sopedakwadoo, oosoo yise gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43014018	Tooe pudusoo mumme e maꞌwugakwuse sapa, mu gi suda sokwama-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu-baatoosoo e kodyu petukwuse.
43014019	Pudusoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu suuꞌmu. Nu puu namayodakwu saaꞌa, mu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
43014020	Ka e namayodase, mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu ka E Naatu, mu punnoꞌo nugatuna, nu mummetu.
43014021	Mu numu e nakabetseadu, besa tookwa e soobedya. Ka umuoo nuka unu soobedya, soo Te Naa tookwa punnoꞌo unu umuoo soobedyakwu. Nu punnoꞌo besa umuoo soobedyana mu tzapoonnekute nu umu-nosoo.”
43014022	Soo Judas mee naneadu, gi Judas Iscariot, ka Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Hownnekoo yise u ne natzapoonnekute, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi u poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo?”
43014023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe nuka unu soobedyadu e nakabetseakwu. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo unu mu soobedyakwu. Numme ka Te Naa-no mu natubangakwu.
43014024	Tooe haga tooe gi e nakabetseadu, tookwa gi e nakaheesoobedya. Nu ka E Naa nuka mumme e tuukwe tuunguna suuꞌmu mu tuukwe.
43014025	Nu ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoopunnena eka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukweyakwe.
43014026	Nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ka oo Besa Pooha-matu-ma mumme oo sootuhi tuungudooa. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha noꞌoko hemma mu tunedyooekwu, noꞌoko hemma mumme e tuukwena mu tzasoomayukudooa.
43014027	Nu besa mu masoonammekwu nuga besa soonamme-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi hownnekoo besa soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi suda soonammenapana, gi tuwazoo suipana.
43014028	Mooasoo nu mu tuukweꞌe, ‘Pudusoo nu nabatsakwuse, saaꞌa namayodase mu-baasoo kodyu petukwu.’ Mu tookwa gi e tubetse soobedya, mu sakwa uga ka e soobedyana besa sokwama, ka Te Naa-matoo e kodyukakwuse. Menoꞌo soo e Naa nuga ooonakwakoosoo pooha-gaꞌyoo.
43014029	Nu ka a namanekwuna mu tuukwe, ka hemma oo manese mu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
43014030	Pudusoo nu gi mu-no yadooa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo e tumooꞌoogena, pana oosoo gi nuka matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43014031	Pana soo e Naa mu numu-koobatoo e nabatsa tuunguna, nu yise ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu. Mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa E Naa besa soobedya. Tamme sakwa mea.” Umu yise ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona mea.
43015001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme pumme nakatzimodu mee netamma, “Nu puu toesabooe namasua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, soo oo pooetooana mesoo nadukadu. Soo Te Naa puu ka tumasuadu ooka mabetseadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
43015002	Noꞌyoona yise mu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka tumasuape maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ka toesabooe gi pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ookow tsegaꞌakwunise oo wunikwu. Mu numu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu ka toesabooe ewow besa pooetooa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa puu ookow mabetseana oosoo besasoo pooedooꞌa.
43015003	Mu ka tumasuape maꞌna besa pooetooadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu ka mumme e tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna.
43015004	Gi nu oemota manepana, nu yise punnoꞌo gi mu ooowemota mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo toesabooe maꞌna-matu gi puusoo pooetoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka toesabooe-maꞌyoona suuꞌmu. Yooonnekoo mu gi muusoo besa tumadugu-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu nu-noꞌyoona suuꞌmu, besa tumudugukwu.
43015005	Umu mu-naga-kwitu nu-noꞌyoodu ka Te Naa nakabeatsedu. Tooe haga tooe nu oemota manegadu, gi besa tumadugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
43015006	Tooe haga tooe gi nu-noꞌyoodu, ka tumasuape maꞌna-waꞌne nawunikwu, oosoo ka pasase, natapoꞌwokese, natunikwu.
43015007	Mu ka nu-noꞌyoona ka mumme e tunedyooena nakabetseana, mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, oosoo yise mu nakasootuhikwu.
43015008	Mu numu ka besa mu manakwe mu poonnena mee unnekwu, ‘Oosoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu,’ umu yise mee tuwazoo unnekwu, ‘Te Naa besaꞌyoo,’ mee.
43015009	Nu besa mu soobedya, ka Te Naa nuka soobedya-kwaꞌne. Nu-no meadabe, oꞌno nu ooosapa besa mu soobedyakwu.
43015010	Nu puu ka Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo ooosapa besa e soobedyakwu.
43015011	Nu tubetse besa soonammena nu eka mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo tubetse besa sokwamakwu.
43015012	Nu besa mu soobedya, ooonneꞌyoona nu mee mu netamma, yooonnekoo sakwa mu besa nanasoobedyamo.
43015013	Tooe haga tooe ka tu puaꞌa-koobatoo mesoo nabatsadu, tookwa tu puaꞌa besa soobedya.
43015014	Tooe haga tooe nuka nakabetseadu puu nuga puaꞌa, nu sakwa oo-koobatoo mesoo nabatsa.
43015015	Mu nuka sukwe tummatzimodu yaa manakwana e besa pupuaꞌamu tuwazoo. Soo sukwe tutummatzidu puu gi ka pumme tu tunetammakukwudu manekwuna sopedakwadoo. Nu ka noꞌoko hemma ka Te Naa mumme e tuukwe tuunguna mu tuukwena ooonneꞌyoona mu tookwa e pupuaꞌamu.
43015016	Mu gi e netutzease nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe, pana nu mu netutzease oꞌno mu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, mu yise e wangaꞌamu. Nu ka Te Naa mu nakabetsea tuungu, oꞌno yise soo besa mu tumadugupu gi mobegwa-gakwu. Mu e nakaꞌoedyukudu yise, ka e nanetsagwayaꞌena, soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko mu nekwina mu sootuhikwu.
43015017	Nu yise mee mu netamma, ‘Besa nanasoobedya,’ mee.
43015018	Ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme wohonedu gi mumme mu petzabekwuse, mu sakwa oo soomayu ka mooasoo nuka mu mooe wohonena.
43015019	Nu ka menoꞌo mu wangaꞌamu natubanga. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu petzape mu gi umu-matu. Umu puusoo nanasoobedya.
43015020	Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe soo nuka nagedu nu-kwaꞌnesoo namadugukwu. Ka nuka tu wohone-kwaꞌnesoo, umu mumme wohonekwu. Ka gi nuka mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwaꞌne, umu gi mumme nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
43015021	Umu ka gi Te Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu sopedakwadoona, ooonneꞌyoona umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna mu wohonekwu.
43015022	Ka gisoo umu e tunedyooe umu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka suda tumaduguna, pana menoꞌo umu oo sopedakwadoo, saaꞌa yise soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka gi mu nanekwuha.
43015023	Soo tooe haga tooe gi e heesoobedyadu ka Te Naa gi heesoobedya tuwazoo.
43015024	Tooe umu numu e mabesakute e poonnepana, umu menoꞌo ka Te Naa nokosoo ne wohoꞌne. Nu umu oe neyugwe ka gi nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
43015025	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe mee tubotugu, ‘Tooe gi suda e tumadugu sapa umu e wohoꞌne,’ ka Te Naa yadooawabe unne-kwaꞌnesoo.
43015026	Nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa petugase, ka oo Besa Pooha-matu yaa teepu-koobatu sootuhi tuungudooa. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha kaahenotu mu tunedyooekwu, yise ka mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwekwu.
43015027	Ka mu numu e tunedyooe manakwana, mu e nakatzina ooosapa e nagenoꞌo. Ka ꞌyoo hemma manepunne, mu punnoꞌo mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwemokwu.”
43016001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesoo numme pumme nakatzimodu yadooedyakwe mee yise ne netamma, “Mooasoo nu ekow mu tunedyooepu, oꞌno mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukumokwu.
43016002	Mu numu ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo mu tayahoo, ka gi mu-no soonanesootuhina. Ka mu goena umu mee sokwamakwu, ‘Numme Te Naa tummatzidu.’
43016003	Pana umu mumme goedu puusoo nanemooaga, umu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa tuwazoo gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
43016004	Nu ka a namanekwuna mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu saaꞌa ka mu numu mumme wohoꞌne oo soomayudooa ka mumme e tuukwena. Nu mooeꞌugasoo ekow gi mu tuukweꞌe, ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoona.
43016005	Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu. Gi haga mu-nagatu meeꞌe e tubengu, ‘Howtoo u meakwu?’ mee.
43016006	Mu ka mee mumme e tuukwese, nu ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukukwu, mu suda sokwama.
43016007	Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu, nu ka Te Naa-baasoo kodyu petugase, nu mu nanesootuhikukwu, oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu punowsoo mu sootuhise mu besa sokwamadooa.
43016008	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha petuse, mu numu saaꞌa ka tu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadooa ka nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka gi wunaꞌme yaa teepu-kooba mu-baaꞌyookwuse, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Naa Besa podo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohekwu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka sutakoo nemamakwupu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda mumme wuyugwedu.
43016012	Nu ewow mu tunedyooe penaꞌe, pana menoꞌo mu gisoo oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌne manepunne.
43016013	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka petuse ka toge kaaheno hemma manepunne-wikoo, mu tuukwekwu gi pummesoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo mu moohekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha saaꞌa ka hemma manegekwuna mu tunesootubuedooa.
43016014	Ka nu-kwitu tuwazoo, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tunedyooedooa, oꞌno mu saaꞌa, ‘E Pabeꞌe,’ mee e natubangadooa. Noꞌyoona hee Te Naa-toohakwi manepunnedu punnoꞌo nugatu.
43016016	Nu pudusoo nabatsakwu, pana huu oo tabe mease nu namayodase yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petukwu. Oꞌno yise nu saaꞌa, ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.”
43016017	Numme tunakatzimodu-matu mee nananetamma, “Tamme gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tuukwena. Haꞌyoo unnena meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu pudusoo nabatsase huu oo tabe mease namayodase kodyu petukwu yise saaꞌa ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu?
43016018	Haꞌoo manena soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo meakwu?’ “
43016019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo sopedakwatoo numme oo tubengakwu ka haꞌyoo unnena mee yise ne netamma, “Mu muusoo nanatubenga how manena nu mee unakwe, ‘Nu pudusoo nabatsakwu. Huu oo tooise namayodase, nu kodyu petukwu.’
43016020	Nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe ka umu e wohomu nuka batsase, mu suda sokwamana, sakwikwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa sokwamakwu. Pana mu ka suda sokwamase sapa, saaꞌa mu besa sokwamakekwu ka e kodyupetuse.
43016021	Ka e nabatsase, mu ka mogoꞌne dooaꞌa-doo-kwaꞌne nuummawunukwu. Soo mogoꞌne puu suda soonamme ka unu nuummaba wumana. Pana ka oongaꞌa nadooaꞌadoose soo mogoꞌne ka tu nuummawununa soomuꞌwase ka oongaꞌa-matoo besa soonammekwu.
43016022	Mu pudusoo suda sokwamakwu, pana ka e kodyu petuse mu besa sokwamakwu. Gi haga yise suda mu masokwama-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
43016023	Oꞌnosoo gi yoo manepunne, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e kodyukase mu gi hemma nuka tubenga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe, oosoo mu nakasootuhikwu ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute. Menoꞌo manakwana mu ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyise soo Te Naa nu-koobatoo mu nakasootuhikwu, mu yise besa sokwamakwu.
43016025	Nu mu tuukweꞌe, mu tunedyooena, ka Te Naa-witu. Mu gi mu natuukwe-witu nakasopedakwadoo, pana pudusoo nu ka Te Naa-witu mu tuukwekwu, besa ooka mu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo.
43016026	Ka Te Naa-matasoo e kodyukase mu saaꞌa ookow nanetzakwiyidooa, nu-toohakwi. Mu besa e soobedyana e nakaꞌoedyukute, ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba e petuse. Mu ka nuka besa soobedyana, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo mumme besa soobedyana, mu nakasootuhiyakwe.
43016028	Nu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmase yaa teepu-kooba petu. Pudusoo nu nabatsase, namayodase, ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.”
43016029	Numme mee oo netamma, “Menoꞌo numme oo nakasopedakwatoo, ka numme u tuukwena.
43016030	Menoꞌo manakwana numme oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, u noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoo. U mooasoo oo sopedakwadoopunne, gisoo uga umu ne tubenga sapa. Numme oo nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa yaa numme-baatoo u taya.”
43016031	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ne netamma, “Mu menoꞌo e nakaꞌoedyukute,
43016032	pana pudusoo mu nu oemota manegakwu. Pana nu gi nu suuꞌmu, soo Te Naa ka nu-noꞌyoona.
43016033	Nu eka mu tuukweꞌe, oꞌno mu besa sokwamakwu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, mu e tumooꞌooyikwu. Pana besa sokwama nu ka sutakoo umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu matzooekukwu.”
43017001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yadooamakwuse toogoopatu poonnese nanesootuhikooha, “E Naa, pudusoo umu e wohomu e batsakwu. Mu numu tunesootabue, nu togesapa u besa dooa. Nu yise punnoꞌo ewow numu u-matoo nanesootuhi mayugwekwu.
43017002	U noꞌoko numu moohedu e mayugweke. Tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyuku u mayugwepu, nu punnoꞌo ooosapa mu gwetzoimokwuna mu sootuhikwu, u numu manumudoopu nu yise Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu numu taka sooꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
43017004	Nu noꞌoko nuka u tunetammakuna yaa teepu-koobatu mamakwu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu numu besa u nemadabuekwu nu-koobatoo.
43017005	Oꞌnosoo gisoo ka teepu namadabuꞌe, ta nabaaꞌyoona, nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
43017006	U mu numu-matoo nuka nakaꞌoedyuku mayugweke. Nu yise punnoꞌo ume mu nakasopedakwadoo tunedyooe.
43017007	Umu ume doodooamuna, u yise nugatu mu mayugweke. Umu ume nakabetseꞌa, umu tuwazoo u nakaꞌoedyukute, u yow noꞌoko hemma e nemadabuekute.
43017008	Noꞌoko nuka u tunedyooepu nu mu numu tunedyooekwu. Umu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, oo sopedakwatoo nu u-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba petu, umu tuwazoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute, u yaatoo e taya.
43017009	Nu umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu, suuꞌmu nanesootuhikute u sakwa mu sootuhi.
43017010	U ka mu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka ume doodooamuna, nuga doodooamu tuwazoo. Ka taga doodooamu besa manakwe mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu tookwa besaꞌyoo.
43017011	Pudusoo nu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mease u-baasoo petugakwu. Pana umu e nakaꞌoedyukudu, togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. E Naa, u ooosapa besaꞌyoo. U unu poohagana, ka umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu mesoo mabetsea. Umu yise sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌnesoo.
43017012	Tooꞌe noꞌyoona umu-matu togesoo e nakaꞌoedyukute, u tunetamma-waꞌnesoo. Nu ka umu-baaꞌyoona suta-makoo mu mabetseayakwe. Sumuꞌyoosoo nana nu oemota manekwu. Pudusoo oosoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
43017013	Pudusoo nu u-matoosoo kodyukakwu. Nu togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona u-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, u ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu. Umu ka pumme u sootuhise besa sokwamakwu, nu-kwaꞌnesoo.
43017014	Nu ka u unnepu-witu mu tuukweꞌe. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi petzape, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoona, gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoona. Umu e nakaꞌoedyukudu gi ka taka wohonedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Nu mee nanesootuhaꞌe ka suta-makoo ka yaa teepu-koobatu mabetsea mee, gi u, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi eka teepu-koobakoo taꞌya. Soo taka nakaꞌoedyukudu gi ooosapa ka teepu-koobaꞌyookwu nu-kwaꞌnesoo.
43017017	U umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu ka u unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka togesapa oo naꞌunakwe, umu u tubetse nakabetseakwu. U yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya.
43017018	Menoꞌo yise nu ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tayakwu, umu ka noꞌobatusoo numu u unnepu tunedyooekwu.
43017019	Oꞌno umu, u nakabetseakwu nu-kwaꞌnesoo, nu pudusoo umu-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oꞌno yise umu u tubetse nakabetseakwu.
43017020	Umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi. Nu-kwitu ka numu nanekwuhana nakadu sootuhi, oꞌno umu e nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
43017021	Ta nanosoo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, noꞌoko umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu mayugweke. Umu ta-no manese, mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu ka yaa teepu-koobatoo nuka u tayase.
43017022	U puu u yadooawabe ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona e mayugwepunne, umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo nuga yadooawabe manepunne. Umu punnoꞌo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
43017023	Nu puu umu-no, u yise punnoꞌo nu-nosoo. Umu yise sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, ta-kwaꞌne, ta puu nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa oo nakasopedakwatoo u yaatoo e taya, u ka umu taka nakaꞌoedyukudu besa nanasoobedya mu mayugwekese nuka u soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo.
43017024	U, E Naa, ooosapa besa e soobedyadu, gisoo ka teepu namadabue sapa. U ka mu numu taka nakaꞌoedyuku mayugwepu, oꞌno umu ta-baa ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Oꞌno umu ta-nawaꞌneꞌyoo mee ta unnena nakasopedakwadookwu, yise taka nesookwugikwu.
43017025	U tubetse besaꞌyoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu u-kwitu gi sopedakwadoo, nu suuꞌmu noꞌoko hemma u-kwitu sopedakwatoo.
43017026	Nu u-kwitu besa mu tuukwepu, yise ooosapa u-kwitu mu tuukwennummekwu. Nu ooosapa umu-noꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise umu besa nanasoobedyakwu nuka u soobedya-kwaꞌne.”
43018001	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tumasuape-nagaꞌyoona nanesootuhi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka nanesootuhi-makwuse, ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no ka duaga Kidron mee naneadu-too meꞌa. O numme ka tumasuape-naga mane-petuga.
43018002	Mu Pharisee numu ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu-no, ka mu tukwutumadu ka Judas Iscariot namoohe tuunguna. Soo Judas oo sopedakwatoo ka tumasuape-naga, pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina, ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa onatoo meayakwe ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-no. Soo Judas ka mu tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo bihooka. Umu ewahoo tukootabuakunooo, tsegesa noko wehe hehemana.
43018004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka tu namanekwuna, yise umu-matoo mease, mu tubengu, “Haka mu wate?”
43018005	Umu oo nanekwegea, “Ka Jesus Nazareth-wiꞌyoona kemmadu numme wate.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo, “Nu yow oosoo.” Umu noꞌyoona ka suise, petapenooyooese, ka teepu-koobatoo abedihoo. Judas togesoo umu-no.
43018007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tubengusoo, “Haka mu wate?” Umu oo nanekwegea, “Ka Jesus Nazareth-witu kemmana numme wate.”
43018008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo, “Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe, ‘Nu yow oosoo.’ Mu ka nuka watena, umu e nakatzimodu tzamaꞌwu.”
43018009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo unakwe, oꞌno soo e unnena kaahenoꞌyookwu, “Nu gi sumuhoo watzekute ka umu nuka nakaꞌoedyukudu-matu.”
43018010	Soo Simon Peter yise ka tu tsegesa gwuuhoose, ka nana Malchus
43018011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka Peter meeꞌe netamma, “Maka u wehe namasootugu. Nu ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.”
43018012	Mu Jew-no Roman tukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakunahoo ka oo wutumakwuse.
43018013	Umu ka nana Annas mee naneadu-matoo oo tzakahooka. Soo Annas ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu, Caiaphas mee naneadu yahe.
43018014	Soo Caiaphas mooasoo ka mu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwepu, “Oosoo nanenagakwu, sumuꞌyoosoo nana noꞌoko numu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse.”
43018015	Ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo ka Annas nobe-witoo nabigena, soo Simon Peter sumuhoo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-no mu-nakwi memeadape. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu ka Annas sopedakwatoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-nosoo ka Annas nobe-kobenatoo meahoo.
43018016	Soo Peter ka natzakwonaꞌa-kumaba tooe wunu-petuga. Sumuꞌyoo numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matu kodyuse, ka mogoꞌne ka natzakwonaꞌa-wi tunekwegedyudu yadooebetuse, oosoo yise oe ka Peter tzaꞌegahoo.
43018017	Soo mogoꞌne ka natzakwenaꞌa-wi ka Peter tubengu, “U-haꞌa sumuꞌyoo mu Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” Soo Peter mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi umu-matu.”
43018018	Unu utzutzuna, mu numu tummatzidu ka mu tukwutumadu-no puuwanakoo pedana, oe yooꞌe. Soo Peter umu-baa yooꞌe.
43018019	Soo Annas ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu ka numme pumme nakatzimodu-witu, yise ka numu oo tunedyooe-witu tuwazoo.
43018020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka numu nehanedu moohedu nanekwegea, “Noꞌyoona numu ka pukwitu pumme e tunedyooena sopedakwatoo. Umu ooosapa e nakayakwe, ka mu numu e tunedyooe ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona. Nu gi mu watze-tunedyooe.
43018021	Mu gi nugasoo tubengu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa tooe haka tooe nuka nakadu tubengu. Umu oo sopedakwatoo ka e unnena.”
43018022	Sumuꞌyoo tukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe kobitu matatseꞌe. Soo tukwutumadu oo nesagwiku, “U sakwa gi ka tamme moohedu suda nanekwegeapana.”
43018023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Ka e esayaꞌe, u sakwa kaaheno e waha. U sakwa yise gi nuka matatzeꞌepana, ka kaaheno e unakwe.”
43018024	Soo Annas yise togesoo natzakunadu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Caiaphas-matoo taya. Oosoo ka numu-koobatoo yadooadu.
43018025	Saaꞌa tuwazoo umu-matu ka Peter meehoo tubengu, “U-haꞌa sumuꞌyoo mu Jesus nakatzimodu-matu?” Soo Peter yise meehoo, “Gi, nu gi umu-matu.”
43018026	Soo Peter pudutseꞌe sumuhoo nana naka wukaꞌakwunihoo. Oo nanumu yise mee ka Peter netamma, “Nu u poonne u ka Jesus-no oona ka tumasuape-kwi.”
43018027	“Nu gi o,” mee soo Peter, oꞌno yise soo kweꞌnaꞌa kwuꞌa yagakooha.
43018028	Mooasoo mu Rome numu-kooba katudu ka Pilate netutzea, Jew numu oo moohe tuunguna. Oogow moooꞌa awamooasoo, mu Jew numu moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Caiaphas-makoo tzakahooka, ka Pilate nobe-witoo. Tooe haga tooe gi ka mu wawaꞌa nobe-wi tzoonooa, ka gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoonosoo, ka hemma nayongotuka gi oo tuka, ka oo nabeatsegana, ka tu tumayohope meeoo naꞌunakwe. Umu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate nobe-wi gi tzoonooꞌa.
43018029	Soo Pilate umu-matoo tsebooekese, mu tubengu, “Haꞌoo suda esoo nana manakwe?”
43018030	Umu oo nanekwegea, “Esoo ka suda tumaduguse, numme u-matoo a bike.”
43018031	Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa mummesoo tumayohope-too a nemadabue.” Mu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate meeoo netamma, “Soo numme Jew tumayohope meeoo, numme oo mesoo batsa, pana mu Roman numu moohedu ne wutumakwu, ka numu ne batsase.”
43018032	Esoo ꞌyoo manepunne. Oꞌno yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo sunngabe namadabue-ma nataposase, nabatsakwu.
43018033	Soo Pilate ka tu nobe-wisoo ekeahoogase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu, “U-haꞌa mu numu-kooba katudu?”
43018034	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Pilate nanekwegea, “Nu ka mu Jew numu Pabeꞌe, nu gi ka numu-kooba katudu mee mu nea-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.”
43018035	Soo Pilate yise mee Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Nu gi Jew numu. U ka mu Jew numu Pabeꞌena, how manena yise umu nu-matoo u taya? Haꞌoo suda u tumadugu?”
43018036	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee ka Pilate nanekwegea, “Mu Jew numu u-matoo e taꞌya, umu e nakatzimodu gi nu-koobatoo nagoꞌe. Nu saaꞌa mu numu-kooba katudu manekwu, ka Te Naa-baa petugase.”
43018037	Soo Pilate yise oo tubengusoo, “U-haꞌa numu-kooba katudu?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “Nu yaahoo Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Nu yaa teepu-koobatoo nadooaꞌadoo, ka mu numu ka kaahenotu tuukwekwuse. Soo tooe haga tooe ka kaahenotu soonakadu sakwa e nakapunne.”
43018038	Soo Pilate tutubengu, “Hee esoo kaahenotu?” Gi ka pumme oo nanekwegeakwuna wutooꞌe, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-matoo tzebuegase, mee unakwe, “Gi nu suda a tumaduguna mamakoo nemamaꞌyu.
43018039	Soo ne tumayohope ka tu naꞌewa tukanoꞌo, sumuꞌyoo mu nakwutumadu-matu natzamaꞌwuyakwe. Mu haaꞌa eka mu-kooba katudu e tzamaꞌwutuungukwu?”
43018040	Mu numu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonena mee unne, “Gi, ka Barabbas tzamaꞌwu.” Unu tutuhadu ka Barabbas mee naneꞌa.
43019001	Soo Pilate ka mu tutukwutumadu tu nobe-kwitoo bihoose, yise meeoo mu netamma, “A wukwupageta.”
43019002	Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tzeabe tzowupagaꞌa-doose, oowehoo oo tzowupakakuhoo. Umu ka numu-kooba katudu kwasu-waꞌne tabuadu-wi oo kwaseyakuhoo.
43019003	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo kemmase, meeoo oo nanetzaꞌmekute, “Yaa u mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.” Umu yise oo kobikoo oo totopagetahoo.
43019004	Soo Pilate yise tsebooekese, ka mu Jew numu moohedu mee netamma, “Nu mu-matoosoo a tzakagekoo, pana nu meeoo esoo gi suda tumadugupu-gaꞌyoo.”
43019005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tzebooekese, tzeabe-wi tzowupagana, ka numu-kooba katudu kwasu-waꞌnekwisoo namadabue. Soo Pilate mee mu netamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Muusoo how a yugwe.”
43019006	Mu Jew numu moohedu ka pumme nakatzimodu-no oo poonnese, ewa unnekooha, “A tzakwenne, sunngaba namadabue-ma a taposa.” Soo Pilate meehoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa a tzakakase, a tzakwenne. Nu meeoo esoo gi suda tumatuku.”
43019007	Mu Jew numu moohedu yise meeoo, “Masoo meehoo, ‘Nu yaa ka Te Naa Tubetse Tooa.’ Soo Te Naa nayadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu, oꞌnosoo mee tubotugu, numme sakwa ka mee ooonnekoo esayidu batsa. Masoo sakwa nabatsa.”
43019008	Soo Pilate ka mu nakase, unu suaꞌe.
43019009	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nobe-wisoo tzoonooase, oo tubengu, “U haaꞌa ooonneꞌyoo?” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi oo nanekwegea.
43019010	Soo Pilate ka Te Pabeꞌe meehoo netamma, “U sakwa e nanekwegea, nu u nemadabuekwu. Nu ka u natzamaꞌwukwuna, tooe too u nabatsakwuna meesoo natuungu.”
43019011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nanekwegea, “U oo mesoo manakwe, ka Nuga Naa te paꞌanakwatu mee unakwe. Mu numu u-baatoo e tzakadu suda tumaduguna, saaꞌa umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
43019012	Soo Pilate yise oo tooꞌe netzamaꞌwu, pana mu Jew numu moohedu ewa unnekooha, “U ka eka nana tzamaꞌwuse, u ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu woho. Tooe haga tooe meeoo unnedu, ‘Nu numu-kooba katudu,’ ka Rome-witu numu-kooba katudu netumooꞌoo.”
43019013	Soo Pilate ekow nakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe puuwanatu bihookase, yise ka numu moohedu katunoo-wi katu, oona ka Tupe-ma Napodopu mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona.
43019014	Soo Pilate yise ka mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Yaaꞌa soo mu Pabeꞌe.” Umu ewa unnekooha, “A tzakakase, a tzakwenne.” Soo Pilate yise mu tubengu, “Nu haaꞌa sakwa eka mu-kooba katudu tzakwenne?” Soo numu nanesootuhi moohedu meehoo, “Numme Rome-kooba katudu suuꞌmu nakabetsea. Numme gi kummaꞌasoo moohedu nakabetseꞌa.” Soo Pilate yise ka mu Roman tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tzakwenne tuungu.
43019017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka sunngabe namadabuenna pumatoo tu natzakwenekwuna, puma tu nataposakwuna, tzanona meꞌa ka pumme tu wumahukase. Oona ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-wi petuga.
43019018	Oꞌno umu ka Te Pabeꞌe waahoo nanana noko, ka sunngabe namadabue-matoo tapotseda. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu naamookwi mu wahaꞌyoo oo nanaꞌenakwa.
43019019	Soo Pilate wobe-ma mu tubotuungu, ka Te Pabeꞌe tzopa nataposakwudu, mee o-ma natuboꞌo, “Yow soo Jesus, Nazareth-witu, mu Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
43019020	Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu ka meeoo nabodu neꞌa, soo pukwi mu natzakwenena ka Jerusalem tzageꞌe. Pahe-batu numu apeka-ma naboꞌo: mu Jew numu; mu Roman numu; mu Greek numu apeka-kwikoo.
43019021	Soo mu Jew numu moohedu ka Pilate meeoo netamma, “Gi ka ‘Mu Jew numu-kooba katudu,’ mee ma-ma tubopana, ‘Esoo nana meeoo, “Nu yaa Jew numu-kooba katudu,” ’ meeꞌe sakwa mu ma-ma tubo.”
43019022	Pana soo Pilate meeoo, “Nu mooasoo meeoo tubose, nu gi atasoo a yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
43019023	Watusukweꞌyoo (4) tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka sunngabe namadabue-ma taposahoo. Umu nanasusuꞌmu oo namasooape hanehoo. Umu yise meeoo, “Ka a kwasu tamme gi tzakebuepana, esoo sumuhoosoo pabahoo wunapu-kwi namadabuꞌe. Tamme sakwa eka wunapu nanatukuku.” Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, oo-toogoosoo mani petu, “Umu nanasuꞌmu ka oo namasooapu-matu hanehoose, ka oo kwasu nanatotzakwate.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo mu tutukwutumadu manakwe.
43019025	Mu watsukweꞌyoo momokoꞌne ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwene tzageꞌe konno, oo pea, oo pedoo-no, Mary mee naneadu Clopas nodukwa, yise Mary Magdalene. Nu, John, punnoꞌo osoo wunupunne.
43019026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu pea nu-baa oo wunu oo poonnese, meehoo tu pea netamma, “John menoꞌo yise umesoo tubetse tooa-waꞌneꞌyoo
43019027	Nuka yise mee netamma, “Menoꞌo masoo yise umesoo tubetse pea-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oowe manakwana Te Pabeꞌe pea ooosapa nu-no.
43019028	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo sopedakwadoose, noꞌoko ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakupu namamakwuse, mee unakwe, “Nu unu puudyaꞌe.” Oosoo meehoo naꞌunakwe, oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa unnepu ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunnekwu.
43019029	Atsa baa suda kamadu suuꞌmu o nuuna, umu yise hooope-ma wanapu tzakunase, ka atsa baa-wi oo tzetsakase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tupa-wi oo tzematsuꞌa.
43019030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka atsa baa tumase, meehoo, “Yaatoo namamakwuhoo.” Yise tzokwuꞌehoose, yaꞌehoo.
43019031	Mu Jew numu moohedu gi ka mu numu tookoo paaꞌa nataposana petsape, ka oogow moooꞌa paba nanesootuhikwuse oo tumaduguyina.
43019032	Mu tutukwutumadu yise oetusoo kodyuse, ka mu waahoo nanana ka Te Pabeꞌe nanaꞌenakwa natzakwenedu kowpa wugotehoo.
43019033	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo yaꞌepu, umu yise gi oogow kowpa wugote.
43019034	Sumuꞌyoo mu tutukwutumadu-matu, ka Te Pabeꞌe ka tu tutokwateno-ma oo sapu kumanakoo oo tzeboosahootooa. Puupe-no baa yise oe manakwana papasawekooha.
43019035	Esoo mumme e tuukwena kaahenoꞌyoo, nu nuusoo namakoo a poonne, oꞌno sakwa mu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyuku.
43019036	Ka soo Te Naa unnepu namamakwuhoo, mee oo unnepu, “Gi oo oho-matu nuugodekwu.” Yise oo unnepu, “Umu numu oo tzeboosahoodu yise o poonnedooa.”
43019038	Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mee naneadu ka Arimathea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Joseph gi haka tuukwe, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina. Soo Joseph yise ka Pilate mee tubengu, “How sakwa nu ka Jesus tookoo hane?” Soo Pilate yise meehoo, “Gi hownneꞌyoo.” Soo Joseph yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehooka.
43019039	Joseph ka nana Nicodemus mee naneadu-no memea.
43019040	Umu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohona ka oo tookoo ka myrrh noko aloe-ma mawoꞌngese, wanapu-wi oo toputooe.
43019041	Ka Te Pabeꞌe natzakwenepu tzageꞌe ewaꞌyoo sunngabe toonoopa oona soo tupe tuwaga, gisoo haga pukwi natuguna.
43019042	Ka tu paba nananesootuhikwuse, oogow tabeno yabesoo yongogaꞌa umu ka pukwi oo natzakwenepu tzageꞌekoo ooka tupe tuwagana mayuse, oowe soo Te Pabeꞌe natugu.
43020001	Awamooasoo togesoo tu toganopunne, ka tu nasatenoꞌo, Mary Magdalene oo natugu-wi petuhooga, oo poonne soo tupe namanonooepu-gaꞌyoo ka teepu tawagana-kobenatu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo kadooꞌoo oetu.
43020002	Numme-baa tanomane petuhoo numme Simon Peter-no, mee ne tuukwe, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehoogapu-gaꞌyoo, nu gi o sopedakwadoo pukwi ooka mu hanena.”
43020003	Numme, John, yise Peter-no memeakwate oo natugu-witoo.
43020004	Numme nanosoo tatanomanega, pana nu ka Peter tusoowunihooka, nu oe mooe petuhooga.
43020005	Pana nu gi oe ega. Nu oetu sukwe tomoema petugase, oo poonne ka wanapu pukwi oo natoputoepu.
43020006	Soo Simon Peter petuhoogase, oe egahookase ka mu wanapu o kwakwape mu poonne.
43020007	Soo wanapu oo wo pukwi namabutoo dapepu besa namasoomedapu oo tzageꞌesoo hape.
43020008	Nu yise oe egase, o poonnena oo nakaꞌoedyukute Te Pabeꞌe namayodapu.
43020009	Pana numme gisoo oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnepu, soo Te Pabeꞌe namayoda tu yaꞌe-wikoo meeꞌe.
43020010	Numme yise nobe-witoo kokodyuka.
43020011	Mary Magdalene ka pukwi o natugupu-kobenaꞌyoona yaka. Yagana yise, ka pukwi oo natugupu-witu tooe poonnennumme.
43020012	Waahoo toha kakasa-gakoo poonne oe mu yugwe, sumuꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tsotugu tabepu-wi, sumuꞌyoo yise o tatugudapepu-wi.
43020013	Umu yise ka Mary tubengu, “Mogoꞌne, how manena u yaka?” Soo Mary mee mu nanekwegea, “Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo hanehoogapu-gaꞌyoo. Nu yise gi o sopedakwatoo oo pukwiꞌyoona.”
43020014	Oꞌno yise nakwumunase, ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne o oo wunu, pana gi oo posopedakwatoo.
43020015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo oo netamma, “Mogoꞌne, how manena u yaka? Haga u wate?” Soo Mary ka tumasuape mabetseadu mee oo soobedyana, mee oo netamma, “U ka oo haneoogase e tuukweꞌe, hano u oo hane? Nu oo hanekwu.”
43020016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meehoo oo netamma, “Mary.” Soo Mary oo-tamme nakwumunase, ka mu Jew numu apeka-wikoo oo neꞌa, “E Pabeꞌe.”
43020017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo oo netamma, “Gi e tzamapana. Nu gisoo ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukaꞌa. Mease, umu nuka nakatzimodu tuukwe, nu ka Te Naa-matoo kodyukakwu.”
43020018	Soo Mary Magdalene yise numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu-matoo mease, numme tuukweꞌe, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.” Oꞌno yise ka numme o netammapu ne tuukweꞌe.
43020019	Oogow togano numme Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu nanano ka nobe-wi natzepunooꞌe, numme ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa tabua-petuse, mee ne netamma, “Besaꞌyoo.”
43020020	Yise ka tu mi ne tzapoonnekute, ka pukwikoo tu nataboosahoopu noko. Numme tubetse besa sokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese.
43020021	“Besaꞌyoo,” mee soo Te Pabeꞌe ne netammasoo. “Ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma, nu yaa ekaoo teepu-kooba petu. Nu punnoꞌo mu tuukwe, mana tooe hano tooe ka mu numu nu-witu tuukwemo.”
43020022	Numme-koobatoo songahaꞌase, meeoo unakwe, “Nu ka E Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhikwu.”
43020023	Soo poohabe, ka mu numu suda tumaduguna puma mu nematzagakwunikwuna. Soo Te Naa yise ka suda mu tumaduguna soomuꞌwakwu. Mu ka gi mu tuukwena, umu gi hownnekoo ka suda tu tumaduguna nematzagakwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo suda mu tumaduguna yise umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
43020024	Sumuꞌyoo numme tunakatzimodu-matu Thomas
43020025	Numme tunakatzimodu ka Thomas meehoo tuukwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne.” Oꞌno yise oosoo meehoo, “Nu ka oo mi-wi tawagadu poonnese, oe tzetuguse, ka tutokwatenoo tuꞌuadoopu-kooba matuguse suuꞌmu, nu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
43020026	Sumu nasatese, numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka nobe-wi sumuhoo, oꞌno soo Thomas numme-no. Tooe ka mu natzakwunaꞌa natzepunooꞌe sapa, soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baa petuse, mee soo unakwe, “Besaꞌyoo.”
43020027	Yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Thomas mee netamma, “Ka e mi poonnese, mi tzetuguse, oꞌno sakwa u e tubetse nakaꞌoedyuku.”
43020028	Soo Thomas yise gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tzamana o nakaꞌoedyuku. Thomas meeoo, “U Ne Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Nu u-matoo nanesootuhikwu.”
43020029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meehoo oo netamma, “U ka e poonnese suuꞌmu e nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu numu gisoo e poonnedu oo sukwe nakaꞌoedyukuyina unusoo nasootuhiyakwe.”
43020030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa nanabesa nanasoogwugaꞌe pooha manakwe ka numme tunakatzimodu punoko, ewaꞌyoo oo manepu gi naboꞌotugu.
43020031	Pana esoo mee naꞌunnedu nu botugu, oꞌno mu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe, ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa. Mu yise ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu ooosapa gi moobekwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.
43021001	Saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe numme-baasoo tapua petusoo ka banunadu, Tiberius mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona. ꞌYoo yise namani.
43021002	Numme, Simon Peter, Thomas
43021003	Soo Simon Peter meeoo, “Nu tuukwigakwu.” Numme meeoo, “Numme u-no.” Numme yise sake-wi meaꞌa, pana togamano gi hemma tzakadu.
43021004	Oogow awamooa, unu tu tapuakese, soo Te Pabeꞌe oona bakumana wunu, pana numme gi oo posopedakwadoo.
43021005	Ne waꞌagese meeoo, “E pupuaꞌamu, mu haaꞌa gi tutzakadu?” Numme yise oo nanekwegea, “Gi tuwazoo.”
43021006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee ne netamma, “Ka puma mu tuukwina ka sake tumadinakwatoo tzakweku, mu tuhanehookwu.” Numme yise oo manise, ka tuukwinoo tzamapana, ka ewow pakwe oekoo.
43021007	Nu yise ka Peter meeoo netamma, “Masoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe.” Soo Peter yise ka gi besa namasooana, wunagow yaahoose, ka baa-witoo nadawunihoose, bakumabatoo bahabehooka.
43021008	Numme yise o nageka ka sake-wi, ka tuukwinoo ewow pakwe oekoo oo wupewoꞌyana.
43021009	Numme ka bakumana petuhoogase, numme oo poonne, onoko nabedana pakwe, noko tukaba, o nanohotuku.
43021010	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Maka pakwe mu tutzagadu-matu hanehooke.”
43021011	Simon Peter yise meahoose ka puma tu tuukwipu bakumabatoo tzabewoꞌyahoo. Ewaꞌyoo (153) papabatseꞌyoo pakwe pana soo puma mu tuukwipu gi natzakebue.
43021012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ne netamma, “Mu tukanna.” Numme gi mee oo tubengu, “Haga u?” nnumme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona.
43021013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tukaba noko pakwe ne maka.
43021014	Toge pahe (3) soo Te Pabeꞌe numme tunakatzimodu natzapoonnekute, ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase.
43021015	Ka ne tukamakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Simon Peter meeoo netamma, “Simon, u John tooa. U haaꞌa noko hemma ooonakwasoo besa e soobedya?” Simon mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha, ne Pabeꞌe, u oo sopedakwatoo nu ume puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netamma, “Umu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.”
43021016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee tuwazoo oo tubengasoo, “Simon, u haaꞌa unu e soobedya?” Soo Simon oo nanekwegeasoo, “Aha, Ne Pabeꞌe, u oo sopedakwatoo nu ume puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo netammasoo, “Ka umu nu-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.”
43021017	Sumu tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe oo tubengasoo, “Simon, u haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Ka Peter suda nenuuma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo tubengasesoo, “U haaꞌa e puaꞌa?” Soo Simon meeoo, “U Ne Pabeꞌe, u noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo. U oo sopedakwatoo nu u puaꞌa.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Umu nu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
43021018	Nu togesapa u tuukwekwu, tooebetseꞌena u tooe hano tooe mesoo mea u petzabe-kwitoo.
43021019	ꞌYooonnekoo soo Peter ka Te Naa-koobatoo nabatsakwu, meꞌesoo Te Pabeꞌe unnena. Yise meeoo oo netamma, “Nuka nageno.”
43021020	Peter wesase e poonne, tu nakwi e meꞌa
43021021	Soo Peter yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tubengu, “Ne Pabeꞌe, Haꞌoo yise masoo manekwu?”
43021022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nanekwegea, “Sumuna masoo nummennummekwu e kodyu-kwitootooe esoo gi ume pukwitoo suda soonammena. U sakwa nuka nage-no.”
43021023	Ooonneꞌyoona susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, “Soo John gi yaꞌekwu.” Esoo gi togesapa. Te Pabeꞌe meeoo sukwe unakwe, “Sumuna masoo nummennummekwu e kodyu-kwitootooe, esoo gi ume pukwitoo suda soonammena.”
43021024	Nu oosoo mu tunakatzimodu-matu oo poonnedu o botugu, ka a namanena. Tamme noꞌyoona oo sopedakwatoo esoo e tubona kaahenoꞌyoo a namanena.
43021025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewa nanabesa pooha manakwe tuwazoo, nu gi toge besa noꞌoko mu bo-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ewaꞌyoo. Nu umu-matusoo mu bokute, oꞌno mu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.
44001001	Ka mooeꞌugasoo numu-matoo tubose ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitu mu tuukweꞌe, yise ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu tunedyooe, oꞌno yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tunakatzimodu oo tunetammakuna mu tuukweꞌe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase oosoo tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase umu pumme nakatzimodu ewasoo natzapoonekute. Ka Te Naa numu magwetzoina mu tuukweꞌe. Mee tuwazoo mu netamma, “Soo John puu mu sootuhina baa-wi mu matzaka. Pudusoo soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa Jerusalem-wi tuutooepunne ka Te Naa mumme sootuhi-kwitoo tooe.”
44001006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe umu tu tuukwewabe-no oona giba-ma nanatapoegease, umu meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa yabesoo tamme Jew numu ka mu Tiboꞌo-makoo natzamaꞌwukwuna natuungu umu yise gi te nemadunagakwu?”
44001007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu nanekwegeꞌa, “Mu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka hemma oo manekwuse, Te Naa ookow soomadabuekwu ka hemma oo manekwuna.
44001008	Pana Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mu nasootuhikwu. Oosoo mu pooha makakwu. Mu yise noꞌoko mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwemokwu: Mu numu Jerusalem-witu, Judea noꞌoko Samaria mee nananeadu teepu-koobatu tuwazoo, tooe hanotu tooe, tooe haga tooe ka teepu-koobatu.”
44001009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka yadooamakwuse, toogoopatoo ka koomeba-naga tsobakase yise tubetse mea.
44001010	Umu oo tuukwewabe oo poonnepunne.
44001011	Mooasoo oo tsobakase sapa toogoopatu poonnepunne, wahaꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo toha kwakwaseyaadu umu-baa petuse, meeoo mu netamma, “Toogoopatu poonnemakwu. Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-matoosoo kodyuhooka. Sumu tabeno oosoo yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petukwu tu mea tabua-kwaꞌnesoo petu tabuadooa.”
44001012	Mu oo tuukwewabe tubongosoo kodyu ka giba, Olive mee naneadu-maꞌyoo, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo katzageꞌe o namea.
44001013	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe tunetutzeana mee nananeadu: Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, James, Alphaeus tooa, Simon Zealot, Judas, James tooa. Ka Jerusalem-wisoo petuse ka waha nakooba yugwedu nobe-kwi huudooe tooipunne.
44001014	Ooweꞌyoonow umu yise nanano nanesootuhiyakwe. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pea umu oo wangaꞌamu yise ewaꞌyoo momokoꞌne umu-no.
44001015	Sumu tu nanesootuhinoꞌo, ewaꞌyoo (120) numu oeꞌyoona nanesootuhi. Soo Peter yotsese ka mu numu yadooe, meeoo yise mu netamma,
44001016	“E nanumu, tamme sakwa sumuoo nana netutzea ka numme Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe-no nadatsungakwudu. Oꞌnosoo soo Judas uga numme-nagatu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabena natutzeadu. Pana yise oosoo ka mu tukwutumadu-matoo Te Pabeꞌe nemawuni, umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe wutumase yise oo batsa.” Soo Judas ka suda tu tumadugu-kwi natumunagakute yise ka pumme tu tumanagaku-ma tubewa tumu. Oꞌno yise ka suda nuummakese, puusoo nabatsa. Oosoo-kobena-tamme aanooaka. Ka tu sapu wubadow petuse, oo sagwa noꞌyoona tseboogeke oosoo yise yaꞌehoo. Mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka oo nakase yise ka tubewabe Pukwitu Nabatsapu meeꞌe oo neꞌa. Soo Peter ka mu numu puno nanesootuhidu mee tuwazoo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo David yise meeoo unakwe ka tu hoobeadoo-kwi soo Judas ꞌyoo manekwu mee tubopu, ‘Oosoo yise ka yaꞌese, saaꞌa gi nasoomaꞌyukwu.’ Sumuba tu hoobeadoo-kwi meeoo, ‘Kummaꞌyoosoo numu sakwa oo kapi nanekatuku.’
44001021	Tamme sakwa kummaꞌakoosoo numu netutzea ka Judas kapi ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekwudu. Esoo nanetutzeadu sakwa oe manakwanasoo ooosapa tamme-no kemmadabedu ka John numu baa-wi matzakanoꞌo manakwana yise ka Te Pabeꞌe nabaatoo pumme oo binoꞌotoo tooe.”
44001023	Mu numu yise ka Peter meeoo unakwe oo nakapunnese, oꞌno yise mu numu waahoo nanana Matthias noko Joseph
44001024	Yise meeoo nanesootuhi, “U noꞌoko numu gi watzekudu. Yise u tunetutzeana ne tuukwe ka Judas kapi manedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe mu numu oo tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.”
44001026	Ka onow ka mu numu tumayoho-kwikoo umu ka mu numu netutzea. Soo Matthias yise nanetutzea, numu-no Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwewabe-matu-no nadatsunga.
44002001	Yise, oꞌno ka tunayasamakwuse, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nananoꞌo sumu, ka oꞌno tabewa-wi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
44002002	Gi obeda yise unu hukwadu-kwaꞌne nanakabetu, yise paꞌanakwana ka nobe-kwi kangabetu.
44002003	Hee goso-ga-kwaꞌneꞌyoo noꞌoko umu-ma aatahoobetu.
44002004	Oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tzapoonnekuna ka Te Naa umu sootuhaꞌe. Oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha noꞌoko umu oe manepunnedu, sootuhihoo umu yise nanakummaꞌamakoosoo yadooape-ma apegeakooha.
44002005	Ewaꞌyoo nananesootuhidu umu tzageꞌe nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Nanakummaꞌakoosoo
44002012	Meeoo yise nananetamma, “How namani?”
44002013	Umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Umu tookwa baakoꞌe.”
44002014	Mu tuukwewabe yosuhoose, soo Peter paba yadooa ka mu Jew numu meeoo netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu, besa e nakapunne.
44002015	‘Baakoꞌe’ mee umu ne netamma. Gi numme. Tamme Jew numu gi atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebedu awamooasoo, ka gisoo tukana. Menoꞌo togesoo sumu kadooꞌoopu-kwi (9) taba-gatu.
44002016	Yowsoo Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo tamme oo tuukwepu. Te Naa yadooawabe Joel mee naneadu, mee tubotugupu,
44002017	Te Naa meeoo te netamma, ‘Nu gisoo ka teepu atasoo yugwena, nuga pooha-matu noꞌoko nanaꞌatakoosoo numu nanakummaꞌakoosoo poohabe-matu-ma sootuhidooa. Mu doodooamu tooe saaꞌa a unnena wahadooa. Tootooebetseꞌe saaꞌa pooha tuusoobedyadooa. Mu wakwaꞌetse saaꞌa punnoꞌo pooha nosedooa.
44002018	Mu momokoꞌne, mu nanana e nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa nu E Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhidooa. Umu yise e unnepu wahamodooa.
44002019	Tooe hownnekoo tooe saaꞌa nu mu tsapoonnekudooa ka hemma oo manekwuse, ka teepu-koobatoo tooetoo mu paꞌanakwatoo: puupe, goso, kweedaba.
44002020	Ka oꞌno tabeba-wi ka teepu atasoo oo yugwekwuse mu notu tonumapunnekwu. Soo muha unu atsakwedyana puupe-kwaꞌne tabuadooa.
44002021	Pana noꞌoko nuka nanetzakwiyidu nu magwetzoidooa.’
44002022	E pupuaꞌamu, soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘Oosoo Mu Pabeꞌe,’ meeꞌe. Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka besa mumme oo tumadugukupu ka Te Naa pooha-ma.
44002023	Pana mu yise ka oo-ma tu natzakaduse, mu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu wakwawaꞌa ooka batsa tuungu, ‘Paꞌa o taposa,’ mee mu netamma. ‘Mu tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo mu mani,’ mee soo Te Naa.
44002024	Oo tunetamma-kwaꞌne, gi tubetse yaꞌe saaꞌa petudooasoo.
44002025	Soo Te Naa yadooawabe David mee naneadu ookow waha ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwepuna. ‘Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ooosapa nu-notu. Nu gi hownnekoo nammayamoa-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nuka mabetsea.
44002026	Nu yise besa soonamme oo nesookwagaꞌena ka Te Naa mee oo netammana, nu oo sopedakwatoo e yaꞌekwuna e namayodakwuna e nummekwunasoo.
44002027	U, Ne Naa gi e yaꞌena petzape. U gi suda e tookoo manena soopetzape.
44002028	Nu ka umetuna. U e magwetzoikwusesoo. Nu yise u-baaꞌyoona tubetse besa soonammekwu,’ mee soo David tubo.
44002029	E nanumu, ka David-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka oꞌnosoo ka David tamme mooe tuukweꞌe. Oosoo puu ka yaꞌese, natuguse, tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka pukwi oo nakoopu. Oosoo gi nakwitusoo waha. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwe.
44002030	Soo David oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa nuugwekwuna. Soo Te Naasoo meeoo ka David tuukweꞌe, ‘Sumuꞌyoo mu-nagatu Te Pabeꞌe manedooa. Oosoo mu nanumu moohedooa u-kwaꞌnesoo.’
44002031	Soo David ooka te tuukwe soo Te Pabeꞌe gi tubetse yaꞌe oo tookoo gi pehekwu. Oosoo tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodakwu.
44002032	Te Naasoo tuwow nakumma-baatoo oo baꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-maka. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma ne sootuhi. Tamme oo nakana oo poonne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe toogoopatoo meapu.
44002034	Soo David gi oo manakwe. Soo David ookahoo waha Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo unakwe, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe nabaa katu tuungu.
44002035	Oosoo yise ka umu oo wokwohomu matzooekukwu.’
44002036	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu sakwa tamme Jew numu unusoo sopedakwatoo. Mu oo batsapu pana yise soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo mayugwese yise saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe numu nemadunagakwu.”
44002037	Umu numu ka Peter nakase, unu suda oo sokwamakuna ka tu manena yise meeoo oo netamma oo poenaꞌewabe-nokosoo, “Haꞌoo sakwa numme manese kaaheno oo mayugwe?”
44002038	Soo Peter mu nekwegease meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwu, baa-wi namatzakase mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku. Oꞌnosoo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhise te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwunise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
44002039	Oosoo Te Naa unnegeapu mee, ‘Mu nanumu, mu dooamu, yise noꞌoko numu mana kwingaꞌa-kwitu noꞌyoona e tunetutzeana, umu e dooamu manekwu,’ mee unnena.”
44002040	Soo Peter ewasoo meeoo mu numu tuukweyakwe, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yow menoꞌo. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhikwu, gi umu-waꞌne manepana, oꞌno saaꞌa mu namagwetzoikwu.”
44002041	Ewaꞌyoo (3,000) numu ka Peter nakaꞌoedyuku ka oꞌno tabeno, umu baa-wi namatzaka. Umu nanesootuhiyakwe ka Te Naa tuukwewabe tu nakana pumme tunedyooe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase oo soomayuna nanano tukana noꞌoko hemma nanatummatzina.
44002043	Mu nanana Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi ewow numu mabesakuyakwe, nanasookwugi tumadaꞌe.
44002044	Mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌoko ka hemma nanatummatzaꞌe.
44002045	Mu numu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo oo-ma tumuna, yise mu gi hee-gakoo tummatzaꞌe.
44002046	Nonotza tabeno ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo meayakwe. Nanano tukayina tu pupuaꞌamu nobe-kwiꞌyoona tooe ka besa nanano sokwamana,
44002047	ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidyina. Noꞌyoona mu numu nesookwugaꞌe ka mu besow umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nonoꞌotsa tabeba-wi nanaꞌewasoo manenoꞌo ka Te Naa numu magwetzoaꞌe ka nanano mu nanesootuhaꞌe.
44003001	Nonotsa tatabeno pahe-kwikoo ka taba katu nananesootuhiyakwe, mu Peter-no John ka pabow Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo nanesootuhiyakwe.
44003002	Soo sumuꞌyoo nana ka tuhaꞌyoonasoo gi nummedu natzakwu petuyakwe. Besa Tabuadu tupe koodua natzakwonaꞌa mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoo, soo nana oo natzatuguna mu numu nanesootuhigadu tukumi meadu tunekwi tabeyakwe.
44003003	Sumu tabeno soo nana pumme tu tzakwumena, mu Peter noko John wegease, “Puma e tumukwuna e gea,” mee mu netamma.
44003004	Umu yise besa oo poonnese soo Peter meeoo oo netamma, “E nakapunne.”
44003005	Oosoo nana besa mu poonnekwunihoose yise meeoo soonamme, “How gina hemma e geakwu?”
44003006	Soo Peter yise meeoo, “Nu gi hemma hee-gapana nu sakwa ka Jesus pooha-ma u tummatzi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus
44003007	Soo Peter yise ka nana gi nummedu oo mi-makoo oo tzadyota. Oꞌno yise soo nana mesoo wunuoose, o natakwuninumme.
44003008	Ka besa tu kowpa noko tu tawetzoko natzooe manise ka Solomon haba mee naneadu-toohatoo, yise mu Peter noko John-no meahoo. Ka besa manise, ka Te Naa nanesootuhi numme. Mu numu yise oo poonnese meeoo unnegonno, “Yowsoo nana ka Besa Tabuadu tupe koodua natzakonaꞌa-kwiꞌyoona numu ka hemma puma tu tumukwina natuungu katuyidu.” Ewaꞌyoo mu numu oo poonnese oo nesookwugaꞌe ka besa oo manise.
44003011	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu sookweda kemmaꞌase ka nana mu Peter noko John-kumaba, ka haba Solomon mee naneadu-tooha mu konno mu poonne petuse, “Uune! U oo mabesaku,” mee mu numu unne.
44003012	Ka mu numu petugonno, soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, gi tammesoo pooha nanesootuhi-makoo soo nana besa mani. Gi meeoonekoo tusooyugwepana.
44003013	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha-toohakwi soo nana besa mani. Soo Te Naa
44003017	Mu ka mumme moohedu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa gi ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwadoona.
44003018	Esoo Te Naa unnepu togesapa. Mooasoo soo Te Naa nanamooatupu yadooawabe o botugu ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwuna.
44003019	Ka Te Naa sakwa ooosapa nanetzakwiyi yise ka sutakoo nemaꞌwuni. Yise ka besatoosoo nummenumme. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu ka sutakoo mu nemaꞌnunise.
44003021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa netutseana ebe toogoopatoo meapu ka teepu saaꞌa atasoo yugwekwuse. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petuse te sootuhikwu. Oꞌnosoo mu Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu te nanamooatupu tuukwe.
44003022	Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu Moses mee naneadu meeoo, ‘Te Naa saaꞌa tamme-matoo yadooawabe tayadooa, te nanumu-nagatu, nu-kwaꞌnekoosoo, yadooawabe. Mu sakwa oo nakabetsea saaꞌa.
44003023	Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokudu tookwa gi Te Naa doodooamu-matu.’
44003024	Noꞌoko soo Te Naa yadooawabe Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwe.
44003025	Yow tamme Te Naa doodooamu Te Naa yadooawabe-kwaꞌne. Te Naa te sootuhi tamme oꞌnosoo tu tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Noꞌyoona tamme ekow sopedakwatoo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka sumuoo te nanumu-nagatu Abraham mee naneadu meeoo netamma, ‘Saaꞌa soo sumuꞌyoo u-maꞌyoo tsuaketu petukwu. Mu noꞌobatusoo nanaꞌatakoosoo numu nu sootuhikwu, ka hemma oo manese.’
44003026	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo tamme-baa petu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoduse, tamme mooe tuukwe. Oosoo te sootuhikwu ka sutakoo po ooemota te nakwumunase.”
44004001	Ewaꞌyoo (5000) numu tunakapunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nakaꞌoedyuku manepetuga. Ka Peter togesoo mu numu yadooewunu, mu numu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu-nagatu, mu Jew tukwutumadu-no oe petuhooga. Mu Sadducee ka gi numu namayoda-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu ka Peter sutakute ka meeoo numu oo tunedyooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌese namayoda. Mu Jew natukwutumawabe ka Peter noko John tukwutuma nobe-kwi wudumedow, ka mooasoo o togano-gaꞌa, nagutza saaꞌasoo ooka tu nehane-kwi.
44004005	Oogow moooꞌa mu Jew tutunehanedu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona tunehane.
44004006	Mu numu moohedu mee nananeꞌa Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander, ewow tu nananumu-no oe.
44004007	Mu tutunehanedu yise mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Ka Peter noko John ne kobenatoo bitooa,” meeꞌe. Ka mu nabi petuhoose, mu tutunehanedu mu mooe ohobu tubengakooha. “Haga pooha-ma mu ka gi nummedu mabesakupu? Haga ooka mu mabesaku tuungu?”
44004008	Soo Peter ka Te Naa Besow Pooha-toohakwi mu Jew tutunehanedu nanekwegea, “Haꞌoo mu ka besa ne manakwe sapa mu gi besa mee netamma? ‘Haga pooha-ma mu ka nana besa mayugwe?’ mee umu.
44004010	Numme noꞌoko mu Jew numu noko mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha besa oo mayugwe. Tooe mu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsa tuunguse sapa, soo Te Naa Pooha yise oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo miyoda. Ookowsoo pooha-ma soo nana namagwetzoi.
44004011	Ka te mooa nayadooawabe tubo-kwaꞌnesoo manekena meeꞌe, ‘Soo mumme nanesootuhi moohedu ka pumme tu tupe-makana wuni, soo Te Naa meeoo ka puma tu nobe-tookwuna netamma, “Mow soo tupe tubetsetu.” ’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe ookow tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
44004012	Te Pabeꞌe Jesus suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwudu. Gadooꞌoo haga oogow-kumisoo te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44004013	Mu tutunehanedu mu sopedakwatoo ka mu Peter noko John gi natunedyooepu yise mu tumadugu-kwitu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu gi nasookwina mu waha. Mu Jew numu moohedu mu nesookwugaꞌe. Mu Jew tutunehanedu mu sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu naka nagemoꞌo.
44004014	Soo nana namagwetzoipu ooka Peter noko John-kumabasoo wunu, gi hownnekoo umuoo yise haꞌyoo mu netamma-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44004015	Mu tutunehanedu mu Peter noko John puuwanatoo tayahoo.
44004016	“Haꞌoo sakwa tamme mu naana sootunaga?” mee yise unnemoꞌo. Yise meeoo, “Noꞌyoona mu numu Jerusalem-witu mee unakwe, ‘Masoo nana Te Naa pooha-ma besa manepu-gaꞌyoo!’ Gi hownnekoo tamme oo nesootuꞌadyae-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44004017	Tamme sakwa mu naana neta, umu sakwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-witu ka mu numu tuukwepana.”
44004018	Mu Peter noko John oetusoo bise yise meeoo mu netamma, “Gi mu numu tuukwepana ka Mu Pabeꞌe pooha-witu.”
44004019	Soo Peter yise meeoo mu tutunehanedu netamma, “Mu oo sopedakwatoo ka besa oo manepunnena, numme haaꞌa ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu pute mumme? Numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu gi mumme.
44004020	Numme gi hownnekoo ka mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwemakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44004021	Mu tutunehanedu tooe how tooe mu yugwekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu gi mu wahamakwu. Umu yise mu sukwe tzamaꞌwu ka gi hekwi sapa meeoo mu netammana. Mu tutunehanedu mu numu-ma suaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanetzakwiyaꞌe ka hemma manekwi.
44004022	Soo Te Naa magwetzoipu nana mooasoo watsu mano tomopu (40).
44004023	Mu Peter-no John yise pumme tu tzamaꞌwuse, tu pupuaꞌamu-matoosoo kodyuka. Mu Peter-no John yise mu tunehanedu unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
44004024	Umu yise noꞌyoona oo nakase, nanesootuhaꞌe, Te Naa-matoo mee unnemoꞌo, “Te Naa numu manumudoopu. U noꞌokosoo hemma madidu. U noꞌokosoo hemma ne nemadunagapunnedu.
44004025	U, Ne Naa, ume pooha ka oꞌnosoo ne nanumu David mee naneadu ka ume nakaꞌoedyukudu tubo tuungupu u-kwitu. ‘Mu wakwawaꞌa unu sutakugonnona ka Te Naa unu netumooꞌoona oo-no nagoe sokwama pana gi how mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44004026	Ewaꞌyoo nanakummaꞌyoosoo numu moohedu nana-no tooe how tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Te Naa tuutzeana mooe yugwekwu,’ meeꞌe
44004027	Menoꞌo tamme ekow poonne mesoo David yadooapu ka Herod-noko Pontius Pilate mu tukwutumadu-no mu te nanumu Jew-no tuwazoo apegea ka Te Pabeꞌe batsakwu mee unnena oosoo ume nakabetsea. U, Ne Naa, tunetutzeana, Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe u.
44004028	Ume tunetammana yoo saaꞌa manedooa.
44004029	U, Ne Naa, oo soomaꞌyu mu tunehanedu naana ka Peter noko John manayahakwu mee. Gi mu tutunehanedu naana-ma ne suikwununumme u natuungu, noꞌoko numu u-witu numme mesoo tuukwedooa.
44004030	U pooha-gana mu numu numme tzapoonnekukwu. U, Ne Naa, mu tuoegoedu besa manekwuna, ne tzapoonekwuna u pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
44004031	Ka nanesootuhimakwuse soo mu nobe wudyutsungawunu. Oosoo Te Naa Besaa Pooha oo wudyutzengewunu. Oosoo Te Naa Besa Poohasoo umu wumana, umu gi suaꞌena ka Te Naa unnena wahagonno. Umu yise ka Te Naa unnena mana kwayaꞌa-kwidooe wahammoꞌo.
44004032	Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa nana-matoo sokwama. Noꞌokosoo hemma nanatummatzaꞌe, gi hemma nananetumooꞌe.
44004033	Mu tuukwewabe meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka namayodase tusootabuese, yise ka Te Naa pooha mu numu tzapoonnekute.” Soo Te Naa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi.
44004034	Noꞌokosoo hemma mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu hee-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubewabe noko nobe-ma mu tumukukwu ka oo mu soomanakwe. Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe tumasumudoona mu numu yise gi hee-gakoo ka hemma mu sookwina oo-matoo mu hanekute.
44004036	Sumuꞌyoo nana Joseph mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe Barnabas
44004037	ka tubewa-ma tumuse, noꞌoko pumme tu tumanagakuna ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe heme.
44005001	Pana soo nana Ananias mee naneadu, ka tu nodukwa Sapphira mee naneadu-no tu hemma-ma tumukwatekwu.
44005002	Ka tu nodukwa-no oo nanenagana naamookwitoo mu hemekwu mee tunetamma. Ka oona mu tuukwewabe nobe-kwi petugase, a naamookwitusoo mu hemese, mee mu netamma, “Noꞌoko nu mu hemekoo.”
44005003	Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “How u yise manena u ka sutakoo nakabetsea? U yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nemooagana oo-matu manumaku ka tubewa-koobatoo, ne esayaekute, ‘Noꞌoko numme mu hemekoo,’ mee ne tuukwena.
44005004	Mummetu uga soo tubewabe ka gisoo oo-ma u tumuꞌu. Ka tubewabe-ma mu tumuse, soo mu natumunagakuna mummetu mani. Haoo u manena suda manakwe?
44005005	U Te Naa nemooaga, gi ka mu nanana suuꞌmu.” Ka meeoo naꞌunnedu soo Ananias nakase, yaꞌehoose, aanooaka. Mu tootooebetse yise oo maputooehoose, oo hanegase, oo tugutooa. Noꞌyoona umu oo nakadu unu suaꞌe.
44005007	Ka saaꞌa manekese soo Ananias nodukwa Sapphira oe petuoo. Gisoo tu kooma yaꞌe-kwitu naka.
44005008	Soo Peter yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Mow haaꞌa yise noꞌyoona mu natumanakakuna ka tubewabe-kwitu mu nahemmana?” “Aha, yow sapa ne hemmana,” meeꞌe soo Sapphira esiyihoo.
44005009	Soo Peter yise meeoo oo netamma, “How manena mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha soomapoonnetu-kwaꞌne manakwe, ka Te Naa gi how mumme oo yukwe sapa?” Soo Peter yise meeoo, “Umu u kooma tugumodu mi pudu tzoonooagena, umu tuwazoo ume ooosoo yugwekwu.”
44005010	Oꞌno yise Sapphira yaꞌehoo, ka Peter-kumabatoo aanooaka. Mu tootooebetse oe tzoonooa petudu mooasoo oo yaꞌepu oo mayuoo petu. Umu yise oo tzakwuhukase, oona oo kooma-kumabasoo oo tugu.
44005011	Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ekow nakase, umu unu nakasui.
44005012	Ka ewow tu nanumu poonnena mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe ewow numu mabesakute. Mu numu nanatabooegea besa nanano nanesootuhina, oona ka Solomon mee naneadu haba-wi ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba.
44005013	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu yise Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakaꞌoedyuku petuga. Gi haga oo sukwe manakwe, umu tubetse manedu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo nananetamma, “Umu besa ka Te Naa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
44005015	Oona puuwana po-kumaba mu numu tu pupuaꞌamu tuoegoedu tzapokwakute, wegea-kooba tuwow. Ka Peter o-toogoo mea, sumuna o habagana wumase, sumuna besa manekwu mee sokwamana.
44005016	Ewaꞌyoo numu petudyakwe Jerusalem-kumaba nonobe-gaꞌyoo tuutooe ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe besa tuukwena nakana. Umu mu pupuaꞌamu tuoegoedu yise namagwetzoi.
44005017	Soo mu Jew pabeꞌe ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no unu ka Peter noko John nuusookwedakute.
44005018	Umuoo ka mu Peter noko John pabenase umu nuudumedahoo.
44005019	Oꞌno togano soo Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Peter noko John-baa wue petuse ka tukwutuma nobe natzakwonaꞌa tzakwonow. Mu Peter noko John oekoo bihookase, meeoo mu netamma,
44005020	“Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kumabatoo memeahoo. Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mumme magwetzoidyi-kwitu mu numu tuukwekwu.”
44005021	Tu tabuagena, oona nanesootuhi nobe-kobena pepetugase, mu numu tunedyooꞌe. Mu nanesootuhi pabeꞌe ka tu pupuaꞌamu-no sumuhoo petuga, mu Jew tutunehanedu-no yise tunehane. Mu tutukwutumadu taya oona tukwutuma nobe-kwitoo mu Peter noko John mu bi tuunguna.
44005022	Ka mu tutukwutumadu oona tukwutuma nobe-kwi petugase, mu Peter-no John kadoo oetu. Punowsoo mease, ka mu tutunehanedu meeoo tuukwe,
44005023	“Numme ka tukwutuma nobe natzepunnoe oo mayu ka tukwutumadu tooesoo tuꞌeyaꞌekatu, pana mu Peter-no John kadoo oetu.”
44005024	Soo mu Jew pabeꞌe-no soo nanesootuhi nobe-kooba tukwutumadu naa mu naka, howga mu Peter noko John mani howgena hee manekwu ka yoo hemma manise?
44005025	Sumuꞌyoo yise petuoose, mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoona meeoo unakwe, “Yow menoꞌo mu Peter-no John mu tukwutumana ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooe.”
44005026	Mu tukwutumadu naa mu susumudu tukwutumadu-no meaꞌase, mu Peter noko John bihoodooa. Mu tukwutumadu gi mu tubetse manoyukwe mu numu-ma suꞌina, mu numu sumuna tupe-ma mu tapagetana mu tagoehoodooa.
44005027	Mu numu pabeꞌe meeoo ka mu Peter noko John netamma,
44005028	“Numme mooasoo meeoo mu netammapu, ‘Gi ka Jesus-witu numu tunedyooepana.’ Pana mu noꞌoko numu Jerusalem-witu ekow tunedyooe. Mu yise ka Jesus nabatsa-kwi numme oe neyugwe.”
44005029	Soo Peter yise ka umu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe-no ka mu numu tutunehanedu meeoo netamma, “Tamme sakwa Te Naa unnena mayoho gi mumme sukwe unnena.
44005030	Te nanamooatupu pumatoo nanetzakwiyina soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo tayapu. Mu ka sunngabe namadabue-ma oo tzakwenese, oo batsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yaꞌe-kwikoo mayoduse numu oo moohe tuungupu. Ka mu numu suda tumadugupu mu nemawuni tuunguna, oꞌno yise soo Te Naa ka suda mu tumudugupu soomuꞌwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe numu oo magwetzoi tuungu.
44005032	Numme ooosapa mu numu tuukwenoꞌo soo Te Naa yise ka tu Besa Pooha-ma mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu numu tzapoonnekute Te Pabeꞌe pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
44005033	Mu tutunehanedu nakasutaꞌa, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe batsakwu ka mee mu tunetamma.
44005034	Soo nana Gamaliel mee naneadu ka nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu-matu yotsehoo. Esoo nana numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu, yise noꞌyoona numu oo togeꞌyookute ka besa-tamme. Soo Gamaliel ka mu tutukwutumadu ka mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe oetu tzadyuba tuunguse.
44005035	Oꞌno yise ka mu tutunehanedu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu, ka mu naana-witu mu tunemadabuepu-witu soohane.
44005036	Ewa natomose soo nana Theudas mee naneadu meeꞌe unakwe, ‘Nu tubetse naduyadu.’ Yise ewaꞌyoo (400) nanana oo nagemoꞌo. Ka saaꞌa oo nabatsase, umu oo nagemodu nanapokise.
44005037	Ka saaꞌa ka mu numu nadatsuꞌnga, soo nana Judas mee naneadu oona Galilee tubewabe-witu kemmana mu numu, ‘E nage’ mee mu netamma. Oosoo punnoꞌo nabatsase, umu oo nagemodu nanapokise.
44005038	Mu sakwa yise menoꞌo umuoo naana gi matzamapana. Mu tzamaꞌwu. Ka sukwe numu unnena suuꞌmu oosoo gi hee.
44005039	Soo Te Naa ka mu tummatzina mu gi hownnekoo how mu yugwe-waꞌne mu ka Te Naa tumooꞌoogana.”
44005040	Oo unne-kwaꞌnesoo umu manakwe ka mu Peter noko John oetu bise, ka tukwutumadu umu wupageta tuungu. Umu tutunehanedu meeoo yise mu Peter noko John netamma, “Gi Jesus-witu mu numu tuukwepana.” Mu yise natzamaꞌwu.
44005041	Mu Peter-no John yise mu tunehanedu-baaꞌyoona nemeahoo. Besa sokwamana, “Ta tookwa besaꞌyoo, oꞌno ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo nuupageta,” mee yise unnemo.
44005042	Ka nanesootuhi nobe-kobena nonoꞌotsa sumuyakwe oona numu nobe-kwi tuwazoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu numu tunedyooena, yise noꞌoko numu ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe.
44006001	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ewa manena, yise nananesootzema. Mu Greek-ma apegeadu numu meeoo, “Mu Hebrew-ma apegeadu tutuha manedu pepeawabe ewow tukapu hanekute, pana mu numme-batu Greek pepeawabe gi namaka.”
44006002	Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe noꞌoko tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesumudoose mee mu tuukwe, “Numme sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu tuukwe. Gi numme yise ooosapa ka mu pepeawabemaka.”
44006003	Natakwasukwuoo (7) naana sakwa netuutsease, umu sakwa mu pepeawabe ooosapa makayi. Umuoo nanana sakwa besaꞌyoona, Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unu sokwamana, tunakabetseana.
44006004	Oꞌno sakwa numme ooosapa mesoo nanesootuhina ka Te Naa unnepu numu tuukwe.
44006005	Noꞌyoona mu numu yise oo nepesaꞌyookute. Mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanana yise nanetutzea. Mee nananeadu: Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolaus. Soo Nicolaus yise wawaꞌa mu Jew numu-waꞌnekoo nanesootuhidu, ka oona Antioch mee naneadu-kwitu kemmana.
44006006	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) nanana ka tuukwewabe-baa nabi petu. Soo mu tuukwewabe ka mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) nanana nanesootuhikuse, umu-kooba matugu.
44006007	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nanatukwena mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise ewa mani petu ka Jerusalem-wi. Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu nananesootuhiwabe punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
