44006008	Soo Stephen ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Stephen numu magwetzoi besa numu yugweyakwe tu pooha-toohakwi.
44006009	Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew Greek-ma apegeadu ka Stephen-no nanepetukute.
44006010	Soo Stephen unu pooha-gana unu soonammena umu yise gi togebesa howꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44006011	Ewow yise mu nanana meeoo netamma umu yise oetoo esayina suda oo netamma, “Numme ka Stephen nakana te nanamooatupu tumayohope Moses unnepu gi numu mayoho tuungu. Soo Moses ka te nanamooatupu tumayohona te tunedyooe yise ka Te Naa tunetammana,” mee mu tunehanedu netamma.
44006012	Ooonneꞌyoona mu numu ka umu pumme moohedu-no gi mu nepetzape. Ka Stephen numu-kobenatoo tzaka oo nehanekwuse.
44006013	Mu oetu esayidu meeoo mu netamma, “Esoo nana ka te nanesootuhina tooꞌe netakonedu, ka Te Naa nobe-kwi yise ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka Moses tamme tunedyooepu o gi te tumayoho tuungu.
44006014	Numme yise oo unnena naka ka oosoo nana Jesus
44006015	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka tunehanekwiꞌyoona ka Stephen poonne oo koba atasoo tubuabodote ka unu pooha-ga-kwaꞌne oo tapuꞌa.
44007001	Soo nanesootuhi pabeꞌe yise meeoo oo tubenga, “Mu numu haaꞌa togesapa u-kwitu waha?”
44007002	Soo Stephen oo nanekwegease noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu, e nakapunne. Yaa nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona suuꞌmu numu nanesootuhaꞌe mee mu unnepana soo Te Naa namooatupu Abraham puu oona kwingaꞌa mu wakwawaꞌa tubewa-wi oo manepunne sapa Te Naa-matoo mesoo nanesootuhi, ka Mesopotamia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Oꞌnosoo Te Naa ka Abraham natzapoonnekuse,
44007003	meeoo oo netamma, ‘U sakwa u nobe noꞌoko u nanumu maꞌwukase, kummaꞌakoosoo teepu-kooba mea. Nu u pukwiꞌyookwunu u tzapoonnekukwu.’
44007004	Abraham yise oo tumayohoku. Ka tu naa-no mea ka teepu Chaldea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona mease yise Haran mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Oonaꞌyoona soo Abraham naa yaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise ka Abraham ekow teepu, eka tamme menoꞌo pukwiꞌyoo-koobatoo oo taya.
44007005	Gisoo soo Te Naa oo teepu maka Abraham yise punnoꞌo gisoo dooamu-gaꞌyoo. Gisoo soo Te Naa ka teepu-matu oo nemawunikute.”
44007006	Soo Te Naa meeoo tuwazoo oo netamma, “Umu mu doodooamu saaꞌa wakwawaꞌa-naga nobe-gadooa. Mu wakwawaꞌa suda mu matugukwu, unu mu nedyaꞌwena ewasoo tomoba-witoo (400) ꞌyoo yise namanekwu.
44007007	Oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu wakwawaꞌa tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyudooa. Oꞌno mu u-maꞌyoona tseagekwudu saaꞌa yaa nu-baasoo nanesootuhi petudooa.”
44007008	Soo Te Naa mu tumayoho tuungu, “Mu sakwa mu naatse doodooamu kootze naꞌoonnakwitu tsekeaꞌa. Oꞌno umu Te Naa dooamuna nasopedakwatookwu.” Abraham nodukwa naatse dooaꞌadoo, Isaac mee yise naneahoo. Sumu nasatese soo Abraham yise ka tu tooa tookoo tsekeaꞌa. Ka saaꞌa yise soo Isaac ka tu tooa Jacob ooosoo yugwe. Soo Jacob yise punnoꞌo umu tu sumumano wahamatsebooeku (12) tu nanaꞌatse ooosoo yugwe.
44007009	Soo Te Naa unnena togesapa manepu, mu Jacob doodooamu yise ka tu wanngaꞌa Joseph mee naneadu unu nuusoogweda. Ooonneꞌyoona umu yise Joseph gi petzape. Umu oo papabeꞌe ka Joseph-ma tumu. Mu wakwawaꞌa ka Joseph tumuse ka Egypt-witoo oo bika. Ka oonow petugase, umu oo-ma tumu. Soo Te Naa ka Joseph sootuhi.
44007010	Tooe how suda ka Joseph namatugu sapa Te Naa oo magwetzoi. Soo Egypt-witu numu moohetu Pharaoh mee naneadu ka Joseph sopedakwadoose, besa tusoohanedu mee oo soopedyana ka Joseph noꞌoko mu numu Egypt-witu moohe tuungu, pumme tummatzidu tuwazoo moohedu.
44007011	Ka saaꞌa ka Egypt teepu nanaꞌena-kwitu gi bowꞌmana unu pasana gi hee naꞌa. Mu tubewa-gaꞌyoo unu suda manepunne. Mu te nanamooatupu gi nadukadu mayu.
44007012	“Ewaꞌyoo tukapu ka Egypt-wi,” mee soo Jacob tunaka. Mu tu doodooamu taya tukapu mu tumu tuunguna.
44007013	Ka penakwa tu doodooamu tukapu tumu tuunguse, Joseph tu pabeꞌemu tuukweꞌe, ‘Nu tubetse Joseph,’ mee yise ka Pharaoh-matoo mu bika.
44007014	Soo Joseph yise tu pabeꞌemu noꞌoko tu nanumu mu bi tuungu. Noꞌyoona (75) mu Joseph nanumu Egypt-wi petuga. Umu ka saaꞌa osoo tuꞌise punowsoo nahanekese, yow te teepu-wisoo natuoona.
44007016	Ka Abraham oꞌnosoo mu Hamor numu-makoo mu tubewa tumu-kwi umu natuoona ona Shechem mee naneadu-kumaba.
44007017	Mu numu ewasoo manemena. Soo Te Naa ka Abraham oo tuukwena pudusoo oo-toogoo namanekoo.
44007018	Kummaꞌyoosoo nana mu numu-kooba katudu manekwu, gi uga ka Joseph heesoobedyadu.
44007019	Oosoo nana mu te nanamooatupu tumooꞌookese suda mu yugwe. Mu numu tu oongaꞌa puuwana maꞌwu tuungu. Umu yise tuaꞌe.
44007020	Oꞌno soo Moses mee naneadu nadooaꞌadoo. Besa tabuadu oongaꞌa. Pahe (3) muha umu nobe-kwisoo oo tzakwatse,
44007021	oꞌno yise puuwana ka oongaꞌa maꞌwu. Soo mu numu-kooba katudu padu oo mayuse, yise oo tooaga.
44007022	Ka saaꞌa yise oosoo Moses noꞌoko mu Egypt numu manena natunedyooe. Besa hemma how yugwedu. Besa unnedu.
44007023	Soo Moses ka nana manese yise pummesoo nanumu-baa nobenega.
44007024	Ka o petugase, sumuꞌyoo Egypt nana ka Jew nana unutse mooedyugwe.
44007025	Soo Moses ka Egypt nana tutzagow ka tu nanumu-koobatoo.
44007026	Soo Moses yise meeoo soonamme, ‘Umu e nanumu ka natzamaꞌwukwuse oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa nuka pooha-makase.’ Pana umu gi oo sooꞌoedyukute ka ooka mooꞌa oo petugase, wahaꞌyoo Jew nanana nanagoehoo. Mu tooꞌe tzadyooikuse, meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu e nananumu gi muusoo nanagoepana.’
44007027	Soo nana unu tu puaꞌa koosekeowdu ka Moses tomatzakowse, meeoo oo netamma, ‘Numu u nemadunagadu mee u naneyugwe.
44007028	Hownneꞌyoo u? Etzeꞌe u sumuoo nana patsow. Menoꞌo haaꞌa yise u nuka batsakwu?’
44007029	Soo Moses oo nakase, soogweda meeow wakwawaꞌa teepu Midean mee naneadu-koobatoo. Oonow petugase oonatusoo nodukwadoose, waahoo nanaꞌatse dooamudoo.
44007030	Waꞌetse manekese soo Moses oona giba Sinai mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona, oonatu nipunne oo poonnese oetoo meahoo heega mee soonammena. Ka goso-baa oo petugase, Te Naa goso-wiꞌyoona oo yatooe.
44007032	‘Nu yow, mu tubetse manumudoopu. Nu-matoo mu nanumu, mu nanamooatupuna Abraham, Isaac-no Jacob nanesootuhiyakwe.’ Soo Moses oetu tu poonnekwu-ma suise, kwepegawunu.
44007033	Soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, ‘U moko tzakwumedow u pooha teepu-kooba ꞌwunu.
44007034	Mu Egypt numu e dooamu suda matugu nu mu poonne. Mu e dooamu nanepagamoꞌo. Nu mu magwetzoidooa. Nu ume Egypt-witoo tayakwu. Umu saaꞌa mu tzamaꞌwudooa.’
44007035	Mooasoo soo Moses te nanamooatupu tumoodyina. Mooasoo umu meeoo oo netamma, ‘Numu u nemadunaga, meeꞌe u naneꞌyugwe. Hownneꞌyoo u?’ Ekow Moses Te Naa umu-matoo tayakwu. Oosoo mu nemadunagana mu moohedooa ka nidu-kwitu pumme tu pooha-makapu-ma. Oosoo nanasookwugi hemma mu tzapoonnekute ka Egypt-wiꞌyoona. Yise oona Atsa Baa mee naneadu-kumabaꞌyoona tuwazoo oosoo watsumano (40) tomoka tu nanumu moohenoꞌo ka oona gi etzaka tukapu namasua-kwi.
44007037	Oosoo tu nanumu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe, “Sumuꞌyoo te nanumu-matoo petukwu. Nu ka Te Naa tuukwewabe-matu, oosoo punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyookwusoo,” mee soo Moses tu nanumu netamma.
44007038	Soo Moses tu nanumu-no petu ka giba-kumaba. Oo nobetu-ga ka giba-kumaba, soo Te Naa tummatziwabe soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo saaꞌa oo yadooedooa ka giba-koobaꞌyoona. Soo Moses saaꞌa ka giba-maꞌyoona wuekese tu nanumu Te Naa pooha unnena tuukwedooa.
44007039	Mu te nanumu gi oo nakabetseꞌa umu ka Egypt numu tumayohonasoo petzabena.
44007040	Ka Moses ka giba-matoo kodyukasesoo, umu ka oo pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “Numme gi ka Moses unnena mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Moses ka Egypt-nakwana ne bi petu. Pana menoꞌo hanoga mea. U sakwa pummatoo te nanesootuhikwuna matabuega.”
44007041	Umu yise kootsoo tooaꞌa-waꞌne tumadabuese, oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ewa nanuka ka oo mu tumadabue-matoo. Umu gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
44007042	Soo Te Naa yise meeoo mu netamma, ‘Muusoo tooꞌe, ka taba noko paatoosooba-matoo mu nanesootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa tuukwewabe mee umu-witu tubotugu. ‘Soo Te Naa mu Jew numu meeoo netamma, “Ewa (40) tomoka mu ka mana gi hemma naa-kwiꞌyoona, gi nu-matoo nanesootuhina. Mu nu-matoo nanesootuhi mee naneyugwe pana mu nanesootuhi nobe tsekatukuse ka taba-matoo nanesootuhi.
44007043	Paatoosooba-matoo tuwazoo. Ooonneꞌyoona nu mu wakwawaꞌa numu oona kwingaꞌa Babylon mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo numu-matoo mu tzamaꞌwukwu.” ’
44007044	Soo Te Naa yise ka Moses nanesootuhi nobe-too tuungu tooe hemma tooe puhu-makoo. Soo Moses yise oo tumayohoku ooka tu poonne tabua-kwaꞌne. Ka tooe hano tooe mu numu momona ka nobe tzanomoꞌo.
44007045	Ka Moses kadooꞌoo manese, sumuꞌyoo nana Joshua mee naneadu ka Moses kapi manekwu. Mu numu ekow teepu-koobatoo ka nobe hanekekoo. Ka mu numu yow petuse, ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa mooasoo yow nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu wakwawaꞌa kadoo mayugwese umu yise otuoo mu teepu-wi nobe-dookwu. Oꞌno yise soo nanesootuhi nobe ooosapa ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Saaꞌa soo David nadooaꞌadoose, nana manepetuga.
44007046	Soo Te Naa oo sootuhipu. ‘Oꞌno sakwa nu Te Naa tupe nobe-dookuse,’ mee soo David tusooyugwe.
44007047	Gi ooosapa oo tumadabue. Oo tooa Solomon mee naneadu oo nanesootuhi nobe-dooku.
44007048	Soo Tamme Manumudoopu gi numu tumadabuena nobe soogwaꞌe. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugu,
44007049	‘Soo Te Naa mee unakwe, “Nu paꞌa mu-kooba katu, pana ka e kuku-ma ka teepu mesoo tamma. Nu noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu. Mu gi toge nuga pukwiꞌyoo-waꞌnekoo nobe matabue-waꞌneꞌyoo.” ’ “
44007051	Soo Stephen mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Mu yaatoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi tumayohodu. Mu nonoꞌotsa Te Naa Besa Pooha netumooꞌoo.
44007052	Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa gi petzabedu. Mu yise punnoꞌo ooosoo manakwe. Mu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa tuukwewabe noꞌoko suda matugupu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna wahadu yise nagoe.
44007053	Te Naa tu tummatziwabe, ka toha kasa-gakoo mu-matoo taya tu unnena mu mayoho tuunguna, pana mu gi oo tumayohokute ka Te Pabeꞌe batsase.”
44007054	Mu numu oo nakasutakute ka Stephen unnena gi nakabetsabena.
44007055	Te Naa Besa Pooha tuusoobedyana, toogoopatu poonnese, ka Te Naa poonne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-kumaba ꞌwunu.
44007056	Soo Stephen yise mu numu meeoo tuukwe, “Nu ka toogoopatu Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-kumaba ꞌwunu oo pooha poonne.”
44007057	Noꞌyoona mu numu tu naka-wi matugumo ka gi oo unnena soonakana, oo nesagwikuna.
44007058	Ka Jerusalem-wikoo oo tzadoodooekase oonow petugase, mu oe oo neyugwedu tu wunagapu tzakwumetase, ka sumuoo nana, Saul mee naneadu-kobena mu tuoona petuga. Umu yise tupe-ma ka Stephen tatapageta. Umu oo batsa soogwina.
44007059	Gisoo pummetu batsa soo Stephen mee nanesootuhi, “Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus, besa-kwitoo ka e moogooa hanega.”
44007060	Measedose tuwazoo pabatseꞌe nanesootuhi, “Ka suda mu tumadugu-kwitu gi mu sootuꞌadyipana.” Oobenakwatoo soo Stephen yaꞌehoo gi oo unnena soonakana, oo nesagwaꞌekuna.
44008001	Mu nanana Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhidu ka Stephen nabatsana tzakwuhooka. Unu oo yagakuse oo tugu. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu toomooꞌoo. Soo Saul besa soonamme ka oo nabatsase yise oona nonobe-too Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu wate mu manoyugwena mu tsapewoꞌya ka mu wutumetakwuse. Ewow nanana wutumeta momokoꞌne nokosoo. Soo Saul yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo wateka mu goekwuse. Mu Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe suuꞌmu oesoo nabenihoo. Mu ewaꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanaꞌemota petukwuhoo. Ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, ka Judea noko Samaria mee nananeadu-koobaꞌyoo meaꞌa. Mu numu ka oonow meana soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe mee mu tuukwemena.
44008005	Soo Stephen puaꞌa, Philip mee naneadu oona Samaria mee naneadu teepu-wi petuga. Onow petugase ka mu oeteoo numu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu tuukweꞌe.
44008006	Ewow numu besa ꞌmayugwe. Ewaꞌyoo tsoapagoedu ka mu tsoapa umu-makoo tayakwunina. Umu tsoapa yise waꞌageyina meahooyakwe mu tsoapagoedu yise besa ꞌmaneyakwe. Soo Philip yise mu numu ka Jesus-witu mu tuukwena, mu yise ka oo poonnena yise ka Philip besa nakabetseꞌa.
44008008	Mu numu yise besa sokwama.
44008009	Oona Samaria-wi sumuꞌyoo tupoohadu nana nobe-gaꞌyoo, Simon mee naneadu. “Nu besow pooha-gaꞌyoo,” mee mu nemooagana.
44008010	Mu numu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise meeoo unakwe, “Oosoo tookwa Te Naa God.” Wunaꞌme yise ꞌmanepetuga ka tu pooha-ma numahanena.
44008012	Menoꞌo soo Philip ka Te Naa ꞌmanepunne-kwitu mu numu tuukweꞌe soo Jesus yise togesapa Te Pabeꞌe. Mu nanana-no momokoꞌne ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, baa-wi namatzaka.
44008013	Soo Simon punnoꞌo numu-no baa-wi namatzaka. Oosoo ka Philip nagennumme. Ka Philip pooha manakwe oo poonnena ka oo poohagana, Simon yise oo nasoodyagena.
44008014	Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe oo nakase, ka mu Samaria-witu numu Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu waahoo nanana Jerusalem-witu, Peter noko John umu-matoo taya.
44008015	Samaria-wi petuga, mooasoo ewaꞌyoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu baa-wi namatzakapu. Gisoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha wumadu.
44008017	Mu Peter-no John mu nanesootuhikuna umu-ma matuguna, umu yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma nasootuhi.
44008018	Simon punnoꞌo o, oosoo ka mu tuukwewabe poonne umu ka mu nananesootuhidu-ma tubetse matuguyina, Simon yise meeoo mu netamma,
44008019	“Yaaꞌa, nu sakwa ka poohabe-matu tumu. Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Nu punnoꞌo umu-ma matuguyina, umu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu-ma nasootuhidooa.”
44008020	Soo Peter meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Sutaꞌyoo noko kadooꞌoo u mayugwekwu. U ka Te Naa tamme sootuhipu tooꞌe netumuna.
44008021	U tookwa gi numme-matu soo Te Naa u sopedakwatoo. U sutaꞌyoo ka meeoo tusooyugwena.
44008022	Nu u sopedakwatoo u ooosapa sutaꞌyoo. Soo hee ooosapa u-tamme gi togeꞌyookwu. Suda u tusooyugwena oo soomuꞌwuse, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa ka suda u tusooyugwena gi sootuꞌadyidooa.”
44008024	Simon yise ka Peter meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Naa-matoo nuka nanesootuhiku. Oꞌno saaꞌa soo hee nuka u tuukwepu gi oo-toogoo manedooa.”
44008025	Umu Peter-no John yise ka Te Naa unnena wahase, oona punowsoo kodyuka Jerusalem-witoo. Ka kodyuna, ka teepu mu Samaria-witu numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwemena.
44008026	Soo sumuꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Philip-baa petugase, meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mease, gi ka po kaaheno habedu-too meapana, ka taba meana-kwi sakwa u ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona, mea ka Gaza mee naneadu-kwi u petugakwu.”
44008027	Sumuꞌyoo nana wuguna-wi meꞌa. Mooasoo Jerusalem-wi nanesootuhitooase, punowsoo pummesoo teepu-koobatoo kodyuna, Ethiopia mee naneadu-kwitoo. Soo nana mu numu tumanagana mabetseadu, ka Ethiopia numu moohedu mogoꞌne tummatzidu.
44008029	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Philip meeoo netamma, “Ka nana hatsukase, oo-nosoo meakwuni.”
44008030	Ka oo hatsukase, oo naka ka Isaiah tubo tuguna oo neꞌa. Soo Philip yise oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa oo nakasopedakwadoo maka u tuneana?”
44008031	Oo nanekwegease meeꞌe, “Gi, nu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Haga sakwa mitu e tuukwe? Nu-baa katuno.”
44008032	Mee yise tuneakooha, “Soo seepu puu gi tunemaꞌyu ka pummetu sebakwuse, pummetu batsakwuse tuwow. Umu-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi hayoo unakwe.
44008033	Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-maꞌyoo nanekoena, gi besa oo matuku. Mu numu suda manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe batsase.”
44008034	Soo nana ka Philip meeoo tubenga, “Haga-witu netamma, puusoo haaꞌa pute haka?” “Jesus-witu,” meeꞌe soo Philip oo nanekwegea, “Soo Jesus tubetse Te Pabeꞌe.”
44008035	Soo Philip yise ka tu tuneana-witu oo tuukwese yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuwazoo oo tuukweꞌe.
44008036	Ooosapa memeadape yise ka banunadu-kumaba pepetuga. Soo nana meeoo unakwe, “Yaaꞌa baa. U sakwa mi e matzaka.”
44008038	Ka waguna tutziwabe yooi tuunguse, ka baa-witoo Philip-no memea. Soo Philip yise ka baa-wi oo matzaka.
44008039	Ka baa-wiꞌyoona pakuase, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Philip bihooka. Soo nana yise besa soonammena, tu nobe-kwitoo mea.
44008040	Azotus mee naneadu toogoo, soo Philip mease, yise kwenaha-tamme meadooa, Caesarea mee naneadu-wi petu. Noꞌokosoo putoogoo tu meatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwemena.
44009001	Soo Saul sutawununa yise ka umu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu goewunu. Soo Saul mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo netamma ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
44009002	Ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo mu Jew numu moohedu-matoo tupo, “Nuka tummatzi,” mee mu netamma. Umu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa nakwutuma. Oꞌno saaꞌa yise mu ka Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu Jerusalem-witoo bika.
44009003	Soo Saul tu pupuaꞌamu-no meana oona Damascus tzageꞌe manegase, hemma tukwukwutseba-waꞌnekoo poonnese yise anoaka.
44009004	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Saul meeoo netamma, “U suda a masoonammekute.”
44009005	“Haga u?” mee soo Saul unne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Nu Jesus u yow ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.
44009006	Yotsese meaꞌase ka Damascus-wi petugase u u manekwuna natuukwedooa.”
44009007	Umu oo pupuaꞌamu gi haꞌyoo unni-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka oo naka pana gi haka poonnena.
44009008	Soo Saul yotsese, oonatu tooꞌe poonne pana gi tubootabue mani. Umu oo pupuamu oo mi-makoo oo tzakaka ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo.
44009009	Pahe tabeno maneka soo Saul ka gi tubootabue manese, gi tukana gi hemma hebena.
44009010	Sumuꞌyoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu Ananias mee naneadu Damascus-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe, “Ananias,” mee, uni mee tuusoobedyana. “Nu u naka,” mee soo Ananias oo nanekwegea. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise meeoo, “Yotsese, meana ka Judas nobe-kwitoo ka Saul-witu tutubenga. Oona soo po kaaheno hape Judas ookow po-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo ka Saul
44009012	U, Ananias, ka Saul-ma matuguse oosoo besa tubootabue ꞌmanekwu, mee soo Saul tuusoobedya.”
44009013	Soo Ananias meeoo unakwe, “Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Saul-witu e tuukwe. Soo Saul gi besaꞌyoo nana. Soo Saul ka Jerusalem-witu mu ume nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetana mu kutsedyina, mu wukoꞌe.
44009014	Soo Saul yow petu ooosoo manekwuse.”
44009015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Ananias nekwegea, “Unu mease, nu oo netutzea ka Saul noꞌobatusoo numu nu-kwitu tuukwekwu, mee nu unakwe. Mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu, yise oo Jew nananumu.
44009016	Ewaꞌyoosoo mu numu ka Saul nekwutumana, oo kutsedyana ka nu-kwitu pumme ka Saul tuukweꞌe,” mee soo Ananias nose.
44009017	Soo Ananias yise ka Judas nobe-kwi petugase, ka Saul-ma matuguse, meeoo oo netamma, “E puaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u-baa petudu u-nosoo nummedu u-matoo e taya. Ume oosoo magwetzoise. Yise ka besaꞌhoo tu pooha-matu-ma u sootuhi.”
44009018	Hee sapaga ka Saul pooe-kwiꞌyoona sawehoose, oosoo besa tubootabue ꞌmani. Yotsese, yise soo Ananias baa-wi oo matzaka
44009019	saaꞌa ka tukase natzooesoo ꞌmanepetuga.
44009020	Soo Saul ka mu Jew numu meeoo tuukwe soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe, yise ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-baa huu tooiyakwe ka Damascus-wi.
44009021	Ewaꞌyoo umu oo nakadu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mee unakwe, “Esoo nana mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu goepu ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona. Masoo yaatuoo mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumetakwuse mu Jew numu moohedu yise Jerusalem-witoo mu bikakwu. Masoo menoꞌo meeoo te netamma oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.”
44009022	Soo Saul nenaguꞌa ka Te Naa unnena Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi oo wahana unusoo poohatooꞌa. Ka mu Jew numu tubetse tzapoonnekute soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Umu numu gi hanotosoo hayoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44009023	Ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu tunehane ka Saul patsakuse tabewano, togawano oona natzakwunaꞌa-wi oo tooꞌe potamana. Soo Saul mu naka ka pumme mu batsakwuse. Mu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ka pabatsekoo kawona-wikoo ka tupe nagoodeadoona ka mu numu nogaduna naꞌoonnakwidu habedu oonow tawaga-too natzakweku tugapoo-ma ka togano.
44009026	Soo Saul ka Jerusalem-wi petugase mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-no tooꞌe nesumuꞌu. Umu suaꞌe ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka ookow puu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
44009027	Soo Barnabas oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo bikea oona mu tuukwewabe-matoo. Soo Barnabas mee unakwe, “Esoo nana ka oona Damascus po-wiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo nakabetsea. Ka Damascus-wi masoosoo mu numu-ma suina ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha-toohakwi Jesus-witu mu numu tuukwe.”
44009028	Soo Saul yise Jerusalem-wi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no ka mu Jew numu-ma gi suina, mu nesumuse ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
44009029	Ka mu Jew numu Greek-ma yadooadu-no nanepetukute. Unu umu oo nesutakute umu ka oo batsakwu mee sokwamana.
44009030	Mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu o nakase oo bikea oona Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo oo nobe-kwitoosoo o kodyu tuunguna.
44009031	Ka Saul tunakaꞌoedyuku ꞌmanese, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Judea, Galilee, Samaria mee nananeadu-koobatu gi how nuugwe, gi nuutumetana, gi namatzama. Umu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhise Te Naa podo mea. Ewa yise ꞌmanepetuga.
44009032	Ka saaꞌa soo Peter mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oona kwayaꞌa-kwitu nobenedyinnumme. Oona ka Lydda mee naneadu-kwi petuga mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobengena.
44009033	Sumuꞌyoo nana Aeneas mee naneadu ka Lydda-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo, gi yutsungadu ooosapa habedabe namewatsu (8) tomokapu. Oo-baa soo Peter petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u mabesakukwu. Yotsese, u kapa mabetsabe.”
44009035	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Lydda-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo, yise ewaꞌyoo numu Sharon mee naneadu tubewa-witu oo poonnese oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe.
44009036	Sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne tunakaꞌoedyukudu Tunna mee naneadu oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwi nobe-gaꞌyoo. Ewa nanabesa tumadugupu. Ewow numu tutuha manedu gi hee-gakoo tummatzaꞌe.
44009037	Soo Tunna yise unu tuoeyaese yaꞌe. Mu oo pupuaꞌamu oo tookoo pakedyase oona nobe-kooba tuutseꞌe nanobe-too-kwi oo tzatugu.
44009038	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwatoo ka Peter oona Lydda-wikoo soo Joppa ono natsageꞌe. Umu wahaꞌyoo naana ka Peter baꞌe, oo natummatzi tuunguna.
44009039	Soo Peter ka nobe-kwi petuoose oosoo ka tuutse oo-kooba nanobe-too-kwitoo meahoo. Noꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne gi kookoomama-gaꞌyoo sakwina manegonno, ka wanapu pukwi tu namasooana ka Peter tzapoonnekute ka gisoo Tunna yaꞌe oo tumadabuena.
44009040	Soo Peter yise noꞌoko puuwanatoo mu taya Te Naa-matoo meatzedose nanesootuhise ka Tunna tookoo yadooꞌe, “Yotseoo Tunna.” Tunna yise mitu poonnegase ka Peter pooꞌnese katuoo.
44009041	Soo Peter ka Tunna mi-makoo oo tzadyotase oo kuku-ma oo tzawunukuoo. Oo gwetzoina mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tzapoonnekute, mu gi kookoomamu-gakoo nokosoo tuwazoo.
44009042	Mu Joppa-witu ewaꞌyoo oo naka ka namanena yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuhoo.
44009043	Sumuꞌyoo nana ka Joppa-witu Simon mee naneadu kootsoo puhu mahanedu. Soo Peter wunaꞌme ka Simon-baa.
44010001	Sumuꞌyoo tukwutumadu naa, Cornelius mee naneadu oona ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo
44010002	Soo Cornelius besaꞌyoo nana noꞌoko mu Jew tutuha manedu numu tummatzidu, noꞌyoona ka tu doodooamu-nosoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiyakwe. Gi Jew numu, pana mu Jew-waꞌnesoo nanesootuhiyakwe.
44010003	Sumu tabeno pahe-kwikoo ka taba soo Cornelius nanesootuhina tuusoobedya. Te Naa tummatzidu toogoopaꞌyoona oo-baa petuse, mee oo netamma, “Cornelius.”
44010004	Soo Cornelius oo pooꞌnese, oo-ma suise, mee unne, “Nu u nakapunne. Hemma u how e yukwe tuungu?” Soo Te Naa tummatzidu meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Te Naa u sootuhi, putamme u nanesootuhipu oo nekwegeana, ka u nanumudoo u tunekwipu tuwazoo.
44010005	U sakwa menoꞌo oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwitu nanana taya. Sumuꞌyoo nana, Simon Peter mee naneadu oonow, mu sakwa oo bidooa. Oosoo punnoꞌo Simon mesoo naneadu, tu puhu mahanedu oo baa soo Simon Peter manepunne. Soo Simon nobe oona tubetse baa-kumaba,” mee tuusoobedya.
44010007	Soo Te Naa tummatzidu yise meahoo. Soo Cornelius tuponnese, ka mu waahoo nobe-kwi tutummatzidu ka Te Naa unnena mu tuukwe. Sumuoo tukwutumadu tuwow tuukwe. Oosoo ooosapa oo tummatzidu, ka Cornelius noꞌoko mu Jew numu-waꞌne nanesootuhaꞌe. Oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwitoo mu taya.
44010009	Oogow mooꞌa tabeno mu nanana wupetuga, soo Peter ka nobe-kooba poyase, nanesootuhaꞌe.
44010010	Ka saaꞌa yise unu tzuayaꞌena, “Hemma sakwa nu tuka?” mee soonamme. Ka mu numu tu tukakwuna mabetsape soo Peter mee tuusoobedyow.
44010011	Soo koomebaga tawaga mee nose. Pabatseꞌe hemma natzatobododu-kwaꞌne tabuadu ka Peter noko ka teepu-tamme wuegena.
44010012	Ka oo wue petuhoose, noꞌobatusoo hee oe, togogwa-no noꞌobatusoo nunuꞌu, noꞌobatusoo kweꞌnaꞌa.
44010013	Soo Peter meeoo nanetamma, “Yabe yotsese, matu tuka.”
44010014	Peter yise meeoo, “Nu gi mownnekoo tukadu. Ne nanamooatupu tunetammana numme mayoho, gi numme hemma mownnekoo tukadu.”
44010015	Mee tuusoobedya, “Esoo besaꞌyoo gi sutaꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena, ‘Besaꞌyoo.’ “
44010016	Pahe tooe meeoo oo netammayakwe. Oꞌno yise oosoo pabatse natzapogotugudu toogoonakwa yabetseꞌesoo tsebooehooka.
44010017	Soo Peter meeoo soonamme, “Hayoo gena soo e tuusoobedyana e tuukwedu?” Mu natayadu ka oona Simon nobe-kwitoo mea, ka nobe-kobena, ka natzakwunaꞌa-kumaba konno petugase
44010018	yise meeoo tutubenga, “Soo Simon Peter haaꞌa mu-baa?”
44010019	Soo Peter togesoo meeoo soonamme, “Haꞌyoo gena soo e tuusoobedyapu e tuukwedu?” Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo oo netamma, “Mu nanana u kwate.
44010020	Wuegase gi suipana umu-no mea. Nu ume mu bi tuungu, umu-no mea.”
44010021	Soo Peter yise umu-baatoo wuese meeoo mu netamma, “Yaaꞌa nu. Hemma mu sookwaꞌe?”
44010022	Umu oo nanekwegea, “Soo Cornelius mee naneadu, mu tukwutumadu moohedu, yaatoo ne taꞌya. Besaꞌyoo nana oosoo mu Jew numu-waꞌne Te Naa-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuwazoo. Mu Jew numu unu oo nenaka. Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee ka Cornelius netamma, ‘U oo tuukwe u oosoo saaꞌa u nobe-kwitoo kemmadooa. Oosoo u tuukwekwu ka u soonakana.’ “
44010023	Soo Peter ka mu natayadu nabaa tooi tuungu. Soo Peter ka tu tabuase, ka mu nanana-no mea. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Joppa-witu punnoꞌo umu-no mea.
44010024	Sumu tooise, oogow mooa tabeno ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Cornelius ka mu sookwipunnena tu nanumu noꞌoko tu pupuaꞌamu ka Peter unnekwuna mu naka tuunguna. Mooasoo soo nobe kaanopunne. Soo Peter yise petuooga, Cornelius oo-matoo meahoose, oo-kobena meatzedoose oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Peter oo tzadyotase meeoo oo netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana. Nu gi Te Naa God. Nu u-kwaꞌnesoo, sukwe numu.” Soo Peter oo-no yadooase ka nobe-kwi tzoonoowahooka.
44010028	Ka nobe-kwi egease, noꞌoko mu numu oe manepunnedu meeoo netamma, “Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwatoo ka numme Jew tumadaguna. Numme ka mu gi Jew numu nobe-kwi gi nobeꞌnge. Gi too mu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo.
44010029	Pana mu ka e bise nu kemma. Nu gi e namanayahowkwu-ma suaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ookow e tzapoonnekute noꞌyoona numu nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Hayoo u e netammakwuse yaatoo e bi?”
44010030	Cornelius meeoo oo nanekwegeꞌa, “Pahe tabeno manegapu, pahe-kwikoo, ka oona nobe-kwiꞌyoonasoo nu nanesootuhaꞌe. Sumuꞌyoo nana nu-kobena tabuꞌa petu. Oo kwasu unu patakwetzeꞌatu-kwaꞌne tabuꞌa
44010031	meeoo yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa u nanesootuhina nekwegea. U nanekwegeana soomaꞌyuna ka oo nanumu u tummatzipu.
44010032	Mu numu-matu taya Joppa-witoo umu sakwa Simon Peter yaatoo bike. Oosoo Simon oo-no, oosoo Simon mee naneadu nana tupuhu mahanedu oo nobe ka tubetse baa-kumaba.’
44010033	Yabesoo nu nabaatoo mu baꞌe, besa umu ka oo manese. Noꞌyoona yise tamme yow Te Naa-kobena manepunne. U yise ka Te Naa unnepu ne tuukwekwu.”
44010034	Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Ka oꞌnosooga soo Te Naa mu Jew numu suuꞌmu besa soobedya, mu susumudu numu gi, mee nu soonamme. Menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa gi numu moodyaꞌe.
44010035	Oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhaꞌe mu besa tumatugutu, mu gi Jew numu nokosoo.
44010036	Soo Te Naa ne taya mu Jew numu-matoo mu tuukwe, mee ne netammana soo Te Naa sakwa tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Oosoo noꞌoko-tamme Pabeꞌe.
44010037	Mu ka sumuna mooasoo oowetuoo nakapunne, soo John mu numu baa-wi matzagadyakwe.” Soo meeoo naꞌunnedu noꞌoko Galilee mee naneadu tubewabe kaano nanakapunne. Oona Judea mee naneadu tubewabe-witooe.
44010038	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nawahana, soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma oo sootuhi, mana yise besa manennumme, ka Te Naa pooha-masoo ka tsoapagoedu mabesaku.
44010039	Numme yise besa oo tumaduguna poonne, mu Jew numu-nagatu
44010040	Ka Te Pabeꞌe soo Te Naa mayoda, ka waha tabeno oo yaꞌedape. Ooonekoo ekow soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute.
44010041	Ka tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayoduse gi noꞌyoona numu oo poonne. Numme suuꞌmu Te Naa tunetutzeana ookow waha. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne. Gi tsoapa, numme oo-no tukase, baa oo-no hepe.
44010042	Mu numu meeoo ne tuukwe tuungu. Soo Te Naa puusoo oo netutzea. ‘Nu noꞌobatusoo mu numu nehanekwudu, mu gisoo yaꞌepu yise yaꞌepu tuwow.’
44010043	Oꞌnosoo noꞌyoona mu Te Naa nanamooatupu tuukwewabe ekow botugu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Umu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohamaka. Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu tumaꞌemukwana somuꞌwa.’ “
44010044	Ka Peter tooesoo umu-no yadooawunu soo Te Naa mu Cornelius noko oo pupuaꞌamu besaꞌhoo tu Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
44010045	Mu Jew numu ka Peter-no petudu, ka mu wakwawaꞌa nanaꞌatasoo apegeagonno mu naka, ka Te Naa pooha pumme sootuhaꞌe. Umu Jew numu ka Peter-no gi oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu gi Jew sapa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhi. Soo Peter yise meeoo unakwe,
44010047	“Tamme sakwa ka gi Jew numu baa-wi matzaka umu ka tamme-waꞌneꞌyoonasoo. Soo Te Naa puu Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi.
44010048	Baa-wi sakwa mu namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Umu ka Peter nenuummaku numme-baasoo, huudooe tooipunne mee oo netammana.
44011001	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Judea mee naneadu teepu-koobatu mu naka ka mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa unnena mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
44011002	Ka Peter Jerusalem-wi petugase, susumudu mu Jew numu-matu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nesootzeꞌma,
44011003	meeoo yise oo netamma, “U gi te tumayohope mayoho u ka mu wakwawaꞌa-baa petugase, umu-no tuka.”
44011004	Soo Peter yise noꞌoko tu manepu mu tuukwe, mee unakwe,
44011005	“Nu ka oona Joppa mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona nanesootuhaꞌe. Ka nanesootuhina nu meeoo tuusoobedyana heegina tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo paꞌanakwana wuegena.
44011006	Ka oo wue petuse nanakummaꞌyoosoo hee oeꞌyoona saꞌwe petuhoo: togogwa, nunuꞌu, nanakummaꞌyoosoo kweꞌnaꞌa nu oo poonne.
44011007	Nuka meeoo netamma, ‘Yabe mu batsase, mu tuka.’
44011008	Nu yise meeoo, ‘Gi numme putoogoo meana. Nu gi mownnekoo tukadu.’
44011009	Meeoo yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa esoo besaꞌyoo, gi sutaꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena.’
44011010	Toge pahe nu meeoo natuukwe. Noꞌyoona soo hee toogoopa nahanegapu, mee nu tuusoobedyana.
44011011	Yabesoo paheꞌyoo nanana petugono ka nobe e pukwiꞌyoopu-wi ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona umuoo natayapu. Umuoo yise petugono punowsoo e bigeakwuse.
44011012	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo e netamma, ‘Gi tunetutzeapana. Umu-no mea.’ Nu yise mu naapihoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no mea. Numme yise mu wakwawaꞌa nobe-kwi petuga.
44011013	Oosoo meeoo mee tuukweꞌe, ‘Soo Te Naa tummatziwabe oo nobe-kwi oo-baa petugase meeoo oo netamma, “Tooe haka tooe sakwa ka Joppa mee naneadu-kwitu ka Simon Peter mee naneadu bitooa.
44011014	Soo Simon Peter ka petuse, mu tuukwetooa soo Te Naa unnepu yise ka mu nobe-kwitu, mu tummatziwabe nokosoo mu magwetzoitooa,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa tummatziwabe.’
44011015	Nu yise oetu mu tuukweꞌe tooesoo e yadooawunu Te Naa Besa Pooha umu-ma mani petu. Ka oꞌnosoo tukwaꞌnesoo tamme ooka wumakwusoo.
44011016	Nu yise oo soomaꞌyu ka oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme netammapu, ‘Soo John baa-wi mu matzaka pana Te Naa yise eka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi,’ meeꞌe.
44011017	Soo Te Naa yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te oedyukute. Menoꞌo punnoꞌo tamme-waꞌnesoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu. Nu gi ka Te Naa tumooꞌoo-waꞌneꞌyoo uweoo.”
44011018	Umu ka Peter tumooꞌoodu, uga, oo nakase gi hanotusoo hayoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa nesootuhina meeoo umu unakwe, “Yise menoꞌo mu wakwawaꞌa atasoo tu manena yugwese soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
44011019	Ka Stephen nabatsase ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mea ka mu numu pumme nehowaꞌe. Susumudu kwenaha-tamme ka tubetse baa kumi meꞌa Phoenicia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo susumudu Cyprus-witoo natsemangega, umu-matu tuwow Antioch mee naneadu-kwitoo meꞌa ka meana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu Jew numu tuukwe meꞌa.
44011020	Pana umu-matoo ka mu wakwawaꞌa teepu Cyprus noko Cyrene mee nananeadu-witoo nadooamudoo, ka Antioch-wi petugase, mu wakwawaꞌa punnoꞌo oetu natuukweꞌe.
44011021	Ka ooka mu waha Te Naa mu sootuhi. Ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa mu nakana oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
44011022	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooesoo Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona umu-witu nakase, sumuoo nana Barnabas mee naneadu umu-matoo taꞌya. Ka Antioch-wi ka Barnabas petugase
44011023	umu oo poonne ka ewow numu oo sootuhaꞌe. Soo Barnabas besa umu-matoo soonammena ka Te Naa ooosapa nakaꞌoedyukuna oo tumayohokuna.
44011024	Soo Barnabas besaꞌyoo nana; unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha hee-gaꞌyoo, ka saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ewa manega.
44011025	Soo Barnabas ka Paul watena Tarsus mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Soo Paul uga Saul mee naneadu.
44011026	Oo mayuse punowsoo oo bika Antioch-witoo. Sumu tommo mu Barnabas-no Paul ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunedyooena ewow numu noko, yow ka Antioch-wiꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, “Te Pabeꞌe nakanagemoꞌodu,” mee umu naneapu.
44011027	Oꞌno yise umu Te Naa-witu numu tunedyooedu Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona ka Antioch-wi petuga.
44011028	Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu Agabus mee naneadu ꞌwunuhoose ka Te Naa Besa Pooha wumana meeoo mu tuukwe, “Pudusoo noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu numu tseagoekwu.” Soo Te Naa unnepu oo-toogoo mani ka Claudius mee naneadu numu-kobena oo katu.
44011029	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Antioch-witu ka mu Judea-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumasumutookute. Tu mapuꞌa noko umu mu haneku.
44011030	Mu Barnabas-no Paul oo hanegase, umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu ka Judea-witu haneku.
44012001	Mu Jew numu-kobena katudu Herod mee naneadu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusega, gi besa mu sootunagaꞌa.
44012002	Soo Herod ka tukwutumadu tsegesa-ma ka John pabeꞌe James batsa tuungu.
44012003	Soo Herod soo tuwow ka Peter nebatsa ka mu Jew numu oosoosoo besa manuumakwu ka James oo batsase. Ka mu numu sumuse ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe gi namayudu tukaba mu ewa tukanoꞌo, soo Herod ka Peter mu wutuma tuungu.
44012004	Mu nanana ooka naꞌeyaꞌe tuungu ka oo tukwutuma nobe-kwikoo. Watsu-baa watsukwuoo naana ooka eyaꞌe tuungu, ka mu ewa tukamakwuse ookow moooꞌa umu oo nehanedooa mee unnena.
44012005	Ka Peter nakwutumase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa unu oo nanesootuhikute.
44012006	Ka togano ka Peter nanehanekwunoꞌo umu oo maꞌwetzogo-kwikoo nanaꞌenakwu tukwutumadu-noko natzakunetu. Soo tukwutumadu yise ka natzakwuna-kumaba oo eyaꞌepunne. Soo Peter uwegapu.
44012007	Gi obeda soo pukwi mu utuina kootabuꞌa petu, yise sumuꞌyoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oe mani petuse, ka Peter matuponnese meeoo oo netamma, “Yabe yotseoo.” Soo Peter yotsehoose ka pummatu natzakunana ooetoosoo sawekuoo.
44012008	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yabe yotseoose, namahaneoo. U nate noko u moko-wi namadabuehoo, wunagayowse e nakwi kemmow.”
44012009	Soo Peter oo nagekase sapa, gi oo sopedakwatoo oo manese meeoo soonamme, “E nosena tookwa.”
44012010	Wahaba, waahoo tukwutumadu moopa memeꞌa o umu pumme eyaꞌedu, oona yise ka weehepu natzakwunaꞌa-wi pepetuooga, oosoo puusoo wonabe. Oeꞌyoona kuꞌowkase,
44012011	oonanoꞌo manikase, soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo maꞌwuooga, mee yise soo Peter soonamme, “Gi tookwa e nosena. Soo Te Naa e tubetse magwetzoipu. Herod mu susumudu Jew numu-no e batsayagate. Pana soo Te Naa ka toha kasa-gakoo nuga magwetzoi tuungu.
44012012	Nu sakwa John Mark pea-baatoo mea,” mee tusooyugwe. Ka John Mark pea Mary nobe-kwitoo mea. Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Peter nanesootuhikuna o.
44012013	Ka nobe-kobena petuoogase ka natzakonaꞌa dokaꞌnge. Mary tummatzidu tsuadumu Rhoda mee naneadu ka oo nadokaꞌnge oetu poonne petuga.
44012014	Soo tsuadumu oo sopedakwatoo ka Peter petuoona, besa soonammese gi ooosapa ka natzakwonaꞌa tzakwuna oobe nobe-kwitoo tanomane mu numu meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Peter oobeoo puuwana natzakwona-kwi ꞌwunu.”
44012015	Mu numu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukudu. “U koodeseyaꞌe,” mee ka Rhoda netamma. Meeoo pumme mu netamma sapa mu tuukwe, “Togesapa soo Peter ebeoo petuhoo.” Umu yise meeoo, “Oosoo tookwa mooasoo nabatsapuna, te natzanakakute.”
44012016	Soo Peter ooosapa tudokangedyakwe. Umu yise ka oo tzakwunase, ka Peter poonne. Noꞌyoona apegeakooha oowetuoo nanatukwena.
44012017	Ka Peter tu mi mayodase umu apegea makwuhoo. Soo Peter yise mu tuukweꞌe, “Ka e nakwutumase, soo Te Naa e tummatzina yow e bipetu. Mu sakwa tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka James saaꞌa tuukwe mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nokosoo.” Soo Peter yise kummaꞌakoosoo tubewa-witoo mea.
44012018	Ka tu tabuase, mu tukwutumadu suda sokwama, umu ka Peter pukwiꞌyoona gi sopedakwadoona.
44012019	Soo Herod oo tooꞌe wate pana gi oo maꞌyu. Soo Herod yise mu tukwutumadu ka Peter eyaꞌedu goekwu meeꞌe unakwe. Soo Herod mease ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwi nobetugu.
44012020	Ka saaꞌa mu numu sutakute ka Tyre noko Sidon-witu. Umu ka Herod pumme sakwaꞌekuna gi petzabebena ka Herod tubewabe-witu tu tukapu hanena. Umu-matoo mease, ka Herod tummatzidu Blastus mee naneadu oo puaꞌadoo. Soo Blastus yise ka Herod noko mu tunehanekwuna nemadabue. Soo Herod yise tu besa kwasu-wi namahanena mu tunehane-wi petuooga. Ka mu numu-kobena katuse, mu numu yadooꞌe. Mu numu besa oo sooyugwena meeoo oo netamma, “U, Ne Naa God-waꞌne.”
44012023	Soo Herod yabesoo unu tuoeyihoo. Woꞌabe tu tookoo sooawunu yaꞌehoo ka meeoo soonammena, “Nu yow Te Naa God-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44012024	Ka yoo tu namanewunu, ewaꞌyoo numu oo naka ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ka Herod manena nakaꞌoedyukuna.
44012025	Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka mu numu tu tummatzina mamakwuse Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona memea. John Mark umu-no memea. Ka Antioch mee naneadu-witoo kodyuka.
44013001	Ka oonow mu pepetugase, mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Antioch mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Umu-matu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, mu Barnabas-no Paul umu-no.
44013002	Ka gi tukapana mu nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu yadooꞌe, “Nu ka Barnabas noko Paul netutzea, noko numu nu-kwitu mu tunedyooe tuunguna. Umuoo sakwa mu taya.”
44013003	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi tukapana ka Paul noko Barnabas-ma pooha matuguse, mu nanesootuhikute yise mana mu taya.
44013004	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Barnabas noko Paul tayase, umu ka Seleucia Cyrene mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Onona umu natzemangeka
44013005	ka Salamis mee naneadu-kwitoo. Ka oe pepetugase, mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwi pepetuooga, mu Jew numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwe. John Mark ka mu Paul noko Barnabas tummatzaꞌe.
44013006	Umu yise saaꞌa ka Paphos mee naneadu-kwi petugonnoga. Oosoo ka Salamis mee naneadu tubewabe ooꞌenakwa. Soo sutaꞌyoo Jew numu poohadu Bar-Jesus mee naneadu o numu-no.
44013007	Soo mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu Sergius Paulus mee naneꞌa, oosoo mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu besa tusooyugwedu, mu Barnabas noko Paul ka Te Naa-witu tutuubenga.
44013008	Soo Bar-Jesus ka Sergius Paulus meeoo netamma, “Gi ka Paul noko Barnabas nakaꞌoedyukupana.”
44013009	Ka Te Naa God Besa Pooha punagakoo oo poonnese, meeoo unakwe.
44013010	“U mu numu gi toge neyugwedu. U ka sutakoo nunuꞌu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. U ka Te Naa tumooꞌoona mu numu ka gi besow podo taꞌya.
44013011	Soo suda u manena u-matoosoo kodyudooa gi u manena petzabena. U gi tubootabue manekwu ka suda u manena gi maꞌwuna.” Yabesoo gi tubootabue manise, numu pumme tsakakwudu tooꞌe kwate.
44013012	Soo Sergius Paulus ka Bar-Jesus gi tubootabuedu poonne oosoo yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakaꞌoedyukute yise ka Te Naa unnepu nesookwugaꞌe.
44013013	Soo Paul tu pupuaꞌamu-no ka Paphas-wiꞌyoona baa-koobakwi natzemangeka ka Perga mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga
44013014	Umu Paul-no Barnabas ka Perga mee naneadu-too memease, ka Antioch mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga ka teepu Pisidia-kooba. Ka te nanesootuhi tabebanoꞌo umu ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo memea.
44013015	Mu Jew nanesootuhidu nemadugudu ka Te Naa God unnena neamakwuse meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, manatu haaꞌa haꞌyoosoo unnekwe?”
44013016	Soo Paul oo wunuse mee mu netamma, “E nanumu-no mu tooe haga tooe Te Naa God nakaꞌoedyukudu e nakapunne.
44013017	Soo Te Naa God, pu-matoo tamme Jew numu nanesootuhina, ka mu te nanamooatupu netutsease, ka mu nanesootuhikuse ewa mu mayugwe ka Egypt-wiꞌyoona, ka mu wakwawaꞌa-waꞌnekoo. Soo Te Naa yise unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Egypt-wikoo mu bikase,
44013018	mu mabetsea ewa (40) tomoka ka teepu gi numu tumasuana naa-kwi.
44013019	Oosoosoo tuwow (7) natakwatsukwuoo-baatoo numu kadoo mayukwe ka Canaan mee naneadu teepu-kooba yise ka te nanamooꞌatupu ookow teepu mu tzapokaku.
44013020	Unu ewa (450) tomokaꞌa oosoo ka mu nanaꞌakwedu-matu unu pooha-gakoo netutzease. Oꞌno soo numu moohedu Samuel mee naneadu ka Te Naa God yadooawabe mane.
44013021	Umu yise pukobena katudu nekwina, soo Te Naa ka Saul mee naneadu netutsea
44013022	Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa oo nabatsakuse ka David yise netutsea ka numu-kobenatoo. Soo Te Naa God mee unakwe, ‘Soo David, Jesse dooa, oosoo nana e sookwi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ooosapa besa e nakabetseadu.’
44013023	Soo Te Naa God ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme Jew numu magwetzoidu matabuepu-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus David-matu meeꞌe soo Te Naa God te tuukwepu-gaꞌyoo.
44013024	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus gisoo Te Naa unnepu mu numu tuukwe petu, soo John mee naneadu meeoo mu numu tuukweꞌe, ‘Noꞌyoona mu Jew numu sakwa ka suda tu manena maꞌwuse baa-wi namatzakase ka Te Naa God besa podo mea,’ mee.
44013025	Soo John ka numu tu tunedyooena mamakwuse meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu Te Pabeꞌe mee haaꞌa mu e sooyugwe? Gi nu. Soo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petukwu. Nu gi oo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo e ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.’
44013026	E nanumu, mu Abraham dooamu-matu yise mu susumudu numu Te Naa meeoo te tuukwe, ‘Nu mu magwetzoikwu.’
44013027	Mu numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo ka mu pumme moohedu-no tooe nonoꞌatsa ka Te Naa unnepu naka, ka oo tubona naneayakwe, pana gi yise ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwatoo. Gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu oo waha. Umu ka Te Naa unnena gi nakaꞌoedyuku pana oo mayoho.
44013028	Umu gi hanotusoo suda naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu waha-waꞌneꞌyoo pana ka Pilate ooka batsa tuungu.
44013029	Oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa tuukwewabe meeoo tubopu umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus batsakwu. Umu yise tooesoo oo manakwe. Oosoo ka yaꞌese, ka sunngabe namadabue-maꞌyoona natzakwekuse, nakoo.
44013030	Soo Te Naa oo matusootabuesoo.
44013031	Ewa tabeba-wi oosoo umu-no Galilee-wiꞌyoona kemmadu natzapoonnekuyakwe. Umuoo naana mu numu oetuooo tuukwe.
44013032	Menoꞌo numme Barnabas-no yow petu mu tuukwe ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnepu ka Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme magwetzoi-kwitu.
44013033	Menoꞌo toge oo-toogoosoo Te Naa unnepu manakwe. Oꞌnosoo David meeoo tubope-gaꞌyoo ka penakwa hoobeabe-kwi meeoo unakwe Te Pabeꞌe witu, ‘Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “U e dooa. Nu u tubetse Naa. Nu menoꞌo mu numu tuukweꞌe.” ’
44013034	Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu besa u tummatzikoo ka David e tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.’ Ka kummaꞌakoosoo David hoobea tubo-kwi tuwazoo meeoo, ‘U gi ka u tunetutzeana tookoo peheku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
44013036	Soo David ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo tuboꞌo gi puusoo nakwitu. Soo David ka Te Naa pumme netammatoo manese, yaꞌe. Ka oo nakoose oo tookoo mooasoo pehewunu.
44013037	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tookoo gi pehe. Te Naasoo oo matuusootabuesesoo.
44013038	E nanumu e naka, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa ka te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwase te sootuhikwu.
44013039	Ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwa. Tamme ka te nanamooatupuna manena sukwe mayohona, ka Moses tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Soo Te Naa gi te tumaꞌemukwana sumuꞌwa tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
44013040	Umu meeoo tuboꞌo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, ‘E nakapunne. Mu ka gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Ka tooesoo u gwetzoaꞌe, nu u tummatzikwu. Tooe numu e tuukwe sapa mu gi oo nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ Mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, oꞌno gi mu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu ka mu oꞌnosoo Te Naa te tuukwe-kwaꞌne.”
44013042	Mu Paul noko Barnabas nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona umu kukuowse umu meeoo mu netamma, “Ka penakwa nanesootuhikwuse, ka Te Naa unnena saaꞌa ne tuukwesoo.”
44013043	Ewaꞌyoo mu Jew numu-no mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew-kwaꞌne nanesootuhi tabuadu ka Paul noko Barnabas-no mea. Paul-no Barnabas mu yadooena meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa Te Naa besa podo ooosapa mea.”
44013044	Ka penakwa nanesootuhi tabenoo ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Antioch-wi sumu ka Te Naa unnena nakakwuse.
44013045	Umu Jew numu moohedu unu sutaꞌa ka ewow numu gi Jew numu pana oetoo kemma ka Paul nakana. Umuoo moohedu ka Paul noko Barnabas unnena netumooꞌoo.
44013046	Mu Paul-no Barnabas gi mu Jew numu unne-ma suina meeoo unakwe, “Mu ka Te Naa unnena mooe naka. Mu muusoo gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna mu yise gi nasootuhaꞌe. Numme yise menoꞌo ka mu wakwawaꞌa Te Naa unnepu-witu tuukwekwu.
44013047	Ka oꞌnosoo numu meeoo tuukwedu ka Te Naa unnena po tuguse te tuukweꞌe. ‘U sakwa noꞌoko enatu tooe mu wakwawaꞌa nu-kwitu tuukwe. Oꞌno mu e nakasopedakwadoo yise namagwetzoikwu,’ mee soo Te Naa.”
44013048	Mu wakwawaꞌa oo nakase, besa sokwamana meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa unnepu unu besaꞌyoo.” Noꞌyoona umu Te Naa tunetutzeana tunakaꞌoedyukute.
44013049	Soo Te Naa unnena yise tooe hanotu tooe yaa teepu-koobatu numu oo naka.
44013050	Mu Jew numu moohedu, mu momokoꞌne ka mu Jew numu-kwaꞌne nanesootuhidu, mu numu moohedu ka mu Paul noko Barnabas tumooꞌoose, oꞌno yise umu ka Antioch-wiꞌyoona memea. Mu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Antioch kooseba tu kuku-makoo tataꞌnese, mu numu tzapoonnekuna ka how sutaꞌyoo umu. Ka Antioch-witu umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa sokwama ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-tooha tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Iconium mee naneadu-wi pepetuga.
44014001	Mu wahaꞌyoo nanana, Paul-no Barnabas Iconium mee naneadu-witoo memea, ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhaꞌe oe pepetuooga. Ewa-baatu numu o. Ewaꞌyoo umu-matu ka Paul sooꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa unnena oo waha.
44014002	Mu Jew numu-matu gi mu Paul-no Barnabas sooꞌoedyukuna mu nesootzema mee mu wakwawaꞌa netamma, “Gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana.”
44014003	Ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona kukuowga. Wunaꞌme ka Iconium-wi gi mu numu-ma suina, mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwe. Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka Te Pabeꞌe besa pooha punagakoo ewow numu mabesaku.
44014004	Mu numu oowetuoo waha-tamme tusooyugwedu susumudu umu-matu tunakaꞌoedyukute tooꞌesoo umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
44014005	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew mu wakwawaꞌa mu Jew moohedu-no ka Paul noko Barnabas tupe-ma tagoekwu mee tunetammana.
44014006	Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka tu nanetammana nakase, yabesoo oeꞌyoona memeow. Yabesoo ka kummaꞌakoosoo teepu, Lycaonia mee naneadu-koobatoo memeahoo. Ka Lystra noko Derbe mee nananeadu-kwi pepetugase,
44014007	Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tuukwe.
44014008	Soo nana Lystra-witu tuutse-wi manakwana gi nummedu
44014009	ka Paul naka katu. Soo Paul ka nana poonnese, yise meeoo oo sooyugwe, “Esoo nana unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pumme magwetzoi-waꞌne manepunne.”
44014010	Soo Paul yise pabatseꞌe meeoo ka nana netamma, “Kaaheno u kuku-ma wunuhoo.” Soo nana gi nummedu yabesoo yotsehoose, yise numme ꞌmani.
44014011	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka oo poonnena ka besa oo manise puusoo tu yadooa-wi mu nanesootuhikuna yise meeoo mu netamma, “Yaatoo umu pumatoo te nanesootuhina te paꞌanakwana numu manise, menoꞌo yow tamme-baa.”
44014012	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu ka Barnabas-wi meeoo sooyugwe, “Yow esoo pumatoo te nanesootuhina moohedu Zeus mee naneadu,” mee. Yise ka Paul-witu meeoo netamma, “Yow Zeus yadooawabe, Hermes mee naneadu.”
44014013	Soo Zeus ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo ka Lystra-kumaba mu nanesootuhiwabe mu kootsoo koomamu wetzaka ka tonegeadu umu-ma wusoena. Oꞌno yise mu numu sakwa ka Barnabas nanetzakwiyaꞌe mee sokwamana.
44014014	Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka mu numu suda manakwe gi besa mu nakasoopedyase puusoo tu kwasu makebuese umu yabesoo mu numu-nagatoo memeahoose, papabatse mu yadooese meeoo,
44014015	“Gi numme-matoo nanesootuhipana. Numme mu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, sukwe numu, ka besow wahamodu. Gi too ka Zeus-matoo nanesootuhipana, oosoo gi kaaheno unnedu nana. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepu.
44014016	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Mu uga mummesoo soomea-kwaꞌne mea tabuꞌa pana menoꞌo mu sakwa nu-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi.’ Soo Te Naa mooasoo mu numu ka tu pooha tzapoonnekute.
44014017	Soo Te Naa powmaba taya ewatseꞌyoo yise soo tukapu naa, tamme yise nasootuhi,” meeꞌe.
44014018	Mu numu gi ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu togesoo ka Paul noko Barnabas-matoo tu nanesootuhina tooꞌe soogwi, pana gi.
44014019	Ka saaꞌa susumudu mu Jew numu Antioch noko Iconium-wiꞌyoona kemmadu petu. Mu numu Lystra-witu, “Soo Paul sutaꞌyoo,” mee mu tuukwena. Umu oo tooꞌe tatsagow tupe-ma oo tapagetana. Ka Lystra-wikoo yise oo tzapewuyaka, Paul yaꞌepu mee sokwamana. Pana gi!
44014020	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Paul naꞌoonnakwi sumuhoose, oosoo yise yotseoose, ka Lystra-witoo kodyuka. Ookow moooꞌa, Barnabas-no ka Lystra-wiꞌyoona memea. Ka Derbe mee naneadu-kwitoo memeakwate.
44014021	Mu Paul-no Barnabas ka Derbe-wi pepetuga ewow numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu tuukwe. Ewaꞌyoo numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane. Mu Barnabas-no Paul kokodyukwate, Lystra, Iconium, noko Antioch Pisidia mee naneadu-too kokodyu.
44014022	Ka memeadabenona, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, “Gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna maꞌwupana,” mee mu netammana. Meeꞌe tuwazoo mu netamma, “Mu numu saaꞌa mu netumooꞌookwu, pana gi umu-ma suipana. Ka saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-matoo meakwu besa-kwitoo.”
44014023	Noꞌoko putoogoo tu meana ooka moohedu netutzeamena mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Mu Paul-no Barnabas gi tukana mu nanesootuhikuna ka Te Naa mee netamma, “U, Ne Naa sakwa mu sootuhi. Besa mu mabetsea.”
44014024	Umu ka teepu Pisidia mee naneadu-kwitoo, memeꞌa,
44014025	ka Perga-wi pepetugase, ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu tuukwe.
			ka Attalia mee naneadu-kwi pepetugase, ka sake-wi Antioch-witoo punowsoo natzemangeka. Otoo mu nanesootuhidu mu taꞌya mana ka Te Naa besa unnepu waha. Menoꞌo yise mu Paul-no Barnabas oo manemakwu.
44014027	Umu mu kokodyu petuse, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sumuse, mu Paul-no Barnabas ka tu mopu-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe oosoo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu mu wakwawaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyukudu mayugwemena.
44014028	Wunaꞌme yise umu o, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa.
44015001	Mu Jew naana-matu ka Jew teepu-wiꞌyoona kemmase petugonno, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi Jew numu yise meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa ka ne nanamooatupu tunetammana mayoho, ka Moses numme tuukwepu. Mu kwuꞌa naꞌoonnakwitu sakwa natsekeaꞌa. Mu ka ꞌyoo manese ka mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo manepunnekwu, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
44015002	Mu Paul-no Barnabas oo netumooꞌoo ka meeoo mu Jew naana-matu unakwe.
44015003	Mu Paul-no Barnabas, susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nataya Jerusalem-witoo ka umu nananesootuhidu moohedu oowetuoo tubengakwuse, ka mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo gi oo naka togeꞌyookuna. Umu Paul-no Barnabas yise ka Phoenicia noko Samaria tubewa-too memeana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwemena, ka mu wakwawaꞌa gi Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise besa nakasokwama.
44015004	Ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu umu pumme moohedu-no besa nesokwama, ka mu nakana ka Te Naa-witu mu waha, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhipu.
44015005	Susumudu numu ka mu nanesootuhidu-matu Pharisee mee nananeadu mee unakwe, “Umuoo wakwawaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa ka tu kwuꞌa naꞌoonnakwitu natsekeaku, ka Moses tamme tunetammakupu ka tamme Jew nanamooatupu manena tumayohokuna.”
44015006	Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu tunehane oowetuoo nehanekwuse.
44015007	Wunaꞌme umu nanano apegease, soo Peter ꞌwunuoose meeꞌe unakwe, “E nanumu, oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa e pooha nose-kwi meeoo e netamma, mu wakwawaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu saaꞌa nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
44015008	Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo pumme ka mu wakwawaꞌa noko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhina tamme tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.
44015009	Soo Te Naa tamme-waꞌnesoo mu matabuepu, mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
44015010	Mu haaꞌa gi oo naka toogeꞌyookute ka Te Naa unnena, mu haaꞌa mu wakwawaꞌa tamme nanamooatupu manena mayoho tuungukwu? Umuoo tumayohope unu namanakwe. Tamme puu gi oo mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu te nanamooatupu punnoꞌo gisoo. Tamme sakwa gi umu ooka mayoho tuungupana.
44015011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus te magwetzoina te sootuhaꞌe ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu wakwawaꞌa tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo,” mee soo Peter unakwe.
44015012	Noꞌyoona mu numu gi tunemayuoose, ka Paul noko Barnabas nakapunne. Ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Naa numme pooha-maka-ma numme mu wakwawaꞌa besa mayugweyakwe.” Ewasoo nanabesa tu manepu-witu mu numu tuukwe.
44015013	Umu yise ka apekeamakwuse, soo James mu numu meeoo netamma, “E nanumu,
44015014	mooasoo soo Peter te tuukweꞌe, ka mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne ka mu wakwawaꞌa tu sootuhina, yise umu-matu wakwawaꞌa tu dooamu mayugweke.
44015015	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa tuukwewabe eka toge meeoosoo naꞌunnedu botugu, soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma,
44015016	‘Nu ewow mu Jew numu tumaꞌemukwadu kadoo mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa yise nu ka mu David nanadooamu sootuhidooa. Ka tooe haga tooe anooase, nu oo mayodadooa.
44015017	Oꞌno saaꞌa mu susumudu numu nu-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukudooa. Susumudu mu wakwawaꞌa-matu saaꞌa nu e dooamu mayugwedooa,’
44015018	mee soo Te Naa unakwe, oꞌno gisoo hemma oo manakwe.”
44015019	Soo James ooosapa yadooadyakwe meeꞌe, “Yise nu meeoo tusooyukwe tamme sakwa gi unutu-kwikoo mu wakwawaꞌa tunedyooe ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
44015020	Tamme sakwa umu-matoo tubo mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu gi tumayohona ka mu Jew numu tumayohope. Yoo oo sukwe ꞌmane: ka mu numu tooe hemma-too tooe nanesootuhidyidu tuka, gi umu-baatu tukapana. Ka nodukwa-gana gi kummaꞌakoosoo pootamapana. Gi too puupe tukapana. Gi ka hemma tookoo puu-gakoo tukapana tuwazoo.
44015021	Yoo sakwa tamme mu mane tuungu mooasoo mu ka yoo tu namanena naka.’ “
44015022	Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka pumme moohedu-no meeoo tusooyugwe, “Numme sakwa mu Paul noko Barnabas ka mu nanana yaatu tamme-matu ka Antioch mee naneadu-witoo taya.” Waahoo nanana yise netutzea ka pumme moohedu-nagatu, Silas-no Judas mee nananeadu.
44015023	Tubose, umu-noko oo taya, meeꞌe naꞌunnedu, “Mu ne nananumu mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu-matoo natayana: Mu wakwawaꞌa Antioch-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mana Syria noko Cilicia mee nananeadu teepu-witu.
44015024	Numme meeoo tunaka, susumudu numu yaatuoo mu nemooagana mu nesagwaꞌe ka tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu netammana. Numme gi umuoo mu-matoo taꞌya. Gi numme meeoo mumme mu netamma tuungu.
44015025	Menoꞌo yise numme tunehanese, noꞌyoona meeoo unakwe, numme nanana tunetutzease mu tayakwu. Umu saaꞌa ne pupuaꞌamu, Paul noko Barnabas-no kemmadooa.
44015026	Mu Paul-no Barnabas tooꞌe nagoehoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo.
44015027	Numme yise Judas noko Silas mu-matoo tayakwu. Eka tubope-kwaꞌnesoo, umu toge maawaꞌnesoo mu tuukwekwu.
44015028	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-no numme meeoo sokwama besa mu ka gi numme Jew numu tumayohope mayohona. Yooꞌoo suuꞌmu sakwa mu ꞌmane.
44015029	Ka mu numu tooe hemmatoo tooe nanesootuhidyidu tuka gi umu-batu tukapana. Ka nodukwa-gana gi maꞌemukwapana. Umuoo tumayohope mu nagena besa ꞌmanekwu.”
44015030	Mu tubope gwuudu ka mease Antioch-wi petuga. Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunehane, umu yise ka tubope mu geahoo.
44015031	Umu yise oo nease, besa sokwama ka besa oo naꞌunakwe.
44015032	Umu Judas-no Silas yise ewow numu nanesootuhi tunedyooꞌe. Tu nanesootuhipe-kwitu mu tuukwena, oꞌno umu unusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
44015033	Onosoo ka saaꞌa umu punowsoo kokodyuka.
44015035	Paul-no Barnabas Antioch-wisoo. Umu onatu-nosoo ka Te Naa unnena numu tuukwe.
44015036	Saaꞌa soo Paul ka Barnabas meeoo netamma, “Ta sakwa oona mu numu nonoꞌata-toosoo moga ka Te Naa God unnepu ta wahapu-witoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobengena, howga umu menoꞌo manakwe?”
44015037	Soo Barnabas ka tu nanumu John Mark mee naneadu nepina.
44015038	Soo Paul gi oo nepetzabena soo Mark gi umu-no tu nummena mamakwu, ka oona teepu Pamphylia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona nobe-kwitoosoo kodyu.
44015039	Mu Paul-no Barnabas nanepetukuse, yise susumuꞌyoonasoo meakwu meeꞌe tunetamma. Mu Barnabas-no Mark, ka Cyprus mee naneadu teepu-witoo natsemangega.
44015040	Soo Paul ka Silas netutzea puno meakwudu. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa umu-kooba tueyaꞌe.
44015041	Umu memea oona ka tu memeatoo yise ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Syria noko Cilicia mee nananeadu teepu-koobatu nanesootuhi tunedyooemena.
44016001	Mu Paul-no Silas ka memeadabena ka Derbe mee naneadu-too memease ka Lystra mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Sumuꞌyoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu Timothy mee naneadu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oo pea Jew numu. Oo naa mu wakwawaꞌa numu-matu.
44016002	Ookow soo Paul naakwena ka susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo Timothy besaꞌyoo nana mee mu unakwe. Soo Paul yise ka Timothy Jew numu mayugwe mooasoo noꞌyoona mu Jew numu oo sopedakwadoo soo Timothy naa mu wakwawaꞌa numu-matu.
44016004	Mu Paul, Silas, Timothy-no ka meadabena noꞌoko tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwemena. Tamme moohedu Jerusalem-witu meeoo mu netamma, “Gi ka mu Jew nanamooatupu tumayohope mayohopana.”
44016005	Mu numu unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nonoꞌotsa tabemeakwi ewasoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manemena.
44016006	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu pihoo nanana ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwitoo gi nemeakute. Umu yise Phrygia noko Galatia mee nananeadu teepu-kumi meꞌa.
44016007	Ka Mysia mee naneadu teepu-kooba petugase, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka teepu Bithynia mee naneadu-koobatoo gi mu nemeakute.
44016008	Umu yise Mysia-too mease ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Nu Luke, oꞌno o. Nu yise umu-no manika.
44016009	Sumu tooise soo Paul meeoo nose, sumuꞌyoo nana Macedonia-wiꞌyoona kemmadu oo nose-kwi oo-baa petu, yise meeoo oo netamma, “Ka Macedonia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo natzemangese, ne tummatzi.”
44016010	Soo Paul ka meeoo nosese numme ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuduna oosooga sumuna tu unnena oonow te waha tuunguna, numme yise Macedonia-witoo meakwu.
44016011	Numme yise Troas-wiꞌyoona mea. Numme natzemangekase Samothrace-wi petuga. Ookow mooa numme tuwazoo natzemangeka, Neapolis-witoo sawe petuga.
44016012	Numme yise Philippi-wi oona sogo mease oo petuga, soo Philippi ka teepu Macedonia-koobatu mooe nadatsunga. Mu numu otuoo Roman numu. Huu tabeno tooe numme o.
44016013	Ka nanesootuhi tabebano numme ka Philippi hooonakwatoo mea ka paa hooodu-kumabaa petuga, mu Jew numu o sumuna nanesootuhiyakwe. Numme aatase, mu momokoꞌne nananesootuhidu-no apegea.
44016014	Sumuꞌyoo umu-matu ne nakapunnedu Lydia mee naneadu mogoꞌne, Thyatira mee naneadu-witoo nadooaꞌadoopu. Oosoo Lydia Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu. Oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe oowetuoo ka Paul pumme tuukwe.
44016015	Ka saaꞌa Lydia ka umu puno baa-wi namatzakapu nenuummakuna mee unakwe, “Mu sakwa nu-baasoo ka e sopedakwatoose, nu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu.” Ne tubetse nenuummakute.
44016016	Sumu numme oona pukwiꞌyoona mu Jew numu nanesootuhidyi-kwitoo meana, oosoo tsuaduma togogwa pooha-gaꞌyoo ne wekeꞌahoo. Ka tu togogwa pooha hemma manekwuna pumme oo tuukweyakwe soo tsuadumu mu numu tuukweyakwe. Mu numu ka tsuadumu meeoo neyugwedu ewa natumanakakute ka tsuadumu numu tuukwe-kwi.
44016017	Oosoo tsuadumu huu tabeno ne nagedyinnumme paba yadooanummena mee unnena, “Umuoo naana ka Te Matabuepu nayadooawabe. Umuoo mu tuukwekwu how soo Te Manumudoopu mu magwetzoi tabuakwu.” Soo Paul oo-matoo suda soonamme ka tsuadumu ooosapa oo manakwe. Soo Paul yise nakwumunase eka togogwa pooha meeoo netamma, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tooha-kwi nu u nematzakukwuni!” Yabesoo yise oosoo sutaꞌyoo poohabe ka tsuadumu nagaꞌyoona tsebooeka.
44016019	Umu meeoo ka tsuadumu neyugwedu unu sutaꞌa. Umu oo sopedakwadoona ka hemma manikwuna, yise gi haka natumanakakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44016020	Umu yise ka Paul noko Silas-ma tzakaduse mu numu nehanedu-matoo mu bika. Yise meeoo mu netamma, “Umu naana yow Jew numu, umu tamme-baaꞌyoona suda tuneyugwe.”
44016021	Umu meeoo te netammana, “Numme Jew tumayohona mayoho.” Tamme noꞌyoona mu netumooꞌoo ka gi mu Jew tumayohope tumayoho-waꞌneꞌyoona. Umuoo tumayohope gi tamme Roman numu tumayoho-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
44016022	Mu numu unu sutana ka mu Paul noko Silas topagetakooha. Mu numu nehanedu yise mu kwasu tzakebooekwunihoose mu tukwutumadu mu Paul noko Silas wupageta tuungu.
44016023	Ka saaꞌa wunaꞌme mu wupagetase, mu wutumetowse mu tueyaꞌedu umu eyaꞌe tuungu.
44016024	Mu tueyaꞌedu yise numu kwingaꞌa-kwitu-kwi mu wutumetase, mu kowpa wobe tasekeya-wi tsakunetahoo.
44016025	Oona togabeno mu Paul-no Silas nanesootuhina tunekwuꞌupunne, mu susumudu nakwutumadu mu naka.
44016026	Soo teepu unu yutsungakooha soo tukwutuma nobe punnoꞌo. Soo tukwutumadu tutzakunedapu wugoomedihoo.
44016027	Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu tupoonnese, ka tukwutuma nobe nanatzakwunaꞌa wuwonetahoopu mu mayuhoo. Oosoo puusoo tooꞌe nabatsowkwu ka tu tsegesa-ma, mu nuutumedadu ka kuowka mee soonammena.
44016028	Soo Paul pabatseoo yadooese meeoo oo netamma, “Gi uusoo namaguapana. Numme togesoo noꞌyoonasoo yow.”
44016029	Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu tukootabuakunoo natuungubodote. Ka unu suise ka Paul-baatoo sookweda meahoose mu-kobena meatzedo petugase, ka unu pooha-gaꞌyoo mee mu soobedyana,
44016030	oobenakwa yise mu bihoogase mee mu tubenga, “Haꞌoo sakwa nu manese namagwetzoi?”
44016031	Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuse, u namagwetzoikwu noꞌoko umu u nobe-kwitu tuwazoo.”
44016032	Umu yise noꞌoko mu nobe-kwitu nokosoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwe.
44016033	Oosoo mu bikease ka tu nuupagetapu-witu baa-ma batzaka, umu yise noꞌyoona oo nobe-kwitu-nosoo baa-wi namatzaka.
44016034	Oosoo yise tu nobe-kwitoo mu bikease mu maka. Te Naa nesookwugana noꞌyoona oo sootogeꞌyookute, oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no.
44016035	Ka tu tabuase, mu numu nehanedu mu tukwutumadu taya ka tukwutuma nobe-kwitoo. “Umu Paul noko Silas tzamaꞌwu,” mee unnena.
44016036	Soo tuꞌeyaꞌedu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Soo mu numu moohedu mumme e tzamaꞌwu tuunguse mu sakwa menoꞌo nanosoo memea.”
44016037	Soo Paul mu tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Numme umuoosoo numme tzamaꞌwuna soogwaꞌe ka umuoosoo suda mane-kwi. Umu ewow numu-koobenaꞌyoona ne wupageta gisoo ne nehanepana. Umu yise ne wutumeta, tooe numme togesapa Roman numupana. Mu Roman tumaduguna puu gi ꞌyoo ne matugu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise mikoo ne watze taꞌya.”
44016038	Mu tukwutumadu ka mu numu nehanedu-baa petugase mu tuukwe. “Mu Paul-no Silas mu Roman numu-matu.” Mu numu nehanedu yise unu nakasuaꞌe.
44016039	Umu numu tunehanedu yise mu Paul noko Silas-baa, ka tukwutuma nobe-kwi petugase mu tzamaꞌwuoo, suda nesokwamana ka mu kusegase. Umuoo punnoꞌo onoko mu tayahookwu.
44016040	Mu Paul-no Silas yise tukwutuma nobe-kwiꞌyoona memeahoose ka nobe-kwi pepetuhooga, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oetu meeoo netamma, “Unu ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu oedyukuno.” Oeꞌyoona yise memea.
44017001	Mu Paul-no Silas memeadabena ka tubetse baa kumana memeana ka mu Amphipolis noko Apollonia mee nananeadu-toogoo memease, Thessalonica mee naneadu-kwi pepetuga. Yise ka Jason mee naneadu-baa tooaꞌe. Mu Jew numu o nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo.
44017002	Soo Paul ooka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-witoo meahoo ka ooosapa maneyina. Yise pahe nasateba-wi nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooeyakwe. Soo Paul mu numu ka Te Naa oꞌnosoo unnena tuukweyakwe oo nabo-kwaꞌnesoo hemma manegena.
44017003	“Soo Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase yise tuusootabue,” mee soo Paul mu netamma. “Soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
44017004	Susumudu mu Jew numu ka Paul noko Silas nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu pumme mu tuukwe, ewaꞌyoo wakwawaꞌa punnoꞌo mu Jew-waꞌnesoo nanesootuhidu, yise ewaꞌyoo unu nadatsungadu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
44017005	Susumudu mu Jew numu-matu mu nuusoogwedakuna, huuhoo umu totoetzeabu sutakoo nanana ka mu numu ka Paul noko Silas-matoo mu nemanekute. Mu numu yise sumuse, ka Jason nobe-kwi petugonnoga ka Paul noko Silas wategana, mu nehanekwu mee unnena.
44017006	Ooonneꞌyoopana yise gi onoko mu maꞌyu. Ka Jason noko susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemmowkase, ka tunehanepe-kwitu mu bihooga. Umu tu tunehanedu meeoo netamma, “Yow mu Paul-no Silas ena noꞌoko teepu-koobakwi suda tuneyugwedu. Yow yise umu menoꞌo pepetu.”
44017007	Soo Jason mu numu-matu-no mu tummatzina, mu nabaaꞌyookute. Umu Paul-no Silas gi tamme-kobena katudu oedyukute. Umu pummesoo-kobena katudu oedyukudu, Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneadu.
44017008	Mu numu, mu pumme moohedu-no naka sutaꞌa ka mu unnena nakase.
44017009	Umu ka Jason umu-kooba tumanaga tuunguse, oꞌno umu mu tzamaꞌwukwu.
44017010	Oꞌno togano mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu Paul noko Silas taya ona Berea mee naneadu-kwitoo. Mu Paul-no Silas yise Berea-wi pepetugase ka mu Jew numu-no nanesootuhaꞌe.
44017011	Mu otuoo Jew numu ka mu Jew numu Thessalonica-witu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo, umu ka Te Naa unnepu-witu besa nakasoobedyana. Umu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nabona neadu, ka Paul unnena soonakatogeꞌyookuna.
44017012	Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu oo soonakaꞌoedyukute, umu Greek momokoꞌne ewa hemma hee-ga-nosoo, ewaꞌyoo Greek naana punnoꞌo.
44017013	Mu Jew numu Thessalonica-witu oo naka ka Paul ka Te Naa unnepu mu numu Berea-witu oo tuukwe. Umu yise o petugase, susumudu mu numu otuoo ka Paul tumooꞌoona ka mu numu ka Paul ooemota mu tooe neyugwe.
44017014	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu otuoo yise ka Paul taꞌyase, mu Silas-no Timothy yise oso. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Paul-no mea, oona ka tubetse baa-tamme.
44017015	Ka Athens mee naneadu-wi petugase, soo Paul umu puno kemmadu punowsoo taꞌya, ka mu Silas noko Timothy yabesoo umu bi tuunguna.
44017016	Ka mu Silas noko Timothy gisoo o pepetuga, soo Paul oona ka Athens-dootu sootsemadyinnumme. Ewaꞌyoo mu numusoo tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhidyina otuoo. Soo Paul suda soonamme ka pumatoo mu nanesootuhina ewow onoko poonnena.
44017017	Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeba oe maneyakwe, soo Paul meayina mu Jew numu noko mu wakwawaꞌa nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe. Nonotsa tabeno ka Athens-witoo meayina ka mu numu hemma-ma tumudu Te Naa-witu tuukweyakwe.
44017018	Susumudu mu numu atakoosoo nanesootuhibu Epicurean noko Stoic mee nananeadu-matu oonow. Paul umu-no yadooꞌa. Meeoo umu unakwe ka Paul pumme tuukwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwiꞌyoona namayodapu meeꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo nananetamma, “Oosoo Paul ooosapa sukwe yadooadu.” Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Oosoo sumuna wakwawaꞌa naa nanesootuhi yadooawabe gi toogoope-gakoo te tuukwe.”
44017019	Umu yise oona ka tu tunehaneyi-kwitoo ka Paul bika Areopagus mee naneadu-kwitoo. Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Yaanona u tooe hemma tooe ne mesoo tuukwekwu ka u tunaka-kwitu.
44017020	Numme gi ooonnekoo nakadu. Menoꞌo numme oo pudu nakakwu. Numme yise punnoꞌo oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”
44017021	Mu numu oetuooo ooonneꞌyoo. Susumudu umu-matu Athens-witoo nadooamu-doopu, umu-matu punnoꞌo oto nowuꞌapu ooosapa meeoo apegeamodu, besow pudu tusoohanepe tooetoo besa naꞌunnedu tutunakakwuna sookwipunnedu.
44017022	Soo Paul ka mu tunehanedu-kobena wunuse, meeoo mu netamma, “Nu mu sopedakwadoo mu unu nanesootuhaꞌe.
44017023	Nu ka mana nummennummena ewow hemma mummesoo tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhidyina poonne. Nu sumuoo ka pukoobaꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina poonne, meeoo oo-ma natuboꞌo, ‘Pu-matoo ka mu nanesootuhidyina gi mu nakasopedakwadoona.’ Menoꞌo nu ooka mu tuukwekwu mu tookwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, pana gi oo sopedakwatoo.
44017024	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemadugoopedoopu, noꞌoko hemma manumudoopu, ka yaa teepu-koobatu noꞌoko tamme-koobawitoo tuwazoo, ka taba, muha, yise noꞌoko mu paatoozoobu.
44017025	Gi soo Te Naa tamme-makoo hemma soogwaꞌe ka puu te matabuepu-gana te songapu makase, tamme oo-ma yutsungamoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe ka hemma te soogwaꞌe.
44017026	Sumuoo mogoꞌne noko nana mooe matabuepu, umu-maꞌyoona yise tamme ewa numu manepetuga. Mooasoo soo Te Naa hemma nemamakwu.
44017027	Oꞌno sumuna mu numu Te Naa watena, yise unusoo manena oetu nakasopedakwadoo. Umu sumuna oetu nakasopedakwadoo pana gi oo unu namanakwe ooka te nakasopedakwadoona. Yow yise soo Te Naa.
44017028	Soo Te Naa gwetzoibu te sootuhipu. Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwadoo soo mu hoobeabe bodu meeoo unakwe ka oo bona. ‘Yow tamme ka Te Naa dooamu.’
44017029	Tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa, gi oosoo mu numu tumadabuena pummatoo mu nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu ka hemma matabuekwuse, oetuoo mooe soohanese, yise oo matabue. Tupe-ma, weehepu-ma, tooetoo oa tupe-ma oo matabue. Soo Te Naa God gi ooonneꞌyoo.
44017030	Mu gi ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoopana mu nakasootuhi. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu tooe hanotu tooe meeꞌe netamma, ‘Mu sakwa suda mu tumaduguna maꞌwu.
44017031	Pudusoo ka teepu atasoo nu yugwekoo, nu bebesow mu-nagatu sootuhikwu, mu sutakoo numu soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe namayodapu ka oo yaꞌekwikoo, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sootuhikwu ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute,” meeꞌe soo Paul ka mu tunehanedu netamma.
44017032	Umu ka oo nakase, ka numu yaꞌena namayoda-witu pumme oo tuukwese nanaꞌatasoo tusooyugwe. Susumudu umu-matu ka Paul-maꞌyoona nanekoꞌe. Umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Numme owetuoosoo unu besa soonakasopedakwadoo.”
44017033	Umu-matu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane: ka mu tunehanedu-matu Dionysius mee naneadu, mogoꞌne Damaris mee naneadu yise huuꞌyootooe numu tunakaꞌoedyuku mane punnoꞌo. Soo Paul yise ka mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoona mea.
44018001	Ka saaꞌa soo Paul yise ka Athens-wiꞌyoona mease, ona ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi petuga.
44018002	Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana, Aquila mee naneadu Pontus-wiꞌyoona kemmana ooweoo nobe-gaꞌyoo. Ka tu nodukwa Priscilla mee naneadu-no ka Rome mee naneadu-kwi ka teepu Italy mee naneadu-wi uga nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Rome numu moohedu Claudius mee naneadu, ka mu Jew numu ka Rome-wikoo taꞌya. Mu Aquila tu nodukwa-no ka Corinth-wi pudu pepetuga. Soo Paul umu-baa nobe-gana,
44018003	umu-no ka tutzekadukupe matabuꞌe.
44018004	Ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeba oe maneyakwe, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petudyakwe, ka wakwawaꞌa noko soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe mu tunedyooꞌe.
44018005	Mu Silas-no Timothy Macedonia-wiꞌyoona memeakwate. Ka Corinth-wi pepetugase, soo Paul ka tu tutzekadukupe tu matabueyina maꞌwukase, ka mu Jew numu nonoꞌotsa tabeno mee mu tuukweyakwe, “Soo Jesus o Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe.”
44018006	Oꞌno yise mu Jew numu ka Te Naa noko ka Paul tumooꞌoo. Soo Paul ka umu suda manakwe mee soonammena, meeoo mu netamma, “Muusoo gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe. Gi nuga mane-kwi nu mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe unnena mu tooꞌe tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise nu mu tsasobedya nu nanesootuhibu mu wakwawaꞌa sukwe tunedyooꞌe.”
44018007	Ka mu Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona yise mease, oona sumuoo gi Jew numu-matu nana Titus Justus mee naneadu-baa tooi petuga. Esoo nana Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
44018008	Oo nobe oonahoo ka mu Jew nanesootuhidu moohedu Crispus mee naneadu noꞌoko ka tu nobe-kwitu-no Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku mane. Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Corinth-witu ka Paul naka, umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu manedu, baa-wi namatzaka.
44018009	Sumu togano soo Paul meeoo nose, soo Te Pabeꞌe-ga mee oo netamma, “Gi nu-kwitoo umu numu u tuukwe-ma suipana.
44018010	Nu yow u-notusoo ewaꞌyoo tuwazoo mu numu yaatuoo nuka sootogeꞌyookute. U yow nu-mama naduya manepunnedu. Gi haga u matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44018011	Sumu tomona naapahe muha, soo Paul ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mu tunedyooꞌe.
44018012	Soo nana, Gallio mee naneadu ka eweoo teepu Greece mee naneadu pudu nehanedu mane. Mu Jew numu nananemooedyugwese, ka Paul tumooꞌoo oo-ma tzakaduhoose, ka tunehanepe-kobena oo bi petuhoo.
44018013	Yise meeoo ka Gallio netamma, “Esoo nana ka mu numu atasoo tumayoho tuunguna gi numme tumayoho-waꞌne.”
44018014	Gisoo ka Paul yadooꞌa soo Gallio mee mu Jew numu netamma, “E nakapunne mu Jew numu. Oosoo Paul gi suda manakwe, nu gi mu nakabetseakwu.
44018015	Mu sukwe nanepetukute. Mumme tumayohope-wiꞌyoona muusoo sakwa oo nemadabuꞌe nu gi ooka mu nemadabueku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44018016	Noꞌoko yise ka tunehanepe-wikoo mu tayahoo.
44018017	Umu Jew numu yise ka pumme nanesootuhi moohedu Sosthenes mee naneadu ka tunehane nobe-kobenaꞌyoona unu mooedyugwe. Soo Gallio gi haꞌyoo mu netamma.
44018018	Wunaꞌme manepetuga soo Paul ka Corinth-wi. Saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona mea, mu Priscilla-no Aquila, ono mangeka ka teepu Syria-tamme. Ka Cenchrae mee naneadu-wi petugase, ka Te Naa tu nagena tzapoonnena tu tzopuhu tsekaꞌa.
44018019	Meadabena ka Ephesus mee naneadu-wi petuga, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi nobe-wi petugase, soo Paul ka mu Jew numu-no yadooakwuse, otuoo mu numu oesoo nenuummakute.
44018021	Soo Paul yise mee mu netamma, “Gi nu. Nu saaꞌa kodyu petudooa, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netamma.” Mu Priscilla-no Aquila oso mamani, puu suuꞌmu soo Paul ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona mea.
44018022	Ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi petugase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nanesootuhi. Oꞌnona meadabena ka Antioch-wi petuga.
44018023	O tooe huudooe tabemea, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa. Ooosapa meadabena ka mu teepu Galatia-no Phrygia mee naneadu-too meana, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa-witu tuukwe ooka mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwitoo mu nenoyukwe meꞌa.
44018024	Sumuꞌyoo Jew nana Alexandria-witoo nadooaꞌadoopu, Apollos mee naneadu, unu soonammena oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnena nabotuguna.
44018025	Oosoo Apollos mooasoo oo nakapana gisoo ka Te Naa po-witu natunedyooepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe po-witu mu tuukwekwuse sapa, ka John baa-wi numu matzakayina suuꞌmu oetu sopedakwadoona, ka Ephesus-wi petu.
44018026	Mu yadooekooha gi mu numu-ma suina, ka mu Jew nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona. Mu Priscilla-no Aquila oo nakase, oo-matoo kekemmase, ewasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu hemma oo tuukweꞌe.
44018027	Saaꞌa soo Apollos mee tusooyugwe, “Nu sakwa Greece-witoo natsemangega,” Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo oo netamma, “U oto mea.” Umu yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubose, mu tuukwe, “Soo Apollos unnena togesapa.” Soo Apollos ka o petugase, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu netummatzaꞌe. Soo Te Naa yise mu nakasootuhina,
44018028	ewow numu tzapoonnekute ka mu Jew unnena gi togekoo. Soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne soo Jesus togesapa Te Pabeꞌe mee oo nabotugu.
44019001	Soo Paul ka Apollos togesoo Corinth-wikoo sogo meadabenona ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwi petuga. Sumumano waha-ma tsebooekudu (12) naana o, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Soo Paul mu mayuse, mu tubenga, “Soo Te Naa haaꞌa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi, ka tunakaꞌoedyuku mu manese?” Umu meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Numme gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-witu nakadu.” Soo Paul tuwazoo meeoo mu tubenga, “Hownnekoo mu nasootuhise ka baa-wi namatzaka?” Umu meeoo oo tuukweꞌe, “Soo John oetu numu tuukweyina yise numu matzakayakwe oo numme yugweyakwe ka tunakaꞌoedyuku ne maneyakwe.” Soo Paul yise meeoo mu netamma, “Soo John baa-wi numu matzaka ka sutakoo podo mu meadabepu mu nematzakakwunise, yise ka Te Naa besa podo mu meadape. Meeoo soo John mu tuukwekwunaꞌe. ‘Sumuꞌyoo ka saaꞌa e-nakwi kemmadooa. Ooka sakwa mu nakaꞌoedyuku.’ Soo John netammana Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee naneꞌa.” Mu numu ka Paul unnena nakase, baa-wi namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Paul yise tu mi-ma mu wo-ma matuguyina, soo Te Naa yise tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhiyakwe. Umu yise nanakummaꞌakoosoo yadooa-ma apegeagonno, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma oo unnena wahakono.
44019008	Pahe muha-wi soo Paul mu Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooeyakwe ewa ka Te Naa besow po-witu mu tuukwena. Soo Paul gi umu-ma suaꞌe.
44019009	Susumudu mu Jew-matu tusoomatzooekuna gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, suda ka Te Naa-witu netamma ka numu ewa-kwiꞌyoona. Soo Paul yise umu punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-no ka Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona meꞌa.
44019010	Waha tommo petuga, umu ka nonoꞌotsa tabeno ka natunedyooe nobe Tyrannus mee naneadu-kwitoo numu tunedyooebodona. Paul ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena noꞌobatusoo numu modu tunedyooꞌe ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona.
44019011	Soo Te Naa yise ka Paul ewow Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma sootuhise oosoo yise ewahoo numu mabesaku.
44019012	Mu numu besa mayugweyakwe. Susumudu numu ka wanapu noko kwasu-matu natzakebooena ka Paul-makoo tuhanena, ka mu tuoegoedu-matu hemedyakwe. Mu tuoegoedu yise besa maneyakwe, mu tzoapugoedu punnoꞌo.
44019013	Susumudu Jew numu mu tsoapa madidu mana tooe manemoꞌo ka mu tsoapa tooꞌe nematzagakwunina. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-ma gi nasootuhipu, mu tsoapa sukwe tooꞌe tayakwunina ka Jesus nanea-ma. Umu meeoo ka tsoapa netammayakwe, “Nu u tayakwunaꞌe ka Paul ooosapa wahana ka Jesus nanea-ma.”
44019014	Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) nanakwanngaꞌamu ka Jew nanesootuhidu moohedu, Sceva mee naneadu dooamu, uga tsoapa nematzagakwunidu. Umu ka tsoapa tooꞌe nematzagakwuni,
44019015	pana soo tsoapa gi meꞌa, meeoo mu sukwe nanekwegea, “Nu ka Jesus sopedakwatoo, ka Paul tuwazoo. Mumme nu gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Hownneꞌyoo mu?”
44019016	Soo tsoapayaedu nana umu-koobatoo nadawunihoose, mu kwasu magebooekwunihoose, unu mu moomooedyugwese yise ka nobe-kwikoo mu matzayubahoo.
44019017	Noꞌyoona numu ka o nakase Te Pabeꞌe pooha nesookwugaꞌe, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha netamma.
44019018	Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka suda tu manena nanekwahamena.
44019019	Ka tu manepu mu numu uga poohadu ka sutakoo tu pooha pukwi nanabotuguna ka mu numu-kobena hane petuse mu tunaꞌe. Ooonnekoo mu tzapoonnemena ka suda tu manena maꞌwukwuse oo nemawunina. Ka oetu tu nasoohane-kwi mu manenaga sumuna tubetse ewa nanenaga.
44019020	Ka ꞌyoo tu namane-kwi soo Te Naa unnena umu-tamme nanakasopedakwadoo manekese, ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Naa unne-kwitu nakaꞌoedyuku manepetu.
44019021	Obenakwa, soo Paul meeoo soonamme, “Nu sakwa mana ka teepu Macedonia noko Greece-too mease, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwitoo. Onona yise ka Rome mee naneadu-kwitoo mea.”
44019022	Waahoo nanana pumme tummatzidu, Timothy-no Erastus mee nananeadu, mooe taya nakobenasoo Macedonia-witoo. Sagwane wunaꞌme o ka Asia mee naneadu teepu-kooba.
44019023	Ka gisoo Ephesus-wiꞌyoona oo meꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu Paul tuaganena ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu oo waha. Mu numu otuoo, gi Jew numu, Artemis mee naneadu numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwi soo Artemis namadabuꞌe Ephesus-wi.
44019024	Soo Demetrius mee naneadu ka esekweehepu-ma ka mu nanesootuhi nobe-kwaꞌne tutugutse tumadabuena ka umu pumme tummatzidu-no ewa oo-ma tumuꞌu. Mu numu yise tu nobe-kwi oo hanena oo-matoo nanesootuhi.
44019025	Noꞌoko pukwaꞌne tumadabuedu nesumuse, meeꞌe mu netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu tamme ꞌyoo te tumadabue-ma gwetzoi.
44019026	Esoo nana Paul yise ka mu numu meeoo netamma, ‘Gi ka numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhipana. Umu gi hee, gi toogoope-gaꞌyoo.’ Ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakabetseꞌa yow Ephesus-wi tuwazoo mana noꞌoko ka teepu Asia-kooba.
44019027	Ka saaꞌa mu numu gi te tumadabuena petzabekwu, tamme Artemis nanesootuhi nobe noko ka Artemis tuwazoo gi petzabekwu. Esoo Artemis paba nanenagadu pummatoo mu nanesootuhina noꞌyoona Asia-koobatu noko yise ka te teepu-koobakwitu.”
44019028	Umu ka ekow nakase, unu nakasagwaꞌe. Noꞌyoona yise waꞌagekoohase meeoo unnegonno, “Soo Artemis pummatoo ne nanesootuhina, Ephesus-wi naduyadu.”
44019029	Pudusoo numu noꞌoko ka ootuoo nakase, umu-baa manekakwu. Umu waahoo ka Paul pupuaꞌamu-ma tzakatu Gaius noko Aristarchus mee nananeadu ka Paul-no Macedonia-wiꞌyoona kekemmadu, yise pabow pukwikoo mu tunehaneyi-kwitoo mu bihooka.
44019030	Soo Paul oetoo tooꞌe nemeꞌa, ka mu numu ewa-kwikoo mu yadooekwu mee soonammena pana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oetuoo oo meakute.
44019031	Susumudu umu numu mooedu-matu Paul pupuaꞌamu mee oo tuyatuukweꞌe, “Gi ka mu tunehane-kwitoo meapana.”
44019032	Mu numu nanaꞌatasoo waꞌagemoꞌo ka gi oo sopedakwatoona ka pukwitu mu nanesumuna.
44019033	Sumuꞌyoo Jew, Alexander mee naneadu oe. Susumudu mu numu-matu ono apegea.
44019034	Mu numu ka oo Jew oo sopedakwatoo oosoo gi Artemis-matoo nanesootuhidu, umu yise pabasoo waꞌagekooha Atemis pummatoo ne nanesootuhina unu naduyadu. Ooosapa waꞌagegonno wunaꞌmetoo.
44019035	Mu tunehanedu tubowabe mu numu yadooena mee mu netamma, “E pupuaꞌamu, noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo tamme yow Ephesus-witu ka pabow Artemis nanesootuhi nobe mabetseadu. Tamme ka pooha tupe paꞌanakwana tamme-matoo wuepu hee-gaꞌyoo.
44019036	Noꞌyoona numu te sopedakwatoo, tamme togesapa ka Artemis-matoo nanesootuhidu.
44019037	Umu nanana mu bi petuna, gi hemma tuduha ka te nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu. Gi umu ena suda tuukwe, ka Artemis-witu.
44019038	Tamme tunehanewabe-gana tunehaneyakwe tuwazoo. Mu Demetrius umu punotu-no ka haꞌyoo numu soonetammana umu sakwa mu tunehane-witoo meeoo mu netamma.
44019039	Mu ka ewasoo haꞌyoo sooꞌunena mu sakwa tunehanepe-kwikoo nanemadabue.
44019040	Gi tamme haꞌyoo ka Roman numu-kooba katudu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, haꞌoo manena tamme yaa tabeno sumuꞌu. Umu sumuna mee te netamma ka te nanagoꞌe.
44019041	Mu sakwa noꞌyoona nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka.”
44020001	Ka saaꞌa hemma namamakwuse, soo Paul noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesumuse mu yadooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu-witu mu tuukwena. Yise ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona natzemangeka ka Macedonia mee naneadu teepu-witoo.
