44020002	Ka meadabena ewow tunakaꞌoedyukudu tunedyooemena ka Greece mee naneadu teepu-kooba petuga.
44020003	Pahe muha yise o. Syria-witoo natzemangekakwuse, ka mu Jew numu pumme batsayagate mu sopedakwatoona. “Nu sakwa kodyu Macedonia-too ka Jerusalem-witoo,” mee soo Paul tusooyugwe.
44020004	Ewaꞌyoo numu oo-no mea
44020005	Noꞌyoona mu naana ka natzemangekase, ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga. O ne wutooekwu. Nu Luke, yise Paul punnoꞌo.
44020006	Numme Philippi-wi gi namayudu tukaba mu ewa tukakwuse pepetuga. Numme yise umu-baaꞌyoona ka Philippi-wiꞌyoona memease natzemangekase, ka Troas mee naneadu-kwitoo. Manege tabe mease, numme ka umu-baa pepetuga ka Troas-wi. O numme sumu nasate.
44020007	Naapahe tu tabemeanoꞌo togano, numme nanano sumu nanesootuhina atsa baa hebena tukaba tukakwuse. Paul wunaꞌme mu yadooꞌe ka oogow moooꞌa Troas-wiꞌyoona meakwuse.
44020008	Togabeno maneka numme ka nobe-kwikoo ewa tugootabuekuna. Pahe nana-kooba aatadu nobe-wiꞌyoona, ka numu sumu-koobatu-wi numme.
44020009	Sumuꞌyoo tooebetse Eutychus mee naneadu ka naboonneꞌe natsatawaga-wi katu. Unu uwegapana ka Paul unnena naka katu. Uꞌweoogase, yise ka naboonneꞌe natsatawaga-wiꞌyoona wuehoo. Mooasoo oo yaꞌehoose umu oo tooꞌe tsagwuuhoo.
44020010	Soo Paul umu-matoo wuegase, ka oo-koobakwi habehoose oo hedapunnese oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo tzakodyuhoo mu numu yise meeoo netammadooa, “Gi suda sokwamapana. Mooasoo nu a nemagwetzoihoo.”
44020011	Oobe paꞌatusoo meaꞌase, umu noꞌyoona nanesootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe pumme tunetammapu mayoho. Soo Paul yise ka tu tabatsebooe-witoo tooe mu yadooꞌe. Soo Paul mu yadooemakwuse mea.
44020012	Umu ka tooebetse gwetzoihoodu tu nobe-witoo bikase, yise unu besa sokwama.
44020013	Ka Jerusalem-tamme numme meana ka Ephesus tzageꞌetoo natzemangeka. Soo Paul oto sogo meakwu mee unnega.
44020014	Assos-wiꞌyoona numme-baa sake-wi tsebooese, noꞌyoona numme natsemangega ka Mitylene-witoo.
44020015	Oogow moooꞌa numme tuwazoo natsemangega ka tuutse pagadudu ooenapatoo Chios mee naneadu-witoo. Oogow moooꞌa tuwazoo numme yise ka Samos mee naneadu-witoo. Oogow moooꞌa tuwazoo numme yise ka Miletus mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
44020016	Jerusalem-witu mu ewa tuka tzageꞌe manegena umu ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌena ka tu tumasuana besa suꞌa. Oꞌno petugakwu mee soo Paul soonammena, ka Ephesus ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-wi gi yoowaꞌe.
44020017	Soo Paul ka Miletus-wi petugase Ephesus-witoo sumuoo taya mu wakwaꞌetse-matoo, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu Ephesus-wi nobe-gaꞌyoo nabatoo mu bi tuunguna.
44020018	Ka pu-baa mu petuse, meeoo mu netamma. “Mu e sopedakwatoo, nu ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meadape. Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona yaa Asia teepu-koobaꞌyoona.
44020019	Nu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌa, ‘Nu mu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo,’ mee gi soonammena. Nu yagana ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute. Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa suta-kwi ka mu Jew nuka tumooꞌoo.
44020020	Nu gi suina noꞌoko hemma mu tuukweꞌe mumme tummatzi-waꞌnekoo tooe haga tooe-kobenaꞌyoona mu nobe-kwitu tuwazoo.
44020021	Nu mu Jew noko mu wakwawaꞌa meeoo netamma ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase ka Te Naa besa podo mea. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
44020022	Menoꞌo yise soo e pooha meeꞌe e netamma, ‘Jerusalem-witoo mea,’ pana nu gi oo sopedakwatoo how hemma manekwuna ka onona.
44020023	Eka suuꞌmu nu sopedakwatoo noꞌoko Te Naa Besa Pooha mee e tuukweyakwe nu nakwutumakwu yise ewa suda namanedu nu-tamme kemmakwu.
44020024	Pana gi hownneꞌyoo. Oosoo gi hee. Nu gi nuusoo namabetsea, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka netamma mamakwukwu. Noꞌoko numu nu ka besa naꞌunnedu tuukwekwu. Oosoo te magwetzoaꞌe ka te soobedyana.”
44020025	Soo Paul meeoo tuwazoo mu netamma, “Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu ka Te Naa besa podo a nameadabena. Menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwatoo mu gi ka teepu-koobakoosoo e poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44020026	Nu gi suina noꞌoko mu tuukwe ka Te Naa manekwuna. Gi nuga manena mu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, ka yaꞌese, gi Te Naa-matoo mease.
44020028	Muusoo noꞌyoona nanamabetseana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu mabetsea tuungu ka umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu-nokosoo. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu mu mayugwe ka Te Pabeꞌe mu-koobatoo nabatsase.
44020029	Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka e mease, saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo etzaꞌa mu-baa petuse mu tooꞌe nemooagana tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu netammakwu. Ewow sumuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo mayugwekwu.
44020030	Mu-matu sumuna ka etzaꞌa podo manese, umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu esayikuna tooe haꞌyoo tooe mu tuukwena, umu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooꞌe neꞌemukwakuna.
44020031	Unu besa sapa, nu pahe tommoka ooosapa ka Te Naa-witu meeoo mu tooꞌe tuukwegena ka mu-koobatoo tutuha nasooyugwena.
44020032	Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Naa mumme sootuhi tuungu oo unnepu-noko ka numu oo sootuhina unu tunakaꞌoedyuku mu mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo ka umu tu besa podo meadabedu-nokosoo.
44020033	Nu gi mu-makoo hemma soogwaꞌe.
44020034	Mu, mooasoo e sopedakwatoo, nuusoo e tukapu noko pukwi e kwasuena tumuꞌu umu nu-notu punnoꞌo ooosoo.
44020035	Mu e manena poonne ka mu tutuha manedu e tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo. Mu oo soomaꞌyu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mee netamma, ‘Tamme besa nasootuhikwu ka kummaꞌakoosoo hemma numu tummatzina gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu-makoo hemma sookwipunnena.’ “
44020036	Soo Paul yise ka tunemamakwuse, meatzedose, nanesootuhikooha.
44020037	Noꞌyoona umu oo-baatu sukwina oo hedana oo mootuhina ka oo tubetse meakwuse.
44020038	Umu suda sokwama ka meeoo pumme oo netamma, “Nu gi hannanoꞌo mu-baasoo kodyu petu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu yise ka sake-witoo o-no mea pana, gi o-no oe kuꞌa.
44021001	Numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona mea. Numme Jerusalem-tamme natzemangeka
44021004	Numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu onoko mayuse umu-baa naapahe tooipunne. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi umu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Gi Jerusalem-witoo meapana.” Pana oosoo gi mu nakabetsea.
44021005	Ka ne mea-kwi oo manepetugase numme ka sake-witoo mea. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme-no ne takwunikakwuse: nanana, momokoꞌne, tu doodooamano. Numme oona pakumaba petugase, meatzedose, nanesootuhaꞌe.
44021006	Numme mu maꞌwukase ka sake-wi tzoonooaka, umu yise nobe-kwitoo kodyu.
44021007	Meadabena numme ka Ptolemais mee naneadu-kwi petuga. O numme mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nobeꞌnge umu-baa numme tooi.
44021008	Ooga moooꞌa numme mea ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo. Philip mee naneadu mu nanesootuhidu tunedyooedu o nobe-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo umu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo-matu (7) a nanetutzeana ka mu gi koomamu-gakoo pepeawabe mabetseadu.
44021009	Oosoo watsukweoo tsutsuꞌa padumu-gaꞌyoo ka hemma manekwuna numu tuukwedu. Umu-baa numme.
44021010	Huuꞌoo tooise, sumuꞌyoo nana Agabus mee naneadu o petu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmadu. Oosoo punnoꞌo umu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo ka hemma how manekwuna numu tuukweyakwe.
44021011	Oosoo numme-baa petu. Oona ka Paul nate natuku oo gwuuꞌhoo. Ka nate-ma tu mi noko tu kuku namatzakunase, meeoo ne netamma, “Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo soo numu eka nate hee-gaꞌyoo mu Jew Jerusalem-witu yooonnekoo oo tzakunakwu. Oo oo yugwese umu ka mu wakwawaꞌa moohedu oo tzageakwu.”
44021012	Numme ka o nakase, numme ka mu numu-no ka Paul tooꞌe nenuumakute, “Gi Jerusalem-witoo meapana,” meeoo oo netammana.
44021013	Soo Paul mee ne sukwe netamma, “Gi sukwipana mu suda e nesoonnumme. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe e tzakunapana. E batsase sapa gi hownneꞌyoo.”
44021014	Soo Paul gi ne nakabetseꞌa. Numme oo nemaꞌwuse gi hayoosoo ooetuooo netamma. Nummesoo meeoo nananetamma, “Oo-toogoo manekwu.”
44021015	Oꞌno yise numme namahanese ka Jerusalem-witoo mea.
44021016	Susumudu Caesarea-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme-no mease oona Mnason nobe-kwitoo ne bikea. O yise numme tooikwu.
44021017	Numme Jerusalem-wi petuga, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa numme-matoo sokwama ka pu-baa ne petugase.
44021018	Oogow moooꞌa soo Paul numme-no mea ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu, James mee naneadu-no ne apegeakwuse. Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu oe.
44021019	Soo Paul noꞌoko tu nummepu-witu mu tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa mu wakwawaꞌa sootuhi ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute ka nuga unne-wi.”
44021020	Ookow nakase, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu noꞌyoona ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe mee unnena, “Te Naa besaꞌyoona numu nakasootuhiyakwe ka mu wakwawaꞌa besa tu sootuhi-kwaꞌne.” Oꞌno yise ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Yow tamme-nagatu mu Jew numu tumayoho-kwi umu tooesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
44021021	Ewaꞌyoo numu u-kwitu naka u ka mu Jew numu mu wakwawaꞌa-nagatu mee netamma, ‘Gi ka Jew tumayohona mayohopana,’ meeoo u-kwitu tu nanaꞌesagoena numme naka.
44021022	Umu ka u petuse oo naka.
44021023	U sakwa ka te tumayohona besa oo-toogoo a nameana mu tzapoonneku. Watsukweꞌyoo naana numme-notu ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, ‘Numme mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohokwu.’
44021024	U sakwa namahanese umu-no mease, oetoo mu natunekwina tumanaka. Oꞌno yise ka mu tumamakwuse, mu tzopuhu noꞌoko wutseba. U ka oo manena noꞌyoona numu u sopedakwadookwu ka te tumayohona u mayohose.
44021025	Gi hownneꞌyoo mu wakwawaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi mayohona. Mooasoo numme umu wakwawaꞌa-matoo tubopu mee naꞌunnedu, ‘Gi hownneꞌyoo mu ka Jew tumayohona gi mayohona. Yoo sakwa mu sukwe mane. Gi ka numu tumadabuena pumatoo mu nanesootuhina nabeamakapu tukapana, puu-gakoo a tookoo tuwazoo. Gi nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu aahe pootammapana.’ “
44021026	Ookow moooꞌa soo Paul namahanese, ka mu watsukwuoo nanana-no, yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-witoo meaꞌa. Meeoo mu tuukwena, “Pudusoo tamme Jew tumayohope namamakwuse noꞌyoona ka Te Naa hemma nabeamakakwu.”
44021027	Sumu nasateka mu Jew numu putoogoo ka tu nanesootuhina mu mayohokwuse. Mooasoo oo namamakwugaꞌa, mu Jew numu Asia-witu kemmana, ka Paul wohonedu, ka Paul poonne oona ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo. Umu oo-ma tzakaduse, papaba apegeakooha,
44021028	ka mu ewow numu oetu meeoo netammabodote, “Ne nanumu, yabe ne tummatzi. Yaaꞌa esoo sutaꞌyoo nana, ka mana tooe hano tooe numu tunedyooena tamme numu nekwohonena, te tumayohona tumooꞌoodu, ka te nanesootuhi nobe nokosoo. Menoꞌo yise masoo te nanesootuhi nobe totsakute ka mu wakwawaꞌa, gi Jew numu, eka te pooha nobe-wi bi petuse.”
44021029	Umudoo ka Paul nesootzemana ka sumuoo wawaꞌa
44021030	Ewaꞌyoo mu numu Jerusalem-witu sumukooha, ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo puuwanatoo ka Paul tzabewoꞌyowkase, ka natzakwonaꞌa tzadumow.
44021031	Umu yise oo tooꞌe batsowkwu. Oꞌno yise mu Roman tukwutumadu pabeꞌe oo nakahoo ka namaniwunudu.
44021032	Mu tukwutumadu ka mu numu sumu-kwitoo tatanomanega. Mu numu ka putamme mu tatanomanegena mu poonnese, ka Paul tu yugwegonnona maꞌwuhoo.
44021033	Mu tukwutumadu ka Paul-baa petugonnose, oo mi-ma tzakadu yise waahoo tukwutumadu naamookwi namaꞌwetzogoeyakuhoo. Mu moohedu meeoo yise mu numu tubenga, “Haga esoo nana? How suda esoo manakwe?”
44021034	Mu numu nanaꞌatasoo unnegonno soo tukwutumadu moohedu gi mu nakasopedakwatoo. Soo mu moohedu ka mu tukwutumadu yise meeoo netamma, “Oona tamme pukwiꞌyookwitu a bihooka.”
44021035	Yise ka a natupoyano-wi petuhoose, mu tukwutumadu oo tokwuhooka ka mu numu ewana unu sutagonno.
44021036	Umu mu-nakwi ooosapa mu nagenoꞌo, “A batsa,” mee unnena.
44021037	Ka nobe-kobena oo natzakwona-wi petuhoogase, mu Greek yadooa-ma soo Paul ka tukwutumadu moohedu mee netamma, “Nu sakwa u-no yadooa.” Soo mu moohedu oo nekwegea, “U tzakadoo Greek-ma mesoo yadooꞌa?
44021038	U haaꞌa oosoo nana Egypt-witu kemmana ka pudu oosoo nana tutzanagoekuse, yise ewa (4000) naana mu tugoedu-nagatu ka giba-matoo bika?”
44021039	Soo Paul meeoo oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi. Nu Jew numu. Nu ka Tarsus mee naneadu-wi numu-baa nabotugu
44021040	“Unudea,” mee soo tukwutumadu moohedu oo nemaꞌe. Ka paꞌa tu natupoyano-wi soo Paul wunuse, mayodahoo, mu numu yise gi tunemayuhoo, ka mu Jew numu yadooa-masoo mu numu yadooekooha.
44022001	“E nanumu, e nakapunne. Nu gi hannanoꞌo suda tumadugupu.”
44022002	Mu numu ka pummesoo yadooa-ma ka Paul Jew-ma yadooakoohase, gi tunemayuhoo.
44022003	Soo Paul meeoo mu numu netamma, “Nu yow tubetse Jew. Nu ka Tarsus-witoo
44022004	Nu uga umu Te Pabeꞌe podo meadu tumooꞌoo. Nu yise mu naana noko momokoꞌne umu-nagatu wutumetayakwe, susumudu nu goꞌe.
44022005	Mu Jew numu tutunehanewabe noꞌyoona oo sopedakwatoo e unnena togesapa. Tubope e geana ka mu Jew numu moohedu tuukwena ka mu Jew numu Damascus-witu nuka tummatzi tuunguna. Numme e pupuaꞌamu-no ka Damascus-witoo meaꞌa, ka mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu Damascus-witu yaa Jerusalem-witoo hane petuse ka mu wutumetakwuse.
44022006	Oona tabeno-nakwa ka Damascus tzageꞌe ne kemma hee sapaga tukwukwutsebu-waꞌneꞌyoo besa kootabuadu paꞌanakwana
44022007	e wunapow. Nu nuka tu yadooese oo nakahoo, ‘U yow ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.’
44022008	Nu oo tubenga, ‘Haga u?’ Mee yise e netamma, ‘Nu mu Pabeꞌe Jesus
44022009	Umu e pupuaꞌamu nu-notu ka kootabuatu poonne pana gi Te Pabeꞌe unnena naka.
44022010	Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, ‘Haꞌoo yise nu manekwu?’ Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netamma, ‘Yotsese, ka Damascus-witoo mea. Ka o u petugase, u manekwuna u natuukwedooa.’
44022011	Nu ka kootapuape-ma kootupooseyaꞌehoo. Umu e pupuaꞌamu yise ka Damascus-witoo e tzakaka.
44022012	Sumuꞌyoo nana, ka te Jew tumayohope besa mayohodu Ananias mee naneadu oonow. Mu Jew numu oonow nobe-gaꞌyoo mee sokwama, ‘Soo Ananias besaꞌyoo nana.’
44022013	Ka saaꞌa soo Ananias nu-baa petuoo, wunupunnese, mee e netamma, ‘Besa manese, mitu poonne.’ Nu yabetse esoo mitu pooꞌnese oo pooꞌne.
44022014	Mee yise e netamma, ‘Soo Te Naa te nanamooatupu pummatoo nanesootuhina ume netutzea. U sakwa Te Naa unnetoo mane ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnese oo unnena nakaꞌoedyuku.
44022015	U sakwa oo waha u pooha poonnena, u pooha nakana tuwazoo. Noꞌobatoosoo numu sakwa u tuukwe.
44022016	Nu baa-wi u matzakakwu. U ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo nanesootuhina, soo Te Pabeꞌe suda u tumaduguna u-makoo namatzakakwunikwu. Oꞌno yise u besa nuummakwu.’
44022017	Ka saaꞌa nu Jerusalem-witoo kodyukase, nu nanesootuhina, ka tammesoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona, nu meeoo tuusoobedya.
44022018	E tuusoobedya-kwi Te Pabeꞌe nu-kumaba wunuse meeoo e netamma, ‘Yabe sapa Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona meahoo. Mu Jew numu gi u nakaꞌoedyuku-waꞌneꞌyoo tooꞌe nu-kwitu besa u wahasapa.’
44022019	Nu meeoo unakwe, ‘Umu sumuna e nakapunnekwu ka puusoo oo sopedakwatoona, nu uga umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka ne tunehanedu-kobenaꞌyoona kusekana, mu wutumeta.
44022020	Nu, oꞌno o ka mu Jew numu ka Stephen tupe-ma natatzagaze, o wununa nu mu tummatzaꞌe, ka mu wunagapu hemapunnena.’
44022021	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mee e netamma, ‘U sakwa mea. Nu oona kwingaꞌatoo mu wakwawaꞌa-matoo u tayakwu,’ “ meeꞌe soo Paul nanekwaha.
44022022	Mu numu oo nakapunne ka “Wakwawaꞌa,” meesoo unnese, oo sopedakwatoose ka puu gi mu wakwawaꞌa petzabena umu yise paba mee unnegonno, “A batsa. Masoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, gi numme-waꞌne.”
44022023	Umu waꞌagena tu kwasu tzakebuekwunina toogoo-baa koosebu tapebuꞌagonno, ka oo manena, “Sutaꞌyoo numu,” mee ka Paul netammana.
44022024	Ewatse suda mu unnegonno soo mu Roman tukwutumadu pabeꞌe umu tu tukwutumawabe ka Paul ka tukwutumadu nobe-kwitoo bigase ooka mu wupageta tuungu. Soo mu moohedu ka Paul meeoo soobedyana oosoo sakwa sumuna pumme tu wupagetase, ka suda tu manena waha.
44022025	Ka pummetu tzakunayakwe soo Paul ka tukwutumawabe moohedu putsageꞌe wunudu meeoo netamma, “Nu yaahoo Roman numu ooonneꞌyoona ka gisoo e nanehane, u gi e wupageta-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme Roman numu gi yoo nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo tamme tumayohope o.”
44022026	Soo tukwutumawabe ka oo nakase meahoo ka pumme moohedu-matoosoo mease, meeoo oo netamma, “Tamme suda manakwe ka ekow nana wupagetakwuse. Esoo tookwa yise tamme Roman numu-matu.”
44022027	Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu ka Paul-baa petuse, meeoo oo tubenga, “U haaꞌa togesapa numme Roman numu-matu?” “Aha,” mee soo Paul.
44022028	Soo mu tukwutumadu moohedu mee unakwe, “Nu Roman numu namayugwepu, nu ewa oo e mane-kwi tumanagapu.” Soo Paul yise meeoo, “Nu yow ooosapa tubetse Roman numu.”
44022029	Ooka pumma tu wupagetakwuna hemana yabesoo umu oo tzamaꞌwuhoo soo umu moohedu punnoꞌo unu suaꞌe, oosoo oo sopedakwatoo ka Paul Roman numu manepunnena, umuoo sakwa uga gi oo tzakunapana.
44022030	Oogow moooꞌa soo tukwutumadu moohedu mee soonamme, “Hekwi mu Jew numu ka Paul oo yugwe?” Ka Paul nabatoo mu bi tuungu ka tukwutuma nobe-wikoo, yise ka mu Jew tunehanedu nesumudoose, ka Paul umu-kobena bi petu.
44023001	Soo Paul gi umu-ma suina mu tunehanedu poonnese, mu mesoo yadooe, meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, nu ka ooosapa kaaheno tumadugunona oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo e sopedakwatoo.”
44023002	Oꞌno soo Jew numu tubetse moohedu Ananias mee naneadu ka Paul tzageꞌe konnodu-matu ka Paul kobikoo oo matake tuungu.
44023003	Soo Paul meeoo ka Ananias netamma, “Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ume ooosoo yugwekwu. U gi besaꞌyoo pana u nasookwatsetuguna, besa nasooyugwe. U gi besa numu matugudu. U gi besaꞌyoo te tumayohope-toohakwi ka e nemadunagana tooe uusoo punnoꞌo gi oo-toogoo tumayohopana meeoohoo. U sakwa uga umu gi e matake tuungupana.”
44023004	Mu numu oo konnopunnedu ka Paul meeoo netamma, “U suda unakwe. U uga gi ka mu numu tubetse moohedu meeoo yadooe-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa oo netutzeapu.”
44023005	Soo Paul mu nekwegea, “Oosoo haaꞌa numu-kooba manepunnedu? Meeoo ooetuooo nabotuku, ‘Gi ka mumme moohedu suda netammapana.’ “
44023006	Soo Paul oo sopedakwatoo ka mu tutunehanedu puu nanakuma-matoosoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu nananesootuhidu Sadducee mee nananeadu-matu. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu tu nadyaꞌe-wiꞌyoona yotsekwuna, yise mu toha kakasa-gakoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu, mu tsoapa-witu tuwazoo. Susumudu umu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu yaꞌese mu yotsese, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tuwazoo ka tsoapa-nokosoo. Soo Paul yise mu tunehanedu yadooe, “Nu yow tubetse Pharisee nanesootuhidu. E naa punnoꞌo ooosoo. Ooonneꞌyoona umu e tumooꞌoogena, nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka numu tu yaꞌe-wiꞌyoona mu yotsena.”
44023009	Mu tunehanedu puusoo nanano nanepetukukooha. Wahaba manese apekeagonno. Umu Pharisee-matu Paul-witu mee netamma, “Esoo Paul gi suda manakwe. Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo sumuna tooe hemma tooe oo tuukwepu, tooetoo poohabe sumuna.”
44023010	Umu tunehanedu papabatse nanepetukukooha. Soo tukwutumadu moohedu unu suaꞌe. Umu sakwa sumuna ka Paul unu maꞌe, mee soonammena. Umu tu tukwutumawabe meeoo netamma, “Oo bihooga oona te nobe-witoo.”
44023011	Oogow togano soo Paul meeoo nose. Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo-baa petuse meeoo oo netamma, “Gi numu-ma suipana. U mooasoo Jerusalem-wi nu-witu wahapu. Saaꞌa tuwow u Rome-wi nu-witu wahadooa.”
44023012	Oogow moooꞌa mu Jew nanana (40) nanano meeoo tunetamma, “Numme gi tukana, gi too baa hebekwu, ka Paul nabatsanoꞌotootooe.”
44023014	Umu ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu-baa petuse, mee mu netamma, “Numme meeoo tubetse unakwe. Numme gi tukana, gi baa hebekoo, ka Paul nabatsa-kwitoo tooe.”
44023015	Mu tunehanedu mu tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Numme ewasoo ka Paul hemma tubenga penaꞌe. Ka tunehanepe-witoo ka Paul bihooka. Numme namamakwupunnekwu, gisoo ka Paul tunehane-kwi nabi petu numme oo batsowkwu.”
44023016	Soo Paul nanakwu mu naka ka mu unnena. Soo oo nanakwa yise ka mu tukwutumadu nobe-wi petugase, ka Paul-no yadooꞌa.
44023017	Soo Paul ka mu tukwutumadu moohedu meeoo netamma, “Ka tooebetse bihooka ka mumme moohedu-matoo. Esoo hemma oo watze tuukwekwu.”
44023018	Soo tukwutumadu moohedu ka tooebetse bihookase, ka pumme moohedu-matu yise mee oo tuukwe, “Soo nakwutumadu Paul mee naneadu u-matoo ka tooebetse e bi tuungu. Esoo hemma u watze tuukwekwu.”
44023019	Soo tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu ka tooebetse tzakowka numu-wanatoo, yise oo watze tubenga, “Hayoo u e tuukwekwuse?”
44023020	Soo tooebetse oo nanekwegea, “Mu Jew numu watze tunehane. Moooꞌa saaꞌa u ka Paul mu tunehanedu-matoo bikadooa. Umu meeoo u netammakwu, ‘Numme ka Paul ewasoo nakwitu tubengakwu.’
44023021	U sakwa gi mu nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewaꞌyoo (40) mu Jew nanana gi tukana, gi hepe, ka Paul tu batsakwu-kwitoo tooe. Umu ka Paul watse hoawina, ka oo patsakwuse. Ume unnena umu menoꞌo wutooepunne.”
44023022	Mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu ka tooebetse meeoo netamma, “Gi haka tuukwepana ka nuka u tuukwepu. U sakwa menoꞌo mea.”
44023023	Soo mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu waahoo tu tukwutumadu moohedu nabatoo mu bi tuungu. Ka pu-baa mu pepetuhoose, soo tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu meeoo mu netamma, “Ewatsekoo (470) tukwutumadu
44023025	Soo Claudius Lysias ka te moohedu Felix-matoo tubohoo mee naꞌunnedu.
44023027	“Yaa esoo nana, Paul mee naneadu, mu Jew numu mamatzakaduse, a tooꞌe batsowkwu. Nu ka a Roman numu a sopedakwadoose numme umu tukwutumudu-no a magwetzoi.
44023028	Saaꞌa nu a bikadooa ka mu Jew numu tunehanedu-matoo, ‘How manena umu meeoo a netamma?’ meeꞌe nu soonammena.
44023029	Gi hekwi tookwa umu meeoo a netamma, a nebatsana. Gi tookwa esoo pumme wutuma-waꞌne. Ka tu tumayohope gi a tumayoho-kwi mee a netamma.
44023030	Nu meeoo natuukweoo susumudu Jew numu ka Paul batsayagate mee. Ooonneꞌyoona nu yabesoo u-matoo a taꞌya. Nu too u-matu ka umu Paul tuaganedu taꞌyakwu tuwazoo. Ume-kobenaꞌyoona sakwa umu meeoo a netamma,” meeꞌe soo tukwutumadu pabeꞌe tuboꞌo.
44023031	Umu tukwutumadu togawano meadabese, ka Paul Antipatris-wi bi petuga.
44023032	Oogow moooꞌa mu sogo meadu tukwutumadu punowsoo kodyuka tu nobe-kwitoo. Mu tukwutumadu poopookoo-gaꞌyoo ka Paul-nosoo meadabe ka Caesarea mee naneadu-kwitoo.
44023033	Ka oonow petugase, ka Paul ooka Felix-matoo bika, yise ka tubope oo gea.
44023034	Soo Felix ka tubope neahoose, ka Paul yise meeoo tubenga, “Hanotu teepu-koobatoo u nadooaꞌadoopu?” “Ka teepu Cilicia mee naneadu-koobatoo nu,” meeꞌe soo Paul.
44023035	Soo Felix yise meeoo oo netamma, “Ka mu numu ume tuaganedu petuse, nu saaꞌa u nehanedooa.” Felix ka mu tukwutumadu yise ka Paul wutuma tuungu pabatsekoo nobe-kwi, oꞌnosoo uga ka numu moohedu Herod mee naneadu nobe-wi.
44024001	Ka saaꞌa huu oo tabe mease, soo mu Jew numu tubetse moohedu Ananias mee naneadu, susumudu mu Jew numu moohedu-no ka pukoobatoo yadooadu Tertullus mee naneadu-no petugonno. Ka Felix-kobena oo bi petuse ka Paul tubetse suda nemadabuꞌe.
44024002	Ka Paul Felix-kobena bi petuse soo Tertullus meeoo ka Felix netammakooha, “U numme Jew numu unu besa masokwama ka numu nehane manese. U ka besow gwetzoibu ne tummatzaꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi. Numme u netubetseayikwu ka yoo u mane-kwi.
44024004	Numme gi u nematzaꞌmakwu. Gi haaꞌnotseꞌe ne nakapunne, numme eka Paul-witu yabesoo u tuukweoo. Esoo Paul suda tuneyugwedu, numme Jew noko mu Roman numu tsanagoekuna noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi. Esoo nana Paul ka nanesootuhibu-wi mu moohedu ka Nazarene mee nananeadu-matu.
44024006	Ka ne nanesootuhi nobe suda tooꞌe maꞌe, numme yise mamatsakatu.
44024008	U sakwa uusoo oo tubenga, oꞌno yise u ume ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
44024009	Noꞌyoona mu Jew numu moohedu yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo numme-koobatoo yadooadu togesapa yadooꞌa.”
44024010	Soo Felix ka Paul tu mi-ma matuukwe ka oo yadooa tuunguna. Oꞌno yise soo Paul meeoo oo netamma, “Ewasoo tommokapu u numu nehanena nu u sopedakwatoo. Nu nuusoo nakwitu u mesoo tuukwe, oꞌno yise u e unnekwuna nakasopedakwadookwu.
44024011	U oo sopedakwadookwu ka sumumano wahama tsebooekudu (12) tabe meapu, nu ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona nanesootuhidyina.
44024012	Mu numu nuka tuakanedu ka nanesootuhi nobe-wikoo e mayu. Nu gi mu numu nesumuna, gi numu-no nanepetukute. Nu yise gi mu numu ka nanesootuhi nobe-wiꞌyoona tsanagoekute, gi tuwazoo ka Jerusalem-wiꞌyoona.
44024013	Soo umu unnena gi tookoope-gaꞌyoo umu ka esagoena.
44024014	Nu yise meeoo unnekwu nu ka Jesus podo meꞌa, kummasoo nanesootuhidu mee umu e netamma, pana nu gi ooohoo. Nu togesoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka te nanamooatupu nanesootuhiputoo meꞌa. Yise nu noꞌoko ne tumayohope tumayohoku meꞌa, ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa-witu nabotugutoo.
44024015	Nu umu-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa mu bebesow tuipu numu mayodakwu pana mu susutakoo soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
44024016	Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa besaꞌyoona o sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo, mu numu punnoꞌo.
44024017	Wunaꞌme nu mana nummennumme nanesootuhina, yaa yise nu nugasoo teepu-wi pudu kodyu petu. Ewa nu natumasumudookuse ka mu tutuha manedu e nanumu nu haneku petu. Nu ka nanesootuhipe-kwitoo tuwuniyakwe ka mu Jew numu tumayoho-kwaꞌne.
44024018	Mu Jew e mayuhoo, tu nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo, nu ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mayohokwuse. Nu gi haga wawaꞌa-no. Nu tuwazoo gi tutsanagoekute.
44024019	Susumudu Jew numu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona kemmadu oe. Umuoo nu-ma tzakadu. Umuoo sakwa menoꞌo yownona, oetu waha ka how suda e tumadugu.
44024020	Umu Jew numu nehanedu menoꞌo yaatoo sakwa oo waha ka suda e manena sopedakwatoona. Umu oho ka mu Jew tunehanedu-kobena e nanekwunukuse.
44024021	Nuuga sumuna suda manakwe ka umu-nagaꞌyoona paba meeoo unnewununa, ‘Nu nanehane mu-kobenaꞌyoona ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa ka tuipu numu matuusootabueyakwe.’ “
44024022	Mooasoo soo Felix ka Te Pabeꞌe po-witu sopedakwatoo. Ka tunehanepe neyooikuhoose mee mu netammana, “Ka mu tukwutumadu tubetse moohedu, Lysias mee naneadu, petuse, nu saaꞌa u nemamakwudooa.”
44024023	Ka tukwutumadu moohedu Paul-kooba tueyaꞌe tuungu. Tu soomane-kwaꞌnesoo ka oeꞌyoona masoo mesoo manakwe. Umu a pupuaꞌamu punnoꞌo a mesoo mabetseꞌa
44024024	Huuoo tabe mease, soo Felix tu nodukwa ka Paul-witoo taya oo-no yadooakwuse. Umu ka Paul nakapunne ka tu tunakaꞌoedyuku-witu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oo waha.
44024025	Soo Paul yise meeoo mu tuukwe, “Mu sakwa uga besaꞌyoo, ka gi kummaꞌamasoo emukwana, ka nanodukwana. Soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.” Soo Felix nakasuꞌise yise meeoo oo netamma, “Menoꞌo sakwa u ka tukwutuma nobe-witoosoo namakodyuku. Nu saaꞌa u bidooa.”
44024026	Soo Felix meeoo soonamme, “Soo Paul hemma e geakwu ka pumme e tzamaꞌwuse,” pana soo Paul gi oo manakwe. Ooosapa ka Paul-witoo tutayayakwe ka oo-no yadooayina.
44024027	Soo Felix gi ka Paul tzamaꞌwu, ka mu Jew numu matubetseana, waha tomoka kummaꞌyoosoo nana, Porcius Festus mee naneadu, nanetutzease ka teepu-kooba numu moohedu Felix kapi mani.
44025001	Soo Festus ka Caesarea-wi petuga, ka teepu-kooba numu moohedu manese. Ka saaꞌa pahe tabe mease, ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witoo mea.
44025002	Ka petugase, mu Jew tunehanedu oo-no yadooꞌa ka Paul netumooꞌoona.
44025003	Meeoo oo tubetse netamma, “Ka Paul Jerusalem-witoo ne tayaku.” Ka tooesoo oo kemma umu oo watse batsakwuse.
44025004	Pana soo Festus meeoo unakwe, “Pudusoo nu kodyukakwu Caesarea-witoo. Soo Paul togesoo oonow nakwutuma.
44025005	Umu mumme moohedu-matu sakwa nu-no mea. Onona umu ka Paul syda nabeoy wagadiia,”
44025006	“Soo Festus umu-baasoo namewatsu (8) tooetoo sumumano (10) tabe mea ka Caesarea-wisoo kodyu petuse. Oogow moooꞌa yise tunehane. Ka Paul nakobenatoo mu bi tuungu.
44025007	Ka Paul petuoose,mu Jew numu moohedu Jerusalem-witu mee unnekooha. “Ewa masoo suda tumayugwepu.” Gi hownnekoo umu kaaheno oo waha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka oo oo manakwe.
44025008	Soo Paul ka Festus meeoo netamma, “Nu ka Jew tumayohope, noꞌoko ka ne nanesootuhina gi netumooꞌoodu, ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu tuwazoo.”
44025009	Soo Festus ka mu Jew numu moohedu sootupuaꞌapunnena hemma too besa umu-nakwana tusookwipunnena ooonneꞌyoona ka Paul meeoo netamma, “U sakwa Jerusalem-witoo mea. Onona sakwa tuwazoo u nanehane.”
44025010	Soo Paul oo nekwegea, “Menoꞌo nu yow mu Roman numu tunehane-kwi. Yaanonasoo sakwa nu nanemamakwu. U oo tubetse sopedakwatoo nu gi ka mu Jew numu suda tumadugudu.
44025011	Nu sakwa uga ka sutaꞌyoona, ka hemma haꞌoo suda yugwese, oetoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoo, u sakwa yise e batsa. Pana nu gi e nabatsakwuna namameꞌa. Pana nu gi suda tumadugudu nu gi nuka mu netamma-kwaꞌne manakwe. U gi nuka mu batsa tuungu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme Roman numu-kooba katudu sakwa e tunetammaku.”
44025012	Soo Festus tu pupuaꞌamu-no yadooase, ka Paul meeoo netamma, “Unudea. U ka tamme-kooba katudu ume nemamakwu tuunguna, nu oo-matoo u tayakwu.”
44025013	Ka saaꞌa sumuꞌyoo nana, Agrippa mee naneadu, tu hamaꞌa, Bernice mee naneadu-no, ka Festus nobenge petuga. Soo Festus umu-kumabasoo teepu-koobatu moohe katudu. Soo Agrippa, Bernice-no ka Caesarea mee naneadu-wi pepetuga,
44025014	huu togano ka Festus-baa tooiyakwe. Soo Festus ka Paul-witu ka Agrippa tuukweꞌe, “Sumuꞌyoo nana yow nu-baa Felix oo wutumase, oo maꞌsuka.
44025015	Nu ka Jerusalem-wi petugase, mu Jew moohedu-no oowetoo nehane. Umu yise meeoo e netamma, ‘Ooka ne batsaku.’
44025016	Pana nu meeoo mu nanekwegea, ‘Soo ne Roman tumayohope yoo manepunne, mooeꞌugasoo soo Paul ka mu pumme tuakanedu uga mooe nanekwegeakwu. Oꞌno yise umu oo nemadubuekwu.’
44025017	Ka yaa mu petuse, ka saaꞌa oogow moooꞌa awamooasoo nu mu nehane. Nu eka nana nakobenatoo mu bi tuungu.
44025018	Umuga saaꞌa nanasuda oowetuoo e tuukwedooa mee nu soonamme.
44025019	Pana gi! Umu ka tu nanesootuhipe-witu e tuukwekooha. Umu sumuoo nana-witu e tuukwe Jesus mee naneadu yaꞌese, ‘Soo Jesus namayoda,’ mee soo Paul.
44025020	Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka ooonnekoo e nemadabuekwuna. Nu yise ka Paul tubenga, ‘U haaꞌa sakwa nu-no Jerusalem-witoo mea? Onona sakwa sumuna nu besa u nemadabue.’
44025021	Pana gi! Soo Paul meeoo e netamma, ‘Soo tamme Roman-kooba katudu sakwa mitu puusoo nemadabue.’ Nu yise yowsoo oo tsitugu. Nu saaꞌa ka tamme-kooba katudu-matoo oo tayadooa.”
44025022	Oꞌno yise soo Agrippa ka Festus mee netamma, “Nu ka Paul unnekwunu besa nakasoonamme.” “Unudea, mooo’a ta ka Paul nakadooa,” mee soo Festus oo nanekwegea.
44025023	Oogow moooꞌa Agrippa tu hamaꞌa Bernice-no yise Festus besa nanamadabuena nanana-kwi sogo meadape ka pabatsekoo tunehane nobe-kwitoo. Mu tukwutumadu moohedu ka mu numu moohedu-no punnoꞌo oe. Soo Festus mu tukwutumadu ka Paul bi tunngu.
44025024	Soo Festus ka Agrippa, yise noꞌoko mu numu oe konnodu noke meeoo netamma, “Yow esoo Paul mee naneadu. Ekow nana noꞌyoona mu Jew yaatuoo yise Jerusalem-witu netumooꞌoo. Umu ooosapa waagena meeoo e netammana, ‘Maasoo nana sakwa nabatsa.’
44025025	Pana nu yise gi hemma pukwi oo nabatsa-waꞌnekoo nemamayu. Soo Pau puusoo meeoo unakwe, ‘Soo Roman numu-kooba katudu sakwa puusoo nu-witu nemadabue.’ Nu yise oo-matoo oo tayakwu.
44025026	27 Nu sakwa ka numu-kooba katudu-matoo tubo ka suda a tumadagupu. Nu gi ka Paul taya-waꞌne tabuꞌa ka gisoo suda oo tumadugupu nemamayuna. Nu gi hemma maꞌyu e tubokwuna Nu yise e puaꞌa Agrippa, umu yaa manepunnedu noꞌoko yaa u-kobenatoo ka Paul bi tuungu. Tamme ka Paul-no yadooase oo unnena naksase, sumuna nu hemma saaꞌa bodooa.”
44026001	Soo Agrippa mee ka Paul netamma, “Yise sakwa u nakwitu ne tuukwe. How manena mu Jew numu u netumooꞌoo?” Soo Paul mayutsungadooase, ka umu moohedu Agrippa mee naneadu yadooꞌekooha.
44026002	“Nu nuusoo nakwitu mu tuukwekwu. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu besa soonamme ka mumme e mane-witu tuukwena.
44026003	U oo sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka mu Jew tumayohona how puu umu tumadugu. U sakwa e nakapunnese gi yabesoo e nanekwegeapana.
44026004	Mooasoo noꞌyoona e sopedakwatoo nu umu-nagaꞌyoona nanapu. Umu Jew numu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo.
44026005	Umu Jew numu oo sopedakwatoo ewasoo tommo petugapu, nu ka numme nanesootuhidu-matu Pharisee mee nananeadu-no. Umuoo ka mu Jew tumayohopu unu mayoho. Umuoo u mesoo tuukwe ka pumme u tubenga.
44026006	Nu yise menoꞌo nanehane ka o nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa ka te namamooatupu meeoo tuukwepu, ‘Soo Te Naa mu numu tuipu mayodakwu,’ meeꞌe. Noꞌyoona numme Jew numu ooosapa nanesootuhidu, Te Naa-matoo meakwu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Esoo numu tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi unu manepunne, mu saaꞌa oo sopedakwadoodooa.
44026009	Nu oꞌnosoo uga ka umu Te Pabeꞌe
44026010	Nu mu Jerusalem-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌookese, ‘Ewow Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu wutumeta,’ ka mu Jew tunehanedu meeoo nuka netamma. Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu tunehanedu-kobena negonnokuse, nu punnoꞌo meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu sakwa nagoepebuꞌa.’
44026011	Ewasoo nu mana umu nananesootuhi mamanepunnetoo meayina, ka umuoo wohonena. Umu sakwa suda Te Naa-witu waha mee nu soonammena. Nu tuwazaoo nanakwingaꞌakwi nummeyakwe mu wakwawaꞌa noꞌaata-too mu nanesootuhidu nekwohonena.
44026012	Mu Jew numu tunehanedu ka Damascus mee naneadu-witoo e tayana, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ootuoo wutumeta mee e netammana.
44026013	Ka tabeno tu manekese numme ooosapa meadabena, paꞌanakwana numme-koobatu besa kootabuapetu ka taba ooonakwa besa kootabuapunne, yaa ne naꞌoonnakwi ka e pupuaꞌamu-no ne meadape.
44026014	Numme noꞌyoona ka teepu-kooba pookwahoo. Haga sapaga ka Jew numuyadooa-wikoo e yadooewunu, ‘Saul, Saul u ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme, uusoo punnoꞌo suda soonamme gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna.’
44026015	Nu yise ka e tuapa nakana mee netamma, ‘Haga u?’ Soo e tuapa nakana meeoo unne, ‘Nu yow Jesus Mu Pabeꞌe. U ooosapa suda e masoonammennumme.
44026016	17 Menoꞌo yise yotse. Nu ume yadooꞌe, ume nu netutzea, u sakwa mana nu-witu wahannumme. Esoo e tuusoobedyana u tuukwedooasoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu nu-witu tuukwe,
44026018	nanakumma-baatusoo numu-matoo nu u tayakwu. Nu u tummatzina u magwetzoidooa ka umesoo nanumu ume tumooꞌookese, yise ka noꞌoko nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu ume tumooꞌoo tuwow.’
44026019	Nu ooosapa tumayohokena ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo nuka netamma eka e tuusoobedya-wi.
44026020	Mooeꞌugasoo mu numu Damascus-witu nu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe, saaꞌa tuwow Jerusalem-wi yise ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona. Nu noꞌoko nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nanesootuhikuna mu tunedyooemena. ‘Gi ka sutakoo podo meapana,’ mee nu mu netamma. ‘Ka gi besa mu tumaduguna nematzagase. Ka besaꞌhoo podo meadabe. Ka oo manena tamme oo tzapoonnekwu ka Te Naa podo meana.’
44026021	Nu ka e tuusoobedyana mayohona mu Jew numu nu-ma tzakadu, ka tu nanesootuhi nobe-kobenaꞌyoona e tooe batsa.
44026022	Ka mu Moses noko ka Te Naa yadooawabe numu mu tuukwepusoo nu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-witu numu oo magwetzoikwu-witu tuwow.
44026023	Umu meeoo, ‘Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, numu-kobenasoo namayodakwu tu yaꞌe-wiꞌyoona,’ meeꞌe. Oosoo saaꞌa namekoosoo mu Jew noko mu wakwawaꞌa tuukwedooa ka Te Naa besa po-witu.”
44026024	Ka Paul togesoo yadooꞌa ka tu mane-kwitu oo wahadyakwe, soo Festus pabatse meeꞌe unne, “Paul, u gi sukwe soonamme. U ka nagutza wunaꞌme natunedyooedabena, oosoo u soonammena suda yugwe petu.”
44026025	Soo Paul mee unne, “Nu gi hownneꞌyoo, nu oetu besa soohanena tubetse togekoo yadooꞌa.
44026026	Soo Agrippa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe-witu sopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona nu etzaga oo-no yadooa. Soo Agrippa tookwa mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo ka e netamma-kwitu. Esoo e netammana gi tookapu-kwikoo a namanena.”
44026027	Soo Paul yise ka Agrippa meeoo netamma, “U ka umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa tuukwewabe tubotuguna nakaꞌoedyukute, nu u sopedakwadoo.”
44026028	Tooesoo ka Paul yadooawunu, soo Agrippa mee oo netamma, “U gi nuka tunakaꞌoedyuku mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44026029	Soo Paul ka Agrippa meeoo netamma, “Nu-kwaꞌnesoo deaꞌa yaahoo menoꞌo mu nanesootuhikukwu mu noꞌyoona e nakapunnedu, yaa tabeno Te Pabeꞌe tubetsedu-gakwu, pana gi mu nu-kwaVne mu natzakuna petzape.”
44026030	Mu Agrippa, nanodukwa, ka Felix-no konnohoose,
44026031	ka nobe-kwiꞌyoona meaꞌa. Nanano apekase mee unakwe, “Esoo nana Paul tookwa gi suda manakwe. Gi pumme batsa-waꞌne manepunnena gi tuwazoo pumme wutumatugu-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44026032	Soo agrippa meeoo ka Felix netamma, “Esoo nana Paul mesoo natzamaꞌw, pana ka te Roman numu-kooba katudu-matoo nemea. Ta sakwa yise oo-matoo a taya.”
44027001	Soo Festus sake-wi ne tayakwu ka teepu Italy mee naneadu-kwitoo mee unakwe. Mu Roman numu moohedu ka tukwutumadu moohedu-no Julius mee naneadu ka Paul noko kukummaꞌakoosoo oo-no nakwutumadu mu eyaꞌe tuungu.
44027002	Numme ka sake-wi
44027003	oogow moooꞌa ka Sidon-wi petuga
44027004	Sidon-wiꞌyoona numme mease, soo hukwapa atatamesoo hukwadyakwe gi ka ne mea-tamme. Numme yise oo kwutoohanakwu-kwi meꞌa ka pagadudu Cyprus mee naneadu-kumi.
44027005	Numme ooosapa natsemangena ka mu Cilicia noko Pamphylia mee nananeadu teepu-kumi meadabena ka Myra noko Lycia mee nananeadu teepu-kooba petuga.
44027006	Soo Julius sumuoo sake mayuhoo Alexandria-wiꞌyoona kemmana Italy-witoo meadu. Ooweoo numme noꞌyoona kuaka.
44027007	Obeda numme natsemange ewa tabe meaka, numme unusoo manena ka Cnidus mee naneadu-kumi meꞌa. Soo hukwapa ne wumatzooejuna, numme gi hownnekoo oosapa meadabe-waꞌne. Numme yise oo kwutoohanakwu-kwi natsemange, ka pagadudu Crete mee naneadu ka Cape Salmone-kumi numme meꞌa.
44027008	Numme ooosapa pakumi meꞌa unusoo manena numme Fair Havens mee naneadu sake pukwi dyooi-kwi petu ka Lasea mee naneadu-kumaba.
44027009	Ewa tabe meaka, numme ka onona. Tommoba mooasoo tzageꞌe manekena. Soo Paul mu naana ka sake-koobatu mee tuya tuukweꞌe.
44027010	“E pupuaꞌamu, nu oo sopedakwatoo tamme ka ooosapa meadabena te nobeana tamme watzekukwu, te sake nokosoo, oꞌno sumuna tamme punnoꞌo batuikwu.”
44027011	12 Umu sake-witu pabeꞌe hise soo sake hee-ga-no oo sopedakwatoo ka eak sake pukwi yooina gi besaꞌyoo gi pukwi tommo-waꞌne. Umu ka Phoenix mee naneadu-kwitoo sakwa tamme ninapa natzemangeka mee unakwe. Otuoo soo sake pukwi yooina ka Crete-kumaba tamme mesoo wutoohapunne pana taba egea-nakwatu gi, o yise tomokwu mee unnena. Soo Julius umuoo nakaꞌoedyuku, pana ka Paul yaasoo sakwa tamme tommo mee oo unnena gi nakaꞌoedyukute.
44027013	Ka taba meana-nakwana soo hukwapa obeda hukwadyakwe. Mu sake mahanedu meeoo sokwama, “Numme mesoo mangegaꞌa ka Phoenix-witoo,” meeꞌe. Ka sake baa-wi tsipunnedu tsatsebooase yise numme ka Crete-kumi meꞌa.
44027014	Pudusoo unu kwenaha petuoo, unu hukwawunu.
44027015	Soo hukwapa ka sake patodyakwekuooka unu ka pagadudu-makoo. Numme yise oo tsasoopedya, gi nasoomanese ka hukwapa ka sake patodyakwehookuse.
44027016	17 Numme ka tuutse pagadudu Clauda mee naneadu taba meana-kwi meꞌa. Otuoo sagwane wutoohapunne. Onona numme ka tuutsekoo sake ka pabatsekoo sake-kooba wutsabeku. Mu sake mahanedu tugapu-ma ka sake wunotake. Oꞌno soo sake gi nuukote ka oo namadabuena. Umu suina meadape numme sakwa sumuna ka baapooe. Syrtis mee naneadu-kwitoo, mee sokwamana. Umu yise ka tu tumadabuena tzakwekuse, soo hukwapa ka sake wupoohedape.
44027018	Ooosapa unu hukwadape, ookow moooꞌa yise umu ka sake-wi tu nobea-matu tzapebuꞌa.
44027019	Ookow moooꞌa numme nummesoo mima ka sake-witu hemma tuwazoo tzapebuꞌa.
44027020	Soo paba hukwapa huu tabe meaka ooosapa hukwadabena. Unu koomeapunnena soo taba ka mu paatoozooba-no gi napoonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Numme sumuna noꞌyoona batuꞌikwu mee numme sokwama.
44027021	Numme gisoo tukana wunaꞌme maneka. Soo Paul yise numu-kobena wunuse mee unakwe, “E pupuaꞌamu, oꞌnosoo sakwa mu e nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa uga Crete-wizoo. Tamme yise ka natzemangekase ꞌyoo suda hee manakwe.
44027022	Pana gi suipana, gi haga tamme-matu yaꞌekwu. Soo sake suuꞌmu kadooꞌoo namaꞌekwu.
44027023	Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka togano soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu nuga nagena nu-baa petu.
44027024	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo meeoo e netamma, ‘Gi suipana, Paul. Soo Te Naa ka Roman-kooba katudu ume nehane tuungu. U nanesootuhidu gi haga ka sake-koobatu batuidooa.’
44027025	Yise e pupuaꞌamu, gi suipana. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa, nu tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo soo hee oo unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
44027026	Soo hukwapa mana tooe hano tooe pagadudu kumana te hane petugadooa.”
44027027	waha nasatese soo hukwapa tooesoo ka tubetse baa Mediterranean mee naneadu-koobakwi ne wumatzaka. Togabeno tu manekuse, ka mu sake-witu mahanedu meeoo sokwama, “Menoꞌo ka sumuna numme teepu tzagee.”
44027028	Umu yise ka baa managahoose gi tubetse tookapu. Gi haaꞌno tu manepunnese umu tuwazoo oo managahoosoo. Oꞌno yise tuwazoo gi unu tookapu.
44027029	Umu suina watsukwuoo sake tzadyooikudu ka baa-witoo tzapebuꞌa. Oꞌno soo sake gi tupe-matoo tape. Umu nanesootuhaꞌe, “Soo sake sakwa gi nuukodepana gisoo tu tabuꞌa,” mee unnena.
44027030	Mu sake-witu mahanedu tooꞌe namameaꞌa ka sake-wiꞌyoona. Ka tuutsekoo sake umu baa-witoo tzakweku sukwe sapa, ka sake-kobenatu ooka tzadyooikudu tzasawekuna.
44027031	Soo Paul ka Julius noko mu tukwutumadu mee netamma, “Ka mu dake-witu mahanedu mease, tamme gi hownnekoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
44027032	Mu tukwutumadu yise ka tugapoo ka tuutsekoo sake tsipunnedu tsekeaꞌahoose oo tzamaꞌwuhoo. Mu sake-witu mahanedu yise gi hownnekoo namamea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
44027033	Ka tu tabuagena soo Paul noꞌoko ka mu numu mee netamma, “Waha nasateka mu gi hemma tukana sukwe nanetzagwiyina.
44027034	Mu sakwa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute oo unnepu meeoo. ‘Gi haga tameme-matu namaꞌehookwu, gi tuwazoo yaꞌekwu.’ Mu sakwa menoꞌo tuka esoo puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
44027035	Soo Paul ka tunemamakwuse, ka tukaba gwuuhoose yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka tukaba-matu tsakaꞌowse oo tukakooha.
44027036	Noꞌyoona mu numu ka Paul tuka oo poonnese umu punnoꞌo ka tukapu-matu tukakooha.
44027037	38 Ka noꞌoko mu tukamakwuse, umu ka tukapu nabenina tzapebuꞌa, ka baa-witu. Oꞌno soo sake unusoo yayagwahookwu. Tubetse ewaꞌyoo (276) numu ka sake-koobatu.
44027039	Ka tubuakese, mu sake-witu mahanedu gi ka teepu posopedakwatoo. Ka bakohapunnedu poonnena paba haanokwi otuba teepu-gaꞌyoo. Oto sakwa numme eka sake wunooꞌyooꞌehoo petuga meeꞌe sokwama.
44027040	Mu tugapoo yise tsebokow ka sake tsipunnedu-makoo yise tu tutsakahenookuna o-tamme tzameakute. Ka sake-kobenatu ka pabatsekoo wanapu namadabuena toogoopa tsadyota, oꞌno soo hukwapa ka sake-kobena-tamme wumatzaka ka a bakohapunne-kwitoo.
44027041	Pana soo sake ka otuba-ma tzange petuga. Soo sake-kobenatu ka otuba-wi tzangehoo soo baa yise ka how wuꞌmaꞌnawena ka sake ooonnakwatu wuugodehoo.
44027042	Mu tukwutumadu ka mu nakwutumadu nekoꞌe. “Oꞌno gi umu-matu namameakwu,” mee unnena.
44027043	Soo Julius ka Paul soomagwetzoina mu netahoo ka meeoo mu unakwe. Noꞌoko mu nanana besa babokwadu meeoo netamma, “Ka baa-witoo natakwatese ka teepu tamme babokwahooga.”
44027044	Ka saaꞌa mu susumudu gi babokwadu ka sake-matu wobe poki-ma wawiyooana ka teepu-tamme patodyakwe. Yoo numme noꞌyoona manena ka teepu-kooba mani petuga.
44028001	Ka teepu-kooba ne petugase, yow esoo pagadudu Malta mee naneadu mee numme natuukweꞌe.
44028002	Mu numu otuoo besa ne matuku. Unu utzutzupunnena, powmakooha. Umu yise ne pedakuhoo pumma ne yooekwuna.
44028003	Soo Paul koona hanena, ka goso-kooba oo tuoonakwuse, togogwa yise ka koona-tohaꞌyoona tsebooeke ka goso nayooekwumana. Ka Paul mi-makoo oo toguehoose, ooo-ma tubetse kuwayooakwunihoo.
44028004	Mu numu oo poonne ka togogwa ka Paul mi-ma oo kukwiyooapunne, mee yise nananetamma, “Tooe esoo nana ka tubetse baa-wikoo namagwetzoise sapa, soo suda oo tumadugupu, oo-matoosoo kodyuna a batsowkwu, soo togogwa oo toguꞌehoo.”
44028005	Soo Paul yise ka togogwa ka goso-witoo tzawunihoo, gi how soo togogwa oo yugwe.
44028006	Mu numu oo tooe wutooepunne, hannanoꞌo ka saaꞌa pawahoodooa, tooetoo yabesoo yaꞌehoodooa meeꞌe sokwamapunne. Wunaꞌme manikea soo Paul gi how manena, umu yise atasoo sokwamahoose mee nananetamma, “Esoo Paul tookwa pummatoo te nanesootuhina.”
44028007	Soo numu moohedu Publius mee naneadu tubewa-gaꞌyoo, gi kwinga ka onona. Soo Publius besa ne matuguna numme oo-baa pahe tooiyakwe.
44028008	Oo naa tuꞌoeyaena hape, unu oo tookoo udutuna, wunaꞌme manekapu nuummayina. Soo Paul oo-matoo mease oo-ma matuguse oo nanesootuhikuse, oosoo yise besa mani.
44028009	Ka oo nakase noꞌyoona mu tuoegoedu numu ka pagadudu-koobatu ka Paul-baa petuyina besa namayugweyakwe.
44028010	Umu tuoegoedu besa maneyidu ewatseꞌe tooe hemma tooe na heꞌme. Yise pahe muha manese numme Italy-witoo natzemangeka. Oꞌno ewasoo umu hemma ne hanekute ne sookwina. Sumuꞌyoo sake Alexandria-wiꞌyoona kemmana Nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo mee naneadu punnoꞌo ookowsoo pagadudu-kumaba tomopu-gaꞌyoo. Oo-kooba numme manega ka Rome-tamme
44028013	Numme ka Puteoli mee naneadu-wi petuse, oto numme ka sake-wiꞌyoona sawe petuga.
44028014	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numme oe tapoega. Umu yise, “Sumu nasateba-witoo sakwa mu numme-baa,” meꞌe ne netamma. Ononasoo numme ka Rome-witoo mea.
44028015	Mu tunaka-ꞌoedyukudu Rome-witu numme-witu nakadu mu Appius Forum noko three Taverns mee maneneadu-wi ka saaꞌa nawegeadooa. Soo Paul ka mu poonnese Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha, besa soonammena.
44028016	Ka Rome-wi ne petugase soo Paul puusoo nanobe-gakute, sumuoo tukwutumadu pumme eyaedu-no, ono soo Paul gi namameaꞌa meeꞌe umu oo sooyugwena.
44028017	Pahe tabe meaka numme o petuse soo Paul mu Jew numu Rome-witu umu numu moohedu tu tunehane-witoo paꞌe. Ka mu sumuse meeoo mu netamma, “E nanumu, nu gi hekwi te nanumu netumooꞌoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu te tumayohona ka te nanamooatupu pumakoo mu tumayohona gi takopadu. Mu Jew numu Jerusalem-witu meeoo e netammana, nu nakwutumana mu yise mu Roman numu-tamme e tzamaꞌwu.
44028018	Mu Roman numu e nemadabuese, e netzamaꞌwu, umu ka oo nakase, ka gi suda e manakwe, nu gi pumme batsa-waꞌne.
44028019	Mu Jew numu gi oo nakabetzape ka mu Roman numu nuka netzamaꞌwu. Nu yise meeoo unakwe, ‘Nu ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu nuka nemadabue tuungu,’ tooe nu gi suda naꞌunnedu e nanumu-tamme unnekwuse.
44028020	Nu ka mu soopoonnena mu-no soodyadooana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwekwuse, ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nu nakwutumase.”
44028021	Mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo ka Paul netamma, “Gi numme u-witu nabodu tubope kwuꞌu ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-witu. Gi mu te nanumu suda naꞌunnedu u-witu ne tuukwedu.
44028022	Pana numme ume tusooyugwena soonakapunne ume nanesootuhi pupuaꞌamu mu numu tooe hanotu tooe ooosapa mu netumooꞌooyakwe.”
44028023	Umu Jew numu yise ka Paul-no tunemadabue, “Oꞌno tabeno saaꞌa tamme nanatabooegadooa.” Ewaꞌyoo numu ka Paul-baa petudyakwe. Tabewano soo Paul ka Te Naa besa po-witu mu numu tuukweꞌe. Soo Paul ka Te Naa unnena mu nemadabuekuna, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu sakwa umu nakatogeꞌyookuse, oo-tamme mane.
44028024	Susumudu umu-matu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute, susumudu punnoꞌo gi.
44028025	Soo Paul yise ka mu gi tunakaoedyukudu meeoo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-kwitu meeꞌe unnepuMu tooe ka Te Naa besa pooha poonne oo unnepu nakapana, gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyuku Te Naa-tamme mane, gi oemota, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoikwu.’ ” Soo Paul yise meeoosoo mu netamma, “Mooasoo nu ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukwepu. Yaa manakwana nu mu wakwawaꞌa gi Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwekwu. Umu-matu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu.” Ka Paul meeoo unnese mu Jew numu puusoo nananepetukuna petukwahooka.
44028030	31 Waha tomoka soo Paul ka tu nobe-wiꞌyoona, oe tumanakana. Noꞌobatusoo numu pumme nobengeketu soo Paul ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweyakwe. Mu Roman tukwutumadu punnoꞌo gi haꞌyoo ka Paul netamma.
45001001	Ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu, nu, Paul, mu-matoo tuboꞌo, ka Rome mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gakoo. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseadu, oosoo e netutzease, nu yise yaahoo yadooawabe mane yise mana mu numu e tuukwe tuungu ka besa tu unnepu-witu.
45001002	Ka besa Te Naa unnepu umu oꞌnosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mooasoo oo bo tugupu.
45001003	Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa yadooawabe oo waha ka Jesus, Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa-witu, menoꞌo yise soo naꞌunnedu togesapa oo-toogoo manepetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoo tabuapu. Oosoo ka David-manakwana kemmapu.
45001004	Pana oosoo tuwazoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa Besa Tooaꞌa ooka te tzapoonnekute, ka tu Besa Pooha-ma oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase.
45001005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe e sootuhi ka tu yadooawabe e mayugwese, ka manatooe e tayana, ka tu besa unnepu noꞌoko numu e tuukwe tuunguna. Oꞌno umu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna saaꞌa oo nakabetseadooa.
45001006	Mu punnoꞌo ka Rome-witu ooosoo. Soo Te Naa mu tunetutzea ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manekese, oosoo ka besa mu soobedyana. Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no ooosapa mu sootuhinokwu yise mu magwetzoikwuse.
45001008	Tooe hano tooe e nummenummetoo mu numu e tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka nakasootuhaꞌe, Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute.
45001009	Nu ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, mu-toogoo besaꞌhoo natuunguna. Nu ka Te Naa tubetse nakabetseana, ka ena tooe hano tooe mu numu tuukwena, ka besa naꞌunnedu ka oo Besaa Tooaꞌa-witu. Oosoo oo sopedakwadoo nu ooosapa mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, nu sakwa mu-baatoo sumudooe mea, ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma.
45001011	Nu sakwa mu-baatoo mease, mu nanesootuhikuna. Oꞌno mu unusoo besa kaaheno tusooyugwena, mu unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugadooa.
45001012	Mu ka tuꞌoedyukuna oetoo e nehanese, tamme nanahoesoo oetu nemadabuese. Oꞌno saaꞌa nu mu-baa besa petuga nuummadooa.
45001013	Pana nu gisoo meꞌa, nu ka gi hownnekoo meana. Nu yise besa mu nobene soonamme, nu sakwa ka mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzi. Nu ka mooasoo tooe hano tooe gi Jew numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooese.
45001014	Soo Te Naa meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe numu-matoo mease, mu tuukwe.”
45001015	Mu-matoo tuwazoo Rome-witoo. Nu unu oo soogwaꞌe mu-baa e petugakwuna, yise ka nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooekwuse,
45001016	nu gi e nanenasookwina soogwaꞌe mu numu mesoo tuukwena ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu, soo Te Naa pooha mu magwetzoikwu, mu Jew numu nokosoo mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
45001017	Soo Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Tamme besaꞌyoo numu, ka ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna.” A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo numu ka kaaheno Te Naa besa podo meana, puusoo nanemagwetzoikwu, oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
45001018	Tamme oo sopedakwadoo soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka ooosapa suda tumatuguna mu numu ka Te Naa togesapa unnena ne watzetugu.
45001019	Tooe mu numu gi Te Naa poonnepana, mu numu sumuna oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa ka teepu matabuepu. Oosoo puusoo mu tzapoonnekute ka noꞌoko hemma besa tu matabuena, yise ka unu tu pooha-gana tuwazoo. Pana umu gi oo nesookwugaꞌena, yise gi oo-matoo nanesootuhi tuwazoo. Umu sakwa oe naneyugwe, ka gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu meeoo nanasooyugwe, “Numme tubetse unu sokwama.” Pana gi! Umu tookwa gi hemma sopedakwadoopana meeoo nasooyugwe.
45001023	Umu gi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, oosoo Te Naa yise noꞌokosoo pooha-gaꞌyoo gi yaꞌedu. Pana umu tooe hemma-too tooe nanesootuhaꞌe gi pooha-gakoo: Numu-waꞌnekoo, tooetoo kweꞌnaꞌa, etzaꞌa, yise togogwa-matoo gi puusoo namagwetzoi-waꞌnekoo, sukwe yaꞌeyakwedu.
45001024	Umuoo gi ka Te Naa-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna petzape, Te Naa besaꞌyoona gi nakaꞌoedyukute pumme nesookwugi-waꞌnekoo, tu naꞌesayina suuꞌmu umu nakabetseadu. Umu gi ka pumme manumudoopu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise pumme nesookwugi-waꞌnekoo. Umu ka hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa mu tsasoopedya, umu yise ka sutakoo podo meadape. Umuoo suda tusooyugwena, suda ka pummesoo tookoo yugwe. Umu noꞌobatusoo suda tu manena petzape. Mu momokoꞌne ka gi toge-wikoo, ka tu puna mogoꞌne mesoo maꞌemukwana.
45001027	Mu nanana punnoꞌo gi ka mu momokoꞌne soogwina puusoo nana-ma tumanaka. Umuoo suda tubetse manakwe soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
45001028	Soo Te Naa gi how mu yugwe suda mee tusooyugwe sapa umu ka gi Te Naa sooꞌoedyukuna.
45001029	Umu yise tooe haꞌoo tooe manakwe nanasuda: unu moomoogoobuna, nanidyapuna, tu pupuaꞌamu nasoodyagena, nanahana, numu mesoo batsana, nanaꞌesagoena, nanatumooagana, ewa suda nanatuukwena, Te Naa gi petzabena, suda nanadyadooena, nananesagwaꞌena, nananesootzemana, besa nanasooyugwena, tu nanaanapuꞌamu gi nakabetseana, gi numu tutuha soobedyana, gi kaaheno tumatuguna, yise tooe haꞌoonnekoo tooe suda namanedu oedyukuna.
45001032	Umu oo sopedakwadoopana ka Te Naa meeoo unnepu, “Soo numu ꞌyoo manedu sakwa yaꞌe.” Umu yise suda mesoo manakwe ka tu pupuaꞌamu suta-witoo pumme moohe.
45002001	Numme Jew numu sakwa umu gi Jew numu gi nesootzemapana, numme punnoꞌo ka ooosoo manena. Numme punnoꞌo nummesoo oe naneyukwe ka tooe how tooe manena.
45002002	Tamme oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa kaaheno noꞌobatusoo umu numu suda manedu kadoo mayugwekwu.
45002003	Tamme sakwa gi meeoo sokwamapana, “Soo Te Naa nuka gi kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe suda e manakwe sapa. Nu umu ataꞌyoosoo.”
45002004	Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo, gi etzaga sutadu. Oosoo ka oo te matuguna, oꞌno tamme sakwa ka suda te tumatuguna maꞌwukase, yise ka oo besa podo meadabekwu. Pana tamme ka meeoo sokwamana, “Nu gi ka suda e tumatuguna maꞌwu-waꞌneꞌyoo yise ka oo besa podo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oꞌno yise tamme tammesoo ka sutakoo mabetseadu-kwaꞌne tabuꞌa, tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu ka kaaheno nanasuuꞌmu numu manena umu-matoosoo kodyuse.
45002006	Noꞌoko mu numu tumatugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu haꞌoo ka mu besow tooetoo mu sutakoo.
45002007	Mu numu ooosapa besa manekwu umu ka besow podokoo soomeana, ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhaꞌe ooosapa nummenummena ka Te Naa-baa nobe-gakwu. Umu numu ka gi toge-witu nakabetseana puu suuꞌmu mee nasooyugwena nanasutatoo meadabekwu, yise kadoo namayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma nana-kwaꞌnesoo matugukwu: mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
45002012	Soo numme Jew tumayohopu ne tuukweꞌe, ka ne manekwuna. Numme ka kaaheno oo mayohona, numme besaꞌyoo meeꞌe soo Te Naa unnekwu. Tamme tammesoo oo naka, pana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Umu gi Jew numu gi ka te tumayohopu nakadu pana umu puusoo oo sopedakwatoo ka how besa manena, tooetoo suda manese. Umu ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo tzapoonnena oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa pumme mane tuunguna. Umu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu ka gi oo nakabetseana. ꞌYoo tu namanekwuse, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe numu watze tusooyugwena oo nemadabue tuunguna. Meeoo nu mana ka mu numu tuukwe.
45002017	Numme Jew sumuna unu ka te tumayoho-ma nasoonatzaꞌe.
45002018	Te Naa-ma nanaꞌunakwe ka mee unnena, numme nummesoo oo sopedakwatoo ka besa ka Te Naa numme mane tuunguna, ka ne tumayohopu natunedyooese.
45002019	Numme mu gi ooka sopedakwatoodu mesoo tunedyooe doodooake tuwazoo, soo ne tumayohopu ka Te Naa besa podokoo ne tzapoonnekute.
45002021	Aha, numme Jew ka besow po sopedakwatoo, pana numme gi oo nakabetseꞌa. Numme mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana,” yise numme sumuna nummesoo tuduha.
45002022	Numme mu numu meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa ka nananodukwana kukummaꞌamasoo emukwapana.” Numme, nummesoo, sumuna ꞌyoo suda manakwe. Numme meeoo, “Numme gi hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo,” pana numme sumuna kummaꞌakoosoo numu natusooa tuduha.
45002023	Numme meeoo nanaꞌunakwe, numme o sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka Te Naa tumayohopu, numme oo nage tuunguna. Pana numme ka mu gi Jew numu suda ka Te Naa-witu mu netamma tuungu, ka numme gi oo unnena nakabetseana.
45002025	Numme meeoo, “Numme ka Te Naa tubetse dooamu, numme ka Jew numuna.” Numme ka Jew-na besaꞌyoo, numme ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseana. Pana numme ka gi oo unnena nakabetseana, numme gi Te Naa dooamu.
45002026	Mu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseadu Te Naa doodooamu numme Jew ooonakwasoo, besaꞌyoo umu ka Te Naa unnena nakabetseana.
45002028	Numme yise Te Naa doodooamu ka oo nakabetseana, ka sukwe Jew numuna.
45002029	Numme ka tunakabetseana soo Te Naa te soonammena sopedakwadoona te sootuhikwu. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu te nesootzemapana.
45003001	Tamme sumuna meeoo unnekwu, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe Jew numupana oosoo gi Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
45003002	Pana gi! Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka Jew numuna, soo Te Naa ka tu unnepu numme Jew numu tuukwese.
45003003	Numme Jew numu gi oo nakabetsea, pana soo Te Naa ooosapa oo nakabetseꞌa, ka pummesoo unnepu.
45003004	Numu tooe esagoepana, soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa togesapa. Meeoo nabotugu oo naꞌunne-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo Te Naa ooosapa kaahenoꞌyoo ka tu yadooa-wi. Gi haga oo tuagaꞌne, ‘Oosoo esayaꞌe,’ mee unnena.”
45003005	Sumuna numu-matu meeoo unnekwu, “Tamme ka suda manena, oosoo oo tzapoonne ka Te Naa besaꞌyoona. Soo Te Naa gi kaahenoꞌyoona oosoo ka mu numu tu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu,” mee mu sukwe numu unakwe. Pana gi! Te Naa ooosapa kaahenoꞌyoona; kaahenosoo mu numu nemadabuekwu. Susumudu numu-matu sumuna meeoo unnekwu, “Nu ka suda manena, nu ka Te Naa besa nemadabue, tamme sakwa yise sutaꞌyoo, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa nanemadabuekwu,” mee umu. Susumudu numu esayaꞌe, nu meeoo unakwe, mee unnena. Mu numu suda unnedu sakwa oe naneyugwe. Pana soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo nakwukodyukukwu.
45003009	Numme, Jew numu, nasootuhaꞌe mu gi Jew numu-waꞌnesoo. Noꞌyoona tamme nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu mooasoo meeoo mu netammapu
45003010	noꞌyoona tamme ka sutakoo po-toogoo meaꞌa, a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Gi haga besa manakwe, gi haga kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meꞌa. Gi tamme-matu ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo.
45003011	Umu gi ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana petzape.
45003012	Umu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
45003013	Umu esagoena, numu nesootzemana nanasuda unnena.
45003015	Umuoo mu numu nuummaba wumakuna suda mu yugwena, numu batsayakwe. Umu unu nidyapu.
45003018	Umuoo gi ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana soohanedu.”
45003019	Numme yise oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa meeoo te netammana, numme Jew numu oe naneꞌyakwe, ka mu gi Jew numu-waꞌnesoo. Numme punnoꞌo ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana.
45003020	Soo ne tumayoho tabuana oo tzapoonne tamme noꞌyoona tumaꞌemukwa, gi tamme oo tzapoonne ka te besaꞌyoona.
45003021	Numme Jew ooosapa meeoo sokwamayakwe, soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo mee te netammakwu, ka te tumayohope te nakabetsea ka umu te nanamooatupu tamme-too tunemadabuepu. Pana umu Te Naa yadooawabe oꞌnosoo te tuukweꞌe, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besa te matabuekwu. Menoꞌo yise oe manepetu.
45003022	Soo Te Naa te tuukweꞌe mu besaꞌyoo mee te netammakwu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo noꞌoko nanakwaꞌnesoo te matugukwu, mu Jew numu yise ka mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
45003023	Tamme ka noꞌyoona tumaꞌemukwakupuna, gi ka Te Naa tamme oo netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena.
45003024	Soo Te Naa ekow nasootuhipu te sootuhipu, tamme yise besaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase besa te mayugwekwu, oꞌno yise, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee te netammakwu.
45003025	Soo Te Naa tusoohanena te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Esoo oo tzapoonne oosoo tookwa kaahenoꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo soo sutaꞌyoo gi numu-matoosoo kodyudu, oosoo ka besaꞌyoona oo soohanena, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwu, oosoo yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Pabeꞌe-wi, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee mu netammakwu.
45003027	Menoꞌo tamme gi nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme tammesoo besa nanemadabue. Pana gi! Soo Te Naa “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netamma, tamme ka te nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi ka te tumayohopu tunakabetsea-wi.
45003029	Soo Te Naa sumuꞌyoosoo, namekoosoo te sootuhaꞌe (mu Jew numu, yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna).
45003031	Sumuna mu numu meeoo unakwe, “Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hee ka tumayohopu namadabue.” Pana gi! He-toogoo soo te tumayohopu namadabuepu.
45004001	Soo ne nanamooatupu, Abraham mee naneadu, punakwana numme Jew numu suakena, punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo.
45004002	Oosoo gi nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puusoo besa namadabuepu ka tunakabetseana. Pana gi!
45004003	O nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Soo Te Naa ka Abraham sootuhise, ‘Besaꞌyoo,’ mee oo netamma, soo Abraham ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
45004004	Tamme ka kummaꞌakoosoo hemma how yugwekuse hemma nagease, oosoo gi te sukwe nageana.
45004005	Pana soo Te Naa tamme sootuhina, ka besaꞌyoona te sukwe nasootuhina, tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, tooe haꞌoo ne tumatuguna sapa, te sootuhaꞌe.
45004006	Oꞌnosoo ne moohedu David mee naneadu mee tubotugu ka Te Naa numme sootuhina, numme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tooꞌe haꞌoo ne tumatugu sapa.
45004007	“Soo Te Naa tubetse besa te manuuma ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase. Tubetse besa te manuuma ka besaꞌyoo mee te netammana.”
45004009	Tooe haga tooe sumuna meeoo soonamme, “Soo Te Naa mu Jew numu suuꞌmu besa sootuhaꞌe.” Pana gi! Soo Te Naa ka Abraham besa sootuhi puu gisoo Jew numu oo manakwe ka oo tumayohomeana. Pana ka saaꞌa ka te tumayohope nagena, Jew manese oo tzapoonne, soo Te Naa mooasoo besaꞌyoo mee oo netamma. Ekow yise te tzapoonnekute soo Te Naa besa numu sootuhaꞌe tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tooꞌe gi te Jew numu sapa. Menoꞌo yise oosoo te natzapoonnekute, tamme sakwa oo nage, ka Abraham-waꞌne besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Menoꞌo tamme ka besa nasootuhidu numuna besaꞌyoo mee nanetamma, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna Abraham-waꞌnesoo, ka gisoo Jew numu oo manakwe, numme Jew numu, yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo.
45004013	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Umuoo-maꞌyoona suaketu saaꞌa noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu hemma nemadabue meadooa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “U e tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute,” tooe how ne tumayohope nakabetseapana.
45004014	Soo Te Naa haaꞌa sakwa unu ka tumayohopu nagedu suuꞌmu sootuhi? Oo unnepu haaꞌa yise gi hee tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme?
45004015	Soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe ka pumme te nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme ka tammesoo besa manena nageana, tamme gi besa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo; te maꞌemukwapu tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu. Pana ka te tumayohope nakabetseana naꞌunnepu kadookoo, tamme tookwa gi tumaꞌemukwa.
45004016	Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka besow nasootuhibu-ma te sootuhi, tamme ka Abraham-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo gi how manepunne tooe tamme gi ka mu Jew tumayohopu nakabetseapana. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme noꞌyoona ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suakepu.
45004017	A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Naa tamme manumudoopu yise mu tuipu matusootabuena, ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “U-nakwana ewaꞌyoo nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo numu suakekwu.” Abraham oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Tooꞌe gi oo nanakaꞌoedyuku oo manepunne sapa oosoo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo soonamme, “Numme dooamu-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe nu unu waꞌetsepana; soo e nodukwa punnoꞌo gi dooamu-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
45004020	Soo Abraham gi wahaba ka Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuse, yise unusoo oe tunakaꞌoedyuku mani.
45004021	Ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe.
45004022	Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, “Besaꞌyoo numu,” meeꞌe.
45004023	Soo Te Naa ekow naꞌunnedu Abraham-witu botugu tamme-too tuwazoo gi ka Abraham suuꞌmu. Soo Te Naa, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netammakwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa yise oo mayodase tamme yise besa manekwu.
45005001	Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa-no besa napuaꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te mayugwese, tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
45005002	Menoꞌo oosoo te sootuhaꞌe tooꞌe gi te besaꞌhoo sapa, besa tamme sokwama ka tamme oo sopedakwadoo, ka tamme yaꞌe-wikoo tamme o mayodakwuse, yise ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
45005003	Menoꞌo tamme yise besa sokwama soo tooe how tooe suda namanedu gi hee tamme-nakwana ka besa tamme tu sootuhaꞌe, ookow tamme oo natunedyooe.
45005004	Tamme ka gi nasootookena te tusooyugwekwudu unu natzooe manepetugakwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno tamme yise oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe.
45005005	Tamme oo sopedakwadoo menoꞌo tamme ooosapa besa sokwamamokwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhi ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma. Oosoo unu te soobedya.
45005006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe te soobedya tooe suda te tumatugu sapa. Soo Te Naa tunemadabuena oe manepetuse, oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, tamme gi hownnekoo tammesoo nanemagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45005007	Tamme puu gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu-koobatoo. Sumuna tubetse besow numu-koobatoo suuꞌmu nu nabatsakwu.
45005008	Pana ka togesoo te maꞌemukwa soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, soo Te Naa ka besa te soobedyana.
45005009	Tamme yise besaꞌyookwu, tamme ka togesoo te sutakoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatase. Oosoo te tubetse magwetzoikwu ka te tumaꞌemukwana gi tamme-matoosoo makodyukuna.
45005010	Ka pumme te tumooꞌoo, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo mabatsa tuungu. Menoꞌo yise tamme oo pupuaꞌamu oosoo yise te magwetzoikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe ka oo nabatsa-wikoo oo mayodase tamme-koobatoo.
45005011	Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo, oosoo ka Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwese.
45005012	Ka mooeꞌugasoo namanumudoopu nana Adam mee naneadu tumaꞌemukwase, soo oo tumaꞌemukwanasoo oo batsa. Oo-waꞌnesoo noꞌyoona numu yaꞌeyakwe, ka noꞌyoona mu numu tumaꞌemukwa.
45005013	Mu numu gi hownnekoo ka tu maꞌemukwana sopedakwatoo ka Moses-kobenasoo, gisoo ka te tumayohope tamme oo namadabuekute. Pana yise hownnekoo mu numu oo sopedakwatoo ka maꞌemukwana soo Moses gisoo mu numu tuukwe mu manekwuna.
45005014	Mu numu gi maꞌemukwa ka Adam maꞌemukwa-kwaꞌne, pana umu noꞌyoona tuiyakwe. Nu ka Adam-witu wahadyakwe, soo Adam ka Te Pabeꞌe-no nanosoo numu moohedu, soo Adam ka suta podokoo te moohe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka besow podo. Soo Adam maꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo ewow numu goeke. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu magwetzoaꞌe.
45005016	Ka Adam maꞌemukwase, ewaꞌyoo numu tumaꞌemukwana nakwukodyu yise nagoꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwana, mu magwetzoaꞌe.
45005018	Oosoo Adam ka Te Naa gi nakana, tooꞌe noꞌoko numu kadoo mayugwe, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa nakana noꞌobatusoo numu magwetzoi.
45005019	Ewaꞌyoo numu tumaꞌemukwa mane ka Adam gi tunakabetseꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu ewow numu besa mayugweke.
45005020	Tooe mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakase sapa, ewaꞌyoosoo tumaꞌemukwa. Pana soo Te Naa ka mu numu nakasootuhi. Tooe ewa mu tumaꞌemukwa sapa, oosoo mu sootuhise, mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.
45005021	Tamme yise tuikwu ka tumaꞌemukwana, pana tamme yise ooosapa mommokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme sootuhise tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsase.
45006001	Sumuna numu meeoo soonamme, “Ka tumaꞌemukwape ewow, soo Te Naa tookwa ewa tusoomuꞌwakwu. Nu sakwa ooosapa maꞌemukwano, oꞌno soo Te Naa ooosapa oo soomuꞌwanokwu.” Ooonneꞌyoo pana tamme gi!
45006002	Gi tamme ooosapa tumaꞌemukwano-waꞌneꞌyoo ka meeoo te soonammena kadoo namayugwese.
45006003	Soo baa-wi te namatzakana yise mee naꞌunnedu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwusoo. Tamme puu tuipu-kwaꞌne oosoo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Tamme menoꞌo mommo pudu namanumudoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa pooha puu ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsa-wikoo oo mayodapu.
45006006	Tamme uga ooosapa ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, gi hownnekoo yooi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana menoꞌo soo oꞌnosoo te tumatugupu kadoo namayugwepu ka Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo oo-koobatoo nabatsase, tamme yise gi ka suda namanedu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo namayodakwu, tamme ka yaꞌese saaꞌa oo-baasoo ooosapa nobe-gana, ka Te Naa nakabetseakoo.
45006009	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tu nabatsa-wikoo namayodase, gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Mooasoo oꞌnosoo oosoo puu ka numu tuina matzooekupu.
45006010	Oꞌnosoo oosoo tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu. Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo, pana ka Te Naa nakabetseana, gwetzoimokwu.
45006011	Meeoosoo sakwa tamme nasooyugwe. Soo yaꞌepu numu gi hownnekoo tumaꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa ka yaꞌepu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo gi te maꞌemukwana soohanepana. Soo nummedu numu ka tu tunakabetseana soogwaꞌe, tamme sakwa umuoo numu-waꞌne, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe noko Te Naa nakabetseꞌa.
45006012	Tamme sakwa gi ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseapana.
45006013	Gi sakwa nagutza tamme menoꞌo te tookoo soonahadyagwepana, tamme sakwa Te Naa nakabetsea. Menoꞌo manakwana yise soo Te Naa pummesoo tusooyugwetoo te nemadabuekwu. Oosoo ka pudu numu-waꞌne te matabuese, ka mu numu tu yaꞌe-wikoo tu mayodapu-waꞌne.
45006014	Menoꞌo yise tamme gi suda tumatugu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, soo Te Naa yise te sootuhi tooe tamme gi ka ne Jew tumayohopu nakabetseapana.
45006015	Sumuna umu-matu mee unnekwu, “Menoꞌo tamme te Jew numu tumayohopu gi nakabetseana, tamme ewa mesoo maꞌemukwa, soo Te Naa ka te sootuhina te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu.” Pana gi!
45006016	Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu. “Tamme ka sumuoo numu nakabetseana oosoo te nehanedu, tamme yise oo mane. Tamme ka sutakoo nakabetseana, oosoo sutaꞌyoo te sooꞌakwu. tamme ka besow nakabetseana, tamme besaꞌyookwu.”
45006017	Mu ugasoo ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, mu yise ookow nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe menoꞌo, mu ka besow nakabetseana, ka mu natunedyooepu.
45006019	Mu ugasoo mu tookoo-ma tumaꞌemukwana sutaꞌyoo. Menoꞌo sakwa yise mu kaaheno tumayohono.
45006020	Tamme ka oꞌnosoo suda te tumatuguna nakabetseana tamme gi ka besow nakabetseꞌa.
45006021	Oosoo gi te tummatzidu, te sukwe koꞌe. Menoꞌo yise tamme ka oꞌnosoo te mane-ma nasookwaꞌe.
45006022	Pana menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseana ka oo besa podokoo meana, ooosapa tamme besa gwetzoimona, gi ka suda namanedu nakabetseakwu.
45006023	Tammesoo tumaꞌemukwana ka te koꞌe, pana soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe te gwetzoimokwuna, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
45007001	Ka mu Jew numu tumayohope-witu, e nanumu, mu oo sopedakwadoo ka gisoo yaꞌena suuꞌmu tamme te tumayohope nakabetseadu. Menoꞌo sakwa nu besasoo mu tuukwe.
45007002	Soo te tumayohope oe ꞌmane ka mi manekase gi hownnekoo nanemaꞌwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo ka nanodukwa-waꞌne. Tamme ka nanodukwadoose, tamme sakwa te kooma-baa. Tamme suda manakwe ka kummaꞌakoosoo nana koomadoose ka tooesoo kooma-gana kooma mooasoo yaꞌepu, oꞌno yise tammesoo mane-gaꞌyoo ka te mane-kwi. Oꞌno sakwa tamme yise saaꞌa kummaꞌasoo mesoo koomadoo. Oosoo yise gi hownneꞌyookwu.
45007004	Oo manepunne, e nanumu, tamme ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme ka te Jew tumayohopu-nosoo, soo te Jew tumayohope yise ka namanedu-witu suda te tunedyooe. Oꞌno yise tamme ka suda namanedu-witu soohanese sapa tooesoo suda manakwe. Soo suda namanedu tamme-matoosoo kodyuse, te goekwu. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, yise namayodase oosoo tamme yaꞌe-kwaꞌnesoo ka mooasoo te Jew tumayohope gi hee tamme-nakwana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka gi ka te nanamooatu Jew tumayohope nakabetsea manese, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseꞌa. Menoꞌo yise tamme besa manekwu.
45007007	Umu-matu sumuna mee sookamma, “Ka Jew tumayohope numme nakabetseana numme tumaꞌemukwa.” Gi! Soo te Jew tumayohope ka te tumaꞌemukwana te tuukwe. Gisoo tamme te tumayohope sopedakwadoo tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagepana. Ka tooe hekwi tooe soo te Jew tumayohope te tunedyooe, tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo nasoodyagepana, nu oo sopedakwatoo, nupuu tumaꞌemukwa.
45007008	Nu yise unusoo numu nasoodyage manemena, nu ka oo sopedakwadoona nu sakwa gi numu nasoodyagepana. Tamme yise gi oo sopedakwadoo ka te yaꞌekwuna. Pana tamme ka te Jew tumayohope-witu nakase, tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka tumaꞌemukwana, tamme tookwa tuikwu.
45007010	Nu meeoo soonammeyakwe, “Soo te Jew tumayohope e magwetzoikwu,” mee. Pana gi! Umu e sukwe tzapoonnekute nu yaꞌekwu, nu ka gi mu nakabetseana. Nu yise nanemooaga ka meeoo soonammena, “Nu namagwetzoikwu ka te tumayohope nakabetseana.” Pana gi, nu yaꞌekwu.
45007012	Oosoo ne Jew tumayohope unu besaꞌyoo pana yise suda te tumatugunasoo te koꞌe. Aha, pana soo ne Jew tumayohope e tzapoonneku nu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa, nu ka gi hownnekoo ka te tumayohope nakabetseana.
45007014	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka te Jew tumayohope-ma te sootuhi; pana nu gi oo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu ka sutakoo suuꞌmu nakabetseana.
45007015	Nu nanesootuhibu soogwipana ka sutakoo nu tuyoho nu yise gi how madaꞌe.
45007016	Nuudea oo sopedakwadoopana ka mu Jew tumatuguna besaꞌyoona, nu yise sutaꞌyoo numu.
45007017	Nu gi suda e manena petzabe; pana soo sutaꞌyoo oo e mane tuungu. Nu nuusoo gi besa mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ooosapa suda manakwe. Nu besa soomane pana nu gi besaꞌyoo. Nu gi ka besa e soomanena mayoho. Nu ka suda namanedu gi e petzabena suuꞌmu mayoho.
45007021	Nu ka besa tooꞌe soomanepana, togesoo suda manenoꞌo. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu ooosapa ooonneꞌyoo.
45007022	Besa nu tooꞌe tusooyugwepana oosoo sutaꞌyoo e manoyugwe.
45007024	Nu tubetse unu suda soonamme soo sutaꞌyoo e yaꞌe-witoo e moohe. Haga e magwetzoikwu?
45007025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise menoꞌo e magwetzoikwu. Nu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu ka oowetoo namagwetzoise. E soonamme-wi nu ka Te Naa nakabetseꞌapana, nu nuusoo togesoo maꞌemukwa. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ꞌyoo manepunne.
45008001	“Noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku, nu ka suta mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo makodyukukwu,” mee soo Te Naa te netamma.
45008002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha te magwetzoise, te maꞌnaꞌwena nemadabuꞌe, tamme yise gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea manekwu.
45008003	Soo te Jew tumayohope gi ka te tumaꞌemukwana tzadyooiku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ekow te sukwe tzapoonnekute tamme nabatsakwu ka tumaꞌemukwana. Soo Te Naa yise Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa yaatoo manumudoopu. Soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo makwukodyupu yise oo batsa, ka te Jew tumayohope tunetammana-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
45008005	Tamme suda tusooyugwe tamme ka gi besow podo meanona. Tamme besa tusooyugwe, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tumayohokuna.
45008006	Tamme ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseana, oosoo te batsakwu. Pana tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseana, tamme namagwetzoise, besa yise sokwamamokwu.
45008007	Tamme ka te tookoo suda tusooyugwena nakabetseana, tamme tookwa ka Te Naa wohokana, gi Te Naa nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45008008	Tamme ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo gi tamme-matoo besa soonamme.
45008009	Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona oo nakabetsea gi ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa. Tamme ka gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu.
45008010	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna, te moogooa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu, soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena tamme besaꞌyoo tooe te tookoo yaꞌese sapa, tamme ka tumaꞌemukwapuna.
45008011	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mayoda ka oo nabatsase ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma, oo Besa Pooha yise ka saaꞌa tamme tookoo mayodakwu, ka oo Besa Pooha te nemadabuepuse.
45008012	E nanumu, tamme sakwa gi ka suda te tusooyugwena nakabetseapana.
45008013	Tamme ka sutakoo nakabetseana, oosoo te goekwu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme ka suda namanedu tzadyooikuse, namagwetzoikwu.
45008014	Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona tamme tookwa Te Naa doodooamu.
45008015	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise, tu doodooamu te mayugwe. Oosoo unu besa te soobedyana tamme yise, “E Naa,” mee oo neꞌa. Te Naa te magwetzoise tu manewabe te mayugwe. Tu doodooamu te mayugwe, tamme yise gi oo-ma suaꞌe.
45008016	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme oedyukute tamme togesapa Te Naa doodooamu.
45008017	Te Naa te sootuhikwu noꞌoko nasootuhibu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo ka oo doodooamuna. Ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo tamme punnoꞌo nuummabu wumakwu yaa ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona. Oꞌno oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Naa punnoꞌo te sootuhikwu.
45008018	Soo suda namanedu yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona gi hee, soo Te Naa ka saaꞌa besa masoo te sootuhikwu, mee nu.
45008019	Soo Te Naa tu doodooamu mu mayugwese oꞌno yise soo hee noꞌyoona oo tumadabuena atasoo namayugwekwu.
45008022	Ekow umu wutooꞌe. Soo numu yaꞌekwuna kadooꞌyoo namayugwekwu, noꞌyoona hee besaꞌyookwu soo Te Naa ooonnekoo hemma besaꞌhoo te sootuhikwu.
45008023	Mooasoo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-ma te magwetzoina yise saaꞌa te mapudutuputookwu tamme ookow soogwipunne.
45008024	Tamme tooe besa sokwamana oo wutooepunnekwu ka hemma noꞌoko atasoo namayugwekwuse.
45008026	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tummatzaꞌe, tamme ka gi oo soomapuꞌana. Tamme gi oo sopedakwatoo how sakwa tamme nanesootuhi tabua, tamme gi oo nakasopedakwatoo tooe tamme oo nanesootuhikute sapa.
45008027	Soo Te Naa oo nakasopedakwatoo ka tu Besa Pooha nanesootuhiwunu. Oosoo noꞌoko numu sokwammana sopedakwatoo. Soo oo Besa Pooha yise te nanesootuhikute, ka Te Naa pumme sooyugwe-kwaꞌnekoo oo nanesootuhaꞌe.
45008028	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko a namanekwuna besa tamme-tamme nemadabue, ka besa pumme te soobedya, oosoo ka mooasoo te netutzease, te sootuhaꞌe.
45008029	Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa tamme-witu sopedakwadoona te netutzease, tamme yise Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Oꞌno yise soo oo tooaꞌa Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe manepunnekwu, oosoo yise ewow samoomu-gakwu.
45008030	Oꞌno soo Te Naa ka tamme-witu soohanese, yise te netutzease, meeoo te netammakwu, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” yise nawaꞌnesoo te mayugwekwu.
45008031	Gi haga te matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa ka te tummatzina.
45008032	Soo Te Naa puu gi ka tu tooa tamme-makoo netumooꞌe. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma te sukwe sootuhaꞌe ka tu tooa tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
45008033	Gi haga te maꞌemukwa-ma te tuagane-waꞌne manepunne tooe ka te maꞌemukwase sapa. Soo Te Naa mooasoo noꞌoko oo soomuꞌwapu. Menoꞌo yise tamme besaꞌyoo mee oosoo.
45008034	Gi haga sutaꞌyoo mee te netamme-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, tu yaꞌe-wikoo namayodase, menoꞌo Te Naa-baa katuna ka besow tamme-too negwaꞌe.
45008035	Gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme soobedyana kadoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo: Gi tooe how tooe a namanewunudu, numu-tamme tumooꞌoona, tseagoena, tutuha manena, suta-wi manepunnena, numu tamme goena, gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme soobedyana kadoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45008036	A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Ka Te Naa-dooamuna tamme oo-waꞌnesoo, tooe hannanoꞌo tooe nahoawipunnena.”
45008037	Ookow tamme mu matzooekupunne ka Te Pabeꞌe togesoo besa tamme soobedya.
45008038	Nu oo sopedakwatoo gi hee ka Te Naa tamme soobedyana tzadyooiku-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-makoo. Gi hee tamme-koobatu, gi mu toha kakasa-gakoo, gi tsoapa, gi poohabe, gi suda namanedu, gi hee teepu-koobatu, gi hee ka togesoo momona te manena, gi yaꞌena, gi saaꞌa tooe how te manikwuna, gi hee tooe-hanotu tooe Te Naa tumadabuena, ka Te Naa tamme soobedyana gi te sootuhidyidooa.
45009001	Nu nugasoo nanumu ooosapa suda soonammekuyakwe. Nu oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Naa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona nu togesapa tuukweꞌe. E nanumu sakwa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku nu-kwaꞌnesoo, yise Te Naa mu sootuhise, oꞌno umu gwetzoimokwu, ookow nu unu soogwaꞌe. Tooe nu ka e nasootuhina watzekuse sapa, umuoo sakwa ooka nasootuhi. Gi yise oo manepunne.
45009004	Umu Te Naa besa doodooamu mee nananea. Umuoo sakwa Te Naa besa doodooamu, soo Te Naa ka oꞌnosoo mu sootuhipuna. Oosoo ka mu tzapoonnekuna tu tubetse besaꞌyoona, mu tuukweꞌena, mu tunetammakuna putoogoo mu meakwuna, yise ka mu nanesootuhi tabuakwuna. “Nu saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu-matoo tayadooa,” mee mu netamma.
45009005	Te Pabeꞌe ekow teepu-koobatoo nawuese ka umu oo numu habetoo kemmapunnedu. Ka Te Naa tamme nehanepunnedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe manumudoopu ookow nu nesootuhaꞌe.
45009006	Soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa togesapa. Umu-naga-kwitu suuꞌmu Jew numu, Te Naa tubetse doodooamu, gi noꞌyoona.
45009007	Umu Abraham maꞌyoona suagetu-nagatu suuꞌmu Te Naa doodooamu. Soo Abraham ewow naaꞌatse dooamu-gaꞌyoo pana soo Te Naa meeoo oo netamma, “U tooaꞌa Isaac-maꞌyoona suagetu suuꞌmu nu saaꞌa sootuhidooa.”
45009008	Esoo Te Naa unnena, “Mu numu nugasoo tunetuzeana nu sootuhikwu ka nuga tumanumudoona suuꞌmu tuwazoo.”
45009009	Soo Te Naa ka Abraham tuukweꞌe ka Isaac nadooaꞌadookwuna, mee unakwe, “Penakwa tamano ka matoogoosoo e kodyu u nodukwa Sara naatse Tooaꞌa-gakwu.”
45009010	Ka saaꞌa yise soo oo tooa Isaac mee naneadu nadooaꞌadoo, nana manekase yise punnoꞌo nodukwadoo. Oo nodukwa Rebecca mee naneadu ka saaꞌa punnoꞌo waahoo koheꞌa.
45009011	Soo Te Naa ka mu waahoo dooake-witu mee oo netamma, “Soo oo wanngaꞌa saaꞌa ka tu pabeꞌe moohedooa. Nu ooka oo wanngaꞌa netutzease oo sootuhikwu gi ka oo pabeꞌe.” Umu ka gisoo nadooamudoona, gisoo tumaꞌemukwa. Soo Te Naa puusoo tu sootuhikwuna netutzea. Gisoo mu dooake hemma sopedakwadoo sapa, ka tooe how tooe mu manakwe sapa tuwazoo. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute.
45009014	Sumuna umu-matu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa gi toge tumatugupu.” Pana gi!
45009015	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Moses meeoo netamma, “Nu nugasoo petzabena sootuhikwu.”
45009016	Soo Te Naa yise ka pummesoo petzabena sootuhaꞌe, tooꞌetoo umu tu nasootuhina petzabedu.
45009017	Ewetuoo oosoo nabotugu ka Te Naa unnena, mu Egypt numu moohedu meeoo netammana, “Nu umuoo numu u moohe tuungu, pana nu yise u ooonakwa natzooedu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu ka teepu-koobatu oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka e pooha-gana,” meeꞌesoo Te Naa.
45009018	Soo Te Naa yise mu sootuhaꞌe umu tu netutzeana. Umu-matu tusoomatzooedu soo Te Naa mu tzasobedya.
45009019	Sumuna tooe haga tooe meeoo unakwe, “Tamme ka suda manena, soo Te Naa sakwa gi tammesoo meeoo netammapana. Oosoo ꞌyoo te matabuena. Tamme gi hownnekoo oo madaꞌe.”
45009020	Pana gi! Tamme sakwa gi meeoo ka Te Naa nemadabuepana. Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu tamme pukwenabe teepuna-tsedadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo tseda sakwa puu gi ka pumme matabuepu meeoo netammapana, “U atasoo e matabue.” Soo numu pummesoo petzabe-kwaꞌne tumadabue, tooe hownnekoo tooe mu puu tsedadookwu, sumuna besa puu-ma nasootzame-waꞌnekoo, tooetoo mu sukwe tsedadookwu.
45009022	Ooosoo Te Naa puu ka mu numu besa matuku. Susumudu numu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa pana soo Te Naa gi yabesoo mu sutakute. Pana saaꞌa umu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
45009023	Oosoo oo tzapoonne ka susumudu numu manekwuna. Pana susumudu numu oosoo netutzea ka mu sootuhikwuse. Umu yise oo tzapoonnekwu how besaꞌyoo tookwa soo Te Naa. Susumudu umu-matu Jew numu, susumudu yise gi. Pana yise noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
