45009025	Ka mu gi Jew numu-witu ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Hosea mee naneadu Te Naa meeoo unnena tubotugupu, “Umuoo numu ugasoo gi nuga doodooamu. Pana nu nugasoo dooamu mu mayugwekwu. Nu ugasoo gi mu soobedyadu pana menoꞌo yise nu besa mu soobedya.”
45009027	Ka mu Jew numu-witu soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu mee tubotugupu. “Menoꞌo tubetse ewatseꞌyoo Jew numu pana ka saaꞌa soo numu tumaꞌemukwana numu-matoosoo kodyukwu yaa teepu-koobatu. Soo Te Naa yise huutsekoosoo Jew numu magwetzoikwu.”
45009029	Menoꞌo yise Isaiah unne-kwaꞌnesoo manepetu. “Tooꞌe noꞌyoona tamme kadooꞌoo tooꞌe namayugwekwu ka mu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-kwaꞌnesoo. Pana soo Te Naa huuoo tamme-makoo suaketu magwetzoihoo.”
45009030	Meeꞌe nu mu tuukwekwu. Susumudu mu gi Jew numu gi puusoo besa tooꞌe manakwe, pana soo Te Naa yise besa mu mayugwekwu ka unu mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
45009031	Susumudu Jew numu punnoꞌo besa tooꞌe manakwe, pana gi, umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu puusoo sukwe besa tooꞌe naneyugwe, ka ne Jew tumayohope nakabetseana, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo kadoo namayugwekwu.
45009033	Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Ka mu Pabeꞌe mu-baasoo petuse. Umu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa saaꞌa namagwetzoikwu, pana mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka saaꞌa puusoo kadoo namayugwekwu.”
45010001	E pupuaꞌamu, umu e Jew numu namagwetzoina, nu unu oo soogwina ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe umu-koobatoo.
45010002	Nu mu sopedakwatoo umu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana soogwaꞌepana, umu gi hownnekoo oo nakasopedakwatoo.
45010003	Umu puusoo besa tooꞌe manepana, umu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona, soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo mee mu neakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi mu tunakaꞌoedyukute.
45010004	Mu Jew-wi nanesootuhidu numu tooꞌesoo namagwetzoipana ka pumme Jew nanesootuhi-wikoo, gi hownnekoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise menoꞌo atasoo te tunetammakute. Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno Te Naa mee te netammaku, “Besaꞌyoo,” oꞌno yise tamme namagwetzoikwu.
45010005	Soo ne Jew tumayohope ka Te Naa po ataꞌyoosoo. Soo Moses meeoo ka ne Jew tumayohope-witu botugu, “Tamme ka te tumayohope ooosapa nakabetseana, tamme namagwetzoikwu,” pana tamme gi oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45010006	Pana ka te tunakaꞌoedyukudu-witu oosoo besa te mayugwekwu meeoo nabotugu, “Gi unu namanakwe, numu namagwetzoina. Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoo bise, oosoo te magwetzoikwu.
45010007	Gi tamme ka oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45010008	Mooasoo oo namanepu tamme mooasoo ooetu naka. Ekow meeoo naꞌunnedu tamme nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
45010009	“Soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe,” meeꞌe tamme unnena tamme oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase, yise oosoo te magwetzoikwu.
45010010	Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa, “Besaꞌyoo,” mee te netamma, tamme yise ka oo wahana, soo Te Naa te magwetzoaꞌe.
45010011	Oo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Umu tunakaꞌoedyukute, ka gi oo-ma nasookwina.”
45010012	Mu tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe tu namagwetzoina natuungudu nanakabetseadooa, mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo. Te Pabeꞌe pumatoo te nanesootuhidu noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe.
45010014	Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa sakwa tooe haga tooe umu-matoo tayase umu yise umu-baa petugase, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Umu numu oo nakase ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno yise oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Ka a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Besa mu numu ka petudyina, nu ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukwekwu.”
45010016	Umu Jew numu natuukweꞌe, pana gi noꞌyoona ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Isaiah mee naneadu umu-witu boꞌo meeꞌe, “Huuꞌyoosoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka pumme ne tuukwena.”
45010018	Mooasoo mu Jew numu ka Te Naa besa unnepu naka, meeꞌe natubotugu, “Tooe hano tooe ka teepu-kooba soo Te Naa unnepu nawaha.”
45010019	Mu Jew numu ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwatoo, pana gi nasootuhi, ka gisoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Moses meeoo mu netamma, “Umu numu, mu gi Jew numu mu nasootzaꞌme sooyugwena umu meeoo unnena umuoo gi hee umuoo mu nasoodyagekwu ka Te Naa umuoo sootuhaꞌe.”
45010020	Isaiah ka Te Naa unnena waha, “Umu uga gi nu-matoo nanesootuhidu, gi uga e soomayudu pana menoꞌo nu mu natzapoonekute, umu yise e sopedakwatoo manepetu.”
45010021	Pana mu ka Jew numu-witu soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Nu ooosapa umuoo numu tuukweꞌe nu mu sootuhikwu, pana umu gi e unnena nakabetseꞌa.”
45011001	Ewaꞌyoo Jew numu gi nasootuhaꞌe, umu ka gi Te Naa nakabetseana, pana gi noꞌyoona mu Jew. Huuꞌyoosoo nasootuhaꞌe. Nu puu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu Jew numu, ka Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu. Nu ka mu Jew-nagatu-matu Benjamin mee nananeadu. Soo Te Naa puu nuka sootuhaꞌe.
45011002	Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu netutzea mu sootuhikwuse. Soo Te Naa ooosapa umu-nagatu magwetzoikwu. Oꞌnosoo soo Elijah meeoo mu soobedyadu. Noꞌyoona mu Jew gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-witu meeoo nabotugu oosoo ka mu Jew numu nanetzaꞌmekute ka Te Naa meeoo tuukwena,
45011003	“Umuoo numu gi u-matoo nanesootuhi manepu. Umuoo gi u nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo noꞌoko u yadooawabe goꞌe ka u-witu mu waha. Menoꞌo yise nu suuꞌmu nabenaꞌe, togesoo u-matoo nanesootuhidu. Umu yise nuka tooꞌe batsa.”
45011004	Soo Te Naa oo nanekwegease meeꞌe, “Susumudu (7000) umu numu-matu togesoo nu-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhaꞌe.”
45011005	Menoꞌo yise tooe ooosoo. Susumudu Jew numu soo Te Naa sootuhaꞌe, puusoo mu netutzeana mu sootuhaꞌe umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
45011006	Soo Te Naa ekow mu sootuhibu. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooka sukwe sootuhipu, gi hemma puusoo obedoo soogwaꞌe.
45011007	Soo Te Naa huuoosoo Jew numu netutzea tu sootuhikwuna. Tooꞌe noꞌyoona Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina soogwipana, gi nasootuhaꞌe. Umuoo tusoomatzooena, gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
45011008	A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Yow tabeba-wi Te Naa gi mu sukwe tsasobedya ka gi pumme mu sooheesoobedya.”
45011009	Soo David ka oꞌnosoo meeoo tubotugu, “Umu puusoo suda nuukwe ka tooe hemma-ma tooe nasoonatzi, pumme magwetzoikwudu.”
45011011	Nu menoꞌo mu Jew numu gi sootuhaꞌe, pana ka saaꞌa umuoo punnoꞌo nasootuhikwu. Menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo nasootuhaꞌe-waꞌnesoo, mu Jew numu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu ka Te Naa kukummaꞌakoosoo numu oo sootuhina oo sopedakwadoose, umu yise ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina punnoꞌo soogwikwu.
45011012	Mu gi Jew numu nasootuhaꞌe, ka mu Jew numu nasootuhaꞌe, ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa po maꞌwukase. Ka saaꞌa unusoo besaꞌyookwu, ka mu Jew numu ka Te Naa po-matoosoo kodyuse. Oꞌno yise noꞌobatusoo numu nananosoo nasootuhikwu.
45011013	Mu gi Jew numu nu meeoo netammakwu, soo Te Naa-manaa tooe hano tooe e taꞌya, mumme gi Jew numu tu unnena e tuukwe tuunguna. Nu ooosapa besa soonamme ka nanesootuhibu mu tunedyooena, nu besakoo mu tunedyooꞌe, nu ka meeoo soonammena, “Sumuna nugasoo nanumu-matu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina soogwaꞌe, umu ka oo nakana, soo Te Naa mu gi Jew numu sootuhaꞌe.”
45011015	Otea besaꞌyookwu ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, ka menoꞌo mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute, mu gi Jew numu yise natuukwe ka Te Naa unnepu. Umuoo yise Te Naa doodooamu mane. Pana ka saaꞌa ka mu Jew numu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyukuse, oꞌno oe manepetukwu, mu tuipu yise namayodakwu. Umu pumaꞌyoona mu Jew-nakwana suaketu, ugasoo Te Naa doodooamu. Umu Jew numu yise punnoꞌo Te Naa dooamu manepetukwu.
45011017	Nu besasoo ooka mu tuukwekwu. Umu Te Naa doodooamu besow wuyupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu a maꞌna pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, umu puu natsegeaꞌakwuni. Mu gi Jew numu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka besaꞌhoo a maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka besow wuyupe tuna-matoo nadotsanase, mu yise ka besow wuyupe-makoo mu besow nasootuhikwu, tooꞌe ka gi besow wuyupe-matu kemmapana.
45011018	Mu sakwa gi naanaꞌunnepana mu ka mu Jew numu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo. Yoo manepunne, soo wuyupe tubetse tuna puu ka a maꞌna ooonnakwasoo natzooꞌe. Tuna oosoo ka a maꞌna paꞌa tsuipunne.
45011019	Mu sakwa gi meeoo tusooyugwepana, “Nu tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Nu ka umu a maꞌna natzakodekwunina kapi manepunne.”
45011020	Umu a maꞌna natzakodekwuni ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka wuyupe-ma namabeni, mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana mu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, mu punnoꞌo a maꞌna pasa-kwaꞌne natzakodekwunaꞌe. Mu sakwa besasoo mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi muusoo paba nasooyugwepana.
45011022	Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute ka tu hownneꞌyoona. Oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa matugu pana, ka saa gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soo sutakoo umu-matoosoo kodyukukwu. Tamme ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu manese, tamme kadoo namayugwekwu punnoꞌo.
45011023	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Jew numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyuku manepetuse, umuoo ka a tuna-masoo punowsoo nadotsanakwu. Soo Te Naa ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo punowsoo mu nadotsanana.
45011024	Gi haga puu ka sutakoo wuyupe maꞌna ka besow wuyupe-ma dotsana-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa mumme oo yugwekwu. Mu ka sutakoo wuyupe-maꞌyoona kemmadu maꞌna-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo yise ka besa wuyupe-ma mu dotsanapu. Pana oosoo etzaga ka Te Naa-wi ka sumu-kwaꞌnekoosoo maꞌna oe soo matabuena, ka mu Jew numu oꞌnosoo pummesoo puwiꞌyoona mu kemmana a tuna-maꞌyoona ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Te Naa-nakwana gi unu manepunne mu Jew numu ka besow wuyupe-maꞌyoonasoo kemmapuna.
45011025	Ka mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyuku-witu mu numu ugasoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Pana ookow nu besasoo mu tuukwekwu, nu ka gi Jew numu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo mee mu nasooyugwena petzabena. Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa sasobedyapunne, ka mu gi Jew tunakaꞌoedyuku-witoo tooe umu ooka nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
45011026	Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu Jew numu magwetzoikwu. Te Naa unnepu nabotugu, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu ka mu Jew numu meeoo netammapu. Nu mu maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Sumuꞌyoo nana yise mu-nagatu saaꞌa mu Pabeꞌe manedooa. Oosoo saaꞌa noꞌoko mu maꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwedooa.”
45011028	Menoꞌo yise umu Jew numu ka Te Naa woho-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa besa unnena. Mu yise menoꞌo oo doodooamu manepu. Pana soo Te Naa mooasoo tunetutzeapu, oosoo ka mooasoo mu nanamooatupu sootuhaꞌe pumakoo mu suagepu.
45011029	Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu mee unakwe. Oosoo gi tu soonammena aatasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45011030	Mu uga gi nasootuhidu mu gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
45011031	Menoꞌo umu gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku, pana ka saaꞌa umu punnoꞌo nasootuhikwu mu-kwaꞌnesoo.
45011032	Soo Te Naa oo tzapoonne noꞌoko numu ooosapa maꞌemukwana pana oosoo ka saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu.
45011033	Soo Te Naa ka besaꞌyoona te sootuhaꞌe. Oosoo unu soonamme noꞌokosoo hemma sopedakwatoo. Oosoo tubetse besa hemma sootunagapu tamme gi oo nakasopedakwatoo oo tusoohanena. Noꞌyoona oo tusoohanena besaꞌyoo, gi haga besasoo hemma oo tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45011035	Nobatusoo ewa hemma hee-gaꞌyoo gi haga hemma oo gea-waꞌneꞌyoo oo soogwipunnena. Oosoo gi hemma nagutzikute.
45011036	Oosoo ka noꞌokosoo hemma hee-gana. Noꞌoko hemma matabuepuna, noꞌokosoo tuwazoo nemadabue. Ooosapa sakwa tamme noꞌyoona nanasoogwugi oo nesootuhi.
45012001	Tamme sakwa tammesoo Te Naa nagea, soo Te Naa ka ewa besa te sootuhina. Tamme sakwa Te Naa sootuhi ka oo nakabetseana.
45012002	Tamme sakwa atasoo tusooyugwe, gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Te Naa tamme mapudutuputoose, oꞌno yise tamme oo sopedakwadookwu ka besa tamme oo sooyugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
45012003	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nu meeoo mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nanaꞌunnepana.” Soo Te Naa nanaꞌatamasoo te sootuhipu. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka puma Te Naa tamme sootuhina, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo tumayohoku.
45012004	Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu tookoo pu sumuꞌyoosoo pana ewa nanamaꞌata. Tamme puu sumuꞌyoosoo, pana ewa nanaꞌatamasoo nasootuhaꞌe. Oꞌno yise tamme nanatummatzi, tamme yise nanaꞌatasoo manakwe nu puu sumuna Te Naa yadooawabe, nu sakwa yadooa ka Te Naa nuka sootuhi-makoosoo.
45012007	Nu sumuna numu tunedyooekwu Te Naa-witu, nu sakwa yise besa numu tunedyooe. Nu sumuna tutuha manedu numu makakoo, nu sakwa yise mu tutuha manedu e mapuanoko makakoo. Nu sumuna numu moohekwu. Nu sakwa yise ka besow podo mu mooheno. Sumuna nu besa numu matugukwu, nu sakwa yise besa soonamme ka ooonneꞌyoona. Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka Te Naa tamme sootuhi-kwaꞌne mane.
45012009	Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyadu numu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa tumatugu, gi ka suda te manena petukupana.
45012010	Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa soobedya, ka te samoomu te soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa mu matugu tammesoo ooonakwa besasoo.
45012011	Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi, gi toetzegoepana.
45012012	Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi, gi tutuha nasooyugwepana, ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne. Tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
45012013	Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tutuha manedu hemma soogwaꞌe, tamme sakwa mu gea, ka oo hee geana. Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kumakwiꞌyoonasoo kemmadu nabaaꞌyooku.
45012014	Ka mu numu tamme wohoꞌne, tamme sakwa mu nanesootuhiku, besow umutoo nekwi.
45012015	Ka mu numu besa sokwama, tamme sakwa punnoꞌo umu-waꞌnesoo.
45012016	Tamme sakwa nanano besa tusooyugwe. Tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, pana besa umu-no nanapuaꞌaga.
45012017	Tooe tamme suda mu matugu sapa, tamme sakwa besa mu matugu.
45012018	Tamme sakwa tammesoo manena maneka, oꞌno yise tamme gi numu-no nanagoꞌe.
45012019	Ka mu numu tamme suda matugu, tamme sakwa gi umuoo suda matugupana. Tamme sakwa sukwe besa mu matugu, umu ka saaꞌa suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Meeoo natugotugu, “Te Naa meeoo, ‘Nu ka sutakoo mu suda tumatugudu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.’ “
45012020	Meeoo tuwazoo natubotugu, “Ka te wohomu tsuagoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu maka. Ka mu puugoꞌe, tamme sakwa mu bamaka. Umu yise nasookwikwu ka suda te matuguse.”
45012021	Ka mu numu suda tamme matugu, tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo manepana, gi suda mu matugupana. tamme sakwa umu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo te besaꞌyoona, yise ka suda mu manena matzooekukwu.
45013001	Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka mu numu moohedu nakabetsea, soo Te Naa ka numu mu moohe tuunguna.
45013002	Tamme ka gi mu nakabetseana, tamme ka Te Naa gi nakabetseꞌa tuwazoo. Mu numu moohedu ka suda tumatugudu gi besa matugu.
45013003	Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma suipana, tamme ka ooosapa besa manemona. Umu besa te masokwamakute ka oo te manakwe, yise te tummatzaꞌe. Mu suda tumatugudu sakwa ka mu numu moohedu-ma sui, umu ka gi besa mu matugukwuse. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu moohedu, numu moohe tuungu.
45013005	Tamme sakwa mu moohedu nakabetseꞌa, tamme oo sopedakwatoo o a namanena gi ka mu numu moohedu besa sukwe masoonammedu.
45013006	Tamme sakwa mu tumanagaku mu numu moohedu umu ka Te Naa tummatzina, umu ka mu numu moohena.
45013007	Oosoo toge tabuꞌa tamme sakwa mu numu moohedu besa sooyugwena mu tumanagaku ka umuoo te kutzina.
45013008	Tamme sakwa gi ooosapa numu hemma nakutzikupana. Ooosapa besa numu soobedyanumme. Tamme ka numu soobedyana, tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa.
45013009	Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Mu sakwa gi tuduhapana, mu sakwa gi numu goepana, gi kummaꞌakoosoo namahegana nasoodyagepana, gi ka kukummaꞌasoo emukwapana.”
45013010	Tamme sakwa ka mu numu nawaꞌnekoosoo soopedyana, tamme noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Tamme yise gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu suda matugukwu.
45013011	Menoꞌo tugana manipetu soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoikwuna, menoꞌo te nanemadabuekwuna tzageꞌe manike ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme sakwa gi toetzegoepana, ka mu ooosapa utuidu-kwaꞌne.
45013012	Menoꞌo yise ka sutakoo togaba-witu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu numu ewa suda manakwe yaa teepu-koobatu. Pana pudusoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka teepu atasoo yugwekwu, esoo teepu yise besaꞌyookwu. Pana tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo atasoo manegena. Gi sakwa tamme suda manepana. Gi nanano baagoepana, gi nana-ma tumanagapana, gi nanagoena, gi nananemooyugwepana.
45013014	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo. gi sakwa suda tusooyugwepana, ka te tookoo soogwi-kwaꞌne. Tooꞌe tamme oo suda tusooyugwepana gi sakwa tamme oo-toogoo manepana.
45014001	Tamme sakwa mu numu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pupuaꞌamu-ga, gi umu-no nanahapana.
45014002	Sumuna umu-matoo tooe hownnekoo tooe tukapu mesoo tuka, sumuna umu-matoo gi a tookoo tukadu. Susumudu a tookoo gi tukadu, tu tumayohope mayohodu.
45014003	Tamme sakwa gi nananemooyugwepana, gi nananesootzemapana tuwazoo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko te doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma, “Tamme besaꞌyookwu tooetoo sutaꞌyookwu.” Gi sakwa tamme numu nesootzemapana ka tamme atasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa ooosapa mu tummatzina umu besa manenokwu.
45014005	Susumudu tamme-matu nanesootuhi tabeba-gaꞌyoo. Susumudu meeoo, noꞌyoona tabeba nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, ka tammesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna ooosoo yise meadabe. Pana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nesootzemapana ka nanakummaꞌasoo mu tumayoho. Mu numu nanesootuhi tabeba-gaꞌyoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, mu numu a tookoo tukadu punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka tukapu-koobatoo. Mu numu gi a tookoo tukadu punnoꞌo nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo pumme tukapu-koobatoo.
45014007	Pana noꞌyoona tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea.
45014008	Tamme ka tooesoo gwetzoimona sakwa Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea, yise ka Te Naa-baa petugase tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu tuwazoo.
45014009	Tamme sakwa yise oo nakabetseamo ka togesoo gwetzoimona tooe yaꞌese sapa tuwazoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaꞌese namayoda.
45014010	Tamme sakwa gi nananesootzemapana, gi suda nananemadabuepana, saaꞌa soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te nemadabuekwu.
45014011	Ka a nanemadabue-witu meeoo nabotugu, “Saaꞌa noꞌyoona numu ka Te Naa nesootuhidooa. Noꞌyoona numu oo tunemadabuena nakabetseakwu.”
45014012	Ooonneꞌyoona tamme noꞌyoona nanasuuꞌmu ka Te Naa nanekwegeakwu ka te manepu-witu.
45014013	Tamme sakwa yise gi numu nesootzemapana. Sumuna mu numu-matu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo ka te tumayohope te nagenoꞌo.
45014014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe, Jesus nuka tunedyooepu soo tukapu noꞌyoona besaꞌyoo mee. Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, noko ka te tukapu besaꞌyoona.
45014015	Ka oo nabeatse-gana sumuna nagumanayahadooa. Umu yise tumaꞌemukwa ka sutaꞌyoo mee oo sooyugwena. Nu sumuna gi toge mu tumatugukuna umuga sumuna oo namanabuekute. Nu sakwa yise gi suta mu tumatugukupana, soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo umu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
45014016	Tooe tamme gi oo nabeatse-gapana, tooetoo gi ooka te namanabuekute sapa.
45014017	Soo Te Naa unnepu gi ka tukapu-witu suuꞌmu ka nahebetu-witu tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi, “Besaꞌyoona, besa tumatuguna, besa sokwama.”
45014018	Tamme ka oo unnepu nakabetseana ka te pupuaꞌamu besa sooyugwena, soo Te Naa besa soonammekwu tamme-koobatoo. Mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu tamme tookwa besa manakwe.
45014019	Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu numu tummatzino, umu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi oo-koobatoo nananepetukukwu.
45014020	“Noꞌyoona tukapu besaꞌyoo,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa, tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa numu sootuhikwuna umu-makoo magamukupana, ka te tukana tuwazoo. Tamme nabeatse saaꞌa gi ka mu numu manayahadooa.
45014021	Oosoo besaꞌyoo tamme ka gi a tookoo tukana, gi atsa tzaꞌemukwa baa hebena, tamme sumuna atasoo tumayohodu numu manayahakwu.
45014022	Tamme noꞌoko ekow sopedakwadoo, tamme sakwa gi unnepana. Tamme gi wahaba tusooyugwedu, tamme oo sopedakwadoo; ka besow nakabetseana, yise besa sokwamakwu.
45014023	Tamme tumaꞌemukwa, ka gi tammesoo tumayohope nakabetseana.
45015001	Tamme sakwa ka unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzi, oꞌno umu punnoꞌo unu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Gi sakwa tamme tammesoo tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne manepana.
45015003	Soo Te Pabeꞌe, puu Te Naa tunetammatoo manakwe. Gisoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu-kooba petuna oo sopedakwatoo, ka mu numu suda pumme matugukwuna. Oꞌnosoo a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Umu ume wohonedusoo nuka nekwohoꞌne tuwazoo.” Oosoo mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo pana yaa petu.
45015004	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko eka naꞌunnepu botugu, tamme natunedyooekwuna, te nenoyukwekwu, oꞌno tamme ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, oo sopedakwatoona, Te Naa yise te sootuhikwu.
45015005	Soo Te Naa te nenoyugwena te tummatzaꞌe, “Mu yise oo nakabetseana nananeꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe nagenokwu,” nu mu nanetzakwiyaꞌekute. Ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna, tamme noꞌyoona sumusoo nesootuhimeakwu.
45015007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugwepu. Tamme sakwa yise besa nanamatugu. Soo Te Naa tamme-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
45015008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka namanumudoose ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa mayugweke ka mu Jew numu oꞌnosoo tuukwepu oosoo ka mu Jew numu tummatzikwu.
45015009	Te Naa ka mu gi Jew numu sootuhipunnena yise umu ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe. Te Pabeꞌe unne-kwaꞌnesoo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Nu ka Te Naa hoobeatookute. Umu gi Jew numu, nu ka Te Naa besaꞌyoona tuukwekwu.”
45015010	Meeꞌe tuwazoo nabotugu, “Noꞌyoona numu sakwa ka Te Naa nesootuhi.”
45015012	Mee tuwazoo soo Isaiah tubotugu, “David-maꞌyoona suaketu pudusoo petukwu. Te Naa noꞌobatusoo numu nemadabuekwu, mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwadookwu soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.”
45015013	Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mumme magwetzoikwu. Nu oo-matoo nanesootuhikwu oosoo besa mu masoonammekwu, mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna. Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanaꞌunusoo besa tunakaꞌoedyuku manedooa.
45015014	Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu besaꞌyoo numu, ewa hemma sopedakwadoona Te Naa unnepu-witu hemma mesoo nanatunedyooꞌe.
45015015	Pana nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu nemayukuna ka mooasoo mu sopedakwadoona.
45015016	Soo Te Naa e sootuhise, nu ka mu gi Jew numu tuukweꞌe ka besa oo unnena, oosoo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwena, soo Te Naa yise tu doodooamu mu mayugwekwu.
45015017	Nu besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka sootuhise, nu yise ka Te Naa unnena waha.
45015018	Nu gi nuga soo unena waha, pana ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-toohakwi, nu yise oo wahana oo tzapoonne, ka mu gi Jew numu ooka nakaꞌoedyukwuna. Mooasoo tooe hano tooe ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona ka Illyricum-witoo, nu noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu waha.
45015020	Nu ooosapa ka mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu tunesootabue meaꞌakwu. Mooasoo ka numu natuukwepu-wiꞌyoona, nu gi numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
45015021	A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu oo nakase, oo nakasopedakwadookwu.”
45015022	Ewasoo tommoka nu ka mu-baatoo soomeayina tuwazoo. Pana nu ooosapa yaanona nanedyaꞌwe nu ka mu numu yaatuoo tuukwena. Pana nu mooasoo mu numu yaatuoo tuukwemakwu.
45015024	Nu saaꞌa mu-baa yooigeadooa ka teepu Spain mee naneadu-witoo meana. Nu besa soonammekwu ka mu-baa nobengena, mu yise e tummatzikwu ka mana e numme-kwi.
45015025	Mu Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi ka Jerusalem-witu ooosapa mu gi Jew numu tooe hanotu tooe tummatziyakwe, ka Te Naa besa unnena mu wahakwuse.
45015026	Menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu Macedonia noꞌoko Achaia mee nananeadu-witu meeoo sooyugwe, “Besaꞌyoo ka Jerusalem-witoo mu tutuha manedu Jew numu mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina, ka hemma mu tayakuna.”
45015027	Umu oo sopedakwadoo umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina, ka mu Jew numu otuoo pumme tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa unnena. Umu ꞌyoo soomanena, umu yise tumasumutoo.
45015028	Menoꞌo yise nu Jerusalem-witoo oo hanekakwu. Nu yise ka mu numu tumasumutoona mu hanekuse, nu mu-baa yooigeadooa ka teepu Spain mee naneadu-witoo meana.
45015029	Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka mu-baa e petugase soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhikwu.
45015030	Nu nuusoo natoogoo nanesootuhaꞌeyakwe mu sakwa e nanesootuhi tummatzi meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe te tunemadabuekupu ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise besa nanasoobedya mee te netammana.
45015031	Mu sakwa e nanesootuhiku, oꞌno nu namagwetzoikwu ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nuka nebatsayakwe ka teepu, Judea mee naneadu-witoo, e meakwuse. E nanesootuhiku tuwazoo ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-wi.
45015032	Ka Te Naa mane-makoosoo nu saaꞌa mu baa petugase besa soonammedooa, oꞌno mu saaꞌa yise e nenoyugwenokwu.
45015033	Nu meeoo nanesootuhi, soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhi.
45016001	Eka mogoꞌne Phoebe mee naneadu-witu, eka tubope gwuudu, masoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu, Cenchrea mee naneadu-witu kemmana.
45016002	Oosoo ewasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatziyakwe, nuka tuwazoo. Saaꞌa mu-baa oo petugase, tooe hemma tooe oo soogwina oo gea, oosoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
45016003	Susumudu mu-nagatu nu mooasoo sopedakwadoo. Nu yise mu soomaꞌyu. Umuoo nananeana yaa: Priscilla-no Aquila, e napuaꞌana, numme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwe.
45016004	Umuoo nu-koobatoo tooꞌe nabatsakwate, nu yise ka mu gi Jew numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no, mu nesootuhaꞌe.
45016005	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nobe-witu numu-no nanesootuhaꞌe. E puaꞌa, Epaenetus mee naneadu soo numu-kobenasoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka mu numu-nagatu ka ekow teepu Asia mee naneadu-witu.
45016006	E puaꞌa, Mary, ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu.
45016007	E pupuaꞌamu Andronicus-no Junias, nu-no uga nakwutumadu. Umu tuwazoo Jew nanana, umu unu nasopedakwadoodu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe. Umuoo nu-koobenasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
45016008	Ampliatus, Te Pabeꞌe-makoo e besa puaꞌa.
45016009	Urbanus, Te Pabeꞌe ewa tummatzidu numme-waꞌnesoo, e besa puaꞌa, Stachys.
45016010	Apelles, ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. E puaꞌa, Aristobulus nanumu.
45016011	Herodian nu-kwaꞌnesoo Jew numu, Narcissus nanumu punnoꞌo nanesootuhidu.
45016012	E pupuaꞌamu Tryphaena-no Tryphosa, mu momokoꞌne, ewa Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi. Persis punnoꞌo ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzi.
45016013	Rufus punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe ewa tummatzi. Oo pea ooosapa tu tooa-waꞌnesoo e matugudu.
45016014	Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas yise umu-no nanesootuhidyidu, mu nobe-wiꞌyoona.
45016015	Philologus, Julia, Nereus tu punneꞌe-no. Olympas yise umu o-no nanesootuhidyidu oo nobe-wiꞌyoona.
45016016	Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatoo mu soomaꞌyu. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanapuaꞌa.
45016017	E pupuaꞌamu, mooasoo mu ka Te Naa besa unnepu natunedyooepu. Tamme sakwa mu tsasobedya umu ka naꞌunnepu-koobatoo nananepetugudu.
45016018	Umuoo ooonneꞌyoo nananepetugudu ka pummesoo sookwina nakabetseadu. Gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea. Umuoo besa ka mu gi sokwamadu numu yadooꞌe, umu ka mu nemooagana.
45016019	Pana mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu besa mu-koobatoo soonamme. Nu meeoo mu soobedya mu sakwa ooosapa oo nakasopedakwadoona besa manena gi suda tusooyugwepana.
45016020	Soo Te Naa te tummatzina, tamme gi nanaha. Pudusoo oosoo mu tummatzina mu ka sutakoo matzooekukwu ka mumme matzamadu. Nu mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa mu sootuhi.
45016021	Umu nu-baatu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu, nuka tummatzidu, Timothy. E nanumu Lucius, Jason-no Sosipater.
45016022	Nu, yise, Tertius tubodu mu soomaꞌyu. Ooka, nu Paul, e pubaaꞌyoona Gaius punnoꞌo.
45016023	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatuoo. Mu numu nokadu kooba tumanakatudu, Erastus mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu.
45016025	Te Naa suuꞌmu unu soonammedu, oosoo unu soonammena te sootuhina, tamme yise gi tunakaꞌoedyukumakwukwu. Onosoo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwepu, “Nu noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu,” mee. Yise oꞌnosoo oo yadooawabe ekow botugupu. Tooe noꞌyoona mu numu uga gi a nakasopedakwatoo, pana menoꞌo yise soo besa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nawaha, noꞌobatusoo numuoo natuukwe, umu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo nakabetsea. Nu punnoꞌo mana numu tuukweyakwe ka besa naꞌunnedu. Ooosapa tamme ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
46001001	Nu, Paul, Te Naa tunetutzeana Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe, ne tubona ka e pua Sosthenes-no.
46001002	Esoo mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka Corinth mee naneadu-witu-matoo nabodu Te Naa tunetuutzeapu numme-waꞌnesoo.
46001003	Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute, “Soo Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe-no mu sootuhise, mu magwetzoikwu.”
46001004	Nu ooosapa Te Naa besa sooyukwe ka besa Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo mu nasootuhise.
46001005	Mu noꞌobatumasoo nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sootuhi, mu yise tuwazoo noꞌoko hemma waha, yise noꞌoko hemma mu nakasopedakwadoona.
46001006	Noꞌyoona soo mumme ne tuukwepu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu oo manepunne.
46001007	Mu yise besa pooha nasootuhipu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabena oo-baa mu petuga-matoo tooe.
46001008	Oꞌno yise mu tubetse besaꞌyookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme tunemadabueku-kwaꞌne.
46001009	Tamme Te Naa-ma nasoonatzaꞌe oosoo te netutzeapuna. Tamme yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-noꞌyookwu. Oosoo te nemabetseakwu.
46001010	E nanumu, menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌe nanano tuunoyugwena, oꞌno mu gi nanasukwesoo nanatumooꞌookwu, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
46001011	E nanumu, soo mogoꞌne Cloe mee naneadu nanaumu-matu mee e tuukwe, “Mu nanahana nananepetukute,” mee.
46001012	Mee nu tunakana susumudu mu-nagatu mee unakwe, “Numme Paul nakabetseadu,” susumudu punnoꞌo meeꞌe, “Numme Apollos nakabetseadu,” yise susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Peter nakabetseadu,” yise sumubaatu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu nakabetseadu.”
46001013	Tamme noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo, tamme noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Nu, Paul, gi mumme magwetzoidu, nu ka gi numu-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Mu baa-wi namatzaka ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana, gi mu nuka tumayohokute.
46001014	Nu besa soonamme ka waahoosoo nanana suuꞌmu, mu-nagatu baa-wi matzakase
46001015	Nu gi mu numu meeoo unnena petzape, umu baa-wi mu matzaka ka Paul-wi tunakabetseana meeꞌe.
46001016	Nu tookwina ka mu Stephen nanadooamu baa-wi matzakapu tuwazoo, pana nu gi haga kummaꞌakoosoo soomaꞌyu baa-wi e matzagapu.
46001017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-matoo e taꞌya, ka besa naꞌunnedu mumme e tuukwe tuunguna, gi nagutza baa-wi numu e matzaka tuunguna. Nu mu tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi, gi nugasoo unnena. Soo nuga unnena gi pooha-gaꞌyoo, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, suuꞌmu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
46001018	Mu numu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwudu meeoo sokwama, “Soo Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu-witu gi oo nakaheesoobedya.” Tamme Te Naa-toohakwi namagwetzoidu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unnepu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
46001019	Soo Te Naa unnepu nabotugudu meeoo, “Nu ka unu soonammedu mee nasooyugwedu numu, ooka yadooadu tuwazoo, gi he-toogoo mayugwekwu.”
46001020	Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka unu sokwamadu mee naneyugwedu numu unnena gi he-toogoo mayugwepu. Gadooꞌoo haga numu-matu unu soonammedu, ewa natunedyooepu, noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu namanewununa sopedakwadoodu, ka Te Naa kumisoo.
46001021	Soo Te Naa tooe gi mu sokwama tumapuꞌa sapa, puusoo soo Te Naa nakwitu mu tunedyooe. Oosoo Te Naa numu magwetzoi umu besa ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu pumme tu tuukweꞌe, tooe susumudu numu gi hemma heesoobedya mee mu unakwe sapa.
46001022	Tamme ooosapa mu numu tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana tooe ka susumudu mu Jew numu gi ooka nakaꞌoedyukute sapa. Susumudu mu Jew numu ka Te Naa pumme tzapoonneku tuungu, ka gi Te Naa unnena nakatoge soobedyana ka nanabesa oo pooha manena. Susumudu mu gi Jew numu Te Naa unnepu gi nakaꞌoedyukute yise meeoo sokwama soo unnepu gi hee.
46001024	Tamme numu Te Naa tunetutzeapu, namekoosoo mu Jew numu yise mu gi Jew numu-nagatu oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.
46001025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoona te sootuhipu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unu soonammedu.
46001026	E pupuaꞌamu, mu haaꞌa oo soomaꞌyu ka hownneꞌyoo uga tamme ka Te Naa gisoo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu uga sokwamadu ka mu numu unu sokwamadu-nagatu. Huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu numu moohedu yise huuꞌyoosoo ewow hemma hee-gaꞌyoo.
46001027	Soo Te Naa tamme numu gi maawaꞌnekoo soobedyana te netutzeꞌa, tamme numu ooonakwasoo sootatzenguna. Ka numu ooonakwasoo nasooyugwedu umuoo ka Te Naa-nakwana gi natatzenga.
46001029	Soo Te Naa tu dooamu te matabue, oꞌno tamme gi tammesoo nanaꞌunakwe Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona.
46001030	Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohaꞌyoona tamme Te Naa doodooamu manepu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoipuna, besa te matabuepu. Ka ꞌyoo manepunnena tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi sokwama tabuꞌapuna.
46001031	Esoo nabotugudu tubetsetu nayadooadu. “Tamme sakwa Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu netubetsea.”
46002001	Nu ka mu-baa petugase, nu gi natzooe nuummana, gi nuusoo nama nanaꞌunne-waꞌne manepunne, nu yise meeoo tusooyugwe nu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa-witu suuꞌmu mu tuukweꞌe. Nu meeoo mu soobedyana mu sakwa tunakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo mu nenoyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzina.
46002005	Oꞌno mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu ka Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi tunakaꞌoedyukute, gi numu sukwe unne-toohakwi.
46002006	Nu ka ooka nakasopedakwatoodu numu unusoo oosoo besa tuukwekwu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu. Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa gi eka mu numu tunesootabue ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Menoꞌo yise oosoo tamme tuukweꞌe, tamme ka oo doodooamu manese. Soo Te Naa soonammepu gi ka numu tusooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi tuwazoo ka numu moohedu tusooyugwe-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Naa-nakwana numu moohedu saaꞌa gi hee manedooa.
46002008	Umuoo numu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo ka unu soonammedu unnepu. Umu gi oo nakasopedakwatoona, ooonneꞌyoona umu ka Te Pabeꞌe batsapu.
46002009	Esoo nabotugudu tubetsetu meeꞌe ka oꞌnosoo nayadooaꞌadu, “Soo Te Naa ka umu unu pumme soobedyadu sootuhikwu.”
46002010	Pana soo Te Naa noꞌoko ooka te nakasopedakwadookwuna te sootuhipu, ka Tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Oo Pooha noꞌokosoo hemma te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa soonammepunnena tooe.
46002011	Soo numu puu, puusoo tu tusooyugwena sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ka tu tusooyugwena puusoo sopedakwatoo.
46002012	Soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhipu noꞌoko soo hemma pooha sopedakwadoodu. Esoo oo Besa Pooha gi ka egeahoo teepu-koobatu poohabe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46002013	Oosoo puusoo ooka tamme tu pooha sootuhipu te tsanakasopedakwatookute. Ooonneꞌyoona numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu, mu numu tuukwe, soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe, gi tamme kummaꞌakoosoo poohabe natunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46002014	Soo numu ka gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhina, ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina gi soogwaꞌe. Umu gi hee mee oo sooyugwe, umu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona.
46002015	Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi suuꞌmu tamme oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha heegana tamme noꞌoko hemma nakasopedakwadookwu, oetu soohanekwu; pana gi haga tamme nakasopedakwatoona tamme-witu nehane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Meeoo oowetuoo nabotugu.
46002016	“Mu numu gi ka Te Naa soonammena nakasopedakwatoo. Oosoo numu ooonakwatusoo sopedakwatoo gi umu puu hemma oo tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Pana tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tusooyugwena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
46003001	E nanumu, nu mu sukwe yadooe, mu numu sukwe nagedu e yadooe-kwaꞌnesoo, gi ka umu Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseadu-kwaꞌne. Mu pudu nadooamudoodu oongaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46003002	Umu puu gi ka unu nayadooadu nakasopedakwadoo pudu nadooaꞌadoodu oongaꞌa-waꞌne, sukwe petze suuꞌmu, gi ka a tookoo tuka. Mu gisoo kummaꞌakoosoo naꞌunnepu-too namabetzape, ka gisoo mu oo nakasopedakwadoona tuwazoo.
46003003	Mu gisoo ka Te Naa besa podo mea. Mu togesoo nanahana, nana ooonakwa nasooyukwe nanatamme. Ooonekoo mu nasoopetakwatoo mu gi Te Naa podo meꞌa, mu numu mu sukwe nage.
46003004	Susumudu mu-nagatu meeoo unakwe, “Numme Paul nakabetseadu.” Susumudu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Numme Apollos nakabetsea.” Mu ka meeoo nanahana mu numu sukwe nake.
46003005	Numme Apollos-no gi Mu Pabeꞌe, numme Apollos-no ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe tummatzidu, numme yaahoo a nanetutzeana mu-matoo natayadu. Nu mooeꞌugasoo mu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka saaꞌa soo Apollos unusoo oetuooo mu tunedyooekwu, pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu ooka mu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu tunedyooekwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
46003007	Numme yise ka Apollos-no nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo, numme ka Te Naa tummatzidu. Tamme Te Naa nakabetseadu suuꞌmu nanakummaꞌamasoo nasootuhikwu, ka besa te mane-kwi.
46003010	Mu ka Te Naa nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka tupe tzatuoona ka Te Naa pukooba nobe-dookwuna. Mu nu penakwa kemmadu Te Naa yadooawabe oo-koobasoo nasootuhikwu saaꞌa tuwazoo ka numu besa tunedyooena. Soo besa naꞌunnedu Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapugana ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
46003011	Gi hanotu mu atasoo naꞌunnedu naka-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsapu-witu mu tuukwepu, ka togesoo mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku.
46003012	Soo numu natunedyooena ka numu tummatzina, ka besow tupe namadabuedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme tunedyooedu tamme mu tunedyooepu-makoosoo nesootunagakwu. Soo te natunedyooena besaꞌyoo ka numu tummatzina, soo Te Naa besa podo nameadu besaꞌhoo tupe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, goso sapa gi how oo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Owetuoo yise Te Naa te tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo te natunedyooena ka gi numu tummatzina gi besaꞌyoo, oꞌno oosoo wahabu, wobe yise hooope-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu. Oosoo puu ka nihoose kootzasooakwu. Soo gi besa numu natunedyooena, gi ka goso-wiꞌyoona namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi hee nagoopenikukwu. Tamme sukwe namagwetzoikwu, gi tamme nasootuhikwu.
46003016	Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme-nagaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, mu sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo.
46003017	Tamme ka tammesoo gi besaꞌyoona, soo Te Naa kadoo te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha gi tamme-naga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ka umu gi totsaba-gakoo numu-naga suuꞌmu.
46003018	Mu sakwa gi nasooꞌemukwapana. Ka tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu unu soonamme mee oo nasooyugwe sapa, gi sakwa oosoo meeoo nasooyugwepana, ka tu tusopedakwadoo-ma sakwa oosoo gi nasootzaꞌmepana. Soo Te Naa gi ooka besa sooyugwe. Oosoo ka gi meeoo nasooyugwena oosoo soonammetabuakwu.
46003019	Soo Te Naa umu unu sokwamedu mee nasooyugwedu ka teepu-koobatu, “sagwamanakwe,” mee mu nemadabue. Oosoo togesapa nabotugu, soo Te Naa unnepu, “Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka umu unu sokwamadu numu, mu numumu nemooꞌagadu. Oosoo yise suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.” Yise meeoo tuwazoo,
46003020	“Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo, mu unu sokwamadu numu tusooyugwena gi hee.”
46003021	Gi yise umu-ma nanaꞌunnepana.
46003022	Noꞌyoosoo hee Te Naa tumadabuena tamme tummatzikwudu: nu Paul, Apollos, yise Peter, ka teepu-kooba togesoomodu, mu tuipu, menoꞌo namanedu tooetoo saaꞌa a namanekwuna noꞌyoona namadabuepu te tummatzikwuse.
46003023	Tamme namadabue ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseakwudu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo Te Naa nakabetseadu.
46004001	Mu sakwa numme ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu besa matugu, ka Te Naa Pooha unnepu-witu newahammoꞌo.
46004002	Tamme sakwa kaaheno numu tunedyooe ka Te Naa besa unnepu. Gi hownneꞌyoo numu nuka nesootzemapana.
46004003	Mu gi e nesootzemapana, Te Naa suꞌumu e hownneꞌyoona sopedakwadoo.
46004005	Mu sakwa muusoo gi numu nemadabuepana gi numu nesootzemapana. Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe wutooe oo kodyu petukwuna. Oosoo ka kodyupetuse te nemadabuekwu oosoo mu tuukwekwu noꞌoko ka sutakoo numu tuwatzetugu-ma mu yise ka besa mu tumatugu-ma mu sootuhikwu.
46004006	E nanumu, nu mooasoo ka numme-witu mu nanekwahakapu yise Apollos-witu tuwazoo, oꞌno mu oo nakasopedakwadoona gi ka Te Naa tubo tuguna kwingakwatoosoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno mu gi susumudu numu nanaꞌooonnakwa sooyugwedooa.
46004007	Mu sakwa gi nanaꞌunnepana ka muusoo gi besaꞌyoona punnoꞌo. Tamme ka nanaꞌunnena tamme meeoo sokwama, “Numme besaꞌyoo ka ne mane-kwi,” pana mu gi besaꞌyoo. Noꞌyoona soo besa te tumatuguna Te Naa tamme sootuhina.
46004008	Susumudu mu-matu nanaꞌunnena mee nanaꞌunakwe, “Mooasoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu Besa Pooha-ma ne sootuhipu.” Numme, Te Naa besa yadooawabe, puu gisoo noꞌoko ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhaꞌe. Mu punnoꞌo gisoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa noꞌoko Tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhidooa.
46004009	Pana gi! Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Gi hownneꞌyoo ka e yadooawabe, suda matugupana.” Soo Te Naa tuwazoo meeoo, “Gi hownneꞌyoo umu e yadooawabe ka nu-koobatoo nagoese numu-kobenaꞌyoona, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo-kobenaꞌyoona tuwazoo.”
46004010	Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu haꞌyoo tooe ne sooyugwepana, numme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meana. Pana mu ka mu numu besa mumme mu sooyugwena petukute. Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu gi ohobu nanesootuhi mee ne sooyukwe pana, mu puu unu mu besa nanesootuhi, mu ka mu numu mee mumme mu sooyugwekuna petzape. Numu besa mu sooyukwe pana, umu numme gi heesoobedya.
46004011	Menoꞌo numme tseagoena, puugoena, mooasoo pukwi ne namadabuena ketzimena kadoo manemena. Numme mooasoo namooedyakwe. Numme-too gi nobe-gaꞌyoo.
46004012	Numme ooosapa nummesoo hemma how yugwe, ne mi-ma. Numme ooosapa besa mu yadooꞌe tooe suda numme mu netamma sapa. Tooe ka mu numu numme netumooꞌoo sapa, numme ka togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hayoo unakwe.
46004013	Tooe mu numu numme nesootzeꞌma sapa numme besa mu matugu. Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe numme ka tuukwunipu-kwaꞌne namatugupana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooꞌe gi haga ne petzabepana. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme gi hee ka mu numu-nakwana.
46004014	Nu meeoo mu tuuya tuukweꞌe, oꞌno sakwa mu ka Te Naa podo besa meadabe. Gi nu mu sukwe nasookwina petzape, nu ka unu mu soobedyana.
46004015	Nu uga mooeꞌugasoo mu manena mu tuukwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu, oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mane, ka e doodooamu-waꞌnesoo. Saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu kemma.
46004016	Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-no Te Pabeꞌe nageno.
46004017	Nu ka Timothy mu-matoo taya, e dooa-waꞌnesoo e soobedyana. Oosoo puu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu. Ka mu-baa petugase soo Timothy saaꞌa mu nemayukudooa, noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu e tuukwena tooe mu tunehane-kwiꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
46004018	Susumudu mu-matu naanaꞌunakwe, ka gi mu-baa e petugakwuse. Nu gi petugakwu mee mu sokwama.
46004019	Pana pudusoo nu mu-baa petugakwu, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netammase, oꞌno nu oo sopedakwadookwu haꞌoo mu numu paba nasooyugwedu ka Te Naa besa podo tubetse meadabe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo, pute umu sukwe nasootzaꞌme.
46004020	Tamme sakwa gi meeoo sukwe unnepana, “Numme ka Te Naa besa podo meꞌa,” meeꞌe. Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tzapoonneku ka Te Naa Besa Pooha hee-gana.
46004021	Ka saaꞌa mu-baa e petugase, mu sakwa besaꞌyoona, nanasoobedyana, mu ka ata-tamme soo manena nu mu nesagwikukwu. Nu gi mu nesagwikuna meeoo mu netamma.
46005001	Nu meeoo tunaka sumuꞌyoo nana mu-nagatu ka tu naa nodukwagapu nodukwadoo. Oo suda namanedu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu gi mayoho.
46005002	Mu sakwa nasookwi, mu sakwa uga ka nana needa, oosoo gi mu-baaꞌyoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana oo manena mu papaba nasooyugwe.
46005003	Tooe nu yaa mu-kwingaꞌayoo pana nu oo sopedakwatoo ka a namanewununa oosoo suda manakwe mee nu tusooyugwe, meeoo soo sakwa nu tusooyukwe nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona.
46005004	Mu ka nanano sumuse, ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-nagaꞌyookwu; nu saaꞌa mu soomayupunnedooa.
46005005	Mu yise sakwa ka suta-matoo eka nana tzakwuni. Oosoo sumuna ka oo tookoo kadooꞌoo mayugwekwu, pana yise ka suda oo tusooyugwena kadooꞌoo namayugwese, oosoo namagwetzoidooa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme nemadabuekwudu kodyu petuse.
46005006	Mu sakwa gi ewetuoo-ma nanaꞌunnepana. Sumuꞌyoosoo numu ka sutaꞌyoona noꞌoko mu numu suda nemadabue. Mu sakwa gi nanano namayuapana, besaꞌyoo ka mu sutakoo numu-no. Mu gi namayuadu tukaba-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46005007	Mu sakwa gi ka sutakoo numu nabaaꞌyookupana. Oꞌno mu tubetse unu besaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Oosoo ka seepu-waꞌneꞌyoo numme Jew numu tubatsana, ka tu ewa nadukanoꞌo.
46005008	Ookow ewa tukapu-wiꞌyoona numme Jew gi namayuadu tukaba suuꞌmu tuka. Oosoo meeoo naꞌunnedu, numme gi namayuꞌa, besaꞌyoo suuꞌmu, kadoo sutaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi namayuapana, susumudu besaꞌyoo, susumudu sutaꞌyoo. Tamme ka oꞌnosoo unu nidyupu, tooe how tooe suda manakwe, menoꞌo yise tamme sakwa kaaheno gi totsaba-gana meadabe.
46005009	Oꞌnosoo nu mu-matoo tubopu, mu numu suda tusooyugwedu gi napuaꞌapana,
46005010	nu gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu netamma. Umu ooonneꞌyoona: unu moogoobuna, tutuhana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina.
46005011	Susumudu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute mee naneꞌyugwe, tooe umu tooe how tooe manaꞌwepana sapa. Umu meeoo naneyugwedu tooe how tooe manakwe kummano napootammana, unu moogoobuna, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, baagoena, tumamooagana, tooe how tooe manakwe. Umu meeoo naneyugwedu sawa gi tame pupuaꞌa-ga mee nu.
46005012	Tamme sakwa mu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nemadabuepana. Tamme gi mu nemadabue-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu nemadabue.
46005013	Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa puusoo mu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemadabuekwu. Mu sakwa ka nana suda manedu tuukwe oosoo gi mu-matu.
46006001	Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nahana tamme sakwa ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu tamme ooka nemakaahenoku tuungu. Tamme sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi meeoo netammapana.
46006002	Mu oo sopedakwadoo ka saaꞌa Te Naa doodooamu noꞌoko numu nemadabuekwudu ka yaa teepu-koobatu. Tamme tuwazoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, Te Naa tu tummatzidu nemakaahenokukwu.
46006004	Ooonneꞌyoonow tamme sakwa tammesoo ka nanahana oo nemakaahenoku. Tooe gi besa soonamme-gaꞌyoo mu-nagatu, ka ooonnekoo mesoo namakaahenokute.
46006005	Nu meeoo mu tuukwe, oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadoo mu ka suda manena. Tooe haga tooe mu-nagatu ka sumuna unu soonammedu, ka mu nanahana nemakaahenokukwu.
46006006	Mu sakwa ooonnekoo mu-nagatu mayu, pana gi hownneꞌyoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi kaaheno mu nemayugwe tuunguna.
46006007	Soo natoogoo mu pabenana oo tzapoonne, mu nanosoo suda manakwe. Mu sakwa meeoo sokwama, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe haga tooe e tumooꞌoona e tooe wutumana.”
46006008	Pana gi! Mu muusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu wutumana, mu tumooꞌoogena, mu samoomunokoosoo.
46006009	Soo numu suda tumatugudu ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi oo sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanemooagapana. Gi haga saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo meadooa ka yoo suda tumatuguna: atasoo nanesootuhidu, nanakummaꞌakoosoo pootamana, nana-ma tusoonagana,
46006010	tutuhadu, unu moogoobu numu, baagoedu, tunesootzemadu, tooetoo numu nemooagadu, tooe hownnekoo tooe suda namanedu mayohodu.
46006011	Mu uga ooonneꞌyoo ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha gi totsabu mu matabue, besa tuwazoo mu matabue ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatu nabatsase.
46006012	“Tamme tooe how tooe mesoo manakwe,” mee mu, pana soo te manena gi te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. “Tamme noꞌosoo mesoo manakwe,” mee mu unne, “Pana oosoo sakwa gi te soonammena ata-tamme wuyugwepana.” meeꞌe nu.
46006013	Menoꞌo tamme ekow teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu, ka ooka nadukadu-ma gwetzoaꞌe. Pana soo hee nadukadu ka te tookoo-no punnoꞌo gi ooosapa ekow yaatuhoo teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Umuoo yaa ekow teepu-koobatoosoo moobegwa-gakwu. Soo Te Naa ka te matabuepuna ka te tookoo te soonahadyakwena, gi petzape.
46006014	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda, tamme tuwazoo ooosoo sootunagakwu.
46006015	Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe matusoo. Gi puu soo Te Pabeꞌe tu tookoo soonahadyagwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo soo wahaꞌyoo numu ka nodukwadoose umu sumusoo numu-waꞌne manepunne. Meeoo nabotugu soo Te Naa unnena, “Ka waahoo numu nanodukwadoose, umu sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Gi puu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo kummaꞌamasoo sutama matzabeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46006017	Oo soomayuna mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna mu sumu-kwaꞌnesoo oo-no manepunne.
46006018	Mu sakwa ka kummaꞌanosoo mu nanapootamana, ooosapa nuutumooena. Noꞌyoona soo suda numu tumatuguna gi mu-notusoo, pana mu ka kukuma-nosoo nanapootamana, muusoo mu tookoo soonahadyakwe ka oo manena.
46006019	Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo tookoo soonahadyakwepana, soo te tookoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, tamme ka oo-gatuoona. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe
46006020	ka tamme suda manekwitoo nabatsase, tamme-kooba tuꞌeyae. Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi manese, tamme sakwa ooosapa besa oo tumayohoku-no.
46007001	Menoꞌo yise, nu ka nuka mu tubengapu ka mu tubokwi nu mu nanekwegeakwu. Aha. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka gi nanodukwadoona.
46007002	Pana nu meeoo, mu sakwa nanodukwadoo ka mu-nagatu nanapootaꞌma.
46007003	Mu nananodukwadoose, soo nana ka mogoꞌneno mesoo naꞌaheyaꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooꞌe umu ka meeoo sokwamana.
46007004	Soo mogoꞌne gi puusoo tu tookoo nemadabuꞌe, oo kooma ooka oo nemadabuekute. Ka nana tookoo soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo oo nemadabuꞌe.
46007005	Mu sakwa ooosapa maneꞌyi ka muusoo meeoo sokwamana, tooetoo huu tabeno gi oo manepana ka muusoo unu nanesootuhikwuse. Mu yise sakwa ooosapa maneꞌyisoo oꞌno yise soo sutaꞌyoo gi mu kwaseno-gakwu.
46007006	Nu meeoo unakwe oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka nanodukwadoose, pana yise oosoo tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka gi nanodukwadoopana.
46007007	Nu meeoo soonamme, nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoona tuwazoo oosoo besaꞌyoo. Nu puu gi nodukwa-gaꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Naa ka numu nanaꞌatasoo sootuhaꞌe.
46007008	Ka umu gisoo nodukwadoodu, yise umu tu koomamu yaꞌekupu nu meeoo, oosoo besaꞌyoo mu-toogoo ka gi nanodukwadoona. Nu puu ooonneꞌyoo.
46007009	Pana umu ka soonaꞌahegoena umu sakwa nanodukwadoo. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka nanodukwana gi ka tu nanaꞌahegoena sukwe peduguna.
46007010	Ka mu mooasoo nanodukwa nanosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu, nu meeoo, “Soo oo nodukwa sakwa gi ka tu kooma poonnekwunipana.”
46007011	Pana umu ka napoonnekwunise, gi kummaꞌakoosoo nodukwadoopana.
46007012	Soo penakwa e unnekwuna nugasoo tusooyugwena, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena. Soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no mooasoo nanodukwadoo-gana, “Gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka oo-baa nobe-gana,” mee soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu soonamme, soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa gi oo poonnekwunipana.
46007014	Soo oo kooma ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna nasootuhaꞌe ka tu nodukwa tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo mogoꞌne punnoꞌo ooosoo nasootuhaꞌe ka tu kooma tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno yise mu doodooamu punnoꞌo nasootuhaꞌe.
46007015	Soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo-baaꞌyoopana gi hownneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa tamme-nakwana te besa sokwamamokwuna soogwaꞌe.
46007016	Mu momokoꞌne gi oo sopedakwadoo, mu sumuna mu kooma magwetzoikwu. Mu nanana punnoꞌo sumuna pummesoo nodukwa magwetzoikwu.
46007017	Nu noꞌobatusoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo netammayakwe, “Soo numu mooasoo Jew numu manepunnedu sakwa gi tu Jew numuna maꞌwupana. Soo numu ka gi Jew numuna sakwa gi Jew numu manena mayohopana. Ka Jew numuna gi hownneꞌyoo, yise gi Jew numupana tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnena te nagena suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo.” Tamme noꞌyoona nanasuuꞌmu sakwa ka te manepunne-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne, ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi te tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o te matabue. Tamme sakwa besa sokwama.
46007021	Soo numu tummatzidu sakwa meeoo soonamme, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka numu tummatziwabena.” Pana ka pumme tu tzamaꞌwuse, oosoo sakwa puusoo manega.
46007022	Soo numu tummatzidu tubetse natzamaꞌwukwu ka puusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manese. Soo numu ka puusoo manegana sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tummatziwabe mane.
46007023	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mane, ka noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsase. Mu sakwa gi sukwe numusoo nakabetseapana.
46007024	Ka Te Pabeꞌe te matabue-kwaꞌne, tamme sakwa besa sokwama. Soo Te Naa mu netutzea pumme nakabetseadu, tooe mu maawaꞌnekoo sapa.
46007025	Meeꞌe mu e tubenga, “How sakwa mu sususuꞌa koomamudoo?” Gi nu ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooa-makoo meeoo naꞌunnedu naka. Nu ka nuga soo oetu sooyugwena mu tuukwekwu, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nayadooawabe manepunnena.
46007026	Ka ewa suda hemma manegena. Mu sakwa ooosapa manepunne mu manepunne-kwaꞌnesoo.
46007027	Mu-matu ka nananodukwagana gi sakwa nanapoonnepebuꞌapana. Mu-matu sakwa ka gi nanodukwagana gi nanodukwadoopana.
46007028	Mu-matu ka nananodukwadoona gi hownneꞌyoo pana gi besa manepunne, ookow gi petzabena nu meeoo. Pana soo numu ka nanodukwadoose, ewa nanasuda hee manekena, nu yise gi mu-toogoo ookow soogwaꞌe.
46007029	Tamme gi haaꞌno tubenaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwuse. Tamme ka nananodukwana sakwa gi suda sokwamapana ka te manekwi.
46007030	Tamme suda sokwamadu sakwa gi ka suda pukwi te sokwamana soomayupana. Ka besa sokwamana sakwa tamme ka besa pukwi te sokwamana gi ooosapa soomayupana. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ooosapa oo soomayupunne ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwuna. Tamme ka hemma tumuna, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe gi oo hee-gapana,” mee sakwa tamme sokwama.
46007031	Tamme ka hemma-ma tumuna tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwatusoo soogwipana. Pudusoo noꞌyoona soo hee teepu-koobatu kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
46007032	Nu gi suda mu sokwamana petzape. Soo nana gi nodukwa-gaꞌyoo puu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu soowabega. Oosoo tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetseadu.
46007033	Soo nodukwa-gaꞌyoo nana puu tu nodukwa tummatzi tuwazoo, oosoo yise wahaba soonammepunnena, namekoosoo tummatzaꞌe. Soo tsuadumu gi kooma-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa suuꞌmu soowabegakwu. Ookow suuꞌmu tu nakabetseana unu sookwaꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne yise kooma-gaꞌyoo ka tu kooma tummatzaꞌe tuwazoo.
46007035	Nu gi meeoo mu soonetammana mu sakwa gi nanodukwadoopana. Nu ka oo namanena mu tuukwena mu ka nanodukwadoose. Nu tubetse unu ooka mu sookwikute ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakabetseana. Nu gi waha-tamme mu tusooyugwena petzape.
46007036	Mu meeoo e tubenga, “Soo tsuadumu naa haaꞌa, ka tu padu mesoo tzakoomadookute?” Soo tsuadumu naa ka meeoo soonammena, “Mooasoo e padu tsuadumuna, oosoo sakwa koomadoo,” oosoo yise mesoo koomadookwu. Oosoo gi suda namanedu.
46007037	Pana oosoo ka gi meeoo tusooyugwena oosoo sakwa gi koomadoopana. Oosoo tuwazoo ka gi tu koomadoona sookwina, oosoo besa ka gi oo tzakoomadoona.
46007038	Soo nana ka tu padu tzakoomadoona besaꞌyoo pana soo nana gi ka tu padu tzakoomadookuna unusoo besaꞌyoo.
46007039	Mu e tubenga, “Soo tu kooma yaꞌekupu haaꞌa sakwa koomadoosoo?” meeꞌe. Soo mogoꞌne sakwa ooosapa tu kooma-baa nobe-ga oo yaꞌe-witoo tooe. Oꞌno yise oosoo kummaꞌakoosoo koomadookwu tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
46007040	Pana nu meeoo oo sooyukwe oosoo sakwa unu besa soonamme ka gi koomadoona nu meeoo soonamme sumuna soo Te Naa Besa Pooha punnoꞌo meeoo soonamme.
46008001	Mu meeoo tuwazoo e tubenga mu tubo-wi, “Numme haaꞌa sakwa a tookoo tuka, ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemma namadabuena, pummatoo mu nanesootuhina?” Mu-nagatu meeoo sokwama, “Numme suuꞌmu ekow sopedakwatoo,” mu yise kukummaꞌakoosoo nesootzeꞌma. Pana gi! Mu papaba nasooyokwe, ka meeoo sokwamana. Tamme sakwa nanasoobedya, gi nananesootzemapana. Oꞌno yise tamme nanatummatzaꞌe ka unusoo te tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna.
46008002	Tamme ka meeoo sokwamana, “Numme mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo,” tamme tookwa gisoo oo sopedakwatoo, ka yise te sopedakwadookwuna.
46008003	Pana tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana soo Te Naa te tubenga, tamme yise gi papaba nasooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46008004	Ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu a tookoo tukase, ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka hemma namadabuena mu geana ka pummatoo mu nanesootuhina, tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka mu hemma namadabuena gi hemma ne tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo hee gi pooha-gaꞌyoo. Noꞌokoo mu hee-nagatu ka numu pumatoo nanesootuhina, soo Te Naa suuꞌmu tubetsetu.
46008005	Ewaꞌyoo hee namadabuꞌe numu pumatoo nanesootuhina, pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu noꞌoko hemma matabuepu. Ookow tamme nakabetseakwu. Sumuꞌyoosoo yise tuwow soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko hemma matabuese, te magwetzoi. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo esoo togesapa.
46008007	Susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ekow gisoo nakasopedakwadoo. Umu uga ooosapa ka hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhidu, oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ka ooonnekoo a tookoo tukayina oo soomaꞌyu ka hemma namadabue-matoo tu nanesootuhina. Oo soomaꞌyuyinasoo togesapa mee soonammena oo-matoo nanesootuhiyakwesoo, umu ka gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
46008008	Soo tukapu te tukana gi atasoo te yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme gi besasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooe oo tukapana. Tamme tuwazoo gi hanobasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe gi oo tukapana.
46008009	Ka gisoo umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda tumatuguhoose, ka ooonnekoo oo tuka ka mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa gi ooonnekoo tuka.
46008010	Soo gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka ooonnekoo mu tuka mu poonnena, oosoo sumuna mu-kwaꞌnesoo ꞌmanedooa. Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo hemma namadabuedu gi hee pana oosoo gi oo nakasopedakwadoona oo-matoo nanesootuhikoohakwusoo.
46008011	Oosoo yise tumaꞌemukwa mu ka oo sopedakwadoona, soo hemma namadabuena puu gi hee, pana oosoo yise gi oo sopedakwadoo. Oosoo mumme puaꞌa, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pukoobatoo nabatsapu.
46008012	Mu ka ꞌyoo manena mu tumaꞌemukwa, mu ka gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwena. Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tamme tumaꞌemukwa.
46008013	Nu ka ooonnekoo tukase ka e puaꞌa tumaꞌemukwakute, nu yise gi ooonnekoo tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno soo e puaꞌa gi tumaꞌemukwakwusoo.
46009001	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus poonne, e tuusoobedya-wikoo. Oosoo e pooha-makapu. Nu ooweoo ka Te Naa yadooawabe manepu. Nu yow Te Naa yadooawabena nu nanesootuhi mu neyugwepu. Mu nananesootuhidu e sopedakwatoo, tooe susumudu numu gi nuka sopedakwatoo sapa.
46009003	Nu ka mu numu nuka nesootzeꞌma mee mu netamma,
46009004	“Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo mu sakwa ka e makana, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwena.
46009005	Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka umu Te Naa yadooawabe-nagetu-waꞌnesoo manena. Umu ka ena momona nanesootuhipe numu tunedyooe, tu nodukwa bina onosoo namaka. Umu Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌamu puu ooonneꞌyoo, Peter punnoꞌo.
46009006	Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa numme ka Barnabas-no suuꞌmu, ka Te Naa yadooawabe-nagatu, nummesoo namabetseana.”
46009007	Gi puu hanotu soyuzu puusoo tumanakana ka soyuzu-wiꞌyoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka wuyupooe wutaꞌnese, ka puusoo oo-matu tukana, oosoo ogowsoo tuutaꞌnena. Oosoo tuwazoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo bakeadaꞌa ka kootsoo tookoo tukana, ka pummesoo mabetseapu.
46009008	Nu gi mu numu sukwe unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
46009009	Soo Te Naa yadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu, oꞌnosoo tubotugupu ka Te Naa unnena, “Gi ka mu pookoo mumme yasa tummatzidu oo-matu, matumooepana.” Soo Te Naa gi mu pookoo suuꞌmu tummatzina meeoo.
46009010	Oosoo meeoo unakwe ka tamme tummatzina tuwazoo. Soo numu puu ka oo masuase, ka pumme tu yasa tummatzise sakwa oo-matu natumanagaku.
46009011	Numme mooasoo mu tummatzaꞌe, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sakwa ne tummatzi.
46009012	Susumudu ka Te Naa yadooawabe-nagatu mu natummatzi tuungu. Numme meeoo mu netamma-waꞌne tabuꞌa mu sakwa ne tummatzi. Pana numme gi oo manakwe. Numme meeoo sokwama, numme ka mu natummatzi tuunguna, mu sumuna gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme ka nummesoo namabetseana oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu,” mee numme sokwamana.
46009013	Mu oo sopedakwatoo, soo pooha-gaꞌyoo, nupoodu, puu natumunagakute, ka numu mahanena.
46009014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo ne netamma, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo numme sakwa ka natumunagakuna, ka nanesootuhipe numu tunedyooena.
46009015	Nu sakwa sukwe tzuayaꞌe, gi mu natummatzi tuungu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooena.
46009016	Tooe nu ka Te Naa-witu wahapana, nu besaꞌyoo mee nu gi unne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu ꞌyoo manakwe ka e pooha tuusoobedya-toohakwi, ka Te Naa nuka meeoo netamma.
46009017	Susumudu numu ka pumme tu tumanagakuna suuꞌmu soogwaꞌe, pana nu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu sukwe tuukwe.
46009018	Nu besa soonamme, ka besa naꞌunedu mu numu tuukwena, gi nu mu tunekwaꞌe tooe oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoopana.
46009019	Tooe nu nuusoo manegapana, nu noꞌoko numu ka besaꞌhoo nanesootuhipe tummatzaꞌe, oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadoona, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
46009020	Nu ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhipe tunedyooena mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo manakwe, oꞌno umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakasopedakwadoodooa. Tooe nu oo sopedakwatoopana ka mu Jew numu putoogoo tumayohona gi numu magwetzoi sapa.
46009021	Nu nanesootuhipe ka mu gi Jew numu tunedyooedu, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nagedu. Nu umu-waꞌnesoo manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-toogoo a nananesootuhi tabuana mu tunedyooekwuse. Gi nu ka Te Naa-matoo tu nananesootuhina maꞌwu.
46009022	Nu ka umu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoona ka hemma mu nuutumooꞌe, nu punnoꞌo umusoo nuutumooꞌe, oꞌno yise umu gi tumaꞌemukwa. Nu noꞌobatu numu-kwaꞌnesoo mesoo manakwe, oꞌno yise umu punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese, namagwetzoikwu.
46009023	Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo numu oo nakasopedakwadookwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, oosoo yise nuka magwetzoikwu tuwazoo.
46009024	Mu oo sopedakwadoo, tooe ewaꞌyoo numu tanomane nabetugu pana sumuꞌyoosoo oo makwuyakwe. Oo sakwa tamme ka Te Naa besa po tubetse nagena, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.
46009025	Tooe haga tooe ka numu-no tuꞌateakwuse ka tu tookoo mooe mabetseꞌa. Umu ka makwuse natumanakakute. Pana soo mu natumanakakuna gi wunaꞌmetoo meadape. Pana soo Te Naa tamme sootuhipu tubetse besaꞌyoo. Oosoo ooosapa wunaꞌmetoo meadabekwu gi moobekwa-gaꞌyoo.
46009026	Ooonneꞌyoona nu kaaheno ka Te Naa besa po nagenoꞌo. Nu gi oo maꞌwudu.
46009027	Nu ka e tookoo nuga nakabetseana mayugwenoꞌo, oꞌno nu gi oo maꞌwukase ka nanesootuhipe e natumanakakuna watzekute, nu ewow numu ka nanesootuhi tunedyooꞌe umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukute mane.
46010001	Ka oꞌnosoo numme Jew numu nanamooatupu manepu-witu nu mu natugwengakwu, oꞌno mu saaꞌa oetu nakasopedakwadoodooa, tooe haga tooe tamme-matu sumuna oo watzekukwu, ka besa te pooha nasootuhipe ka tammesoo tumaꞌemukwase. Ka oꞌnosoo numme nanamooatupu ka Te Naa yadooawabe, Moses mee naneadu nagenoꞌo. Umu baa-wi namatzakapu-waꞌne ka Te Naa pumme moohenoꞌo, ka koomeba, yise ka tubetse baa pumme oo tzakwonakuse umu yise oo-toogoo meꞌa. Oosoo ka tu pooha-ma nanasookwugidu mu tzapoonnekute. Te Naa yise ka tubetse baa putoogoo mu meakwuna naꞌemota tsapedooꞌakuse, umu numu yise ka oo pasawoyoꞌato ninapatoo mangeka.
46010003	Soo Te Naa ka tu pooha-ma mu makase, baa ka tupe-nagakoo mu baamaka. Oosoo tupe ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oosoo tooe hano tooe umu-no mea.
46010005	Pana yise tooe noꞌyoona umu-nagatu ka saaꞌa, gi ka Te Naa besa po nagekaꞌa. Umuoo soo Te Naa gi sootuhaꞌe, ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi, umu yise tuꞌi, ka oona gi hekwana manepetugase.
46010006	Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo, soo suta mu tumatuguna umu-matoo kodyukwu. “Gi sakwa mu umu-waꞌne manepana,” mee soo Te Naa te tuyatuukweꞌe.
46010007	Tamme sakwa ka hemma namadabue-matoo umu-waꞌne gi nanesootuhipana. Soo Te Naa unnena meeoo nabotugu, “Mu numu tuka aatase, hebena, yise nuga yotsuyakwe, nanesootuhina ka hemma namadabue-matoo.”
46010008	Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-nosoo nanapootamapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Ewaꞌyoo umu-matu tuꞌi, togogwa tukue-ma, umu ka kukummaꞌa-no nanapootama. Umu ka Te Naa tumadina soopoonnena, gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Gi oo manepana.
46010010	Mu sakwa gi Te Naa nesootzemapana umu-matu-waꞌne. Umu puu tuoegoese, tuꞌi.
46010011	Ka oꞌnosoo umu nanamooatupu manepu nabotugu, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa menoꞌo te tuyatuukwe, gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoopana.
46010012	Tamme sakwa ooosapa gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwupana. Tooe tamme besa nasooyugwepana, “Numme besaꞌyoona, numme gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo,” tamme sumuna oo maꞌwukekwu.
46010013	Tooe ka sutakoo tamme suda maꞌemukwa tuungu sapa tamme sakwa gi oo nakabetseapana. Mooasoo ewaꞌyoosoo numu ookowsoo maꞌemukwapu. Tamme ka Te Naa-ma mesoo nasoonatzaꞌe. Oosoo gi umuoo sutakoo tusoohanepe tamme-matoo soonoyugwe. Soo Te Naa gi umu suta natusoohanedu te geaꞌa tamme ka te natzooe-ma oo nuutumooekwu. Tamme ka suda natusoohanedu hee-gana, oosoo te pooha-makakwu tamme sakwa yise ka suda namanedu nuutumooe.
46010014	Mu sakwa ka kummaꞌa-matoosoo mu numu nanesootuhi suuꞌmu mu nuutumooe gi umu-noꞌyoopana.
46010015	Mu ka unu sokwamana muusoo oetu soohane, ka e unne-kwitoo how esoo besaꞌyoo, tooetoo sutaꞌyoo.
46010016	Tamme ka tseda-witu atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa hebese, mooasoo pukwitoo a nananesootuhipu yise ka tukaba tukase, tamme sumuoosoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi.
46010017	Tamme noꞌyoona ka sumuoosoo tukaba tuka mee unnena, tamme sumuꞌyoosoo tooe tamme ewaꞌyoopana.
46010018	Soo mu Jew numu puu ka oꞌnosoo ka tukana, ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-witoo tukapu nahanegayina nanesootuhaꞌe Te Naa-matoo. Oꞌno umu Te Naa-no sumusoo manikwu.
46010019	Soo hemma namadabuena gi pooha-gaꞌyoo mee nu unnena meeoo.
46010020	Esoo tukapu ka mu hemma namadabuena nageana, mu numu pumatoo mu nanesootuhina, ka umu sutakoo tubetse nageana. Nu gi oo petzape mu sakwa gi umu-no nanesootuhipana.
46010021	Gi tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhina, nanano tukana, yise ka umu numu mu suta-matoo nanesootuhidu-no tukana, umu-no hebe-waꞌneꞌyoo tuwazoo. Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa.
46010022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi besa soonammekwu ka oo te manakwe. “Numme unu natzoe,” mee mu. Pana Te Pabeꞌe tamme ooonakwasoo unu natzooe.
46010023	“Numme tooe hemma tooe mesoo tuka,” meeꞌe gi sokwamapana, gi oo manepana, gi ka a tookoo ka suta-matoo nanesootuhina nagea u tukapana, oosoo gi pumme tuka-waꞌneꞌyoo, mu saaꞌa ka oo manena ka umu besa pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manayahadooa.
46010024	Mu sakwa mu tummatzi gi muusoo namakoo tusoohanepana.
46010025	Ka nanatumudu a tookoo mu mesoo tuka. Tooe ka suta-matoo a tookoo sapa oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka oo sopedakwadoona mu sakwa ka gi oetu tutubengana.
46010026	Soo Te Naa unnepu mee naꞌunakwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka teepu matabuepuna, noꞌyoona hee makoobatu oo-gatuoo.”
46010027	Tamme ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa tukana tamme sakwa noꞌoko hemma tamme oo makana tuka, gi oetu tubengapana. “Esoo a tokoo haaꞌa hemma namadabuena, numu pumatoo nanesootuhina nageana?”
46010028	Pana ka tooe haga tooe mumme u tuukweꞌe masoo ka sutakoo nageana, gi oo tukapana,
46010029	gi ume putoogoo tumatuguna. Soo numu o tukadu u tuukwedu sumuna meeoo soonammena, “Oosoo tookwa gi suta-matoo nanesootuhidu.”
46010030	How sakwa manena nu kummakoosoo tusooyugwena-koobatoo nabeatse-gana nu gi tookoo tuka? Nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, makoobatoo, “Nu sakwa a mesoo tuka,” mee sumuna mu unakwe.
46010031	Tooe how tooe manena tukana, tooetoo hebena, besa sapa oo hane tabua, mu numu te poonnena ka Te Naa besa sooyugwekwu.
46010032	Tamme sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu gi ka Te Naa oowemota nemayugwepana, yise Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu, tuwazoo ooosoo.
46010033	Nu noꞌoko numudoo soobesaꞌyoo, gi nu nuusoo namakoo tusoohane. Oꞌno mu numu namagwetzoikwu.
46011001	Mu sakwa nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuno.
46011002	Nu besa mu-matoo soonamme ka nuka mu soomaꞌyu, ka mumme e tunnedyooepu mu mayohono.
46011003	Pana yise sakwa mu e nakasopedakwadoo ka tzotuayuana nanesootuhi-kwitu, ka numu wo nuunoduna-kwitu. Tamme ka te wo nodunana nanesootuhina, mee nanemadabuꞌe kummaꞌyoosoo numu tookwa te moohedu. O umuoo suuꞌmu tu wo wunoduꞌna, o tamme putoogoo tumayohona. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo mu naana matabuepu. Oꞌno mu numu besa ka Te Naa sooyugwepunne. Umu naana sakwa gi tzotuayapana ka nanesootuhina, umu ka oo manena umu tookwa ka pukwaꞌnekoosoo nana nakabetseadu. Soo nana puu ka tzotuayana nanesootuhina, tooetoo, ka Te Naa unnepu wahana gi besa tumatugupu, oosoo tookwa Te Pabeꞌe gi heesoobedya. Mu momokoꞌne sakwa ka nanana nakabetsea. Mu momokoꞌne ka nanesootuhina tooetoo Te Naa unnepu wahana numu-kobenaꞌyoona umu sakwa tu wo wunodunana. Umu momokoꞌne meeoo unnedu-kwaꞌne, “Nu e kooma unnetoo manedu.” Soo Te Naa ka mu momokoꞌne namadabuese mu manumudoopu, oꞌno mu numu ka mu nanana besa umu-koobatoo sooyugwe. Soo momokoꞌne tu kooma gi heesoobedya, ooonneꞌyoona soo mogoꞌne ka gi tu wo wunodunana, oosoo sakwa ka tu wo nuusebaku suuꞌmu.
46011008	Soo Te Naa ka numu matabuese, ka mogoꞌne ka nana-makoo matabue, gi ka nana mogoꞌne-makoo matabuepu.
46011009	Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka numu matabuese, oꞌno soo mogoꞌne namadabue tu koomma tummatzikwudu.
46011010	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa tu wo wunoduna ka nanesootuhina. Oꞌno mu numu oo sopedakwatoo umu puu tookwa tu kooma nakabetseꞌa. Mu Te Naa tutummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, ka yaanona gi oo petzape ka papaba mu momokoꞌne nasooyugwe.
46011011	Te Naa tunetammapu, mu nanana ka mu momokoꞌne-ma nadanumuꞌa mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo mu nanana-ma nadanumuꞌa.
46011012	Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo mogoꞌne ka nana-nakwana namadabuepu. Obenakwutoo mu nanaatse oꞌongaꞌa yise ka mu momokoꞌne-nakwana kemmadu. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa namebatusoo te matabuepu.
46011013	Umu numu sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne sakwa tu wo wunoduna ka nanesootuhina.
46011014	Yise noꞌyoona mu naana oodu tu tzopuhu tu naaku-ma nasookwaꞌe.
46011015	Mu momokoꞌne punnoꞌo ka oodu tu tzopuhu naakuse besa oo sooyugwe, soo Te Naa ka mu momokoꞌne ooduoo tu tzopuhu-gana sootuhi, ka tu wo pu-ma mu kwunodunana.
46011016	Tooe hanotu tooe, tamme noꞌyoona ka te tumayohope naka, noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mana kwingaꞌa-kwitu tooe yoo manakwe, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌena. Mu sakwa yise ne unnepu nakabetsea.
46011017	Nu gi besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme, ka mu nanesootuhi tunehane-witu. Mu gi toge manakwe mee nu mu nakana. Mu maꞌemukwana, mu nanano sukwe nanahayakwe, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi nasootuhina mee nu suda tunaka, mu numu-makoo, nu yise oo-matu tooe nakaꞌoedyuku.
46011019	Tamme ka nanahagonnona oo sopedakwadookwu hanakwatu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute, umu ka gi haꞌyoo unnena.
46011020	Mu ka nanano tukakwuse, mu tutzasumuyakwe, mu yise tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatu mu nabatsana soomuꞌwa.
46011021	Mu ka gi numu wutooepana susumudu mooe tukagonnoyina. Susumudu umu-matu ewa ka tukapu sukwe haneyakwe, yise susumudu tooꞌe tzuagoꞌe, susumudu punnoꞌo sukwe baagoꞌe. Oosoo suda namanedu. Gi umu tutuha manedu suda masokwamapana, ka mu ewow hemma hee-gana. Mu ka mu tutuha manena tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi soobedyadu-kwaꞌne mu matuku. Nu ka mu mane-wi unu suda soonamme. Mu tubetse unu suda manakwe. Mu sakwa ka oo manena mu nobe-wiꞌyoonasoo tukana, hebe, mu ka unu tseagoena.
46011023	Ka pooha natumayohope, ka tukaba naduka-witu, oꞌnosoo nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka tuukwena. Ka oꞌnosoo, sumu togano ka putoogoo tu napabenase, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe tukaba gwuuse,
46011024	oo-koobatoo nanesootuhise, oo tzabokase ka umu punotu meeoo netamma, “Esoo tukaba e tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka tukaba yoo pooha tuka tabuaꞌyi, oꞌno mu ka mu-koobatoo e nabatsapu soomayuꞌyikwu.”
46011025	Ka mu yongo tukamakwuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka atsa baa-koobatoo nanesootuhaꞌe, yise meeoo mu netamma, “Esoo atsa baa e puupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Kummaꞌaꞌyoosoo a pudu natunetammapu, e-toogoo mu namagwetzoikwu, ka mu-koobatoo e nabatsase. Mu ka ekow hebese, e nabatsapu soomayudooa.”
46011026	Ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe tamme ka ekow tukaba tukase, ekow atsa baa hebese, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu. Tamme ooosapa ꞌyoo tumayohonokwu, Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petu-witoo tooe.
46011027	Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi nasootzagwiyina ka pooha tukaba tukase, tumaꞌemukwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsana gi heesoobedyadu-kwaꞌne.
46011028	Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona nanasusuꞌmu oetu mooe soohanese, ka pooha nadukadu tuka.
46011029	Tamme ka gi oetoo soohanena oo sukwe tukase, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsa-kwitu soomuꞌwa, soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
46011030	Ooonneꞌyoona ewaꞌyoo mu-nagatu gi natzooena, tuoegoꞌe, susumudu mu-matu mooasoo tuipu.
46011031	Pana tamme ka tammesoo nakwitu soohanese, atasoo te manese, oꞌno soo Te Naa saaꞌa te sootuhikwu.
46011032	Pana ka gi togokoo te manoyugwe, oosoo Te Naa te nemadabuekwu, yise saaꞌa soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, oꞌno tamme ka suta te manena maꞌwukwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise, gi kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu, ka saaꞌa mu sutaꞌyoo numu kadooꞌoo naneyugwekwu.
46011033	Mu ka nanano sumuse, mu sakwa nanakwutooese ka pooha tukapu ewa tuka.
46011034	Mu ka unu tzuagoꞌena, mu sakwa nobe-wiꞌyoosoo tuka, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Naa gi suda mu sooyugwekwu. Nu saaꞌa ewasoo mu tuukwedooa, ka mu-baa petugase.
46012001	Ka Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhi-witu nu mu nakasopedakwadoona soogwaꞌe.
46012002	Mu ka oꞌnosoo gisoo hemma nakasopedakwadoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, mu sutakoo gi toogoope-gakoo mu nanesootuhidu mumme meeoo mu neyukwe mu oo-toogoo manena ka sutakoo nanesootuhaꞌe.
46012003	Nu mu tuukwekwu, hownneꞌyoo umu Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi apegeagonnodu. Gi haga ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Soo Jesus sutaꞌyoo.” Soo tooe haga tooe, “Jesus Te tubetse besa Pabeꞌe,” mee unnedu, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooꞌa.
46012004	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sumuꞌyoosoo, pana oosoo te pooha-maka ewow nanaꞌatabatumasoo te sootuhaꞌe.
46012005	Ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi ewaꞌyoo, ewa-baa tamme numu tummatzipu, pana Te Pabeꞌe sumusoo, tamme noꞌyoona oo tummatzikwu.
46012006	Ewa-baa tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseamodu, pana sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Naa besa te neyugwedu.
46012007	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma nanasusumuoo numu sootuhaꞌe, oꞌno tamme noꞌyoona nanatummatzikwu.
46012008	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi susumudu nanesootuhipu puu numu besa tunedyooedu. Susumudu punnoꞌo ka Te Naa-witu mu numu tuukwedu pumme tu pooha sootuhipu.
46012009	Susumudu umu-matu Te Naa unusoo oedyukukwudu. Susumudu punnoꞌo tuoegoedu numu tumabesakuna ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
46012010	Susumudu nanabesa tu pooha tumadaꞌena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhi. Susumudu punnoꞌo mu numu Te Naa Pooha-toohakwi ka Te Naa unnena tu wahagonnona nageꞌa. Susumudu umu-matu punnoꞌo sutakoo numu-makoo tu pooha, sopedakwadookwu. Susumudu nanaꞌatabatumasoo paꞌanakwatu te yadooawununa nasootuhi. Susumudu umu-matu ka numu atamasoo oo yadooawununa numu tuukweꞌe ka oo unena.
46012011	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sumuꞌyoosoo, pana nanaꞌatasoo numu sootuhaꞌe, puusoo numu-nagwitu tutzeana Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma numu sootuhaꞌe.
46012012	Soo numu tookoo manepunnena, puu ewa nanama aatadu pana sumuꞌyoosoo; mu nananesootuhidu sumusoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe sumuoosoo.
46012013	Tamme nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu, mu numu tummatziwabe, mu numu tutunehanedu, nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo, pana tamme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo nasootuhaꞌe, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
46012014	Haꞌoo puu soo te tookoo ewa nanama aata.
46012015	Soo numu kuku puu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Nu tookwa gi mu-matu, ka gi a mina.”
46012016	Soo numu naka puu punnoꞌo meeoo, “Nu tookwa gi a tookoo-matu, nu ka gi a pooena,” mee unnekwu. Soo numu naka ooonneꞌyoopana togesoo numu tookoo-matu.
46012017	Ka e pooe suuꞌmu e tookoo-matu nabenaꞌe, nu gi tunaka-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka gi e naka hee-gana. Tooetoo ka e naka suuꞌmu hee-gana, nu gi hemma egwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi moobe-gana.
46012018	Soo Te Naa ka numu tookoo manepunnena ewa-baa nanaꞌatasoo matabuepu gi sumu-kwaꞌnesoo oo matabuꞌe.
46012019	Oosoo ka noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo namadabuese, oosoo gi numu tookoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46012020	Menoꞌo yise ewaba nanama aata, tammesoo numu sumusoo manepunnena.
46012021	Soo te tookoo namanepunnena puu nanatummatzi, soo numu pooe gi ka numu mi nanenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo numu kwo, gi ka tu kuku nanenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi! Noꞌyoona soo te tookoo nanama aatadu.
46012022	Gi natzooedu nanama aatadu gi maawaꞌne sooyugwena, puu sumuna yise gi nananenaboa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46012023	Ka te tookoo-matu tamme gi numu poonnekwuna petzape, umuoo tamme unu mabetseana te kwasu-ma mu mawatzetugu.
46012024	Ka mu mesoo napoonnedu, tamme gi yoo mabetsea.
46012025	Gadooꞌoo hee, pumme nanenaboa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo te tookoo-matu, noꞌyoona unu nana-matusoo. Noꞌyoona te tookoo manepunnena nanatummatzidu.
46012026	Ka sumu-batu besa te sooyugwe, noꞌyoona mu nanama aꞌatadu besa sokwamakute, ka sumu-batu nuummana, noꞌyoona mu nanama te aatana puu oo-waꞌnesoo.
46012027	Ooonneꞌyoona noꞌyoona tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoona, unu nanatummatzi.
46012028	Soo Te Naa tamme-nagakwitu netutsea susumudu tamme-nagakwitu ka pumme nayadooawabe manekwudu tuwow, yise susumudu ka nanesootuhiba numu tunedyooedu, susumudu tuwow nanasoogwugi namanedu numu tzapoonnekudu, susumudu tuwazoo ka numu tuoegoedu mabesakudu, susumudu numu tutumatzidu, susumudu punnoꞌo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu, susumudu yise punnoꞌo nanakummaꞌasoo gi numu nakasopedakwadoona apegeagonnodu ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nakasopedakwadoo.
46012029	Gi noꞌyoona tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa nayadooawabekwuna nasootuhi, gi noꞌyoona tuwazoo nanesootuhiba numu tunedyooedu manakwe,
46012030	gi noꞌyoona too numu tuoe mabesakudu nasootuhaꞌe, gi noꞌyoona nanaꞌatakoosoo apegeagonnona nasootuhaꞌe, gi noꞌyoona tuwazoo ka tu pooha numu nayadooadu tutunekwegeawunukwuna nasootuhaꞌe.
46012031	Pana mu sakwa ka besow mu nasootuhikwuna soogwi. Nu menoꞌo mu tuukwekwu ka tubetse besow numu nasootuhi-kwitu.
46013001	Soo numu nanasoobedyana, yisetu. Tamme ka noꞌobatumasoo mesoo apegeana, ka mu numu apegeana, ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tuwazoo apegeana, pana ka gi numu petzabena, tamme gi hee, ewa tu sukwe naꞌunnewunu-kwaꞌne oo nakasoobedya. Gi tamme haka tummatzaꞌe yoo manena.
46013002	Tamme ka hemma manekwuna sopedakwatoona, oo nakasopedakwatoona noꞌoko Te Naa-witu yise tooe hekwitu tooe, o tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno soo giba nooyooakwu ka meeoo te nanesootuhi, pana tamme ka gi numu petzabena, tamme togesoo gi hee.
46013003	Tamme ka noꞌoko hemma te hee-gana nemawunise, ka te tookoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwuse, pana ka gi numu petzabena, tamme gi oo-koobatoo nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme togesoo gi hee.
46013004	Tamme ka mu numu soobedyana tamme ooosapa besa numu nematugukwu, tooe hemma tooe how mu yugwe sapa, gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagekwu, gi nanaꞌunnekwu, gi meeoo tusooyugwekwu, numme numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo mee.
46013005	Gi suda numu matugukwu, gi nidyapuna, oo soomuꞌwukwu ka suda ume tu matuku.
46013006	Tamme besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu besa manakwe, gi besa sokwama ka suda mu manakwe,
46013007	pana ka mu numu besa soobedyana, tamme gi suda mu tumatuguna waha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka besow numu-witu, ooosapa numu netubetzeyaꞌekwu tooe hemma tooe how manese sapa, ooosapa nanasoobedyakwu, tooe suda tamme mu yugwe sapa.
46013008	Ewaꞌyoo soo Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu, sumu tabeno mobegwa-gakwu petukwutu, ka Te Naa tamme nanasoobedyana gi mobegwakakoo.
46013009	Soo Te Naa tamme yadooekwuna nanaꞌatabatumasoo nayadooadu, natunedyooenona ka teepu moobegwaga-matoo, punnoꞌo tu mobegwakana soogwaꞌe, ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tamme gi hanokoo hemma sopedakwadoo, gi hownnekoo tamme mu numu nakasoobedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46013010	Pana tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona noꞌyoona, noꞌoko, nasootuhipu hee-gana, gi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te hee-gana soogwikwu.
46013011	Nu puu ka tuhaꞌyoona tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne yadooꞌa, yise tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tusooyugwe. Pana nu ka nana manese, ka e tuhaꞌyoona maꞌwuke.
46013012	Tamme puu ka gi besaꞌhoo napoonneꞌe-wikoo te napoonnepunne-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, ka saaꞌa tamme ka tubetse napoonnese. Menoꞌo nu huutsetsekoosoo sopedakwatoo, saaꞌa nu noꞌokosoo hemma besa sopedakwadookwu, ka Te Naa nuka sopedakwatoo-kwaꞌnekoosoo.
46013013	Umuoo pahebatu Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu ooosapa tamme-noꞌyookwutu: ka Te Naa-wi te tunakaꞌoedyukute, Te Naa te magwetzoikwu, tamme yise nanasoobedyakwu, pana te nanasoobedyana, yise tubetse kaahenotu.
46014001	Mu sakwa tubetse unu ka mu nanasoobedyana sookwi, ooosapa sakwa mu maneno. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha muume sootuhikwuna sookwi. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka mummesoo yadooakwikoo, ka Te Naa unnena mu numu tunesootabuena.
46014002	Tamme ka nanakummaꞌamasoo pooha apegeana, tamme Te Naa suuꞌmu yadooꞌe, gi mu numu, gi haga te nakasopedakwatoo.
46014003	Tamme ka Te Naa unnepu, tammesoo yadooama wahana, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nakasopedakwatoo. Umu ka ooonnekoo nakana, umu unu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu, yise nananetummatzina besa nananenuumakute.
46014004	Tamme ka kukummaꞌamasoo pooha apegeana, tammesoo nanemabetsea, pana ka Te Naa unnena tammesoo yadooa-ma wahana, tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo nananetummatzina besa nakasokwamana, oetoo nakasawekwu.
46014005	Nu noꞌoko nanakummaꞌamasoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mu apegeakwuna sookwaꞌe, pana nu ka mummesoo yadooa-ma ka Te Naa unnepu mu wahakwuna petzape. Soo Te Naa unnepu tammesoo yadooa-kwikoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi te apegeana ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise mu numu oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Ka tamme-matusoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi oo pooha yadooawunu, sumuꞌyoo ekow pooha nageapu te tunekwegeakwuna tamme yise nananetummatzaꞌe. Noꞌyoona yise tamme tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu.
46014006	Nu puu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooana mu puu ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona oosoo gi hownnekoo mu netummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnena mumme e tunedyooe mu numu besa nasootuhaꞌe, ka tammesoo yadooa-ma pumme e tuukwe. Ka Te Naa unnepu, tooetoo numu e tuukweꞌe Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi e tuusoobedyana tuwazoo.
46014007	Yoo manepunne soo tooe haga tooe ka tumooyagakunoo oonatooe oo namooyakakuse, gi ka oo hoobeadoona nakasopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46014008	Soo tumahekwudu punnoꞌo, gi nuummabetsabe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka tumooyagakunoo kaaheno oo mooyagakuse suuꞌmu oosoo tutumahekwutu.
46014009	Tamme ka gi nanakasopedakwadoo-ma numu yadooena mu numu puu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme sukwe nemuwayaꞌe.
46014010	Ekow teepu-kooba ewaꞌyoo nanaꞌatasoo apegeadu numu, umu pummesoo apegeana yise nakasopedakwatoo.
46014011	Pana tamme ka gi kummaꞌakoosoo yadooana nakasopedakwadoona ka kummaꞌamasoo mu yadooaꞌa tamme nanatamme wakwaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46014012	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nananetummatzi.
46014013	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi te sootuhise, sumuna tamme pooha yadooakwu. Tamme sakwa yise nanesootuhi, oꞌno tamme ka tammesoo unnewununa mu numu mesoo tunesootabuekwu.
