46014014	Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pooha nanesootuhipana, tamme tammesoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo.
46014015	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi pooha yadooana, nanesootuhina, tunekwu. Tamme sakwa tuwazoo tammesoo yadooa-ma nanesootuhina tunekwu.
46014016	Ka te pooha yadooa-toohakwi te nanesootuhaꞌe mu numu gi hownnekoo tamme-no ka Te Naa-matoo nesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka gi te unnewununa nakasopedakwadoona.
46014017	Tamme sumuna ka te pooha yadooa-toohakwi besa nanesootuhaꞌe, pana mu numu gi nasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, umu ka gi te nakasopedakwatoona.
46014018	Nu suuꞌmuna mumme ooonakwasoo besa ka e pooha yadooa-toohakwi nanesootuhaꞌe.
46014019	Pana nu puu ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona nugasoo yadooa-ma yadooꞌa. Nu ka nugasoo yadooa-ma mu numu unu tummatzaꞌe, pana mu numu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi e pooha yadooꞌa gi nasootuhaꞌe ka gi oo nakasopedakwatoona.
46014020	E nanumu, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nayadooape-kwitu mu sakwa besasoo nakasopedakwatoo. Tamme sakwa gi totsaba-ga, tuha-kwaꞌne, pana yise nanapu-waꞌnekoosoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadoo.
46014021	Soo Te Naa unnepu puu meeꞌe, “Tooe mu wakwaꞌa nuga yadooa-ma ka mu numu kummaꞌakoosoo nakadu tooꞌe tuukwepana, umu gisoo oo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
46014022	Nu besasoo mu tuukwekwu soo numu ka tusoomatzooena gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa kummaꞌamasoo mu yadooꞌe. Pana ka mu numu pumme nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Naa umuoosoo yadooa-ma mu yadooꞌe.
46014023	Ka noꞌyoona tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu te pooha yadooa-toohakwi ooosapa te apegeagonno, soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka tamme-baa petuse te nakana mee te netammakwu, “Umu tookwa maꞌemukwadu.”
46014024	Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu te waha tammesoo yadooa-ma, soo gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu tamme-baa petuse, ka Te Naa unnepu nakasopedakwadookwu,
46014025	oosoo yise ka tu maꞌemukwapu wahakwu, ka tu tunekwatzetugu nokosoo. Ka oo manese oosoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu, mee unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa togesapa yaa tamme-naga.”
46014026	E nanumu, tamme ka nanano nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa tuwazoo nananetummatzi. Sumuꞌyoo numu puu tunekwuhoo, sumuꞌyoo puu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooe, sumuꞌyoo numu punnoꞌo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooa. Sumuꞌyoo tunekwugeadu ka pooha yadooawunudu yadooꞌakute.
46014027	Ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona, soo numu sakwa ka pooha yadooape-ma, penakwa pumme tu sootuhise gi nanano-kwisoo apegeapana, nanapenakwa yadooa. Sumuꞌyoo umu-nagatu sakwa oo tunekwugeaku. Ka gi tunekwugeawabe-gana, tamme sakwa gi pooha yadooapana numu nakana. Wahaꞌyoo tooetoo paheꞌyoo numu nanapenakwa mesoo apegea.
46014029	Ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooena, tammesoo apegea-ma numu tunedyooe, sumuꞌyoosoo nanapenakwa numu tunedyooe. Soo numu sakwa besa oo nakapunne, unu oetu soohane, ka pumme tu tunedyooepe. Wahaꞌyoo tooetoo paheꞌyoo numu sakwa nanapenakwa numu mesoo tunedyooe.
46014030	Soo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu, sakwa ka pumme nakapunnedu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma oo nasootuhise, sakwa gi tunemayuhoo, oꞌno oosoo nasootuhihoodu yise yadooakwu. Mu numu yise ka Te Naa unnepu nakapunnedu nasootuhikwu.
46014032	Soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhibu kaaheno meadabena soogwaꞌe, gi tooe hayoo oo nananemadabuekwuna. Ooonneꞌyoona soo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu puusoo mesoo tunemamakwu.
46014034	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa gi apegeapana, ka mu numu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona. Yow putoogoo te natunedyooe meana, tooe hanotu tooe tu nananesootuhi. Tubetse moomooasoo Te Naa tamme tunetammakupu, umu momokoꞌne sakwa tu kooma nakapoohwimo.
46014035	Umu sakwa ka hemma sosopedakwatoona ka tu nobe-kwi petuse tu kooma tubenga. Oosoo gi toge tabuꞌa mu momokoꞌne ka yadooana, mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhi sumuꞌu-kwiꞌyoona.
46014036	Mu sakwa gi a nesootuꞌadyipana. “Numme suuꞌmu soo Te Naa mooe sootuhaꞌe,” mee gi sokwamapana. Gi mummesoo nasooyugwe-too meagonnopana, ka nanesootuhi sumuꞌuna.
46014037	Nu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme e tuukwe tuunguna. Umu Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhipu oo nakasoopedakwu, ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepu mumme e tuukwe.
46014038	Mu numu unu naka tusoomatzooedu, gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana.
46014039	E nanumu, tamme sakwa tammesoo yadooa-ma nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooe, o yisetu. Pana oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo numu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi yadooawununa.
46014040	Pana tamme sakwa gi nananokwisoo apegeapana, nanapenakwa yadooayi.
46015001	E nanumu, mu ka oo soomaꞌyu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mumme e tuukwepu, mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuse, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuno.
46015002	Mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna namagwetzoikwu. Mu ka gi ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa sukwe naneyugwedu.
46015003	Oꞌnosoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukweꞌe. Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nuugwepu-witu. Ka oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa Pooha tunemamakwupu. Oosoo togesapa oo nawahana, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme suda tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
46015004	Ka oo yaꞌeoose tupe tawaga-kwi natugu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise pahe tabe mease, Te Naa oo mayodupu, esoo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwupu.
46015005	Puusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Peter tookoope natzapoonnekupu-gaꞌyoo, yise mu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo oo poonne.
46015006	Ka saaꞌa ewaꞌyoo (500) tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌyoona sumusoo oo poonne, ewaꞌyoo umu-matu tooesoo gwetzoaꞌe.
46015007	Ka saaꞌa punnoꞌo James mee naneadu oo wanngaꞌa oo poonne. Yise ka saaꞌa noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo oo poonnesoo.
46015008	Nuka tuwazoo pooha natzapoonnekupu, gi numu meeoo soonammeno.
46015009	Nu gi unu besaꞌyoona gi nu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ka ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu unu kusedyana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tooe nuka sutakoo sapa e sootuhise yise oo e mayugwepu-gaꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa nakabetsease noꞌoko ka mu oo yadooawabe ooonakwasoo tumayoho ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
46015011	Numme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu tunedyooepu soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodapu. Esoo naꞌunnedu mumme nakaꞌoedyukuna. Numme noꞌyoona sumu-kwaꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
46015012	Numme meeoo mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda meeꞌe. Pana susumudu mu-matu mee mu numu tunedyooe, soo numu ka yaꞌese gi namayoda-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Umu tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe namayoda-kwitu nakaꞌoedyukute. Numme mu nemooaga mee umu tookwa sokwama soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase mee mu tuukwena. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka besow numu ne tunedyooena, gi ka numu namagwetzoikwuna tuwazoo. Umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuise namayodakwu. Umu tutuha te soobedya ka puu gi oo nakasopedakwadoona soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoikwu.
46015020	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise punnoꞌo tamme te yaꞌe-kwikoo mayosukwu.
46015021	Ka Adam mee naneadu soo Te Naa mooe manumudoopu. Oogow mane-kwitoo tamme yise yaꞌeyakwe. Tamme namayodakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-kwitoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te magwetzoi ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
46015023	Noꞌyoona tamme ka toge-kwi oo manepetuse, namayodakwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooeꞌugasoo namayodupu, ka saaꞌa yise oo kodyu petuse, oosoo ka pumme te nakaꞌoedyukute, soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa te mayosudooa.
46015024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌekwu, soo Te Naa noꞌoko sutakoo pumme wohonedu kadooꞌoo tu mayugwe-kwitoo tooe. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha te nemayugwepu. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko mu suda tumayugwedu kadooꞌoo mayugwedooa. Ka nakwitoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka numu yaꞌeyina kadoo mayugwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma punowsoo ka Te Naa-matoo nemawunikwu, puusoo tuwazoo oo-toohatoo nanemawunikwu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma nemadunagakwu. Oꞌnotoo soo te teepu moobekwa-kakwu.
46015029	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo numu ka tuyaꞌekwakoo namayodayakwe, ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka umuoo tuipu-koobatoo, baa-wi namatzakayakwe.
46015030	Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tamme ka ooosapa tooe nabatsayina, tamme puu te yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu.
46015031	Tooe nonoꞌotsa tabeno nuka tu batsayagate sapa nu ooosapa besa soonamme, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwena. Nu oo nakaꞌoedyukute ooonneꞌyoona nu oo nanetzakwiyiyakwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe.
46015032	Nu ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona, mu numu oetu e nebatsana e nehowawaꞌe. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa e yaꞌe-kwikoo e mayodase, oo-koobatoo e sootuhikwu. Pana umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukutu-matu meeoo, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa sokwama, tukana, baagoena tuwazoo tamme sumuna yabesoo yaꞌekwu.” Tamme ka oo ꞌoedyukuna soo numu ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu meꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu unnepu gi nakatogeꞌyookute.
46015033	Gi umuoo mumme nemooagadu-ma nakaꞌemukwapana. Umu ka Te Naa besa po-makoo mu takohonedu. Esoo togesapa naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka sutakoo numu napuaꞌana, tamme punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo manepetugakwu.”
46015034	Mu sakwa ka suda mu tumatuguna maꞌwuse oo nakasopedakwatoo ka togetu-kwitu. Susumudu mu-nagatu gisoo ka Te Naa sooꞌoedyukute. Mu sakwa suda oo sokwamaku ka oo mu manena.
46015035	Sumuna mu gi hemma nakaꞌoedyukuna meeꞌe tutubengakwu, “Hownnekoo yise soo yaꞌepu namanumudoose nummenummekwu? Hownnekoo ka saaꞌa umu tookoo-gadooa?”
46015036	Mu numu mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka ewetuhoo nanekwegeana. Te tookoo manepunnena puu, hemma tupooe-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme puu ka tupooe teepu-tooha mabemase, oꞌno oosoo naakwu.
46015037	Tamme ka tumasuana, gi tamme ka mooasoo a suana masuꞌa. Tamme ka oo tupooe masuꞌa.
46015038	Soo Te Naa ka tumasuape matabuepu, ooka tu sooyugwe-kwikoo yise noꞌobatusoo a pooe matabuepu ooonneꞌyoona soo tumasuape nanakummaꞌyoosoo.
46015039	Noꞌyoona puusoo soo hee modu tookoo gi nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo numu tookoo puu sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, soo nunuꞌu tookoo puu ataꞌyoosoo, soo nahoawidu tookoo punnoꞌo ataꞌyoosoo.
46015040	Soo tamme paꞌanakwitu ka teepu-koobakwituno naꞌataꞌyoosoo. Soo te paꞌanakwitu puu besa tatabuꞌadu-gaꞌyoo mu hee yaa teepu-koobatoo punnoꞌo besa tatabuꞌadu-gaꞌyoo.
46015041	Soo taba besa tabuꞌa, pummesoo tabua-kwikoo, yise soo muha punnoꞌo besa tabuꞌa, tu namadabue-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu paatoozooba punnoꞌo besa tatabuaꞌa pana noꞌyoona nanaꞌatasoo nanamadabuꞌe.
46015042	Tamme ka te yaꞌe-kwikoo namanumudoose tamme punnoꞌo pudutupu namayugwekwu. Soo te tookoo gi ka menoꞌotu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
46015043	Soo te tookoo yaa teepu-koobatu ka sutaꞌyoona, gi natsooena tamme yaꞌeyina nakooyikwu. Pana tamme ka pudu namanumudoose tamme unu natzooedu, besa tabuadu, gi yaꞌedu tookoo-ga manekwu, oowe manakwana. Te pudu tookoo besaꞌyookwu ka Te Naa-baa te nummenumme.
46015045	Soo Te Naa pooha yadooapu mee, “Soo Adam mee naneadu nana nagutza mooeꞌugasoo yow teepu-koobatu namanumudoopu,” pana soo Te Pabeꞌe yise yaaꞌa tamme-baa te magwetzoi petu.
46015046	Soo Te Naa mooeꞌugasoo noꞌoko numu sukwe matabuepuna yise saaꞌa oosoosoo Tu Besa Pooha-ma te mapudutupudookwu.
46015047	Soo Adam ka teepu-makoo namanumudoopu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ebe tamme-koobatu kemmana. Umu Adam nagedu ka teepu-kooba suuꞌmu momokwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nagedu ebe tamme-kooba Te Naa-baatoosoo mease oo-baaꞌyookwu. Tamme uga Adam-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, tamme yise saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
46015050	E nanumu, tamme ka mu numu manena nagena, tamme gi besa manekwu, tamme ka gi ooosapa yaa teepu-kooba momokwuse, ka kadooꞌoo namayugwekwuse. Pana tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nagemona, tamme atasoo manese tamme ka Te Naa poonnekwu.
46015051	Oꞌno soo tumooyagakunoo namooyagakukwu, ka teepu atasoo manikwuse, oo pudu nakasopedakwatoo ka putoogoo te pudu nanematugukwuna. Mu nanesootuhidu numu mooasoo tuigapu natzayozukwu. Mu tooesoo eka teepu-kooba gwetzoimodu-no mu nananesootuhidu tuipu numu-nosoo, noꞌyoona tamme yabesoo pudu namanumudookwusoo, umu gi kadooꞌoo namayugwedu Te Naa-baa ooosapa gwetzoikwudu.
46015053	Tamme ka pudu namanumudoose te tookoo atasoo manise gi tamme kadooꞌoo namayugweku-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oꞌno soo Te Naa tunemamakwupu, otoogoo manepetukwu. Soo Etzaꞌa suda unnepu punnoꞌo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa oo matzooekukwu. Oosoo nayaꞌedu ka namatzooekuse gi kadooꞌoo te mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
46015056	Soo suda numu tumatuguna numu-matoosoo kodyukwu numu goedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka gi Te Naa unnepu mayohona.
46015057	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooonneꞌyoona tamme mane-kwitoo nabatsapu. Oo te magwetzoi tabuapu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, ka Tu Besaa Tooa tamme-koobatoo oo nemawunipu.
46015058	Ooonneꞌyoona e nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi wahadame tusooyugwepana; ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuno, ooosapa oo nakabetseanona, besa oo tumayohokuna. Tamme ka pudu numu tamme oo mayugwekese. Oꞌno tamme nasootuhikwu.
46016001	Ka pukwi mu tutummatzipu-matu mu tumasumudoopu-witu sakwa nu mu tuukwe. Nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tutuha manedu Jerusalem-witu mu tummatzikwuna sookwaꞌe. Mu sakwa tumasumudoo mana mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Galatia mee naneadu-kwitu yoo mane tuungu. Mu sakwa punnoꞌo ooosoo.
46016002	Ka nonoꞌotsa mu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona, mu sakwa tumasumudooyina ka Te Naa mumme sootuhipu-matu, ka mu tumasumudooyina tsipunne. Oꞌno yise ka e petugase oosoo namamakwupunnedooa. Oꞌno yise nu gi tumasumudoona mu natuungu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
46016003	Nu ka mu-baa petugase tooe haga tooe saaꞌa mu tunetutzeapu, ka mu tumasumudoona noko ka mu tubope-noko Jerusalem-witoo tayadooa. Soo tubope saaꞌa umu-witusoo wahadu.
46016004	Tooꞌe saaꞌa nu umu-no meadooa ka oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoona. Oꞌno yise umu nu-no napuaꞌa-gadooa.
46016005	Nu ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-too mease, nu sumuna mu-baa gi haaꞌnotoo nobengekakwu.
46016006	Tooetoo nu sumuna mu-baa tomokwu. Mu sumuna e tummatzikwu, ka penakwa e mease tooe hanotoo tooe.
46016007	Gi haaꞌnoto nu mu nobengena, nu sakwa wunaꞌme mu-baa ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka meeoo sooyugwe.
46016008	Pana nu yaa ka Ephesus mee naneadu-kwiꞌyookwusoo ka tu nayasana mu mamakwunoto tooe yaanoꞌyoopunnekwu, nu ewasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu mesoo tunesootabuedooa, tooe menoꞌo ewaꞌyoo numu ne tumooꞌoogena sapa ka te nanesootuhi-kwi.
46016010	Ka Timothy mu-baa petugase, ka saaꞌa besa oo matugu. Oꞌno oosoo besa mu napuaꞌa nuummadooa. Oosoo nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe.
46016011	Mu sakwa noꞌyoona besa oo matuguna, oo tummatzi, oꞌno yise oosoo yabesoo nu-baatoosoo kodyudooa besa soonammena, numme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no oo soogwipunne.
46016012	Soo Apollos sakwa tooꞌe, mu susumudu nananesootuhidu-no mu-baa nobenge, meeꞌe nu oo tooe netamma. “Gi nu menoꞌo oo mani-kwaꞌneꞌyoona,” mee soo Apollos. Pana sumuna soo Apollos saaꞌa mumme nanekwegeakwu.
46016013	Mu sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu sakwa gi suipana tooe hemma haꞌoo manese sapa. Natzooesoo nasooyugwepunne.
46016014	Noꞌokosoo hemma how mu yugwekwi mu sakwa besa nanasoobedya.
46016015	Menoꞌo yise, e pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa ka Stephanas mee naneadu ka oo nobe-kwitunosoo besa umu-no nananetummatzi. Umuoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi mooe tunakaꞌoedyukupu, ka mu tubewa-wiꞌyoona, ka mumme tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootummatzina. Mu sakwa tuwazoo noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzidu tummatzi.
46016017	Nu besa soonamme ka Stephanas, Portunas noko Achaicus nu-baa petuse, umu ka nu-baaꞌyoona, tooe mumme gi nu-baakoo sapa.
46016018	Umu nu-baa petuse, mu mane-kwitu besa nemadabue. Umu besa e masoonamme, yise besa mu masoonammekwu tuwow, ka mu-baa petugase. Mu sakwa umuoo naana sootubetseyaꞌe.
46016019	Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa Asia-kooba nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu nemaꞌyu. Umu Aquila noko Priscilla mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu umu-no mu nobe-kwi sumuyakwe,
46016020	noꞌyoona yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatu mu nemaꞌyuyakwe. Mu sakwa nananenoꞌyugwe.
46016021	Nu, nuusoo, ka umu ume nemayudu unnena yow botugumena.
46016022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa tamme-baa petudooa. Tooe haga tooe ka gi Te Pabeꞌe petzabena, soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
46016023	Nu meeoo nanesootuhidyikwu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus sakwa besa mu sootuhi.”
46016024	Nu noꞌoko unu mu soobedya, mumme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu.
47001001	Ka Paul-makoo, Te Naa tunetutzeana, Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe, yise Timothy punnoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo, yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Achaia mee nanaeadu-matoo tuboꞌo tuwow.
47001002	Numme mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.
47001003	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe, oosoo ka tutuha te soobedyana te sootuhikwu. Soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooe ka suda hemma manise.
47001004	Saaꞌa tamme punnoꞌo mu numu netummatzikwu ka umu suda manese. Tamme mooasoo nasootuhipu, tamme yise kummaꞌakoosoo mesoo netummatzi.
47001005	Tooe mu numu suda te matuguse sapa, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo te sootuhaꞌe, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo netummatzi.
47001006	Numme ka suda numme tu matugu sapa numme mumme netummatzi, mu yise ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukute tooe suda mumme tumatuku sapa.
47001007	Numme ooosapa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedya, numme ka oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa mu netummatzikwu numme tu yugwe-waꞌnesoo tooe suda mu namanatzaya, numme-waꞌnesoo.
47001008	Mu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo soo hee numme-baatu suda mani numme ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Numme meeoo sokwama nummega nagoekwu meeꞌe.
47001009	Numme oo sopedakwatoo nummega sumuna uga nagoekwu. Numme yise ka Te Naa-ma tubetse nasoonatzi gi nummesoo mane-ma namagwetzoi. Soo Te Naa puu ka te yaꞌe-kwikoo te mesoo mayodakwu, ka meeoo te soobedyana numme oo-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzi.
47001010	Pana soo Te Naa ne magwetzoinoꞌo. Numme oo-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzaꞌe, ne magwetzoikwudu.
47001011	Mu yise besakoo ne tummatzaꞌepu-gaꞌyoo ka ne nanesootuhikuꞌyina. Oꞌno yise ewaꞌyoo oo nesootuhikwu tamme-koobatoo oosoo ka mu nanesootuhina nanekwegeana.
47001012	Numme oo sopedakwatoo ka kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo besa meana. Numme besa kaaheno mu matugu noꞌoko numu tuwazoo, soo Te Naa ka ne sootuhise numme mu soobedya.
47001013	Noꞌoko eka mu-matu ne tubona mu a mesoo nakasopedakwadoo. Mooasoo mu ma-matu nakasopedakwadoona. Nu noꞌoko maka mu nakasopedakwadoona besa sobedyana. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu numme-koobatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo kodyu petuse.
47001015	Mooasoo nu ka mooeꞌugasoo mu-matu tubose ka mu-baa nobengekwu mee tooꞌe soonammese, nu yise gi oo-toogoo mane, numme ooosapa gi ka Macedonia-wi moꞌo. Tamme saaꞌa ka nanataboegase, besa nanamatoo sokwamakwu. Tamme uga nanano nanesootuhikwu.
47001017	Nu gi waha-tamme tusooyugwena, meeoo mu tuukwe nu saaꞌa kemmadooa mee. Nu gi meeoo sukwe unakwe yise gi oo maneyakwe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Soo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo.
47001018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi ooonneꞌyoo, ooosapa tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo maneyakwe. Soo Te Naa puu te sootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo, ooonneꞌyooona tamme oo-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Tamme oo nesootuhaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. Soo Te Naa puusoo nakwi tunakaꞌoedyuku te matabuena, mu numu ne tuukwe tuunguna ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Nu Paul, Timothy yise Silas oowetuoo mu tuukwekwu.
47001022	Soo Te Naa Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi, tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo oosoo tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manese te magwetzoikwu.
47001023	Nu ooosapa gi mu-baa numme, nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu uga mu nesagwikukwu. Oosoo Te Naa e sopedakwatoo nu ka ooosapa besa mu nanesootuhikuna.
47001024	Gi numme mu ooonnakwa besaꞌyoo mee nasooꞌyugwena, numme mu soonoyugwepunnena. Numme mu netummatzina mu besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
47002001	Ooonneꞌyoona nu gi mu-baa nobengegena, nu gi mu soonesagwikute.
47002002	Nu gi besa soonamme ka mu nesagwikuna. Mu sakwa uga besa manemona besa nanesootuhina nu mu-matoo besa soonamme.
47002003	Nu mu-matoo tubopu, oꞌno nu ka mu-baa petugase gi suda soonammekwu ka mu-matu tumaꞌemukwa. Mu sakwa besa e masoonamme. Nu oo sopedakwatoo, nu ka besa soonammena mu punnoꞌo besa sokwamakwu.
47002004	Nu suda soonamme ka mu tumaꞌemukwadu nakase, nu yise mu-matu tubo. Nu ka besa mu soobedyana mu sootummatzina, nu gi suda mu sokwamana petzape.
47002005	Soo nana tumaꞌemukwadu gi nuka suuꞌmu suda masoonammekute, noꞌoko suda te masokwamakute tuwazoo.
47002006	Nagutza wunaꞌme natsasoopedyapunne oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwase. Menoꞌo yise oosoo suda oo soonammekuse oo nemakodyuka ka suda tu manepu.
47002007	Mu sakwa yise oo tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwuse, oo nanesootuhiku. Oꞌno yise oosoo saaꞌa gi suda soonammena, gi nasootookedooa.
47002008	Mu sakwa yise tubetse besa oo matugu.
47002009	Mooeꞌugasoo nu mu-matoo tubose nu meeoo soonammena howga mu e tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo oo-toogoo manakwe. Mu yise e nakabetseapu-gaꞌyoo.
47002010	Menoꞌo mu ka nana tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwuna nu punnoꞌo mu-no mooasoo oo soomuꞌwupu. Nu ka oo manepu soomuꞌwuna, nuka Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma-waꞌnesoo mane.
47002011	Soo Sutaꞌyoo ka tumaꞌemukwadu kadooꞌoo mayugweku-waꞌne tabuꞌa tamme oo sopedakwatoo. Soo Sutaꞌyoo noꞌoko kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu mee tusooyugwe.
47002012	Nu ooosapa meadabena ka Troas mee naneadu-kwi petuga nu ooosapa gi mu-baa nobengegaꞌa. Onona nu ka mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Soo Te Naa tookwa mooasoo ewow numu sootuhipuna umu yise e nakowyapunne.
47002013	Pana nu yise meeoo soonamme nu sakwa gi besa ka umu-baaꞌyoona ka e puaꞌa Titus gi onoko, oonow ka mee nu soonammena. Nu yise sake-wi mangeka ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwitoo, nu ka Titus watehooka.
47002014	Numme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe oosoo ka ooosapa ne moohena, numme yise ka sutakoo matsooekute. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netammana, numme yise manatooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona.
47002015	Mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukukwudu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona te magwetzoikwu. Mu numu gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna ka yaꞌeyina gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugakwu ka gi gwetzoibu-ma pumme tu sootuhaꞌe.
47002017	Tooe numme gi maawaꞌneꞌyoopana Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahammoꞌo. Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Numme toge-kwitu ka Te Naa-witu wahakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha tooha-kwi. Pana numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu gi oe natumunagakupana.
47003001	Mu mooasoo ne numu sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Naa yadooakumoꞌo, yisetoo gi hemma hayoosoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Numme gi tubope mu mapoonnekute mu mooasoo ne manena sopedakwatoo. Gi yise numme tubope mu-makoo soogwaꞌe ka ne manepunnena wahadu. Mu mooasoo ne besaꞌyoona sopedakwatoo.
47003002	Mu, muusoo mu numu tzapoonnekute mu natunedyooepu. Noꞌyoona mu numu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute ka oetu numme mu tuukwese. Mu ka natubodu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo ka mu numu numme-witu tuukwena. Mu oo tzapoonne soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-ma mumme sootuhi. Menoꞌo yise mu numu ne sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe.
47003004	Numme oo sopedakwatoo, numme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa ne sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yoo ne matabuepu.
47003005	Numme gi nummesoo besa namadabuꞌe, soo Te Naasoo ne matabue, numme yise besa maneke.
47003006	Soo Te Naa meeoo ne netammana, “Mu numu tuukweꞌe ka e Besa Pooha-witu Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoi.” Soo ne mooa tumayohope ka tseketadyadu tupe-matoo nanaboꞌo. Pana numme ka ne nanamooatupu tumayohope tamme magwetzoidu tooe nagena umu gi ne magwetzoina, numme tuaꞌe. Soo Te Naa pudu unnena meeoo menoꞌo numme ka mu numu meeoo netamma oo Besa Pooha atasoo te yugwekwu. Tamme yise ooosapa gwetzoikwu.
47003007	Oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu ka te mooa tumayohope nagease, soo Moses koba pooha kootabedooa-waꞌne tabuꞌa, mu Jew numu gi oo koba poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana oosoo poohabe obeda kadoo manekapu.
47003008	Menoꞌo tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-tooha.
47003009	Soo oꞌnosoo naꞌunnedu ka te tumayohope-witu naduya pana gi atasoo te yugwe, te sukwe koꞌe. Soo pudu naꞌunnedu unu natzooꞌe. Oosoo unnepu meeoo te tuukweꞌe Te Naa Besa Pooha atasoo te yugwe tamme besa manekwu.
47003010	Soo oꞌnosoo te manena, te nagemona, unu ugasoo natzooe pana menoꞌo gi natzooꞌe-gaꞌyoo oosoo mobegwa-gaꞌyoo, soo pudu naꞌunnedu ka unu natzooena ooosapa gi mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
47003012	Numme gi nasookwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ne wahakwuna oo sopedakwadoona, numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha unnena wahamoꞌo. Esoo Pooha ooosapa numme-no gi moobegwaga.
47003013	Gi ka unnepu ka Moses ne nanamooatupu tuukwe-kwaꞌne. Soo Moses unnepu moobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
47003014	Susumudu mu Jew numu yise gi ka Te Pabeꞌe soonakaꞌoedyukute, tooe menoꞌo pana ka Moses tubona naneꞌa mu Jew numu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Mu Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suuꞌmu oo nakasopedakwatoo ka Moses tubona.
47003017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooka te nakasopedakwadoona te sootuhina tamme yise ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Menoꞌo tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suina, gi too oo-ma nasookwaꞌe, tamme ka Te Naa nakasopedakwadoona.
47003018	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma atasoo te yugwewunu unusoo nawaꞌnesoo te yugwe.
47004001	Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo ne netamma mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, numme gi nasootookedu, numme ka numme tu sootuhaꞌe.
47004002	Numme togesapa tuukwena, ka Te Naa besa podo meadape. Numme ka nanasuda namanedu po maꞌwukese, numme gi numu nemooagana ka Te Naa unnena kaaheno wahammoꞌo. Mu ne sopedakwadoo numme kaahenoꞌyoo, Te Naa punnoꞌo ne sopedakwatoo.
47004003	Umu numu gi Te Pabeꞌe nakasopedakwadoodu ka sutakoo nakabetseꞌa.
47004004	Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo mu tzaꞌemukwana, umu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha nakasopedakwadoo. Umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
47004005	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu suuꞌmu, numu tunedyooꞌe gi numme nummesoo tusooyugwena. Ka Te Pabeꞌe numme nakabetseꞌa, ka mu tummatzina.
47004006	Menoꞌo numme oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo manepu, yise how unu pooha-gana tubetse besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga togabu-wi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-baa petuse, tamme tabua-kwitoo kua. Soo Te Naa ka teepu pudu matabuese, meeoo unakwe, “Soo taba sakwa ka togabu kootabuakupunne.”
47004007	Numme ka Te Naa besa unnena sopedakwadoona nasootuhipu, pana numme togesoo sukwe numu, gi nummesoo pooha-gana mu numu yise oo sopedakwadookwu numme ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi gi nummetusoo.
47004008	Tooe hano tooe numme suda namatugupu, gi numme oo namatzooekute, gi too nasootooke.
47004009	Numme tu netumooꞌoose sapa, numme gi numme suuꞌmu soo Te Naa ooosapa numme-no, tooe numme tu kusegeaꞌa sapa, gi kadoo namayugwe.
47004010	Tooe numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsakwuse ooosapa namabetseapunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha numme-ma natzapoonnekwu. Numme tookoo-gaꞌyoo mesoo nabatsadu, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ne magwetzoaꞌe.
47004012	Pana numme ka oo-koobatoo nabatzase, mu nasootuhina, namagwetzoikwu.
47004013	Meeoo nabotugu, “Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu meeoo unakwe, nu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Numme punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo.
47004014	Numme oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa te yaꞌe-kwikoo te mayodakwu, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yugwese. Tamme yise ooosapa oo-baayookwu.
47004015	Noꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo uga numme-tamme kemmadu nanematzagakwunipu. Ewaꞌyoosoo yise numu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna namagwetzoikwu, soo Te Naa yise umu-koobatoo nanesookwugikwu.
47004016	Ooonneꞌyoona numme yise gi nasootooke. Ne tookoo kadooꞌoo namayugwese sapa, ne soonammena pudutupusoo namadabuemenasoo nonotsa tabeno.
47004017	Soo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona mu numu ne netumooꞌoona, oꞌno yise numme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona ooosapa noꞌyoona hee numme-tamme besaꞌyookwu.
47004018	Numme yise oo soomaꞌyu ne nasootuhipe ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, pana numme yise ka sutakoo uga numme-tamme kemmadu soomuꞌwa. Soo menoꞌo hee yaa teepu-kooba gi haaꞌnotosoo meadu, mobegwa-gaꞌyoo saaꞌa ne nasootuhipe Te Naa-baa gi mobegwa-gakoo.
47005001	Soo te tookoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoonasoo mobegwa-gakwu. Umuoo kadoo namayugwese, tamme kummaꞌakoosoo pudutupu natookoo-makakwu. Te Naa tamme matabuekuna ooosapa namagwetzoinummekwudu.
47005002	Menoꞌo tamme yaa teepu-koobasoo te tookoo-wizoo, tooe tamme ka te paꞌanakwatoo te meakwuna soogwipana.
47005003	Tamme yise gi a moogooa suuꞌmu, gi tsoapa-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme tubetse tookoo-gakwu tooe ka saaꞌa yaꞌese sapa.
47005004	Tamme ka yaano nanatutuha manemodu gi besa sokwama ka tammesoo tookoo-wiꞌyoona, pana tamme gi tsoapa-waꞌne sokwama. Tamme ka te pooha tookoo soogwaꞌe, oꞌno tamme ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
47005005	Soo Te Naa te mapudutupudookwu, oꞌno tamme gwetzoikwusoo, oosoo yise ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise, oꞌno tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
47005006	Tamme ka te tunakaꞌoedyukuna nakabetsea, gi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona hemma te poonnena. Tamme ka tunakabetseana ooosapa besa sokwamakwu tamme oo sopedakwadoo tamme togesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tamme gi Te Naa-baa.
47005008	Tamme ka te tookoo tubetse soomawunaꞌe, oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu.
47005009	Tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa te nakabetseakwuna petzape ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona tooetoo Te Naa-baaꞌyoona.
47005010	O saaꞌa tamme ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona te manepu-makoo te nemadabuekwu. Tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu tamme ka besa tumatuguna tooetoo suda tumatuguna. Tamme ka besa tumatuguna besa nasootuhikwu. Tamme ka suda tumatuguna gi nasootuhikwu.
47005011	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona, numme mu numu tuukweꞌe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu yise oo nakasopedakwadookwu, oꞌno umu sumuna tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ne sopedakwadoo, nu yise mumme ne nakasopedakwadookwuna petzape tuwazoo.
47005012	Numme gi nummesoo nanesookwugina petukute, pana mu tuukwena nummesoo nakwitu, oꞌno mu gi numme-ma nasookwikwu ka mu numu numme nekwohone petuse. Umu ne wohonedu ooonneꞌyoo ka numu tabua-makoo meadu, gi ka oo tumatugu-makoo.
47005013	Tooꞌe numme ka gi sokwamadu-kwaꞌne manakwe mee numme tu netamma sapa, numme ka Te Naa-koobatoo oo manakwe. Numme ka besa tusoyugwena, numme tooe hownnekoo tooe mu tummatzikwu.
47005014	Noꞌyoona ne manena ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka besa te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa.
47005015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo nabatsa menoꞌo yise tamme ka sutakoo te nagena mesoo tzadyooikute. Menoꞌo umu ka Te Pabeꞌe mesoo nakabetseꞌa ka puu-koobatoo oo nabatsase, ka tu yaꞌekwikoo oo namayodase.
47005016	Menoꞌo tamme gi tooe hayoo tooe oo sooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu-waꞌne. Tamme oꞌnosoo uga ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo soobedyayakwe, pana menoꞌo tamme gi.
47005017	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwuse, tamme pudutupu maneke, pudu namadabuepu-waꞌne. Tamme gi ka oꞌnosoo te tusooyugwe-waꞌne tusooyugwe, besasoo tusooyugwe.
47005018	Soo Te Naa atasoo te yugwekese tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugweke, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
47005019	Soo Te Naa numu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwu, meeoo ne netammana, “Mu sakwa mu numu ewetuoo tuukwe.”
47005020	Numme yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe manepunnedu, mu numu tuukwedu ka Te Naa umu sootuhipu. Numme meeoo, “Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,
47005021	oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi tumaꞌemukwadu, tamme-koobatoo nabatsa tumaꞌemukwadu-kwaꞌne, oꞌno soo Te Naa besa te mesoo matabuekwu.”
47006001	Numme meeoo mu netamma, “Mu ka gisoo besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi oo ooowemota nakwumunapana, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu sootuhi petukwu.”
47006002	Meeoo soo Te Naa unnepu nabotugu, “Nu ka mu nanetzagwaꞌena nakase mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno nu mu magwetzoikwu.” Yise menoꞌo soo Te Naa mu namagwetzoikwuna petzape.
47006003	Numme ooosapa besa manakwe ka mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi tzadyooikudu, ooosapa besa unakwe tuwazoo. Numme ooosapa besa manakwe mu numu numme gi nesootzema-koobatoo-waꞌne, numme ka Te Naa yadooawabena.
47006004	Mu numu ne sopedakwatoo numme ka Te Naa yadooawabena, tuwazoo numme ooosapa oo-no wunu tooe hemma nanasuda numme-tamme manekese sapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
47006005	Numme nuupagedayina, nakwutuma numme tuwazoo, gi maneyakwe ka ewa hemma howyugwena, yise tooe natseagoena, yise gi besa utuiyina.
47006006	Mu numu ne poonne, numme besa tumatugupu. Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseadu, gi etzaga sutagonno, besa numu ooosapa matugudu, numme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, noꞌoko mu numu numme besa soobedya. Numme ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohaꞌyoona, ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meadape.
47006008	Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu hayoo unakwe sapa, umu ka ne nesootuhina, tooetoo ne nesootzemana, ka mu numu meeoo numme mu netamma numme kaahenoꞌyoo tooetoo mu nemooagadu,
47006009	ka gi ne sopedakwatoo mee mu unakwe sapa tooe noꞌoko numu numme sopedakwatoo. Numme ooosapa tooꞌe nabatsayakwe pana numme togesoo momoꞌo.
47006010	Numme-tamme ewasoo suda maneyakwe ooonneꞌyoopana numme ooosapa besa nesokwama. Tooe numme tutuha manemo pana ewaꞌyoo mu numu nasootuhiyakwe. Tooe numme gi hee-ga-kwaꞌne tabuapana menoꞌo numme noꞌoko nasootuhipe hee-gaꞌyoo.
47006011	E nanumu, numme noꞌoko hemma kaaheno mu tuukwekwu.
47006012	Numme unu mu soobedyana, gi hemma mu-makoo tsitugu, pana mu gi oo neheesoobedya.
47006013	Mu sakwa ne soobedya. Nu puu mu soobedya mu doodooamu-ga-kwaꞌnesoo.
47006014	Tamme sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-ma tzabepana: gi umu-matu nodukwadoopana, gi umu-matu besa pupuaꞌamu-gapana. Tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadu, umuoo sutaꞌyoo kummaꞌakoosoo po-gaꞌyoo gi tamme umu-no mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
47006015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo moohedu woho-gaꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nanetupuaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌne gi tusooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa yise gi umu-noꞌyoopana.
47006016	Tamme Te Naa doodooamu-matu. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-noꞌyookwu. Tamme gi tooe hemmatoo tooe nanesootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo meeoo nabotugu tamme Te Naa doodooamu-matu meeꞌe. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu mu-baa nobe-gaꞌyoo. Nu Mu Naa manepunne, umu yise nuga doodooamu mee nu mu natubangakwu.”
47006017	Meeoo tuwazoo unakwe, “Mu sakwa gi mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baaꞌyoopana, mu sakwa gi ka suda namanedu tsitugupana. Mu ka suda namanedu maꞌwukese,
47006018	nu e dooamu mu mayugwekwu.”
47007001	E besa nanumu, tamme sakwa gi totsabu manekese, ka suda namanedu soomuꞌwake. Tamme sakwa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku, tamme ka Te Naa sopedakwadoona. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina tu doodooamu te mayugwekwu.
47007002	Mu sakwa meeoo sokwama numme mu pupuaꞌamu mee. Numme ooosapa besa mu matugu. Numme gi haga nemawunaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matu, numme tuwazoo gi numu nemooagadu.
47007003	Nu gi mu nesootzemana meeoo unakwe, nu meeoosoo unakwe nu tubetse besa mu soobedya. Mu ne pupuaꞌamu, haꞌoo ka ne nabatsase, tooetoo togesoo ne momona.
47007004	Numme oo sopedakwatoo mu besa manekese, numme besa mu-koobatoo sokwama. Ewa numme-tamme suda namanekena, pana numme besa mu-koobatoo sokwama.
47007005	Numme ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwi petugase, numme gi manega. Numme ewa nanasuda manegena. Mu numu ne netumooꞌoona, numme ewa mu-kwitu soohanena suda mu sokwamakute.
47007006	Pana soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme nasootukedu sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ne sootuhaꞌe, ka Titus numme-baa petuse.
47007007	Besa oosoo ka numme-baa petusesoo, soo Titus meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu oo nenoyugwenoꞌo. Menoꞌo ne tuukwe mu ne tubetse pupuaꞌamu mu suda sokwama ka tumaꞌemukwase, mu yise e sumusoomaꞌyu. Menoꞌo yise nu besa soonamme.
47007008	Nu gi suda soonamme menoꞌo tooe nu ka mooeꞌugasoo suda mu nenuumase sapa, ka mu-matoo tubose. Nu gi haaꞌnoto suda soonamme pana menoꞌo nu oo sopedakwadoo e tubona suda mu nenuuma gi haaꞌnoto, yise ka suda-makoo mu makodyu. Nu menoꞌo besa soonamme mu ka Te Naa besa podosoo meadabena tuwazoo. Soo Te Naa suda mu sokwamana petzape ka suda mu tumatugu-kwi, oꞌno mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manekekwusoo. Besa mu ka oo manese, numme mu netummatzaꞌe, numme ka mu-matoo tubose, mu yise tunakaꞌoedyukusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi maneke.
47007010	Tamme yise suda sokwama ka oo sopedakwadoona ka suda manese, oosoo besaꞌyoo soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoikwu. Pana tamme ka suda sokwammana, tamme ka gi te sookwina hee-gana soo suda te sokwammana kadoo te mayugwekwu.
47007011	Mu tumaꞌemukwana suda mu masoonamme, mu yise ka suda mu manena nanekwahakwuni. Mu yise yabesoo ka suda tumatugudu nesagwikuhoo. Mu oo tzapoonne mu ka gi suda tumatugudu-matu mu ka suda tumatugudu tzasoopedya.
47007012	Nu mu-matoo tubo ka Te Naa-makoo, oꞌno mu muusoo oo tzapoonne, mu ka besa ne soobedyana. Mu ka e nakabetseana, mu e tzapoonnekute. Nu gi sukwe tuboꞌo ka suda numu manese.
47007013	Menoꞌo yise mu besa ne masokwama, mu ka Te Naa besa podo manekese. Soo Titus punnoꞌo mu-matoo besa nuumma numme yise punnoꞌo besa sokwama, ka punowsoo kodyuse.
47007014	Nu ka gisoo mu-kwitu oo tuukwena mu ka Te Naa podo meꞌa, menoꞌo mu yise ka Te Naa tzapoonnekute mu ka besa manekese. Noꞌyoona soo hee ka Titus ne tuukwena mu-kwitu togesapa.
47007015	Soo Titus besa mu soobedya mu ka e nakabetseapugana, e oedyukuna ka mumme oo tunetammakupu, ka besa oo matuguna ka oo mu-baaꞌyoopunne.
47007016	Nu besa soonamme ka besa ooosapa mu tumatugu.
47008001	Ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-witu mu tummatzikwu-kwitu nu mu tuukwekwu. Mu nananesootuhidu numu Macedonia-witu puu besa nasootuhaꞌe, umu ka hemma tuukepana ka mu nananesootuhidu tummatzina.
47008002	Tooe unu tutuha manepana umu besa sokwama ka tu pupuaꞌamu tummatzina.
47008003	Umu ka umusoo tooe gi oo mapuaꞌapana umu ka mu umu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootummatzina, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitu.
47008005	Numme gi meeoo mu netamma. Umu puusoo ka Te Naa soobedya oo tumayohope ne soobedya-waꞌne numme tuwow tumayohokute.
47008006	Numme ka Titus yaa menoꞌo mu-matoosoo kodyu tuungu. Oosoo ka tu tumasumudoona oo mamakwuhookwu. Oosoo mooasoo umu-naga-kwitu tumasumudoo tuungu.
47008007	Mu mooasoo ooosapa besa tunakaꞌoedyukute, mu ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo mu ka oo unnepu unu oo nakabetseana. Menoꞌo yise mu ka tutuha manedu nanesootuhidu tumasumudookuse gi saaꞌa nabagapana ka penebetudooe saaꞌa oetu pebuꞌa, mu ka numme soobedyana.
47008008	Gi nuga tunetammana mu Macedonia-witu numu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe unu nesoobedyana ka oo unnepu mayohona, ka mu tutuha manedu nanesootuhidu tumasumudookuna, ka mu tummatzina.
47008009	Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa manepunne pana gi hemma tuuge ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, pana Te Pabeꞌe te soobedyana. Oosoo yise noꞌoko tu hemma matusookwunise tamme-baa petuse, yow yise tutuha manena nabatsapu tamme-koobatoo. Oo manese tamme yise besakoo nasootuhaꞌe.
47008010	Mooasoo sumu tomokapu mu ka mu tumasumudookwu mee unnese, umu sakwa menoꞌo oo-toogoo namamakwupunne.
47008011	Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu mu tookwa togesapa unakwe.
47008012	Mu ka mu mapuꞌana ka tumasumudoo-kwitoo pepuꞌana soo Te Naa besa mu-matoo soonamme. Soo Te Naa mu sopedakwadoo ka tutuha mu manepunne.
47008013	Umu Jerusalem-witu nananesootuhidu menoꞌo natummatzibu soogwipunne. Mu yise punnoꞌo sumudooe natummatzibu soogwikwu. Umu yise punnoꞌo mu tummatzikwu. Tamme yise nanahoesoo nanatummatzina, yise noꞌyoona tamme gi tutuugekwu.
47008015	A nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu numu makana, mu numu ka moogoo manena, tooe umu ewa tutzobase sapa gi hee penaweyakwe. Pana mu numu huutseꞌe tutzobadu gi tutuuge.”
47008016	Numme ka Titus besa sooyukwe ka Te Naa oo nesootuhaꞌe. Soo Titus ewa mu-kwitu soohane numme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
47008017	Numme ka Titus netutzea mu-baasoo oo nobenge tuunguna, oosoo yise yadada oosoo ka tubetse unu mu-baatoo soomeapunnena.
47008018	Sumuꞌyoo tunakabetseadu Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanesootuhi-kwitu tunedyooedu oo-noꞌyookwu. Ewaꞌyoosoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatooe ookow numu nesopedakwadoona oo nebesaꞌyookute.
47008019	Mu yaatu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo netutzease Titus-no mana meakwutu, oꞌno umu saaꞌa ka mu tumasumudoona ka Jerusalem-witu puu hanedooa. Oꞌno mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nananesootuhidu, yise oo sopedakwadoodooa gi numme nummesoo oo hanekwuse.
47008020	Numme gi numu numme tuakwuna petzape ka tummasumudoope ne hanese.
47008021	Numme noꞌoko numu ooka sopedakwadoopunnena petzabena numme ka kaaheno tumatuguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo ne sopedakwadoo. Ooonneꞌyoona numme umuoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu taꞌya.
47008022	Kummaꞌyoosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo umu-no. Numme oo netutzea oosoo ewasoo ne tzapoonnekute ka besaꞌyoona. Oosoo besa tu manena petzape. Oosoo mu-matoo tu meana besa soobedya. Oosoo ka oo tubetse oedyukuna mu besa manekekwu.
47008023	Mooasoo mu ka Titus sopedakwatoo, oosoo ka nanesootuhibu numu e tunedyooꞌe e tummatzaꞌe, mu sakwa unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku mee numme mu soobedyana. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatu noꞌyoona nanetutzeapu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi nanesootuhibu tunedyooekwudu. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesootuhaꞌe umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatoo.
47008024	Mu sakwa besa mu numu matugu, oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatu tooe ne sopedakwadoona mu tzapoonneku, ka mu numu besa ne soobedyana, numme togesapa ka mu nanana tuukweꞌe mu-witu.
47009001	Ka mu tutuha manedu numu Jerusalem-witu mu tummatzikwuna, nu gi oetu mu nenoyukwena mu-matoo tuboꞌo.
47009002	Nu mooasoo mu sopedakwatoo ka mu tumasumudookwuse, nu ka mooasoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwese. Ka teepu Macedonia mee naneadu-kwitu, mooeꞌugasoo manakwanasoo mu mu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumasumudookukwu mee unakwe. Nu ka mu Macedonia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwena, umu punnoꞌo, ka mu tutuha manedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzikwu.
47009003	Nu umuoo nanana netutzea umu sakwa mooe tumasumudoo. Nu ka mu numu ooka mooe sopedakwatoona petzabena ka kaaheno mu-kwitu e wahana. Nu mooasoo mu namamakwupunnena mumme e waha-kwaꞌnesoo petzape.
47009004	Nu gi mu-baa menoꞌo e petugana petzape ka mu Macedonia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-noko, ka mu tumasumudoona gisoo mu mamakwu. Nu nuusoo namanasookwikwu ka meeoo tuukwese nu mu sopedakwatoo mu besa tumatugudu mee nu mu wahase. Mu sumuna punnoꞌo nasookwikwu ka gisoo namamakwupunnena.
47009005	Nu mu naana mooe tayakwu nakobenasoo mu sakwa namabetzapepunne ka mu tumasumudoona mooe mamakwupunne, oꞌno nu ka mu-baa petugase mu saaꞌa mu tzakeadooa. Mu yise besa sokwamakwu, ka mu hanekuse. Oꞌno gi nu mu nenoyukwedu-kwaꞌne tabuakwu ka mu-baa e petugase.
47009006	Yoo manepunne. Tamme ka huutsekoo hemma pooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme huutsekoosoo yasakwu. Pana tamme ka ewow tubooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme ewow yasakwu. Ooosoo manepunne soo numu natugeana u ka nabagana huutsekoo tugease, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa huutseꞌe-ma te sootuhikwu.
47009007	Pana tamme ka gi nabagase ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa noꞌyoona mu tusooyugwena nakabetsea soo Te Naa besa soonammena mu tugeana petzape, gi mu sukwe tugeana.
47009008	Soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko hemma-ma mu sootuhikwu, mu gi hemma soogwikwusoo, oꞌno mu ka mu tutuha manedu tummatzikwu.
47009009	Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo nabotugu, “Soo Te Naa ka umu tutuha manedu sootuhikwu. Mu numu ooosapa besow oo neyugwekwu ka oo ooonnekoo soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
47009010	Soo Te Naa ka tu tupooe-ma te sootuhipunne noꞌokosoo hemma nadukadu gi te namatuukekute. Soo Te Naa nanabesasoo te sootuhikwu.
47009011	Mu tubetse besakoo nasootuhikwu ka gi nabagana, ka tutuha manedu tummatzise. Mu numu yise ka besa Te Naa sooyugwe, mu mane-koobatoo. Mu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna tzapoonnekukwu, Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunetammakupu tumayohona ka besa mu numu matuguna.
47009014	Umu Jerusalem-witu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu nemayuna yise mu nanesootuhikute ka besa mu tumasumudookwuse.
47009015	Numme ka Te Naa besa sooyugwe, ka Te Naa numme sootuhaꞌe ka besa ooosapa numme oo tubetse sootuhise gi numu tunenagapu.
47010001	Nu ka Te Naa besa podo mu meadabekwuna unu petzape. Ka oo mu manakwe, oꞌno yise nu gi mu nesagwikute ka mu-baa petugase. Oꞌno nu besa mu matugukwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Mu meeoo, “Soo Paul besa te matugu ka tamme-baaꞌyoona, pana ka tu tubokwi unu te nesagwikute ka tamme-kwingaꞌyoona.” Nu punnoꞌo mu-matu nesagwikukwu ka mu-baa petugase mu ka meeoo unnena, “Numme ka numme tu tunedyooena nummesoo gi mayohopana,” mee mu unakwe.
47010003	Numme ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona gi nummesoo ka sutakoo takone-waꞌneꞌyoo.
47010004	Numme gi pooha-gaꞌyoo, soo Te Naa puusoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo unu natzooena. Te Naa pooha-ma numme ka sutakoo matzooekute.
47010005	Umu numme netoomooꞌoodu gi haꞌyoosoo unne-waꞌni, numme ka umu-no yadooana. Numme mu tzapoonnekute umu numu nemooagadu. Numme ka Te Naa pooha-ma mu suda unnedu nematzooekuse, umu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseakwu.
47010006	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana mee ne netamma, oꞌno mu Te Naa po ooowemota meadu makodyukukwu.
47010007	Mu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu paba naneꞌyugwe. Mu ne sopedakwatoo numme unu tunakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi. Numme mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwena soo Te Pabeꞌe tu pooha-matu-ma e sootuhise nu mu tunedyooe, nu yise gi sukwe nanaꞌunakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netammana nu mu tunedyooena mu netummatzaꞌe.
47010008	Nu gi oo nasookwaꞌe ekow mumme e tuukwena.
47010009	Pana nu gi e tubo-wi mumme e nesuana petzape.
47010010	Mu-nagatu meeoo e netamma, “Oosoo Paul ka tubona, oo unnena unu natzooꞌe, pana ka numme-baaꞌyoona oo unnena gi hee.”
47010011	Pana gi! Mu ka sutakoo gi maꞌwuna, nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu mu ohobu nematugukwu ka e tubo-kwaꞌnesoo.
47010012	Susumudu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee naneyugwedu mooasoo mu-baa petugapu, mu nemooagadu meeoo mu netamma, “Numme ka Paul ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Numme tubetse besa Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabena.” Tooe umu, “Numme unu sokwamadu,” mee mu nanaꞌunnepana, mu gi unu sokwama. Gi too ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo tusooyugwedu. Umuoo gi ka Te Naa yadooawabena, gi mu-matoo natayadu. Umu numu sukwe nemooagamodu. Numme Timothy-no gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
47010014	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu mooe tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi. Ooosapa numme nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooemo, yow numme mooeꞌugasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooekwudu.
47010015	Numme mu oedyukuna mu unusoo tunakaꞌoedyukukwu tubetse besakoo mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwitoo tooe. Oꞌno yise numme mu numu mu-kwingadutusoo tuukwemokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
47010016	Numme numu tunedyookwu ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakadu, gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu manena-ma nanaꞌunnena.
47010017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-ma nanaꞌunnese oosoo yisetu, pana tamme ka tammesoo nanaꞌunnesoo, oosoo gi hee. Tamme sakwa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo suuꞌmu nanetzakwiyaꞌe.
47011001	Mu sakwa e nakapunne gi haaꞌnokosoo nusoo-nawitu mu tuukwe.
47011002	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwese, nu yise ka mu besaꞌyookwuna petzape mu ka oo-matoo meakwuse, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo. Mu sakwa ooosapa gi tootsaba-gana ka Te Naa-baa petuga.
47011003	Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo Sutaꞌyoo togogwa ka mooe namadabuepu mogoꞌne, Eve mee naneadu, nemooagapu. Soo Sutaꞌyoo sumuna ka Te Naa besa po oeꞌmoota mu yugwe.
47011004	Mu ooosapa ka mumme nemooagadu besa nakabetsea umu kummaꞌakoosoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te tuukwekwu, kummaꞌakoosoo poohabe, tooetoo kummaꞌakoosoo naꞌunnedu ka Te Naa-maꞌyoo kemmadu mee unnena. Umuoo numu mee unnena, “Numme yow ka Te Naa tubetse nanayadooawabe,” pana umuoo gi. Umu numu nemooaga, sukweapu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwena. Oosoo Sutaꞌyoo numu nemooagadu mee naneadu punnoꞌo mee naneꞌyugwe, Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo meeꞌe, ooonneꞌyooona umu numu Sutakoo nakabetseadu. Umu numme-waꞌnesoo, manakwe mee naneꞌyugwe. Pana gi toge manakwe, mu tunemooagana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Gi saaꞌa umu-ma nakatzabepana. Nu punnoꞌo besaꞌyoo gi umuoo numu-waꞌne. Nu sumuna gi besa hemma nemadabuewunudu, pana nu oo sopedakwadoo ka pukwitu e nehanena. Numme mooasoo ekow mu tzapoonnekute. Mu meeoo, nu Paul ka sumuna maꞌemukwa. Nu ka gi mu tunekwina ka mu nanesootuhi tunedyooena. Susumudu mu-matoo e nesootzemana mee unakwe, “Soo Paul tookwa gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi te tunedyooe, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo gi te tunekwaꞌe tooe ka nanesootuhibu te tunedyooepana.” Oosoo togesapa nu gi hemma nuusoo hee-gaꞌyoo, nu ka nuusoo nakoobatoo manena. Nu ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu hemma natuungu, nu ka gi mumme nuka tummatzikwuna petzabena. Oꞌno sakwa nu mu netummatzi gi suda mu nesokwama. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka teepu Macedonia-wiꞌyoona tu tumasumudoopu nu-baa hanepetu. Gi haga mumme teepu Achaia mee naneadu-koobatu mee unne-waꞌneꞌyoo nu hemma mu-makoo hane. Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama, “Soo Paul gi te petzabedu-kwaꞌne, oosoo puu gi te tunekwaꞌe.” Pana gi! Nu unu mu soobedya. Te Naa e sopedakwadoo nu mu soobedya. Nu ooosapa mu tuukwenokwu, nu kaaheno manenokwu nu ka mu sootzapoonnekuna umu sutaꞌyoo yadooawabe gi nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umu puu ooosapa hemma mu-makoo natuunguyakwe, pana nu gi hemma mu natuungudu.
47011016	Mu sakwa gi meeoo e netammapana, “Soo Paul gi soonamme,” pana mu sakwa e nakapunne, oꞌno nu mu tuukwekwu, nu besaꞌyoo gi ka mu susumudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
47011017	Nu tookwa neꞌemukwa ka nanaꞌunnena soo Te Pabeꞌe Pooha puu gi meeoo naꞌunakwe.
47011018	Pana yise umu Sutaꞌyoo nayadooawabe puu nanaꞌunakwe numu-waꞌnesoo, nu sakwa nuusoo nawitu gi haaꞌnoto wahahoo.
47011019	Mu ooosapa mumme nemooagadu nakabetseꞌa mu ka unu sokwama mee nanatukwena.
47011020	Tooe umu suda mu matuguse sapa, umu mu nemooagana, gi mu heesoobedya, pana mu tooesoo mu nakabetsea.
47011021	Mu sumuna meeoo sokwama numme sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo nidyapu. Pana gi! Nu gi nidyupu. Nu umu mu nemooagadu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
47011022	Umu naanaꞌunnena, “Numme tubetse Jew numu Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu.” Nu punnoꞌo Jew numu, umu-waꞌnesoo. Nu punnoꞌo togesapa Abraham-maꞌyoona suaketu.
47011023	Umu meeoo naneyugwe, “Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa yadooawabe.” Nu punnoꞌo yadooawabe ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo. (Nu tookwa gi besa tusooyukwe ka meeoo unnena.) Nu umuoo ooonakwasoo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooe. Nu ewasoo nakwutumapu unu nuupageta, ewasoo natsasoopedya, yaꞌe sakwa mee nasoobedyana ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
47011024	Manege tooe mu Jew numu tubetse unutseꞌe tooe e wupageta.
47011025	Pahe tooe mu Roman numu punnoꞌo hooope-ma e moomooedyakwe, sumu tupe-ma e tatapagetu. Pahe tooe soo e sake patatzopapunne, nu yise sumu tabeno, sumu togano, ka baa-kooba patadyotsenummeyakwe.
47011026	Nu ooosapa manatooe nummenummedu. Nu sakwa sumuna batadyaꞌe, mu tuduhadu sumuna e wutzagakwu. Umu nugasoo nanumu mu Jew numu sakwa sumuna e batsapu. Mu gi Jew numu punnoꞌo. Tooe hanoꞌyoona tooe uga sumuna nu nabatsapu mana tubewabe-kwitoo, tooetoo mana baa-koobatoo tuwazoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. Umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu punnoꞌo e wohoꞌne.
47011027	Nu ewasoo gi uwedu ka ewa hemma howyugweduna. Nu tsuayaena unu budyaꞌe ka ewasoo gi tukapu-gana. Ewasoo nu tooꞌe sudyaꞌeyakwe ka gi ewow nagaꞌapu-gana.
47011028	Pana nu yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu manatu tooe mooe soohaneyakwe.
47011029	Nu umu gisoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwitu soohane. Umu tumaꞌemukwadu-kwitu tuwazoo nu soohane.
47011030	Ka nanaꞌunnena nu sakwa nanaꞌunne ka gi natzooena.
47011031	Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka gi e esayaꞌedu. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Naa, tamme sakwa ooosapa meeoo unneyi, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
47011032	Nu ka Damascus-wiꞌyoona soo numu
47011033	Pana soo Te Naa e magwetzoi, nu ka tupe koodea-wiꞌyoona kawona-kwikoo natzakweku, oꞌno namatzatzeboa.
47012001	Oosoo gi hemma tummatzaꞌe soo numu nanaꞌunnena, pana nu mu tuukwenokwu e tuusobedya-witu, e nosepu-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe-makoo.
47012002	Ewasoo tomogapu e nosepu nu toogoopatoo nabika Te Naa-matoo.
47012003	Sumunaga e moogooa suuꞌmu mea, howga nagutza e tookoo punnoꞌo, nu gi oo sopedakwatoo, Te Naa suuꞌmu.
47012004	Onona nu nanabesow hemma poonne gi hownnekoo oo waha-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa meeoo nuka netamma.
47012005	Nu ewa hemma mesoo wahapana, nu sakwa gi oo-ma nanaꞌunnepana. Nu sakwa ka nugasoo gi natzooena waha.
47012006	Tooe nu nuusoo nawitu mu tuukwese, nu gi mu nemooaga, nu ka kaaheno nawitu wahana. Nu gi hemma e nose-witu mu tuukwe, nu ka gisoo nanaꞌunnena.
47012007	Nu hemma nagea nuka matzamakwudu tonobe numu tookoo wuma-kwaꞌne. Soo Sutaꞌyoo oo e matabue. Oꞌno nu hee mee nasooyugwe, tooe nu besa nosepu-gase sapa.
47012008	Pahe tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhiyakwe oo tooꞌe nematzagakwunina.
47012009	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo e netammayakwe, “U ka tuꞌoebuna nasootuhipu, oꞌno u gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwedu.” Nu oo besaꞌyookute ka nuka u tuoeba-makapu, oꞌno nu gi paba nasooyugwe. Nu sakwa unusoo nanaꞌunne ka gi e natzooe-ma, oꞌno soo Te Naa pooha unusoo nu-nagaꞌyookwu.
47012010	Ooonneꞌyoona nu besa soonamme, tooe mu numu e tumooꞌoopana. Nu besa soonamme, tooe ka mu numu nuka nesootzemapana, nu ka nuusoo sopedakwadoo o soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu gi e matusookwunaꞌe.
47012011	Uune! Nasootzamedu-waꞌne, nu tabuꞌa ka nawitu wahana. Mu sakwa mu numu tuukwe nu togesapa Te Naa nayadooawabe.
47012012	Nu mu tzapoonnekute nu togesapa Te Naa nayadooawabe, nu ka nanasookwugi tumadise, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Tooe hee sutaꞌyoo nu-tamme kemmapu nu ooosapa gi nanasookwugi.
47012013	Mu punnoꞌo nasootuhi ka mu susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne besa nasootuhi pana mumme nu gi oe tunnekwaꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoopana mu ka sumuna ne nesagwaꞌekute ka oo ne manakwe, mu suda ne matuku.
47012014	Pudusoo nu mu-baa petugakwu. Numme mooasoo waha mu-baa nobengeyakwe, e-no yise pahe manekwu ka mu-baa ne nobengekwuna. Pana numme gi mu tunnekwaꞌe. Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meakwuna suuꞌmu soogwaꞌepunne. Mu dooake puu gi ka tu naanapuaꞌamu tummatzi pana mu naanapuaꞌamu tu dooamu ooosapa tummatzi. Mu puu nuga dooamu-waꞌnesoo nuumma.
47012015	Nu besa soonammena tooe hownnekoo tooe mu tummatzinoꞌo, oꞌno mu namagwetzoikwu. Meeoo nuumma, nu nanaꞌunusoo mu soobedyakena pana mu gi e petsabedu-kwaꞌne manakwe. Mu sakwa unusoo e soobedyana besa.
47012016	Mu meeoo e sooyugwe, “Tooꞌe soo Paul gi ne natumanakakuna natuungupana oosoo ne watze wumooaga.” Pana gi!
47012017	Mu ne tutayayina punnoꞌo gi ne natumanakaku tuungu.
47012018	Soo Titus ka sumuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu punoꞌyoodu-no puu gi ne natumunagaku tuungu. Umu nu-kwaꞌnesoo gi hemma natuungu.
47012019	Nu gi mu-kobenaꞌyoona numme-koobatoosoo yadooana meeoo unakwe. Numme meeoo mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa ka oo sopedakwatoona numme kaahenoꞌyoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi numme meeoo mu tuukwe. Numme mu tummatzina meeoo unakwe, oꞌno yise mu nanatummatzina ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meakwu.
47012020	Ka mu-baa e petugase mu sumuna gisoo besa manepunnekwu. Mu sumuna nanano togesoo nanahaꞌa, nanakwohonena, nanasutakuna, mu suuꞌmu mee nasooyugwena, nananewohonena, nananesootzemana, sumuna gi nananoꞌyoona.
47012021	Sumuna mu-matu togesoo gisoo nanekwaha ka nanasuda manekese sapa. Nu gi oo mu manekwuna petzape. Nu sumuna suda mu-ma nuummakwu ka mu ooonnekoo.
47013001	Nu saaꞌa mu tunetammakudooa. Mooasoo nu mu tuukwepu ka nakwi mu-baaꞌyoona, mu sakwa yise gi suda manepana. Ka penakwa mu-baa petugase, nu mu nemadabuekwu a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo, “Ka waahoo numu suda tumatuguna poonnedusoo nawaꞌnesoo mu unnesesoo nu mu nemadabuekwu,” mee nu mu tooꞌe tuukwe.
47013003	Menoꞌo yise nu ookowsoo mu tuukwekwusoo, nu mu-naga-kwitu nesagwikukwu mu tumaꞌemukwadu, oꞌno mu e sopedakwadoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-toohakwi yadooana mee unakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu pooha-gaꞌyoo gi namatzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
47013004	Oosoo gi natzooedu-kwaꞌne nanasoobedya nabatsase, pana soo Te Naa Pooha yise ka oo yaꞌese oo mayodake. Numme punnoꞌo gi how mane-waꞌne tabuꞌa, oo-waꞌnesoo. Numme ka mu-baa petugase, numme ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo, ka Te Naa-tamme mu neyugwekwu.
47013005	Mu nuga manena nesootzemadyakwe, mu sakwa mummesoo manena soomayumo. Howꞌoo haaꞌa mu togesapa Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu? Mu sakwa muusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sopedakwatoo, sumuna too mu gi.
47013006	Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tuukwepu ooonneꞌyoona mu ne sopedakwadoo petugakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nayadooawabena.
47013007	Numme ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhiku mu gi suda tumatugupana, numme ka besa mu manekwuna petzape tooe hayoo mumme mu netamma sapa.
47013008	Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meanona petzape.
47013009	Oꞌno numme besa sokwamakwu ka besa mu tumatuguna, besa Te Naa mu oedyukute. Numme ka Te Naa besa podo mu meakwunasoo petzape tooe mu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoo mee numme mu soobedya sapa. Numme mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa besasoo.
47013010	Nu menoꞌo mu-matoo tuboꞌo, oꞌno nu saaꞌa ka mu-baa petugase nu gi unu mu nesagwikukwu. Soo Te Naa Tu Pooha-matu-ma e sootuhi mumme e tummatzi tuunguna.
47013011	E nanumu, mu sakwa besa sokwamana, mu sakwa e nakabetsease ka Te Naa besa po-witoosoo kodyu. Mu sakwa mu sokwamana sumusoo mayugwese, oꞌno soo Te Naa mu-noꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa ka te matabuepuna, ooonneꞌyoona te soobedya.
47013012	Mu ka nanapuaꞌamudoosesoo, oꞌno mu nananoꞌyookwu.
47013013	Noꞌyoona mu yaatuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa mu nemaya.
47013014	Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu sootuhina soo Te Naa besa nanasoobedya mu matabuena mu noꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi sumusoo manepunne.
48001001	Nu Paul mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-baatu-no tuboꞌo ka teepu, Galatia mee naneadu-koobatu noꞌoko tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sakwa mu sootuhi, ka numme mu nanesootuhikute. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meeoo tunetamma soo Te Pabeꞌe ka suda te tumatuguduna te nemawunise te magwetzoikwu yaa eka teepu-koobatu. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo miyoda. Soo Te Naa ka ꞌyoo manese sakwa ooosapa nanesookwugi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa meeoo nanatuukwe. “Soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Umu, Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe, meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko meeoo mu numu tuukwe.” Gi sukwe numu, meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuungu.
48001006	Soo Te Naa mu tuukwe ka besa tu unnena ka mu sootuhina ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsa-koobatoo, gi ka hemma how mu yugwe-koobatoo. Mu yise ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukute. Nu gi besa soonamme ka menoꞌo mu ka atasoo naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa naꞌunnedu mee mu oo nemadabuena.
48001007	Pana ooosoo gi besa naꞌunnedu, mu numu mu nemooaga, umuoo ka Te Naa besa unnena atasoo naneyugwena, mu yise yabesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute.
48001008	Mooasoo numme mu tuukwe ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu numu ka atasoo mu tuukwena soo gi besa mu tumatuguna saaꞌa umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Ka tooe haga tooe numu, numme, tooetoo mu toha kakasa-gakoo, ka atasoo naꞌunnedu mu tuukwe soo Te Naa sakwa gi mu sootuhipana. Ookowsoo nu menoꞌo mu tuukwe. Soo Te Naa gi ooosapa mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka mu numu atasoo naꞌunnedu mumme tuukweꞌe, mu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
48001010	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo, “Soo Paul sukwe numu unnena mu tuukweꞌe besa numu sukwe nesokwamakuna.” Nu mu tuukwekwu, nu gi sukwe numu nakabetseꞌa, nu Te Naa suuꞌmu nakabetseꞌa.
48001011	Nu gi sukwe numu unnepu mu tuukweꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48001012	Gi haga e tunedyooe ka Te Naa unnepu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus pooha ookow e tunedyooepu.
48001013	Mu mooasoo ka oꞌnosoo e sopedakwadoo. Nu ka mu Jew numu tumayohopu nagedu, mu Jew numu nu-noꞌosoo tomopu ooonakwa, nu unu tumayoho. Nu ka mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusedyana, kadooꞌoo mu tooꞌe mayugwena.
48001015	Oꞌno nu gisoo oo sopedakwatoona nu ka gisoo nadooaꞌadoona soo Te Naa e tuutzeapu oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu mee e soopedyana, oosoo ka e sootuhikwuse. Oosoo yise e sootuhi.
48001016	Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa oetu soohanese ka e tzapoonnekute ka Jesus Te Pabeꞌe. Oosoo e pooha sootuhise, nu ka mu gi Jew numu ka besa oo unnepu tuukwe.
48001017	Oosoo ooka e wahakwuna e poohasootuhi nu yise gi Jerusalem-witoo meꞌa umu mooasoo numu moohedu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi hemmasoo e tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Nu kwingaꞌa mea mu numu-baaꞌyoona ka Arabia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo. Onoꞌyoona soo Te Naa pooha ka oo unnepu e tunedyooꞌe. Oꞌno yise ka saaꞌa nu kodyuka ka Damascus mee naneadu-kwitoo.
48001018	Pahe tomose, nu ka Peter nobeꞌnge, nu ka oo sootapoegeana. Waha nasateba-wi nu oo-baa nobeꞌnge.
48001019	O nu ka Te Pabeꞌe wanngaꞌa tapoegea James mee naneadu. Ewow ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu-nagatu, nu gi tapoegeꞌa.
48001020	Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo nu togesapa mu tuukweꞌe. Umuoo gi e tunedyooꞌe mumme e tuukwekwuna.
48001021	Oꞌno yise mu Syria noko Cilicia mee naneadu teepu-koobatoo nu mea.
48001022	Mu Jew numu Judea-witu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi e sopedakwatoo.
48001023	Umu nu-kwitu sukwe nakadu, “Soo Paul te netumooꞌoodu kadoo te tooꞌe mayugwese, menoꞌo yise mu numu tunakaꞌoedyuku tuungu.”
48001024	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa nesootuhikwu, ka Paul atasoo manese.
48002001	Sumumano watsu matsebuekudu (14) tomokapu soo Te Naa Jerusalem-witoo umu-matoo e taꞌyase. Pana umu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu mee naneyugwedu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa watse tzoonooase, umu-nagakwi manepunne. Umu oo sopedakwatoo numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mesoo wunaꞌme numme ka gi mu Jew numu tumayohokuna nagena oo-ma namagwetzoina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwu. Umu ka pumme tumayoho-kwitoo ne soonoyugwena, umu gi te sukwe manaꞌwena petzape. Nu Paul, Barnabas, Titus-no Jerusalem-wi petugonnoga ka saaꞌa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooheduno watse tunehane. “Nu ooosapa mu tuukweꞌe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka umu gi Jew numu-nagatu umu sakwa gi Jew numu manepana, ka mu tumayohona gi nagepana. Sumuna menoꞌo mu papabeꞌe e unnena sooꞌoedyukute,” mee nu soonamme. Pana gi! Soo Titus puu gi Jew nana umu gi haꞌyoo oo netamma.
48002005	Numme gi mu numu nemooagadu nakabetsea. Numme ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe.
48002006	Ka mu numu, “Numme moohedu,” mee naneyugwedu, nu gi mu tubetse sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu mu numu manena sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa gi mu manena watzekute.
48002007	Umu puu gi hemma nuka tunedyooe. Umu ka Peter noko e sopedakwatoo numme nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
48002008	Soo Te Naa tu pooha-matu-ma ka Peter sootuhipu mu Jew oo tunedyooe tuunguna, nuka tuwazoo sootuhipu ka mu gi Jew numu e tunedyooe tuunguna.
48002009	Umu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu James, Peter, John mee netamma mu oo nakasopedakwatoo ka ooonnekoo Te Naa numme Barnabas-noko pooha sootuhipu. Numme nanamitzadyaꞌme ka nanapuaꞌana numme noꞌyoona meeoo unakwe umu paheꞌyoo James, Peter, John-no sakwa mu Jew numu tunedyooe, numme punnoꞌo mu gi Jew numu tunedyooekwu.
48002010	Mee umu ne netamma, “Tamme sakwa noꞌoko mu nananesootuhidu-no mu tutuha manedu numu tummatzi.” Nu tubetse unu oo e manekwuna soogwaꞌe. Oꞌno numme yise Barnabas, Titus-no punowsoo Antioch-witoo kodyukakwu.
48002011	Ka saaꞌa soo Peter Antioch-wi petuga. Noꞌyoona numme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu Jew-nagatu yise mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo nanano tukayakwe. Soo James huuhoo Jew nanana numme-matoo taya. Umu ka petuse, gi ka mu gi Jew numu-no netuka, umu ka gi mu Jew numu tumayohope mayohona. Soo Peter yise nasookwise gi umu gi Jew numu-no tuka mani. Mu otuoo mu Jew numu, Barnabas tooe punnoꞌo gi umu-no tuka mani. Nu yise ka Peter nesagwikute oosoo ka suda tumatuguna.
48002014	Soo Peter gi ka Te Naa kaaheno tumayohokute. Oosoo ka Te Naa togesapa unnena gi nakaheesoobedya. Nu noꞌoko numu nakana ka Peter meeoo netamma, “U mow Jew nana. Menoꞌo maneka u uusoo gi mu Jew tumayohokute. U yise menoꞌo mu gi Jew numu ka Jew tumayohope nage tuungu. U tubetse unu maꞌemukwa.”
48002015	Numme Jew numu ka gi Jew numu tumaꞌemukwadu mee neꞌa umu ka gi te tumayohona nagena. Numme ooosapa Jew numu.
48002016	Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ne sootuhise, numme oo dooamu mane, numme oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi gi numme ka mu Jew tumayohona nakabetseana. Soo Te Naa numu sootuhi gi ka mu Jew tumayohope-koobatoosoo suuꞌmu.
48002017	Umu numu nemooagadu meeoo te netamma, “Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu oedyukute oosoo mu magwetzoi pana mu gi mu Jew tumayohope nakabetsea. Mu yise suda tumaduku.” Pana gi! Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi suda te mane tuungu.
48002018	Nu mu numu meeoo netammagena, “Gi ka mu Jew tumayohona oedyukupana.” Nu sakwa ka oꞌnosoo ka Jew tumayohope-witoosoo kodyuse, oꞌno yise nu uga unu tumaꞌemukwakwu.
48002019	Soo mu Jew tumayohope meeoo e netamma nu sakwa yaꞌe ka suda tumaꞌemukwana. Nu sakwa uga nabatsa gisoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsa. Pana nu yise namagwetzoaꞌe. Menoꞌo nu gi ka te nanamooatupu tumayohope nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nu nakabetseakwu. Nu namagwetzoaꞌe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa-wi nu tunakaꞌoedyukuna pana ne nanamooatupu tumayohope gi e magwetzoaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsapu, oosoo e tunemadabuekute. Oosoo e soobedyana nu-koobatoo nabatsapu.
48002021	Nu sakwa uga ka besaꞌyoona ka mu Jew numu tumayohona nakabetseana soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa gi nu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Pana oosoo gi oo manepunne. Nu oo sopedakwatoona nu ka Te Pabeꞌe soogwaꞌe nu-koobatoo nabatsakwudu.
48003001	Mu numu Galatia-witu, gi toge tusoohane. Mu ka sumuna napoohapu-gana mu gi kaaheno besa tusooyugwe. Mu uga toge-kwitu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana sopedakwatoona. Pana menoꞌo mu gi.
48003002	Ewetuoo soohane. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa mumme tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhise ka pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute, gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mu nakabetsea.
48003003	Menoꞌo yise mu gi toge tusoohane. Mooasoo uga mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhipu. Menoꞌo yise mu muusoo besa tooꞌe tumatugu, gi ka Te Naa Pooha soomayuna.
48003004	Mu ka sumuna oo soomuꞌwa noꞌoko mu manaꞌwena ka tutuha manena ka besow mu mayupu.
48003005	Mu ka sumuna gi oo natunedyooꞌe tooe how tooe suda manaꞌwepana. Soo Te Naa nanasookwugi mu pooha sootuhi ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope mu nage-kwitoo.
48003006	Mu Jew numu numu nemooagadu meeoo, “Tamme Te Naa doodooamu togesapa tamme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona tsuagetu. Numme ookow Te Naa tunetammakuna nagedu.” Ooonneꞌyoopana umu gi. Oꞌnosoo ka Abraham-witu meeoo natubotugupu, “Soo Te Naa meeoo, ‘Abraham besaꞌyoo,’ soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
48003007	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise ka Abraham-nakwana tubetse tsuagetu. Umu oo-waꞌnesoo ka Te Naa-witu nakaꞌoedyukute. Ookow soo Te Naa te tunetammakute.
48003008	Meeoo tuwazoo ka oꞌnosoo naboꞌo soo Te Naa ka Abraham besa netamma, “Saaꞌa nu noꞌobatusoo numu sootuhikwu umu ka u-kwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute tuwazoo.”
48003009	Umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Abraham-waꞌneꞌyoosoo, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umuoo ooonnekoo soo Te Naa besa sootuhaꞌe.
48003010	Umu Jew numu tumayohona nagedu gi nasootuhikwu. Oꞌnosoo meeoo nabotugu, “Soo Te Naa gi mu numu sootuhikwu umu ka gi ka a nabotuguna mayohona.”
48003011	Mu numu ka tumayohope nagedu soo Te Naa gi sootuhikwu umu ka noꞌoko gi mayoho-waꞌneꞌyoona, ka mu ewow. Pana umu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nasootuhikwu. Esoo oꞌnosoo Te Naa tunemadabuena a nabotuguna mu numu namagwetzoikwu, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
48003013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe nanasootuhi namadabuepunne tamme-koobatoo oosoo ka puu gi nasootuhipuna. Oo oosoo nabotugu, “Soo numu puu ka sunngabe-ma natzakwenese, ka yaꞌese gi nasootuhikwu.”
48003014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo numu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Menoꞌo yise noꞌobatusoo nasootuhikwu ka Abraham nasootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhikwu, tamme tu netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
48003015	E nanumu, soo numu ka nanano tunemadabuese, oo botuguse, gi haga umu-matu ka a naꞌunnena atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa unnepu ooonneꞌyoo, soo Te Naa gi atasoo oo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48003016	Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu oo sootuhikwu sumuoo u-maꞌyoona suagetu gi noꞌoko.” Mee naꞌunakwe, “Sumuꞌyoosoo u-maꞌyoo tsuagetu.” Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu wahakwu. Mooasoo soo Te Naa ka tu unnena tugukepu.
48003017	Ewasoo (430) tomokapu mu Jew numu ka tumayohope, natuukwepuna. Umuoo tumayohope ka Te Naa unnena ka Abraham-tamme gi atasoo naneyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48003018	Mu numu nemooagadu meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa meeoo mu numu Jew numu tumayohope nagedu suuꞌmu nasootuhikwu.” Pana gi! Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu.”
48003019	Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo ka Abraham netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu ka nuka mu nakaꞌoedyukute.” Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo suuꞌmu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope ka yadooawabe tunetammakupu, oosoo yadooawabe yise ka mu numu ooka tu tunetammakupu mu nage tuungu. Soo Jew tumayohope gi ka Te Naa unnepu netumooꞌoo. Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petu, soo Te Naa mu Jew tumayohopu-too numu mabetsea. Umu-makoo oosoo te mooe tunedyooꞌe. Soo umuoo tumatugu-toohakwi gi numu namagwetzoidu. Mu numu ooosapa suda tumatugutu yaa teepu-koobatu a nabotugu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo mu Jew tumayohope gi numu besa mayugwedu. Soo numu besa namayugwekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuna.
48003025	Mooasoo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe namanumudoopu tamme ooweoo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Gi tamme ka te tumayohope soogwaꞌe.
48003026	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu ka baa-wi namatzakase Te Naa doodooamu mane. Oꞌno yise mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
48003028	Tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Naa-nakwana nanakwaꞌneꞌyoo: Mu Jew numu ka mu gi Jew numu, mu unu hemma howyugwedu umu gi hemma howyugwedu noꞌokosoo, mu nanana mu momokoꞌne-no, noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna nanawaꞌneꞌyoo.
48003029	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe wangaꞌana tamme ka Abraham-maꞌyoona tubetse tsuagetu. Soo Te Naa yise noꞌoko te sootuhikwu ka Abraham sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.
48004001	Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petu numme ka mu Jew numu tumayohona nakabetseadu, tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne, oosoo puu ka hemma pumme mabetseadu nakabetsea. Soo numu puu ka yaꞌese, ka tu tooa togesoo tuhaꞌakoo, soo oo tooaꞌa ka tu naa hemma, oo tumawugana heedooꞌa,
48004002	pana togesoo oosoo ka pumme mabetseadu nakabetseꞌa, ka saaꞌa puusoo namabetsea mane. Oo naa meeoo tunetamma ka oo tomona oe manepetuse.
48004003	Ka oꞌnosoo tamme ookow tuhaꞌa-kwaꞌne tamme ka numu tumayohope-too meaꞌa.
48004004	Ka hemma toge-kwi mani petuse, soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ka eka teepu-koobatoo manumudoose, oosoo yise Jew numu mane ka tu nanumu tumayohona oo nage tuungu.
48004005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme Jew numu tumayohodu magwetzoise tamme yise Te Naa doodooamu mayugwe, tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuse.
48004006	Tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna oosoo ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi. Menoꞌo yise tamme Te Naa mee oo natubanga.
48004007	Te tumayohope uga te tsitugu menoꞌo yise tamme ookow gi tumayohope-gaꞌyoo. Tamme yise Te Naa tunetammatoo manemokwu oosoo yise te doodooamu-gakwu noꞌoko te sootuhikwu.
48004008	Mu uga gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo. Mu nanesootuhiyakwe tooe hemmatoo tooe mu yise oo nakabetseaꞌa, gi ka Te Naa-matoo.
48004009	Menoꞌo yise mu Te Naa sopedakwatoo. Soo Te Naa mooasoo mu sopedakwatoo. Gi yise ka yaa teepu-koobatu poohabe nakabetseapana. Umuoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48004010	Mu uga tooe how tooe manakwe pana menoꞌo mu ka tooe how tooe mu manena tabeba-gakute mu Jew numu-waꞌnesoo.
48004011	Mu ka sumuna gi a nakasopedakwadoo ka nuga unnena, mu ka gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna.
48004012	Nu ka mu-baaꞌyoona nu mu-kwaꞌnesoo manepetu nu punnoꞌo gi Jew tumayohope mayoho. Menoꞌo yise mu punnoꞌo sakwa nu-kwaꞌnesoo mane, gi Jew tumayohope mayohopana. Mu ooosapa besa e matugudu.
48004013	Mu oo sopedakwatoo nu ka mu-baa petuse, mu tunedyooꞌe tuoeyipana.
48004014	Mu gi e matusookwunaꞌe ka e tuoeyaꞌe, tooe mumme e nematzama sapa. Mu besa e matugu, ka toha kasa-gakoo tooetoo ka Te Pabeꞌe mu matugu-kwaꞌne.
48004015	Ka nu-toogoo tubetse besaꞌyoona mu uga ka mu pooe mesoo tzayubowse yise e mesoo hemeookwu. Menoꞌo yise mu atasoo nuummatugu.
48004016	Nu ka kaahenotu mu tooꞌe tunedyooe mu yise ooweoo e sookwohoꞌne.
48004017	Mu numu nemooagadu besa mu matugu, pana umu te tapoka, ka mu soohee-gana. Umu numme mu nagena gi petzape, oꞌno yise umuoo nagekoo mee sokwamana.
48004018	Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka numu besa mumme matugu, pana umu sakwa ooosapa besa mu tumatuguku, gi nuka onoko suuꞌmu.
48004019	E nanumu, nu suda mu soonammekuna, gi besa nuumma, mu ka gi besa manena. Nu mu suuꞌmu soomayu nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mu tooꞌe soomawunise.
48004021	Mu ka oo soonakabetseana, ka mu Jew numu tumayohona ka Moses tubotuguna, mu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo.
48004022	Ka Abraham, waahoo nodukwa-ga-kwitu wahadu. Sarah noko oo tummatziwabe Hagar mee nananeadu.
48004023	Soo Sarah naatse tooaꞌadoona mooasoo natuukwepu soo Te Naa tu pooha-toohakwi meeoo oo netammana naatse tooaꞌagakwu soo Sarah yise oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Hagar yise punnoꞌo tooaꞌatoo mogoꞌne tooaꞌadoo tabua-kwaꞌnesoo.
48004024	Esoo nanatuukwepu te tuukwe ka menoꞌo hemma manepunnena. Soo numu tummatzidu mogoꞌne ka giba Sinai mee naneadu-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo.
48004025	Ooweꞌyoona soo Jew numu tumayohope mooe nawaha. Mu Jew numu pummesoo tumayohope nakabetseadu ka numu tummatzidu mogoꞌne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo numu nedyaweda, ooosapa pummesoo tumayohope nakabetseana. Soo Sarah puusoo mane-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa oo sootuhi ka pumme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe.
48004026	Mu Jew numu meeoo sokwama, “Soo Jerusalem besaꞌyoo, besa pukwi nanobe-gaꞌyoo.” Tamme nobe ka Te Naa-baa, o yise tubetse Jerusalem. Mu Jew numu uga ewatseꞌyoo, tamme yise Te Naa doodooamu ewasoo manemena,
48004027	tamme-witu a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. “Umu Te Naa doodooamu sakwa ooosapa besa sokwamana ka Te Naa ooosapa nesookwugino. Oꞌnosoo umu gi ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa tu doodooamu mu mayugwemena. Soo Te Naa umuoo tu doodooamu ka mu Jew numu Jerusalem-wi nonobe-gakoo ooonakwa unusoo sootuhi.” Ekow mogoꞌne doodooamu-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme.
48004028	E nanumu tamme Te Naa doodooamu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa Abraham netamma-kwaꞌne.
48004029	Esoo nanatugwengape umuoo waahoo nanaꞌatse-witu. Esoo naatse numu-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoo tabuadu ka naatse Te Naa Pooha-wi nadooaꞌadoodu nekuseka. Menoꞌo esoo ooonneꞌyoo, mu Jew numu tamme Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kusegeayakwe.
48004030	Soo Te Naa meeoo tubotugupu, “Soo tuhaꞌyoo ka puusoo manekakoo mogoꞌne-matoo kemmana, punnoꞌo besa nasootuhi. Soo numu tummatziwabe tu tooa nosoo gi nasootuhikwu umu sukwe natayakwunikwu.”
48004031	E nanumu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka puusoo manekakoo mogoꞌne tooa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48005001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe te natzamaꞌwuna tamme numu too sookwaꞌe, oosoo ka te sukwe maꞌnaꞌwena petsabena. Gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseapana, tooe ka pumme tumayohope mumme mu nakabetsea tuungu sapa.
48005002	Nu, Paul, yise meeoo mu tubetse netamma, mu gi Jew numu manepana. Mu ka Jew numu manese, mu tookwa gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi nasootuhaꞌe.
48005003	Mu ka oo manena, mu noꞌoko ka Jew numu tumayohope mayohokwu.
48005004	Mu ka tumayohope nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa yise gi mu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48005005	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa saaꞌa besa te mayugwenokwu.
48005006	Tamme yise ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus doodooamu manese, soo numu Jew numu manina, gi hee. Tamme yise Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna suuꞌmu nasootuhikwu, yise nanasoobedyakwu.
48005007	Mu ugasoo besa ka Te Naa podo meadape, mu numu nemoꞌagadu mooasoo mu tzadyooiku ka kaaheno naꞌunnedu mu nakabetseꞌa.
48005008	Soo Te Naa e doodooamu mee mu natubangakwuse mu netutzea, gi ka hemma nakaꞌemukwapana, mee mu netammana.
48005009	Pana huuꞌyoo mu-nagatu mu nemooagakwu ewow mu-nagatu suda neeyugwekwu.
48005010	Nu oo sopedakwadoo soo Te Naa ekow mu nakasopedakwadookwuna mu sootuhikwu. Mu yise nu-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwekwu. Soo sutaꞌyoo kodyukakwu umu numu nemooagadu-matoo.
48005011	Umu numu nemooagadu nu-kwitu naꞌesagoena, nu ka mu Jew numu tumayoho tuungu mee nanaꞌesagoeꞌe nu mu numu mee tuukwena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa,” ooonneꞌyoona mu Jew numu ooosapa unu e nekuseka.
48005012	Ka mu Jew numu nemooagadu gi nakaꞌoedyukupana umu sakwa mu tsasoopedya.
48005013	E nanumu, soo Te Naa mu netutzea gi ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseapana, gi yise too ka suda tu namanena nakabetseapana tuwow. Sumuꞌyoosoo naꞌunnedu noꞌoko ka Te Naa tumayohona waha mee naꞌunnedu, “Tamme ka tammesoo besa nanasoobedyana tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa soobedya.” Mu sakwa Te Naa tumayohope nanatummatzina ka muusoo besa nanasoobedyana.
48005015	Mu ka ooosapa muusoo nanahana, mu sumuna muusoo kadoo nananemayugwekwu.
48005016	Mu sakwa ooosapa Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu gi suda manekwu, numu sukwe tusoomayu-waꞌne.
48005017	Soo numu soonammena, suda tusooyukwe pana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu numu besa mane tuungu. Numu soonammena ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-no naꞌataꞌyoosoo.
48005018	Mu sakwa yise noꞌoko ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tunetammana nakabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu tooe gi ka Jew numu tumayohope nagepana gi hownneꞌyoo.
48005019	Soo numu tooe how tooe nanasuda manakwe: nanamaꞌemukwana, numu poohana, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, nidyupuna, yabesoo sutana, hee-koobatoo nanakwohonena, numu nasutaꞌana, noꞌoko numu sutakuna, nanahana,
48005021	nananenaboaꞌana, baagoena, tooe how tooe manena yise nanasuda tumatuguna. Mooasoo nu meeoo mu tuukweꞌe, “Soo suda tumatuguduna gi Te Naa doodooamu mane-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
48005022	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu-naga manese nanabesa numu manetuungu, besa nanasobedyana, besa sokwamana, nanapuaꞌana, gi nanahapana,
48005023	numu tummatzina, gi yabe sutana, besa tumatuguna, numu besa matuguna, gi esayaꞌena, yise puusoo besa namabetseana. Tamme ka yoo manena tamme ka Te Naa tamme netammana nakabetsea.
48005024	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manise gi suda tumatugunokwu.
48005025	Tamme ekow sutakoo po maꞌwuke. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunetammakute.
48005026	Tamme sakwa gi tamme soo nananasootzaꞌmeku, gi numu nasoodyagepana, gi paba nasooyugwepana, tamme sakwa tunakabetsea.
48006001	E nanumu, ka mu-nagatu uga tunakaꞌoedyukudu maꞌemukwakese mu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseadu-nagadu sakwa oo tummatzi, oꞌno saaꞌa oo soo besasoo manekadooa. Gi haꞌyoo oo sooyugwepana. Muusoo saaꞌa punnoꞌo besa nanemabetseano oꞌno mu besa nanesootuhinokwu.
48006002	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme oo tunetammakupu besa nagenona, oꞌno tamme besa nananemabetseanokwu.
48006003	Soo numu meeoo nasooyugwedu, “Nu nagutza besaꞌyoo numu e tummatzi-too,” oosoo puusoo nanemooaga.
48006004	Tamme sakwa ka besa te tumatuguna sopedakwadoona, gi sakwa tamme numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana,
48006005	tamme ka noꞌyoona suda tumatuguna.
48006006	Tamme ka tamme tunedyooedu sakwa tumanagaku, ka besa tamme oo tunedyooꞌe.
48006007	Gi muusoo nanemooagapana, mu puu gi ka Te Naa nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme puu ka tooe hemma tooe masuase, saaꞌa tamme ooonnekoo soo yasakwu.
48006008	U ooosoo manepunne. Tamme ka suda manena, ka saaꞌa soo suta te tumatuguna tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu. Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseana, saaꞌa soo Te Naa ooosapa te sootuhina, te magwetzoinokwu.
48006009	Tamme sakwa gi oo sookwumehoepana ka besaꞌhoo, ooosapa oo nageno, gi oo maꞌwu, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besaꞌyoo tamme-tammesoo kodyudooa.
48006010	Menoꞌo yise tamme Te Pabeꞌe nananesootuhidu sakwa besa nanamatuguna noꞌoko mu numu ooosoo matugu.
48006011	Esoo nakwi nabodu, nugasoo tuboona. A poonne haaꞌno pabatseꞌe nu tuboꞌo.
48006012	Mu numu Jew mu mane tuungudu, mu sukwe tumayohokuna, oꞌno mu numu gi mu nekwohoꞌnekwu mee umu sokwamana.
48006013	Tooe umu puusoo Jew numu pana, umu punnoꞌo puusoo gi ka Jew numu tumayohope nakabetseꞌa. Mu-ma umu sukwe nanaꞌunnena mu mu nakabetsease, Jew manekwu, mee unnena.
48006014	Nu sakwa puu gi nuusoo nama nanaꞌunne. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-ma nanaꞌunakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu nu-koobatoo nabatsa. Menoꞌo yise nu gi ka sutakoo ka teepu-koobatoo nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
48006015	Soo numu ka Jew-na gi hee. Soo numu yise ka gi Jew-na oosoo punnoꞌo gi hee. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo soo Te Naa ka te pudu manumudookwuse.
48006016	Umu egea nakaꞌoedyukudu, nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikute, “Mu sootuhi,” mee unnena. Umu tunakabetseadu tubetse Jew numu Te Naa tunetutzeana.
48006017	E tookoo unu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetummana numu e tunedyooꞌe, oowetu umu e kusedyana. Tooe haga tooe sakwa gi e nematzamapana, mooasoo nu togekoo tutzagaꞌyoo.
48006018	E nanumu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa ooosapa besa mu sootuhi,” mee nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe. Esoo sakwa ooosapa togesapa.
49001001	Ka Paul-makoo mumme Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo nabopu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe nuka netutzea ka besa tu unnepu mu numu e tuukwe tuunguna, ka Te Naa pumme meeoo netamma.
49001002	Nu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikute umuoo mu sootuhina mu magwetzoikwu.
49001003	Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-tuna oosoo noꞌoko hemma bebesow-ma te sootuhaꞌe.
49001004	Oꞌnosoo gisoo ka Te Naa ka teepu matabue oosoo te netutzease, mee tamme-witu netamma, “E Besaa Tooaꞌa saaꞌa Mu Pabeꞌe Jesus manedooa. Oosoo numu-koobatoo nabatsakwu. Nu saaꞌa gi mu tumaꞌemukwa-kwi mu neyugwedooa, soo E Tooaꞌa unu e soobedyana mu-koobatoo nabatsadooa. Nu saaꞌa yise mu tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwadooa. Nu mumme e dooamu e mayugwekwuna besa soobedya. Nu tubetse unu mu soobedyana besa mu sootuhikwu. Nu oꞌnosoo e tusoohanena gi mu numu tuukwe, pana menoꞌo nu ooka mu nakasopedakwadookwuna petzape, nu nobatu-ma mu sootuhikwu ka Nuga Besaa Tooa mu ꞌoedyukute. Umu saaꞌa ka nuꞌmatoo e nanesootuhina mee unnedooa, ‘Tubetse besaꞌyoo soo Te Naa tusooyugwena, soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu.’ “
