49001010	Soo Te Naa meeoo mooasoo tusoohanepa, ka teepu atasoo manikwuna oe manepetuse, oosoo noꞌoko hemma nanano tuunoyugwe mayugwekwu yaa ka teepu-kooba manipetuse noko ka teepu paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo soo Te Pabeꞌe yise noꞌoko hemma nemadabuepunnedooa.
49001011	Noꞌyoona soo Te Naa tusooyugwena ooosapa kaaheno manekena. Mooasoo soo Te Naa tunetutzeapu noꞌobatusoo numu tu dooamu tu mayugwegena ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
49001012	Soo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu e dooamu mu mayugwekwu. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu e tubetse besaꞌyoona sopedakwadookwu.” Mooeꞌugasoo numme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukute.
49001013	Mu saaꞌa ka ne tubetse unnepu nakase oꞌno, yise mu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukukwu soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwutu o. Oosoo yise tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhi, oo-ma mu kopokwu pummetusoo mu mayugwekwu tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo.
49001014	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhikwu, te tzapoonnekuna oosoo saaꞌa besa te magwetzoidooa yise tu besa dooamu te mayugwedooa. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu, ka Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoona sopedakwadookwu.
49001015	Nu meeoo tuwazoo unakwe soo Te Naa tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo nu nanabesa mu-kwitu nakapunne mu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna, noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedya.
49001016	Nu yise ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute, meeꞌe nu unneyakwe, “U, Ne Naa ka Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse Naa. U tubetse naduyadu. U ka mu numu otuoo besa sootuhiyakwe. Mu yise besa nasootuhiyakwe. Oꞌno umu besa u-kwitu nakasopedakwadookwu.
49001018	Umu u sooꞌoedyukukwu besa oo nakasopedakwadookwu, u, Ne Naa, numme netuseapu yise saaꞌa numme besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhidooa, numme u tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
49001019	Umu oo sopedakwadookwu u, Ne Naa, unu pooha-gana ne magwetzoikwu, numme ka u nakaꞌoedyukuna.
49001020	U, Ne Naa, ka u pooha-ma Ne Pabeꞌe mayoda ka oo nabatsa-kwikoo. U, Ne Naa, nabaatoo oo bise, nawaꞌnesoo oo matabue.”
49001021	Menoꞌo manakwana soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo poohabe mu numu-no ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi manepunne mayugwe.
49001022	Te Pabeꞌe yise ka noꞌokosoo poohabe putooha ka Te Naa neyugwese oosoo yise ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohekwu.
49001023	Soo Te Naa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no nawaꞌnesoo manepunne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma nanemamakwuna nanemadabuena oo-toogoo te moohe.
49002001	Ka oꞌnosoo umu gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo mu ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana.
49002002	Umu ka mu suda manedu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo yaa teepu-koobatu ooosapa gi togekoo, ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
49002003	Tamme ka sutakoo podo mea ka sutakoo tookwa nakabetseana, tamme ka sutakoo besa sooyugwena. Noꞌyoona tamme uga nanakwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, suta te tumatuguna yise tamme-matoosoo namakodyukukwu.
49002004	Tooe tamme uga gi ka Te Naa napuaꞌapana tamme ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana, soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Oosoo unu tutuha te soobedyana, te sootuhi. Tooe gi ooka te mapuꞌapunne sapa soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo te magwetzoaꞌe.
49002006	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe yaꞌese oo mayodase oo-no soo Te Naa saaꞌa nabatoo te bikwu, oꞌno tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuise, te mayodadooa, yise Te Naa-baatoo te bikakwu tamme yise oo-no hemma nemadunagakwu.
49002007	Ooosapa yise Te Pabeꞌe besa te sootuhinokwu ka putoohakwi te manese soo Te Naa tu tubetse besaꞌyoona te tzapoonnekukwu.
49002008	Tooe tamme gi ka tamme oo tunetammakuna noꞌoko mayohopana soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu. Oosoo te magwetzoikwu ka te tunakaꞌoedyukute.
49002009	Noꞌyoona tamme gi meeꞌe nanaꞌunne-waꞌneꞌyoo, “Numme nummesoo namagwetzoaꞌe ka besa tumatuguna.” Soo Te Naa puusoo tamme sootuhikwu.
49002010	Oꞌno oosoo gi te pudu manumudoose ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha te mayugwe. Ka Te Naa tamme tunemadabuekupu ka besow podo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no meanoꞌokwu.
49002011	Mu gi Jew numu-nagatu-matu sakwa oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu hownneꞌyoona. Mu Jew numu uga ooosapa mee mu-kwitu wahayakwe, “Umu gi Jew numu, gi. Numme Jew numu suuꞌmu nanetutzeapu,” meeꞌe umu. Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petu, mu uga wakwawaꞌa. Soo Te Naa gisoo meeoo mumme netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu,” mee. Mu uga Te Naa gi sopedakwatoo, gi hownnekoo mu bi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi pumme mu sopedakwadoo. Mu uga gi Te Pabeꞌe-tu, soo Te Naa yise mu sukwe tsasoopedya.
49002013	Mu uga Te Naa-kwingaꞌa pana soo Te Pabeꞌe mu-koobatoo nabatsase, menoꞌo yise mu Te Naa doodooamu manepetu.
49002014	Numme ka mu gi Jew numu naboꞌoꞌa, ka numme Jew tumayoho-too meana. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ne mooꞌa tumayohopu kadoo ne mayugweku. Oosoo ne nananenaboana kadoo mayugwekese, noꞌobatusoo numu sumusoo mayugweke, Jew numu yise mu gi Jew tuwazoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌo-koosoo hekoobaatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo yise tamme gi nanakwohonena, tamme nanapuaꞌakwu.
49002016	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase oosoo yise Te Naa pupuaꞌamu te mayugwe,
49002017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse noꞌoko te tuukwe soo Te Naa noꞌoko tu pupuaꞌamu te mayugwe.
49002018	Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oꞌno yise noꞌobatusoo numu ka tu Besa Pooha-ma sootuhi yise tamme noꞌyoona Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu.
49002019	Mu menoꞌo gi Jew numu gi wakwawaꞌa manese, mu numme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo Te Naa doodooamu tamme noꞌyoona nanano ka Te Naa-baa natzepotugu.
49002020	Menoꞌo tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa tubetse nanesootuhi nobe pumatoo namadabue-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka nobe-matu besaꞌyoo. Umu Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo yise mu punnoꞌo ka nobe-matuoosoo namadabuepunnedusoo. Oosoo noꞌoko nana-ma te totsagedukwu, sumuoosoo nanesootuhi nobe te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa tamme-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
49003001	Nu, Paul, nakwutuma ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo, nu ka mumme gi Jew numu nanesootuhibu tuneyooena.
49003002	Mu mooasoo e sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa e sootuhipu, ka Te Naa pudu tunetammapu mu-toogoo besaꞌhoo mumme e tunedyooe tuunguna.
49003003	Oꞌnosoo esoo naꞌunnepu gi haga oo nakadu ka gi numu natuukwe. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha umu oo yadooawabe tuukwe ka pudu naꞌunnepu. u tuwazoo oo pooha nosepu ekow naꞌunnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Menoꞌo yise mu oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, mu ka mu-matoo e tubona mesoo neana. Nu oo boꞌo ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwaꞌnesoo.
49003006	Menoꞌo soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu besa matugu namekoosoo mu Jew numu, mu gi Jew numu tuwazoo. Oosoo te sootuhaꞌe, tu dooamu te mayugwese noꞌoko sumu-kwaꞌnesoo te matabuedooa tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwiꞌyoona.
49003007	Soo Te Naa e sootuhipu tooe gi e maawaꞌnekoo sapa noꞌoko tu doodooamu-nagatu. Oosoo e pooha-maka ka besa tu unnepu mumme gi Jew numu e tunedyooe tuunguna. Nu noꞌoko numu ooka nakasopedakwadoo mayugwekena soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu sootuhaꞌe. Soo tamme oo sootuhina noꞌoko tooe hemma tooe numu tusooyugwena ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Nu ka besa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe gi mobekwakwukoo gwetzoibu mu tuukwe.
49003010	Soo te matabuepu noꞌoko numu e tuukwe tuungu. Te Manumudoopu uga mu numu gi oogow tuukwepu pana menoꞌo oosoo te tuukwe. Nagutza mooe ugasoo hemma-kobenasoo soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo tusooyugwepu oosoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo menoꞌo tzapoonnekukwu ka unu besa tamme-too tu tusooyugwena soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌokosoo sumusoo te mayugwekwu. Tamme mu tzapoonnekute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa mayugweke, tamme ooka nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu.
49003012	Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Naa mesoo nanetzakwiyaꞌena gi hemma-ma nasoosui ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasoonatzina.
49003013	Tooe nu mu-koobatoo nakwutumase sapa mu sakwa gi nasootookepana. Oꞌno mu mesoo natummatzikwu.
49003014	Ooonneꞌyoona nu yaa nanesootuhaꞌe ka Te Naa-matoo mee unnena.
49003015	“U Noꞌobatusoo Numu Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatu nokosoo ebe tamme-koobakwitu tooe.
49003016	U sakwa ne pewu-kwitu sootuhi U Besa Pooha-ma.
49003017	U Ne Pabeꞌe ooosapa numme-koobatu, umu sakwa ookow nakaꞌoedyuku. Oꞌno yise umu ooosapa nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedyakwu.
49003018	Numme yise noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no oo nakasopedakwadookwu ka noꞌoko numme unu besa u soobedya.
49003019	U tubetse unu ne soobedya. Numme gi hownnekoo oo nakasopedakwadoo petu ka numme besa u soobedyana. U tubetse unu besaꞌyoo. U sakwa besa ne mayugweke nawaꞌnesoo.
49003020	U tubetse unu besaꞌyoo. U, Ne Naa, u Besa Pooha-ma besa ne tuyugwekute ka ne nanesootuhi, tooetoo ne tusooyugwena ooonakwa besasoo.
49003021	Noꞌyoona numme u nakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwadoo u tubetse besaꞌyoo. Ooosapa yise noꞌyoona numme Ne Pabeꞌe-toohakwidu nanesootuhidu mee unnekwu, ‘Soo Te Naa unu besaꞌyoo,’ oosoo ka Tu Pooha-ma besa ne mayugwena.”
49004001	Yaahoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatziwabena, nu nakwutuma. Nu meeoo mu tubetse netamma, mu sakwa ka Te Naa mumme tunetammakuna nakabetsea ka nasootuhi manese ka mumme oo netutzease.
49004002	Oosoo ka besa nayadooadu te tuukweꞌepu tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi nidyapupana ooosapa nanatoo besaꞌyoona ka unu nanasoobedyana.
49004003	Tamme sakwa sumusoo maneka. Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetseapunne. Oosoo noꞌoko nanakwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwe te mayugwekese, tamme besa nanamatoo sokwamakwu.
49004004	Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoosoo. Tamme sumuoosoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha nakabetsea. Tamme noꞌyoona sumusoo nanetutzeapu tamme yise noꞌyoona Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu.
49004005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sumuꞌyoosoo ka noꞌyoona pumme te nakabetseꞌa. Tamme noꞌyoona sumu-waꞌnesoo baa-wi namatzaka. Tamme noꞌyoona sumu-waꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute.
49004006	Sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Naa tamme noꞌyoona oo-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo noꞌoko hemma matabuepu, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuepu, noꞌoko te gwetzoimona te nemadabuekupuna tu pooha-ma te sootuhipu.
49004007	Tamme noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoo, pana soo Te Pabeꞌe nanaꞌatakoosoo besow poohabe-ma te sootuhi tu sookwikwaꞌnesoo.
49004008	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. “Oosoo ka tu wohomu matzooekuse, oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyuka. Ooonneꞌyoona oosoo numu nanaꞌatakoosoo besow pooha sootuhipu.”
49004009	Oosoo tookwa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona yaa teepu-kooba petupu oꞌno meeoo naꞌunakwe oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyuka.
49004010	Menoꞌo yise oosoo ka Te Naa-baatoosoo kodyukase noꞌyonna hee yise namamakwu petu.
49004011	Oosoo nanaꞌatakoosoo besow te Pooha-sootuhipu ka te nanatummatzikwuna te nemahanekuna. Susumudu oo yadooawabe, susumudu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa-witu tuukwemoꞌodu, susumudu numu nenoyukwedu. Pana noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe unu mu nakaꞌoedyukukwuna.
49004013	Tamme yise noꞌyoona sumusoo manekekwu ka Te Naa Tooa sopedakwatoona, nanakwaꞌnesoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme yise natzooepunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuakwu, ka Te Naa tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.
49004014	Tamme yise gi waha-tamme tusooyugwekwu, tuhaꞌa-waꞌne. Ka mu numu nemooagadu numme-baa petuse, tamme gi mu nakabetseapana tooe tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga sapa. Tamme gi ooosapa te soonammena atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi nanaꞌemota wumatzakadyipana.
49004015	Tamme kaaheno nanadyadooekwu, tamme ka unu nanasoobedyana. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo manekekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o te moohekwudu
49004016	tamme yise oo-ma nasoonatzina nanatummatzikwu. Tamme nanano tuunoyugwe tamme ka nanasoobedyana. Oꞌno tamme natzooekwu.
49004017	Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mumme e tuukwe tuunguna, “Mu uga ka oꞌnosoo tumaꞌemukwadu ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa gi ooosoo manepana.” Umuoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi kaaheno tusooyugwedu.
49004018	Umu gi ka Te Naa nakasopedakwadoona. Oo-tamme wakwawaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina, umu ka tusoomatzooena gi sootunakaꞌoedyukuna.
49004019	“Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe sutaꞌyoopana,” mee sokwamadu. Umuoo suta tu tusooyugwena pedukudu. Umu tooe how tooe suda manakwe ka meeoo sokwamana. Umu yise nanaꞌunusoo suda manakwe.
49004020	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu gi suta mu manena natunedyooe.
49004021	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unnepu naka. Mu ka besow po te nagekwuna natunedyooe, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-doodooamuna.
49004022	Soo besa oo unnepu tamme ka suta te manena tzadyooikute, ka oꞌnosoo te soomane-kwaꞌne mee naꞌunnedu soo Te Naa pudu numusoo te matabuekwu. Oꞌno tamme kaaheno tusooyugwekwu. Tamme besa nanamatugukwu yise ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo.
49004025	Noꞌyoona sakwa tamme ka suda te tumaꞌemukwana maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno nanadyadooe, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka noꞌyoona sumuꞌyoonasoo.
49004026	Ka sutana, tamme sakwa yabesoo suta makwu. Tamme sakwa gi wunaꞌme sutapana tu yongo-matoo.
49004027	Tamme ka sutana, soo sutaꞌyoo te matzooekukwu.
49004028	Tooe haga tooe tuduhadu sakwa gi tuduha mane. Oosoo sakwa hemma natunedyuse hemma howyugwe. Oꞌno yise oosoo tooe hemma tooe ka mu tutuha manedu gea.
49004029	Tamme sakwa gi suda yadooapana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa unnena oosoo kummaꞌakoosoo numu tummatzi. Tamme sakwa ka besow mu tuukwena umu besa hanesootuhino. Oꞌno soo Te Naa besa mu sootuhikwu.
49004030	Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha suda masoonammepana. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te kopose, oosoo yise saaꞌa te magwetzoikwu, oosoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
49004031	Tamme sakwa gi nidyapupana, gi sutapana, gi nananesootzemapana, gi tooe how tooe nanadyugwepana.
49004032	Tamme sakwa yise unu nanasoobedyana besa nanamatugu. Tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwa ka numu suda tamme matugu, soo Te Naa puu te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
49005001	Soo Te Naa unu te soobedyana pummesoo dooamu-waꞌne te matugu. Tamme sakwa oo-waꞌnesoo.
49005002	Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedya ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme unu soobedya-kwaꞌne. Oosoo puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu yise te tumaꞌemukwana oo-koobatoo soomuꞌwa.
49005003	Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌa-no nanaꞌahegoepana, gi moogoo manepana soo Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi ooonneꞌyoopana.
49005004	Tamme sakwa gi suda apegeapana, tooe hayoo tooe unnepana, suda naꞌunnedu tuukwepana, tamme Te Naa doodooamu sakwa gi suda apegeapana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa apegeamo, mee unnena, “Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
49005005	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo mu Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu atasoo yugwekwuse. Soo Te Naa mu moogoobu numu noꞌoko nanaꞌahegoedu gi ooka mu maꞌwu, umuoo gi sootuhikwu, umu gi oo-noꞌyookwu.
49005006	“Gi hownneꞌyoo ka tumaꞌemukwagonnopana,” meeꞌe mu nemooagana, mu netammakwu. Umuoo gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo Te Naa ka sutakoo umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu noꞌoko mu gi tunakabetseadu umu ka tumaꞌemukwakena.
49005007	Tamme sakwa numu nemooagadu sukwe tsasoopedya.
49005008	Tamme-notu toganopunne uga ka Te Naa gi nasopedakwatoo, tamme togaba-witu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Menoꞌo yise tamme oetu tabuakute, o tamme ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoose. Tamme sakwa Te Naa dooamu-kwaꞌne besa oetu nakasopedakwadoo.
49005009	Tamme ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwatoona, tamme sakwa besaꞌyoona kaaheno ka Te Naa podo besa meadabe.
49005010	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme oo soomane tuungu oo-ma sokwama tabua.
49005011	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tooe how tooe manakwe, umu ka gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoona. Tamme sakwa gi umu-ma tzabepana. Umuoo sakwa mu neda.
49005012	Ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda watze manakwe umu-ma nasookwina gi oo wahapana.
49005013	Tooe ka togano-wi sapa, hemma gi pepesow nawatzetugu ka oo-koobatoo tabedooakese numu oo mesoo poonne. Ka te nanesootuhi hoobea-waꞌne oo naꞌunakwe: Umu utuꞌidu sakwa tubonne. Umu tuipu sakwa yozu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka taba mu-koobatoo tabedooapunnedu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
49005015	Tamme sakwa unu sokwama manekese, besa kaaheno ooosapa maneno. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka tamme tu sootuhipu-ma maneno. Mu numu menoꞌotu ewa suda tumaꞌemukwa, umu ka gi sosokwamana. Tamme sakwa gi umu-waꞌne manepana.
49005017	Tamme sakwa unu sokwamana ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunetammakuna nakasopedakwatoo.
49005018	Tamme sakwa gi baagoepana, soo nahebedu kadooꞌoo te mayugwekwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha sakwa te tunemadabueku.
49005019	Tamme sakwa besa nanadyadooena, nanesootuhi hoobea nananekwuhukuna. Te soonamme-kwikoo puusoo hoobeadoona. Tamme sakwa too ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo tunekwuhu.
49005020	Ooosapa tamme sakwa nanesootuhi ka Te Naa-matoo, mee unnena, “U besakoo ne sootuhipu ka Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo. U tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
49005021	Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo nananakabetsea tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
49005022	Momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo.
49005023	Mu nanana sakwa tu nonodukwamu nemadabue, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemadabue-kwaꞌne. Oosoo te magwetzoaꞌe.
49005024	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa ooosapa tu koomamu nakabetsea tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea-kwaꞌne.
49005025	Mu nanana sakwa ka tu nonodukawamu besa soobedya ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu soobedya-kwaꞌne. Oosoo unu te soobedyana tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, Oꞌno soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu. Besa tu nayadooa-ma ka baa-wi te matzakase, tamme gi totsabu ka manekwu.
49005027	Oosoo tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemabetsape ka saaꞌa naa-baatoo te bikwuse. Oosoo besa te mayugwemena, gi maꞌemukwadu, gi totsadu.
49005028	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme besa soobedya-kwaꞌne, nanana sakwa tu nonodukwamu soobedya. Tamme sakwa te nonodukwamu soobedya tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne. Tamme ka te nodukwa-no sumuꞌyoosoo.
49005029	Numu puu noꞌyoona pummesoo tookoo namakana mabetseꞌa. Tamme sakwa te nonodukwamu mabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mabetsea-kwaꞌne.
49005030	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa te mabetsea, tamme puu oogowsoo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
49005031	Mee nabotugu, “Soo nana puu tu naanapuaꞌamu-baaꞌyoona mea, oosoo tu nodukwa-baaꞌyookwuse. Umu wahaꞌyoo numu sumuꞌyoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyookwu.”
49005032	Esoo naꞌunnepu togesapa naꞌunnedu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sumuoosoo numu manekwu.
49005033	Noꞌyoona nanana sakwa pummesoo nodukwa besa soobedya ka tammesoo nasoobedya-kwaꞌne, noꞌyoona momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo koomamu nakabetsea.
49006001	Mu doodooake sakwa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea, ookow soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyookute. Oo manenona besa.
49006002	Oꞌnosooo soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakupu, “Mu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea,” meeꞌe.
49006003	Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka tamme tu tunetammakuna podo te tumayohono, mee yise te netamma, “Mu gi tuoebuna, besa sokwamana, wunaꞌmetoo momokwu eka teepu-kooba.”
49006004	Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo dooamu besa mabetsea yise ka Te Naa unnepu mu tunedyooeno. Umu sakwa gi nidya noko mu manaanapana.
49006005	Mu hemma how yugwedu sakwa mu pumme nedyawena nakabetsea, umu puu ka hemma how yugwenaka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa. Umu sakwa gi sukweapu ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetseapana.
49006006	Umu sakwa gi ka pumme nedyawedu pumme poonnepunne suuꞌmu oo nakabetseapana, ka besa oo masoonammena umu sakwa oo nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo pumme netamma.
49006007	Ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu tummatzina tamme sakwa besa oo soobedya. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tutummatzina,
49006008	tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌobatusoo numu besa manedu besow tamme-matu makodyukukwu: namekoosoo ka hemma how yugwedu oo nedyawedu nokosoo.
49006009	Ka hemma how yugwedu sakwa soo oo nedyawedu besa matugu. Umu sakwa gi mu netzakwikupana, umu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa mu nedyawedu. Soo Te Naa gi numu tutzeꞌa.
49006010	Yow nakwitoo mumme e netammakwuna, e pupuamu. Tamme sakwa unusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna. Oosoo nanaꞌunusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku te mayugwekwu.
49006011	Noꞌoko ka Te Naa tamme pooha sootuhipu-ma, tamme natzooꞌe, tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooekuno tooe ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwa sapa.
49006012	Tamme noꞌobatusoo sutakoo poohabe gi tabuadu-no nanamabetukute gi ka sukwe numu-no.
49006013	Tamme sakwa namabetzapepunne ka sutakoo matzooekukwuse. Oꞌno ka tamme-baa oo petuse, tamme oo matzooekukwu, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhise. Tamme sakwa namabetzapepunne ka soyuzu-waꞌne, oosoo puu namabetzapepunne numu-no nagoekwuse:
49006014	Tamme sakwa ka kaahenodu sopedakwatoo, kaaheno tusooyugwena, ooosapa kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu tamme ka besa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoikwu.
49006016	Ka sutakoo tamme wohone tooe niwunudu hoa-ma te kwatesangepana, ka oo petuse, oosoo gi how te yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
49006017	Tamme gi how nuugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme ka oo sopedakwatoona ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka oo unnepu-ma te sootuhi. Ekow naꞌunnepu-ma tamme sakwa ka sutakoo matzooeku.
49006018	Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhina nanetzakwiyino tuwazoo, ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa namabetzapepunne noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhikuna.
49006019	Nuka tuwazoo mu sakwa nanesootuhiku, nu yise gi nasookwina ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwekwu tooe nu oo-koobatoo nakwutumase sapa. E nanesootuhiku nu gi suina mesoo yadooakwu. Soo Te Naa yise tu unnepu-ma e sootuhikwu oꞌno yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu numu nakasopedakwadookwu.
49006021	E besa puaꞌa Tychicus mee naneadu ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu, nu oo-ma nasoonatzaꞌe. Nu mu-matoo oo taꞌya. Oosoo ka mu-baa petugase, oosoo noꞌoko hemma mu tuukwekwu ka how e manepunnena. Oosoo mu nenoyukwedooa.
49006023	Nu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikute mee unnena, “Mu numu sakwa besa nanasoobedya umu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. U sakwa umuoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoi.
49006024	U sakwa noꞌoko numu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa soobedyadu sootuhi.”
50001001	Numme Paul-no Timothy ka Te Pabeꞌe numme netamma-too manemodu tubona mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo, ka Philippi mee naneadu-kwi nonobe-gakoo-matoo ka umu nanesootuhi moohedu-matoo tuwazoo.
50001002	Numme mu nanesootuhikute, oꞌno umu Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe besa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoikwu.
50001003	Nu ka mu soomayuna Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikunona besa soonamme.
50001005	Mu besaꞌyoo e masoonammekute ka e tummatzina. Mu besaꞌyoo e tummatzipu ka mu-baa e pudu petugase, mu yise too togesoo e tummatzaꞌe.
50001006	Soo Te Naa ka tu besa podo mumme oo moohe, nu oo tubetse sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yise ooosapa besatoo mu moohenokwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuno-too tooe.
50001007	Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu, nu ka noꞌoko mu soobedyana tuwow. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu nuka tu sootuhipu-waꞌnekoosoo tooe e nakwutuma sapa, tooetoo mana ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu e tunesootabue sapa.
50001008	Soo Te Naa ka mumme unu e soobedyana sopedakwatoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme soobedya-kwaꞌnekoosoo.
50001009	Nu ka unu mu nanasoobedyakwuna mu nanesootuhikute, mu yise ka toge-kwitu unusoo nakasopedakwadoo.
50001010	Ooonneꞌyoo mu sakwa ooosapa kaaheno besa manemona oꞌno ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo kodyu petuse gi tusooꞌmukwudooa.
50001011	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena nakaꞌoedyukuna besa nanesootuhinona soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno Te Naa podo mu moohenokwu. Oꞌno mu numu ka mu poonnena punnoꞌo Te Naa nanesootuhikwu.
50001012	E nanumu, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutuma nu ka besakoo mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi nanesootuhi tunedyooena.
50001013	Noꞌyoona mu tutukwutumadu ka mu numu moohedu nobe-kooba tuyaꞌedu, yise mu numu yaatu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu e nanesootuhi tunedyooe-kwi oo sopedakwatoo e nakwutumana.
50001014	Tooꞌe noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaatuoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nanenasoogwaꞌe besasoo unusoo nanesootuhimena ka yaa Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo e nakwutuma.
50001015	Susumudu numu nanesootuhidu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu toge kaaheno numu tunedyooꞌe umu ka besa sootumatuguna. Umuoo numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe noko nuka unu soobedyana gi umu hemmasoo sookwi. Umu oo sopedakwatoo ka pukwi e nakwutumana nu ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwena. Susumudu mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu e tuukwe nuka nuusoogwedakute.
50001017	Susumudu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe umu ka e nuusookwedana. Nu ka nakwutumana mee mu naka ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute umu ka nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu nakana nu mu nuusookwedakukwu mee umu sokwama.
50001018	Nu gi haꞌyoo oo soobedya. Nu ka Te Naa besaꞌyookute ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu nanesootuhi tunedyooe.
50001019	Nu ka a namagwetzoikwuna sopedakwadoona besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha nuka tummatzaꞌe ka nuka mu nanesootuhikunoꞌo.
50001020	Gadoo hee pukwi puma e nanenasookwina ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu ooosapa e wahanoꞌo mu numu yise ka oo e manakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugikwu tooe how e gwetzoaꞌe tooetoo e nabatsase.
50001021	Nu ka nummena yaa teepu-kooba gwetzoina ooosapa nummenummekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena mayohonoꞌo, nu yise ka yaꞌese, nu ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ookow te petukuna besaꞌyoo.
50001022	Nu ka ooosapa nummena nu mu numu mesoo tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu umu yise tunakaꞌoedyukudu manekwu. Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo hanotu ka nu netutzeakwu.
50001023	Nu waha-baa tusooyugwe. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatoo e meakwuna soogwaꞌe, oosoo unu besaꞌyoo;
50001024	pana nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo mumme unu tummatzaꞌe.
50001025	Nu oo tubetse sopedakwatoo ka ꞌyoo oo manepunne, nu sakwa yaa teepu-koobasoo. Soo Te Naa e magwetzoikwu ka umu nuka batsakwuse nu yise ooosapa nummenummekwu mu tummatzikwuna noꞌyoona unusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna, besa sokwamana mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
50001026	Oꞌno mu ka Te Pabeꞌe unusoo besa sooyugwekwu ka saaꞌa mu-baasoo petugakwusesoo.
50001027	Ka tooe how tooe hemma manegena, ka Te Naa besa podo ooosapa meadabe oꞌno mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe besakoosoo nesootuhikwu. Nu ka how mu-baa petugase, tooetoo mu-witu sukwe nakana, oꞌno nu oo sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo mea, nananeꞌoedyukuna, nanatummatzina, oꞌno mu kukummaꞌyoosoo Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhi mea-kwitoo nesawekukwu.
50001028	Umu ka oo kadooꞌoo oo namayugwekwudu soo Te Naa yise mu magwetzoi.
50001029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu tutzeapuna mu nasootuhaꞌe mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna oo-koobatoo ka suda mumme tu matugu.
50001030	Menoꞌo mu mooasoo nanasuda namatugu nu-kwaꞌnesoo, nu puu togesoo nanasuda namatugu.
50002001	Menoꞌo mu tubetse besa sokwama mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona sopedakwadoona. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu soobedyana ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhaꞌe. Mu ka nanasoobedyana besa mu tumatuguna besa oo soobedya.
50002002	Mu sakwa nanasoobedyana, besa nanano unnena ka yow manekwuse, oetu nehanena. Mu ka oo manena nuka besa masoonammekute.
50002003	Tamme sakwa gi numu tuꞌwepana, gi nasootzaꞌmepana, tammesoo ooonakwa besa sakwa tamme kukumasoo numu besa matugu.
50002004	Gi muusoo nakwitu mooe soohanepana mu natummatzibu soogwidu tummatzaꞌe.
50002005	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo tusoohane, oosoo puu tamme-witu mooe soohaneyakwe.
50002006	Ka oe manakwana Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo pana yise gi besa nasooyugwe pumme tu nasooyugwe-kwaꞌne meeoo soonamme, “Gi hownneꞌyoo tooe mu numu gi e sootuhipana.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi maawaꞌne nasooyugwese yaa tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe sutakoo numu-waꞌne matugu ka oo batsase.
50002009	Pana soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase noꞌoko numu moohedu oo mayugwe, yise numu ooonakwa besasoo oo matabue.
50002010	Ka saaꞌa yise mu noꞌobatusoo numu tooe hanotu tooe mu numu oo sopedakwadookwu ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa oo pooha-gakoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu yise tooe hee tooe ka teepu-koobatu meeoo ka Te Pabeꞌe netammakwu, “Yow tookwa u unu naduyadu. U noꞌoko ne nemadabuepu.” Ka ꞌyoo mu manena, soo Te Naa nanesookwugikwu.
50002012	E nanumu, soo Te Naa te sootuhina ooonneꞌyoona tamme etzaga ooosapa oo nakabetseanoꞌo mu ka nuka mu noko mu ooosapa besa Te Naa tumayohokute mu sakwa ooosapa besa oo tumayohokuno tooe nuka kadookoo sapa. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe mu ka Te Naa-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
50002014	Gi hayoo unnepana, ka tooe how tooe manena gi numu-no nanepetugupana besakoosoo oo soohanese yise oo mane.
50002015	Oꞌno yise mu numu gi mu nesootuꞌidyi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oꞌno tookwa mu Te Naa dooamu. Mu numu yaatoo menoꞌo sutaꞌyoo suda namanedu nage; pana mu gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu tooe togano sapa kootabuapunnekwu paatoosoobaa-waꞌne. Oꞌno mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu ka mu besaꞌyoona.
50002016	Oꞌno yise nu besa mu-witu wahakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petuse. Oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadookwu nu tookwa besakoo kaaheno mu tunedyooepu.
50002017	Nu noꞌoko mu-matoo besa soonamme, tooe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsakwuse sapa, nu ka besa mu tunakaꞌoedyuku tummatzise.
50002018	Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-koobatoo besa sokwama ka besa kaaheno mumme e tunedyooese.
50002019	Nu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe nuka meeoo netammase, ka Timothy mu-matoo yabesoo taya. Ka mu-baa oo nummetooase nu saaꞌa besa oo-makoo tunakase, oꞌno nu besa soonammedooa.
50002020	Soo Timothy suuꞌmu nu-kwaꞌnesoo tusooyugwedu, ka mumme sootummatzina.
50002021	Kukummaꞌyoosoo mu numu ka puusoo hemma soogwaꞌe suuꞌmu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe sootummatzina.
50002022	Timothy mooasoo mu tzapoonnekute oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseana. Oosoo besa e tummatzina nu mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.
50002023	Nu ka e manekwuna sopedakwadoohoose ooonneꞌyoona nu sumuna mu-matoo oo tayakwu.
50002024	Nu tuwazoo meeoo tusooyukwe nu pudusoo mu-baa petukakwu.
50002025	Nu ka Epaphroditus-witu mu tuukwekwu. Oꞌnosoo mu e sootummatzi pana nu gi nuusoo kemma-waꞌne manepunne. Mu yise ka Epaphroditus taya nuka oo tummatzi tuunguna. Oosoo e pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookoosoo, ka e tummatzina numme nano mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetseadu. Ka saaꞌa nu-baa petuse, oosoo tuoeyaese tooꞌe yaꞌe. Soo Te Naa namekoosoo ne sootuhise oo mabesaku, soo Te Naa ka nuga suda soonammena gi petzabena. Menoꞌo yise oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, nu meeoo oetu soobedya oosoo toge tabuꞌa ka mu-baatoosoo oo tayase. Oosoo mumme tu poonnekwuna besa soobedya mu ka tuoeyaꞌe mee oo nakase. Mu punnoꞌo ka besa oo poonne sokwamana, mu besa sokwamakwu ka oo namabesakuna poonnese. Oꞌno nu punnoꞌo besa soonammekwu.
50002029	Ka mu-baa oo petugase mu saaꞌa tubetse besa oo-matoo sokwama. Mu numu sakwa oo-waꞌnekoosoo numu besa sooyugwe,
50002030	oosoo ka tooꞌe yaꞌese ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe ka nuka tummatzina. Mu gi e tummatzi-waꞌne manepunnena oosoo yise oo mamakwe.
50003001	E nanumu, yaahoo mumme mee e yadooekwuna: Mu sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama ka Te Pabeꞌe natubanga, Te Naa oowetuoo besa sooyugwe mu-matoo tubodyikoo tooe sumu-kwaꞌnesoo unaꞌwepana oꞌno sakwa mu sumuna a nakasopedakwadoo petuga.
50003002	Gi mu nakabetseapana umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu umu meeoo Jew numu manese sapa ka Te Naa doodooamu manekwu.
50003003	Tamme Te Naa doodooamu manese ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi ka Te Pabeꞌe-too, gi tamme tammesoo hemma manetoo namagwetzoi.
50003004	Nu uga ka mu Jew numu tumayohona mu ooonakwa besa nakabetseadu oosoo numu magwetzoikwudu mee oo sooyugwena.
50003005	Nu ka nadooaꞌadoose sumu nasatese e tookoo-matu natsegeaꞌakuse, nu yise Jew numu mane umu e nanumu tumayohona tumayohokuna. Noꞌyoona umu e nanumu Jew numu. Nu oo sopedakwatoo nu mu Jew numu Benjamin mee nananeadu numu habena. Nu uga tubetse unu ka mu Jew numu tumayohope nagedu ka umu Pharisee mee puusoo nananeadu-nagatu.
50003006	Nu uga mu Jew numu tubetse tunemabetsabekute nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu wohonena unu mu kusedyidu. Nu ooosapa besa tumatuguna ka mu Jew numu tumayohona tooꞌe nagena.
50003007	Nu tubetse besa tooꞌe Jew tumayohopana yise nu gi oowekoo hemma maꞌyu. Gi, oosoo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu yise e magwetzoi.
50003008	Mu Jew numu tumayohona tookwa gi hee. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nanesootuhi manese, oosoo yise numu magwetzoidu, tubetse unu besaꞌyoo.
50003009	Menoꞌo nu kaaheno meadabekwu ka Te Naa besa podo, menoꞌo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nage manekwu.
50003010	Oosoo tubetse besaꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu-nagatu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi nasootuhina. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda. Nu besa soonammekwu ka mu numu wohoꞌne, tooe nuga mu batsase sapa, umu puu ka Te Pabeꞌe wohoneke.
50003011	Nu yise e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Nu yise ooosapa besa soonammekwu ka besa-kwitoo mease gi moobegwaga gwetzoinummekwuse.
50003012	Nu menoꞌo gisoo oo mapuꞌa ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo e namayodakwuna. Nu gi ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo; pana nu togesoo oo petukunoꞌo ka e besaꞌyookwuna, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo e mane-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ka uga putoogoo e kemmapu nu maꞌwukese nu yise menoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseano.
50003013	E nanumu, nu ka nanasuda puu e manekepu maꞌwukese, menoꞌo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana, nu unusoo besa e manekwuna petukunoꞌo, oꞌno nu oobeoo Te Pabeꞌe-no Te Naa-baa manepetugadooa.
50003015	Noꞌyoona tamme meeoo tusooyugwedu numme ka Te Naa besa podo besa meadabepu mee sokwamadu. Mu ka atasoo tusooyukwe manekese soo Te Naa ka besaꞌhoo tu po-witoo mu moohekwusoo.
50003016	Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nageno tamme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona ka kaahenotu Te Naa podo nameadabedu.
50003017	Mu sakwa ooosapa nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa besa podo meano, yise umu susumudu numu nu-kwaꞌnesoo mane Te Pabeꞌe oedyukudu-kwaꞌnesoo.
50003018	Ewaꞌyoosoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsana netumooꞌoogena. Umu meeoo unnegena soo tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana, gi hee. Nu ekow mu tuukwekwu menoꞌo, oꞌno sakwa mu gi umu-ma nakatzabepana. Nu oꞌnosoo mooasoo umu-witu mu tuukwepu. Nu tutuha mu sooyugwena yagayakwe.
50003019	Umuoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu umu ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, ooosapa tu tookoo sutakoo nekwina nakabetseana, tooe ka suda tu manena besa sooyugwepana umu sakwa tooe namaꞌnasookwiku ka suda manena. Umuoo suda manedu tusooyugwena yaa teepu-koobatoosoo mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
50003020	Pana tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-baa te naneana natzepotuguna. Tamme unu oo soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus kodyu petukwuna, oosoo suuꞌmu te magwetzoikwu.
50003021	Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe nawaꞌnesoo te matabuekwu ka pummesoo Pooha tookoo-waꞌnesoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mikwoapa hemma ooonakwa pooha-gana noꞌoko hemma nadooha mayugwekwu.
50004001	E nanumu, nu ka besa mu soobedyana, nu sakwa mumme e tapoegakwuna besa soobedya. Nu ka besa mu nanesootuhi meꞌa besa mu-matoo soonamme ka oo mu manakwe soo Te Naa besakoo e sootuhaꞌe. Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe.
50004002	Umu momokoꞌne, Euodia-no Syntyche mee nananeadu mu gi nanetumooꞌoowamepana, umu ka nanosoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi mooasoo nanesootuhi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
50004003	U punnoꞌo Tubetse Tumatzidu mee naneadu nanana, u sakwa umu momokoꞌne tummatzi oꞌno umu sumusoo tusooyugwekwu. Oꞌnosoo umu momokoꞌne e tummatzaꞌe mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukweꞌe. Soo Clement punnoꞌo e tummatzi yise huuꞌyoo kukummaꞌyoosoo tutunakaꞌoedyukudu menoꞌo mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-baa manepunnedu.
50004004	Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo besa sokwama mee nu mu netamma. Besa sokwama mesoo tuwazoo nu mu netamma.
50004005	Mu sakwa noꞌoko numu-tamme besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo tamme-baasoo kodyu petukwu.
50004006	Gi hemma suda sokwamakupana, ooosapa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo oo tuukwena ka hemma mu sookwina, oo-matoo nanesootuhina tooe hekwitoo tooe.
50004007	Tooe gi ooka te nakasopedakwatoo sapa, soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu, mu ooosapa besa sokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseanona.
50004008	E pupuaꞌamu, nakwitoo mumme e tuukwena mu sakwa umu yooonne-kwitu soohane: kaaheno hemma manepunnena soohane ka Te Naa ooosapa nasootsakwina, hemma gi tootsagakoo soohane, besa nanano hemma nematuguna hemma ooosapa besa-kwikoo soohanena, Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma besa tamme maneyina, yise tooe hemma tooe mu numu Te Naa nesootuhi-koobatoo. Mu sakwa yooonnekoo besa-kwitu ooosapa soohane.
50004009	Mu sakwa mumme e tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena, ka e poonnena nuga mane-kwaꞌnesoo mane. Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu magwetzoina, ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
50004010	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa sooyugwena oo-matoo nanesootuhina mu ka e tummatzi manekasesoo. Mu uga gi hownnekoo e tummatzaꞌe, tooe e sootummatzipana.
50004011	Gi nu ka hemma mu-nakwana sookwina, meeoo unakwe. Nu natunedyooepu ka tooe gi nu hemma hee-gana tooe hee-gapana nu besa soonamme. Sumudooe nu gi hemma hee-gaꞌyoo, yise susumudu nu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo. Sumudooe nu besa tukayakwe; sumudooe too nu tuka tuukweyakwe. Tooe how nu manepunnepana,
50004013	nu besa soonamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha-ma noꞌokosoo hemma sutakoo tumatzooekukena, nu yise besa soonamme.
50004014	Mu tubetse besa e matuku ka e tummatzina ka suda e manese e nakwutumase.
50004015	Mu numu Macedonia-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnedu mumme e tunedyooe oo sopedakwatoo ka mu-baa e petugase, mu suuꞌmu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu e tummatzi. Ka mumme e maꞌwukakwuse,
50004016	waha mu ka e Thessalonica-wikoo e tummatzaꞌe, toge ka unu natummatziba e soogwaꞌe.
50004017	Tooe gi mu-nakwana e tusoogwaꞌe sapa, nu besa oo sooyukwe ka Te Naa besa mu sootuhaꞌe ka hemma nuka mu gea-matoo.
50004018	Nu ka nuka mu hee-maka-matoo besa soonamme ka Epaphroditus nuka heme petuse. Nu besa mu sooyukwe ka nuka mu tummatzaꞌe gi nu hemmasoo soogwaꞌe. Soo Te Naa besa mu sooyukwe nuka mu hee-maka.
50004019	Soo Te Naa noꞌobatusoo hemma hee-gana ka hemma mu nekwaꞌe sootuhikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe manepu-koobatoo.
50004020	Soo Te Naa nanesookwugi. Sakwa ooosapa sakwa manepunne.
50004021	Nu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa nu-baatu-no numme noꞌyoona puu mu nemaꞌyu,
50004022	umu yaatuoo Caesar numu-kooba katudu tutummatzidu punnoꞌo.
50004023	“Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa mu tubetse sootuhino,” mee nu mu nanesootuhikute.
51001001	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yadooawabe Paul mee naneadu yise ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu Timothy mee naneadu tubona,
51001002	ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa doodooamu Colossae mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gakoo-matoo nabodu. Numme ooosapa mu nanesootuhikuyakwe mee unnena, “U Ne Pabeꞌe Jesus Naa. Numme besa sokwama ka oo nakase ka mu susumudu numu Colossae-witu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku manese. U sakwa ooosapa mu sootuhina mu magwetzoi.”
51001004	Mooasoo ka Te Naa unnepu togesapa naꞌunnedu mana kwingaꞌa-kwi noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi nawaha, yise ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea manemena. Soo Epaphras mee naneadu ne tuukweꞌe oosoosoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu mumme tuukwepu, mu oo nakana oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu yise oo tubetse sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe, tooe gi ooka te mapuꞌa sapa. Mu noꞌoko ka Te Naa doodooamu soobedyana, mu oo sopedakwadoo, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa besakoo te sootuhikwu, ka puu-baa te petugase.
51001007	Ka te puaꞌa, Te Naa yadooawabe Epaphras numme-baa petuse, oosoo mu-kwitu ne tuukweꞌe. Soo Epaphras ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukweyakwe.
51001008	Soo Epaphras meeoo, “Te Naa Besa Pooha besa nanasoobedya mu mayugwepu.”
51001009	Menoꞌo yise numme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna nakase, numme ooosapa mee mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, “Ne Naa Besa Pooha sakwa umuoo unu sokwama mayugweke.” Umu sakwa ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo. Umu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo noꞌoko ka pumme u tunetammakuna.
51001010	Oꞌno umu oo mesoo manakwe, ka pumme u netamma-kwaꞌne. U yise besa umu-koobatoo soonammekwu. Umu yise ewa nanabesa tumatugukwu. Umu ka u besa podo meadabekwu. Umu unusoo u sopedakwadookwu.
51001011	U unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. U sakwa mu sootuhi, oꞌno umu besa tusoohanekwu. Oꞌno umu gi nasootookekwu, ka mu numu suda pumme mu matugu.
51001012	Umu besa sokwamana ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu mee unnena, “U tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ne sootuhise, besa ne mayugweke. Menoꞌo yise numme u doodooamu-no nadatsungakwu, ka umu u sootuhaꞌe. Numme yise u sopedakwadooke.”
51001013	Tamme uga ka sutakoo nakabetseadu. Pana soo Te Naa ka suta-makoo te magwetzoise, te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, ka Tu Besaa Tooa nakabetsea te mayugweke.
51001015	Tooe tamme gi ka Te Naa poonnepupana, tamme oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa Jesus yise oo-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ka oꞌnosoo gisoo hemma namadabuꞌe, ooosapa soo Te Naa Tooa oo-baatu. Soo Te Naa ka Tu Tooaꞌa noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabue tuungu, yise oo-paꞌanakwitu tuwazoo, noꞌoko Te Naa hemma te poonnena matabuepu, noꞌoko poohabe tuwazoo, Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo nokosoo. Noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe oo tumadabuepu oo-gatuoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe unu naduyadu. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma mabetseana, noꞌyoona hee yise besa nanano meadabe.
51001018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooe nadatsunga, ooonneꞌyoona tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo nagenokwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo mooe namayodakwu.
51001019	Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Mu Pabeꞌe saaꞌa mooeꞌugasoo nadatsungadooa, noꞌokosoo hekwi nu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwusoo.”
51001020	Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabue, yise oo-paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo, pana mu numu tumaꞌemukwakese, soo Te Naa gi hownnekoo mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu nanakwaꞌnesoo sootuhi.
51001021	Mu tuwazoo uga gi ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo, ooonneꞌyoona mu gi oo nakabetseꞌa.
51001022	Pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase yise Te Naa pupuaꞌamu mu mayugweke. Tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa te puꞌa, yise ka te tumaꞌemukwapu tamme ooemota nemayugwedooa.
51001023	Mooasoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa unnepu naka, mu punnoꞌo. Soo Te Naa besa unnepu mee, “Soo Te Naa saaꞌa te sootuhikwu.” Ekow besa naꞌunnedu Nu, Paul, mana tooe hano tooe numu-too tuukwenummekwu.
51001024	Tooe ka e tunakaꞌoedyuku-koobatoo mu numu nuka wohoꞌne sapa nu besa soonamme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nu-kwaꞌnesoo punnoꞌo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatoo nakwohoꞌne.
51001025	Oꞌnosoo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Saaꞌa noꞌobatusoo numu E Besaa Tooaꞌa-no meadabekwu. Oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu ka pumme e bise Te Pabeꞌe-no numu nemadabuekwu.” Soo Te Naa uga besa tu tusooyugwena gi mu numu tuukwe. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa tu pooha-matu-ma e sootuhise tu besa tusooyugwe-witu mu numu e tuukwe tuungu.
51001028	Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi Te Naa unnepu nakasoopedakwudoose, mu numu owetuoo mu tunesootabuenumme. Oꞌno kaaheno nu mu numu tuukwekwu. Ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyu-witu nu mu numu tuya tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa mee e netammana mu numu tunedyooese yise saaꞌa umu ka Te Naa-baa petugase umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoosoodooa.
51002001	Nu sakwa mu tunesootabue, nu ooosapa noꞌoko mu nanesootuhikuyakwe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu gi mu poonnepana mu numu Laodicea mee naneadu-kwi tuwazoo.
51002002	Nu mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa besa sokwama. Mu sakwa nanano manekese, unu nanasoobedya manepetu. Mu Te Naa unnepu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwadoose, oetoo mu nasootuhikwu.
51002003	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe sopedakwadoona tamme punnoꞌo noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadookwu, oosoo ka unu soonammena noꞌoko hemma sopedakwadoona.
51002004	Nu mu tuukwekwu ka mumme nemooagadu toge oo-waꞌnesoo nanakadu unnepu-ma tamme mu tooꞌe nemooaga, tamme sakwa gi umuoo nakaꞌoedyukupana.
51002005	Nu tubetse besa soonamme ka besa mu nanesootuhinoꞌo mu nakana ooosapa besa mu tunakaꞌoedyukute, tooe nu yaa kwingaꞌyoopana soo mumme e nanesootuhikuna ooosapa noꞌyoona mu-baa petugadyagwe.
51002006	Mooasoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu natunedyooepu. Mu sakwa ooosapa oo-no meanona,
51002007	oo-ma nasoonatsipunne. Mu sakwa nanaꞌunusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku mu natunedyooe-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa ooosapa mee unneyi, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa e matugu.”
51002008	Mu sakwa gi nanemooagapana Mu numu nemooagadu mu soonamme-kwitu tooꞌe nemaꞌemukwakwu mee mu netammakwu, “Nu ewow hemma sopedakwatoona, unu soonamme, mu numu ewow hemma e tunedyooepu. Nu punnoꞌo ka besa naꞌunnedu mu mesoo tunedyooꞌe, mu sakwa nuga pooha nakabetseꞌa,” mee umu mu tooꞌe nemooagadu mu netammakwu. Gi umuoo nakabetseapana. Umu pummesoo tusooyugwena mu tuukweꞌe. Mu unne-witu o kadooꞌoo. Umuoo pooha sutaꞌyoo, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Pooha-waꞌneꞌyoo.
51002009	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu nakabetsea. Tooe Te Pabeꞌe numu manese sapa oosoo togesoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
51002010	Oosoo noꞌokosoo hemma ooonakwakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo mu tubetse magwetzoipu.
51002011	Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa doodooamu mu yugweke ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukute, gi ka mu Jew numu tumayoho-too mu tumagwetzoi.
51002012	Te Naa mu mapudutupu-too ka mu tuꞌoedyukute, menoꞌo yise mu Te Pabeꞌe-no meanoꞌo. Umu uga sutakoo podo menoꞌo, menoꞌo gi
51002013	Oꞌnosoo umu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana soo Te Naa gi mu doodooamu-gaꞌyoo. Te Naa uga meeoo mu tooꞌe netamma, “Umu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu mu maꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu yise mu goekwu,” mee mu tooꞌe netamma. Mu uga mooasoo nakoopu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, soo Te tumayohope menoꞌo atasoo manepetu. Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, yise te magwetzoikwu.
51002015	Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oosoo noꞌoko ka sutakoo poohabe matzooekupu.
51002016	Umuoo mumme nemooagadu tu tumayohope mu tuukwekwu ka hownnekoo mu tukakwuna, mu hebena, yise hannanoꞌo mu nanesootuhi tabeba. Mu sakwa gi umuoo nakabetseapana, ka mumme mu nesootzeꞌma.
51002017	Umuoo tumayohope numme oꞌnosoo natuukweꞌe ka hemma Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka oo habagana numu-baa mooe petu-waꞌne. Pana mooasoo oo petuse, tamme gi ka oo habagana soogwaꞌe.
51002018	Umu numu poohadu sumuna mee mu nemooagakwu, “Nu pooha nose. Soo e pooha nosepu meeoo, ‘Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo numme ooonakwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa umuoo nanesootuhina nakakwu, gi tammetu. Tamme sakwa mu toha kakasa-gakoo te nanesootuhiku tuungu,’ “ meeoo umu. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhikwu umuoo nakabetseana. Umuoo numu nemooagadu besa sukwe nasooyugwedu, kadoo hee besa puma mu nasooyugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Umu suda tusooyugwedu sukwe numu soonammena.
51002019	Umuoo gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi nanesootuhaꞌe. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwitu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te kwo-waꞌneꞌyoo, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise oo tookoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te makana tamme ooosapa nananotu ka a oho noko a tookoo yise a tamoo-waꞌne puu nananotu. Tamme yise naaꞌna ka Te Naa tamme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo.
51002020	Mooasoo mu oo sopedakwatoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌetu maneke ka mu-koobatoo oo nabatsase. Tamme gi ka sutakoo poohabe nakabetseꞌa, ka oꞌnosoo te nakabetseana. Tamme gi ekow teepu-koobatu ka sutakoo numu maꞌemukwana, gi nakabetseapana yise ekow teepu-koobatu mu numu tumayohope-doona gi nakabetseapana. Umuoo unu nabeatse-gana. Umu meeoo gi mownnekoo tukapana, gi mownnekoo tzamapana.
51002022	Ka umu hemma yaa teepu-koobatu oo netammana, saaꞌa kadoo namayugwekwudu.
51002023	Tamme ka umuoo tumayohope nakabetseana, tamme besow nananesootuhidu-kwaꞌne sukwe tatabuꞌa, tammesoo besa nanemadabuena pana umu ka suda te tusooyugwena gi kaaheno te mayugwekute.
51003001	Tamme ka oꞌnosoo mu numu-waꞌneꞌyoo te nanamooatupu tumayohope suuꞌmu nakabetseadu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase oꞌno tamme atasoo namayugweke, ka suda te tumatuguna kadoo namayugwe-kwaꞌne. Ka Te Pabeꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayoda-kwaꞌne, tamme punnoꞌo pudu namanumudooke. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baatoo nabi, noꞌoko otuoo hemma nemadabuekwuse. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-baatu soomayu, ka Te Pabeꞌe onoko. Tamme sakwa gi noꞌokosoo hemma soogwi ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamu namayugwekese. Menoꞌo mu numu gi hownnekoo ka Te Pabeꞌe soopedakwudoona gi oo nakasopedakwatoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma te nasoonatzaꞌe. Pana ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe yaa ka teepu-kooba atasoo oo yugwe petuse, tamme saaꞌa punnoꞌo pudu namanumudookwu oo-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise noꞌyoona numu te poonnekwu ka atasoo te namayugwese tamme tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe-baatu.
51003005	Ka Te Naa doodooamuna tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona: gi suda tusooyugwepana, ka nanodukwana gi kukummaꞌa-noosoo nanapootamapana, tamme sakwa gi moogoobupana. Tamme ka moogoobuna, ka hemma namadabuena nakabetseadu-kwaꞌne, gi ka Tamme Manumudoopu madumotsea.
51003006	Umuoo tumaꞌemukwape numu-matoosoo kodyuna, kadoo mu mayugwekwu.
51003007	Mu punnoꞌo uga umuoo tumaꞌemukwape nakabetseadu.
51003008	Pana menoꞌo tamme sakwa gi suda manepana, oꞌnosoo te mane-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana, gi numu nesootzemapana, gi nanaꞌesagoekupana, gi suda apegeapana,
51003010	soo Te Naa te pudu manumudookwu. Soo Te Naa nawaꞌnesoo te matabuekwu, tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona.
51003011	Soo Te Naa tamme noꞌobatusoo sumu-kwaꞌnesoo mayugweke: mu numu, mu wakwawaꞌa, mu tiboꞌo, mu ewow hee-gakoo numu, tutuha manedu tuwazoo, noꞌobatusoo sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu.
51003012	Soo Te Naa unu te soobedyana te netutzea tu doodooamu manekwudu, besaꞌhoo numu te mayugwekwu. Tamme sakwa mu numu tummatzi, besa mu matuguna, gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana, gi sutapana, gi nidyanapana.
51003013	Tamme sakwa gi nananesootzemapana. Ka mu numu tamme suda matuku sapa, tamme sakwa oo soomuꞌwa, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu.
51003014	Tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedya Te Naa tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana, sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo besa nanano meadabekwu.
51003015	Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe, soo Te Naa meeoo te netammana, “Mu sakwa sumuoosoo numu-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Oosoo noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe tamme yise meeoo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besa ne matuku.”
51003016	Tamme sakwa ewa oetu soohaneyi ka Te Naa unnepu. Oꞌno tamme unu sokwamana tammesoo mesoo nananenoyugwe, ka Te Naa unnepu nanatunedyooe tuwazoo. Tamme sakwa tunekwuna mee unnemo, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.
51003017	Soo Te Naa besaꞌyoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nemawunise.” Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa nesootuhidyi. Tamme sakwa ka hemma how yugwena, tooetoo haꞌyoo unnena, Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidyi.
51003018	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa pummesoo kooma nakabetsea, umu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana.
51003019	Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo nonodukwamu besa soobedya, besa mu matuguna. Umu sakwa gi mu nekusekapana.
51003020	Mu doodooake sakwa ooosapa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetsea, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka meeoo tunetammana.
51003021	Mu nanana sakwa pummesoo doodooamu gi masutakupana, umu sumuna nasootookekwu.
51003022	Mu numu sakwa ooosapa pumme nehanedu nakabetsea. Umu sakwa ooosapa kaaheno oo sooyugwe, ka Te Naa pumme meeoo netamma. Mu sakwa gi ka pumme nehanedu besa sukwe masoonammepana ka pumme oo poonnepunne suuꞌmu besa manegonnona. Ka tooe hemma tooe how yugwena tamme sakwa oo soomane,
51003024	tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhaꞌe ka besa te manakwe, tamme togesapa ka Te Pabeꞌe tummatzaꞌe.
51003025	Tamme ka suda manena soo suda te manena punnoꞌo tamme-matoosoo nakwukodyukukwu, soo Te Naa ka sumu-kwaꞌne numu sooyugwe gi sumuoosoo tuutzeana.
51004001	Soo mumme nehanedu sakwa besa mu tumanakaku, soo Te Naa ka noꞌokosoo hemma nehanedu.
51004002	Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi gi manatu tooe sukwe soomayu. Tamme sakwa mee unne, “Te Naa tubetse besa te sootuhi.”
51004003	Mu sakwa punnoꞌo e nanesootuhiku. Nu ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwenummena ooonneꞌyoo nu nakwutuma. E nanesootuhiku nu saaꞌa mu numu mesoo tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa unnepu,
51004004	ooka mu nakasopedakwatoo-kwikoo, nuka tu tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo.
51004005	Mu sakwa punnoꞌo nu-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa mu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Tamme sakwa numu soonakana, ka besa naꞌunnedu waha. Tamme sakwa mu numu mesoo nanekwegeayi. Tamme ka mu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu tamme poonnepunne gi suda manepana.
51004007	Ka e puaꞌa, Tychicus mee naneadu eka tubope gwuudu mu-baa petugase, oosoo saaꞌa noꞌoko nu-kwitu mu tuukwedooa. Nu-kwaꞌnesoo soo Tychicus ooosapa manatooe nummenumme ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, numu tunedyooena. Oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
51004008	Nu mu-matoo oo taya oꞌno mu oo sopedakwadoo ka how ne manepunnena. Soo Tychicus saaꞌa besa mu masoonammedooa.
51004009	E besa puaꞌa, Onesimus mee naneadu oo-no. Mu sumuna mooasoo oo sopedakwadoo oosoo uga mu-nagatu. Mu-baaꞌyoona tuduhana namamea, menoꞌo yise tunakaꞌoedyuku maneke, nu yise oo-ma tubetse nasoonatzaꞌe. Umu saaꞌa noꞌoko yaatu namanena mu tuukwedooa.
51004010	Soo nana Aristarchus mee naneadu nu-no nakwutumadu mu nemaꞌyu. Soo Mark mee naneadu, Barnabas wkangaꞌa punnoꞌo mu nemaꞌyu. Mooasoo ka Mark-witu nu mu tuukwepu. Ka mu-baa oo petugase, saaꞌa oo nakabetsea, oo nabaaꞌyoo tuungu.
51004011	Soo nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu Jesus Justus mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu nemaꞌyu.
51004012	Noꞌoko mu ka Te Naa unnepu wahadu numu tunedyooedu-nagatu, umuoo nanana suuꞌmu Jew numu. Umu ooosapa besa e masoonammenoꞌo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe-witu numu tunedyooedu Epaphras mee naneadu mu nemaꞌyu. Soo Epaphras mu-nagatu kemmana, ooosapa mu nanesootuhikute mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo nakaꞌoedyuku.
51004013	Nu ka Epaphras-witu meeoo mu tuukweꞌe, oosoo mu tummatzi, yise ka mu numu mu tzageꞌekwitu Laodicea noko Hierapolis mee nananeadu-kwitu.
51004014	Oosoo e puaꞌa, Luke mee naneadu mu nemaꞌyu, Demas punnoꞌo.
51004015	Nu umu e pupuaꞌamu Laodicea-witu soomaꞌyu. Soo mogoꞌne Nympha mee naneadu, mu tunakaꞌoedyudu oo-baaꞌyoona nanesootuhidu punnoꞌo.
51004016	Ka eka tubope mu naneakumakwuse, mu sakwa ka umu Laodicea-witu tunakaꞌoedyudu-matoo a mameaku. Mu sakwa yise ka tubope umu-matoo e tayana nea tuwazoo.
51004017	Ka nana Archippus mee naneadu sakwa mu tuukwekwu, “Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe u manekwuna u pooha tuukwe. U sakwa oo tubetse nakabetsea ekow naꞌunnepu.”
51004018	Nu, Paul, nuusoo ekow boꞌo. E soomayu, nu nakwutuma. Nu mu nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.
52001001	Mu Paul, Silas noko Timothy tubona. Mu Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witu. “Mu sakwa ooosapa besa nasootuhi.” Numme ooosapa besow mu-toogoo natuunguyakwe.
52001002	Numme ooosapa Te Naa-matoo mu nanesootuhikute mee yise numme unneyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Besakoo u ka mu Thessalonica-witu numu sootuhipu-gaꞌyoo. Umu yise besa manakwe.” Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhaꞌe tuwazoo. Wunaꞌme umu oo sopedakwatoo ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe petukwuse pumme mu sootuhikwuse.
52001004	Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu mu soobedyana, ka puu mu netutzease.
52001005	Numme ka Te Naa besa unnepu mu tuukweꞌena numme gi meeoo numu sukwe unnepu mu tuukweꞌe. Unu natzooꞌe esoo besa naꞌunnedu. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mu ka oo unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute. Mu ka ne mu-baakoo oo sopedakwatoo ka ne hownneꞌyoona. Soo Te Naa ne nematunagapu mu-toogoo.
52001006	Mu yise numme-waꞌnesoo manakwe, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌne, tuwazoo. Tooe mu ka mu numu mumme tumooꞌoosoo sapa, mu besa sokwama. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu masokwamakute.
52001007	Mu yise noꞌoko mu Macedonia noko Achaia-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa podo moohekwu.
52001008	Oꞌno yise mu noꞌoko mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tuukweꞌe ka mu teepu, Macedonia noko Achaia-koobatu. Menoꞌo tooe hanotu tooe noꞌyoona mu numu mu-witu wahammoꞌo. Mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Gisoo mu-witu pumme ne tuukweꞌe mu numu mu-ma nanaꞌunneyakwe.
52001009	Umu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu besa sokwama, ka mu-baa ne nobengese. Umu meeoo ne tuukweꞌe mu ka Te Naa besa podo-tamme mea. Menoꞌo mu gi ka mu numu tumadabue-matoo nanesootuhi. Mu ka Te Tubetse Naa menoꞌo nakabetsea.
52001010	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe magwetzoi ka oo yaꞌe-wikoo oo mayodase, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe ka sumudooe yabesoo petuse te magwetzoikwu. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukutu maꞌemukwana saaꞌa umu-matoo kodyudooa.
52002001	Umu ne wohonedu ooosapa numme-witu suda mu tuukweꞌe. Mu ka toge-witu sopedakwatoo. Numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa besa mu netummatzaꞌe mu oo sopedakwatoo.
52002002	Numme ka gisoo mu-baa petuna, ka Philippi-wiꞌyoona tubetse suda namatuku. Pana numme ka mu-baa petuse, gi suaꞌe, ka Te Naa numme besa sootuhaꞌe. Tooe ka susumudu numu numme tumooꞌoo sapa, numme gi nanenasookwina ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
52002003	Numme ka Te Naa unnepu kaaheno mu tuukweꞌe. Numme gi suda manakwe. Numme tuwazoo gi mu nemooaga.
52002004	Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo ka toge ne manakwe. Soo Te Naa ne netutzea mee ne netamma “Mu numu tuukwe ka besa naꞌunnedu.” Ooonneꞌyoona numme ka Te Naa numme netamma-waꞌnesoo manakwe ka Te Naa unnepu-waꞌnesoo ka mu yadooena; gi ka numu petzabe-waꞌne.
52002005	Gi numme hemma mu-makoo soogwaꞌe. Numme gi ooonneꞌyoo soo Te Naa oo sopedakwatoo. Mu punnoꞌo oo sopedakwatoo. Numme toge kaaheno mu tuukwe.
52002006	Numme gi mu numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwedu.
52002007	Tooe sakwa mu ka Te Pabeꞌe tuukwewabe makase sapa, numme gi nagutza mu-makoo ookow soogwaꞌe. Numme mu mabetsea ka numu pea tu dooaꞌa mabetsea-kwaꞌne.
52002008	Numme noꞌoko besa mu pupuaꞌamu-gaꞌyoo. Numme mu soobedyana, numme besa oo sooyukwe ooonneꞌyoona numme ne tookoo mu-koobatoo mesoo soomawuni. Numme ka Te Naa besa unnena mu tuukweꞌe.
52002009	Numme ka Te Naa unnena mu sukwe tuukwe, numme unu manena ne tukapu mayuna, gi mu tunekwi ka hemma how mu yugwekuna.
52002010	Mu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa punnoꞌo oo sopedakwatoo numme ooosapa kaaheno mu matugudu.
52002011	Tu naa-waꞌneꞌyoo numme mu-tamme. Numme mu nenoyukwena mee mu netamma,
52002012	“Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo mea ka Te Naa tamme meeoo netamma. Soo Te Naa besa te nemadabuese yise saaꞌa te bidooa.”
52002013	Numme ooosapa Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe mu-koobatoo. Numme ka manow mu-baa petugase, mu besa sokwama. Mu ne nakapunne ka Te Naa unnepu-witu mumme ne tuukweꞌe. Mu oo nakasopedakwatoo oosoo Te Naa unnepu; gi sukwe numu unnena. Menoꞌo yise mu oo nagenoꞌo ka Te Naa mumme tummatzaꞌe.
52002014	Umu Jew numu mee nananeadu puusoo tu nanumu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tumooꞌoogena. Mu yise punnoꞌo oosoo manakwe. Mu nanumu punnoꞌo mumme tumooꞌoogena.
52002015	Mu Jew numu ooonneꞌyoo. Umu ooosapa suda manakwe ka Te Naa gi petzabedu-waꞌne. Umuoo mu numu tumooꞌoogena. Ka oꞌnosoo umu ka Te Naa yadooawabe-matu goepu-gaꞌyoo. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus batsa. Numme tuwazoo oekoo tayakwuni.
52002016	Ne tooꞌe nedyooikute ka Te Naa unnepu mu wakwawaꞌa ne tuukweꞌe. Oꞌno mu wakwawaꞌa oo nakase, oo oedyukuse namagwetzoikwu. Mu Jew numu ooosapa tooe how tooe manakwe. Yaa menoꞌo mu Jew numu suda tumatugupu umu-matoosoo namakodyukugena.
52002017	Ne pupuaꞌamu, gi haaꞌnotu umu Jew numu mu-baakoo ne nekaꞌapunne. Pana numme mu soomaꞌyu, numme sakwa sumu tuwazoo mu-no nanobenge.
52002018	Waha numme mu-matoo tooꞌe meayakwe soo Te Kwoho suda tumayugwedu ne tzadyooikuyakwe.
52002019	Numme besa mu-matoo sokwama. Mu tuwazoo besa ne masokwama. Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe yaa petuse,
52002020	Te Naa ne netubetseaꞌekwu tooe hannanoꞌo tooe mu-koobatoo.
52003001	Ka oꞌnosoo numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona mu tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa meeoo unnepu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanetumooꞌookwu, meeꞌe. Ka saaꞌa numme ka Athens-wiꞌyoona, “Haꞌooga mu menoꞌo?” mee sokwama. Numme meeoo nananetamma, “Yow menoꞌo mu numu nanatumooꞌoogena.” Mu ka sumuna nasootooke. Sumuna soo suda tumatugudu etzaꞌa puhu-wi mu tzanekeana, meeoo mu netammana, “Umu Te Naa po ooemota meꞌa ka mu numu pumme wohoꞌne.” Sumuna numme oo sukwe manakwe, ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukweꞌena. Numme tubetse unu mu-witu nakasokwama, mu haaꞌa togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute? Soo e puaꞌa Timothy nu-waꞌnesoo. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tuukwekena. Soo Timothy mu numu nanesootuhi nemayugwekena, umu yise tubetse unu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Nu mu-matoo oo taꞌya. Oosoo sakwa mu nenoyukwena mu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku, tooe mu numu mumme netumooꞌoo sapa.
52003006	Menoꞌo oosoo numme-baasoo kodyu petu. Oosoo meeoo ne tuukwe mu ka Te Naa unnepu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu nanasoobedyana, mu ooosapa ne soomayuna, numme sakwa sumu tooe mu-baasoo petuga, numme tusooyugwe-waꞌnesoo.
52003007	Tooe mu numu suda ne matugupana numme besa mu sokwamakute, numme ka meeoo tunakase mu togesoo tunakaꞌoedyukute meeꞌe. Menoꞌo yise numme gi suda mu sokwamakute mu ka Te Naa besa podo meana.
52003009	Numme ka Te Naa nesootuhaꞌe mu-koobatoo, mu ka besa ne masokwamase.
52003010	Numme ooosapa meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, “Numme sakwa mu-baatoosoo kodyuse ka mumme ne tunedyooena mamakwu ka pukwi mu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
52003011	Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikuyakwe soo Te Naa God ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no sakwa tooe hownnekoo tooe mu-baatoosoo ne makodyuka.
52003012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa unu nanasoobedya mu mayugwe, nokoꞌo mu numu noꞌokosoo mumme ne soobedya-kwaꞌnesoo.
52003013	Oosoo ka nanesootuhi mu mayugwena mu pewu besa mu sootuhikwu. Ka saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-baa petuse oꞌno mu besa sokwamakwu.
52004001	Oꞌno yise, mu ne nanumu, ka Te Naa besa po nagena, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tunetammana ka Te Naa unne-waꞌne manekwu. Numme mooasoo ookow mu tuukweꞌepu-gana, menoꞌo tuwazoo numme ookoosoo mu tubetse tuukweꞌe. “Ooosapa ka Te Naa petzabe-waꞌne mu manakwe.”
52004002	Ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa nage, numme Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi mu tuukweꞌe ka mu-baaꞌyoona.
52004003	Mu sakwa gi nanakummaꞌasoo nasoodyagepana, gi kukummaꞌakoosoo maꞌemukwapana. Oꞌno mu besa-wikoo nananodukwagakwu.
52004005	Gi ka Te Naa-wi gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌneꞌyoopana. Umu gi ka Te Naa besa po sopedakwatoo. Umuoo suda tutusooyugwedu.
52004006	Gi nanatumooapana, gi tutzetumepana gi ka nanakummaꞌakoosoo nananodukwa-no nanapootama-pana, mu ka gi besa tumatuguna soo gi besa mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyudooa, mee numme mooasoo mu tuukweꞌe.
52004007	Soo Te Naa besowsoo mu-makoo soogwaꞌe, gi ka suda nanamanedu.
52004008	Mu ka Te Naa unnena gi nakabetseana; mu Te Naa unnepu ooowemota manakwe gi esoo sukwe numu unnena. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi.
52004009	Mooasoo Te Naa meeoo mu tunedyooepu muusoo nanasoobedya meeꞌe. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhi.
52004010	Mu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukuduno ka teepu, Macedonia mee naneadu-koobatu nanasoobedya. Numme menoꞌo mu tuukweꞌe, ne nanumu, mu sakwa ooosapa unusoo nanasoobedya.
52004011	Gi nanasoosagwaekupana, gi kukummaꞌakoosoo numu matzamapana. Oo maneno mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌne, “Gi toetzegoepana.” Muusoo namagwetzoimmoꞌo oꞌno mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu poonnena umu tookwa besa manakwe mee sokwamadooa.
52004013	Ne nanumu, umu mooasoo tuipu-witu numme besasoo mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa ekow mu tooꞌe tuukweꞌe, soo numu ka yaꞌese, oo-baa petugayakwe ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda sokwamayakwe ka tu soobedyana yaꞌeyakwe. Mu sakwa gi umu-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwepana.
52004014	Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo tuukwe, Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna yise namayodapu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tamme punnoꞌo te yaꞌe-wikoo namayodakwu, ka tamme oo bise.
52004015	Soo Te Naa tamme tunemayugwekupu meeoo mu numu te tuukwetuungu, sumuꞌyoo numu yotsedu mu toha kakasa-gakoo moohedu-matu saaꞌa paꞌanakwana mooe wuekedooa. Soo Te Naa tumooyagakunoo saaꞌa namooyagakudooa, oꞌno saaꞌa yise punnoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baaꞌyoona tubongo wuekedooa. Mooeꞌugasoo mu tuipu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tu yaꞌe-wikoo namayodase oo mooe wegeadooa.
52004017	Yise tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu togesoo gwetzoimodu toogoopatoo natzadyakwegakwu ka koomeba-nagatoo, tubetse paꞌa ka teepu-kooba Te Pabeꞌe wegeakwu. Tamme ooosapa oo-baꞌyookwu.
52004018	Eka meeoo naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukuna ooosapa mitoo nananenoyugweno.
52005001	Numme gi mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka hannanoꞌo Te Pabeꞌe kodyupetukwuna. Mooasoo mu oo naka, gi haga oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tooe hannanoꞌo tooe yabesoo oo petukwuna.
52005003	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo sokwama gi hee oo manepunne, gi oo suda namanekwu. Umu yabesoo kadoo namamaꞌekwu. Umu gi oo namamea-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka koheadu mogoꞌne-waꞌne oosoo puu nuummabu wuma ka dooaꞌa-doona. Ookow tabeba-wi ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gisoo namamakwupunnekwu. Gi obeda oosoo tamme-tamme kemmakwu.
52005004	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu puu togano baakoese yise utuina, gi umu tu namanekwuna sopedakwadookwu. Pana mu yise gi ooonneꞌyoo. Mu numu-waꞌnesoo tabua-wisoo mommodu. Mu ka oo tu namanekwuna sopedakwatoo. Tamme sakwa namabetseapunne. Tamme sakwa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, unu nanasoobedyana oo soomayuna soo Te Naa te mabetseakwu. Tamme ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna tamme sutakoo nematzagakwunina ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwunu-toogoo tamme namamakwupunnekwu.
52005009	Te Naa tusoohanena soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme mabetseakwuna. Soo sutaꞌyoo gi tamme-matoo kodyukwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu. Tamme ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe podo oo-no meadabekwu. Tamme ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu ka oo kodyu petuse tooe tamme tuipupana tooetoo how gwetzoipana.
52005011	Nananetummatzina, nanatummatzina, nanatukwena ka ooosapa hemma yoo manekena ooosapa mu manekeno.
52005012	Umu te moohedu besa tamme mu tunedyooedu-witu, ne nanumu, numme mu tuukwekwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe tunetutzeana, umu te tunedyooekwu. Tamme sakwa mu netubetseapunne.
52005013	Tamme sakwa besa umu-tamme tusooyugwena, mu nakabetseana, mu soobedyana, umu ka Te Naa manewabena. Gi sakwa tammesoo nanagoepana.
52005014	Ooosapa oetoo nananenoyugwena. Mu toetzegoedu-mitoo nenoyugwe. Mu nenoyukwe mu nasootookedu. Mu gi nanatzooedu tummatzina. Gi haka sakwaꞌekupana.
52005015	Umu suda ume tumatugukudu gi tumakodyukupana. Ooosapa besa nanamatugu.
52005016	Ooosapa besa sokwamammo.
52005017	Ooosapa nanesootuhina.
52005018	Noꞌokosoo hekwi ka Te Naa nesootuhina, “Te Naa besaꞌyoo,” meeꞌe. Ekow soo Te Pabeꞌe te tzapoonnekute ka Te Naa tamme tunemadabuekuna.
52005019	Gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu-nagakwi manennummedu netakonepana.
52005020	Sumuna numu mee mu netammakwu, “Menoꞌo nuga pooha unnena nu mu tuukwekwu.” “Hownnekoo pooha-gana oosoo meeoo unakwe?” mee mu sokwama. Oosoo ka kaaheno Te Naa unnepuna oꞌno sakwa mu oo nakapunne.
52005022	Noꞌoko sutakoo gi nagepana.
52005023	Soo Te Naa puusoo noꞌoko te sootuhaꞌe. Numme meeoo oo-matoo nanesootuhi, oosoo sakwa noꞌoko besa mu mabetsea. Oosoo mu mabetseakwu; mu tookoo, mu soonamme-witu, mu moogooꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, gi mu hownnekoo mu poonnepetukwu.
52005024	Soo Te Naa ka mu netutzease tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
52005025	Ne nanumu, mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku
52005026	Mu sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukweꞌe tamme nanapupuaꞌamu.
52005027	Mu sakwa ka eka mu-matoo ne tubona noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu neaku.
52005028	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu.
53001001	Mu Paul, Silas, noko Timothy tubona, umu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witoo nabodu.
53001002	Numme mu nanesootuhikute mee unnena, “Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu sakwa mu numu sootuhise umu besa sokwama, besa gwetzoimo.
53001003	U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Besa numme ka mu nanesootuhikuna, mu unusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuna yise besa nasootuhikwu tuwazoo unusoo nanasoobedyakwu.
53001004	Numme mu-matoo besa sokwama mee unnena, “Tooe mu numu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda matuguna umu gi suda soonamme-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.”
53001005	Tooe menoꞌo mu ka nanamatsamana, yise tuwazoo nanamooedyugwepana, ka Te Naa besa po nage. Soo Te Naa kaaheno umu-toogoo besaꞌyoo, oosoo ka mumme atasoo yugwena.
53001006	Soo Te Naasoo besa mu mayugwekwu. Saaꞌa oosoo ka sutakoo umu mumme kusegea-matoosoo makodyukukwu.
53001007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa ka suda-makoo te magwetzoidooa ka paꞌanakwana kodyu petuse. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka petuse, umu pumme tummatzidu, toha kasa-gana-no,
53001008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe besa kootabedooadu goso-waꞌne tabuana petukwu. Umu ka te unne-too gi tumayohodu soo Te Naa gi nakasootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo umu ka gi Te Naa-witu tu sopedakwatoona petzabena.
53001009	Umuoo gi Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyuse, oosoo gi mu magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo ka unu tu pooha-ga-ma.
53001010	Mu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe petuse, mu tubetse nasootuhikwu. Noꞌyoona umu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe netubetseayikwu, mu umu-noꞌyookwu, mu ka mumme ne tuukwena nakaꞌoedyukuna.
53001011	Menoꞌo yise numme ooosapa mee mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, soo Te Naa sakwa unu mu pooha-maka. Oꞌno yise mu noꞌoko ka besa mu manena, besa mu tusooyugwena mamakwese mu yise Te Naa besa podo meanokwu. Soo Te Naa yise mee mu netammakwu, “Mu e tusoohaneku-waꞌnesoo besa manakwe.”
53001012	Mumme mane-kwitoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoona napoonnekwu. Mu punnoꞌo oo tzapoonnekwu ka besa manena ka Te Pabeꞌe mumme neyugwetoosoo manena.
53002001	Ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme bikwu-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Gi ka kummaꞌakoosoo mumme nemooaga oo nakabetseapana. Gi suda oo sokwamakupana. Susumudu mu-naga-kwitu mu nemooagadu meeoo mu tuukwekwu, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwu,” meeꞌe. Umu nuupoohadu sumuna, “Ne pooha meeoo ne tuukweꞌe,” mee deaꞌa umu unakwe mooasoo. Sumuna tooe haga tooe meeoo mu tunedyooꞌe. “Umu meeoo tuboꞌo,” mee sumuna umu ne netamma. Numme yise gi oo manakwe. Mooasoo numme mu tuukwe ookow a namanekwuna ka mu-baaꞌyoona. Gi oo soomuꞌwapana numme mooasoo meeoo mu tuukwe mooaꞌugasoo namanekwudu umu saaꞌa ka Te Naa unu netumooꞌookwu. Mooasoo mu numu-matu ka Te Naa watze tumooꞌoo. Umuoo suda tu tumatuguna besa soobedya. Umuoo gi ooka togesapa naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukute. Umuoo soo Te Naa matusookwunikwu, umu ka naꞌesagoedu nakabetseana. Pana menoꞌo hee sapaga ka suda namanedu tzadyooikupunne. Mu ka ooka tzadyooikudu sopedakwatoo. Saaꞌa ka hemma toge manepetuse, oeꞌyoonasoo oo tzadyooikudu nayadooakwu. Oꞌno yise soo sutaꞌyoo nana sutakoo pummesoo pooha mu numu tzapoonnekukwu, oosoo nana sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo suta-tamme mu numu moohedu. Oosoo mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mamooakakwu, ka ewow nanesootuhidu tooe netakonekwu. Ka pabow Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egease puu oeꞌyoona oosoo mu numu nemadunagakwu. Meeoo yise unnekwu, “Nu yow. Nu oosoo mu Manumudoopu. Nu Mu Tubetse Naa.” Oꞌno yise soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, ka tu songapu pooha-ga manese, ka ooka sutakoo pooha-gakoo kadoo mayugwekwu.
53002013	O tooꞌe, besa numme ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyigena, “U, Ne Naa besa mu numu sootuhipu.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu soobedya. Soo Te Naa mu netutzea mu ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu ka besa oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo Te Naa tu besa pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi, mu yise Te Naa besa podo mea. Oosoo mu magwetzoise, ka saaꞌa mu Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-matoo mease, ooosapa oo-baaꞌyoona, mu oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
53002015	Yise, ne nanumu, gi nasootookepana. Ka mu-baaꞌyoona mumme ne tuukwepu ooosapa nakaꞌoedyuku, ka mu-matoo ne tubona tuwazoo.
53002016	Numme meeoo mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa mu nakaꞌoedyukute mu sootuhikwu, oꞌno mu besa tumatuguna besow suuꞌmu apegeakwu. Oosoo te soobedyana, te nenoyugwe, te tummatzina te sootuhaꞌe.
53003001	Mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku numme ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu tuukwena, ewaꞌyoo oo nakase oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu, yise mu-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu.
53003002	Ne nanesootuhiku, soo Te Naa sutakoo tamme ooemota mayugweku, tooe ka susumudu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda numme mu sooyukwe sapa.
53003003	Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma-kwaꞌne mane. Oosoo nanesootuhi mu mayugwese, ka mu numu mumme kusegeadu oo ooemota mu neyugwese, mu magwetzoikwu.
53003004	Numme mooasoo oo sopedakwatoo mumme ne tuukwe-kwaꞌne mu manakwe. Mu sakwa ooosapa maneno, ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwiꞌyoona.
53003005	“Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa ooosapa nawaꞌnesoo mu sokwamatuguku,” mee numme mu nanesootuhikuyakwe. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa noꞌoko numu soobedyadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi numu nasoomenakwadu.” Numme ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo mu nanesootuhikukwu, “Mu numu unu nana soobedyakwu, Te Naa-waꞌnesoo yise mu gi numu nasoomenakwakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo.”
53003006	Ne nanumu, soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo mu tunetammakute, “Mu totoetsebu-ma gi tzabepana.” Mu totoetsebu numu gi ne nakabetseadu.
53003007	Numme gi tototseabu ka mu-baaꞌyoona, mu ne poonne. Numme tabewano hemma how yugwe yongo-matoo tooe mu numu tunedyooepana.
53003008	Tooe mu numutu tunedyooedu sakwa namakayakwe sapa, ooosapa namakayipana, gi hemma mu-makoo soogwaꞌe. Nummesoo nakwitu poohwaꞌe.
53003010	Mooasoo numme ka mu-baaꞌyoona meeoo mu netamma, “Mu toetzegoedu sakwa gi namakapana.”
53003011	Numme meeoo tunaka susumudu mu-baatu unu toetzebu, gi hemma how yugwedu. Umu ka numu matzama.
53003012	Umuoo ooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te netamma tuungu. “Muusoo nakoobatoo mane gi nakasagwipana, oꞌno yise mu besa sokwamakwu.”
53003013	Ne nanumu, ooosapa besa manenona gi nasootookepana.
53003014	Mu oo meesoo sopedakwadoo ka mu numu Te Pabeꞌe besa unnena gi mayohodu. Oo tsasoopedya oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwase nasookwikwu.
53003015	Pana yise gi mu wohonepana. Umu-too besaꞌyoona besakoosoo mu tuukwe ka mu maꞌemukwa.
53003016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe nana-matoo te sokwamatugukute. Oo-matoo yise tamme nanesootuhina oosoo noꞌoko te nakasootuhina nanatamme mu nanatogeꞌyookwuna, yise ooosapa mu besa sokwamamokwu.
53003017	Nu Paul nuusoo tupokwu. Oꞌno muusoo oo tubetse sopedakwadookwu esoo nugasoo mi-ma e tubona.
53003018	Nu meeoo nanesootuhi soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu.
54001001	Nuga tubona, Paul, e puaꞌa, Timothy-matoo. Nu mooasoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu u tunedyooꞌepu mu Te Naa God Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no meeoo e netamma, “Mu numu tuukwe ka Mu Pabeꞌe-witu.” Soo Te Naa togesapa te magwetzoipu. Te Pabeꞌe tamme poonnekwu ka pumatoo te nanetzakwiyina. Oꞌno tamme oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
54001002	Nu u sopedakwatoo. U togesoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute ka ume e tuukwena ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu. Nu meeoo u nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no sakwa besa u mabetsea, u sootuhina, u magwetzoi.
54001003	Nu ka gi soo Macedonia-witoo meana, “U sakwa yaa Ephesus-wizoo,” mee nu u tubetse netamma. “U sakwa mu numu nemooagadu tunedyooe mu tuukwe umu sakwa nukatu tunedyooe-kwaꞌnekoosoo mu tunedyooe.”
54001004	Umu sakwa gi mu Jew numu pumme tunedyooena tumayohokupana, yise kukummaꞌakoosoo numu pumme tunedyooena gi nakabetseapana. Oosoo ooonneꞌyoo numu pukwi nanahana, ka oo tu namane-kwi umu Te Naa gi nakaꞌoedyukute. Pana soo Te Naa meeoo te tubetse netamma, “Nuka suuꞌmu nakaꞌoedyuku.”
54001005	Sumuba naꞌunnedu soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Nanasoobedyana ka nu-kwitu tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku kaaheno nuga podo meano.”
54001006	Susumudu numu ka Te Naa besa po ooemota maneyugwe. Umuoo sukwe apegea, gi hekwitu nehanepana.
54001007	Umuoo ka mu Jew numu tumayohona gi nakasopedakwatoopana numu tooꞌe tunedyooe.
54001008	Ka moomooasoo soo Moses nanamooꞌatupu mu Jew numu tumayohona te tuukweꞌe oosoo besaꞌyoo ka pumme tu nakasopedakwatoo.
54001009	Tamme sakwa oo nakasopedakwadoo ka mu Jew numu tumayohona ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu too sutaꞌyoo, umu tooꞌe natunedyooena gi ka mooasoo besaꞌyoo numu-doo. Mu ooonneꞌyoo sutaꞌyoo numu: Ka Te Naa-witu suda nanatuukwedu, tu naanapuaꞌamu mesoo goena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu mesoo goena.
54001010	Kukummanosoo nanaꞌaheegoena, numu tooe tuduhana, esagoena, suda nana-witu naꞌesagoena, tooe how tooe manakwe.
54001011	Yow esoo Te Naa unnepu oo tuukwena. Soo Te Naa meeoo e netamma, “Noꞌoko mu numu nuga besa unnepu tuukwe.”
54001012	Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe nesookwugaꞌe unu oo nakabetsea. Nuka oosoo sakwa e nakabetsea e sooyugwena soo Te Pabeꞌe nuka netutzeapu.
54001013	Oꞌnosoo nu gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka Jesus suda netammana, ka oo nanumu kusegeana, nu tookwa ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonepana, gi oo nakasopedakwatoo. Ooonneꞌyoopana soo Te Pabeꞌe e sootuhipu.
54001014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tunakaꞌoedyuku e mayugwe.
54001015	Soo tooe haga tooe tubetse togesapa yadooꞌa ka meeoo unnena, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka te teepu-kooba petu mu sutakoo numu putamme manese mu magwetzoikwuse.” Nu yow uga tubetse sutaꞌyoo numu.
54001016	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus e sootuhipu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu tzapoonnekute, te mesoo sootuhaꞌe tuwazoo tooꞌe ka pumme te wohoꞌne sapa. Menoꞌo yise tuwazoo te tzapoonnekute umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoina.
54001017	Numme oo nesookwugaꞌe, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa ne moohenummekwudu, gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. U Ne Tubetse Naa. Gi haga u poonnedu. Tooe haga tooe, tooe hanotu tooe, sakwa ooosapa u nesootuhimo.”
54001018	E puaꞌa, Timothy, nu meeoo u netamma u sakwa oo tubetse nakabetsea ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus noꞌoko hekwitu ka meeoo ume oo pooha netamma-kwaꞌnesoo. U oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu numu u-makoo poohabe poonne.
54001019	U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna oꞌno u ooosapa besa manenokwu. Susumudu numu oe tu tunakaꞌoedyuku soomuꞌwa umu ka gi tubetse besa tu soonamme-kwikoo hemma mayohona.
54001020	Soo Hymenaeus-no Alexander mee naneadu ooonneꞌyoo. Nu ka suda-tamme umu tzamuna umu sakwa oo natunedyooese, gi ka Te Naa suda netammadooa. Oꞌno saaꞌa suda tu unnepu nematzagase soo Te Naa oꞌno mu sootuhidooa.
54002001	Tamme sakwa noꞌoko tooe hownnekoo tooe numu nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhi, tamme yise Te Naa oowetoo netubetseꞌa.
54002002	Noꞌobatusoo mu numu moohedu tamme sakwa nanesootuhiku tuwazoo. Oꞌno yise umu gi te wohonena tamme ka besa podo gi namatzamana mesoo meadabekwu.
54002003	Tamme ka mu numu moohedu nanesootuhikuna, oꞌno yise Te Naa ookow besaꞌyookute.
54002004	Mu numu sakwa noꞌyoona ka Te Naa-witu besa nakasopedakwatoo, Te Naa noꞌoko numu soomagwetzoaꞌe.
54002005	Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu pumatoo te nanesootuhina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse numu mane. Tamme-kooba nabatsase te magwetzoi. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te naamookwi manepunne. Oꞌno soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu ka tamme Te Naa noko nanapuaꞌamu mayugwedooa. Soo Te Naa meeoo mu numu tuukwe.
54002007	Soo Te Naa nuka yise netutzeapu mu gi Jew numu tunesootabue mee unnena.
54002008	Mu naana tooe hanotu tooe sakwa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Umu sakwa gi sutapana, gi nanahapana ka nanesootuhina. Ka suda tu manena nematzagase oꞌno besa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
54002009	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa punnoꞌo besa tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa nanesootuhi-no. Umu sakwa gi tu nagwe a tubua-ma mu numu nasootzaꞌmekupana, gi how tuwazoo tu tzopuhu-ma namadabue-ma nasootzaꞌmepana gi ka besa tatabuadu-ma namasooapana tuwazoo.
54002010	Mu momokoꞌne sakwa besa mu tumatugukugena, oꞌno mu numu mu posopedakwadoona, umu tookwa tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee mu sooyugwe.
54002011	Noꞌyoona mu momokoꞌne sakwa oo nakapunne ka pummetu tunedyooꞌe. Gi pummesoo tusooyugwena wahapana.
54002012	Gi sakwa mu momokoꞌne ka mu naana puu tunemadabueku, tuwazoo gi mu naana tunedyooe. Umuoo momokoꞌne sakwa gi unnepana.
54002013	Soo nana, Adam mee naneadu mooe namanumudoopu, oꞌno yise soo mogoꞌne Eve mee naneadu oobenakwatu namadabue.
54002014	Soo Adam gi nanemooagapu pana soo Eve yise nanemooagase suda mooe tumatugupu.
54002015	Ka ꞌyoo manena mu momokoꞌne namagwetzoi umu yise ka oe tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka tooaꞌadoona gi noꞌosoo nummabodona besa oo-toogoo tsebooenokwu yise ka Te Naa besa podo meadabenokwu.
54003001	Esoo naꞌunnedu togesapa, “Gi nasookwipana ka nananesootuhidu moohena esoo besaꞌyoo.”
54003002	Ka mu nananesootuhidu moohedu sakwa kaaheno besa tumatugudu. Umu sakwa noꞌyoona nanasuꞌmu nonodukwa-ga. Umu sakwa gi suda-ma namaꞌemukwa, besa tutusooyugwedu, gi numu nasootzaꞌmekupana tuwazoo. Umu sakwa ka mu numu tummatzi ka tooe hekwi tooe. Umu sakwa gi puusoo ewow hemma sookwipana, umu gi baagoedu. Umu sakwa gi nidyupupana, gi etzaga sutapana, besa ooosapa numu matugu.
54003004	Umu sakwa besa numu tunedyooedu. Umu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka tu nodukwa noꞌoko tu dooamu tunemadabueku, oꞌno umu tu naa nakabetseakwu. Umu ka gi pummesoo dooamu meeoo tunedyooena, umu tookwa gi ka Te Naa dooamu meeoo tunedyooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
54003006	Umu sakwa gi pudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Umu ka ooonneꞌyoona sumuna paba nasooyugwekwu. Soo suda tu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu ka Sutakoo tu yugwe-kwaꞌnesoo.
54003007	Umu sakwa mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-tamme kaahenoꞌyoo besa mu nematugu, oꞌno yise numu gi mu nesootzema-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu sumuna umu nesootzeꞌma soo sutaꞌyoo suda-kwi mu mesoo mayugwe.
54003008	Mu numu nanesootuhidu tummatzikwudu sakwa besa naꞌeyaꞌese oꞌno sakwa umu nanetutzea. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa oo mooe sopedakwatoo ka besaꞌyoona. Umu nanetutzeadu sakwa ka Te Naa podo besa tu meakwuna tzapoonne umu sakwa gi esagoepana, gi baagoepana, gi numu tuꞌooepana, gi puusoo hemma natoogoo soogwipana tuwazoo. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka puusoo nasopedakwadoona ka Te Naa besa podo meana.
54003011	Mu pepeawabe ka mu nanesootuhidu tummatziwabe sakwa punnoꞌo besaꞌyoo. Umu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, gi etzaga haꞌyoo tooe naneyugwepana, ooosapa kaaheno besa tumatuguna oꞌno besaꞌyoo.
54003012	Mu nanesootuhidu tutummatziwabe sakwa nanasusumu nonodukwa-ga, mu doodooamu sakwa punnoꞌo besa mu nakabetsea, noꞌoko tu nobe-witu meeoo tunedyooe tuwazoo.
54003013	Umu ka besa mu nanesootuhidu tutummatzina mu numu besa mu sooyugwe. Umuoo gi nasookwina Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu wahakwu.
54003014	Nu yabesoo u-baa soopetugaꞌa pana sumuna nu gi oo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonneꞌyoona nu u-matoo tuboꞌo, oꞌno yise u ka Te Tubetse Naa-matoo nanesootuhibu kaaheno mu numu tunedyooe.
54003016	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma numme tunekwuꞌu. Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba tamme-waꞌnesoo nadooaꞌadoopu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha oo tzapoonne oosoo Te Naa Besa Tooaꞌa. Oobe paꞌatoo tamme-koobatoosoo ka Te Naa-baatoo oosoo kodyuka. Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nawahana nakakoo. Yise tooe hano tooe susumudu numu oe tunakaꞌoedyukute.
54004001	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tuukweꞌe ka saaꞌa susumudu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo tu meana maꞌwukakwu, ka tooe hownnekoo tooe sutakoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukuna pumme nemooagadu.
54004002	Mu numu sutakoo tunedyooena umuoo numu nemooaga. Umu numu nemooagadu ka wunaꞌme suda tumatuguna, umu yise ka kaaheno besow gi oo sopedakwatoo.
54004003	“Gi nananodukwadoopana, gi noꞌo-baatoosoo tukapu tukapana,” mee mu numu nemooagadu numu netamma, pana soo Te Naa ka noꞌoko tukapu tamme-too matabuepu. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma besa matabuepu yise gi hee sutaꞌyoo ka oo-koobatoo te nanesootuhaꞌe.
54004005	Soo Te Naa unnepu ka tukapu-koobatoo te nanesootuhinoꞌo, tamme gi oo namanabuekute.
