54004006	U ka Te Pabeꞌe besa tummatzaꞌe ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwena ka ume e tuukwe-kwitu. U uusoo besa natunedyooe ka besa naꞌunnedu nagenona.
54004007	Ka umu naꞌesayaedu numu tunedyooedu u sakwa gi nakabetseapana. U sakwa ka Te Naa besa po tubetse nageno. Oo-makoo natunedyooena.
54004008	Esoo u tookoo u mabetseana besaꞌyoo, pana soo Te Naa besa podo numu meanona unusoo besaꞌyoo. Oosoo Te Naa podo nameadu numu natunedyooena besaꞌyoo, ka oo-toogoo meanona unusoo besaꞌyoo. Oosoo Te Naa podo nameadu numu natunedyooena besaꞌyoo ka menoꞌo yaaꞌa ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona pana ka saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo te mease oosoo unusoo besaꞌyoo.
54004009	Soo meeoo ume e tuukwena togesapa. U sakwa a nageno.
54004010	Nu ka tubetse besow po nagenoꞌo, soo Te Naa noꞌoko numu besa matugu, ka pukwi u tunakaꞌoedyuku u magwetzoikwu.
54004011	Noꞌoko numu tunedyooe umu sakwa ka ume e tuukwena nageno.
54004012	U sakwa noꞌoko numu soopedya, oꞌno mu numu ume sootubetseyaꞌekwu, yise tubetse unudooe besaꞌyoo. U sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meanona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu u poonnena punnoꞌo u-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno gi haga sakwa meeoo u netamma, “U nagutza naatse numme u tunedyooe-kwi.”
54004013	Ooosapa ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu-witu tunedyooeno, e petunoꞌotoo tooe.
54004014	Mu wakwaꞌetse u pooha poonnena, u nanesootuhikute. Umuoo u-ma matuguse soo Te Naa ka nanesootuhibu noko numu u tunedyooekwuna ooka u sootuhi. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu-witu numu tunedyooe. Gi u namatusookwunikwu.
54004015	U sakwa e tunetamma tubetse nagenona, oꞌno yise mu numu u poonnena u sopedakwadookwu ka unusoo besa u manenoꞌo.
54004016	Besakoo tunakabetseana, besakoo ka Te Naa unnepu suuꞌmu numu tunedyooena, u ka ume nakabetseadu-no namagwetzoikwu.
54005001	Tooe mu wakwaꞌetse tumaꞌemukwa sapa gi mu nasakwaꞌekupana, besakoo ooka mu nemadabuekuna, u naa u nemadatugu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu naana sakwa u pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo nematugu.
54005002	Mu pepeawabe u pea-waꞌne, mu momokoꞌne u punneꞌe-waꞌne. Gi suda umu-tamme tusooyugwepana.
54005003	Umu pepeawabe gi kookoomamu-gakoo, umuoo mu doodooamu-no mu mooamu sakwa mu mabetsea. Oꞌnosoo umu naanapuaꞌamu mu mananase umu ka tu naanapuaꞌamu mooatupugoese, oꞌno yise mu doodooamu sakwa mu mabetsea. Oo umu manena Te Naa tunetammana mayohona ka Te Naa besa masoonammekute. Mu doodooamu sakwa Te Naa nakabetsea. Umu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo, gi nanumu-gaꞌyoo.
54005005	Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo gi nananumu-gaꞌyoo, “Soo Te Naa ne mabetseakwu,” mee sokwama. Ooosapa Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhinoꞌo. Umu ooonneꞌyoo sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mabetsea.
54005006	Susumudu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo gi kaaheno Te Naa podo meadu ooosapa puusoo tu nasooꞌyugwetoo manedu, gi Te Naa-nakwana nakwitu soonammedu, umuoo gi hee.
54005007	“Umu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa ka besow tumayohope nagena oꞌno umu gi haga mu nesootzema-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee sakwa u mu tuukwe.
54005008	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwedu ka gi pummesoo tu nobe-witu manepunnena mabetseana ka tu nanumu-too gi mabetsea umu oo tzapoonne ka gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu yise mu numu gi soo tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooonakwa sutaꞌyoo.
54005009	Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo ka nanesootuhi tummatzidu mane-kwitu, ooonnekoo u sakwa netutzea. Mooasoo pepeawabena, sumusoo koomadoopu,
54005010	mu numu sakwa oo sopedakwatoo ka besa mu tumatuguna, tu doodooamu besa mabetseapu, wakwawaꞌa besa matuguna, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina, mu tutuha manedu numu tuwow, yise noꞌobatusoo besa matugudu.
54005011	Mu sususuꞌa tu kookoomamu tuikupu sakwa gi mu numu nanesootuhibu-wi tutummatzipana, ka gisoo pepeawabena. Umu toetzegoekwu oona nonobe-too meana numu nesootzemana gi pumme nehane-kwitu sapa ewa tuukwena. Tooe umu ka Te Pabeꞌe, “Ooosapa nu mu nanesootuhi tummatzikwu,” mee netammase sapa, umu sumuna koomadoose ka tu unnepu gi mayohokwu.
54005014	Nu meeoo mu netamma mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo sususuꞌa sakwa koomadoose ka dooamu-gana mu mabetsea, ka mu tu nobe-witu tuwazoo. Oꞌno umu gi nanesootzeꞌma.
54005015	Umu-matu mooasoo ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, ka sutakoo podo manekapu.
54005016	Mu gi kookoomamu-gaꞌyoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu nanumu-gana, umuoosoo sakwa mu mabetsea. Oꞌno yise mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, gi kookoomamu-gakoo, gi oekoo nanumu-gakoo, gi natummatzidu, umuoo sakwa umu tummatzi.
54005017	Mu wakwaꞌetse ka besa tunematuguna umuoo sakwa ka mu numu nanesootuhipe tunedyooe yise oo-koobakwisoo natumanakakwu.
54005018	Soo Te Naa unnena ooonneꞌyoona mee nabotugupu, “Soo pookoo puu ka numu yasa tummatzise umu sakwa oo-matoo mesoo tuka.” Yise, “Soo tooe haga tooe numu tummatzidu sakwa punnoꞌo natumanakaku ka tu tutummatzi-kwi.”
54005019	Tamme gi numu nakaꞌoedyukupana ka mu numu moohedu mu wakwaꞌetse nesootzema. Waahoo tooetoo pihoo numu ooka suda oo tumatuguna poonnedusoo ookow waha, mu saaꞌa mu nakaꞌoedyukudooa.
54005020	U sakwa ka mu wakwaꞌetse-matu suda tumatugudu numu-koobenatoo bi, oꞌno umu susumudu saaꞌa gi oo-waꞌnesoo manedooa.
54005021	Noꞌoko nanana sumu-kwaꞌnesoo nematugu. Nu ka mu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka umu Te Naa tutummatzidu-no ka nuka tu tunemanekuna u tuukwe, “U sakwa noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana gi numu tutzeapana.”
54005022	U ka numu moohedu manekwuse, oetu mooe soohanenummese, oꞌno u ka u mi-ma oo-ma matuguse oo nanesootuhikukwu. Ka numu suda manakwe gi umu-ma tzabepana. Ooosapa besa tumatuguno.
54005023	Ka baa hebena gi ookow suuꞌmu hebepana, huutsekoo atsa tutzaꞌemukwa baa tuwazoo, oꞌno u numua-witu besa yugwekwu. Oꞌno yise u gi ooosapa tuoeyaꞌe.
54005024	Susumudu numu ka suda tumatuguse noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwatoo ka menoꞌo. Susumudu numu ka suda tu tumatuguna tooe watsetugupana mu numu saaꞌa oetu naka.
54005025	Susumudu ka besa manena noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwadoo. Tooe mu numu gi oo nakase sapa, saaꞌa umu oo sopedakwadoo, gi oosoo ooosapa nawatsetugu.
54006001	Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka meeoo pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea tooe nawangaꞌa-waꞌne manepunnepana.
54006002	Mu numu hemma how yugwedu sakwa tubetse tunakabetseꞌa umu ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tummatzina ka besa mu soobedyana.
54006003	Umu atasoo numu tunedyooedu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa unnepu nagedu,
54006004	umu meeoo nasooyugwedu, “Numme numu ooonakwa unu sokwama,” meeꞌe, pana umu gi hemma sopedakwatoo. Umu numu-no tu nanepeduguna nananuusoogwedukuna, nanasagwaꞌekuna suda nananetammana, suda manakwe.
54006005	Soo numu ka sukwe nanahana gi ka toge-kwitu sopedakwatoo. Umu numu meeoo sokwama soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa podo meana ewow hemma hee-gakoo. Pana gi!
54006006	Mu numu ka Te Naa besa podo meana gi hemma soogwaꞌe, mooasoo besa nasootuhaꞌe.
54006007	Tamme ka nadooaꞌadoose, gi hee-gana yaaꞌa teepu-kooba numu petu tamme yise ka yaꞌese noꞌokosoo hemma yaanoko te heetooꞌapu maꞌwukakwu.
54006008	Tamme ka tukapu noko ka pukwi te namasuana mooasoo hee-gana gi hemmasoo soosookwi-waꞌne tabua.
54006009	Mu numu ka ewahoosoo hemma soogwina besakoo nanemooagakwu. Umu tubetse unu hemma soogwikwu oosoosoo yise kadoo mu mayugwekwu.
54006010	Noꞌobatusoo soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-tamme kemmakwu ka unusoo te tusoogwipunne. Susumudu numu ka unu tusoogwina umuoo ka Te Naa besa po ooemota manekayakwe, yise puusoo suda namasokwamayakwe.
54006011	Timothy, u mow Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukudu. Gi hemma sookwipana ka Te Naa besa po nagenoꞌo: Besa tumatuguna, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, noꞌoko numu soobedyana, besa numu matuguna. Ooosapa oo nageno tooe hemma tooe how manegena sapa.
54006012	U sakwa tubetse unusoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku. Uusoo nanemabetseano, oꞌno saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo besakoo meadooa. U deaꞌa ka Te Naa tunetammana mayohona u baa-wi namatzakana ewow numu tunedyooꞌe ka umu natunedyooepu-witu.
54006013	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemamakwupu ookahoo soo Te Pabeꞌe-no umuoo
54006015	Ka Te Naa tu sooyugwena oe manepetuse, soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petudooa soo Te Naa o unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, noꞌoko hemma nemadabuedu, noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa naduꞌyadu. Tamme ooosapa oo nesookwugikwu.
54006016	Te Naa suuꞌmu numu magwetzoidu, gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma ooonakwakoo pooha-gana soo oo pooha oo naꞌoonnakwi kootabedooapunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Gi hemma putsageꞌe mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka unu oo pooha-gakoo. Gi haga oo poonnedu. Gi haga oo poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tuwow noꞌyoona numu tooe hanotu tooe sakwa oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Numu ooosapa sakwa oo tubetseyi, noꞌyoona hemma oosoo nematunagakwudu. Togesapa.
54006017	Ka mu numu ewow hee-gakoo meeoo netamma, “Gi ka mu numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana.” Umu sakwa gi ka hemma tu hee-ga-ma nasoonatzipana, ka Te Naa-ma suuꞌmu nasoonatzi. Oosoo noꞌoko hemma-ma te sootuhina besa pumatoo te masokwamana, oosoo ka noꞌokosoo hemma hee-gana.
54006018	Umu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo sakwa besa tumatuguna ka numu besa tummatzi. Umu sakwa mu tutuha manedu mesoo hee-maka. Soo Te Naa ka oo mu tumatuguse ka hemma besa mu hee-ga-ma umu-matoo makodyukwuse, oꞌno saaꞌa umu nasootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baa petugase.
54006020	E puaꞌa Timothy, ooosapa oo sumayu ka Te Naa ume netammapu. Gi ka mu numu ooosapa nanahadu noꞌoko hemma nesopedakwatoo mee unnedu nakabetseapana.
54006021	Susumudu gi kaaheno tunakabetseana umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe po ooemota manekayakwe. “Soo Te Naa sakwa u tubetse sootuhi,” meeꞌe nu u nanesootuhikute.
55001001	Paul tubona. Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus meeoo netamma, “Nu ka Paul netutzeakwu oosoo saaꞌa ume tummatzikwu. Oosoo mu numu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedooa. Oosoo mu numu tuukwekwu, nu yow mu numu magwetzoikwudu.” Soo Te Naa God Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-no meeoo nuka tunemanekute, “Mu numu tuukwe Te Pabeꞌe mu magwetzoikwu.”
55001002	E puaꞌa, e tunedyooepu Timothy-matoo e tubona. Nu u nanesootuhikute soo Te Naa-no soo Te Pabeꞌe besa u mabetsea, u sootuhi, u magwetzoi.
55001003	Nu besa soonamme u ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna. U mooꞌa Lois mee naneadu mooe tunakaꞌoedyukupu-gaꞌyoo, oꞌno yise u pea Eunice mee naneadu punnoꞌo. Nu punnoꞌo ooosapa Te Naa nakabetsea umu te nanamooatupu-waꞌne. Nu u nanesootuhikute. Nu oo soomaꞌyu u suda soonamme ka ume e maꞌwukase. Nu besa u poonnese yise nu besa soonammekwu.
55001006	U sakwa u pooha nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ookow u poohamaka, ka u-ma e matuguse.
55001007	Soo Te Naa tu besa pooha-ma te sootuhipu ooonneꞌyoona tamme unu nanasoopedyadu. Oꞌno yise tamme gi nasoogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tuukwemeana.
55001008	U sakwa mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tuukwena gi nanenasookwipana. Gi nu-ma nasookwipana, nu Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutuma. Gi saaꞌa suipana ka mu numu te tuukweꞌe ka besa naꞌunnedu, tooe tamme mu tumooꞌoo sapa. U ka Te Naa mayukese besa nasootuhikwu oꞌno yise u gi nasookwikwu.
55001009	Tooe gi te besow sapa soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu. Oosoo te tutzeapu gisoo ka teepu matabuena. Oosoo meeoo te netamma, “Nuga besa podo mea.”
55001010	Menoꞌo yise, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yaa ka teepu-kooba petuse ka Etzaꞌa tunetammana ka mu numu tuina tzadyooiku yise noꞌoko mu Te Naa besa unnepu-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu magwetzoi.
55001011	Nu nanetutzeapu ka besa naꞌunnedu wahakwuse.
55001012	Menoꞌo nu nakwutumapana mu numu nu tuukweꞌe ka nuga pukwi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Nu ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse sopedakwatoo. Oosoo e tummatzikwu, nu yise mu numu tuukwekwu ka besa naꞌunnedu yow teepu-koobasoo oo petunoꞌo-kwitoo tooe. Ooonneꞌyoona nu gi nanenasookwaꞌe.
55001013	U sakwa ooosapa mu numu tunedyooe ka ume e tunedyooe-kwaꞌnesoo. Umuoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna noꞌoko numu besa soobedya. U ka ꞌyoo manena mu numu tzapoonnekute u ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus podo meana.
55001014	U sakwa besa oo mabetseana ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ume oo sootuhipu. Tamme noꞌyoona ka oo Besa Pooha-matu nasootuhipu.
55001015	Ewaꞌyoo mu Asia-wiꞌyoona kemmatu nu-ma nasookwaꞌe. Phygelus-no Hermogenes punnoꞌo.
55001016	Soo Onesiphorus ka Rome-wi petu, unu manena e mayu. Oosoo gi nu-ma nasookwaꞌe oosoo ooosapa e nenoyugwe, nu meeoo nanesootuhi, soo Te Naa sakwa oo sootuhi ka saaꞌa numu-witu nemadabuena. U mooasoo noꞌoko ka hemma besa nuka oo tumatugukupu sopedakwatoo ka Ephesus-wiꞌyoona.
55002001	U sakwa yise, e puaꞌa, ohobu tusooyugwe manepunne ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ume sootuhi.
55002002	Ewaꞌyoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu e naka, ka umu Te Naa besa unnepu e tuukweꞌe. U sakwa mana numu-nagakwi oo wahanumme oꞌno umu punnoꞌo numu tunedyooe meakwu. Umu punnoꞌo numu moohekwudu.
55002003	Tooe ume tu netumooꞌoo sapa sakwa u oho maneno. Gi sakwa puu soo numu mummesoo nasooyugwe-kwi manepana ka Te Pabeꞌe podo meakwuse. U sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetamma mayohomea.
55002005	Soo numu puu ka wutokoꞌo tuateana oo nanematugutoosoo tumayohonokwu. Tamme sakwa puu Te Pabeꞌe tamme nematugutoosoo maneno.
55002006	Soo gi tooetsebu numu puu tumasuakuse puusoo oo-matoo mooehane. Tamme nasootuhikwu ka unu tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
55002007	U sakwa ka ume e tuukwepu-witu unu soohanenummese, oꞌno u oo nakasopedakwadookwu. Soo Te Naa u tummatzina u oo nakasopedakwadookwu.
55002008	U sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe soomayu. Tu yaꞌe-wikoo oosoo namayodapu. O oosoo Te Pabeꞌe. Nu ooosapa mu numu tuukweꞌe eka Te Naa besa unnepu.
55002009	Nu ka mu numu tuukwena ka Te Naa besa unnena, umu yise e tumooꞌoo, e wutuma suda tumatugupu numu-waꞌne. Pana ka Te Naa unnepu gi netakone-waꞌneꞌyoo.
55002010	Nu ooosapa oo oedyukute ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu te manekena. Oꞌno soo Te Naa te netutzeana tamme saaꞌa tunakaꞌoedyukudooa, yise namagwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mu magwetzoise saaꞌa mu bikekwu Te Naa-matoo. Umu yise ooosapa oo-baaꞌyookwu.
55002011	Soo te hoobea puu meeoo naꞌunne meꞌa, Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokuna-koobatoo nabatsase, tamme oo-matoosoo meakwu.
55002012	Tamme ka ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka mu numu tamme netumooꞌoo sapa oꞌno tamme saaꞌa oo-no mu numu nemadunagadooa. Tamme ka mu numu-ma suina ka Te Pabeꞌe gi nanena-maꞌyoona. Oosoo punnoꞌo saaꞌa gi te nanena-maꞌyoodooa meeꞌe.
55002013	Tooe tamme ka gi te unnepu mayohona sapa, oosoo puu ooosapa tu unnepu mayoho, oosoo gi esayidu.
55002014	U sakwa ooosapa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tuukwe, “Soo Te Naa gi ka tu unnepu-koobatu mu naha tuungu.” Umu ka nahana gi hemma besa nemadabue. Gi hownnekoo kaaheno oo nemayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu numu ooka nakadu Te Naa po oowemota neyugwe.
55002015	U sakwa ooosapa tubetse besa mu tunedyooe. Oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa, “U tookwa besa numu tunedyooepu,” mee u netammadooa. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu besa kaaheno mu numu tunedyooena oꞌno u gi suda soonammekwu.
55002016	Ka tooe mu numu nananepetukute sapa gi nakaꞌoedyukupana. Soo meeoo naꞌunnewunudu nanakwingaꞌasoo ka Te Naa po kwingaꞌa numu nemayugwe.
55002017	Soo suda naꞌunnedu numu tookoo pehekudu tuoeba-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo puu paba haano-wi manena kadooꞌoo numu mayugwe. Mu naana Hymenaeus-no Philetus mee nananeadu umu puu ooonneꞌyoo, ooosapa numu-no nahayakwe.
55002018	Umu puu Te Naa tubetse po-wiꞌyoona mukwakapu ka mu numu esayaekuna, “Soo numu ka yaꞌese, gi yotse-waꞌneꞌyoo,” mee mu numu nemooaga. Susumudu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu, ka Te Naa po oemota neyugwe.
55002019	Soo Te Naa ka besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeoo tunetamma, “Nu umu e dooamu sopedakwatoo. Soo tooe haga tooe e tooꞌe mee unnedu sakwa ka suda tu manena maꞌwu.”
55002020	Ka pabow nobe-wi puu ewaꞌyoo unu nanenagadu tseda nahane. Umu-matu ka oa tupe-ma namadabuedu, susumudu ka ese tupe-ma namadabuedu. Susumudu gi nanenagadu pakwena teepu-ma namadabuedu suu tseda tuwow. Umu unu nanenagadu tseda puu gi nabebuꞌa, umu gi nanenagadu tooe nabebuꞌa pana gi hownneꞌyoo.
55002021	Tamme ka gi suda manena, tamme ka unu nanenagadu tseda-waꞌne. Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa manewabe manekwu. Tamme yise ooosapa noꞌyoona besakoo tumayohonokwu.
55002022	U sakwa gi ka suda tusooyugwedu namahane-kwitu soohanepana. U sakwa kaaheno ka besow podo mea, unusoo Te Naa nakaꞌoedyuku. U sakwa ka mu numu soobedyana, gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemapana.
55002023	Soo tooe hayoo tooe naꞌunnewunudu gi pukooba numu naha-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka oo manena tamme nanamanidyunakute.
55002024	Soo nanesootuhidu numu tunedyooedu sakwa gi nidyupupana. Noꞌoko besa numu matuguna numu tunedyooe. Ka tooe how tooe suda pumme tusootunagaꞌa sapa gi suda mu numu soobedyapana.
55002025	Mu gi toge tusoohanedu numu besa kaaheno tunedyooe gi mu sootuꞌadyipana. Oꞌno sumuna soo Te Naa kaaheno mu mayugwekwu ka sutakoo podo mu meꞌa. Oꞌno umu oo nakasopedakwadoona ka Te Naa unnepu yise oo besa podo meakwu.
55002026	Oꞌno mu suda tumayugwedu gi ooosapa tu kwase mu-kooba wumakute. Oosoo sumu noꞌoko mu takoꞌne. Umu ooosapa oo unnetoo manakwe, pana menoꞌo oosoo mu tzamaꞌwu.
55003001	U sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna-koobenasoo oo nakasopedakwadoo tamme unusoo manena Te Naa podo meakwu.
55003002	Pudusoo mu numu tooe hownnekoo tooe nanasuda manekwu: Unu puusoo nanakamakukwu, moogoobukwu, paba nasooyugwekwu, nidyupukwu, gi too sosokwamakwu, tu dooamu gi mabetseakwu, numu nesootzemakwu, numu wohoꞌnekwu, suda tu namatuguna gi soomuꞌwakwu, tu pupuaꞌamu wohoma umu-witu tuukwena, gi ka Te Naa nanesootamakwu. Puusoo natamme-too hemma nasoohanekukwu, gi Te Naa nakaheesoobedyakwu.
55003006	Mu gi totogeꞌyoona numu ka mooasoo gi totogekoo momokoꞌne mu nonobe-toosoo etzaga nemooaga. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwedu.
55003007	Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseana ka tooe haꞌyoo tooe naꞌunnedu-ma nakatsape. Umu noꞌobatusoo Te Naa unnepu sukwe nakana Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseadu.
55003008	Mu suda numu tunedyooedu, ka momokoꞌne nemooagana ka Te Naa tuwazoo wohoꞌne. Ka oꞌnosoo mu Jannes-no Jambres mee nananeadu ka Moses wohonepu. Umu ooosapa suda tusooyugwena gi ka togekoo nakaꞌoedyukudu.
55003009	Pudusoo mu numu mu sopedakwadookwu, ka gi togeꞌyoona, numu sukwe nemooagadu.
55003010	U mooasoo e sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa besaꞌhoo podo e meꞌa. U ka e natunedyooepu mooasoo naka. Nu tuwazoo noꞌoko numu unu soobedya. Tooe ka mu numu nuka wohoꞌne sapa, nu togesoo Te Naa nakabetseanoꞌo.
55003011	Umu e tooꞌe batsa ka ona Antioch, Iconium, noko Lystra mee nananeadu-wiꞌyoona, pana soo Te Naa nu-kooba tummatzise nu namagwetzoi.
55003012	Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus besa podo meadu mu numu oo wohoꞌnekwu.
55003013	Pana umu suda numu tunedyooedu unusoo sutaꞌyookwu. Umu kukummaꞌakoosoo nemooagana puusoo tuwazoo nanemooꞌagapana gi oo sopedakwadoo.
55003014	U sakwa yise ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyuku ka nuka togekoo ume tunedyooepu nageno. U ka oo sopedakwadoona,
55003015	ka tuhaꞌyoonasoo u ka Te Naa unnena nabotuguna neana oosoo u magwetzoina, u tunedyooenokwu. Te Pabeꞌe Jesus u magwetzoikwu ka pumme u nakaꞌoedyukute.
55003016	Noꞌyoona mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Naasoo tunetammapu nabotugu. Soo Te Naa unnepu-makoo kaaheno natunedyooemeꞌa tooe ka gi kaaheno te tunakaꞌoedyukute sapa yise soo Te Naa tu besa podo te mameakute.
55003017	Oꞌno yise mu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu namabetzapepunnena ka tooe how tooe besa tumatuguna.
55004001	Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea oosoo pudusoo kodyu petukwu. Pudusoo kodyu petuse, noꞌoko numu nemadunagakwu. Saaꞌa yise oosoo mu numu toogesoo modu umu mooasoo tuipu tuwazoo nemadunagakwu oosoo te manena sopedakwatoo. Nu ekow naꞌunnedu mu tubetse tuukweꞌe Te Naa yise Te Pabeꞌe nuka tunemanekuna.
55004002	U sakwa mu numu tubetse tuukwe ka Te Naa unnepu. U sakwa ooosapa namabetseapunnena ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe mu numu tuukwe. U sakwa mu numu tuukwe haꞌoo soo numu kaaheno ka Te Naa besa podo meana, gi nidyupuna. U sakwa meeoo soonammena, “Mu numu besa mesoo manakwe yise ooosapa mu tunedyooeno.”
55004003	Ka saaꞌa mu numu gi oo nakabetseakwu, pana umu ewow nanakummaꞌakoosoo pumme tunedyooedu pumme mu tuukweꞌe oo-tamme nakasokwama manepetugakwu.
55004004	Umu ka numu tubetse natunedyooedu gi nakabetseana, ka a naꞌesayaena suuꞌmu oedyukukwu.
55004005	U sakwa ooosapa meeoo soonamme. U sakwa ka ume tu wohoꞌne gi Te Naa unnepu wahamakwupana. U sakwa ooosapa mu numu gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nakadu tuukwe. U sakwa yise ka Te Naa ume tunetammakuna nakabetsea.
55004006	Nu pudusoo nabatsakoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo. U saaꞌa mu numu tunedyooedooa nuga kapi.
55004007	Nu tubetse unu sutakoo wohonese, oo makwuhoo. Nu ka Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna mayoho.
55004008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno tunemadabuedu. Ka saaꞌa oosoo ka mu numu nemadabuena, oosoo nuka sootuhikwu, nu ka kaaheno meadabena. Gi nuka suuꞌmu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu sootuhikwu umu ka oo kodyu petukwuna petzabena ka oo wutooꞌena.
55004009	U sakwa yabesoo nu-matoo kemma.
55004010	Demas mee naneadu noꞌoko hemma hee-gana Te Naa ooonakwa oo sooyugwewunu. E maꞌwukase, ka Thessalonica mee naneadu-witoo mea. Soo Crescens mee naneadu punnoꞌo mea ka teepu Galatia mee naneadu-kwitoo. Soo Titus punnoꞌo ka teepu Dalmatia mee naneadu-kwitoo.
55004011	Soo Luke mee naneadu suuꞌmu yow nu-baa. U sakwa ka Mark bike, oosoo sakwa besa e tummatzi ka mu numu Te Naa unnepu-witu tuukwe.
55004012	Nu ka Tychicus mee naneadu Ephesus-witoo tayapu.
55004013	U ka waketoo kemmana, u sakwa e wega gwuuke. Nu ona ka Troas mee naneadu-wi ka Carpus mee naneadu-baa oo maꞌwuke. Pu-witu e neakwuna e tubope noꞌoko saaꞌa haneke.
55004014	Soo Alexander oa wehepu mahanedu tubetse unu e nekwohoꞌnepu. U sakwa gi oo-ma tzabepana, oosoo tubetse unu ka naꞌunnedu netumooꞌoo. Soo Te Naasoo oo sopedakwatoo ka tu unnepu oosoo saaꞌa oo nemadunagadooa.
55004016	Nu ka mooeꞌugasoo nuka tu nehane gi haga e tummatzi. Umu noꞌyoona e maꞌwuhooka. Soo Te Naa sakwa oo soomuꞌwu ka mu manena mee nu nanesootuhi.
55004017	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe e tummatzi. E sootuhise, nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu tubetse tuukweꞌe. Noꞌyoona mu wakwawaꞌa oetu naka. Nu yise tooe nabatsakwuse sapa namagwetzoi.
55004018	Soo Te Pabeꞌe e mabetseakwu noꞌoko ka sutakoo takonegena oꞌno yise nu ka Te Naa-matoo mease, oo-baasoo nobe-gakwu. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” tamme sakwa ooosapa nanesootuhi.
55004019	Nu mu Priscilla noko Aquila noꞌoko ka Onesiphorus nobe-kwitu soomaꞌyu.
55004020	Soo Erastus mee naneadu tooesoo ka Corinth mee naneadu-wi. Nu ka Miletus mee naneadu-wiꞌyoona kemmase, ka Trophimus mee naneadu-wi togesoo tuoeyaꞌe.
55004021	Gisoo tu tommo petu sakwa u yaa numme-baa petu. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa u soomaꞌyu.
55004022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sakwa noꞌoko mu sootuhi, “Meeꞌe nu mu nanesootuhikute.”
56001001	Paul ka Titus-matoo tubona. Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa umu te nanamooatupu meeoo tuukwepu, “Nu saaꞌa mu magwetzoidooa.” Oosoo gi naesayaepu. Soo Te Naa unnena menoꞌo oo-toogoo manakwe, oꞌno soo Te Naa nuka tunetammakupu mee naꞌunakwe, “U ka e unnena mu numu tunedyooekwu.” Nu yise oo nakabetsease, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu tuukwekwu ka Te Naa besa podo a nameadabekwuna. Oꞌno ka saaꞌa mu Te Naa-baa petugadooa.
56001004	U Titus, e puaꞌa, u nu-kwaꞌnesoo unu tunakaꞌoedyukute. Nu u nanesootuhaekuyakwe, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no te magwetzoikwudu, besa u sootuhina ooosapa u magwetzoinokwu.
56001005	Nu ka teepu Crete mee naneadu-wi u maꞌwuke nu u tuukwepu u numu nanesootuhi tunedyooekwutu, tooe hanotu tooe mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu mu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooekwutu e netutzeadooa.
56001006	Mu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooekwutu, sakwa besaꞌyoo nanetutzea, umu ka Te Naa doodooamu mabetseakwuse, gi pumme nesootzema-waꞌnekoo. Umu sakwa gi etzaga naneꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi besa nasooyugwepana, gi etzaga sutadu, gi baagoedu, gi nidyapu, umu sakwa mu wakwawaꞌa mesoo tummatzidu, besa tunakabetseadu, besa tusoohanedu, kaaheeno ka Te Naa podo meadabedu. Umu sakwa susuꞌmuoosoo nodukwa-gana, mu doodooamu punnoꞌo tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Mu doodooamu sakwa tu naanapuaꞌamu nakabetseana, gi noꞌosoo manepana. Umu nanesootuhi numu tunedyooedu sakwa ka tubetse naꞌunnedu pumme tu tunedyooepu-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukumo, oꞌno ka kaaheno mu numu tu tunedyooena sopedakwatoo, yise ka mu numu nemooagadu kaaheno nemayugwe.
56001010	Umuoo numu nemooagadu besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee naneyugwe. Umuoo ka te nanamooatupu Jew numu tumayohona numu tunedyooeꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu owemota mu nemayugwe.
56001011	Umuoo ka mu numu nonobe-kwitu suda neyugwena, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu kummaꞌakoosoo tunedyooeꞌe. Umuoo numu, oo numu tunedyooe tabua ka ewowsoo obetoo tusoogwipunnena. Mu suda numu tunedyooedu sakwa nanetzadyoiku.
56001012	Soo nana Crete-witu puusoo yooonne-kwitu wahana meeoo unakwe, “Numme Crete-witu numu unu esagoedu, sutakoo nunuꞌu-waꞌne, unu totoetzeabuna, unu moomoogoobu.”
56001013	Esoo umu-witu nawahana togesapa naꞌunnedu. U sakwa yise kaaheno mu nemayugwe, oꞌno yise umu ka toge naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukukwu.
56001014	Oꞌno yise umu numu gi ka mu numu nemooagadu nakabetsea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
56001015	Tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu soo tooe hee tooe tamme-too besaꞌyoo. Pana umu numu sutaꞌyoo ewa nabeatse-gaꞌyoo.
56001016	Umuoo ka Te Naa unnepu sopedakwatoo mee naneyugwedu, pana umu ooosapa suda tumatuguyakwe, gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseꞌa.
56002001	U sakwa yise ka Te Naa besa unnepu numu tunedyooe.
56002002	Mu wakwaꞌetse tuukwena umu sakwa besaꞌyookuna, besa tutusooyugwena, gi pumme neꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Te Naa-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu, noꞌoko numu soobesaꞌyookuna ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe.
56002003	U sakwa mu pepeawabe tuwazoo tuukweꞌe, umuoo sakwa punnoꞌo ooosapa nanesootuhi, ooosapa besa tumatuguna, gi tunesootzepana, gi baagoepana, ka hemma besow numu tunedyooe.
56002004	Umu sakwa mu momokoꞌne meeoo tunedyooe, meeoo mu netammana, “Mu koomamu besa soobedyana, mu doodooamu tuwazoo too besa mabetseana,
56002005	gi kummaꞌakoosoo maꞌemukwakupana, mu nobe besa mabetseana, besa numu matuguna, tu koomma nakabetseana, oꞌno yise mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu nesookwuga.”
56002006	U sakwa mu pudu nanana tuwazoo meeoo tuukweꞌe, “Gi nanemaꞌemukwapana gi tusoomatzooepana.”
56002007	U sakwa ooosapa besa tumatugu, u ka Te Naa besa podo meanoꞌo, oꞌno yise umu u-kwaꞌnesoo. U sakwa mu numu tubetse tunedyooe.
56002008	Soo u unnekwuna sakwa besaꞌyoo, oꞌno mu numu gi te netumooꞌoona, te nesootzemakwu.
56002009	Noꞌyoona mu numu ka hemma how yugwena sakwa ka pumme nedyawedu nakabetsea. Umu hemma how yugwedu sakwa besa mu masokwamana gi umu-no sukwe nahapana.
56002010	Umu sakwa gi hemma umu-makoo tuduhapana, oꞌno mu numu Te Naa unnepu nesoogwugaꞌekwu.
56002011	Soo Te Naa besa unnepu noꞌobatusoo numu-baa nanaka petugapu, soo Te Naa ka pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu sootuhina, mu magwetzoaꞌe tooe gi besa mu tumatuguse sapa, soo Te Naa ka suda mu tumatuguna soomuꞌwakwu.
56002012	Te Naa unnepu meeoo te tunedyooꞌe, ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka suta mu manena soomuꞌwa. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme kaaheno ka Te Naa podo mea, ooosapa besa tumatuguna, gi naneꞌemukwapupana, gi tusoomatzooepana ka yow teepu-koobaꞌyoona.
56002013	Ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwuna tamme sookwaꞌe, mee tamme nanesootuhiyakwe.
56002014	Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, oosoo te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwase, besa gi totsabu te mayugwe, tu doodooamu te mayugwe. Oꞌno yise tamme ooosapa besa tumatugumokwu.
56002015	Yooonnekoo hekwitu sakwa u numu tunedyooe. Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyukwena, mu ume gi nakabetseadu kaaheno nemayugwe, u ka mu moohena. Mu numu sakwa saaꞌa gi u-maꞌyoona nanekoepana ka meeoo pumme u tuukweꞌe.
56003001	U sakwa ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nemayuku umu ka teepu-koobatu pumme moohedu nakabetseana, ewa nanabesa tumatuguna, besa sokwama.
56003002	Umu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, gi nanahapana tuwazoo. Umu sakwa noꞌobatusoo numu besa matugu.
56003003	Mu numu uga noꞌyoona gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme uga ka gisoo tunakaꞌoedyukuna punnoꞌo ooonneꞌyoosoo. Tamme uga gi oo nakasopedakwadoona gi oo nakabetsea, ka tamme tu nemooaga, tamme meeoo tusooyugwe. Tamme nanasuda manena, unu nidyupuna, ka kummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, gi ooosapa nanapetsabedu.
56003004	Ooonneꞌyoopana soo Te Naa te soobedyana, te sootuhaꞌe. Tooe gi te besaꞌhoo sapa, soo Te Naa te magwetzoipu. Tutuha soo Te Naa te sooyugwena ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-matoo taya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase, yise suda te tumatuguna nematzagakwunise te magwetzoi. Oosoo yise tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise atasoo te magugwe. Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meana tamme oo-baa petugadooa, ka tuise.
56003008	Esoo naꞌunnedu togesapa. U sakwa ka meeoo naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooe, oꞌno yise umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu oo-toogoo manekwu gi oo soomuꞌwana, oꞌno ka saaꞌa besa tumatugudooa, ka oo manena umu besa numu tummatzikwu.
56003009	Ka mu Jew numu tumayohona noko te natugwengapu, te mooe natunedyooepu-koobatoo gi nanahapana, soo numu nanahana gi hemma numu tummatzaꞌe.
56003010	Ka mu numu nanahaꞌa, tooe huu tooe mu netammapunnese gi umu-no ooosapa nahawunupana, mu tsasobedya.
56003011	Umu ooonneꞌyoo numu sutaꞌyoona noꞌyoona numu oo sopedakwadoo ka gi mu togeꞌyoona.
56003012	Nu yaa Nicapolas-wi tomokwu, nu ka Artemas tooetoo ka Tychicus u-matoo tayakwu. Ka u-baa oo petugase nu-baa saaꞌa nobenge.
56003013	Yabesoo ka Zenas numu-koobatoo yadooadu, ka Apollos noko taya, tooe hemma tooe mu sookwina u sakwa mu tummatzi.
56003014	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa unusoo tunakabetsena, oꞌno umu ka mu numu natummatziba sookwidu tummatzikwu.
56003015	Noꞌyoona umu nu-batu u nemaꞌyu. Ne pupuaꞌamu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo ne nemayu. “Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhaꞌe,” mee numme mu nanesootuhikute.
57001001	Paul tubona, nu nakwutuma ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo. Soo e puaꞌa Timothy nu-no ka Philemon-matoo tubokwu.
57001002	Ka Philemon nodukwa Apphia, mu tooa Archippus yise ka u-baa nanesootuhidu-matoo tuwazoo tuboꞌo.
57001003	Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe-no sakwa besa mu matuguna mu magwetzoi.
57001004	U noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu soobedyana yise tubetse unu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunaꞌoedyukute, nu u nuka. Ooonneꞌyoona nu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikunoꞌo.
57001006	U ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakaꞌoedyukuduna unusoo besa tumatugunokwu ka numme-no Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meana. Oꞌno sakwa yise u oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina.
57001007	Nu u-matoo besa nakasoonamme u ka umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu besa matuguna, besa mu tummatzaꞌe.
57001008	U ka tunakaꞌoedyukuduna, nu sakwa oetoo u tubetse nenoyukwe, ka besa u tumatugu,
57001009	pana nu u sukwe tubenga ka besa u tumatugu, nu ka waetsena unu u soobedya, tooꞌe nu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-koobatoo nakwutumapana.
57001010	Nu ka eka nana Onesimus mee naneadu ume uga tummatzidu nekwaꞌe. Nu ka Onesimus Te Naa-tamme nanesootuhi tunedyooepu ka togesoo nakwutumana.
57001011	Ka oꞌnosoo oosoo Onesimus uga u-tamme gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, menoꞌo yise oosoo unu ta besaꞌyookute.
57001012	Tooe nu besa oo soobedya manepetuse sapa, menoꞌo yise nu punowsoo u-matoo oo taꞌya.
57001013	Nu menoꞌo nakwutuma ka mu numu tuukwena ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu, soo Onesimus sakwa nu-baaꞌyoonasoo e tummatzi mee nu tooe soonamme.
57001014	Nu gi u nenoyukwe u natummatzi tuunguna pana u sakwa e tummatzi ka uusoo meeoo soonammena
57001015	Soo Onesimus gi haaꞌnotu uga u maꞌwupunne yise oosoo ooosapa u-noꞌyookwu yaa manakwana, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu manepuna.
57001016	Soo Onesimus gi numu sukwe tummatzidu oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ooonneꞌyoona ta ka Onesimus unu soobedya menoꞌo.
57001017	Ta ka besa napuaꞌana, nu meeoo u netamma, “U sakwa besa ka Onesimus matugu nuka u matugu-kwaꞌnesoo.”
57001018	Ka tooe how tooe ume oo matuguse ka Onesimus hemma ume nakutzikute, nuka oe tunekwi.
57001019	Nu nugasoo mi-ma u-matoo tuboꞌo, nu saaꞌa oe u tumanagakudooa. U sakwa gi oo soomuꞌwapana ka nuka u nakutzina, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku u mayugwe.
57001020	E puaꞌa, u ka yoo manena, besa e masoonammekwu.
57001021	Nu eka tubope u-matoo taꞌya. Nu oo sopedakwatoo u ume e netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu, yise ewasoo oo-koobakwisoo tuwazoo.
57001022	Mu sakwa nu-toogoo tumabetsabepunne. Mu ka e nanesootuhikuna ka nakwutumana e natzamaꞌwukwuna, nu sumuna mu-baa nobene-gadooa.
57001023	Epaphras mee naneadu nakwutumadu nu-waꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumayohokudu punnoꞌo a besana mu sookwikute.
57001024	Umu nuka tutummatzidu Mark, Aristarchus, Demas-no Luke u-tamme punnoꞌo meeoosoo tusooyugwe.
57001025	“Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus sakwa ooosapa besa mu sootuhi,” meeꞌe nu mu nanesootuhikute.
58001001	Ka tubetse besaꞌhoo Te Naa Besaa Tooa, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-witu nu mu tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Oosoo tubetse besaꞌyoo. Oꞌnosoo ka teepu kadookoosoo soo Te Naa ka tu Besaa Tooaꞌa mee netamma, “Ka teepu matabuese saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma uusoo nemadabue oo-koobatoo, ka Ta Besa Pooha taka tunetammakuna.” Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa yadooawabe ka te nanamooatupu tuukweyakwe ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu. Pana menoꞌo yise tamme etzaga oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-witu te netammakupu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa tunetammapu mamakwuse ka tamme suda manekwi nabatsase, menoꞌo yise Te Naa-baa manepetugapu.
58001004	Soo Te Naa puusoo meeoo unakwe, “Soo Mu Pabeꞌe umu nuka tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo ooonakwasoo unu besaꞌyoo.” Soo Te Naa ewa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohamaka ka umu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu ooonakwasoo.
58001005	Ka Te Pabeꞌe soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Menoꞌo nu noꞌoko numu tuukwe, ‘U Nuga Besaa Tooaꞌa,’ “ mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Nu yaahoo u naa. U nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.” Soo Te Naa ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu, gi meeoo netammadu.
58001006	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe yaaꞌa teepu-koobatoo tamme-matoo tayase mee unakwe, “Noꞌyoona umu nuka tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo sakwa oo-matoo nanesootuhi.”
58001007	Ka umu pumme tummatzidu soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Nu umuoo hukwapa noko goso-waꞌnesoo mu matabuꞌe.”
58001008	Ka Tu Tooa soo Te Naa meeoo netamma, “U nu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo.
58001009	U ooosapa noꞌoko hemma nemadabuekwu. U numu ooonakwasoo nasootuhikwu u ka ooosapa besa soomanena.”
58001010	Mee tuwazoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma, “Oꞌnosoo u ka teepu, ka taba, ka muha, yise mu paatoozooba matabuepu.
58001011	Saaꞌa umu, mooatupugoe petuga umu yise kadoo manekwu wanapu-waꞌne. Pana u gi mooatupuyina u gi moobegwa-gakwu.
58001013	U nu-baaꞌyoona ooosapa nu umu ume wohonedu matzooekukwu.” Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu meeoo netamma, “Umu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo gi ka u-waꞌneꞌyoo,
58001014	umu nuga tutummatziwabe.” Tooe tamme gi mu poonnedupana soo Te Naa tamme mu tummatzi tuungu soo Te Naa ka te magwetzoikwuse.
58002001	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unnena besa nakabetsea, tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa po oowemota manepana.
58002002	Oꞌnosoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka te nanamooatupu Te Naa unnena tuukweꞌe. Susumudu umu-matu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyupu.
58002003	Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo te tuukweꞌe soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu. Umu Te Pabeꞌe nakatzimodu oo nakase, ka oo unnena te tuukwe. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu kaaheno te tuukwe soo Te Naa nanasusuꞌmu mu poohamakakwu, oosoo tooe hownne-ma tooe mu sootuhaꞌe, ka Tu Besa Pooha-toohakwi. Ewa nanasookwugaꞌe pooha tumagwetzoigena. Tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme netammana tubetse nakabetsea. Mee te netammana, “Mu sakwa e nakaꞌoedyuku nu mu magwetzoikwu.” Tamme ka gi oo besa unnepu nakabetseana, soo suda te tumatuguna togesapa tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
58002005	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo tubetse netamma, “Saaꞌa u noꞌoko mu numu moohedooa.” Soo Te Naa gi meeoo ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo, pumme tummatzidu, netammadu.
58002006	Sumuꞌyoo numu meeoo tubopu-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa meeoo netammana, “Tooe numme numu gi maawaꞌneꞌyoopana u ne sootuhise ne mabetsea.
58002007	Gi haaꞌnoto numme mu toha kakasa-gakoo menakwutu-ma nasootuhaꞌe pana menoꞌo u tubetse besakoo ne sootuhaꞌe.”
58002008	Te Naa meeoo ne netamma, “Noꞌoko hemma nuga matabuena besa nemadabuedooa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Tamme saaꞌa noꞌoko hemma besa nemadabuekoo, pana menoꞌo gisoo oe manepetu.”
58002009	Ekow naꞌunnedu togesapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Gi haaꞌnoto soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu Te Naa tummatzidu menakwutu-ma nasootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsa soo Te Naa ka meeoo unnena Te Naa te magwetzoise, te sootuhikwu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe unu sootuhaꞌe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu matabuepu-kooba numu oo moohe tuunguna.
58002010	Soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma tu sootumadabuena matabue. Soo Te Naa besa ka Te Pabeꞌe magwetzoi, oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa yise ka tu yaꞌekwikoo namayoda. Ooonekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu moohekena mu nasootuhi-kwitoo.
58002011	Soo Te Pabeꞌe nawaꞌnesoo te mayugwemena, ka Te Naa doodooamu te mayugwena. Oosoo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe manepetu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nasookwina, “E wangaꞌamu, E punneꞌemu,” mee te natubanga.
58002012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo ka Te Naa netamma, “Nu naduyadu pooha hoobea nekwuhukwu ka nanesootuhipe-kwiꞌyoona, ‘Te Naa besaꞌyoo,’ mee ka e wangaꞌamu noko e punneꞌemu tuukwena.”
58002013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe te netamma, “Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Naa-wi nasootzagwiyina.” Soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo ka Te Naa tamme-witu mee netamma, “Nu yow e nanumu-baa E Naa-toohakwi mu e nanumu-gaꞌyoo.”
58002014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yow tamme-baa petuse namanumudoose, yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kadooꞌoo ka sutakoo mayugweke ka tamme goedu tunetammapu oo tubetse tamatzooekupu.
58002015	Oꞌnosoo soo sutaꞌyoo ooosapa te nemooagana te nesuana, “Mu tubetse tuikwu,” mee te netammana. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo pooha kadoo nemayugwekepu.
58002016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu nanumu tummatzikwuse ka yaa teepu-kooba petuse gi ka Tu Naa tummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo-kooba tueyaꞌekwuse.
58002017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo ka tamme-waꞌnesoo manekese, soo Sutaꞌyoo suda oo tooꞌe mane tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe oo nakasopedakwatoo ka sutakoo tamme oo yugwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhina te nanesootuhikute ka Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa tuunguna.
58003001	E nanumu, soo Te Naa te netutzeꞌa tu doodooamu manekwutu yise te magwetzoi. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo soomayu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tubetse besow.
58003002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe te nanesootuhikuna ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukwe ka Te Naa pumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo, ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetsea ka Moses-waꞌne.
58003003	Pana soo Te Pabeꞌe pudu unnepu besaꞌyoo, gi ka mu Jew numu mooa tumayohope ka Moses tamme tuukwe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Moses ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka oo matabuese, ka nobe-tootu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu ka tu nobe-toona ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoona.
58003004	Tooe numu nobe-too sapa soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu.
58003005	Soo Moses, Te Naa besa tuukwewabe, meeoo te tuukwe, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa petudooa.”
58003006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Moses ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka Te Naa God Besaa Tooaꞌa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te moohedooa, ka ooosapa te tunakaꞌoedyukute oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu.
58003007	Ka Te nanamooatupu-witu soo tubope te tuukwe. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe Moses mee naneadu mu numu mooheka ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Tooe umu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Ewasoo (40) tomokapu umu ka gi tunakabetseana. Soo Te Naa meeoo mu netamma, “Nu umuoo maꞌemukwadu gi sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu yise gi ka Te Naa pumme tunetammaku-kwitoo wupetugaꞌa. Ka oonow sukwe hee-kwanaꞌyoona umu yise noꞌyoona tui tzasooa petuga, umu ka gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mee te netamma, “Ka yaa tabeno ka Te Naa mumme yadooe besa oo nakapunne, mu sakwa oo nakabetsea. Mu sakwa gi tusoomatzooepana, ka mu nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌne. Ewasoo (40) tomoka nu ka mu sootuhina, ewa nanabesahoo mu tooꞌe tzapoonnekuna. Pana umu tusoomatzooena gi e nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu tuwazoo e tooꞌe masutaꞌa. Nu yise mu soosakwiku petugase meeoo unakwe, ‘Umu gi e nakaꞌoedyukuna gi e nakabetsea. Umuoo gi pumme e sootuhi-kwi wupetuga-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “ E nanumu, noꞌyoona sakwa tamme besasoo, ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi suda manepana. Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Tubetse Naa besa po kaꞌabepana. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa Besa Podo nanesootuhino oetoo nananenoyugwenona. Oꞌno yise soo suda te tusooyugwena gi suda te wuyugwepunnekwu. Mooasoo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nanumu maneke, tamme tunakaꞌoedyukuna yise ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukunokwu.
58004001	Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Nu mu sootuhikwu.” Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina wupetuga
58004002	gi ka te nanamooatupu-waꞌne. Tooe umu tamme-waꞌnesoo ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana umu gi oo wupetuga, ka pumme oo sootuhina umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
58004003	Tamme menoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa ooosapa besa te sootuhinoꞌo. Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka teepu matabuese oo mamakwupu ka tamme tu sootuhikwuna tamme-too mamakwupunne. Mee naꞌunnepu, “Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma naapahe (6) tabeba-wisoo matabuepu. Soo Te Naa penakwa tabeba kemmadu-kwi gi hemma howyugwe, ka noꞌoko hemma mooasoo mamakwuse.” Ooonneꞌyoona soo te nasootuhipu oꞌnosoo tamme-too nanemamakwupu.
58004006	Soo Te Naa ka numu tu sootuhina besa soobedyana tooe umu te nanamooatupu ka Te Naa unnepu nakapana gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna gi ka Te Naa pumme sootuhi-kwitu wupetugaꞌa.
58004007	Tooe soo numu moohedu Joshua mee naneadu ka mu Jew numu moohepana gi ka Te Naa unusoo tabeba pumme tu tuukwe-kwitoo wupetuga pana gi yow mu tubetse nasootuhinotu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa nayadooawabe David mee naneadu mee unakwe, “Yaa manakwana, ka Te Naa mumme yadooe mu sakwa gi oo nakasoomatzooapana.”
58004009	Soo Te Naa doodooamu tu sootuhikwuna togesoo ooosapa manepunne.
58004010	Tamme ka Te Naa tamme magwetzoipu sopedakwadoona gi tammesoo namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo, tooesoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma nemadabuemea.
58004011	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo besakoo meadabena besakoosoo ka Te Naa nakabetseana gi ka te nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌne manepana, oꞌno soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu.
58004012	Soo Te Naa besa unnepu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Ka Te Naa unnepu-wi oosoo ka te watze tusooyugwena te soogwina tuwazoo nematzatsebooe. Soo Te Naa te tubetse sopedakwadoona noꞌoko hemma te matabuepu poonne oo sopedakwatoo ka te manena. Oosoo tuwazoo te nemadabuekwu tooe te watze tusooyugwe sapa.
58004014	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhi-baa moohedu tamme yise oo sootumma. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukuno. Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo sopedakwatoona gi oo tumayohokute ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo ooosapa suda te mane tuungu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus, Te Naa Besaa Tooa, mooasoo ka Te Naa-baa petugapuna, onona oosoo ooosapa te nanesootuhikute.
58004015	Soo Te Pabeꞌe suda te soonammekute ka tutuha te namanatsayamoꞌo ka mooasoo oosoo puusoo oo-toogoo meapuna. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yise te nanesootuhikute ka oꞌnosoo tooesoo yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo suda oo tooꞌe mane tuungu pana oosoo gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
58004016	Ooonneꞌyoona menoꞌo yise tamme ka Te Naa-matoo mesoo nanetzakwiyaꞌe gi oo-ma suina tooe tamme gi maa-waꞌneꞌyoopana. Soo Te Naa te sootuhina te magwetzoikwu ka suta-kwi te manekena.
58005001	Yaa ka teepu-koobatu susumudu numu soo Te Naa pooha sootuhi, ka suda numu tutumatugukena mu nematzagakwunaꞌe.
58005002	Umu tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo sukwe numu tutuha te soobedya obedasoo besa te matugugena. Ooonneꞌyoona umu ka sutakoo tamme-makoo nematzaga.
58005003	Umu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka sutakoo nematzagana noꞌoko suda te tutumatuguna yise pummesoo suda tumatuguna tuwazoo.
58005004	Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa puu mu numu pooha sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa mu-matu netutzeana mu pooha sootuhaꞌe, gi umu puusoo nanetutzea. Soo Te Naa puu ka te namooatupu Aaron mee naneadu netutzease oo pooha sootuhipu.
58005005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi puusoo meeoo nasooyugwena ka numu nanesootuhi moohekwu. Soo Te Naa puusoo oo netutzeapu, ka numu nanesootuhiku meeoo oo netammana oo pooha-makapu. Soo Te Naa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, “U Nuga Besaa Tooa. Yaa tabeno manakwana noꞌyoona numu u sopedakwadookwu u yow Nuga Besaa Tooa.”
58005006	Penakwa mee tuwazoo oo netamma, “Oꞌnosoo soo besaꞌyoo nanesootuhidu Melchizedek mee naneadu ooosapa besa mu numu nanesootuhikugena. Ka ume e pooha-makase u punnoꞌo ooonnekoosoo pooha-gakwu gi moobegwa-gakoo.”
58005007	Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa nanesootuhiyakwe ka Te Naa-matoo nanetzakwiyina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodakwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhina nakasootuhi, soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseana tooe oo unnena unu namanakwe sapa.
58005008	Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌapana, oosoo Te Naa unnena nakabetsea tooe unu nuummaba wumase pummetu batsase sapa.
58005009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka noꞌoko Te Naa pooha tunetammapu mamakwuse, oꞌno yise saaꞌa oosoo noꞌoko numu pumme nakabetseadu magwetzoikwu.
58005010	Soo Te Naa Tu Besaa Tooaꞌa ka tu pooha nanesootuhipe-matu-ma oo sootuhi ka Melchizedek-waꞌne ka mooasoo meeoo oo netammakese.
58005011	Ka Melchizedek-witu, nu saaꞌa mu tuukwedooa. Pana mu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukuna.
58005012	Wunaꞌme mu oo nakamopana mu ka mumme tu tunedyooena suuꞌmu poohimo. Menoꞌo sakwa mu punnoꞌo mu numu ka Te Naa besa unnena tunedyooe. Mu yise togesoo gi oo nakasopedakwatoo kaaheno hemma manepunnena. Mu oongaꞌa petzedu-waꞌneꞌyoo gi hemma sopedakwadoo. Mu sakwa ka gi etzaga numu tunedyooena mooe natunedyooe ka nanapu manekase a tookoo mesoo tukadu-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa ka besow ka suda namanedu-makoo sopedakwatoo .
58006001	Mooasoo mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu-witu sopedakwatoo ka etzaga numu natunedyooena. Gi yise numme ookowsoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoosoo: ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, ka sutakoo nanematzagakwunina. Ka numu baa-wi namatzakana, ka numu nanesootuhikuna umu-ma pooha matuguyina, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo Te Naa noꞌoko numu mayodakwuna mu tui-kwikoo, ka mu mane-makoosoo mu nemadabuekwu.
58006003	Menoꞌo yise ka Te Naa tamme tummatzaꞌe, nu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnena gisoo ooka nakasopedakwatoodu tuukwekwu.
58006004	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Mooasoo tamme ka te maꞌemukwapu nemawunikese soo Te Naa te sootuhipu ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma te sootuhise yise te magwetzoipu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unnena besaꞌyoo.
58006006	Tamme sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukapana, tamme ka suda te manena manoyugwena gi tamme sumuna punowsoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe manasookwikute ka tunakaꞌoedyukupana suda tumatugukese ka Te Pabeꞌe pudu batsatu-kwaꞌne tamme manakwe.
58006007	Tooe ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe sapa tamme gi besa manakwe, ka gi he-toogoo besow tubewabe-kwaꞌne. Tooe ka tubewabe-koobatu unu powꞌma sapa soo tsaꞌabu suuꞌmu oe naatape, saaꞌa umuoo tsaꞌabu natunikwutu tamme saaꞌa ka tsaꞌabu-waꞌne namatugudooa te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, ka Te Naa besa po te maꞌwukase.
58006009	Nu meeoo mu yadooe pana gi sutaꞌyoo mee nu mu sooyugwe. Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu togesoo besa manakwe, Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.
58006010	Soo Te Naa ooosapa kaaheno tumatugudu. Soo Te Naa oo soomayukwu ka besa mu tumatugupu. Mu ka unu oo soobedyana togesoo oo doodooamu tummatzaꞌe.
58006011	Tamme sakwa gi toetzegoepana ooosapa besa tumatuguno. Mu te nanamooatupu puu besa nasootuhaꞌe, besa-kwitoo wupetuga umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Naa tamme besa sootuhi-kwi petugakwusoo.
58006013	Ka oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa tu mi mayodase ka togesoo te nanamooatupu momoꞌo ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu nuusoo besa u sootuhikwu, ewaꞌyoo numu u-nakwana suakedooa.” Soo Abraham yise besa soonammena tuutooꞌe, ka saaꞌa yise soo Te Naa oo sootuhaꞌe.
58006016	Tamme puu ka te mi mayodase, tamme hemma pooha-gakoo nemaꞌyu. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa puusoo nanemayu gi hemma tu ooonakwa pooha-gakoo. Soo numu ka mayodase tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu kaaheno tuukwekwu.
58006017	Soo Te Naa puu togekoo yadooadu ooosapa, te sootuhikwu mee unnese mu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mee netammase, tamme yise oo nakasopedakwatoo oo tubetse sooꞌoedyukukwu.
58006018	Wahaba-tamme tamme oo nakasopedakwatoo ka togetu-kwikoo tamme oo yadooꞌe soo Te Naa puu gi esapu. Oosoo ka tu mi mayodase puu kaaheno unnekwu. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna, tamme oo magwetzoikwuna tuwazoo, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka besa-kwikoo nanatukwena,
58006019	oo tubetse sopedakwadookwu ka Te Naa-baa te petugakwuna.
58006020	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa-baa petugapu oosoo ooosapa te nanesootuhikute ka Te Naa-matoo gi moobegwa-gakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Melchizedek-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo puu numu nanesootuhikudu.
58007001	Esoo nana numu nanesootuhikuyidu Melchizedek mee naneadu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa oo netutzea, numu oo nanesootuhiku tuunguna tuwazoo. Soo punakwana oo kemmapu gi nasopedakwadoo, gi oo nanapuaꞌamu, gi ka pumakoo oo suakena wahadu. Gi oo yaꞌena waha. Oosoo tookwu ooosapa gwetzoinummedu gi moobegwa-gakwutu, ka Te Naa Tooaꞌa, Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Soo Melchizedek ka besow podo mu numu kaaheno moohenoꞌo, kaaheno noꞌoko hemma howyugwe ka numu tummatzina. Oosoo yise ka Te Naa pumme sootuhi-kwitoo mu moohega, meeꞌe naꞌunnedu soo oo naneana, ka oogowsoo yadooa-kwi. Meeꞌe owetuoo nawahadu ka oꞌnosoo susumudu mu numu-matu noꞌoko mu numu namahema hanehooka. Soo te namooatupu Abraham mee naneadu tu nanumu-no yise mu nagekase mu numu matzooekuse umu-makoo tu hemma punowsoo haneoo. Ka Abraham kodyugena soo Melchizedek oo takwise oo nanesootuhikute. Soo Abraham yise ka tu hanedooapu-matu ka Melchizedek tosamaka.
58007004	Soo Melchizedek tookwa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona soo Abraham oo tosamaka.
58007005	Saaꞌa soo Moses ka tu nanumu, umu Jew naana tamme nanesootuhikudu mu tosamaka tuungu. Umuoo numu nanesootuhikudu ka mu Jew numu-matu Levi mee naneadu-nakwana kemmadu.
58007006	Soo Melchizedek gi ka Levi-nakwana kemmadu, gi Jew nanesootuhidu, gi tuwazoo te nanumu-matu pana soo Abraham oo tosamaka. Mooasoo ka Te Naa ka Abraham sootuhikwu mee oo unakwe sapa, soo Melchizedek oo nanesootuhikute, soo Te Naa yise Abraham sootuhi.
58007007	Soo Melchizedek tookwa ka Abraham ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona ka Abraham puusoo nanesootuhikute.
58007008	Soo Melchizedek umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu ooonakwasoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, oosoo ooosapa gwetzoaꞌe gi moobegwa-gakoo umu Jew numu puu sukwe yaꞌeyakwe.
58007009	Soo Abraham puu ka Melchizedek tosamaka umu te Jew nanesootuhikudu punnoꞌo ooosoo manepunnedu-kwaꞌne manepunne,
58007010	tooe umu gisoo nadooamudoopu pana.
58007011	Soo tamme Jew numu putoogoo tumayohona puu ꞌyoo manepunne, umu numu nanesootuhikudu sakwa umu Levi numu-nagatu-matu. Pana mu Levi numu-nagatu te nanesootuhikudu tookwa gi poopooha-gaꞌyoo, ka Te Naa-matoo ka suda te tumuduguna tu tunematzaga-kwi. Soo Te Naa yise pudutupu tumayohope, putoogoo te tumayohomeakwuna te nemadabuekukwu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-maka, putoogoo te nanemagwetzoi tabuakwuna yaa manakwana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Melchizedek-kwaꞌnesoo te nanesootuhiku tabuakukwu.
58007013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe namanumudooke, ka Judah mee naneadu numu-nagatu. Gi hannanoꞌo ka Judah numu-nagatu pooha-gaꞌyoo numu nanesootuhikudu uga soo Te Naa puu gi hannanoꞌo meeoo mu tunetammakudu.
58007015	Menoꞌo tamme oo nakasopedakwadoo soo Te Naa atasoo te tumayohope yugwepu oosoo ka kukummaꞌakoosoo tamme nanesootuhiku tuunguna Melchizedek-waꞌnekoo.
58007016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka umu Jew nanana tamme nanesootuhikudu tubetse ataꞌyoosoo. Umu nanana nanesootuhidu sukwe numu-nagatu. Gi tubetse pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-waꞌneꞌyoo ooosapa gwetzoinummekwu gi moobegwa-gakwutu.
58007017	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netammapu, “Nu putoogoo numu u pooha nemagwetzoikwuna u sootuhikwu ka Melchizedek-waꞌnekoosoo. U ooosapa ka eka poohabe hee-gakwu.”
58007018	Tooe tamme ka te Jew tumayohotoo meadabepana gi tamme hownnekoosoo oo-toogoo nanemagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa ka putoogoo te pudu tumayoho meakwuna te sootuhipu. Menoꞌo manakwana ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme moohe, ka Te Naa tamme tugunaꞌa manekena.
58007020	Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te nanesootuhikute, tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo oosoo kaahenoꞌyoo. Mee naꞌunakwe, “Soo Te Naa tu mi mayodase kaaheno ka Te Pabeꞌe meeoo netamma, ‘Nu u pooha-maka, putoogoo numu u nemagwetzoikwuna. Gi nu ekow e unnepu atasoo yugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.’ “ Soo Te Naa puu gi tu mi mayodapana umu Jew nanesootuhikudu tamme meeoo nanesootuhiku tuungu.
58007022	Soo Te Naa unnepu tamme oo tunetammakupu ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme nemagwetzoikwuna mooasoo ka te tumayohope ooonakwa besaꞌyoo.
58007023	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa te mesoo nanesootuhikute oosoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinummena. Umuoo gi ooosapa te nanesootuhikukwu umuoo sukwe tuikwu.
58007025	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko te namanayaha-makoo te magwetzoi, oosoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinummena te nanesootuhikuna tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhinona.
58007026	Tubetse besaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe putoogoo te nanemagwetzoina. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo oosoo Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌana gi totsabu-gaꞌyoo gi suda tumatugudu, gi hee oo ooonakwatu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme yaa teepu-koobatu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
58007027	Soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu tamme nanesootuhikudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Nonotsa tabeno umu puu tuu tumaꞌemukwana nematzagadape, ka tamme tumaꞌemukwa nokosoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka puu gi hannanoꞌo tumaꞌemukwapuna. Sumuꞌyoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo mooasoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona soo Te Naa besa te sootuhina ooosapa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa.
58007028	Soo numu gi tubetse pooha-gaꞌyoo uga te tooe nanesootuhikute. Pana menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooa Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nemawuni yise tamme ooosapa nanemagwetzoi.
58008001	Nu ooosapa mu tuukwenoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe umu numu nanesootuhidu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Oosoo ka Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-tumadinakwa katuna te nanesootuhikute gi ka mu numu nanesootuhi nobe-too-kwiꞌyoona.
58008003	Umu nanesootuhidu numu puu ka Te Naa tosamaka te tumayohope naꞌunne-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu, puusoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanemawuni.
58008004	Ka te nanamooatupu mooa tumayohope manepunne-kwi, ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nanesootuhi numu manepunne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme mooasoo tamme nanesootuhikudu-gaꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe gi umu-nagatu. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa tumadinakwu katuna te nanesootuhikute.
58008005	Ooonneꞌyoona ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina nobe, ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoo-waꞌnesoo sukwe manepunne oetu. Tubetse oꞌnosoo ka Moses oona giba-maꞌyoona tunetammakupu, “Yoo saaꞌa mu ka nanesootuhi nobe matabuedooa,” meeꞌe soo Te Naa oo netammapu.
58008006	Soo Te Pabeꞌe pooha ka umu yaa teepu-kooba nanesootuhidu numu pooha ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo. Ooonekoosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe umuoo ooonakwa besasoo te nanesootuhikute. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe tunetammapu, ka Moses te nanamooatupu oo netammana ooonakwasoo besaꞌyoo.
58008007	Soo Te Naa putoogoo te pudu nanesootuhi meakwuna menoꞌo te tuukwe, oꞌnosoo mu tumayohona, ka umu te nanamooatupu gi hemma mu tummatzi.
58008008	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo: “Nu ka mu Jew numu ka teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwikoo mu moohegase besa mu tooꞌe tunetammakute. Pana umu gi e nakabetseꞌa. Nu gi hownnekoo mu tummatzi mane mu sakwa e tsasoopedya, pudusoo nu yise mu tuukwekwu ka putoogoo mu pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna. Nu gi ka mu nanamooatupu meeoo tunetammakudu.
58008010	Nu saaꞌa nu-tamme mu soonamme tuoonakuse mu yise ka e unnepu soohanese, e nakabetseadooa.
58008011	Oꞌno yise mu e besa doodooamu manekese nu-matoo nanesootuhidooa. Gi mu kummaꞌakoosoo sookwikwu, nu-kwitu pumme tunedyooekwudu. Oowe manakwana noꞌyoona e sopedakwadookwu.
58008012	Oꞌno saaꞌa yise nu ka nanasuda mu manepu soomuꞌwakwu.”
58008013	Soo Te Naa ka putoogoo mu mooa nanesootuhimeapu, mooasoo mooatupu kadooꞌoo oo mayugwekwu. Menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka tu pudu unnepu te tuukwekwu.
58009001	Oꞌnosoo tamme nanamooatupu puusoo putoogoo pooha meapu ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona hee-gaꞌyoo, pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina.
58009002	Soo nanesootuhi nobe ka natzekadukuse, soo pukwi oo mooe naꞌegeahookayina Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Oetu kootabuakudu, pooha tukaba wobe namadabue-kooba natugu. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu ka nobe naamootoo natzapata. Ka wunapu natzapadadu-kwingakwuna soo Tubetse Unu Poohakakoo Pukwiꞌyoona mee naneꞌa. Esoo wobe-ma namadabuedu oe, oa tupe oo naꞌoonnakwi nahane, yise besa kookwanadu pukwikoo natunina, wobe namadabuena oa tupe petakwa-gaꞌyoo oe tuwazoo. Soo Aaron natzetono ooweoo natugu, sumu togaba-wisoo boohe naahoodu, ka Te Naa Pooha-ma wahaꞌyoo segetayamadu tupe ka Te Naa unnepu puuma nabona, yise tseda oa tupe-ma namadabuena tuwazoo. Soo tukaba Te Naa ka te nanamooatupu pumatu oo makapu ka tseda-wi.
58009005	Oobe ka wobe-ma namadabuena-koobenaꞌyoona mu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu numu tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwuniyakwe. Soo hemma namadabuena oo-kooba wammedu ka mu toha kakasa-ga-kwaꞌne tatabuadu. Mu kasa yise ka wobe namadabue-koobakwi natzapadapunnedu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Gi nu menoꞌo hemmasoo owetuoo mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58009006	Ka Poohabe Pu-kwiꞌyoona mee naneadu mu nanesootuhidu moohedu suuꞌmu nonotsa tabeno meꞌayakwe.
58009007	Sumu tomoyina mu tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo ka Tubetse Unu Pooha-gakoo Pukwiꞌyoona mee naneadu-kwi egeayakwe. Nonotsa oe egeana ka kootsoo tooaꞌa, noko seepu puupe yoongana, ookow ka Te Naa nabeamakana, ka mu numu suda tumatugu-koobatoo, pummesoo suda tumatuguna tuwazoo nematzagakwuniyina umu numu suda tu tumatuguna gi sopedakwadoodu-koobatoo tuwazoo.
58009008	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe tamme ka te Jew numu tumayohope-toohakwi gi tammesoo ka Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka te Jew tumayohope-toohaꞌyoona mu numu gi puusoo ka wunapu natzapadadu-kwingakwatoo mea-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58009009	Pana soo te nanamooatupu tumayohona gi haga numu tummatzaꞌe menoꞌo meeꞌe soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te tunedyooe. Tooe tamme menoꞌo ka Te Naa nabeamakawunupana, oosoo gi ka suda te tumatuguna kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58009010	Soo te nanamooatupu putoogoo mooa tumayohona, ekow suuꞌmu te tunedyooe ka te pooha manekwitu. Ka baa hebena, tukana, nabakeana, hemma te nabeatse-gana, noko eka suuꞌmu te tunedyooe. Yow putoogoo te tumayoho meana ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe-witu te sopedakwatoo, menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe besasoo ka kaaheno putoogoo te pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna te tunedyooe.
58009011	Ka tumayohope te nanamooatupu mayohomona soo te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu ka te tumaꞌemukwana tooꞌe nematzagakwunaꞌe, yaa teepu-koobatu ka numu tumadabuena nanesootuhi nobe-kwi nanesootuhi konnona. Ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona, umu ka sukwe numuna, gi hownnekoo te nanesootuhiku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58009012	Umu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu yise kootsoo kooma puupe-ma, tooetoo kootsoo natunina kootoosebu baa noko namayuadu-ma te bawutaꞌne mee te netammana, “Mu yise menoꞌo gi totsaba-gaꞌyoo.” Tooe oo mu manakwe sapa oosoo gi te tummatzaꞌe.
58009014	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme pudu tunemadabuekuna ookow ooonakwa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa po-witu, tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe gi tootsabu-gapana, tamme-koobatoo nabatsa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda yise ka Te Naa-baa petuga. Oobeꞌyoona ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona soo Te Pabeꞌe nanesootuhina ka te tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwunaꞌe. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise oo nakaꞌoedyukunokwu. Soo Te Naa yise gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu.
58009015	ꞌYooonnekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tuukweꞌe, ka Te Naa tamme pudu tunetammakuna, te tumayohomeakwuna. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa besa gi moobegwaga te sootuhikwu, mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu.
58009016	Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona togesoo gwetzoina soo numu puu ka tu namahe tooe haga-tamme oo nemawunaꞌe, ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooꞌe oo yaꞌese, ka menoꞌo soo numu ka puumatoo oo nanemawunise saaꞌa oo hee-gadooa. Ooonekoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase tamme noꞌoko ka besow nasootuhipe nasootuhi oꞌnosoo ka Te Naa tamme tunetammapu-kwaꞌne.
58009018	Ka oꞌnosoo ka tumayohope te nanamooatupu mayohomona tamme-koobatoo hemma nabatsayakwe.
58009019	Ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo soo Moses te pooha tunetammakupu, ka kootsoo tooaꞌa batsase, oo puupe hanese, ka baa noko oo wumayuase, yise ka tonegea, tooetoo ka seepu puhu-matu ooweoo matzakase noꞌoko ka mu numu oo-ma bawutabeꞌa. Ka Pooha natubodu, ka pukwiꞌyoona mu nanesootuhidyina tuwazoo yise noꞌoko hemma ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwitu bawutabea tuwazoo. Soo Moses yise meeoo mu numu netamma, “ ‘Mu ꞌyoo tumatugunokwu,’ meeꞌe soo Te Naa unakwe. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa besa te sootuhikwu.” Oo-waꞌnesoo manepunne
58009022	menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase yooonnekoo suuꞌmu soo Te Naa suda te tumatuguna soomuꞌwa.
58009023	Ka yaaꞌa teepu-koobaꞌyoona soo te Jew nanesootuhi nobe sagwane ka Te Naa ebe tamme-koobatu tubetse nobe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona numu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwa ka seepu tooetoo kootsoo umu-koobatoo nabatsayakwe. Pana ka Te Naa ebe tamme-koobatoo tubetse nobe-kwiꞌyoona, soo te tumaꞌemukwana tubetse nasoomuꞌwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
58009024	Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ka Te Naa tubetse nobe-kwi tzaꞌegea ka oobeꞌyoona te nanesootuhikute gi ka yaaꞌa teepu-kooba nanesootuhi nobe, sukwe numu tumadabue-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
58009025	Nonotsa sumu tomoyina umu te nananesootuhi papabeꞌemu seepu batsayakwe, ka oo puupe haneyina, ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi egeayakwe, ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana tooe nematzagakwunina. Ka teepu mooe namadabue manakwana ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo oo yugwe-kwitoo tooe, soo Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petuse, tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsa.
58009027	Noꞌyoona numu sumusoo yaꞌeyakwe. Obenakwatoo yise soo Te Naa noꞌoko te tumatugupu nemadunagakwu.
58009028	Sumusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ewow numu-koobatoo nabatsapu. Gi tuwazoo oosoo nabatsa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Saaꞌa oosoo penakwa kodyu petuse, ka tamme pumme wutooepunnedu magwetzoikwu.
58010001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna, soo Te Naa yise punnoꞌo te tumaꞌemukwapu soomuꞌwapu. Tooe tamme tooe haaꞌno tooe kootsoo kooma, tooetoo seepu goewunupana, oosoo gi te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ooosapa uga ka Te Naa tosamakayakwe tooesoo tamme oo sopedakwatoo, tamme tumaꞌemukwana. Tooe tamme ka te tumayohope nakabetseapana, oosoo gi besa te mayugwe.
58010005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka yaa teepu-kooba namanumudoose, ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Nu yow menoꞌo petu ka nuka u tunetammakupu mayohokwuse, a nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo. U yaahoo e manumudoopuna ooonneꞌyoona yise nu ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsa, u gi ka hemma ume tu nabeamakana petzabena.”
58010008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Soo Te Naa ka hemma nagoena pumme tu nabeamakana gi petzape ka te nanamooatupu putoohakwi tumayohona.”
58010009	Soo Te Naa te mooa tumayohodyina gi petzabena ka Te Pabeꞌe oe mayugwese oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, ka Te Naa unne-waꞌnesoo. Oo ka Te Pabeꞌe manese soo Te Naa yise ka suda te tumatugupu noꞌoko soomuꞌwukwunipu.
58010011	Nonotsa tabeno tamme mu Jew numu papabeꞌe konnoyina nanesootuhiyakwe ewasoo te nanamooatupu tumayohope tooꞌe mayohopana, umuoo tumayohope gi ka te maꞌemukwana kadooꞌoo mayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58010012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe sumusoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna, soo Te Naa yise ka te tumaꞌemukwana tubetse soomuꞌwa. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa tumadinakwa, ka Te Naa-waꞌnesoo pooha-gaꞌyoo.
58010013	Menoꞌo ewaꞌyoo numu togesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe gi nakabetseꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise mu sukwe tsasoopedya, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa gi mu nakabetseakwu. Ka umu tu nemadabuekwi oo manepetuse ka Te Naa tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo. Ka mu paba nanehane-kwitoo tooe, oꞌno soo Te Naa umu suda nuugwedu pooha tuukwekwu.
58010014	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa doodooamu besa mayugweke oosoo ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
58010015	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha meeoo,
58010016	“Nu saaꞌa sapa ka putoogoo mu pudu nanesootuhimeakwuna mu sootuhikwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa nu ka mu tunakabetseadu sootuhikwu.”
58010017	Mee tuwazoo unakwe, “Menoꞌo manakwana yise nu mu tumaꞌemukwa soomuꞌwanokwu.”
58010018	Menoꞌo manakwana tamme gi ka Te Naa nabeamakakwu, ka mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu.
58010019	E nanumu, tamme uga gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa-baa petuga-waꞌneꞌyoo ka te mooa tumayohope mayohona, ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe-kwiꞌyoona. Soo pabaꞌyoo wunapu oo naamootoo natzapadadu ooosapa uga ka Te Naa-makoo te takonepunne, pana menoꞌo yise soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Oꞌno yise ka Te Naa pumme pudu tunetammakupu-too te tunedyooe meakwu.
58010020	Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase soo Te Naa ka tamme takoꞌnedu ka wunapu naamoo tzakebuꞌeoo ka nanesootuhi nobe-kwi natzapadadu, menoꞌo yise tamme kaaheno Te Naa-no mesoo yadooa, gi hee te takoꞌne.
58010021	Menoꞌo yise Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko hemma nemadabuena, te nanesootuhikute.
58010022	Menoꞌo yise tamme gi ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona suaꞌe ka oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa, tamme yise baa-wi namatzaka.
58010023	Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa te magwetzoi, yise tamme ooosapa ka oo unnepu nakabetsea.
58010024	Tamme sakwa nananenoyukwena, nanatummatzina, ooosapa besa maneno, besa nanasoobedyana.
58010025	Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano nanesootuhidyi, ka menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwu. Mu sakwa gi mu susumudu numu-waꞌne manepana, umu puu gi numu-no nanesootuhi.
58010026	Tamme ka mooasoo Te Naa tubetse unnepu sopedakwatoo pana ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena, gi hownnekoo saaꞌa soo Te Naa te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58010027	Saaꞌa soo te tumaꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, oꞌno tamme noꞌoko ka Te Naa wohonedu-nosoo natunikwu.
58010028	Soo te Jew nanamooatupu tumayohope mee naꞌunakwe, soo wahaꞌyoo numu ka te tumayohope tumooꞌoodu poonnedusoo meeoo unnese, oꞌno sakwa tamme gi oo-toogoo mu nabagapana. Oosoo sakwa tupe-ma natatsaga.
58010029	Tamme ka Te Naa pooha unnepu tumooꞌoona, tamme tubetse suda manakwe. Tammesoo kadoo namayugwekwu tamme ka mee unnena, “Soo Te Naa Tooa gi hee. Soo tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsana gi pooha-gaꞌyoo.” Tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha tamme magwetzoidu netumooꞌoona.
58010030	Tamme ka Te Naa tamme netammapu sopedakwadoopana ka suda te manena manoyugwena, soo suda te tumatugupu tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu ka te nanemadabuese.
58010031	Oosoo sumu tabeno te masakwikwutu ka gi te tunakaꞌoedyukute, soo suda te manena ka tamme-matoosoo kodyuse.
58010032	Mu sakwa oo soomayu ka oꞌnosoo mu manena gi oo soomuꞌwapana. Mu ka pudu mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuse, tooe suda mumme tu matugu sapa, mu gi nasootooke.
58010033	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu uga mu nesootzeꞌmayakwe, mu uga ka mu nanesootuhidu nanesootzemayidu numu tummatziyakwe.
58010034	Mu ka mu nakwutumadu tunakaꞌoedyukudu uga tummatzidu tuwow. Tooe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu noꞌoko mu hemma hanese sapa, mu gi suda oo sokwamakute ka Te Naa-baakoo besa mu nasootuhikwuna sopedakwadoona. Umuoo Te Naa-baakoo te namahegana gi kadoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58010035	Wunaꞌme menoꞌo maneka mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Saaꞌa soo Te Naa oowetoo mu sootuhikwu. Mu sakwa gi nasootookena, gi ka mu nasootuhipe nemawunipana.
58010036	Mu sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseano, oꞌno saaꞌa oosoo mu sootuhidooa ka mee unnena,
58010037	“Pudusoo Mu Pabeꞌe mu-baa petukwusoo, yise mu magwetzoikwu.
58010038	Umu e tubetse doodooamu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukunodu nu magwetzoikwu. Pana umu e besa po maꞌwukadu, nu gi sootuhikwu.”
58010039	Pana tamme ka Te Naa besa po gi maꞌwuka-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme namagwetzoikwu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukunona.
58011001	Tooe tamme gisoo ka puma Te Naa tamme sootuhikwuna poonnepana, mooasoo tamme oo sopedakwadoo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011002	Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Mu nanamooatupu-matu uga besaꞌyoo umu ka e nakaꞌoedyukuna.”
58011003	Soo hee noꞌyoona yaa teepu-koobatu menoꞌo te poonnena gi hemmakoo namadabuepu, tubetse kadooꞌoo hee uga. Soo Te Naa ka teepu matabuepu noꞌoko hemma-ma-koobatu madookoopedoopu tooe tamme gi oo manepu poonnepana, tamme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa sukwe yadooase noꞌoko hemma te poonnena nemadabuepu.
58011004	Oꞌnosoo sumuꞌyoo tooebetse Abel mee naneadu ka Te Naa seepu tookoo nabeamaka. Soo Te Naa ka Abel tumatuguna besaꞌyookute ka besa oo tunakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Abel pabeꞌe ka tu tumasua-matu ka Te Naa sukwe totsaꞌmaka tooe gi oo nakaꞌoedyukupana. Tooꞌe ka Abel oꞌnosoo nabatsapu sapa, tamme togesoo ka oo besa tumatugukepu-makoo natunedyooe.
58011005	Soo nana Enoch mee naneadu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa oo-matoo besa soonamme, oosoo ka unu pumme oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa nabatoo oo bi. Soo Enoch yise gi yaꞌepana, ka Te Naa-matoo sukwe mea.
58011006	Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa besa masoonamme ka oo nummenummena nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu numu pumme tubetse nakabetseadu soo Te Naa besa sootuhikwu, umu ka ooosapa besaꞌyoona saaꞌa hemma besowsoo Te Naa-nakwana poonnekwu.
58011007	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo tusooyugwe, “Nu saaꞌa ka teepu batatzopakudooa.” Soo Te Naa yise ka nana Noah mee naneadu pabatsekoo sake matabue tuungu. Tooe soo Noah gi hannanoꞌo ka teepu batatzopana poonnedupana, oosoo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna, ka pumme oo sakedoo tuunguna matabue. Mu Noah nanodukwa, pihoo tu doodooamu, yise pihoo tu kunoopeamu-no noꞌyoona ka sake-wikoo namagwetzoipu. Noꞌyoona mu numu ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona badatuꞌihoo ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Noah-maꞌyoona suaketu suuꞌmu nasootuhi.
58011008	Soo nana Abraham mee naneadu uga umu tu nananumu-naga nobe-gaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa mana ume e tayakwitoo mea, nu saaꞌa ookow umu u-maꞌyoona suaketu teepu-makadooa.” Soo Abraham yise oetoo mea ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011009	Soo Abraham yise ooosapa mana ka Te Naa pumme geakwunakwahana ka teepu-koobakwisoo nummenumme. Soo Abraham tutsekadukupe-kwi nobega numme, oo tooa Isaac mee naneadu, oo kunooꞌoo punnoꞌo Jacob mee naneadu oo-no, umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu tu unne-waꞌnesoo.
58011010	Soo Abraham gi yaa teepu-kooba tu nobe-gana heesoobedya ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu mee soonammena ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011011	Soo Abraham nodukwa Sarah mee naneadu mooasoo unu peawabe. Pana soo Te Naa oo sootuhise, oosoo koꞌhease tooaꞌadoo ka Te Naa tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna, mee yise Te Naa oo netamma,
58011012	“Umu u-maꞌyoona suakekwutu ewaꞌyookwu gi pumme tasunganoꞌyookwu.” Tooe ka numu meeoo sokwama sapa, “Abraham sumuna yaꞌekwu gisoo dooamu-gana oosoo ka mooasoo unu waꞌetsena,” Abraham punnoꞌo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute.
58011013	Mu Abraham nanodukwa, tu tooa, tu kunooꞌoo-no tooe gi oo poonnepana ka Te Naa pumme tuukwepu, ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukunoꞌo ka tu tui-kwitoo tooe. Pana sumu tabeno oo-toogoo hee manekwu meeꞌe umu oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Umu meeꞌe unakwe, “Esoo teepu gi ooosapa pukooba te gwetzoimokwuna tamme yaanona mease tamme ka Te Naa-baa tubetse manepetugakwu.”
58011014	Umu ka meeoo tusooyugwena ka Te Naa-tammetu ooosapa soomayumo umu ka yaa teepu-koobatu gi heesoobedya ka tu tubewa-witoo kodyu-waꞌneꞌyoopana, ka mooasoo Te Naa tu pukwiꞌyookwuna oo mabetsape ka oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa puu gi umu-ma nasookwaꞌe. “Nu mu Tubetse Naa, nu yow ooosapa mu nabaaꞌyookukwu,” ka Te Naa meeꞌe pumme mu natubanga.
58011017	Soo Te Naa ka Abraham meeoo netamma, “Nu umu u tooa-maꞌyoona numu suaketu besa sootuhidooa,” tooe gisoo oo tooaꞌa-gakoo sapa. Ka saaꞌa yise oo tooa nawue, oosoo yise Isaac mee nanea, ka Te Naa tunetamma-waꞌnesoo. Ka Isaac tooebetse manekese, saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka Abraham soomapoonnena meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa u tooa Isaac e nabeamaka.” Soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakabetsea oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Abraham ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute tooe ka tu penebe tooa oo nabeamakase sapa soo Te Naa oo mesoo manumudoosoo, meeꞌe soo Abraham tusooyugwe. O yise ka Abraham tusooyugwe-kwaꞌnesoo, soo Te Naa ka Isaac oo tooa punowsoo oo gea.
58011020	Ka saaꞌa soo Isaac waꞌetseyikese, umu waahoo tu doodooamu kaaheno mu pooha tuukwe ka umu-maꞌyoona suakekwutu manekwuna. Soo Isaac ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa ka oo tooa Jacob mee naneadu besa sootuhikwu.
58011021	Soo Jacob, punnoꞌo ka waꞌetseyikese, oo sopedakwatoo hanotu-matu tu kunooꞌoomu-matu soo Te Naa sootuhikwu, soo Jacob ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Jacob ka tu natzetono-koobakwi nuusoese, nanesootuhina mu pooha tuukweꞌe, ka saaꞌa tu kunooꞌoomu manekwuna.
58011022	Soo Jacob tooaꞌa Joseph mee naneadu punnoꞌo ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukute oo sopedakwadoo ka sumu tabeno ka tu nanumu pumme tubewa geakwuna. Tooe oona-kwingaꞌa Egypt-wiꞌyoo pana, soo Joseph ka yaꞌekwuse tu nanumu meeoo netamma, “Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka mumme tu tubewabe tuukwe-kwitoo mu moohegakwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa mu ka e oho nabenina hanegase oonowsoo oo wumabemadooa.”
58011023	Ka saaꞌa mu Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu mu Jew numu umu tu pudu nadooamudoodu nanaꞌatse goe tuungu. Sumuꞌyoo oongaꞌa besa tabuadu nadooaꞌadoose Moses mee nanea. Umu oo naanapuaꞌamu ka Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu tunetammana gi suina gi oo nakabetsea, gi tu naꞌatse tooaꞌa oo batsa, umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011024	Ka saaꞌa soo Moses ka nana manekase meeoo unakwe, “Nu tubetse Jew numu. Nu gi ka Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu togoꞌo, nu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
58011025	Tooe ka mu Jew numu suda namatugu sapa, soo Moses umu-matu mee nasooyugwe. Soo Moses mee soonamme, “Nu gi ooosapa yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Nu gi noꞌoko hemma e hee-gana soogwaꞌe ka yaa teepu Egypt mee naneadu-kwiꞌyoona. Nu uga maꞌemukwakwu ka yaanonasoo hemma besa namasoonammena. Nu sakwa puu umu e nanumu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo Te Naa Tooaꞌa, tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nuka suda tu matugu sapa.”
58011027	Soo Moses ka saaꞌa Egypt-wiꞌyoona mea, oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Moses gi ka mu Egypt-witu numu-kooba katudu-ma suaꞌe, tooe pumme oo sutakute sapa. Oosoo ooosapa ka Te Naa nagenoꞌo oo poonnetu-kwaꞌne, tooe gi oo poonnepana.
58011028	Saaꞌa soo Moses ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka mu numu meeoo netamma, “Mu sakwa seepu batsase, ka oo puupe-ma mu natzakwonaꞌa naꞌooonakwi wumatzua, oꞌno soo nanapu mu naꞌatse tooa yaa togano gi nabatsakwu.”
58011029	Saaꞌa soo Te Naa ka tubetse babatseꞌe banunadu Atsa Baa mee naneadu mu-koobenatu ninapatoo pasawoyoꞌakuse, mu Jew numu yise oo-toogoo mea umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu Egypt-witu numu oo-toogoosoo mu tooꞌe nageka, soo Te Naa ka tubetse baa oetusoo nekodyuoose, umu yise oe batatuihoo, ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011030	Soo numu pukwi nogadu-kwi Jericho mee naneadu unu natzooedu oo naꞌooonakwi tupe koodea-gaꞌyoo. Mu Jew numu ka Te Naa oedyukute oosoo ka Jericho-witu mu numu matzooekuna. Soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu natakwatsukwu (7) tabeba-witoo ka Jericho-naꞌooonakwi sogomea tuungu, soo tupe koodea yise puuwana-tamme yoomedihoo, umu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
58011031	Soo mogoꞌne, nanana maꞌemukwadu Rahab mee naneadu, tooe ka mu Jew numu tumooꞌoo-gapana, ka mu Jew tuꞌeyiwabe tu nanumu-makoo tzakwatze, oosoo ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka saaꞌa mu sutakoo numu Jericho-witu nagoese, soo Rahab namagwetzoi, oosoo ka mu Jew numu tuꞌeyiwabe tzakwatzese.
58011032	Nu menoꞌo gi noꞌoko mu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ewaꞌyoosoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu meeꞌe nananeadu: Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel yise ewaꞌyoo mu Te Naa nanayadooawabe tuwazoo.
58011033	Umu ewa nanasookwugi manekena umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Umuoo tu wohomu matzooekukena, umu ka besow podo numu moohena, umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhipu hee-gana umu ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Ka mu sutakoo nunuꞌu-makoo namagwetzoi,
58011034	koso-ma pumme tu tooꞌe tunihoose sapa namagwetzoi. Umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna tooe puusoo gi nanatzooepana, umu unu naduya manemena, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Umu ewow wakwawaꞌa pumme wohonedu matzooekukena.
58011035	Ewaꞌyoosoo mu momokoꞌne tooe tu tooaꞌa yaꞌekuꞌyipana mu tooaꞌa tu tui-kwikoo namayodayakwe, umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Susumudu numu meeoo nanetamma, “Mu ka Mu Naa Besa Po mee mu netammana gi maꞌwukana, numme mu goekwu.” Umu yise meeꞌe mu nanekwegea, “Numme ooosapa Ne Naa nakabetseadu tooe numme tu goekwuse sapa, numme ka Ne Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna soo Te Naa nabaatoo ne bikwu oo-baa yise numme nobe-gakwu, oosoo yise besa ne sootuhikwu.”
58011036	Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-maꞌyoo nanekoꞌe, nakwebaꞌa-ma nuupageta, susumudu natzakunetana nuutumeta, umu-matoo nanehanena nagoꞌe.
58011037	Susumudu tupe-ma nadakoꞌe tu yaꞌe-kwitoo tooe, tsegesa-ma natseboka, susumudu tooe hownnekoo tooe nagoꞌe.
58011038	Susumudu numu tooe Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhimopana tutuha manakwe yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona ka gi kwasu-gana seepu puhu-wi namasooana, gi nobegana, numu-wana manemodu tupe tawaga-kwi ka giba-maꞌyoona, tooetoo ka teepu tawaga-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu suda mu matugu ka mu wohoꞌnena.
58011039	Tooe umuoo besaꞌyoo numupana ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu ka Te Naa pumme sootuhina sukwe wutooe, ka Te Pabeꞌe gisoo petu.
58011040	Soo Te Naa mooasoo meeoo unnepu oosoo te paba nasootuhikwuna. Umuoo tamme-nosoo ka Te Naa tamme sootuhina hee-gakwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
58012001	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka besow po ka Te Naa tamme tuukwepu, ewaꞌyoosoo mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo oo-toogoo meapu. Menoꞌo sakwa tamme ka suda te tumaꞌemukwana etzaga maꞌwu, oosoo ooosapa te takonegena. Oꞌno tamme yabesoo ka Te Naa Besa Po-wi tzabekakwusoo.
58012002	Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nageno, oosoo ka Te Naa Besa Podo te moohe oo pudu nage-ma-kwiꞌyoona ka oo mobegwana-too tooe. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pumme wohone sapa pumme gi mu heesoobedya, tooe pumme te batsayagate sapa soo Te Pabeꞌe gi nasootooke. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tubetse besa soonamme, ka Te Naa Besa Podo meadabena. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa-nabatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe bi, “U saaꞌa nu-waꞌneꞌyookwu,” mee oo netammana.
58012003	Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo soomayuna oo-waꞌnesoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi nasootooke tooe ka mu sutakoo numu suda pumme matugu sapa.
58012004	Mu sumuna mee sokwama, “Numme ewa suda manekena numme ka mu numu tumaꞌemukwana wohonekena.” Pana mu gisoo nabatsa ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌne.
58012005	Tooe tamme ka susumudu unu nanasutatoo meapana gi nasootookepana meeoo soo Te Naa te tunedyooe. Tamme sakwa ooosapa sutatoo meadabe, oꞌno soo Te Naa tu doodooamu-waꞌnesoo te matugu. Tamme sakwa oo soomayu ka a nabotuguna, tamme oo netammapu, “Mu sakwa oo nakatugupunne ka Te Naa mumme tunedyooe. Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana ka mumme oo tunedyooꞌe. Soo Te Naa ka mu soobedyana, mu tunedyooe. Oosoo numu puu ka pummesoo dooamu ka suda mu manakwe mu nenanawaꞌe.” Yooonnekoo soo Te Naa te tzapoonnekute tamme ka oogow doodooamuna.
58012008	Soo Te Naa ka gi te heesoobedyana uga ka tooe how tooe te manakwe sapa te tsasoopedyakwu.
58012009	Soo nugasoo naa puu ka oꞌnosoo e tunedyooe, nu yise puu oo nakapunneyakwe. Ooonnekoo sakwa tamme ka Te Naa tamme tunedyooena nakatuguyi. Nu ka tooesoo tuhaꞌyoona gi toge tumatuguse soo e naa puu e nesagwikuyakwe.
58012010	Soo Te Naa punnoꞌo ka suda te tumatuguse te nenanawikwu, tamme-too oosoo besaꞌyoo. Oꞌno yise tamme besa manekekwu.
58012011	Soo te nanenana-wina gi besa numu nenuumadu, pana saaꞌa tamme ka oo natunedyooekese, tamme besa manekese besakoo yise nasootuhinokwu.
58012012	Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme nananenoyugweno. Tamme sakwa umu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nenoyugweyi. Tamme sakwa noꞌoko hemma sutakoo maꞌwuke. Oosoo ka mu numu Te Naa besa po-makoo takohoꞌne.
58012014	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa doodooamuna nananemabetseana gi sakwa tamme nanahapana. Umu Te Naa tubetse doodooamu suuꞌmu ka Te Pabeꞌe-baa petugakwu.
58012015	Ka Te Naa Besa Podo te meadape ka tooe haga tooe numu-nakwi manedu tummatzina oo nenoyugwe, oꞌno oosoo punnoꞌo ka Te Naa besa pumme sootuhi-kwi petugakwu. Soo numu tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa po maꞌwukadu sumuna suda tuukwena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu suta-tamme moohekadooa.
58012016	Gi haga tamme-matu sakwa mee soonammepana, “Soo Te Naa nuka sootuhina gi hee. Nu sakwa tooe how tooe mesoo mane, kukummaꞌanosoo mesoo nabotama.” Oꞌnosoo soo nana Esau mee naneadu meeoo tusooyugwe. Soo Esau uga nasootuhikwu oosoo ka mu suuꞌmu pabeꞌena, pana oosoo tu nasootuhipe sumuoo tukapupedo yugwepu.
58012017	Mu mooasoo ka Esau-witu naka, ka saaꞌa oosoo Te Naa pumme sootuhina tooꞌe nekwaꞌe. Yagana tooꞌe nanesootuhaꞌe pana soo Te Naa gi oo nakasootuhaꞌe.
58012018	Tamme puu gi ka umu yaa teepu-kooba ka Te Naa pukoobaꞌyoona giba petukwana petugase, onona ka Te Naa tuapa tookoope naka. Soo giba nitu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne umu oo-ma suaꞌe. Soo giba kwetu-kwitu tubetse unu toganopunne.
58012019	Soo Te Naa yise mu yadooedyina nunuadu-kwaꞌne unaꞌwe mu numu yise unu suina ka Te Naa meeoo netamma, “Gi ne yadooepana numme unu suaꞌe.”
58012020	Soo Te Naa meeoo mu netamma, “Gi sakwa haga ka giba tzageꞌe manepana. Gi mu hemma ma-kooba tatokupana. Mu sakwa gi ka mu seepu tooetoo mu kootsoo ka giba-ma tatokupana, ka oo mu manakwe tupe-ma mu tatsaga.”
58012021	Soo giba puma nanasui tabuapunne soo Moses meeoo, “Nu kwepekeawunu suina.”
58012022	Pana tamme ka Te Naa tubetse nobe-kwitoo nabaꞌe, oowetuoo gi nanasuaꞌe. Tubetse ewaꞌyoo umu Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo nanano besa sokwamana o. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu punnoꞌo umu-noꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa te netutzease oto te sootuhikwu, soo Te nananeana ka oo-baa nabotuguna.
