Mu tutunakaꞌoedyukudu moogooa punnoꞌo o, ka Te Naa besa pumme matabuese. Soo Te Naa onona ka mu gi tutunakaꞌoedyukudu paba nehanekwuse. Soo Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo onokwu, mee tamme nanetammana. Oosoo mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme maꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ka tooebetse Abel mee naneadu nabatsase oo pabeꞌe oe naneyugwe. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase gi haka oe naneyukwe ka oogow nabatsaputoo te nasootuhikwuse.
58012025	Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa tamme netammana nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa ka giba-maꞌyoona mu te nanamooatupu yadooese ka teepu neyuutsengahoose sapa, umu te nanamooatupu gi oo nakabetseana, yise kadooꞌoo namayugwepu. Menoꞌo yise soo Te Naa ka tu pudu unnepu te tuukwe paꞌanakwana. Tamme sakwa oo nakabetsea saaꞌa oosoo ka teepu noko hemma oo paꞌanakwatu tzadyuutsengekwu.
58012027	Soo Te Naa ka noꞌoko hemma tzadyuutsengese noꞌyoona hee oo matabuepu atasoo nuugwekwu. Gi noꞌyoona hee kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo gi tuwazoo atasoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Pana soo te nasootuhina ka Te Naa-baatu wunaꞌmetoo gwetzoinummekwu gi atasoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
58012028	Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe soo Te Naa mee te unnena besa soobedya, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. Numme u nesookwugaꞌe u noꞌoko sutakoo hemma kadoo mayugwekwu, soo besaꞌyoo suuꞌmu yise nabenikwu.”
58013001	Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya.
58013002	Tamme sakwa kukummaꞌakoosoo wakwawaꞌa nabaaꞌyooku, ka gi hano mu tooi-waꞌne mu manepunne. Susumudu numu sumuna ka mu Te Naa tummatzidu, mu toha kakasa-gakoo, nabaaꞌyooku pana gi mu sopedakwadoo.
58013003	Tamme sakwa oetu soohanena ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda namatugu-witu soohanena tamme punnoꞌo ka yaa teepu-koobaꞌyoona suda namatuguyakwe. Mu nuutumedadu numu-witu soohanena tuwazoo.
58013004	Tamme sakwa meeoo sokwama soo numu nananodukwa-gana besaꞌyoo. Tamme ka kummaꞌanosoo nabootamana soo sutaꞌyoo tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
58013005	Tamme sakwa gi ewowsoo hemma soogwipana. Tamme sakwa ka mooasoo te hee-ga-matoo besa sokwama, oꞌno soo Te Naa te mabetseakwu. Soo Te Naa mee te netamma, “Nu mu mabetseana gi mu matusookwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
58013006	Ooonneꞌyoo tamme togesapa ka meeꞌe, “Nu gi sui. Numu gi nuka manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Te Naa nu-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe e tummatzina.”
58013007	Mu numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu nagutza mooeꞌugasoo tuukwedu besa ka Te Naa Podo meadape, tooe ka tu tunakaꞌoedyuku-kwi nagoese sapa. Tamme sakwa umu-waꞌnesoo besa tunakaꞌoedyukuno.
58013008	Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu ooosapa sumu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, ooosapa besaꞌyoo.
58013009	Tamme sakwa gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu nakabetseapana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nanaꞌatasoo tamme mu tuukweꞌe sapa, gi ka Te Naa Besa Po maꞌwupana. Soo Te Naa ka besa te sootuhina, tamme nanaꞌunusoo oo nakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo te nanamooatupu tumayohope ka te tukakwitu nanetammana gi hownnekoo te tummatzi-waꞌneꞌyoo tooe ooka te nakabetsea sapa.
58013010	Tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, soo Te Naa togesoo te sootuhaꞌe. Umu te nanamooatupu tumayohope nagedu soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhikudu papabeꞌe nokosoo.
58013011	Tamme Jew numu puu ꞌyoo tumayohoyakwe soo nanesootuhi pabeꞌe puu ka seepu nabeamakayakwe ka suda te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo oo batsase, oosoo yise ka puupe suuꞌmu ka tu nanesootuhi nobe-kwitoo hanegayakwe, ka oo tookoo yise numu nonoꞌata-wanatoo hanegayina oo tuniyakwe.
58013012	Ooosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tamme-koobatoo nabatsa tabuapu, ka mu Jew numu nonoꞌatana-wanatoo nabatsapu.
58013013	Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabuana maꞌwukase, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme mane, tooe numu tamme-maꞌyoona nanekoena, tamme mu nesootzema sapa.
58013014	Gi tamme ooosapa yaa teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Tamme ka Te Naa tamme tumadabueku-kwitoo meakwu.
58013015	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo,” mee sakwa tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhino.
58013016	Tamme sakwa tuwazoo besa nanamatugu, nanatummatzina soo Te Naa besa soonamme ka oo te manakwe.
58013017	Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu tamme nanesootuhi moohedu nakabetsea. Ka Te Naa tamme-kooba umu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuungu oosoo ka how besa umu e nakabetsea meeꞌe mu sooyugwena meeoo mu netamma. Tamme ka mu nakabetseana, umu etzaga te tummatzina, umu besa sokwama. Pana tamme ka gi mu nakabetseana, umu te moohedu suda sokwamana, gi hownnekoo te tummatzidooa.
58013018	Mu sakwa ooosapa ne nanesootuhiku. Numme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa podo kaaheno numme meadabena.
58013019	Mu sakwa ne nanesootuhiku, oꞌno numme sumu tooe mu-baasoo kodyu petukadooa.
58013020	Nu mu nemayuwunu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi mee unnena, “U, Ne Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U ne magwetzoaꞌe u ka nanasookwugina. U ka besa u unnepu ne tuukwe oosoo ooosapa togesapa naꞌunnedu soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. U ka Ne Pabeꞌe yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayodase, yise tamme-kooba oo tueyaꞌe tuungu. U mu sokwamana atasoo mu mayugwekuse, besakoosoo, oꞌno umu u nakabetseakwu. Oꞌno mu ka umu mumme netamma-kwaꞌnesoo manekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe pooha-toohakwi.”
58013022	E nanumu, mu sakwa e nakapunne. Nu gi haanoko mu-matoo tubokwu.
58013023	Nu ka mu sootuukwena ka Timothy tu nakwutuma-kwiꞌyoona natzatzebooa-kwitu. Ka pudusoo yaa oo petuse, numme saaꞌa mu-baa nobenegadooa.
58013024	Nu noꞌoko mumme Te Naa doodooamu, mumme nanesootuhi moohedu, noꞌokosoo mu soomayu. Noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaaꞌa teepu Italy mee naneadu-koobatu mu soomaꞌyu.
58013025	“Soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu,” meeꞌe nu nanesootuhiyakwe.
59001001	Nu yow James eka tubope mu tunakaꞌoedykudu-matoo noko mu Jew numu-nagatu tooe hanotu tooe tubo. Nu James ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakabetseadu tubona.
59001002	E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme ka noꞌobatusoo he-kwi suda manepunnena, tamme gi sakwa suda oo sokwamakupana.
59001003	Tamme ka gi ka sutakoo nakabetseanona unu natzooꞌe, ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasootamana, oꞌno oosoo natzooe te mayugwekwu ka te tubetse tunakaꞌoedyuku-kwi. Oꞌno yise tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu.
59001004	Tamme ka ooosapa Te Naa podo meadabena, tamme ka saaꞌa oo moobegwana petugase, onona tamme besow nasootuhibu nasootuhikwu.
59001005	Tamme ka gi sooname tumapuaꞌana, tamme sakwa nanesootuhi Te Naa-matoo, oosoo sakwa ka tu besa yadooape-matoo besa te sokwamatuguse te sootuhi, oosoo besa sooname ka noꞌoko te sootuhina. Soo Te Naa gi numu netsagwikudu ka pumme nanesootuhina hemma pumme tu nanetsakwiyaꞌe.
59001006	Ka nanesootuhina, tamme sakwa tubetse unu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku. Tamme sakwa gi wahaba tusooyugwepana. Tamme ka gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme waha-tamme tusooyugwe, hukwapu-waꞌnekoo sooname-gaꞌyoo. Soo hukwapu puu waha-tamme hukwadu.
59001007	Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa gi te sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59001008	Tamme ka wahaba tusooyugwena gi hemma mamakwu-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59001009	Ka mu numu tamme tutuha manedu gi paba nenaka sapa, oꞌno tamme sakwa besa sokwama soo Te Naa puu paba te sooyugwe.
59001010	Mu ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa oo nakasoopedakwadoo, umu pudusoo yabesoo gadoo manegakwu ka hemma tonegeabu-waꞌnesoo oosoo puu yabesoo tonesaweyakwe. Ka taba udutupunne soo wahabu puu pasayakwe yise soo hemma tonegeana puu saweyakwe yise gi besa tabuayakwe. Soo ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa gi ka hemma tu heega-ma nasoonatzipana ka Te Naa-ma nasoonatzina oꞌno suuꞌmu umu besa sokwamakwu.
59001012	Tamme ka tooe how tooe maneyipana ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, tamme besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa tamme sootuhaꞌe ka unu pumme te soobedya.
59001013	Tamme sakwa ka suda tusooyugwena gi, “Ka Te Naa oe neyugwepana,” mee. Oosoo Te Naa gi suda manedu.
59001014	Oosoo tammesoo suda tusooyukwena suda te wuyukwe.
59001015	Tamme ka ooosapa suda tusooyugwena, pudusoo tamme gi besa manegeakwu. Tamme ka ooosapa suda manetabena oosoo Sutaꞌyoo te goekwu.
59001016	Gi ka Suta-ma nanemooagapana.
59001017	Soo Te Naa ka besow suuꞌmu te sootuhaꞌe. Soo Te Naa ka taba noko ka paatoozooba besa matabuepuna, umu ooosapa ooonneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooosapa besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoo sapa, gi atasoo naneyukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59001018	Soo Te Naa oetu soohanese tu doodooamu te mayugwe ka togekoo tu yadooapu-waꞌnesoo tamme yise o besa doodooamu mane.
59001019	E nanesootuhi nanumu, noꞌyoona sakwa tamme besa oo nakapunne, gi sakwa tamme ooosapa apegeagonopana. Tamme sakwa gi etzaga nidyanapana.
59001020	Tamme nidyanana gi besa manakwe, gi ka Te Naa tamme sooyukwe-waꞌne.
59001021	Tamme sakwa besa-tamme meadabe. Tamme sakwa ka suda te manena maꞌwu. Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa unena nakapunnena oo nakabetsea tamme tu tuukwepu. Ookow unena te magwetzoikwu.
59001022	Tamme sakwa gi tammesoo nanemooagapana. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa unnepu sukwe nakapunnepana, tamme sakwa oo mayohotooe.
59001023	Tamme ka Te Naa unena nakase, yabesoo oo soomuꞌwase,
59001024	tammesoo nabonneꞌe-wikoo nabonnese, ka meahoose te tabuana soomuꞌwahookadu-waꞌne manepunne.
59001025	Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu tamme ka besa oo unnepu nakabetseana gi oo soomuꞌwapana oo tumayohokuna, soo sutaꞌyoo gi te matzooekute. Tamme gi oo soomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59001026	Tamme ka meeoo unena, “Nu ka Te Naa-matoo ooosapa nanesootuhidu pana tamme ka ooosapa sutakoo unegana tamme tammesoo nanemooꞌaka soo Te Naa gi te sootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
59001027	Umu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu puu yooonneꞌyoo: Umu puu mu gi koomamu-gakoo pepeawabe tumatzaꞌe, ka gi naanapuaꞌamu-gakoo tooe hownnekoo tooe suta-kwi mu manepunne tuwazoo. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu gi ka sutakoo po nagekwu.
59002001	E nanesootuhi nanumu, tamme sakwa gi sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matugupana ka numu-nagatu. Tamme ka sumuoosoo suuꞌmu besa matuguna tamme tookwa gi togekoo podo meꞌa.
59002002	Mee nu besasoo mu tuukweꞌe tabuakwu: sumuna wahaꞌyoo nanana te nanesootuhipu-wi pepetuoo. Sumuꞌyooga unu nanenagadu-kwi kwaseadu, yise oa kwehepu maꞌnegea-wi namadabuena. Tamme sumuna meeoo oo netammakwu, “Yaaꞌa soo besaꞌyoo kadunoo. U sakwa yaaꞌa katu.” Soo sumuꞌyoo unu tutuha namadabuedu mooa kwasu-kwi namadabuedu tamme sumuna ookow meeoo netammakwu, “Gi ka kadunoo-kooba katupana. U sakwa yaa ꞌwunu tooetoo yaa teepu-kooba katu.”
59002004	Tamme suda manakwe. Tamme ka sumuoo besa matuguna ka sumuoo-tamme gi besa matuguna, te tusooyugwena gi besa tabuꞌa ka Te Naa-nagwana.
59002005	E pupuamu, ka yaa teepu-koobatu umu tutuha manedu numu-nagatu soo Te Naa sootuhikwu, ka pumme tu nakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme oo manena Te Naa tu doodooamu manepetugakwu. Soo Te Naa meeoo te tubetse netammapu tamme ooosapa saaꞌa oo-baaꞌyookwu, tamme ka oo tubetsetugana, besa oo sooyukwena, besa oo soobedyana. Ooonneꞌyoona sakwa tamme gi mu tutuha manedu numu suda matugupana, ka mu ewow hee-gakoo numu-nagatu puu gi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu ooosapa suda te netammana te wumooaga ka te nanehane-kwikoo.
59002007	Umu suda ka Te Pabeꞌe netamma pu-matoo te nanesootuhina. Oosoo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo tamme-nakwana.
59002008	Soo Te Naa tubetse unnepu oo tubotuguna tamme oo nagetuguna mee naꞌunakwe, “Tamme sakwa noꞌyoona numu soobedya ka tammesoo te tookoo soobedya-waꞌnesoo.” Ookow sakwa tamme nakabetsea oꞌno tamme besa manekwu.
59002009	Tamme ka sumuoosoo mu numu-nagatu besa matuguna, tamme ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.
59002010	Tamme ka noꞌoko Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana, pana sukwe sumuoosoo Te Naa unepu-matu gi nakabetseana, tamme tookwa togesapa gi Te Naa nakabetseadu.
59002011	Yooonekoo sakwa nu besasoo mu tuukwe. Soo Te Naa waha-baa naꞌunedu te tuukwe, “Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, yise sakwa gi too numu patsapana.” Tamme ka numu patsase, tooe gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nanapootamapana, tamme tooesoo ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetsea.
59002012	Soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma, “Tamme sakwa ooosapa mu numu tutuha soobedya.” Tamme ka gi mu numu tumatzina, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo gi tamme tutuha soobedya. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tutuha te sooyugwedu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea oosoo besa kaaheno te mayukwepunne. Soo Te Naa ka meeoo mooasoo te sooyukwepuna, suda te tumaduguna gi tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu.
59002014	Tamme ka mee unena, “Nu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuku,” pana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme gi meeoo une-waꞌne tabuꞌa ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka yoo manena gi namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59002015	Nu besasoo oowetuoo mu tuukwe tabuakwu. Ka tooe haka tooe tamme-baa petuse, tsuayaꞌena, utzutzuna, tutuha namadabuena
59002016	tamme tookwa gi oo soobedyana tamme ka mee oo netammase, “Gi hownneꞌyoo u ka sumuna wutzuꞌmena, besa yooena,” tooe gi hemma oo geapana. Oosoo gi togeꞌyoo tamme ka tammesoo unena gi nakabetseana.
59002017	Ooonneꞌyooona tuwazoo tamme ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi oo nakabetseana, tamme tookwa gi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
59002018	Tamme ka gi tunakabetseana, gi hownnekoo oo tzapoonne-waꞌneꞌyoo ka te tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme ka tunakabetseana oo tzapoonne ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
59002019	Tamme ka meeoo unena tamme Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna oosoo suuꞌmu besaꞌyoo pummatoo te nanesootuhina, pana tamme gi Te Naa nakabetseana, oosoo gi te magwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu tamme-toohatu kwakwase-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka Te Naa-witu soopedakwadoona unu oo-ma umu suaꞌe.
59002020	Mee nu besasoo mu tuukwe tabuakwu. Oosoo gi togeꞌyoo tamme meeoo unena, numme oo nakaꞌoedyukupana gi oo nakabetseana.
59002021	Ka oꞌnosoo te namooatupu Abraham ka Te Naa nakabetsease, ka tu tooa Isaac mee naneadu ka Te Naa-matoosoo nemawuni. Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Oosoo Abraham besaꞌyoo,”
59002022	ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyuukuna, oo tzapoonne tuwazoo ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.
59002023	Ka ꞌyoo manena oosoo oo tzapoonne, soo Te Naa unnepu togesapa, soo meeꞌe natubodu, “Abraham Te Naa puaꞌa.” Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Abraham besaꞌyoo ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.”
59002024	Soo Te Naa meeoo besaꞌyoo tamme ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna oo nakabetseana. Gi sakwa sukwe tunakaꞌoedyukuna mee naneyugwepana.
59002025	Oꞌnosoo tuwazoo Rahab mee naneadu mogoꞌne oo tzapoone ka Te Naa-wi tu tunakaꞌoedyukuna tu mane-kwi. Ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu ka Te Naa doodooamu-nagatu pu-baa petugase, soo Rahab ka mu numu watze tuꞌeyaꞌedu watzetugu, soo Rahab mu watze tumatzi. Ka ꞌyoo tu mane-kwi, oosoo oo tzapoonne soo Te Naa meeoo, “Soo Rahab besaꞌyoo.”
59002026	Yoo manepunne soo te tookoo yaanopana, tamme gi hee ka te moogooa gadooꞌookoo. Ooonneꞌyoona tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukute mee unepana gi tunakabetseana, te tunakaꞌoedyukuna gi hee.
59003001	E pupuaꞌamu, huuꞌyoosoo tamme-nagatu sakwa numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu mane. Soo Te Naa mu numu nanesootuhi tutunedyooedu unu tunakabetsea manena soogwaꞌe, noꞌoko numu ooonakwasoo.
59003002	Noꞌyoona tamme tuneꞌemukwa. Soo tooe haga tooe gi tuneꞌemukwudu tookwa tubetse besaꞌyoo.
59003003	Soo numu ego puu tuutseꞌyoo pana tooe ka tuutsekoo hemma paba mesoo nemadabue. Soo natzipu puu tuutseꞌyoo pana tamme ka pookoo tupa-wi oo hanese, soo pookoo te nakabetseana tooe howtoo tooe pumme te tzamuna, tamme soomane-kwaꞌnesoo manenumme.
59003004	Soo sake natzakohakunoo puu tuutseꞌyoo pana ka sake tzamuna, ka tutzidu soomane-kwaꞌne tooe unu tu hukwa sapa. Umu-waꞌneꞌyoo soo numu ego tuutseꞌyoo pana ewa suta-kwi numu nemayukwe.
59003005	Tuutseꞌyoo goso puu paba haano-kwi tooe hemma tooe nikute. Mu numu ego ka goso-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo suta numu ego neyugwedu ka teepu-toohatu ooosapa nidabedu gi tookedu goso-nakwana kemmadu. Soo te ego noꞌoko te tookoo totsaba geꞌa ka suda te mane tuunguna.
59003007	Noꞌobatusoo hemma modu soo numu mesoo madusooyookute: hootsebaꞌa tooe togogwa sapa tuwazoo.
59003008	Pana tooe haga tooe gi hownnekoo pummesoo ego unikwuna tzi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo numu ego puu ewa nanasuda numu unekute.
59003009	Susumana tamme oo-ma Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, yise susumana te pupuꞌamu nesootzeꞌma, oo namanedu gi besaꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, ka Te Naa mu numu pu-kwaꞌnesoo mu matabuese. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina numu nesootzemapana nanoꞌo-kwizoo.
59003011	E pupuaꞌamu, nu sakwa besasoo mu tuukwe tabua. Sumuꞌyoo patzona puu besa kamadu baa-gana, gi osa kamadu baa-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo tuwazoo.
59003012	Sumuꞌyoo tumasuape pu gi nanakummaꞌakoosoo suakute. Soo osa baa puu gi hannanoꞌo besa kama-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina numu nesootzemapana nanoꞌo-kwizoo.
59003013	Tamme numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu ka kaahenotu soopedakwadoona, gi sakwa paba nasooyukwepana. Tamme sakwa ka mu numu tzapoonneku ka Te Naa besa podo te meana, ka gi nanahana, gi numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyugwena.
59003014	Tamme ka nanahana, numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyukwena, tamme ka toge naꞌunepu gi nakabetsea.
59003015	Tamme ka nanahana oo-koobatoo paba nasooyugwena, tamme gi ka Te Naa toge unnepu nakabetseꞌa, pana tamme mu numu tumaduguna ka kwase-gakoo unena tamme nakabetsea.
59003016	Soo numu ka puusoo besa nasooyukwena numu ooonakwasoo, umu tooe how tooe nanasuda manena nananuusoogweduna mu numu yise ooweoo nanahaꞌa.
59003017	Tamme ka Te Naa kaaheno unnepu nakabetseana, tamme yooonneꞌyoo: gi totsaꞌa, gi nanano nanahaꞌa, besa numu matugu, besa numu nakasoopedakwadoo, numu tumatzina, ka toge-kwitu soopedakwadoona, kaahenoꞌyoona.
59003018	Umu gi tu nanakwohonena petzabedu, nananosoo besa hemma hanekwu, oosoo yise umu-matoo kodyuka umu yise besaꞌyookwu.
59004001	Tamme numu nanano nanakoꞌe, tamme ka tammesoo nakoobatoo hemma soogwina.
59004002	Tamme yise ka te nekwina gi hanena tamme nanahakooha, sumuna nanagoekwu yise sumuna tamme matu tu puaꞌa patsowkwu. Tamme ka gi hemma hee-gana, tamme ka gi oowetuoo Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
59004003	Tamme yise ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhise, oosoo gi ooka te geana, tamme ka tammesoo sutakoo natoogoo hemma sookwina.
59004004	Tamme unu suda manakwe ka ooosapa tooe hemma tooe natoogoosoo soogwina. Tamme ka Sutakoo tumatzina Sutakoo pupuaꞌa-gaꞌyoo. Gi tamme ka Te Naa puaꞌa-gana Sutakoo tuwazoo pupuaꞌa-ga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
59004005	Meeoo natubotugu, “Soo Te Naa te matabuese, te moogooa te geapu. Oosoo meeoo te soobedyana tamme sakwa ookow suuꞌmu nakabetsea.”
59004006	Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka te tumatzina, ka oo nabotugu-kwaꞌnesoo mee naꞌunedu, “Soo Te Naa mu numu besa nasooyugwedu tumooꞌoo, pana mu sootuhaꞌe umu gi oo manedu.”
59004007	Tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyukwepana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa gi ka tamme-toohatu kwase-gakoo nakabetseapana. Tamme ka kwase-gakoo tubetse unu tumooꞌoose oosoo suihoose, namameahookwu.
59004008	Tamme sakwa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi, oꞌno yise oosoo te sootuhikwu. Ka te nuumaduguna besow, tamme sakwa gi totsabuga mane. Tamme sakwa gi waha-baa tusooyugwepana, tamme sakwa ooosapa Te Naa-witu soomayu, oꞌno tamme ooosapa Te Naa-noꞌyookwu.
59004009	Tamme sakwa unu suda sokwama ka suda tumaduguse.
59004010	Tamme ka gi numu ooonakwasoo besa nasooyugwena, tamme oo soopedakwadoo tamme gi maaꞌwaꞌneꞌyoo soo Te Pabeꞌe te sootuhise besasoo te matabuekwu.
59004011	E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi nesootzemapana. Tamme ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nesootzemana mee unena, “Oosoo suda manakwe,” tamme tookwa punnoꞌo gi ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, “Noꞌoko numu besa nematugu.” Tamme tookwa gi meeoo sokwama, tamme numu nemadunagaꞌa meeꞌe,
59004012	pana soo Te Naa suuꞌmu numu nemadunagakwu. Mooasoo Te Naa tu unnepu mu numu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu numu gadoo mesoo mayugwekwu, tooetoo numu magwetzoikwu. Tamme sakwa gi kukummaꞌakoosoo mu numu nemadunagapana.
59004013	Tamme gi mu numu tuukwe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka saaꞌa hemma manikwuna, tamme ka gi oo soopedakwadoona. Tamme sumuna mee unekwu, “Nu saaꞌa o mease, o tomodooa, hemma-ma tumuna, besa manepunnedooa.” Pana tamme gi oo soopedakwatoo ka hemma manekwuna. Tamme gi oo soopedakwatoo ka oꞌnoto te momokwuna. Ka pagunabe-kwaꞌne ka te songapu yabesoo gadoo manise, tamme yaꞌehookwu.
59004015	Tamme sakwa uga meeꞌe une, “Soo Te Naa meeoo te sooyugwena, tamme togesoo momona, tamme yoo manekwu.”
59004016	Tamme tookwa nanaꞌunakwe tamme ka meeoo unena tamme oo soopedakwatoo ka te manekwuna. Oosoo gi besa naꞌunedu.
59004017	Tamme ka oo soopedakwatoona ka besa te manekwuna pana gi oo manena, tamme tubetse unu tumaꞌemukwa.
59005001	Mu tubetse ewow hee-gaꞌyoo numu sakwa ka tu manekwuna soopedakwatoona, umu sumuna sakwikwu, soo suda mu tumadugupu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
59005002	Soo mu hee-gana yungusanadooadooa tookana-kwana, mu wunapu kwasu unu nanenakadu mu woabe sooakwu.
59005003	Umuoo ka mu tzapoonnekuna ka saaꞌa gi hee manepetukwu. Umu meeoo sokwama, “Numme ewatsekoo hemma hee-gaꞌyoo, nummesoo oo nanomatugukwu.” Pana gi! Umu moogoobuna soo suda mu tumadugupu mu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Oosoo goso-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoosoo ka saaꞌa mu kootsasooakukwu. Tooe ka suda namanedu umu-matoosoo kodyuse sapa, umu togesoo ewow tu hee geapunnena soogwipunne.
59005004	Umu ooosapa ka pumme tumatzidu wumooꞌaga ka umu mu natumanagaku-kwi. Umu mu tumatziwabe ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, mu nanekwegeakwu.
59005005	Yaa ka teepu-koobatu ewow mu hee-gana ka unu moogoobuna besa sokwamana yabesoo ewa mu hee-gana gadoo namayugwekwu.
59005006	Umu besaꞌyoo numu puu nabatsakwu umu ka besaꞌyoona, ka gi umu-punatusoo mawaꞌe. Pana saaꞌa soo suda mu manepu umu-matasoo kodyukwu.
59005007	E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa gi nasootookepana tuutooe, ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoosoo oo kodyukwunoꞌotoo, soo tumasuadu puu tuutooe. Oosoo tumasuadu puu besow ka a pooe masuꞌa. Soo tumasuadu yise ewatsekoo baa wutooe, oꞌnosoo oo tumasuana besa naakwu. Soo tumasuadu wutooe besow oo naakwuna, tuwazoo oo kwasukwuna, oꞌno yise oo kwasuse, oo yasakwu.
59005008	Tamme sakwa yise ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyukwuna wutooe, pudusoo oosoo tamme-baasoo kodyu petukwu.
59005009	Pudusoo Te Pabeꞌe te tunemadabuekukwu. Tamme sakwa yise gi mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu suda netammanapana. Tamme ka suda mu netammana, soo Te Naa punnoꞌo suda te netammakwu.
59005010	E pupuaꞌamu, mu te nanamooatupu Te Naa nanayadooakudu te tzapoonnekute umu puu gi nasootooke tooe suda manepunnepana.
59005011	Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa mu tubetse sootuhikwu. Soo nana, Job mee naneadu, puu ootoogoo meapu, oosoo nanasuda manepu pana gi nasootooke. Ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa noꞌoko hemma besa oo matabueku. Soo Te Naa ooonneꞌyoo besaꞌyoo oosoo tamme tu sootuhina yise tamme tu tumatzina petzape.
59005012	Yise e pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa ooosapa toge-kwitu numu tuukwe. Tamme meeoo unena, “Gi esayipana, o togetukana o waha. Tamme ka meeoo unena, tooetoo ka oo kwayadu-kwisoo unena oosoo sakwa ka gi kaaheno unena, soo Te Naasoo saaꞌa te nemadabuedooa.”
59005013	Tamme sakwa ka suda manepunnena nanesootuhi. Ka besa sokwamana tamme sakwa tunekwu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina.
59005014	Sumuꞌyoo tamme-nagatu ka tuoeyise, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu moohedu sakwa oosoo nekwi. Ka oo-baa petuse, ka yoohoo oo-ma oo tsematzuase nanesootuhiku.
59005015	Tamme ka nanesootuhina tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tuoeyaedu numu besa mayugweyakwe. Soo tuoeyaꞌedu numu tuwazoo ka tumaꞌemakwase, soo Te Naa oo soomuꞌwakwu.
59005016	Tamme sakwa ka tumaꞌemukwana kaaheno toge-witu nanatuukwena ka tumaꞌemukwana, yise nanano nanesootuhina, tamme yise besa manekwu. Soo besa tunakabetseadu numu ka oo nanesootuhikuna oosoo ka ewow pooha-gana ewa besa tumayukwe.
59005017	Ka oꞌnosoo soo nana Elijah mee naneadu ooonneꞌyoo. Oosoo uga tamme-waꞌneꞌyoosoo: sukwe numu. Oosoo ka Te Naa nanetsagwayaꞌe yise nanesootuhina, ka gi tu powmakwuna nekwise. Esoo gi powmakwu pahe tomo-baa noꞌoko naapahe muha-baawitoo gi powmakwu.
59005018	Soo Elijah yise nanesootuhi, powmabe nekwina, yise powmabetu, noꞌyoona mu hee namasuadu besa naa.
59005019	E pupuaꞌamu, soo numu ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwukase, tamme sakwa oetusoo oo nekodyuku.
59005020	Tamme ka neꞌemukwadu ka Te Naa besa podo nekodyuse, tamme oo yaꞌekwuna-makoo oo magwetzoi, soo suda oo tumaduguna yise nasoomuꞌwukwu. Yaatoo nu a nemoobekwakakwu.
60001001	Esoo Peter, Te Naa yadooawabe tubona, ka mu Jew numu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo, mana ka mu teepu Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia noꞌoko Bithynia mee nananeadu-kwi nonobe-gaꞌyoo.
60001002	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa meeoo unnepu soo oo Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetsea. Nu meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, “Soo Te Naa sakwa mu sootuhise mu magwetzoi.”
60001003	Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nesookwugi, oosoo ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus Naa. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda. Soo Te Naa te sootuhise tu doodooamu te mayugweke.
60001004	Soo Te Naa te sootuhina ooosapa te tummatzikwu, gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka puu-baa te petugase.
60001005	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha te mabetseakwu, tamme ka oe tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Oosoo ooosapa tamme-kooba tueyaꞌedu pu-baa te petuganoꞌoto tooe te magwetzoikwu, ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo oo yugwekwuse.
60001006	Tamme besa sokwama ka a namanekwuna soopedakwuna, tooe menoꞌo noꞌobatusoo mu numu numme wohoꞌne sapa, mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa.
60001007	Mu numu tamme netumooꞌoodu te mapoonnena how unu tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo tamme oo tubetse nakaꞌoedyukute, oosoo ka ese tupe tooetoo ka oa tupe ooonakwasoo nanenagadu. Umu kadoo mesoo namayugwedu. Soo ese tupe ka oa tupe-no puu besa namadabue, ka goso-koobakoo nakoopatooekuna. Ooonnekoo mu oo mesoo natunedyooꞌe mu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka numu mumme wohoꞌne, oꞌno yise mu ooosapa tunakaꞌoedyukumokwu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus kodyu petuse, mu yise besa nanemadabuekwu.
60001008	Tooe mu gi ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnedupana, mu oo soobedyana, oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, besa sokwamana, besa pumme waha-waꞌne.
60001009	Mu ka Te Naa besa po mobegwana petugase, mu namagwetzoikwu mu ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
60001010	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe oo botugu, ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsakwuna, yise oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo namayodakwuna. Umu ka ekow naꞌunnedu-kwitu soohanena, “Hannanoꞌogina ꞌyoo namanekwu, hagagina?” mee sokwama, mu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Besa Pooha ka yadooawabe tuukweꞌe soo mu tubotuguna gi umutusoo, oosoo tammetu. Umu te tuukweꞌe ka Te Naa besa unnepu soo Te Naa yise tutuha te soobedyana te magwetzoi.
60001013	Tamme sakwa tammesoo namabetsea kaaheno tusooyugwena, gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu-ma emukwapana, tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna, soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo oo kodyu petuse.
60001014	Tamme oꞌnosoo uga ka sutakoo podo meadape. Tamme gi ka Te Naa po sopedakwadoona.
60001015	Pana menoꞌo tamme sakwa yooꞌmane soo Te Naa ka besaꞌyoona, tamme sakwa oo-waꞌneꞌyoo, ooosapa besa manemo.
60001016	Mee nabotugu soo Te Naa unnena, “Mu sakwa besaꞌyoo ka nuka puu besow.”
60001017	Tamme ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe ka oo doodooamuna, tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakabetsea, tamme oo sopedakwadoona oosoo unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo gi numu nenaboꞌa ka numu nemadabuekwuse, ka numu besa tooetoo suda manakwe. Tamme gi ooosapa yaa teepu-koobatu. Esoo teepu gi pukwi te natzepotuguna.
60001018	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Pabeꞌe nanetutzea, gisoo ka teepu namatabuꞌe, tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwudu, oꞌno tamme namagwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa petu, tamme yise ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoopana oosoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe oo yaꞌe-kwikoo oo mayoda, oo Besa Pooha yise te tuukweꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Oꞌno yise soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakute, “Soo Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo,” mee. Soo tooe hee tooe kadooꞌoo mesoo namayugwedu gi puma te namagwetzoi-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme yise ka sutakoo po-makoo namagwetzoi, ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
60001022	Tamme tammesoo besa namayugwenokwu ka Te Naa besa podo meakwuse. Tamme unu nanasoobedya ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya.
60001023	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna yise pudu numu namayugwemena ka Te Naa unnepu-ma. Soo Te Naa unnepu gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
60001024	Meeoo natubotugu: “Noꞌyoona numu tuikwu. Wahabu-kwaꞌne kadoo namayugwekwu, noꞌyoona hee numu besa sooyugwena atonegea-kwaꞌne pudusoo napoohekwunikwu.
60001025	Pana soo Te Naa unnepu ooosapa gi moobegwagakwu.” Yow esoo besa naꞌunnepu mu natuukwena.
60002001	Tamme sakwa ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, tamme sakwa gi numu nemooagapana, gi tuwazoo besa nasooyugwena, kukummaꞌakoosoo numu nasoodyagena, yise gi nananesootzemapana.
60002002	Tamme sakwa kaaheno ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe te sopedakwadoona petzape, ka pudu oongaꞌa tu petzekwuna oo soogwaꞌe-kwaꞌne. Tamme namagwetzoise, oꞌno yise tamme besa manekekwu.
60002003	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa besaꞌyoona te sootuhikwu.
60002004	Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe netutzea, tooe gi mu susumudu numu ooka petzape sapa. Ooonneꞌyoona ka Te Naa ooka sopedakwatoo-wikoo tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse soogwipunnekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo, oosoo puu Te Naa nobe-matu manepunnena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa pooha hee-gaꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna tamme ookow tupe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-matu hee-gaꞌyoo. Tamme punnoꞌo mu numu mesoo nanesootuhikute. Soo Te Naa ka te nanesootuhina nekwegeꞌa, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase.
60002006	Mee natubotugu oosoo Te Naa unnena, “Nu ka Mu Pabeꞌe netutzeapu. Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka tupe namadabuena ka nobe pukooba katu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka mu Jew numu moohekwudu, oosoo sakwa unu nasoobedya. Tooe haga tooe ka Mu Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu gi nasookwikwu.”
60002007	Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe unu soobedya ka oo nakaꞌoedyukuna pana umu gi oo nakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo heesoobedya. Mee natubotugu, soo Te Naa meeoo, “Umu Jew numu moohedu gi ka Mu Pabeꞌe heesoobedyapana, nu yise ookow numu moohe tuunguna.” Mee tuwazoo.
60002008	“Soo Mu Pabeꞌe ka tupe mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu puma tukwutzangeyi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Umuoo ka Mu Pabeꞌe-ma nasookwaꞌe. Umuoo kadoo namayakwekwu umu ka gi oo nakaꞌoedyukuna.” Umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-ma nasookwaꞌe, umu ka gi Te Naa unnepu nakabetseꞌa. Yoo mu manekwuna soo Te Naa sopedakwadoo.
60002009	Pana mu gi ooonneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa mu netutzeapu tu doodooamu manekwutu pumatoo tubetse nanesootuhikwutu ka Te Naa podo meadapekwutu. Oꞌno mu ka mu numu tuukwekoo ka oo besaꞌyoona oosoo tooe ka uga gi ooka mu nakasopedakwatoo sapa ooka mu sopedakwadoona mu mayugweke. Ka togano-wiꞌyoona mu puu gi hemma poonne-waꞌneꞌyoo, oo uga manepunne. Menoꞌo yise oosoo ka tabua-kwitoo mu moohekese, mu yise noꞌoko hemma poonnena oo nakasopedakwatoo.
60002010	Mu uga oꞌnosoo gi ka Te Naa tubetse doodooamu, pana menoꞌo yise oosoo tu doodooamu mu mayugweke. Oꞌnosoo uga soo Te Naa gi mu sootuhaꞌe menoꞌo yise besa mu sootuhaꞌe.
60002011	E nanumu, nu togesapa mu netamma mu sakwa ka suda mu tusooyugwena gi tumayohokupana, tamme gi ekow teepu-kooba tubetse manepunne-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme ka yaanona wakwawaꞌa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo nakabetseapana, tooe meeoo sokwamapana. Tamme ka oo nakabetseana, soo sutaꞌyoo kadoo te mayugwekwu.
60002012	Tamme sakwa ooosapa kaaheno meadabe, tooe ka mu kukummaꞌakoosoo numu tamme sutaꞌyoo mee tamme mu netamma sapa, saaꞌa umu oo sopedakwadookwu tamme tookwa besaꞌyoo. Umu ka puusoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekese, oꞌno umu oo sopedakwadookwu, ka kaaheno tamme tumatuguna. Umu yise meeoo unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa tookwa besaꞌyoo.”
60002013	Tamme sakwa ka mu numu moohedu nakabetsea, ka Te Pabeꞌe umu netutzeapu. Mu noꞌobatusoo numu moohedu, ka suda manedu mesoo wutuma tuungu. Ka umu besow numu meeoo netamma, “Ka oo mu manena numme mu besaꞌyookute.”
60002015	Ka besa tumatuguna, ookow soo Te Naa besaꞌyookute. Oꞌno mu gi te togeꞌyookudu numu gi haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo.
60002016	Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa maneno ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nakabetseana. Tamme gi nasookwipana ka how soomanena, oꞌno tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo tamme neyugwe-kwaꞌne mane.
60002017	Tamme sakwa noꞌoko numu besa matugu. Tamme sakwa nanasoobedyana, tamme ka noꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe nanumuna. Tamme sakwa ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna ka Te Naa besa ooosapa sooyugwe.
60002018	Mu ka numu tummatzina, mu sakwa mu nakabetsea ka hayoo mumme mu netamma, mu ka Te Naa nakabetseana. Ka mumme mu nesagwikute sapa, tooetoo ka besa mumme mu nematugu sapa tuwazoo mu nakabetsea.
60002019	Mu ka Te Naa nakabetseana soo Te Naa besa mu-matoo soonammekwu ka mee mu unakwe, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo tooe nu namaꞌehoose sapa, ka mu numu nuga kuseka. Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka Te Naa nakabetsea, nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo nu-matoo besa soonammekwu.”
60002020	Soo Te Naa gi oo nakaheesoobedya ka meeoo te sukwe unakwe, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu ka nakusekahoose nu ka suda manena,” pana soo Te Naa besa tamme-matoo soonammekwu ka mee te unakwe, “Tooe nu nakusekapana nu ka besa mu matuguna, oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo ka tooge manena.”
60002021	Soo Te Naa te netutzea ka yoo manekwutu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nakusega, tamme sakwa oo-waꞌneꞌyoona oo nageno.
60002022	Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi maꞌemukwa, gi numu nemooagadu.
60002023	Tooe ka mu numu suda pukwitu mu netamma sapa, oosoo puu umuoo gi suda netamma. Ka mu numu pumme kuseka, oosoo gi mu nedyooikute. Oosoo oo nakaꞌoedyukute soo Te Naa oo tummatzikwu. Soo Te Naa toge ka mu numu nemadabuena.
60002024	Tamme ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa besa po ooemota meadu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tamme-koobatoo nabatsa, soo Te Naa yise ka te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwa. Tamme yise ka sutakoo po maꞌwukase, ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu. Tamme namagwetzoi soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Menoꞌo yise tamme ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyu, oosoo tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe.
60003001	Mu momokoꞌne koomamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa tu koomamu nakabetsea. Tooe gi ka mu koomamu tunakaꞌoedyukute sapa, umu-matoo tunakaꞌoedyuku manekwu, ka mumme momokoꞌne ooonnekoo, tooe gi hayoo mu unakwe sapa.
60003002	Umu oo sopedakwadookwu mu Te Naa doodooamu umu ka mu poonnena, mumme mane-makoo, mu ka Te Naa besa podo meadu.
60003003	Mu sakwa gi muusoo unu besa namabetseapana, mu tzopuhu mabetsabena, tooetoo unu nanenagadu-wi namasooana. Mu sakwa besa tabua ka gi nidyapuna, besaꞌyoona.
60003004	Mu ka besaꞌyoona, mu unu nanenagadu besa tabuadu namasooape-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Esoo punnoꞌo gi kadooꞌoo namayugwe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ooonnekoo soo Te Naa besa sooyugwe.
60003005	Ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa doodooamu mu momokoꞌne ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna besa namabetzape, yise pummesoo koomamu nakabetseꞌa.
60003006	Soo Sarah mee naneadu puu uga ooonneꞌyoo, oosoo ka tu kooma Abraham nakabetseꞌa. Mu oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu, mu ka besa manena gi noꞌokosoo hemma suda soonammekuna.
60003007	Mu nanana nonodukwamu-gaꞌyoo sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu nodukwamu gi mu-kwaꞌne nanatzooe. Mu sakwa besaꞌyoo mee mu sooyukwe umu ka mu natummatzina soogwina, besa nanamatuguna ka nanapa nobe-gana. Soo Te Naa yise ka pumme mu nanetzakwiyaꞌe mu nakasootuhikwu, ka yoo mu manakwe.
60003008	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa noꞌyoona nanakwaꞌnesoo unnena, tusooyugwena, ka mu pupuaꞌamu suda sokwama mu punnoꞌo sakwa tutuha mu soobedya, unu nanasoobedyana nanasamoomu-kwaꞌne, besa nanamatuguna, mu sakwa gi meeoo tusooyugwepana, “Numme numu ooonakwa besaꞌyoo,” mee.
60003009	Mu sakwa gi numu nesootzemapana, tooe mumme mu nesootzema sapa. Tamme sakwa mu numu tamme wohonedu nanesootuhiku, soo Te Naa meeoo te netamma. Tamme ka mu numu nanesootuhikuna, soo Te Naa tamme sootuhikwu.
60003010	Tamme oo sopedakwadoo oosoo ka meeꞌe nabotuguna. “Tamme ka gi suda apegeana, gi tunesootzemana, tamme wunaꞌmetoo momokwu, te sokwama-kwaꞌnesoo.
60003011	Tamme sakwa kaaheno meadabe, yise ka suda te maꞌnawena tzadyooiku. Tamme sakwa ooosapa nanano tuunoyugwe.
60003012	Soo Te Naa oo sopedakwadoo ka numu besa manakwe, oosoo yise ka putamme mu nanesootuhina nekwekakwu. Pana soo Te Naa ka mu suda tumatugudu numu tumooꞌookwu.”
60003013	Gi haga te manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoo tamme ka kaaheno tubetse tusooyugwena.
60003014	Soo Te Naa te sootuhikwu ka mu numu tamme tumooꞌoo, tamme yise kaaheno meadabekwu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe nakabetseana oo-matoo nanesootuhi. Tamme sakwa gi mu numu-ma suipana, tamme nekusekadu gi suda oo soonammekupana ka tooe how tooe tamme mu yugwesapa. Tamme sakwa ooosapa besa ka mu numu tuukwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, ka ooka mu soonaka, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna.
60003016	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka toge manena. Oꞌno sumuna umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo te nekusekadu nasookwikwu. Umu sumuna nasookwina te tumooꞌookwu ka toge te manakwe.
60003017	Ka Te Naa meeoo unakwe oosoo besa ka te nanekuseka ka toge te manakwe. Tamme ka maꞌemukwase, mu numu sakwa te tumooꞌoo. Oosoo gi besa, tamme suda manena.
60003018	Soo Te Naa te maꞌemukwana soomuꞌwakwu, oꞌno tamme yise oo doodooamu manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsase. Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa ka Te Naa nakabetseapana, oosoo tamme tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsapu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase, oo tookoo suuꞌmu yaꞌe oo moogooa gi yaꞌe.
60003019	Soo Te Pabeꞌe moogooa ka susumudu moogooa nanesootuhibu tunedyooꞌe.
60003020	Umuoo moogooa ka umu numu gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu-matu ka Noah tu sake mabetsape, tooe soo Te Naa wunaꞌme mu wutooꞌese sapa, ka sutakoo po mu maꞌwukakwuna. Pana namewatsukweꞌyoo (8) numu namagwetzoi, oꞌno ka baa-makoo, umuoo, oꞌno ka sake-wi, ka Te Naa ka teepu batatsopakuse.
60003021	Ka Noah baa-makoo namagwetzoipu-kwaꞌnesoo, tamme namagwetzoi tamme ka baa-wi namatzakana. Tamme ka baa-wi namatzakana, tamme namagwetzoi ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee mu te mesoo netamma. Soo Te Naa oo mesoo manakwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoduse, menoꞌo yise ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona noꞌoko poohabe nemadabue. Gi tamme baa-wi namatzaka ka totsabu te tookoo-makoo sukwe tsabatsugana.
60004001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo, tooe mu numu e kusekapana.” Tamme sakwa oo-waꞌnesoo tusooyugwe, tooe tamme tu mooedyukwe sapa, tamme sakwa ka sutakoo po maꞌwuka.
60004002	Oꞌno yise tamme ka Te Naa mesoo nakabetsea, gi ka suda te manena tumayohokuna.
60004003	Mooasoo tamme ka oꞌnosoo suda manakwe, umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-waꞌne. Tamme uga ka suda te tumatuguna nakabetseana tooe how tooe suda manena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu-no nabootamana, baagoena, hemma namadabue-matoo nanesootuhina, tooe oo sopedakwadoopana oosoo gi besa namanedu.
60004004	Umu te pupuaꞌamu te nekuseka, umu ka gi te nakasopedakwadoona, ka suda mu manakwe tamme gi umu-ma tzabekaꞌa.
60004005	Pana ka saaꞌa umu puusoo ka tu tumaꞌemukwapu-kwitu Te Naa tuukwedooa. Soo Te Naa yise mu nemadabuekwu ka how mu besow tooetoo mu sutakoo numu.
60004006	Noꞌyoona numu natuukwe Te Pabeꞌe-witu, umu tuipu moogooa punnoꞌo. Oꞌno yise umu tooe mooasoo tuise sapa, umu sumuna saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa mesoo nobe-gakwu ka tu moogooa menoꞌo ooka nakabetsease.
60004007	Pudusoo soo Te Naa atasoo eka teepu yugwekwu. Tamme sakwa kaaheno tusooyugwena gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu nakabetseapana, oꞌno yise tamme besa nanesootuhimokwu.
60004008	Tamme sakwa ooosapa unu nanasoobedya, tamme puu gi ka numu maꞌemukwa oo poonne, ka unu mu soobedyana.
60004009	Tamme sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nabaaꞌyooku, ka tooe hannanoꞌo tooe tamme-baa mu petuse.
60004010	Tamme sakwa tammesoo nanasootuhi, soo Te Naa puu nanaꞌatamasoo te sootuhaꞌe ka besa te nanatummatzaꞌe.
60004011	Sumuna soo Te Naa besa te yadooakuna te sootuhi. Tamme sakwa oo mesoo wahakwuni, ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna. Sumuna soo Te Naa numu te tummatzikwuna te sootuhi. Tamme sakwa besa numu tummatzi, soo Te Naa ka meeoo te netammana. Oꞌno yise mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-tooha meadu mee unnekwu, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Mu numu sakwa ooosapa meeoo ka Te Naa-witu netammayi, “Noꞌyoona hee sakwa oo nakabetsea.”
60004012	E pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa oo sopedakwadoo mu numu mu tumooꞌookwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu te nanetumooꞌoo ka tamme namaboonnena weehepu goso-ma namaboonne-kwaꞌne. Mu sakwa besa sokwama mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoona. Mu numu mu tumooꞌoona mu wohonekwu ka Te Pabeꞌe tu tumooꞌoopu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu tubetse besa sokwamakwu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme oo sootuhise, mu oo sopedakwadookwu oosoo tookwa Te Naa-waꞌneꞌyoosoo. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma mumme tu sootuhise tooe mumme tu tumooꞌoo sapa mu besa sokwamakwu.
60004015	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha besa mu mayugwekwu. Gi haga mu-matu sakwa tumaꞌemukwana oowetuoo suda nasooyugwepana. Mu sakwa gi suda manepana, gi numu batzapana, gi hemma tuduhapana, gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu matzamapana.
60004016	Pana mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nakwutumase, mu sakwa gi oo nasookwikupana. Mu sakwa besa sokwama, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
60004017	Menoꞌo soo Te Naa ka mu numu nemadabuedyakwe, mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka tu doodooamu nemadabuekwu, pana saaꞌa umu gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukudu mu ooonakwasoo nuummabu wumakwu.
60004018	Meeꞌe nabotugu; “Soo besa tunakaꞌoedyukudu unusoo manena namagwetzoi, umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi hownnekoosoo puu namagwetzoikwu.”
60004019	Soo Te Naa ka suda nuummaba wumakoo mee te soobedyana, tamme sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku oosoo te mabetseana, tamme ooosapa kaaheno meadabeno.
60005001	Nu mumme nanesootuhidu moohedu tuukwekwu, ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu mu-kooba mu tuꞌeyaꞌe tuunguna. Ka numu-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌedu besa soonammena gi mu natumanakakwuna umu-nakwana sookwipunnepana. Nu yoo mu mane tuungu nu punnoꞌo yow nanesootuhidu moohedu. Nu oo pooonne, soo Te Pabeꞌe unu nuummaba wumase nabatsa, nu yise saaꞌa mu-kwaꞌnesoo besa soonammedooa ka oo kodyu petuse, oosoo ka Te Tubetse Naa-waꞌneꞌyoo.
60005003	Mu sakwa mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa besa podo meadabe tuungu, umu sakwa punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo. Mu sakwa gi suda mu neyugwepana.
60005004	Ka saaꞌa ka Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa tamme-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌedu petuse, oosoo mu manena besaꞌyookukwu mee te netammakwu.
60005005	Mu tootooebetse-no, sususuꞌa sakwa ooosapa mu nanamooatupu nakabetsea. Tamme sakwa tammesoo gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana oosoo ka mee nabotuguna, “Soo Te Naa ka umu besa nasooyugwedu numu gi besa sooyugwe. Oosoo te sootuhaꞌe ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe.”
60005006	Ooonneꞌyoona tamme sakwa gi numu ooonakwa besa nasooyugwepana. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu te nemadabuekwu. Ka gi numu ooonakwa besa te nasooyugwe, oosoo Te Naa ka saaꞌa meeoo mesoo unakwe, “Mu besaꞌyoo,” mee.
60005007	Tamme sakwa gi tooe hemma tooe suda soonammekupana. Tamme sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyuku soo Te Naa te mabetsea.
60005008	Tamme sakwa gi ka sutakoo tamme maꞌemukwadu-ma emukwapana. Tamme sakwa namabetseapunne, oꞌno soo Sutaꞌyoo te wohonedu, gi te matzooekute. Soo Sutaꞌyoo te wohonedu te nesootzemadu, kadoo te mayugwekwu mee tusooyugwe, nunuꞌa-waꞌne.
60005009	Tamme oo mesoo matzooekute, ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Tamme oo sopedakwadoona manatutooe noꞌyoona mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kooba nakusega.
60005010	Gi haaꞌnoto tamme nakusegapunnese, ka saaꞌa soo Te Naa te sootuhise te magwetzoikwu tamme yise unusoo tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Soo Te Naa suuꞌmu te sootuhidu te netutzea ooosapa pubaaꞌyookwutu, tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna.
60005011	Tamme mee nanesootuhaꞌe, “U, Ne Naa, noꞌoko hemma mabetseanokwu umesoo besa pooha-ma.”
60005012	Silvanus mee naneadu nana, ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Oosoo eka tubope mu-matoo gwuukakwu. Nu gi haaꞌno mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu tuukwena soo Te Naa te tubetse magwetzoikwu. Mu sakwa ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyuku, soo Te Naa mu magwetzoikwu.
60005013	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa ka Rome mee naneadu-kwitu mu soomaꞌyu. Soo e besa puaꞌa, Mark mee naneadu punnoꞌo mu soomaꞌyu.
60005014	Mu sakwa besa nanapuaꞌana unu nanasoobedya. Nu meeoo nanesootuhiyakwe, soo Te Naa noꞌoko mu sootuhikwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe doodooamuna.
61001001	Ka Simon Peter-makoo, Te Pabeꞌe Jesus nakabetseadu oo yadooawabe tubono, umu Te Naa tu dooamu-matoo, umu nu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu. Soo Te Naa mu sootuhaꞌe numme tu sootuhi-kwaꞌnesoo.
61001002	Nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe soo Te Naa mu magwetzoina mu sootuhikwu ka nanaꞌunusoo mu tunakaꞌoedyukute ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi.
61001003	Soo Te Naa mooasoo te tuukwe, oosoo te tubetse mabetseakwu. Tamme gi ka sutakoo podo meakwu, ka mu numu suda soomanedu yaa teepu-koobatu nagena, tamme ka Te Naa Pooha hee-gana. Tamme yise ka Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu, tamme ka unu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna. Soo Te Naa te netutzea tamme oo-waꞌnesoo unu besaꞌyookwu.
61001005	Tamme sakwa tubetse unu tunakaꞌoedyuku. Tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, tamme besaꞌyookwu. Ka besaꞌyoona, ka besow nakabetseakwu.
61001006	Tamme ka Te Naa-witu besa nakasopedakwadoona, soo Sutaꞌyoo gi te maꞌemukwa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka Sutakoo gi tamme maꞌemukwa, tamme ooosapa Te Naa nakabetseakwu. Tamme ka ooosapa tunakabetseana, tamme ka besa podo meadabenokwu.
61001007	Tamme ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena, tamme nanapupuaꞌakwu, tamme nanasamoomu-waꞌneꞌyookwu. Tamme ka nanapuaꞌana, tamme sakwa nanasoobedya.
61001008	Tamme ka ekow nakabetseana, tamme nanaꞌunusoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Oꞌno yise tamme ka tunakaꞌoedyukuna, besa manepunnekwu.
61001009	Tamme ka gi yooonnekoo nakabetseana tamme tookwa gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute. Tamme tookwa oo soomuꞌwa ka oo-kooba te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwa. Tamme yaatu tooꞌe poonnedu-kwaꞌne, pana tamme gi tubootabuꞌe.
61001010	Ooonneꞌyoona, e pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa tubetse tunakabetsea. Tamme yise oo sopedakwadookwu, ka saaꞌa ka Te Naa nabatoo tamme oo bikwuna. Tamme ka tunakabetseana tamme gi ka Te Naa besa po maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
61001011	Oꞌno yise tamme saaꞌa Te Naa-matoo meakwu. Oosoo ka te sootuhise, soo Te Pabeꞌe te magwetzoi, tamme-kooba yise tuꞌeyaꞌedooa.
61001012	Nu oo sopedakwatoo mu mooasoo oo nakapu, ka mumme e tuukwedyina. Mu yise oo nakaꞌoedyukute, ooka mu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo. Nu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo gi hownneꞌyoo nu mu nemayukute ka e unnepu mu nakabetseana, nu sumuna gi wunaꞌme ka teepu-koobaꞌyookwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe e tuukweꞌe pudusoo nu nabatsakwu. Nu yise ooosapa mu nemayukukwu mu ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakabetseana, oꞌno mu oo soomayuna tunakabetseamokwu ka yaano e mease.
61001016	Numme mu tuukweꞌe ka toge-kwitu mu nakaꞌoedyukuna, gi tooe hayoo tooe sukwe naꞌunnedu numme mu tuukweꞌe, soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, pudusoo kodyu petukwu yaa teepu-koobasoo. Numme togesapa mu tuukweꞌe numme oꞌno mana giba-maꞌyoona ka oo pooha numme poonne, ka Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe-matoo yadooꞌa. Numme oo naka soo Te Naa meeoo, “E Besaa Dooa yow. Tubetse besa e masoonamme. Oosoo nu-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo, nu unu oo soobedya.”
61001019	Tamme tuwazoo oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa unnepu, oꞌnosoo nabotugu pudusoo togesapa manepetukwu. Mu sakwa ooosapa Te Naa unnepu nakabetsea, soo Te Naa unnepu tukootabuakunoo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Oosoo ooka te nakasopedakwatoona te mayugweke. Ka Te Pabeꞌe petukwu-kwitoo tooe tamme namabetsapunnekwu. Soo yaa oo kodyu petukwuna, ka tu taba tsebooeke-kwaꞌneꞌyookwu, oꞌno yise tamme noꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwadookwu.
61001020	Tammesoo oo sopedakwatoo, tamme gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa unnepu tammesoo tusooyugwe-kwikoo oo nakasopedakwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo.
61001021	Soo Te Naa tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma ka tu yadooawabe pooha sootuhipu ka Te Naa unnepu oo waha tuunguna. Esoo Te Naa unnepu, gi sukwe numusoo yadooana nanemadabuena.
61002001	Ka oꞌnosoo mu esagoedu Te Naa yadooawabe mee naneyugwetu, menoꞌo mu numu mu-naga-kwitu unne-kwaꞌnesoo. Umu kaaheno mu tuukwe mee naneyakwe pana mu esakoekute, ka Te Pabeꞌe tooꞌe nemooaga ka meeoo unnena. Umu meeoo, “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe tooe tamme-koobatoo nabatsase sapa.” Umuoo puusoo yabesoo kadooꞌoo nanemayugwe, umu ka meeoo mu numu tuukwena. “Oosoo gi Te Pabeꞌe,” mee.
61002002	Ewaꞌyoo numu mu nakana, yise ka sutakoo po nake. Ooonneꞌyoona susumudu numu ka umu-ma tzabena suda unakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
61002003	Umu numu nemooagadu tu natumanakakuookwuna soogwidu sapa, tooe hayoo tooe mu tuukwena, mu yise mu tumanagakute. Umuoo unu moogoobu. Oꞌnosoo meeoo natunetamma soo mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, ooonnekoo umu puusoo kadooꞌoo namayugwekwu.
61002004	Soo Te Naa mu toha kakasa-gakoo gi tutuha soobadya tooe umu pumme tummatzidu sapa. Ka umu-matu tumaꞌemukwase, soo sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu yise menoꞌo togano-kwi nakwutumakwu. Umu ooosapa oe nakwutumakoo ka Te Naa atasoo ka teepu tu yugwenoꞌoto tooe.
61002005	Soo Te Naa oꞌnosoo ka umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi mu sootuhipu-gaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Soo te nanamooatupu Noah, mana mu numu tooꞌe tuukwe, umu sakwa besasoo tunakaꞌoedyuku, pana umu gi oo nakabetsea. Umu ka pumme tu tuukwe gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna soo teepu yise umu-no padatsopa, umu yise kadoo namayugwe. Soo Te Naa ka Noah suuꞌmu magwetzoihoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) oo nanumu-noko.
61002006	Noꞌyooona tuwazoo ka mu Sodom noko Gomorrah mee nananeadu-kwitu suda maꞌemukwadu. Nonoꞌotsa tabeno umu ooosapa tumaꞌemukwa. Sumuꞌyoo nana, Lot mee naneadu suuꞌmu besa manakwe. Oosoo mu poonne ka ooosapa mu maꞌemukwadape, suda soonamme ka tu pupuaꞌamu sutakoo po mu nake. Soo Te Naa ka Lot umuoo numu-nagakoo magwetzoaꞌe. Umu yise kootuꞌihoo, ka suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyuse. Umuoo kadoo namayugwe, oꞌno mu numu ka saaꞌa ka sutakoo po nagena oo sopedakwadookwu, mu tumaꞌemukwana mu-matoosoo kodyukwu tuwazoo.
61002009	Soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoikwu tuwazoo, tamme ka besa manena. Umu suda tumatugudu wutumetakwu oosoo ka saaꞌa nanasuꞌmu mu nemadabuedooa, ka how mu besow tooetoo sutahoo.
61002010	Oosoo mu wutumetakwu ka umu maꞌemukwadu, ka umu puusoo unu totsamanena, gi pumme moohedu nakabetseana. Umu ka puusoo pummesoo manena unu soonagena, gi hemma tooe soobedyana, ka noꞌoko poohabe-maꞌyoona mesoo nanekoena.
61002011	Mu Te Naa tummatziwabe toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo unu ohobu nanatzooe-ma manepunnedu, unutoo pooha nanatzooedu noꞌoko mu numu ooonnakwa. Umuoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo puu gi hownnekoo ka Te Naa-kobenaꞌyoona gi tooe haꞌyoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo, gi umu ka poohabe-kwitu nehane-waꞌneꞌyoo.
61002012	Umuoo numu nemooagadu nunuꞌu-waꞌneꞌyoo gi ka besow tooetoo ka sutakoo sopedakwatoo. Umuoo sukwe momoꞌo yaa teepu-kooba, saaꞌa nagoekwudu. Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu, mu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, kadoo mu mayugwekwu, umu ka suda unnena gi oo nakasopedakwadoopana. Umu suda manakwe ka suda manena. Umu besa sokwama ka tabuapa, suda manena. Tooetoo togano umu ka mu nanesootuhi sumu-kwiꞌyoona umu-no tukana, tu baagoena suuꞌmu pedukuna. Tabewano tuwazoo umu baagooena, togesapa umuoo mu numu suda pumme sooyugwena pedukudu.
61002014	Umoo numu nemoagadu ka tu nanapootamana petukute. Numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu maꞌemukwa. Saaꞌa soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
61002015	Umuoo suda manakwe, ka Te Naa besa po oowemota manegase, ka unu moogoobuna. Oꞌnosoo soo numu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu Balaam
61002016	Pana soo Te Naa ka tzagase tzadyadooakute, ka Balaam nesagwikuna, ka suda oo manakwe. Soo nanesootuhipu numu tunedyooedu, Balaam, yise natzamaꞌwuoo ka suda tooꞌe tusooyugwese. Suda tooꞌe manekwuse.
61002017	Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, patzona pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo, pagunaba-waꞌne. Umuoo maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu yise togano-kwi nakwutumakwu.
61002018	Umu puusoo papaba-ma suda apegeana naanaꞌunnena. Umuoo numu nemooagadu ka mu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe unnepu pudu nakadu mee esayikute, “Umu sakwa tu soomane-kwaꞌne mane,” gi sakwa mu sutakoo moohedu nakabetseapana. Oꞌno yise umu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu-ma tubetse tsabekwu, soo sutaꞌyoo mu matzooekukwu ka hemma how mu tooe yugwe, umu yise ka sutakoo nakabetseakwu suuꞌmu, yise mu ka kwase-gakoo podo meakwu.
61002020	Umu esagoedu uga ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, oꞌno umu gi ka suta-ma emukwa, pana menoꞌo soo sutaꞌyoo mu matzooekute. Umu unu suda manepunne menoꞌo. Umu ka Te Naa besa unnepu pumme tu tuukwese gi sakwa uga oo natunedyooepana. Umu sakwa gi ka Te Naa besa podo uga meapana, menoꞌo umu hanoꞌoba suta-kwi manepetuga, ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna.
61002022	Umu ka sutakoo po-witoosoo kodyukwu. Umuoo ka a nanatugwenga-waꞌne manakwe, “Soo saduꞌu puu ka tu owaꞌepu-witusoo tuka, yise punnoꞌo soo hogu pumme tu nabakeakuse sapa, ka pasagwabu-witusoo kodyu.”
61003001	Oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwu-witu mu numu tuukwe, soo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe punnoꞌo ka Te Naa unnepu mu tuukwe. Nu punnoꞌo mooasoo waha tooe mu-matoo tuboyakwe. Ka besa mumme tu tuukwepu sokwamatuoona mee mu netammana.
61003003	Numme noꞌyoona meeoo mu netammayakwe, “Ka Te Naa ka teepu atasoo yugwekwuna-kobenasoo, mu numu ka sutakoo nakabetseadu tamme-maꞌyoona nanekoekwu, ka Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo kodyu petukwuna, mee te tunakaꞌoedyukute.”
61003004	Umu numu nemooagadu meeoo unakwe, “Ka teepu namadabue manakwanasoo noꞌyoona hee ooosapa manepunne. Umu te nanamooatupu tooe ooosapa manepunne, gi atasoo mane-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kodyu petukwu mee unnese sapa, gisoo.”
61003005	Umu gi oo soonakaꞌoedyukute ka oꞌnosoo Te Naa unnepu ka noꞌoko hemma teepu-koobakwi oo matabuekepu. Ka teepu noko noꞌoko hemma oo-koobakwitu tuwazoo.
61003006	Oosoo ka baa, ka teepu-koobakwi hooodabedu, ka powmabu tuwazoo matabuepu. Ka saaꞌa yise ka teepu patatzopaku.
61003007	Meeoo soo Te Naa unnepu, yise noꞌoko ka hemma teepu-koobatu nikukwu, ka teepu paꞌanakwitu nokosoo. Mooasoo oosoo nanemadabuepu ka oe hemma manepetuse, soo Te Naa saaꞌa mu numu nemadabuedooa, soo sutaꞌyoo umu numu gi pumme nakabetseadu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
61003008	Pana mu, e pupuaꞌamu, mu sakwa oo soomayu, ka soo Te Naa tamme atasoo tusooyugwekute. Mee oosoo tusooyugwe, “Sumuoo tabeba ewa a tommo-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Yise ewa a tommo-gana sumuoo tabeba-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa-nakwana.”
61003009	Tooe soo Te Pabeꞌe tu unne-kwaꞌnesoo manekwuse sapa, oosoo mu ewowsoo numu wutooꞌe, mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna, oosoo sumuna ka noꞌoko numu tu maꞌemukwana maꞌwuse, ka pukwi suuꞌmu mu tunakaꞌoedyukukwuna soogwina. Oosoo gi tooe haka tooe suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwuna soogwi, ka gi kadoo mu namayugwena petsabena, ka noꞌoko numu tu matabuepu soobedyana.
61003010	Tamme gi o sopedakwatoo hananoꞌo ka teepu paꞌanakwitu, yise noꞌoko hee ka teepu-koobatu, paba nanakowse kadooꞌoo namamaꞌekwu. Soo teepu, yise, noꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatu nosoo nakootzasooꞌowkwu.
61003011	Tamme ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukumona, tamme oo tunetammakutoosoo manena, tamme oo sopedakwatoo, ka noꞌoko hemma oo tumadabuepu nakootzasooakwuse.
61003012	Ekow teepu nakootzasooakwuna tamme soogwi,
61003013	tamme ka oo sopedakwadoona tamme saaꞌa ka pudu teepu-kooba manepunnehoose noꞌyoona hee ka teepu-koobatu yise o paꞌanakwatu pudu namapudupudookwu. Onona noꞌyoona numu kaaheno manese, pudu meadabekwu.
61003014	E pupuaꞌamu, tamme sakwa ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakabetsea, oꞌno oosoo ka kodyu petuse saaꞌa te besaꞌyookudooa. Tamme gi ka te mane-ma nasookwidooa. Tamme ka tunakabetseana, tamme besa nanano nanapuaꞌakwu. Tamme yoo manekwu ka pudu teepu-kooba nobe-gakwuse, ka oo paꞌanakwatu nokosoo oo pudu namadabuekwuse.
61003015	Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa tuutooꞌe, oꞌno ewaꞌyoosoo tamme-matu namagwetzoikwu. Te besa puaꞌa Paul mu-matoo tubo, ekow noꞌoko tu tubope-kwi wahana. Oosoo noꞌoko tu sopedakwatoona po, ka Te Naa pumme tunetammakuna tu nakasopedakwadoo-kwikoo. Oo-naga-witu numu, gi etzaga nakasopedakwatoo. Susumudu numu, gi oo soonammemapuꞌa, waha-tamme tusooyugwedu, ka Paul unnena tzamayuana puusoo ka sutakoo namatoosoo makodyukute, pumme kadooꞌoo yugwekwudu. Umu noꞌoko ka Te Naa besa pooha-toohakwi nabodu tzamayuꞌa.
61003017	Gi umu-ma nasooꞌemukwapana, umuoo gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu. Nu mu tuya tuukweꞌe, umuoo, mu nemooagadu gi nakabetseapana. Mu ka umu-waꞌnesoo manena mu punnoꞌo gi tunakaꞌoedyuku manepetugakwu.
61003018	Mu sakwa nanaꞌunusoo oo nakasopedakwatoo ka te nasootuhina, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme magwetzoidu. Tamme sakwa ooosapa mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse unu besaꞌyoo.” Ooosapa sakwa noꞌyoona numu mee unnemo, “Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nanasoogwugidu.”
62001001	Nu mu-matoo tubokwu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu. Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo ka teepu pudu namadabuese soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa-baa. Soo Te Pabeꞌe saaꞌa yaa teepu-kooba petu ka mu numu Te Naa besa unnepu tuukwegese, oꞌno yise mu numu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-kooba petuse, numu oo manese, numme oo tookoope poonne, numme tuwazoo oo tookoo tzama.
62001003	Mooasoo numme ka Te Naa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe-no nanapuaꞌana umu-nosoo meadape. Numme ooosapa ka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukwedyakwe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu, oꞌno mu oo nakaꞌoedyukuna tamme nanapuaꞌase nananosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meakwu.
62001004	Numme ka besa naꞌunnedu mu tuukweꞌe, oꞌno mu numme-no ka Te Naa besa po-wi tzabekakwu. Tamme noꞌyoona yise besa sokwamakwu.
62001005	Ekowsoo naꞌunnepu soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo ne tuukwepu numme yise punnoꞌo mumme tuukwekwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee te netamma, “Soo Te Naa kootabedooadu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe hano tooe katuna ka besow po-kooba kootabuapunne.”
62001006	Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu ka Te Naa puaꞌagana ka oo besa podo meꞌa,” pana ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwatabena oosoo esayaꞌena ka togabadoo nummenumme.
62001007	Tamme ka kootabua-kwi momona ka Te Naa-waꞌne ooosapa kootabedooapunnena tamme tookwa nanapuaꞌa. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko ka te tumaꞌemukwana soomuꞌwapu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mooasoo tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna.
62001008	Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu,” puusoo nanemooaga ka gi kaaheno meana.
62001009	Tamme ka te tumaꞌemukwana wahase Te Naa gi totsaba-ga te mayugwekwu.
62001010	Tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu gi tumaꞌemukwadu,” gi ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukute, “Te Naa esayaꞌe,” mee tookwa oosoo tusooyugwedu.
62002001	E nanumu nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo oꞌno mu gi tumaꞌemukwakwu. Ka tooe haga tooe tamme-nagatu tumaꞌemukwa soo Te Pabeꞌe ka kaahenoꞌyoona te tumaꞌemukwana nematzagakwuni.
62002002	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mooasoo te tumaꞌemukwa-koobatoo nabatsase, noꞌobatusoo numu tumaꞌemukwana kadoo namayugwe.
62002003	Tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna oo nakaꞌoedyukute, yise oo nakabetseꞌa ka tamme oo tuukwena.
62002004	Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, tooꞌe oosoo mee unnedu pana, “Nu ka Te Naa dooamu-nagatu,” oosoo tookwa esayaꞌe.
62002005	Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana soo Te Naa tookwa oo besaꞌyookute. Soo tooe haga tooe mee unnedu, “Nu Te Naa tooaꞌa,” oosoo sakwa ka Te Naa besa podo meano, ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌnesoo. Oꞌno yise oosoo puusoo nasopedakwadoo ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana.
62002007	E nanumu, oe manakwanasoo mu ka mooeꞌugasoo tunakaꞌoedyukuse mu ka Te Pabeꞌe naka tamme sakwa yise unu nanasoobedya.
62002008	Menoꞌo esoo naꞌunnedu unu natzooesoo manemena soo Te Pabeꞌe ka unu nanasoobedya te mayugwena. Mooasoo soo togaba kadoo manemena, ka togaba-wiꞌyoona kaaheno kootabedooa-kwitoo numu kua-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
62002009	Tooe soo tooe haga tooe nu ka gootabedooadu-kwi mee unnedu pana ka sumuoo Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi petzabena oosoo tookwa togesoo ka togaba-wi.
62002010	Soo tooe haga tooe ka tamme-matu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu unu soobedyadu ka kootabedooadu-kwi nummenumme. Oꞌno yise oosoo ka Te Naa besa podo meadabena gi oo maꞌwuka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
62002011	Soo tooe haga tooe ka tamme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-nagatu gi petzabedu, tookwa togesoo togaba-wi numme numme, oosoo gi hownnekoo oo sopedakwadookwu-waꞌneꞌyoo ka Te Naa besa podo tu nameana.
62002012	Mu Te Naa doodooamu nu mu-matoo tuboꞌo soo mu tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu-koobatoo nabatsapuna. Ooonneꞌyoona yise mu menoꞌo Te Naa besa doodooamu. Mumme nanamooatupu nu tuwazoo mu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa tamme Manumudoopu sopedakwatoona. Mumme yise pudu numu nu tuukwekwu mu ka Te Naa unnepu nakabetseana, mu ka sutakoo matzooekute.
62002015	Gi sakwa tamme mu gi toge manedu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo podo meadu tookwa gi ka Te Naa petzape. Soo Te Naa ka suda namanedu gi petzape.
62002016	Mu yaa teepu-koobatu numu suda tu manena besa soobedya, umu ka unu moogoomanena puusoo unu nasooyugwena gi ka Te Naa petzabe-kwaꞌne manedu.
62002017	Saaꞌa esoo teepu ka mu sutakoo numu-no kadoo namayugwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa nakabetseadu soo oo gwetzoinummekwuna gi mobegwa-gakwu.
62002018	E nanumu, pudusoo esoo teepu namapudutupudookwu. Mooasoo mu oo naka gisoo ka Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu mapudutupudoo sumuꞌyoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tubetse tumooꞌoopunnedu yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baa petukwu. Mooasoo ewaꞌyoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohoꞌne tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo pudusoo Te Pabeꞌe ka teepu mapudutupudookwu.
62002019	Umu Te Pabeꞌe nekwohonedu tamme-nagatu uga gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukute. Umu uga ka tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukuna togesoo tamme-noꞌyookwu. Menoꞌo tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu tookwa gi tubetse tunakaꞌoedyukupana meeoo sukwe naneyukwe gi tookwa umu tubetse tamme-notu ooonneꞌyoona umu te gaꞌabeyakwe.
62002020	Mu Te Pabeꞌe tubetse nakaꞌoedyukunodu, soo Te Pabeꞌe ka tu Besa Pooha-ma mu sootuhipu, ooonneꞌyoona umu ka togesapa naꞌunnedu sopedakwatoo.
62002021	Mu mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakasopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa tubetse kaahenotu, ooonneꞌyoona nu mu tuukweꞌe.
62002022	Soo tooe haga tooe Jesus gi Te Pabeꞌe mee unnedu esayaꞌe. Esoo esayidu ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoo oosoo ka gi Te Naa noko ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna meeoo unakwe.
62002023	Soo tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu, gi Te Naa Tooaꞌa. Mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu oe manakwanasoo nakaduguna ooosapa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, oꞌno mu ooosapa Te Naa noꞌoko Te Pabeꞌe doodooamu manepunnekwu.
62002025	Oosoo mooasoo te tunetammakupu, soo te gwetzoimokwuna gi moobegwa-gakwu.
62002026	Yaa menoꞌo nu mu tuukwekwu gi ka mu mumme nemooagadu-ma saaꞌa nakatzabepana.
62002027	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu sootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ooosapa ka togesapa naꞌunnedu mu tunedyooenokwu, ka tooe hekwi mu gi kummaꞌakoosoo numu tunedyooedu soogwikwu. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu tunedyooena mu yise ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.
62002028	E nanumu, tamme ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuna ka yaa teepu-kooba oo kodyu petuse tamme gi oo-ma suina gi oo nasookwikwu.
62002029	Soo Te Pabeꞌe ooosapa kaaheno tumatugudu, mu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu punnoꞌo Te Naa tooaꞌa.
62003001	Soo Te Naa tubetse unu te soobedyana, “E doodooamutseꞌe,” mee te natubaꞌnga. Umu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa meeoo tamme natubaꞌnga umu ka gi Te Naa sopedakwatoona.
62003002	E nanumu, mooasoo tamme Te Naa doodooamu manepu. Tamme ka Te Naa-tamme sootunagakwuna gisoo sopedakwatoo. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, oꞌno tamme oo poonnese oo-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
62003003	Tamme ka Te Naa atasoo numu nemayugwena oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe te pudu manumudookwu mee naꞌunnedu, ooonneꞌyoona oosoo ka suda te tumatuguna soomuꞌwase gi totsaba-ga tamme manekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi totsaba-gaꞌyoo.
62003004	Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unnepu gi nakabetseadu tumaꞌemukwa.
62003005	Mu oo sopedakwatoo mooasoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobatoo, nanasuda te tumatugupu-koobatoo oo nabatsapu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe puu gi tumaꞌemukwadu.
62003006	Soo Tooe haga tooe ooosapa tumaꞌemukwadubedu gi Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukute.
62003007	E nanumu, tooe haga tooe kaaheno tumatugudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
62003008	Soo tooe haga tooe ooosapa tumaꞌemukwadu tookwa ka Numu Sooꞌadu, sutakoo nagedu oosoo Gi Togeꞌyoo puu oe-manakwanasoo, ooosapa suda tumatugukepu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yaa teepu-koobasoo petuse, ka sutakoo, numu tumaꞌemukwa mayugwedu kadooꞌoo mayugwekwuse.
62003009	Tamme ka Te Naa besa doodooamu manese ka suda namanedu nuuninokwu.
62003010	Tooe haga tooe ooosapa gi toge manedu ka Te Naa doodooamu gi petzabedu tookwa, ka Numu Sooꞌadu nagedu. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka ooka gi togekoo, Numu Sooꞌadu tumayohokudu oosoo gi Te Naa doodooamu-matu.
62003011	Ka Te Pabeꞌe mu nakaꞌoedyuku-kwi manakwanasoo, soo Te Naa unnepu, “Mu sakwa nanasoobedya,” meeꞌe naꞌunnedu mu ooosapa nakanoꞌo.
62003012	Mu sakwa gi ka oꞌnosoo tooebetse Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne manepana. Soo Cain suda manakwe ka tu wanngaꞌa nuusoogwedukuna, ka tu wanngaꞌa kaaheno tumatugu oo batsase. Soo Cain tookwa ka mu sutakoo nagedu.
62003013	Ooonneꞌyoona, E nanumu, mu sutaꞌyoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu puu gi te petzape.
62003014	Saaꞌa mu suda manedu numu ka tuꞌina ooosapa togano-kwiꞌyookwu. Tamme ka tuꞌise besa-kwitoo, ooosapa namagwetzoidu-kwitoo meꞌa, tamme ka nanasoobedyana.
62003015	Tooe haga tooe gi tu pupuaꞌamu petzabedu tu puaꞌa batsadu-kwaꞌnesoo manepunne. Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo numu puu ka tu nanumu batsase suda oo tumatuguna oo-matoosoo kodyukwu, yise gi ka Te Naa-baa petugakwu.
62003016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu. Tamme sakwa punnoꞌo oo-waꞌnesoo nanasoobedya.
62003017	Soo tooe haga tooe gi hemma tuugedu, ka tu puaꞌa tutuha manakwe sakwa oo tummatzi ka Te Naa unu soobedyana oo-matoo nanesootuhiyana.
62003018	E nanumu tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyana nanatummatzi gi meeoo sukwe unnepana.
62003019	Oꞌno tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna, tammesoo nanasopedakwadookwu. Tamme yise gi suikwu ka Te Naa-koobena manepetugase.
62003020	Tooe ka Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna gi mapuꞌapana, te nasootuagaꞌne sapa, soo Te Naa ka te sopedakwadoona tutuha te soobedyana te sootuhaꞌe.
62003021	E nanumu, tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suaꞌekwu ka mooasoo oo sopedakwadoona te tutumaꞌemukwana oo soomuꞌwapu.
62003022	Tamme ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyiyina oosoo te nakana te sootuhaꞌe, tamme ka tamme oo tunetammakuna nakabetseana.
62003023	Soo Te Naa meeoo soo Jesus Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, mu sakwa oo nakaꞌoedyukuna unu nanasoobedya.
62003024	Tamme ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakabetseanona soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu, ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhise.
62004001	E nanumu, tamme sakwa gi ka noꞌobatusoo poohabe nakaꞌoedyukupana. Ewa yaa teepu-kooba naꞌesagoꞌe, ka sutakoo poohabe-toohakwi. Ka nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu mee unnedu tamme-baa petuse, tamme sakwa ka hownnekoo oo pooha-gana sopedakwatoo, haꞌoo Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi numu tunedyooe.
62004002	Nu mu tuukwekwu, haꞌoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, hownnekoo poohabe-toohakwi oosoo numu tunedyooe. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi unnekwu, mee soo Jesus o kaaheno Te Pabeꞌe, oosoo togesapa naꞌunnedu ka yaa teepu-kooba tamme-baa numu petuse tamme-waꞌneꞌyookwu.
62004003	Soo tooe haga tooe yise mee unnedu, soo Jesus Te Pabeꞌe gi togeꞌyoo, oosoo tookwa sutakoo pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona ka Te Pabeꞌe nekwohoꞌne. Soo Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoodu, numu nemooagadu, tamme ka oꞌnosoo mu nanekemmadu nakadu menoꞌo yise mooasoo tamme-naga.
62004004	Umu esagoedu gi te nemooꞌaga-waꞌneꞌyoo, e nanumu, tamme ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwiꞌyoona, oosoo noꞌoko poohabe matzooekudu.
62004005	Soo numu esayaekudu ata-tammesoo numu neyugwedu, ka mu numu gi Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi manepunnedu etzaga nemooaꞌaga. Umuoo numu esagoekuna ka mu numu sutakoo tumayohope mu nagetuunguna mu tunedyooꞌe, ooonneꞌyoona mu sutaꞌyoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu nakabetseꞌa.
62004006	Tooe haga tooe Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu te nakapunnekwu, tamme ka Te Naa doodooamuna. Soo tooe haga tooe gi te soonakadu tookwa gi Te Naa heesoobedya, ooonnekoo tamme oo sopedakwadookwu, haꞌoo sutakoo poohabe oo-nagakoo tooetoo besow.
62004007	E nanumu, tamme sakwa Te Naa unnena nakaꞌoedyukuna nanasoobedya. Noꞌyoona Te Naa doodooamu nanasoobedya soo Te Naa ka oo te mayugwena.
62004008	Soo tooe haga tooe gi numu petzabedu tookwa gi ka Te Naa doodooamu-matu, soo Te Naa puu ooosapa unu numu soobedyadu.
62004009	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa puu tamme unu soobedyana, ka tu Besaa Tooa ka yaa teepu-kooba nabatsakupu, ka noꞌoko te tumaꞌemukwana kadoo mayugwena. Ka mooeꞌugasoo soo Te Naa ka unu te soobedyana, ooonneꞌyoona tamme punnoꞌo unu nanasoobedya.
62004011	E nanumu tamme sakwa unu nanasoobedyana, ka Te Naa puu tubetse unu tamme soobedya.
62004012	Gi haga ka Te Naa tookoope poonnedu. Tamme ka nanasoobedyana soo Te Naa ooosapa tamme-no manenummekwu. Tamme punnoꞌo nanasoobedya manepetukwu, ka Te Naa tamme sooyugwe-waꞌne.
62004013	Soo Te Naa ka tu Besa Pooha-ma te sootuhipu. Ooonneꞌyoona ooosapa te tummatzina tamme oo-no besa kemmadape.
62004014	Tamme yise oo sopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa ka tu Besaa Tooa yaa teepu-koobatoo taya, ka numu oo magwetzoi tuunguna.
62004015	Tooe haga tooe oo nakaꞌoedyukudu soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa Tooa, tookwa Te Naa-no meadape.
62004016	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo tooe haga tooe punnoꞌo unu numu soobedyadu tookwa Te Naa-doodooamu-matu.
62004017	Tamme nananesootuhidu numu nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedya manemena, ka Te Naa tamme sooyugwe-waꞌne. Oꞌno saaꞌa ka Te Naa numu nemadabooꞌe tamme puu gi ka Te Naa-ma suikwu, tamme ka mooasoo ka Te Naa unu soobedyana.
62004018	Tamme gi ka Te Naa-ma suaꞌe ka unu oo soobedyana. Tamme ka mooasoo unu Te Naa soobedya manepetuse, mooasoo ka te tumaꞌemukwana nasoomuꞌwapu gi hemma-ma suaꞌekwu. Tamme ka suina suda tusooyugwe. Tamme ka mooasoo oo sopedakwatoona soo Te Naa te mabetsea ka unu pumme te soobedya. Tooe haga tooe Te Naa-ma suidu tookwa gisoo ka Te Naa tu soobedya-kwi manakwe.
62004019	Soo Te Naa mooeꞌugasoo unu te soobedya ooonneꞌyoona tamme punnoꞌo Te Naa unu soobedya.
62004020	Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unu soobedya mee unnepana ka Te Naa besa doodooamu gi petzabena oosoo tookwa esayaꞌe. Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa doodooamu tookoope poonnepana gi mu petzabedu hownnekoo ka Te Naa yise gi tu tookoope poonnena petzabekwu?
62004021	Soo Te Naa mee te netamma, “Soo tooe haga tooe unu e soobedyadu, sakwa umu e doodooamu tuwazoo unu soobedya.”
62005001	Tooe haga tooe o soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe meeꞌe naꞌunnedu nakaꞌoedyukudu tookwa Te Naa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa unu soobedyadu Te Naa dooamu unu soobedyakwu tuwazoo.
62005002	Tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana, oo tunetamma-kwaꞌnesoo manena oo nakabetseana tamme tookwa Te Naa doodooamu besa soobedya.
62005003	Soo Te Naa tamme tunetammakuna tamme ka oo nakabetseana oosoo gi namanakwe tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana.
62005004	Tamme Te Naa dooamu gi ka sutakoo nakabetsea ka yaa teepu-koobatu numu mayohona. Tamme ka sutakoo mooasoo matzooekute, ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna.
62005005	Soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa Besaa Tooa Tubetse oedyukudu suuꞌmu ka sutakoo matzooekute. Soo sutaꞌyoo ka numu suta-tamme ohoyugwedu.
62005006	Soo Te Naa oo waha soo Te Pabeꞌe oo Besaa Tooa baa-wi namatzakase, soo Te Naa oo wahasoo tuwazoo, ka Te Pabeꞌe nabatsase. Yise nakwitoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha.
62005009	Esoo Te Naa besa yadooapu toge kaahenotu ka Tu Penebe Besa Tuooaꞌa-witu. Mu numu puu ka tu nanumu haꞌyoo unakwe oo nakaꞌoedyukute. Soo Te Naa unnepu ka sukwe numu unnepu, ooonnekoo toge kaahenoꞌyoo.
62005010	Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu oo sopedakwatoo oosoo Te Naa Penebe Besaa Tooaꞌa. Tooe haga tooe gi ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa neꞌesatooe.
62005011	Soo Te Naa meeoo te tunetammakupu ka Te Pabeꞌe mane-koobatoo gi mobegwa-gakwu ooosapa te gwetzoimokwuna te sootuhikwu.
62005012	Soo tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu tu namagwetzoina nasootuhikwu, soo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi.
62005013	Nu mumme Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tuboꞌo oꞌno mu nananesootuhaꞌedu numu ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo namagwetzoidu, pumme tu sootuhipu sopedakwadookwu.
62005014	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina ka oo tunetammana oedyukuna oosoo te nakana
62005015	te sootuhikwu ka pumme te nanetzakwiyi.
62005016	Unu nanesootuhi numu ka tunakaꞌoedyukudu maꞌemukwa oo poonnena oosoo sakwa oo nanesootuhiku soo Te Naa yise ka tumaꞌemukwadu magwetzoikwu. Tooe noꞌoko numu tumaꞌemukwana gi besow sapa, soo tooꞌe noꞌobatu soo numu tumaꞌemukwapu mesoo nanematzagakwunaꞌe. Sumubatu numu tumaꞌemukwana gi nananesootuhikwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo oosoo ka tumaꞌemukwadu-matoosoo namakodyukuse oo batsakwu. Ookow tumaꞌemukwape gi hownnekoo tamme nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoo.
62005018	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo umu nananesootuhidu numu Te Naa doodooamu gi ooosapa tumaꞌemukwano-waꞌneꞌyoo.
62005019	Tamme oo sopedakwatoo tamme Te Naa doodooamu, yise soo sutaꞌyoo Gi Togeꞌyoo ka noꞌoko yaa teepu-koobatu mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu nemadunagakwu.
62005020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-baa yaa teepu-kooba petuse te sootuhaꞌe oꞌno tamme oo-toogoo Te Naa besa sopedakwadookwu. Ka Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe Jesus-toohakwi, soo Te Naa togesapa te sootuhi tamme yise gi mobegwa-ga gwetzoimokwu.
62005021	E nanumu, ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu sakwa mu nanesootuhi mea. Yaanotu sapa esoo pooha nanesootuhibu-witu nanemamakwupetu.
63001001	Nu yaahoo mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu ka umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubokwu tooe hano tooe manepunne. Numme yise noꞌyoona umu Te Pabeꞌe-witu nakaꞌoedyukudu-no besa mu soobedya,
63001002	tamme ka Te Naa togesapa oo unnepu gi moobegwaga ooosapa nakabetseana.
63001003	“Soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu te sootuhina,” mee nu nanesootuhi.
63001004	Ka mu-matu yaa numme-baa petuse mu ka Te Naa tunetammapu-too togesoo mu nanesootuhi meꞌa. Nu besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme.
63001005	Ka Te Pabeꞌe te mooe nakaꞌoedyuku-kwi manakwanasoo soo Te Naa unu nanasoobedyana mee te netammanoꞌo.
63001006	Tamme ka Te Naa unu soobedyana tamme oo tumayohokunokwu. Soo Te Naa mee te netammapu, “Nanasoobedyana sakwa mu e podo meadabe.”
63001007	Ewaꞌyoona mu numu tunedyooedu numu nemooagadu ka eka teepu-koobakwi maꞌnaꞌwedu gi meeoo unne-waꞌneꞌyoo soo Jesus Te Tubetse Pabeꞌe numu manese yaa teepu-koobatoo nataya. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe nekwohonena
63001008	gi umu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabe. Gi umu-waꞌne manepana. Mu sumuna mu ka Te Naa mumme besa sootuhina watzekadooa.
63001009	Mu ka Te Pabeꞌe besa po maꞌwukase ka Te Naa matusookwunikwu. Mu ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe besa podo meadabena ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe nakabetsea.
63001010	Ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-baa petuse gi mu nabaaꞌyookupana ka nanesootuhina gi mu nanesootuhi tuungupana. Gi tuwazoo mu tunemabetsabekupana.
63001011	Soo tooe haga tooe ka mu numu nemooagadu nabatoo bina mu tumaꞌemukwana mu nenoyukwe tummatzaꞌe.
63001012	Nu ewasoo mu soonetammapana gi mu-matoo e sukwe tubona soogwaꞌe. Sumuna nu saaꞌa mu-baa nobenena. Oꞌno saaꞌa tamme besakoo nanatuukwedooa. Tamme yise noꞌyoona besa sokwamadooa.
63001013	Numme yaatuoo nananesootuhidu mu nemayudooa.
64001001	Nu mu nanesootuhi tunedyooedu ka e besa puaꞌa Gaius-matoo tubokwu. Togesapa u e besa puaꞌa.
64001002	Ka ooosapa u manenokwuna nu u nanesootuhikute, oꞌno soo Te Naa ka besa u nanesootuhi meꞌa besakoosoo u sootuhikwu.
64001003	Susumudu umu Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu nu-baa petudyipunne yise mu e nobenedyidu-makoo nu meeoo tunaka, u e tooe tuukweꞌe, u toge kaaheno Te Naa besa podo meadape.
64001004	Ka umu e besa pupuaꞌamu Te Naa besa podo meꞌa, mee nu mu nakana besa mu-matoo nakasoonamme.
64001005	E puaꞌa, u besa manakwe. Ka mu wakwawaꞌa mu-baa petuse ka Te Naa besa unnepu mumme mu tunedyooꞌe u sakwa tubetse besa mu matugu.
64001006	Mu u-baa nobenemodu ka kodyu petuse besa u-kwitu nemadabue, u besa mu matugu ka Te Naa tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo. Oosoo besaꞌyoo ka besa mu matuguna,
64001007	umu manatooe ka Te Pabeꞌe besa unnepu wahammoꞌo. Umu gi ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu natummatzi tuungu.
64001008	Ta sakwa ka mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu maka, ka yoo manena ta ka Te Naa togesapa unnepu mu tuukwe tummatzaꞌe.
64001009	Mooasoo nu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tubo pana soo Diotrephes mee naneadu gi ne nakabetseꞌa, oosoo ka puu mooe nadatsungakwu mee tusooyugwena.
64001010	Nu ka mu-baa petugase nu mu tuukwekwu oosoo nana numme-witu esayaꞌe. Ooosoo tuwazoo gi ka mu nanesootuhibu nu-mu tunedyooedu mu-baa petuna petzape. Oosoo nana ka mu numu nanesootuhibu tunedyooedu tu nanumu umu tummatzaꞌe, mu neꞌyooikuhooyakwe. Ka nanesootuhibu mu numu tunedyooedu mu maka, ka mu-no tuwazoo mu nanesootuhaꞌe mu tayahooyakwe.
64001011	E puaꞌa Gaius, ta sakwa gi ka Diotrephes-waꞌne suda tumatugupana. Soo tooe haga tooe besa tumatugudu tookwa Te Naa doodooamu. Soo tooe haga tooe suda tumatugudu tookwa gi Te Naa sopedakwadoo.
64001012	Noꞌyoona numu meeoo, soo Demetrius besa kaaheno numu tunedyooedu. Nu punnoꞌo u tuukweꞌe oosoo kaaheno numu tunedyooedu u yise namekoosoo ne sopedakwatoo numme gi esagoedu.
64001013	Nu ewasoo u tuukwe penipana gi ooka e sukwe bona petzape. Sumuna saaꞌa nu u-baa petugakwu. Oꞌno saaꞌa ta oetu nanatuukwedooa.
64001014	“Ka Gaius sootuhi,” mee nu ka Te Naa-matoo u nanesootuhikuyakwe. Ta pupuaꞌamu yaatu u nemayuyakwe. Nu punnoꞌo ka umu e pupuaꞌamu u-baatu nemayuyakwe.
65001001	Jude, ka James wangaꞌa, ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus-wi punnoꞌo tunakabetseadu noꞌoko mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo oo tubona. Soo Te Naa noꞌoko te netutzeapu ka unu te soobedyana. Tamme ka Te Naa-doodooamu o ooonneꞌyoona oosoo te tummatzipunne ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi.
65001002	Meeoo nu mu nanesootuhikuyakwe, “Soo Te Naa sakwa ooosapa mu sootuhina, mu magwetzoi, yise nanaꞌunusoo nanasoobedya mu mayugwe.”
65001003	E besa nanumu, nu ooosapa mu-matoo e tubokwuna soogwaꞌe ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu noꞌoko tamme oo magwetzoikwu-kwitu, tooe ka mu numu mumme tumooꞌoo sapa. Ooonneꞌyoona nu menoꞌo mu-matoo tuboꞌo ooka mu tuukwena, numu mu tubetse nenoyukwe tuunguna, oꞌno umu ooosapa ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukukwu. Tamme tunakaꞌoedyukudu mooasoo ka togesapa naꞌunnedu ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu natuukwepu, tamme punnoꞌo ka mu numu natuukwe tuungu. Tamme sakwa ka kaaheno te tusooyugwena gi atasoo neyugwepana.
65001004	Nu eka mu tuukweꞌekwu susumudu mu-matu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu, tunakaꞌoedyukute mee naneyakwe. “Soo Te Naa te magwetzoikwu tooe ka sutakoo mu nakabetsea sapa,” mee mu esagoedu tooꞌe unakwe, umukwu too gi ka Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukupana meeoo unakwe. Tubetse oꞌnosoo umu suda manakwe soo saaꞌa sutaꞌyoo umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
65001005	Menoꞌo yise nu mu nemayukukwu tooe mooasoo mu natuukweꞌepu sapa soo suda mu manena mu numu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Tubetse oꞌnosoo soo Te Naa ka mu Jew numu ka mu Egypt numu-makoo magwetzoipu. Pana ka saaꞌa mu Jew numu kadoo maꞌe, gi pumme mu nakaꞌoedyukute.
65001006	Oꞌnosoo tuwazoo ka mu Te Naa tutummatziwabe, toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo maꞌemukwase ka Te Naa umu tunetammakuna mu maꞌwuhoose mu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyupu. Oosoo yise togano-kwi mu wutumeta, ka sumu tabeno suda mu tumatuguna nemadabuekwuse.
65001007	Umu Sodom noko Gomorrah-witu numu umu tzageꞌe-witu nokosoo ka suda tumatuguna mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyu. Umu nanapootama gi numu mane-kwaꞌne. Ooonekoo mu tumaꞌemukwadu nidabekwu koso gi kootzasooadu-kwiꞌyoona. Tamme sakwa oo sopedakwadoo tamme ka ooosapa tumaꞌemukwana te maꞌemukwana tamme-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu numu maꞌemukwana puu umu-matoosoo kodyupu.
65001008	Umu numu nemooagadu sutakoo pooha nosepu-gaꞌyoo ka nanapootamana tooe how tooe nanasoonahadyugwe, yise gi mu numu moohedu nakabetseꞌa. Umuoo tuwazoo ka umu Te Naa tutummatziwabe mu toha kakasa-gakoo nanasuda mu netamma.
65001009	Soo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo moohedu Michael mee naneadu ka Moses yaꞌese ka oo tookoo-witoo kemmase, soo Sutaꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo oo takonehoo ka Moses tookoo nehegana. Ka Sutakoo sukwe naka yise meeoo, “Soo Te Naa u nedakwu ka suda u unakwe.” Soo Te Naa tummatzidu puu gi suda unakwe tooe ka Sutakoo suda pumme netammase sapa. Pana soo Michael yise gi suda yadooꞌa, oo sukwe naka.
65001010	Pana umuoo sutaꞌyoo nanana suda apegea ka gi hemma nakasopedakwadoona. Umu puusoo kadoo namayugwe ka suda apegeana gi hemma sopedakwadoopana. Umu kadoo namayugwe ka sutakoo nakabetseana umu ka oo sopedakwadoona, gi oetu soohanepana tooe how tooe manakwe.
65001011	Soo suda mu manepu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu umu ka sutakoo podo meadabena ka oꞌnosoo ka te namooatupu Cain mee naneadu-kwaꞌne. Soo Cain puu tu wanngaꞌa batsapu oosoo nuusoogweda ka Te Naa ooosapa oo tumatugukute. Ooonekoo soo soo Te Naa besa oo nenaka. Umu numu nemooagadu unu moogoobu ka tooe nanesootuhipana Balaam mee naneadu-kwaꞌnesoo. Soo Balaam ewow numu-nakwana tu natumanakakuookwuna ooosapa soogwipunnedu ka numu tooꞌe poohana. Soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu. Ka oꞌnosoo te nanamooatupu Korah mee naneadu, tu pupuaꞌmu-no kadoo namayugwepu. Ka Moses mu nekwohone petuse, soo te teepu yise wunabese-ma kadoo mu maꞌe.
65001012	Mu numu mu nesootzeꞌma ka mu numu nemooagadu mu-nagakwi manepunne. Ka nanano mu nanesootuhi tuka mu numu nemooagadu suda oeꞌyoona sukwe maneyakwe, gi kaaheno ka nanesootuhi tumayoho, sukwe unu pepewutzena. Umuoo gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo, gi powmadu koomeba-waꞌneꞌyoo, sukwe wutzagakwunaꞌe. Umuoo toꞌesabu pasa-kwaꞌneꞌyoo tooe unu yubanoo manekase sapa gi pooe-gaꞌyoo. Umu gi he-toogoo besaꞌyoo.
65001013	Umuoo ka pedyoomaba napoonne-kwaꞌneꞌyoo noꞌoko hemma tumeatoo tzobadu. Soo suda mu tumatuguna ooonneꞌyoo gi nawatzekute, tuukwunipe-kwaꞌne numu oo poonne tooe how kwingaꞌyoopana. Umuoo numu nemooagadu paatoozooba tui sawe-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Numu puu gi mu nageka-waꞌneꞌyoo.
65001014	Ka oꞌnosoo soo mu numu nemooagadu ooosapa togaba-wi mukwamoꞌo. Mooeꞌugasoo nana Adam kunooꞌoo tzoꞌo, Enoch mee naneadu mee ka mu numu tuukweꞌe, “Saaꞌa Te Pabeꞌe petukwusoo umu pumme tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-ga-no,
