65001015	ka mu numu nanasuda manepunne mu nemadabuekwuse. Oꞌno yise soo suda numu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, umu ka Te Naa suda netammase.”
65001016	Numu nemooyugwena, numu nesootzemana, suda mesoo manena, puusoo papabatseꞌe naanaꞌunnena, kummaꞌakoosoo numu nanetubetseyaꞌena tuwow, oꞌno mu numu hemma mu hanekukwu.
65001017	Mu sakwa gi oo soomuꞌwapana ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus yadooawabe tamme tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo oo unnepu.
65001018	Ka gisoo Te Pabeꞌe petukwuna oe manakwe mu numu mu-maꞌyoo nanekoekwu ka Te Naa besa manakwe. Umu ka Te Naa gi nakabetseana. Ka suda tu manena manoyugwena, umuoo numu nemooagadu nanaꞌemota numu yugwe. Umu ka gi tunakaꞌoedyukuna umu gi ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma nasootuhikwu.
65001020	E nanumu mu sakwa ka Te Naa besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukuna. Mu sakwa ka oo Besa Pooha-toohakwi nanesootuhi.
65001021	Ka Te Naa unu mu soobedya yise oo nakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme magwetzoina soomayuna, saaꞌa tamme ooosapa ka Te Naa-baaꞌyookwuse.
65001022	Tamme sakwa mu gi besa tunakabetseadu numu nenoyugwe, oꞌno umu tunakaꞌoedyukukwu.
65001023	Yise oo tamme mu magwetzoi tabuakwu ka suda mu nuugwekwese ka goso-wikoo mu natzakwu-kwaꞌne. Tamme sakwa mu tumaꞌemukwadu numu tutuha soobedyana ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoosoo mu makodyuku. Tamme sakwa gi umuoo tumaꞌemukwadu numu-ma nakatzipana.
65001024	Soo Te Naa oo madaꞌe ka pumme te nakabetseana, yise namatoosoo te bikwu, gi totsabugana. Soo Te Naa te mabetseana besa te masokwamakwu ka Te Pabeꞌe Jesus tamme-koobatoo manepu-witoo.
65001025	Soo Te Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo te magwetzoikwu. Noꞌyoona tamme sakwa oo nakabetsea. Noꞌyoona numu sakwa mee unne, “Soo Te Naa ooosapa tubetse besaꞌyoo.” Yow e nanesootuhi-kwaꞌneꞌyoosoo.
66001001	Ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu tu tubetse namanekwuna, soo Te Naa e pooha nose-kwi, tu tummatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo e tuukwepu. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe mee nuka John tuukwe tuungu ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi ka hemma manemeakwuna. E nosepu mumme pumatoo nananesootuhidu e tuukweꞌe tuunguna.
66001003	Soo Te Naa ka mu numu eka besa naꞌunnedu neadu sootuhikwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka a nakana, a nakabetseana nasootuhikwu, ka pudusoo hemma manepetukwuna nu mu tuukwekwu.
66001004	Nu John mu-matoo tuboꞌo mu Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nananesootuhidu tooe hano tooe ka teepu Asia mee naneadu-koobatu. Nu meeoo mu nanesootuhikute umu Te Naa, Te Pabeꞌe-no yise soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu sootuhise mu magwetzoikwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe toge kaaheno ka Te Naa besa unnepu te tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe unu te soobedyana ka suda tamme tumatugu-koobatoo nabatsapu, ooonneꞌyoona Te Pabeꞌe ka suda tamme tumatugupu tubetse nematzakwunipu. Yise Te Pabeꞌe ka tu yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodase ooosapa gwetzoinumme. Ka mu numu nanesootuhiku meeꞌe soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko tamme nananesootuhidu netamma. Tamme ka Te Pabeꞌe besa nakabetsea oosoo yise noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu te nehane katukwu. Gi hee ka Te Pabeꞌe ooonakwatu pooha-gaꞌyoo, oosoo besaꞌyoona gi mobegwa-gaꞌyoo.
66001007	Pudusoo soo Te Pabeꞌe koomeba-nagakwi kemmowgese yaa teepu-kooba petuookwu. Noꞌyoona numu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnekwu. Noꞌyoona mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka yaa teepu-koobakwitu suda sokwammana, sagwikwu ka suda tu tutumatugupu putammesoo kodyuse.
66001008	Soo Te Naa meeoo, “Nu yow noꞌokosoo hemma-kobenatusoo, nu noꞌoko hemma eka teepu-koobatu nemadabuepu. Nu ooosapa oe manakwana gwetzoibu manepunnena.”
66001009	Nu mumme Te Pabeꞌe-witu tunakaꞌoedyukudu-matoo tuboꞌokwu. Nu punnoꞌo mu-kwaꞌnesoo ka Te Pabeꞌe-matoo nanesootuhidu tooe tamme tu nekuseka, yise tamme tu nanetumooꞌoo sapa. Nu ka Te Naa unnepu Te Pabeꞌe-witu mu numu tunedyooena, ooonneꞌyoona nu yaa baa-kumana pagadudu Patmos mee naneadu-kooba nakwutuma.
66001010	Ka nanesootuhi tabeno nu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhiwununa e ooonakwana nu nadyadooese,
66001011	meeoo natunetammakute, “Eka ume e tzapoonnekukwuna mu ta nananesootuhi nanumu tunesootabue ka mu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu ka Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia-no Laodicea-wi mamanepunnedu.”
66001012	“Hagaga e yadooedyakwe?” mee nu soonammena oo tamme nakwumunase, natakwatsukwuhoo (7) tutukootabuakunoo natzekoonookute nu poonne mu gagatzokwa-matu nidyakwe.
66001013	Umu naniwunudu naamookwi soo Te Pabeꞌe numu-waꞌne tabuana wunu, yaa tu tawetzogo noꞌoto oodutsekoo kwaseana, soo Te Pabeꞌe patakwetseaadu oakwadyadu-ma tu anga-koobakwi nakwunateꞌa, mu numu nanesootuhikudu moohedu-kwaꞌne ooosoo namadabue.
66001014	Besa toha tzopuhu-gana, soo unu oo tusopedakwadoona gi e-natu. Oo pooe goso-kwaꞌneꞌyoona numu-nagakwi tooe tuboohwaꞌe, gi hemma watzekute.
66001015	Oosoo oo kuku unu nadanatzooe tatabuana, weehepu nakooꞌatsawayaꞌneku-kwaꞌne. Oosoo besow ohobu tuapa-gana.
66001016	Tu tumadinakwa natakwatsukwuoo (7) paatoozooba hemmapunne. Soo oo koba unu besa kootabedooapunnena, numu kootuboseyikute. Ka yadooana oo tuapa naduya numu-nagakwi pooha tunemeꞌa.
66001017	Nu ka oo poonnese oo-koobanatoo anoase nanesootuhikooha. Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tu tumadinakwa nu-ma pooha matugu, mee yise e netamma, “Gi suipana. Nu e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayodapu, menoꞌo yise nu gwetzoibu manepunnena. Nu ka nayaꞌedu matzooekupu.
66001019	U sakwa noꞌoko u pooha nosepu, u natzapoonnekukwuna botugumea.
66001020	U sakwa ekahoo nakasopedakwadoo, mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tugoo tabuagunoo nananesootuhidu manepunnedu, nu umu-naga. Mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) paatoozooba tumadina e hemmapunnena, mu nananesootuhidu manepunnena, nu noꞌoko mu manana-wipunne.
66002001	U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakuna botuguse ka Ephesus-witu, mu nananesootuhidu-matoo a taya,” meeꞌe yise soo Te Pabeꞌe. “Nu ooosapa mu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu manana-wina, umu-kooba tueyaꞌe.
66002002	Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukute tooe ka mu sutakoo numu mumme netumooꞌoo sapa. Mu ka gi hemma nasoomenakwana. Besa mu ka mumme nemooagadu-ma gi nakatzabena, tooe mumme mu nanaꞌunnekuna, ‘Numme yaahoo Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe,’ mee mumme mu nemooaga sapa.
66002004	Yise menoꞌo nu mu tuukweꞌehookwu mu uga oꞌnosoo nanasoobedya, menoꞌo yise gi nanaheesoobedya.
66002005	Mu sakwa ka oꞌnosoo unu mu nanasoobedya soomayuna, menoꞌo yise punowsoo kodyuse, oꞌno nu yise mu dooamu-gakwu.
66002006	Besa mu ka mumme tooꞌe nemooagadu mu Nicolaitan mee nananeadu numu-ma gi nakatzaꞌe, nu punnoꞌo ka umuoo suda manena gi petzape.
66002007	Noꞌoko nananesootuhidu nu meeoo netamma, mu sakwa unu nanasoobedyapunne. Oꞌno saaꞌa mu ka Te Naa-baa ka besa-kwi petugase, nu ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo nanagwetzoidu mu sootuhikwu.
66002008	U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakukwuna botuguse ka saaꞌa mu nananesootuhidu Smyrna-matoo oo taya mee nu unnekwu.
66002009	‘Ka tubetse mooeꞌugasoo ka teepu gisoo e matabuena, nu ooosapa E Naa-no gwetzoinumme. Nu yise nuka tu batsase sapa, ka e yaꞌe-kwikoo namayoda. Menoꞌo yise nu gwetzoinummena gi mobegwa-gakwu. Nu noꞌoko sutakoo pooha matzooekute. Nu ka tutuha mu manepunnena sopedakwatoo mu ooonneꞌyoopana ooosapa e sooꞌoedyukute, oꞌno nu tubetse besakoo mu sootuhi. Mu gi totogeꞌyoo numu mu nekwohonedu, “Numme suuꞌmu Te Naa dooamu,” meeꞌe naneyugwepana umu ka gi togekoo tumayohokudu.
66002010	Pudusoo umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu suda mu neyugwekwu susumudu mu-matu yise nuutumedakwu. Gi haaꞌnotoo mu sutaꞌyoo numu mu netumooꞌoopunnese yise susumudu mu-matu sumuna nagoekwu nu-koobatoo. Ooonneꞌyoopana gi sakwa mu umu-ma suipana. Mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna nu ka ooosapa nanagwetzoidu gi mobegwa-gakoo mu sootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baatoo.
66002011	Noꞌoko mumme numu nu-matoo nanesootuhidu nu mee netamma, mu ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukunona, nu-matoo nanesootuhinona, nu gi mu matusookwuni-waꞌneꞌyoo, nu ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.
66002012	U sakwa ka menoꞌo ume e tunetammakukwuna botuguse ka saaꞌa mu nanesootuhidu Pergamos-matoo oo taya, mee nu unnekwu, e tuapa mu-nagakwi pooha tunemeakwu.
66002013	Nu ka sutakoo numu gi toge-tamme numu nedyakwedu-naga mu nonobe-gana sopedakwatoo. Pana mu gi umu-ma nakaꞌemukwana, nu-matoo ooosapa nanesootuhimoꞌo tooe ka sumuhoo umu-matu Antipas mee naneadu nu-koobatoo nabatsase sapa, mu ooosapa e nakabetsea sapa tooe.
66002014	Susumudu mu-nagatu ka gi togekoo numu-ma nakatzape. Umuoo numu nemooagadu Balaam-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka oꞌnosoo puu soo numu nemooagadu Balaam mee naneadu ka Balak numu nemooaga tuungu. Soo Balak yise meeoo pumme nanumu netamma, “Mu Te Naa besa dooamu nemooagana gi totogekoo-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.”
66002015	Oosoo menoꞌo, susumudu mu-nagatu ka numu nemooaga ka Nicolaitan mee nananeadu-ma nakatzabena pumme mu neyugwe-too manakwe.
66002016	Maꞌno ka mumme nemooagadu-ma mu gi nakatzabepana, nu-tammesoo manese, oꞌno nu mu maꞌemukwapu tusoomuꞌwakwu. Oꞌno yise ka gi oo mu manakwe, soo suda mu manena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
66002017	Nu noꞌoko mu nananesootuhidu meeoo netammanoꞌo, mu ka ooosapa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, nu besakoo mu sootuhina atasoo mu mayugwekwu, oꞌno yise ooosapa mu-noꞌyookwu.’ “
66002018	Nu John ka Te Pabeꞌe tubokute meeoo nuka oo netamma, “U sakwa Thyatira-witoo mu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse, meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yaa Te Naa Besaa Tooaꞌa. Nu noꞌoko gi hemma poohwatzekupunne eka teepu-koobatu. Nu mu-koobenatu, nu ka mu nanesootuhidu-notu.
66002019	Nu mu sopedakwatoo mu o manepu, besa e nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu besa nanatummatzi, mu yise gi etzaga nasootooke. Menoꞌo yise mu unusoo nanabesasoo.
66002020	Pana sumuꞌyoo mogoꞌne
66002021	Huutooe nu ka mogoꞌne tooꞌe neta, pana soo mogoꞌne gi oo maꞌwu.
66002022	Oosoo gi toge oo tumatuguna oo-matoosoo kodyuse oo matuꞌoeyikwu.
66002023	Mu naneꞌemukwadu punnoꞌo ka gi mu maꞌemukwana nematzagakwunina, oosoo mu-matoosoo kodyuse mu goekwu. Menoꞌo yise mu nananesootuhidu, mu oo sopedakwadoo yise nu noꞌoko mu sokwamana gi watzekute. Soo suda mu manena mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
66002024	Susumudu mu-matu ka mogoꞌne mumme nemooagadu-ma gi nakaꞌemukwadu tooe nanabesa oo unnewunu.
66002025	Ooosapa nanesootuhino e kodyu petu-noꞌoto tooe.’
66002026	Nu noꞌoko nu-matoo nananesootuhidu meeoo netamma, ‘Tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo matzooekuna ooosapa e nakabetseana ka hemma namamakwu-kwitoo tooe. Ka E Naa nuga tunetammaku-kwaꞌnesoo tamme ka sutakoo kadoo mayugwekwu, oꞌno tamme saaꞌa ewow nanakummaꞌakoosoo numu nehanegatukwu.’
66003001	U sakwa ka Sardis-witu mu numu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabeꞌe. Mu nuka nanetzakwiyaꞌedu nu mabetseꞌa. Nu noꞌoko mu manena gi watzekute. Mu numu meeoo mu nanatuukwe, “Mu numu Sardis-witu besa nananesootuhidu,” meeꞌe pana mu-naga-kwitu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu nemooagadu.
66003002	Mu ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo ka e unnena nakase, unu besa tumayohogonno. Mu sakwa ka suda mu manena maꞌwuke besasoo nanesootuhi manegasoo ka oꞌnosoo mu mane-kwaꞌnesoo. Oꞌno soo suda mu tumatuguna gi mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
66003004	Huuꞌyoosoo mu-nagatu besa tuꞌoedyukute gi suda manakwe, mu saaꞌa ka Te Naa-baa nu-no manepetugadooa.
66003005	Mumme noꞌoko nuga nanetzakwiyidu ka sutakoo gi nanatoohakuna, oꞌno mu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyookwu. Nu ka Te Naa noko mu ooka toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, “E nanumu,” meeꞌe mu natubangakakwu. Oꞌno soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu ka Te Naa-baa ooosapa nanagwetzoidu gi moobegwa-gakoo.’
66003007	U sakwa ka mu Philadelphia-witu mu numu nananesootuhidu-matoo tuwazoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, mu nemadanagakwutu, ka mu Te Naa doodooamu manepunnekwutu, ka mu-matu gi ooka mapuꞌakwutu tuwow.
66003008	Nu yow Te Naa doodooamu mu mayugwekese, oꞌno saaꞌa soo Te Naa-nabatoosoo besakoo mu sootuhidooa. Nu mu sopedakwatoo tooe namadugedu numu pana, mu besa e nakaꞌoedyukuna besa e tumayohokute ka mumme e tunetammakute.
66003009	Mu Jew numu o mu-baa manepunnedu ka besa mu manakwe mu nesootuhidyi, “Numme suuꞌmu besa Ne Naa doodooamu, okowsoo tutzeapu,” tooꞌe umu meeoo mu nemooagapana ka puusoo ka sutakoo tumayohokuna meehoo unakwe. Nu saaꞌa ꞌyoo mu sootunagadooa umu saaꞌa mu-matusoo kemmase ka tu unnepu sootuꞌadyise oo nemakodyukudooa. Oꞌno saaꞌa umu ka mumme unu e kammakuna sopedakwadoona.
66003010	Nanasuda namanedu ka yow teepu-koobatu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu tokunakena mu ka besa nuka nakatumayohokuna, nu ooosapa mu sootuhinokwu, yise mu magwetzoi petugakwu.
66003011	Mu sakwa ooosapa nuka nakatumayohokuno ka pudusoo yaa teepu-koobasoo e kodyu petukwuse.’
66003012	Noꞌoko mu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu nu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Mu ka sutakoo gi namatzooekunona. Nu ooosapa Te Naa-tooha mu mayugwenokwu, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numme-noꞌyoodooa ooosapa, eka teepu besa pudu namapudutupudoose.’
66003014	U sakwa ka Laodicea-witu ka mu nananesootuhidu-matoo e tubokuse meeoo mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe. Ooosapa toge kaahenokoo hemma mu tuukwedu. Nu noꞌoko hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepuna, noꞌoko hekwitu poohwaꞌe.
66003015	Nu noꞌoko mu-kwitu sopedakwatoo mu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu, mu sakwa nakwitu soohanese sumu-tammesoo tusooyugwe ka besa-tamme.
66003017	“Numme ka mooasoo besa manepunnena,” mee mu nasooyugwena, “Oo-mahoo nasoonatzina gi hemma soogwi,” meeꞌe mu sokwama. Ooonneꞌyoona mu gi ka Te Naa nanetzakwiyina. Ka nuga pooha manepunnena gi sooheesoobedyana mu muusoo nanemooꞌaka ka gi nuka nanetzakwiyina nu gi mu sootuhi-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66003018	Mu ka ooosapa nu-matoo nanesootuhinona nu mu nakasootuhise, yise mu nu-kwitu nakasopedakwadoose ka nuga besa podo nu-no kaaheno meadabenokwu.
66003019	Nu ka mu soobedyana mu nenanawina meeoo mu netamma. Ka gi toge mu mamanena sakwa mu maꞌwuse, nuga mumme tutunetammakuna tumayohoku.
66003020	Nu mu paꞌe mu-matu tooe haga tooe e nakaꞌoedyukudu mu ooosapa nu-noꞌyookwu nu-nosoo Te Naa besa podo meadabekwu.’
66003021	Noꞌoko mu numu nu-matoo nananesootuhidu nu meeoo netammakwu, ‘Tooe haga tooe nuka nanesootuhidu nuka nakaꞌoedyukunodu saaꞌa nu-no e nanumu nemadanagadooa. Nu punnoꞌo E Naa besa nakaꞌoedyuikupuna, ooonneꞌyoona nu saaꞌa noꞌoko numu nemadunagakwu.’ “
66004001	Mee tuwazoo nu pooha tuusoobedya. Soo Te Pabeꞌe besa e tookoope netamma, “Yaatoo kemmase ka saaꞌa hemma manepetukwuna nu u tzapoonnekwu.”
66004002	Nu pooha tsebooese soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka koomeba tawagatoo e bihookase ka Te Naa-kobena numme pepetuga, o ka Te Naa numu nehanegatu-kwi.
66004003	Soo Te Naa unu besa pooha-gana o katu.
66004004	Soo Te Naa tubetse naduya numu poohawuma, ka pukwi ka natakwatsu-baatu (7) goso manepunnedu-kwiꞌyoona. Mu goso Te Naa Besa Pooha manepunnena, ka yaa te teepu-kooba oosoo natakwatsu-baa (7) numu nanesootuhibu manepunnena. Waha manoꞌyoona watsu matsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu mu kwingatu-kwisoo toha namasoana manepunne, o umu Te Naa tutummatzidu a papabeꞌemu aataꞌa.
66004006	Soo pukooba mu manepunnena besa patsekoba-waꞌne patatzadyaꞌa. Soo mu a papabeꞌemu manepunnena noꞌoko ka Te Naa mu watsubatu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu, gi hemma puu watzekudu.
66004007	Sumuꞌyoo natzooebu, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo tutummatziba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo soonammeba, sumuꞌyoo punnoꞌo yabesoo he-toogoo natunakabetseadu mamanepunnena.
66004008	Nanasusuꞌmu umu watsukweꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu nanapaheoo (6) kakasa-gaꞌyoo umuoo watsukweꞌyoo nanasusuꞌmuꞌyoo Te Naa pooha manepunnena. Umuoo ooosapa ka Te Naa unu soonagapunnena oo nesookwugaꞌe.
66004009	Umu ka Te Naa nesookwugina,
66004010	umu waha mano watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu punnoꞌo oo nepesana oo nesookwugaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “U tubetse nanasookwugaꞌe. Numme gi mama-waꞌneꞌyoo. U besaꞌyoo unu pooha-gana ka noꞌoko hemma besa umesoo tusooaꞌa-waꞌne matabuepu-gana. Besa deaꞌa ka noꞌoko numu ume nesookwugaꞌe.”
66005001	E tuusoobedya-kwi Te Naa tumadinakwa tu mi-wi hemma namaputooedu gwuukatu oo nanaꞌenakwa Te Naa tunetammagepu nabotugu natakwatsu-baa (7) nanasusuꞌmu nanamatzabekudu.
66005002	Nu yise tuwazoo sumuhoo poohabe manepunnena toha kasa-gakoo Te Naa tummatzidu poonne, oosoo pabatseꞌe mee unne, “Haga mu-matu eka namabutooedu mabusuke-waꞌne manepunne Te Naa tunemamakwupu ka natakwatsu-baa (7) nanasusu-ma nanasukwesoo nanamatzabekudu?”
66005003	Gi haga tooe hanotu tooe namabutooedu mabusuke meana a nea-waꞌneꞌyoo ka gi pooha-gana.
66005004	Nu ka oe nabodu e poonnekwuna soogwetakuse, gi haga ooka tu mabusukekwuna mapuꞌapunne, nu yise suda soonammese yagakooha.
66005005	Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu meeoo e netamma, “Gi yagapana. Yahoo Te Pabeꞌe, David manakwana numu suakepu suuꞌmu soo Te Pabeꞌe ka ooka oo mabusukekwuna oo sootuhipuna.”
66005006	E tuusoobedya-kwikoo nu ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne ka Te Naa pukwi manepunnena koobenakoo. Soo Te Pabeꞌe o ka tamme-koobatoo nabatsapuna ka yotsepu-gana. Soo Te Pabeꞌe naduyadu pooha-gana unu soonammepunne.
66005007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise ka tu mi-wi ka namabutooedu ka Te Naa tunetammakwupu gwuuhu. Mu watsukwuꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu, umu waha mano watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo a papabeꞌemu ka Te Pabeꞌe-kobena meatzedo petuse, oo-matoo nanesootuhigonno. Noꞌyoona umu nanasusumuoo oa tupe namadabuena kwekwedadu tseda yoongedana, ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu nanesootuhina oekoo.
66005009	Mu meeoo tunekwuhu, “U Ne Pabeꞌe unu nanasookwugaꞌe. U suuꞌmu ka Te Naa tunetammakwepu mabusuke-waꞌne manepunne, numu-koobatoo nabatsapu ka oo numu magwetzoipu-gana.
66005010	Noꞌobatusoo numu ume tumagwetzoipu, u ka Te Naa tutummatzidu mayugwepu, umu yise Te Naa-witu numu tunedyooedu ka teepu-koobaꞌyoona.”
66005011	Nu oetusoo poonnese tubetse ewow gi nadatsungapu mu toha kakasa-gakoo poonne, numu pookwumehoepu, mu nanaꞌooonakwisoo manepunne.
66005012	Umu yise mee naꞌunnedu hoobea papaba nekwugonno tunetzabigonno. “Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsase mu magwetzoi, Te Pabeꞌe besaꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabeꞌe poohabe sootuhipu, noꞌoko tu sopedakwadoo-baa manepunnena, ka gi hemma wumehoena naduyana, noꞌokosoo hemma manepunnena, noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa unu nanasookwugaꞌe, Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko ekow nasootuhipu.”
66005013	Noꞌyoona hee ka Te Naa manumudoopu punnoꞌo mee unnegonno, “Te Pabeꞌe ka mu numu-koobatoo nabatsase menoꞌo gwetzoidu noꞌoko hemma ooonakwa unu nanasookwugaꞌe, mu suuꞌmu tamme-kooba namayugwe, naduya noꞌokosoo hemma mamanepunnena ekow noꞌoko nasootuhipu gi mobegwa-ga.”
66005014	Mu watsukwuꞌyoo (4) Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu punnoꞌo meeoo mu tunemootzadyakupu mu ewa (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo a papabeꞌemu punnoꞌo meatzedose, ka Te Naa Te Pabeꞌe nepesaꞌyookute.
66006001	Ka e tuusoobedya-wi soo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu, ka Te Naa tunemamakwupu gwuuse ka nagutza mooeꞌugasoo a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌase, ka a mooe naꞌunnena mabusuke. Mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka yaa teepu-koobatu maꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukooha, ka oo mooe namabusukese. Sumuꞌyoo mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu pabatse pooha tunekemmaku.
66006002	Oꞌno yise nu-kobena tabuapetu soo nana aabu-gaꞌyoo, waaꞌadu noko pongosa hemmadu. Oo mu ewa gi totogekoo matzooekuhookwudu.
66006003	Ka nagutza mooeꞌuga-nakwatu a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌase ka penakwa naꞌunnedu soo Te Pabeꞌe tuwazoo mabusuke. Sumuꞌyoo mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu punnoꞌo tunekemmaku.
66006004	Sumuꞌyoo yise nana atsakwadyadu pookoo-kooba katudu nu-kobena tabuahoobetu, osoo oogow pooha punnoꞌo. Esoo punnoꞌo tsegesa kwuꞌu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-kooba nanagoekooha.
66006005	Ka pahe-kwitu soo Te Pabeꞌe namatzabekudu tzatoꞌase punnoꞌo ooka oo mabusukese, mu watsu-matu mu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu punnoꞌo tunekemmaku. Sumuꞌyoo nana too pookoo-gaꞌyoo tukapu pukoobakoo natzakwuekuna tu mi-wi tzadyakwedu e-kobena tabuahoopetu.
66006006	Ka teepu-kooba petuse, ka teepu-koobatu nadukadu natuukekwuna wahadu, oꞌno mu numu tsagoekwu, a yoohoo noko atsa baa gi natuukekwuna.
66006007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwow watsu a namatzabekuna tzatoꞌasoo yise oo mabusukesoo, oꞌno yise mu watsu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu-matu pooha tunekemmaku.
66006008	Sumuꞌyoo nana aakwadyatu pookoo-gaꞌyoo e-kobena tabuapetu. Osoo yaꞌebu manepunnena, sumuꞌyoo tuwazoo tzageꞌe oo ooonakwa tabuapetu, oo-notusoo, oꞌno mu numu-naga-kwitu-matu ka teepu-koobatu tuikooha. Umu tooe how tooe a tui tatabuana, susumudu punnoꞌo a nanagoena, susumudu tuoebu-ma a tuina, susumudu a tseatuina, yise tuwow susumudu nunuꞌu tugoena.
66006009	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwazoo ka manege-kwitu namatzabekudu tzatoꞌa ka ookow oo mabusukesoo, Te Pabeꞌe tummatzidu-koobatoo nagoena mu moogooa mooasoo Te Naa-baa manepetuga.
66006010	Umu yise ka Te Naa-matoo unu nanesootuhikooha mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa nanasookwugaꞌe. U ooosapa togetu. Wunaꞌme manekapu, umu sutaꞌyoo numu numme ume nanesootuhi doodooamu goetabena tooe. Hannanoꞌo umu ne goedu soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu?”
66006011	Mu nagoepu moogooa nanasusumuꞌyoona besa nasootuhina. Soo Te Naa yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa tuutooepunne. Tooesoo mu e dooamu nagoe penaꞌe. Oꞌno yise mu tugoepu suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
66006012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe yise tuwazoo ka naapahe-kwitu namatzabekudu tzatoꞌasoo ka ookow oo mabusukesoo, esoo teepu-koobatu wudyusengakooha gi besa namanakwe soo teepu atasoo mani.
66006015	Mu susutaꞌyoo numu yise suda sokwamana nasootooke, teepu tawaga-kwi watse ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-ma suipunnena.
66006016	Umu ka tubetse suda tu namanakwe tooꞌe watsepana gi hownnekoo namatzatsebooe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66006017	Umu ka tu matuadyina pumatoosoo kodyu, umu gi hownnekoo how mane-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa gi toge soobedyase.
66007001	Yise e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi mu watsukweꞌyoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu, ka teepu-kooba ka watsubatu pedyoomaba punowsoo tsipunne. Oꞌno soo pedyoomaba gi ka teepu-koobatu noko ka baa-witu suda yugwekwu.
66007002	Toge ka umu watsukweoo Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-gakoo ka pedyoomaba mu tzamaꞌwuhookwuse, kummaꞌyoosoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo Te Naa tummatzidu taba tsebooe-nakwana teepu-koobaꞌyoona tsebooegena, umu-baa manipetu ka tu tukoopona tu gwuu-ma numu puma oo tsepokwuna. Oosoo meehoo unakwe,
66007003	“Ka Te Naa nuka nemanekuna, ka mu Te Naa doodooamu pumakoo nasoobedakwadookwuna, nu gisoo mamakwu.”
66007004	Ka saaꞌa Te Naa pumme nemanekuna mamakwu, (144,000) mu Jew numu pooha nakoopoꞌokwu, ewaꞌyoo (12,000) noꞌobatusoo
66007009	E tuusoobedya-kwi tubetse ewaꞌyoo noꞌobatusoo numu ka teepu-koobatu gi nadatsunga-waꞌneꞌyoo, ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe kwiyaꞌa mu naꞌooonakwi, ka mooasoo mu naꞌooonakwi mu manepunne sapa mu naꞌooonakwisoo konnopunne. Umuoo gi tototsaba-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamadu.
66007010	Umu eka besa nakaꞌoedyukudu, kaaheno Te Naa-ma sokwama tabuapu, ooosapa umu hoobeadookemma mee unnena, “U, Ne Naa ka Ne Pabeꞌe-no tumagwetzoibu manepunnena. Esoo Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo nabatsapu soo Te Naa tunemadabuepu.”
66007011	Noꞌyoona mu Te Naa tummatzidu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo mu papabeꞌemu-no ka Te Naa naꞌooonakwi konnopunnedu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha.
66007012	Mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo. U nokosoo hemma sopedakwatoona gi hee u-makoo nawatzetugu-waꞌneꞌyoo, unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, numu magwetzoidu. Numme ooosapa u nesookwugaꞌe. U, Ne Naa tubetse nanasookwugi pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
66007013	Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasakoo papabeꞌe-matu meeoo e tubenga, “Hee numu umu, u haaꞌa mu sopedakwatoo? Hanotu kemmana?”
66007014	Nu mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu gi mu sopedakwatoo. U sakwa yise nuka tuukwe.” Oosoo yise meeoo e tuukwe, “Umuoo numu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhi tooe Te Pabeꞌe-koobatu nakusedyipana ooonneꞌyoona umu namagwetzoipu.
66007015	Menoꞌo manakwana umu ooosapa Te Naa-baaꞌyoona, ooosapa oo-matoo nanesootuhinokwu, soo Te Naa yise tu pooha-ma mu tzatoboyakwu, nadooha mu mayugwepunnekwu.
66007016	Umu gi tzuagoena, puugoꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo ka oꞌnosoo mu manepu-waꞌne ka besa-kwiꞌyoona, gi umu udututu-baa wuma-kwaꞌne ka oꞌnosoo tu namanatzayapu-waꞌne.
66007017	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mu mabetseana mu sootuhikwu oosoo ka umu soobedyana mu-koobatoo nabatsapuna, menoꞌo manakwana oosoo ooosapa besa mu masokwamana mu sootuhikwu.”
66008001	Soo Te Pabeꞌe natakwatsu-kwitu (7) namatzabekudu tzatoꞌase punnoꞌo ooka oo mabusukese Te Naa-baatu yise gi haaꞌnotoo gi natunemayupunne.
66008002	Oꞌno soo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gakoo papabeꞌemu, ka Te Naa tutummatziwabe nanasusumuhoo tumooyagakunoo heme.
66008003	Sumuꞌyoo kummaꞌyoosoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo, mu Te Naa tummatzidu-matu Te Naa-kobena wunuhoo petu, ka oa tupe-ma namadabuena tseda yongana. Noꞌyoona Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhipu yadooaba nanemamakwuna mooasoo nakwedapu ka tseda-wi.
66008004	Esoo tseda-witu soo nananesootuhipe ka besa kookwanadu-no namayuapunnena ka Te Naa-tamme kookwanapunne.
66008005	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise ka tseda tukwuna ka goso-matu oe yongase paꞌanakwana ka teepu-koobatoo oo wukwatehoo. Ka oo manise oꞌno yise nunuadu, tukwukwutseba, soo teepu unu yutsungawunu, oꞌno mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka suda tu tumatuguna putammesoo kodyukwuna sopedakwadookwu.
66008006	Mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) tumooyagakukwudu nuummabetsabepunne ka nanapenakwa nanasumuꞌu tumooyagakukwuse.
66008007	Soo mooenakwasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mooe tumooyagakuse. Hakwopa, goso, puupe-no namayuadu ka teepu-kooba mani petu. Tooꞌe naamookwitu noꞌobatusoo sunngabe nihoo, yise noꞌobatusoo pooe tumasuape punnoꞌo.
66008008	Soo penakwatu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Tubetse goso pabatsekoo ka tubetse baa-witoo paꞌanakwana wueoo. Tooꞌe naamookwitu soo tubetse baa puupe mani.
66008009	Tooꞌe naamookwitu mu pakwe ka tubetse baa-witu tuihoo. Tooꞌe naamookwitu punnoꞌo mu sake baa-koobatu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe.
66008010	Soo penakwatu pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Soo pabaꞌyoo paatoozooba pooedabedooa tutsepokwuegaꞌa ka teepu-koobatu. A tooꞌe naamookwitu ka mu baa hooodu yise a batsebooewunu suda kammakooha. Suda manise ewaꞌyoo numu oo hebese tuigonno.
66008012	Soo watsu nadatsunga toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo tumooyagaku. Soo taba, ka muha-no ka mu paatoozooba togawiyaꞌnehoo yise mu tooꞌe naamookwitu suuꞌmu kootabuapunne.
66008013	Nu yise oetu poonnese sumuꞌyoosoo kweꞌnaꞌa ne paꞌanakwi oo yotsenummena ne tuya tuukwenummena mee unnenumme, “Suda namanekwu, tubetse suda namanekwu. Tubetse suda namanekwu noꞌoko mu numu ka teepu-koobatu gwetzoipunnedu ka umu pihoo toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo nabenidu ka tu tumooyagakuno mu mooyagakuhoose.”
66009001	Soo manege nadatsunga toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise tumooyagaku. E nose-kwi soo sutaꞌyoo suda tumatugupu yaa teepu-koobatoo wuehoo. Oosoo sutaꞌyoo napoohamakahoo ka mu tsoapa pukwi nakwutumana natzakwonaꞌa natzakwona tuunguna.
66009002	Ka ookow o tzakwonowse, oetu kweedakooha. Soo kweedadu ka teepu paꞌanakwi manise ka taba habakakuoo.
66009003	Mu hoadada-waꞌneꞌyoo ka teepu-kooba mani. Umu unu tubekwudyungadu.
66009004	Umu hoadada meeoo nanetamma gi ka pooe-gakoo ka teepu-koobatu, tooetoo mu sunngabe, ka tooe hemma tooe naadu ka teepu-koobatu matzamapana. Mu gi Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu numu suuꞌmu manayaha.
66009005	Manege muha mu pekwudyana pana gi mu batsapana mee nanetamma. Mu tupekuepu unu nananuumadu.
66009006	Mu numu tooꞌe sootui, pana gi tui-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66009007	Mu hoadada tu ewa-ma nananakwisoo kemmadu-kwaꞌne tabuadape. Ka mu kwo-kooba oa tupe namadabuena tzotua-kwaꞌne tatabua yise too numu koba-gaꞌyoo.
66009008	Umu momokoꞌne-waꞌne tsotsotabuꞌa. Umu unu gunatzooena.
66009009	Umu tuwazoo unu ohobudu nungabu-gaꞌyoo. Mu kasa ewow hemma medabedu-kwaꞌne kangagonno ka mu yotsumoꞌo.
66009011	Soo mu moohedu sutaꞌyoo mu tsotsoapa pabeꞌe, Gadooꞌoo Hemma Mayugwedu, mee naneadu.
66009012	Paheꞌyoo suda namanedu numu-tamme kemma. Mooeꞌugasoo mu hoadada hemma oo yugwe. Wahaꞌyoo yise penaꞌe.
66009013	Soo Te Naa ka mu naapahe nadatsungadu toha kakasa-gakoo tumooyagakunoo gwuudu meeoo netamma, “Ka umu watsukwuꞌyoo (4) sutakoo tsoapa ka paba hooodu, Euphrates mee naneadu-kumaba natzakunetadu tzadopeta.”
66009015	Umuoo tsotsoapa wunaꞌme tuutooꞌe oꞌno umu yise tooꞌe now mookwitu mu numu-matu goekwu.
66009016	Umu ewow (200,000,000) tsotsoapa tutummatziwabe-gaꞌyoo.
66009017	Umu boobookoo-gaꞌyoo umu tsotsoapa unu ohobudu weehepu nanungabudoona, soo weehepu pukwi mu kwakwasea atsakwadyana, boohekwadyana, oakwadyana. Mu pookoo wo nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tatabuana, nidu kweedadu-no mu tupa-wiꞌyoona tsebooewunu, tooꞌe naamookwitu mu numu ka teepu-koobatu goehoo.
66009019	Mu pookoo kwase ka togogwa-waꞌne yise numu tokuꞌe.
66009020	Ooonneꞌyoopana mu numu penidu ka sutakoo tu nanesootuhina gi maꞌwu.
66009021	Mu penidu numu tubatsana, tutuhana, numu tupoohana gi maꞌwu.
66010001	Yise ka e tuusoobedya-kwi nu kummaꞌakoosoo unu naduya pooha-gaꞌyoo toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana koomeba-nagaꞌyoo oo wuegena. Peagutukwunupunne-waꞌne oo tzotua manepunne. Oo koba ka taba-waꞌne patakwetseaapunne. Oo kowpa goso-makoo namadabuedu-kwaꞌne tabuana.
66010002	Tuutsekoo tubope nadoputooena, oo naꞌenakwa puma natubodu, mooasoo natzakwonadu tu mi-wi gwuuna. Tumadinakwatu oo kuku ka tubetse baa-kooba, soo oenakwatu punnoꞌo ka teepu-kooba tatugupunne.
66010003	Paba pooha tunetzabi ka mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) oo nanekwekadu, punnoꞌo tunetzabi.
66010004	Toge ka mu natakwatsukwuoo (7) nunuadu unawena e botugukwuse soo Te Pabeꞌe paꞌanakwana e netahoo, “Gi ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) nunuabu unnewunudu bopana, esoo togesoo nawatsetugupunnedu.”
66010005	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tumadinakwatu tu mi toogoopatoo mayodapunne.
66010006	Mee unnekooha, “Te Naa e taya ka kaahenotu mumme e tuukwe tuunguna. Oosoo gi wunaꞌmesoo tuutooe-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo Te Naa ooosapa gwetzoinummedu gi mobekwa-gaꞌyoo. Oosoo ka tamme-koobakwitu noꞌoko hemma matabuepu ka teepu noꞌoko hemma ma-koobakwitu, yise ka tubetse baa-wi gwetzoidu noꞌoko hemma oetu tuwazoo.
66010007	Ka natakwatsu (7) nadatzengudu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tumooyagakukoohase, soo Te Naa ka tu watze tunetammana mamakwuhookwu ka tu yadooawabe tu tuukwepu-waꞌnesoo.”
66010008	Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe naka paꞌanakwana mee nuka oo netammase, “Meahoose ka namabutooetu tubope ka toha kasa-gakoo mi-wikoo oo gwuuhootooa.”
66010009	Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo-matoo meahoose ka tuutse namabutooetu tubope oo natuungu. Oosoo mee e netamma, “A gwuuse a tuka. Masoo besa kamma nota peha-waꞌne, pana masoo ka saaꞌa u seenuumakukwu.”
66010010	Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo unne-kwaꞌnesoo mani.
66010011	Oosoo yise mee e netamma, “U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu noꞌobatusoo numu mu moohedu nokosoo pooha tuukwe.”
66011001	Ka hooope Te Naa e geahoose mee e netamma, “Meahoose hooope-ma ka Te Naa pukwiyoona mu nanesootuhi nobe managahoo ka umu e dooamu oeꞌyoona nanesootuhidu saaꞌa datsungahooke.
66011002	Pana gi ka puuwanatu oo nanaꞌoonnakwitu managapana oosoo ka mu gi Jew numu pukwitu nehanena. Umu gi Jew numu ka Te Naa gi heesoobedya, gi besa tumatuguna ka mu wakwawaꞌa-toohakwi manemokwu.
66011003	Nu waahoo e yadooawabe poohamakakwu. Umu wahaꞌyoo saaꞌa ewa (126O) tabeba-wi mu numu ka e unnepu tuukwemodooa, oꞌno yise mu suda sokwamakwu.
66011005	Soo tooe haga tooe ka gi mu nakabetsabedu ka mu sootumooꞌoodu gi hownnekoo mu manayaha-waꞌneꞌyoo.” Umu wahaꞌyoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Naa Besa Pooha punagakoo mu pooha yadooana umu wohonepu puusoo ka suda mu tumatuguna mu-matoosoo makodyukute.
66011006	Umu wahaꞌyoo yadooawabe ka pooha-gana ka powmadu mesoo nedyooikudu. Ka baa puupe-kwitoo tu matabuena pooha-gaꞌyoo tuwazoo. Mu Te Naa yadooawabe ookow pooha-gaꞌyoo eka numu suda mu namanatzayapu mu pooha tzapoonnekute, ooonneꞌyoona eka numu suda tumaꞌemukwana umu-matusoo mesoo makodyu.
66011007	Umu Te Naa nayadooawabe ka saaꞌa numu ka Te Naa unnena tuukwemakwuse soo sutaꞌyoo nunuꞌu mu Te Naa nayadooawabe goepu.
66011008	Mu tookoo gi nakookwu pana ka Jerusalem mee naneadu-kwi namawukwu, po-wi
66011009	Paheꞌyoo yise oo naamookwitu tabeno noꞌobatusoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu mu tookoo sookwugikwu ka gi umu mu nakooꞌoo tuungu.
66011010	Noꞌyoona mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu besa sokwama ka eka Te Naa nanayadooawabe nagoese. Umu ka besa tu sokwamana tzapoonnena nanahoesoo nanahemaka. Noꞌyoona soo suda namanedu ka mu Te Naa waahoo nayadooawabe tumayugwena kadooꞌoo maneka mee umu sokwama.
66011011	Ka pahe yise oo naamookwitu tabeno manekase soo Te Naa songapu ka umu waahoo Te Naa yadooawabe-kwitoo nasongahase, umu yise yotsuhoo noꞌyoona numu oo poonnese suihoo.
66011012	Umu wahaꞌyoo Te Naa yadooawabe ka Te Pabeꞌe naka ka pabatse paꞌanakwana mee oo unnese, “Mu sakwa nu-matoo yaa-too kekemmow.” Umu wahaꞌyoo yise koomeba-naga toogoopatoo kuowka mu wohonedu mu sookwugipunne.
66011013	Oꞌno soo teepu yutsungakooha soo Jerusalem-matu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe yise ewaꞌyoo numu tuihoo. Mu numu nabenihoodu unutse suihoose mee unnegonno, “Soo Te Naa pooha naduya.”
66011014	Mooasoo mu numu soo wahatooe suda namanedu poonneke, yise sumuꞌyoo umu-tammesoo kemmowgenasoo.
66011015	Soo natakwatsu (7) a nadatsunga-kwitu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka tu tumooyagakunoo mooyagaku. Ewaꞌyoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo besa sokwamana tunegwuukooha, “Soo sutaꞌyoo menoꞌo manakwana gi hownnekoo numu matzoeku-waꞌne mani. Yaa manakwana soo Te Naa numu nemadunagakwu, gi mobegwa-gakwu.”
66011016	Noꞌyoona umu te nanesootuhi papabeꞌemu ka Te Naa-kobena meatzedose ka Te Naa nesookwugaꞌe
66011017	mee unnegonno, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo, kadoo ume kumitusoo. U noꞌoko hemma matzooekupu.
66011018	Noꞌobatusoo gi u-matoo nanesootuhidu numu uga u soosawikute. Menoꞌo yise umuoo numu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu, mu tuipu numu tuwazoo ooosoo. Menoꞌo u yise ka umu ume nakabetseadu ka mu numu besa u unnepu tuukwedu, u-matoo nanesootuhidu sootuhikwu. U ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu ka teepu kadoo mayugwedu punnoꞌo kadoo mayugwekwu.”
66011019	Soo Te Naa yoo mani ka tu tunetammakupu-wi petugase ka tu yadooapu tamme-tamme sootuhise, umu yise ookahoo oowekoo sopedakwatoo. Oꞌno yise nunuana tukwukwutsekooha soo teepu unu yutsungakoohase yise papabatsema hakwotukwakooha. Yaahoo esoo Te Naa pooha manepunne.
66012001	Nu yise ka e tuusobedya-kwi ka mogoꞌne poonne. Soo mogoꞌne ka mu Jew numu manepunnena wahadu. Soo Te Naa pooha ka mogoꞌne noꞌotu atsa tukwunupunne. O tookwa soo mu numu pabeꞌe pea.
66012002	Oosoo mogoꞌne koheꞌadu, paba nanepaga ka tooaꞌadoohookwuse.
66012003	Nu yise ka e tuusobedya-kwi pabatsekoo atsa togogwa-waꞌne tabuadu poonne. O oosoo panetogogwa numu goekwudu. Natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gana noꞌyoona suta-kwi pooha tsotsowupaka yise sumumanoꞌokoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo.
66012004	Tu kwase-ma tooꞌe naamookwitu ka mu paatoozooba tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo wusawekuwunu. Soo panetogogwa ka mogoꞌne tooaꞌadoodu-kobena wunuhoo, oꞌno oosoo ka oongaꞌa oo nadooaꞌadoohoose oo totzobahookwu mee soonammena.
66012005	Esoo naatse Te Pabeꞌe manekwudu. Gi haga Te Pabeꞌe pooha matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo panetogogwa gi how oo maꞌe. Esoo naatse Te Naa-baatoo natzagwuuga, obeꞌyoona oosoo saaꞌa numu-koobatoo manedooa.
66012006	Soo mogoꞌne oo namatzatseboogese oo-na tubetse hekwana manepetuga, soo Te Naa mooasoo oo-toogoo tumabetsape ka pahe tomoba naamookwitu oo mabetseakwuse.
66012007	Te Naa manepunne-kwitu nananepetugudu. Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu moohedu Michael mee naneadu-no panetogogwa nananepetukute Te Naa manepunne-kwitu.
66012008	Soo panetogogwa, mu tsotsoapa pupuaꞌamu-no nanematzooekuse, yise ka Te Naa-bakoo gi nanepetzape.
66012009	Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa unu pabaꞌyoo ka pudu oe manakwana numu suda mayugwedu, numu nemooagadu ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona ka teepu-koobatoo natayakwuni. Noꞌoko umu pumme tupuaꞌadu punnoꞌo.
66012010	Umu yise Te Naa-batu oo pooha nesookwugaꞌe mee unnemoꞌo, “Menoꞌo soo Te Naa tamme magwetzoina namamakwupetu. Soo Te Naa yise ka sutakoo netayakwuni. Menoꞌo soo Te Pabeꞌe ka sutakoo panetogogwa ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa uga ka Te Naa-kobena wunuyina mu nanesootuhikuna suda nanemadabueyakwe. Ka oo oo manakwe soo Te Naa nabakoo oo tayakwunipu.
66012011	Umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu-koobatu nabatsa ooonneꞌyoona ka sutakoo matzooekukwu umu ka Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukuna. Oꞌno yise mu mee ka mu numu tunesootabuemona, soo Te Pabeꞌe yise te magwetzoikwu umu ka tunakabetseanona tooe pumme tu goꞌese sapa.
66012012	Yaa manakwana noꞌyoona umu Te Naa-batu besa sokwamakwu. Pana mu numu teepu-koobakwitu suda namatuusoobedyakwu ka sutakoo yaa teepu-kooba mani petuse.” Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa unu sutaꞌa ka pudusoo oosoo tu tubetse nakwutumakwuse sopedakwatoona.
66012013	Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka teepu-koobatoo nuwatzeoose, ka mogoꞌne sookusega.
66012014	Soo mogoꞌne ka Te Naa-toohatu ooonneꞌyoona soo sutaꞌyoo gi oo nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66012015	Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa nanasuda ka mogoꞌne sootunagagena, ooonneꞌyoopana ka mogoꞌne gi mapuꞌa. Soo Te Naa ooosapa ka mogoꞌne tummatzina besa oo sootuhaꞌe oo-kooba tuꞌeyaꞌe.
66012017	Soo sutaꞌyoo yise ka Te Naa Besaa Tooa gi mapuꞌahoose mu wakwawaꞌa-ma maniga. Ka mu wakwawaꞌa nananesootuhi manegase sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa gi mu mapuꞌa.
66013001	Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa yise ka tubetse baa-kumaba wunupetuga. Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi nunuꞌu ka tubetse baa-wiꞌyoona tsebooeke. Sumu mano (10) aa-gana pooha tsotsotuꞌaꞌyaa noꞌoko tu aa-ma. Natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) wo-gana noꞌoko mu tu kwo-ma natubotuguna, “Mu sakwa nu-matoo nanesootuhi.”
66013002	Soo nunuꞌu e poonnena toohooꞌoo-waꞌne tabuꞌa, pana soo oo kuku ka oo tupa-no, wudaꞌa-waꞌne tabua. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka nunuꞌu sutakoo tu pooha geahoo, oosoo yise sutakoo moohedu oo mayugwese oosoo tunetammadu mane.
66013003	Sumuꞌyoo ka nunuꞌu wo-matu pabatsekoo tutzaga-gaꞌyoo, segesa-ma tooꞌe nabatsahoo. Pana soo oo natsegeana besa mani. Noꞌobatusoo mu numu gi Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyudu ka teepu-koobatu oo sookwugaꞌe ka yabesoo besa oo manise, yise oo nakaꞌoedyuku mane.
66013004	Mu numu yise ka sutakoo panetogogwa-matoo nanesootuhi oosoo ka nunuꞌu sutakoo pooha-makase. Ka nunuꞌu-matoo tuwazoo nanesootuhina mee unakwe, “Yowsoo nunuꞌu, gi haga a matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
66013005	Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa ka nunuꞌu nenoyukwe ka Te Naa suda oo netamma tuunguna yise paba naneyugwe, ka umu tamme-kooba ooweoo gwetzoimodu tuwazoo. Ka sutakoo tu pooha oo gea ka pahe yise oo naamookwitu tomoba-witoo oo wumeakuwunukwutu. Oosoo nunuꞌu yise paba kusaꞌa ka Te Naa suda netammakwu mee soonammena ka Te Naa-witu esayiyina.
66013007	Oosoo napooha-maka ka umu Te Naa nakaꞌoedyukudu newohonekwuse, oosoo noꞌobatusoo numu moohedu manekwu tooe hanotu tooe ka yaa teepu-koobatu.
66013008	Mu gi Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu saaꞌa ka nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhikwu.
66013009	Mu sakwa e unnena nakapunne,
66013010	soo nunuꞌu susumudu Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukudu-matu wutumakwu, yise susumudu-matu goekwu. Gi tooe hownnekoo tooe namatzatsebooa-waꞌneꞌyoo. Gi suipana. Tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukuno.
66013011	Kummaꞌyoosoo nunuꞌu yadooawabe, numu nemooagakwudu ka teepu-wiꞌyoona tsebooegena nu oo poonne. Waahoo aa-gaꞌyoo ka seepu dooa-waꞌne. Ka sutakoo panetogogwa-waꞌne yadooakanga. Noꞌoko mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu ka nunuꞌu tutzaga-gaꞌyoo, besa-matoo mu nanesootuhi tuungu.
66013012	Soo nunuꞌu ka tu yadooawabe ka numu nemooagadu noꞌoko tu pooha haneku.
66013013	Soo numu nemooagadu nunuꞌu yadooawabe nanabesa tumadaꞌe ka nunuꞌu-kobenaꞌyoona. Ka goso nekemmaku ka mu numu pumme poonnepunne. Ooonnekoo soo nunuꞌu yadooawabe ka yaa teepu-koobatu mu numu nemooaga. Soo numu nemooagadu ka mu numu, hemma ka nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tabuadu matabue tuungu.
66013015	Soo nunuꞌu yadooawabe ka tu pooha-toohakwi ka hemma nunuꞌu-kwaꞌne tabuadu namadabuedu mesoo yadooꞌe ka mu numu gi pumatoo nanesootuhidu oo goe tuungu.
66013016	Soo nunuꞌu tu yadooawabe meeoo, “Mu numu noꞌobatusoo sakwa nagopo ka tu mi-ma tooetoo tu aa-ma.
66013017	Soo tooe haga tooe ka nunuꞌu nanea-ma gi nakopodu gi hemma-ma tumuna gi hemma tumukwu.”
66013018	Tamme sumuna ka nunuꞌu sopedakwatoo. Oosoo nana oo naneana ka natzetatsungana 666 manakwe.
66014001	Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi soo Te Pabeꞌe ka Te Naa giba-kooba wunu nu oo poonne. Ewaꞌyoo (144,000) numu oo manepunne onona nagopoꞌo, Te Naa tunetammapu.
66014002	Umu tunekwuna, nanakatsebooepunne.
66014003	Umu ka Te Naa pudu hoobea watsukweoo umu Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌemu-kobenaꞌyoona tuwazoo nekwuhu. Umu numu namagwetzoidu suuꞌmu ka hoobea sopedakwadoo.
66014004	Umuoo namagwetzoidu o manepunne ka ooosapa Te Pabeꞌe oedyukumodu gi tototzaba-gaꞌyoo gi hannanoꞌo ka nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhidu. Umu yise Te Naa-baa soo Te Naa yise ka gwetzoibu mu sootuhi.
66014005	Umuoo numu gi hannano esagoedu, ka suda tu tumatuguna mooasoo nematzagakwunipu.
66014006	Nu yise kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo ka teepu-koobakwi oo yotsenumme oo poonne. Oosoo noꞌobatusoo numu noꞌoko ka teepu-koobatu mu nanaꞌatabatumasoo apegeadu tuukweꞌe, “Mu ka mu maꞌemukwana maꞌwukese, soo Te Naa mu sootuhikwu.”
66014007	Oosoo pabatse mee unne, “Ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo nakaꞌoedyuku ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina. Soo Te Naa noꞌokosoo hemma ka teepu-koobatu matabuepu ka tubetse baa yise ka te paꞌanakwatu tuwazoo.”
66014008	Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oo-nakwisoo yotsepunnena mee unakwe, “Soo mu numu ka Rome mee naneadu-wi nonobe-gaꞌyoo nanasuda manena yise mu noꞌobatusoo numu ka mu poonnena umu-kwaꞌne nanasuda manakwe. Umuoosoo nanasuda manena umu-matoosoo kodyuhoose kadoo mu mayugwe.”
66014009	Oꞌno yise soo pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo mu-nakwisoo yutseno meeoo unnemena, “Soo tooe haga tooe ka sutakoo nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhidu ka nunuꞌu oedyukuna,
66014010	soo suda mu manena umu-matoosoo kodyudooa. Umuoo sutaꞌyoo numu saaꞌa ka gi toogedu goso-wi nidooa, oeꞌyoo gi besa namanatzayakwe ka nuummaba wumakwu umu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonnena tooe nasootuaganekwu gi how oo madikwu.
66014012	Umu Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yaa manakwana gi ni-waꞌneꞌyoo ka ooosapa Te Naa nakabetseana ka Te Pabeꞌe nakaꞌoedyukuna tooe ka mu numu pumme wohoꞌne sapa.”
66014013	Sumuꞌyoo yise paꞌanakwana mee unne, “Menoꞌo mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Pabeꞌe-koobatoo nabatsase besa nasootukikwu.” Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha yise mee unne, “Aha, gi hee sutaꞌyoo umu-matoo kodyukwu. Umu yise nasootuhikwu ka besa tumatuguse.”
66014014	Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne oona toha koomeba-ma oo katu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe ka noꞌoko mu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobakwu.
66014015	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo petuoose pabatse Te Pabeꞌe mee netamma, “Ka umu yaa teepu-koobatu noꞌoko u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu matzobakooha. Menoꞌo mooasoo soo Te Naa noꞌoko nemamakwuhoo.”
66014016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko umu pumme nakaꞌoedyukudu matzobakooha.
66014017	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa-baaꞌyoona kemmadu ka kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo mee netamma, “Noꞌoko ka sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobakooha. Yaa manakwana soo suda mu tumatuguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
66014019	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise noꞌoko mu sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu matzobase kadooꞌoo mu mamaꞌe.
66014020	Tubetse ewaꞌyoo gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu kadoo namamaꞌe. Umu kadoo namamaꞌedu mu puupe yise oodutsekoo baa hoo-waꞌne pookoo natsipunnoꞌo dookapu-wi hoodape.
66015001	Yise ka e pooha tuusoobedya-wi natakwatsukwuꞌyoo Te Naa tutummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka mu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu yaa teepu-koobatu suda tumatuguna umu-matoosoo makodyukukwu.
66015002	Oꞌno ewaꞌyoo, Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu ka Te Naa-baa manipetu. Soo pukwi mu konnopunnena ka tubetse besa patatsadyana goso-no namayu-kwaꞌne tabuapunne. Umuoo o konnodu tunakaꞌoedyukudu gi ka nunuꞌu nanea-ma nagopo, umu gi nunuꞌu-matoo nanesootuhaꞌe. Oosoo nunuꞌu gi hownnekoo umu matzooeku-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66015003	Umu ka Te Naa pumme magwetzoise besa sokwama Te Naa tunekwukute ka oꞌnosoo Moses tu nanamooatupu manepu-waꞌneꞌyoo, yise ka Te Pabeꞌe tamme-koobatoo oo nabatsapu-witu nekwuꞌu. Umu meeoo, “U, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo besa manakwe. U ooosapa kaaheno manedu, u noꞌobatusoo numu-kooba katudu.
66015004	Noꞌobatusoo numu mee u nesookwugaꞌe, ‘U tubetse unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. Gi haga u-kwaꞌne besaꞌyoo. Noꞌobatusoo numu u nakaꞌoedyukuna u-matoo nanesootuhikwu, umu ka u nakasopedakwatoona ka pumme u magwetzoipu.’ “
66015005	Nu yise ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona poonnese,
66015006	mu natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo ka Te Naa pukwi manepunne-kwiꞌyoona kuꞌahooke. Umu ka numu nanasuda manepu umu-matoosoo makodyukukwudu. Umu besa toha namasooana oa tupe namadabue-ma tu ama wupaka.
66015007	Sumuꞌyoo yise ka umu watsu Te Naa pooha manepunnena-matu ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo nanasusumu tseda yoongedahoo. Soo tseda mu sutakoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu manena-ma nakaanokute.
66015008	Soo Te Naa Pooha unu natzooe ka Te Naa pukwiꞌyoona kaanohokwu, gi haga ka Te Naa tzage mane-kwaꞌneꞌyoo. Ka mu toha kakasa-gakoo tunetummana mamakwuhoose, oꞌno saaꞌa mu numu ka Te Naa tzageꞌe meesoo manidooa.
66016001	Soo Te Naa ka mu natakwatsukwuoo toha kakasa-gakoo pabatseꞌe mee netamma, “Meaꞌase ka natakwatsukwuoo (7) sutakoo tseda-wi nuunetadu ka mu numu nanasuda manepunne ka teepu-koobatoo makodyuhoo.”
66016002	Soo mooeꞌugasoo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka mease ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatu wukwate ka mu numu ka nunuꞌu nagedu yise unu nananuumadu uagoe.
66016003	Soo waha nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tseda-witu ka tubetse baa-witoo wukwatehoo. Soo yise puupe-kwaꞌne manise, noꞌyoona hee ka tubetse baa-witu batatuihoo.
66016004	Soo pahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo punnoꞌo ka pumme tseda-witu ka teepu-koobatoo wukwatuhoo noꞌyoona yise mu patzona ka baa hooodu-no, puupe mani.
66016005	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee unakwe, “U, Ne Naa u besa manakwe.
66016006	Mu sutaꞌyoo ka umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu yise umu u yadooawabe goehoo ka mu puupe ka teepu-koobatoo wutookahoo. Menoꞌo yise umu ka puupe hebekwu.”
66016007	Nu yise sumuoo nanesootuhiwunu oo naka mee o unakwe, “Aha, Ne Naa unu pooha-gaꞌyoo. U toge tumatuguna. U ka umu u-kwi tunakaꞌoedyukudu u tuukwe-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe.”
66016008	Soo watsu nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka taba-kooba wukwatekoose, unusoo udutu petuhoo mu yise mu numu tooꞌe kootuꞌi pana umu nanasuda ka Te Naa netamma tooe ka oo pooha ka sutakoo tzadyooikudu sapa. Umu uga ka Te Naa nanesootuhina soo Te Naa uga mu sootuhise, umu gi ka Te Naa nakaheesoobedya yise ka nanasuda tu manena gi maꞌwu.
66016010	Soo manege nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu noꞌoko mu nunuꞌu tunetammana umu-koobatoosoo wukwatehoo. Mu nunuꞌu pabeꞌe nagedu togabu-wi mani, puusoo nanatoo nisagoehoose.
66016011	Umu nanasuda ka Te Naa te paꞌanakwatu netamma ka nuummaba wumana ka uagoena. Oo manepana umu gi ka nanasuda tu manena maꞌwu.
66016012	Soo naapahe nadatsungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka paba hooodu Euphrates mee naneadu baa-witoo oo wukwatehoo, soo baa yise pasahoo mu soyuzu ka tabatsebooe-nakwa teepu-gaꞌyoo mesoo kemmaꞌakwu oo-toogoo mu tumaꞌekwu.
66016013	Mu pihoo tsotsoapa pamogo-kwaꞌne tatabuedu nu poonne. Sumuꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa tupiꞌyoona, sumuꞌyoo ka nunuꞌu tupiꞌyoona, soo sumuꞌyoo yise punnoꞌo ka esayaꞌedu yadooawabe tupiꞌyoona kemma.
66016014	Mu tsotsoapa mu numu nemooagakwudu noꞌobatusoo yaa teepu-koobatu nesumuse ka Te Naa oemota neyugwekwutu oꞌno yise Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu.
66016015	Mooasoo soo Te Pabeꞌe Jesus mee unnegapu, “Nu saaꞌa petudooasoo gi numu nuka sookwinoꞌo. Namabetsabepunne oꞌno mu gi nasookwidooa. Mu namabetzapepunnedu nu sootuhikwu.”
66016016	Mu tsotsoapa tumanisakoekukwitu yise noꞌoko mu numu Te Naa wohonedu nesumuhoo ka Armageddon mee naneadu-wi.
66016017	Oꞌno yise soo natakwatsu natasungadu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo pumme tseda-witu ka teepu paꞌanakwitoo wukwatehoo. Soo Te Naa yise tamme-koobatu paba yadooa, “Namamakwuhoo.”
66016018	Oꞌno yise tukwukwetsena, nunuꞌana soo teepu unu yutsungakooha.
66016019	Soo numu nokatuna Rome mee naneadu ka nanasuda manedu petukwadu pahe-baa nuugotehoo. Noꞌoko ka mu numu nogatuna ka teepu-koobatu kadooꞌoo namaꞌe. Soo Te Naa oo soomayu ka umu numu Rome-wi nogatudu tumaꞌemukwana yise umu-matoosoo kodyu.
66016020	Noꞌyoona teepu atasoo mani.
66016021	Yise paꞌanakwana papabatse-ma hakwotukwakooha. Mu papabatseꞌyoo hakwotukwadu ka mu numu-koobatoo sawehoo umu numu yise Te Naa oetu tuꞌaganena suda oo netamma pana umu gi ka nanasuda tumanena maꞌwu.
66017001	Sumuꞌyoo mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo-matu sumuoo mu nanasuda manena uga ka tseda-wikoo yoongana-matu nu-matoo kemmase mee e netamma, “Ta sakwa tupoonnega, nu-no kemmow nu u tzapoonnekukwu ka moogoobu mogoꞌne nanasuda tumaꞌemukwana oo-matoosoo kodyu. Soo mogoꞌne bahoodu-kumaba nobe-gaꞌyoo. Esoo mogoꞌne ewabatusoo numu-kooba katudu.
66017002	Mu teepu-koobatu numu moohedu ugasoo nanasuda oo-no maneyakwe.”
66017003	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise e bika ka e pooha tuusoobedya-kwi ona numu-wanatoo. Nu sumuoo mogoꞌne poonne ka atsa nunuꞌu-kooba oo katu oosoo nunuꞌu ewow oo-ma natuboꞌo mee naꞌunnedu, “Mu sukwa nu-matoo nanesootuhi.” Soo nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gana sumumanoꞌyoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo.
66017004	Soo mogoꞌne unu nanenagadu-kwi namasooana, unu nanenagadu patze tupe oo-maꞌyoona patakwetseakawunu ewow oa tupe hee-gaꞌyoo. Oa tupe namadabuena tseda yoongana noꞌyoona soo suda oo tumatugupu oowekoo yoongakatu.
66017005	Soo mogoꞌne naneana oo oo-ma naboꞌo mee watze naꞌunnedu, “Pabaꞌyoo Rome noꞌobatusoo ka teepu-koobatu suda namanedu mahetapunnedu.”
66017006	Soo mogoꞌne ka umu Te Naa dooamu goena mu puupe-ma bayaꞌe. (Nu ka oo poonnese gi oo nakasopedakwatoo).
66017007	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise mee e netamma, “How manena yise u ka oo poonnepana gi oo nakasopedakwatoo? Nu ka mogoꞌne noko ka nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gakoo,-kooba oo katu-kwitu besasoo u tuukwekwu.
66017008	Soo nunuꞌu oꞌnosoo uga nummenummedu pana menoꞌo yaꞌepu. Soo nunuꞌu pudusoo ka teepu tzatoboyakwusoo saaꞌa kadoo namayugwekwu. Mu gi Te Naa doodooamu gi oo nakasopedakwatoona ka nunuꞌu poonnese.
66017009	U sakwa ekow tuwazoo nakasopedakwatoo soo nunuꞌu natakwatsukwuoo (7) wo-gaꞌyoo natakwatsukwuoo (7) giba manepunnena. Umuoo soo wo punnoꞌo natakwatsukwuꞌyoo (7) numu-kooba aatadu mee tuwazoo naꞌunnedu.
66017010	Manegeꞌyoo tuipu sumuꞌyoo togesoo menoꞌo gwetzoinumme sumuꞌyoo gisoo numu pabeꞌe namayugwe, pana ka petuse oosoo gi haaꞌnoto numu-kooba katukwu.
66017011	Soo nunuꞌu uga gwetzoidu pana menoꞌo gi, puu ugasoo numu-kooba katudu umu natakwatsu-waꞌneꞌyoosoo (7). Saaꞌa oosoo punnoꞌo kadooꞌoo tubetse namayugwekwusoo.
66017012	Soo nunuꞌu sumumanoꞌyoo (10) aa-gaꞌyoo u poonnena sumumanoꞌyoo numu-kooba aatadu mee nanetammana gisoo numu moohedu pana saaꞌa ka nunuꞌu-no numu-kooba aatakwu gi haaꞌnoto.
66017013	Umu noꞌyoona ka nunuꞌu nakabetseakwu yise noꞌoko numu pukooba mu aatadu ooka nakabetseꞌa mayugwekwu.”
66017014	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee e netamma, “Oosoo baa hooodu u poonnena mee naꞌunnedu noꞌobatusoo numu yaa teepu-koobatu nanetammana. Soo nunuꞌu numu nemooagadu ka sumumano (10) numu-kooba aatadu-no ka mogoꞌne gi petzabekwu. Umu oo matzooekuse noꞌoko hemma oo hee-gana hanehookwu. Umu goso-ma oo nikuse kadooꞌoo oo tubetse mamaꞌekwu. Soo Te Naa meeoo tusoohanena umu ꞌyoo manakwe. Umu ka Te Naa unne-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe. Soo mogoꞌne ka u pooha tuusoobedya-kwikoo u poonnena ka Rome nanetammana ka numu nanasuda nenoyukwedu. Umu numu-kooba aatadu ka Te Pabeꞌe wohonena ono nanaꞌakwekwu, soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko umu pumme nagedu pummesoo tunetutzeana-no mu matzooekukwu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko numu ooonnakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
66018001	Ka saaꞌa nu kummaꞌakoosoo toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana tubongo oo wuekena, oosoo mu toha kasa-gakoo moohedu. Besa patakwetzeakena, noꞌoko ka teepu kootabuakukena.
66018002	Pabatseꞌe yadooase mee une, “Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana maꞌwukese ooka Rome-witu namanewunutu Te Naa ooonakwasoo oo sooyukwena. Mu numu-kooba aatadu yaa teepu-koobatu punnoꞌo. Umu hemma-ma tumudu unu moogooba mane ka Rome-witu no tuheꞌnena hemma-ma tumuna, ewa heedooa petuga. Soo pabatseꞌyoo numu pukwi nokatuna, Rome mee naneadu tubetse kadoo namaꞌe. Ewaꞌyoo mu tsotsoapu yise tooe hownneꞌyoo tooe sutaꞌyoo oe manekwu yaa manakwana.”
66018004	Te Naa paꞌanakwana paba yadooa meeꞌe unena, “E nanumu, mu Rome numu suda tumaduguna, gi Rome numu-ma tzabepana. Gi too umu-waꞌnesoo manepana, miꞌyoona mea. Oꞌno soo mu tumaꞌemukwana gi mu-matoosoo kodyudooa.”
66018006	Soo Te Naa meeꞌe too une, “Mu numu ka Rome-witu suda tumaduguna waha oo-koobakwizoo umu-matoosoo kodyudooa.
66018007	Unu oo maꞌe, mu numu puu nuummabu puusoo nagea ka sutakoo numu pu-ma tu poohana, noꞌokosoo hegana. Soo Rome-witu numu meeoo tusooyukwe. ‘Numme yow naduyadu, numu ooonakwa sutakoo pooha-gaꞌyoo. Nu gi a natamawukana. Nu gi hemma suda soonameku-waꞌneꞌyoo.’
66018008	Menoꞌo yise noꞌyoona suda mu tumadugupu, sumu tabeba-wizoo oo-matoosoo kodyukwu. Numu tuikwu, suda nasokwamakwu, yise natseatuikwu. Soo Rome goso-ma kadoo kooyugwekwu. Nu oo mu yukwekwu nu unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
66018009	Ka mu numu-kooba aatadu Rome no tuheneꞌetu gi Te Naa nakabetseadu ka Rome naꞌe, oo kweedapunne, oo poonnena unu suda sokwama.
66018010	Umu suaꞌe ka umu ooosoo maꞌekwu mee sokwamana, kwingaꞌasoo konnopunnena mee une, “Udaꞌa suda tooꞌe, tubetse unu suda. Soo pabatseꞌyoo Rome gi nasoonubooedu yabetse kadoo mani.”
66018011	Mu hemma-ma tumudu ka teepu-koobatu suda sokwamakwu ka Rome gadoo namayukwe, ka gi haga hemma tumu manese.
66018012	Mu numu ka onosoo Rome-witu ewa nanenakadu noꞌobatusoo hemma-ma tumuyakwe.
66018014	Mu wakwawaꞌa hemma-ma tumudu ka mu numu umu-baa tooꞌe petu pana gi hownnekoo hemma tumu-waꞌneꞌyoo. Ka tu hemma gadoo nuugwe gi haga oweoo tunehue-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66018015	Mu wakwawaꞌa hemma-ma tumudu nesuaꞌe ka mu ooosoo namaꞌekwu mee sokwamana, kwingaꞌasoo konnopunnena,
66018016	mee unena, “Uda! Suda tooꞌe, tubetse suda tooe. Soo Rome yabesoo kadooꞌoo namaꞌe. Unu nanenakadu kwasu-gaꞌyoo, oa tupe, unu nanenakadu namasooapu-gaꞌyoo.
66018017	Menoꞌo gadooꞌyoo.” Noꞌyoona mu sake Rome-witoo hemma nodu, baa-koobaꞌyoona ewow natumanagayakwedu kwingaꞌasoo konnopunne.
66018018	Umu ka oetu kweedapunnedu oo nipunne oo poonnese papabatseꞌe mee une, “Gi hanotu ekeow Rome-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
66018019	Umuoo ka suda sokwamana yagana mee unena, “Uda! Suda hiꞌyoo, tubetse suda tooe. Numme besa manekese ka Rome-witu ewa ne tumanagayakwese. Pana Rome yabesoo gadooꞌoo koomani.
66018020	Mu toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo, mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu, mu nanamooatupu soo Te Naa yadooawabe, soo Te Pabeꞌe tunemayakwewabe punnoꞌo, besa sokwama ka Te Naa tunetammana namamakwupu.”
66018021	Yise soo unu natzooedu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo tusoonoo-kwaꞌnekoo pabahoo tupe ka tubetse baa-witoo tawazeoo mee yise une, “Soo Rome mee naneadu yooonnekoosoo kadooꞌoo namaꞌekwu.
66018022	Mu tunekwudu, mu tutzadyagakudu-no gi tunemayukakwu. Mu numu hemma matabuedu punnoꞌo gi onona tumatabuemanekwu gi nahongobetookwu tuwazoo.
66018023	Mu tugootabuakuno punnoꞌo gi gootabua manekwu, mu numu gi nananodukwadoo-waꞌneꞌyoo. Mu papaba nanana hemma-ma tumudu uga ewa oetu mu natumanakakudu ka teepu-koobatu, umu ka sutakoo pooha-gana numu poohadu, suda numu mayugwe.
66018024	Soo Rome oe naneyukwe oosoo ka mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu koese, yise ka Te Naa yadooawabe noꞌoko mu numu teepu-koobatu nakoedu tuwazoo.”
66019001	Nu yise ewatsekoo numu naka tamme-koobakoo Te Naa-baaꞌyoona papabatse mee unena naka, “Soo Te Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo te magwetzoina unu naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, gadooꞌoo hee oo ooonakwa pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
66019002	Besa oosoo Te Naa ka oo mu yugwese ka umu pumme nanesootuhidu, unu suda mu yukwe nabatoo namasawekuna, suda manena. Mooasoo yise mu tumaꞌemukwana umu-matoosoo kodyu.
66019003	Umu yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi papabatseꞌe mee une, “Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa suuꞌmu nesootuhi. Mu Rome numu suda manepu gi nasoomuꞌwa-waꞌneꞌyoo.”
66019004	Mu wahamanoꞌyoona watsumatsebooekudu (24) toha kakasa-gaꞌyoo papabeꞌe ka mu watsukweꞌyoo Te Naa besa pupuaꞌamu manena ponnena meatzedose ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee umu unegono, “Togesapa u Ne Naa tubetse besaꞌyoo.”
66019005	Ka Te Naa kumabaaꞌyoona nu tuapu naka mee une, “Noꞌyoona tamme ka Te Naa nakabetseana oo tumatzidu sakwa oo nesootuhi. Noꞌobatusoo numu oo nakaꞌoedyukudu sakwa punnoꞌo Te Naa netubetseyi.”
66019006	Nu yise tuwazoo ewow numu nakasoo papabatse ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee unekono, “Te Naa mooasoo noꞌokosoo ka sutakoo matzooekupu, soo Te Naa naduyadu pooha-gaꞌyoo, soo Te Naa menoꞌo tamme-kooba tueyaꞌekatu.
66019007	Tamme sakwa ka besa-matoo besa sokwama. Soo Te Pabeꞌe uga nabatsapu menoꞌo gwetzoidu mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu pu-toogoo namamakwupunne nadooha mu mayugwekwu.
66019008	O umu besa tumadugupu, gi tosadu tunakaꞌoedyukudu.”
66019009	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nu-notu yise mee e netamma, “U sakwa eka botugu besa kaaheno ka Te Naa yadooapu mee unakwe, ‘Yaa manakwana umu noꞌyoona ka umu ooosapa Tu Pabeꞌe noꞌyookwu oosoo mu besaa dooamu-gana ooosapa mu sootuhi.’ “
66019010	Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo-kobena meatzedose oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Pana oosoo mee e netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana. Nu ka Te Naa sukwe natumatziwabe numu-kwaꞌnesoo manedu. Ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhi. Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha ka umu Te Naa numu tunepohabeku-too ka Te Pabeꞌe-witu.”
66019011	Nu yise ka Te Pabeꞌe poonne paꞌanakwana aaba-kooba katuna tubongo oo wuekena. Soo Te Pabeꞌe togesapa unakwe ka tu une-kwaꞌnesoo manakwe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe kaaheno besakoo mu numu nemadabuekoo, noꞌoko gi togekoo matzooekudu.
66019012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko gi hemma nekwatzekudu. Noꞌobatusoo soo hee ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohakwi manepunnekwu, noꞌobatusoo numu tooe. Soo Te Pabeꞌe suuꞌmu puusoo nawitu soopedakwadoo.
66019013	Soo Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko soo hemma matzooekupu. Soo Te Pabeꞌe Te Naa madumotseapu, oosoo suuꞌmu tu nanumu magwetzoi.
66019014	Ka Te Naa manepunne-kwiꞌyoona mu nananesootuhidu-no gi totsabu-gana ka Te Pabeꞌe punnoꞌo aabu-gakoo-nakwi woyooadape.
66019015	Ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe yadooꞌa suda manedu gadooꞌoo mani. Soo nanasuda mu manepu umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
66019016	Ka oodutsekoo oo wunagaꞌa-ma yise oo si-ma mee natuboꞌo, “Yowsoo noꞌoko numu-kooba tubetse katukwudu.”
66019017	Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo ka taba tabedooapunne-kwi wunudu poonne, noꞌoko mu a toogoo tukadu yozumodu hootsebaꞌa mee mu netamma, “Mu paba tukakwu ka mu ewa sutaꞌyoo numu pudusoo nagoekwu mu saaꞌa oꞌno mu tukakwu soo Te Naa mooasoo tunemamakwu pu-toogoo a namanekwuna.
66019018	Mu noꞌobatusoo sutaꞌyoo numu tookoo sooakwu, yise mu hootsebaꞌa pookoo tuina tookoo tukakwu tuwazoo.”
66019019	Oꞌno yise nu ka sutakoo nunuꞌu papabeꞌe tu nananumu mu nesumutoo ka Te Pabeꞌe tumooꞌoona poonne.
66019020	Mu nunuꞌu papabeꞌemu yadooawabe nahemahoose ka paba hano-kwi nidabedu oa saanoo-kwaꞌne kookwanapunnedu, kweedapunnedu, numu kweekahaꞌekudu-kwitoo natzabepuꞌa togesoo gwetzoina.
66019021	Noꞌyoona mu Te Pabeꞌe wohonedu, ka Te Pabeꞌe sukwe yadooase gadoo namaꞌe. Noꞌyoona mu hotsebaꞌa mu tookoo tu wuzuꞌme-kwitoo tukana.
66020001	Nu yise ka toha kasa-gakoo poonne paꞌanakwana tubonga wuekena. Oosoo ka sutakoo pukwi nakwutumakwuna teepa tawaga-kwi nanatzakwona pu-ma natzepunooena gwuuna. Soo Te Naa mooasoo ka sutakoo oo tzakuna tuungu.
66020002	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa wutuma ka ooosapa umu mooe namanumudoopu numu nemooagapu oo-ma tzakatuse oo tzagunahoo ewa (1OOO) tomoba-witoo.
66020003	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo ka sutakoo panetogogwa ka pukwi oo nakwutuma-kwitoo tzawunihoose, oo tzatumowse, oo tseboonooehoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa yise ewa tomoba-witoo gi mu numu nemooaga-waꞌneꞌyoo. Soo sutaꞌyoo panetogogwa pihoo nanea-gaꞌyoo Etzaꞌa, tooetoo Sutaꞌyoo mee naneꞌa tuwazoo.
66020004	Oꞌno mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu Te Naa netuzeana mu numu nehanekwudu mu numu-koobena aataꞌa. O umu numu ka Te Pabeꞌe noko Te Naa unnepu tunedyooedu. Ooonneꞌyoona mu sutaꞌyoo numu mu goꞌe. Umu ka Te Pabeꞌe-no ewa (1000) tomoba-witoo mu numu nemadabuekwu.
66020005	Mu sutaꞌyoo numu tuina ka Te Naa tunepohabekuse ka mooe petugase. Ka ewa (1,000) tomoba namamakwuse suuꞌmu.
66020006	Mu tunakaꞌoedyukudu numu punnoꞌo besa tu sokwamakwuna besa nasootuhikwu. Umu gi ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo meakwu.
66020007	Ka ewa (1,000) tomoba namooese soo Sutaꞌyoo ka tu nakwutama-kwiꞌyoona numu-matoo natzamaꞌwukesoo numu tu nemooaga-witoosoo kodyukwu.
66020008	Umu Gog noko Magog Te Naa-matoo nananesootuhidu tumooꞌoodu. Umu tunakaꞌemukwadu ewaꞌyoo, gi nadatsungapu.
66020009	Umu noꞌoko ka teepu-koobakwi manakwana kemmase ka umu ka Te Naa-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pukwiꞌyoona takonekwu yise paꞌanakwana ka goso-ma mu nakootsasooakwu.
66020010	Soo Sutaꞌyoo numu nemooagadu ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo ka nunuꞌu yadooawabe numu nemooagadu oetu tzakwunipu. Umu tatabewano yise totogano ooosapa nuumaba wumakwu.
66020011	Nu yise ka Te Naa poonne pabatsekoo toha kadunoo-kwi ka mu numu nesootunagakatu. Soo teepu oo paꞌana-kwitu ka teepu-no gadooꞌoo namamaꞌe.
66020012	Tuipu numu tooe hano tooe namayosuse, noꞌobatusoo tuipu numu ka Te Naa-kobena konnopunne. Soo Te Naa oꞌnosoo mu manena botugukwu. Sumuꞌyoo yise tubope ka mu numu ooosapa momokwudu naneana pukwi nabona punnoꞌo natzakwunahoo. Mu tuipu numu gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu noꞌoko tu manemopu-ma nanemadabuehoo. Noꞌyoona ka umu tubope-wi nanaboꞌo.
66020014	Tooe haga tooe naneana gi ka tubope-wi nabodu numu ooosapa gwetzoikwuna nasootuhipu ka gi tookedu nikatudu-kwaꞌne. Oꞌno soo numu yaꞌekwuna ka gi tookedu goso-kwitoo natzawunihoo. Oosoo nikatudu-kwaꞌneꞌyoo Penakwa Numu Yaekwuna mee naneꞌa. Umuoo gi Te Naa hee soobedyadu. Oꞌnosoo Etzaꞌa unnepu gadoo namayugwe, oꞌno manakwana numu gi yaꞌe-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66021001	E pooha tuusoobedya-kwi soo Te Naa ekeow teepu-koobatu namapudutupudoo, tamme-koobatu pudu matabuehoo, soo tubetse baa gadooꞌyoo.
66021002	O umuoo Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu pudu teepu-kooba tubewa-gaꞌyoo.
66021003	Sumuꞌyoo Te Naa oo-tuganaꞌyoona meeoo une, “Menoꞌo manakwana soo Te Naa ooosapa tu dooamu-noꞌyoopunnekwu mu ooosapa Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Te Naa ooosapa mu doodooamu-gana mu mabetseakwu.
66021004	Umu teaꞌa noꞌyoona besa sokwamana, nuumaba gadooꞌyoo gi tuikwu.”
66021005	Soo Te Naa meeoo unakwe, “Nu noꞌoko hemma mapudutupudoo u sakwa te nanumu tuukwe e unena kaaheno togeꞌyoo.”
66021006	Soo Te Naa yise e tuukwe, “Nu noꞌokosoo hemma matabuepu yow nu noꞌoko a mamakwuhoopetu. Nu tooe haga tooe nu-toohatoo nasoomawunidu, ka gwetzoibu, gi mobegwa-gakoo mu sootuhikwu.
66021007	Mu numu e besa unnepu nakaꞌoedyukumodu nu besa mu sootuhikwu. Oꞌno yise umuoo pudu teepu-koobatu tabewa-gakwu, nu mu dooamu-gakwu.
66021008	Pana mu sutaꞌyoo numu tuuyapa-gaꞌyoo, wahabu tuusooyugwedu, gi toge-matoo nanesootuhidu, numu goedu, yise too gi toge nanakwenagoedu yise nanapoohadu, esagoedu, umuoo ka gi tookedu goso-witoo natsemaꞌanakwu.”
66021009	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nu-no yadooadu mee tuwazoo e netamma, “Ta sakwa ka umu Te Pabeꞌe unu soobedyana pukwiꞌyookwuna poopoonnega.”
66021010	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo e bikase numme oona paꞌa giba tzogwedu-kwi pepetuga. Numme besakoo mu poonne mu nananesootuhidu-pukwiꞌyookwuna, paaꞌanakwana tubongo ka teepu-koobatoo wuekena,
66021011	besa tabuana ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi.
66021012	Ka e pooha tuusoobedya-toohakwi ka umu sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12) nanaꞌataꞌyoosoo nanatzakwona-gaꞌyoo Jew numu-ma nananeadu. Mu nananesootuhidu pukwi nobeduguna oo naꞌoonakwi tupe nakooduadoo sumu mano waha matsebooekudu (12).
66021013	Watsuba pahe nanaꞌemota nanatsakwoneta, mu numu ka tooe hano manakwana Te Naa-baa petudyina.
66021014	Soo tupe koodua oo naꞌoonakwitu sumu mano wahamatsebooekudu (12) papabatsekoo tupe-kooba namadabuꞌe. Umuoo ka Te Pabeꞌe yadooawabe oo tunemadabuepu mooe wahamodu.
66021015	Soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo oodutsekoo hoope hemma pu-ma namanagana kwuuna, ka mu nananesootuhidu-pukwiꞌyoona nobe-gakwuna managakwuse.
66021016	Ka oo managase nanaꞌemota nananoꞌosoo namanagahoo yise tubetse pabatseꞌyoo (1500 miles). Tubetse ewatsekoo numu mesoo tzidu.
66021017	Soo tupe koodua punnoꞌo tubetse besa namadabuepu.
66021018	Besa tabuana gi totsa-ga-kwaꞌne tabuapunne.
66021019	Ewatsekoo nanaꞌatabasoo besa tatabuadu tupe-ma namadabuepu. Mu po ootoogoo po-kwakwabedu punnoꞌo noꞌyoona oa tupe namadabuena.
66021022	Soo Te Pooha Naa, Te Pabeꞌe-no ooosapa mu numu nagasoo nobe-gaꞌyoo, ooonneꞌyoona umu gi nanesootuhi nobe-gaꞌyoo.
66021023	Noꞌyoona umu oo doodooamu ka Te Pabeꞌe noꞌoko Te Naa pooha-toohakwi manemo. Ooonneꞌyoona gi togaba-gaꞌyoo.
66021024	Noꞌobatusoo numu ka Te Pabeꞌe-toohatoo nanemawunikwu.
66021025	Gadoo hee pu-mama numu nasoosuina.
66021026	Noꞌobatusoo numu oe petudyikwu, ka Te Naa nesoogwugikwuse.
66021027	Tooe haga tooe ka Te Naa Tooaꞌana yise oo-noꞌyookwu. Mu sutaꞌyoo numu gi oe naneꞌegakute mu tooe hemmatu tooe nanesootuhidu punnoꞌo gi oe naneꞌega-waꞌneꞌyoo.
66022001	Oꞌno yise Te Naa tumatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo nuka tu pooha poonnekuna, ka besa patatzadyadu gi totsa-gakoo baa hoodu ka Te Naa noko Te Pabeꞌe-pukwiꞌyoona nakwana kemmadu.
66022002	Umu numu baa hoodu nanaꞌenakwi nanobe-gaꞌyoo, soo besa peha kammadu natukadu ka hoodu nanaꞌenakwi, noꞌoko muha-ma nanakummaꞌakoosoo besa peha kammadu pooe-mamaꞌyoo naayakwe. Soo numu pu-matu peha tukana ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Mu numu yise gi nanakwohonena. Soo numu besa nanano tuunoꞌyugwe.
66022003	Tooe hee sutaꞌyoo otuoo gadooꞌyookwu. Soo Te Naa-no Te Pabeꞌe o numu nehanepunnena, umu ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhina, umuoo ooosapa Te Naa dooamuna
66022004	ooosapa oo-noꞌyookwu.
66022005	Soo Te Naa ka kootabuape manepunnena umu ka oo-baaꞌyoona mu numu gi togabu poonnekwu. Ka ooosapa gi mobegwa-ga gwetzoimokwu, besa sokwamana.
66022006	Mee tuwazoo nu tuusoobedya soo Te Naa tumatzidu toha kasa-gaꞌyoo yise mee e netamma, “Nu toge kaaheno tuukwe, ka Te Naa tubetse tunemadipu nuka oo tunemanekupu nu mu tuukweꞌe. Soo Te Naa mu tuukwepu pudusoo a namanekwuna.
66022007	Soo Te Pabeꞌe pudusoo ka teepu-kooba kodyu petukwu.” Soo tooe haga tooe ekeow nakaꞌoedyukudu, ka a naꞌunepu mayohona besa sokwamamokwu.
66022008	Nu ka hemma poonnese, oo nakase tuwazoo, ka toha kasa-gakoo kobena meatzedose, oo-matoo nanesootuhikooha.
66022009	Pana soo toha kasa-gaꞌyoo mee e netamma, “Gi nu-matoo nanesootuhipana, ta nawaꞌneꞌyoosoo. Tamme Te Naa-toohatu nanakwaꞌnesoo, tamme sakwa ooosapa ka Te Naa-matoo suuꞌmu nanesootuhimo.”
66022010	Mee tuwazoo e netamma, “U nanumu tuukwe soo hemma ꞌyoo manekwuna tuganaꞌa manegena. Mu tubetse gi tunakaꞌoedyukudu sumuna gi nasoomamakwudu.”
66022012	Soo Te Pabeꞌe mee e netamma, “Nu pudusoo numu-basoo kodyu petukwu. Nu besa tuꞌoedyukudu sootuhikwu pana gi tuꞌoedyukudu suda namanatsayakwu.
66022013	Nu yow noꞌoko hemma matabuepu. Nu noꞌoko hemma mamakwu petugakwudu.
66022014	Tooe haga tooe ka suta tu manena soomoodyise ka nu-tooha manise besa soonamekwu, ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu ooosapa yise nu-noꞌyookwu.
66022015	Mu gi toge manedu nu tzasobedyakwu gi nu mu sootuhikwu. Nu ka nanaꞌesagoena, nanasuda tumaduguna, kummaꞌakoosoo-matoo nanesootuhina, numu goena, nanapoohana, umuoo yise gi nasootuhikwu.”
66022016	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeꞌe e netamma, “Noꞌoko hemma u tuusoobedyana te nanumu tuukwe. Nu yow Mu Tubetse Pabeꞌe, unu pooha-gaꞌyoo.”
66022017	Soo Te Naa Besa Pooha, Te Pabeꞌe-wi tunakaꞌoedyukudu-no, ka mu yaatoo numu meeoo netamma, “Te Pabeꞌe-tooha manese oo nakaꞌoedyukuna, mu ka gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoibu-ma nasootuhikwu.”
66022018	Tooe haga tooe a nakadu gi atasoo a neyugwena a wahapana. Tooe haga tooe ka oo manedu gi toge manedu numu-no goso-witoo natsekwunikwu ka noꞌoko a nanemamakwu petugase.
66022020	Soo Te Pabeꞌe meeoo, “Pudusoo nu petukwu, mee oosoo unegapu.” Numme oo soogwedakuna yabesoo oo petukwuna soogwina nanesootuhiyakwe.
66022021	Nu yise noꞌoko mu nanesootuhikute soo Te Pabeꞌe mu sootuhikwu. s Maꞌnoꞌyoo sapa.
